mPDF

The Gravity PDF mPDF class.

The class is defined in the following location(s).

  662.     var $OrientationChanges; //array indicating orientation changes 
  663.     var $k; //scale factor (number of points in user unit) 
  664.     var $fwPt; 
  665.     var $fhPt; //dimensions of page format in points 
  666.     var $fw; 
  667.     var $fh; //dimensions of page format in user unit 
  668.     var $wPt; 
  669.     var $hPt; //current dimensions of page in points 
  670.     var $w; 
  671.     var $h; //current dimensions of page in user unit 
  672.     var $lMargin; //left margin 
  673.     var $tMargin; //top margin 
  674.     var $rMargin; //right margin 
  675.     var $bMargin; //page break margin 
  676.     var $cMarginL; //cell margin Left 
  677.     var $cMarginR; //cell margin Right 
  678.     var $cMarginT; //cell margin Left 
  679.     var $cMarginB; //cell margin Right 
  680.     var $DeflMargin; //Default left margin 
  681.     var $DefrMargin; //Default right margin 
  682.     var $x; 
  683.     var $y; //current position in user unit for cell positioning 
  684.     var $lasth; //height of last cell printed 
  685.     var $LineWidth; //line width in user unit 
  686.     var $CoreFonts; //array of standard font names 
  687.     var $fonts; //array of used fonts 
  688.     var $FontFiles; //array of font files 
  689.     var $images; //array of used images 
  690.     var $PageLinks; //array of links in pages 
  691.     var $links; //array of internal links 
  692.     var $FontFamily; //current font family 
  693.     var $FontStyle; //current font style 
  694.     var $CurrentFont; //current font info 
  695.     var $FontSizePt; //current font size in points 
  696.     var $FontSize; //current font size in user unit 
  697.     var $DrawColor; //commands for drawing color 
  698.     var $FillColor; //commands for filling color 
  699.     var $TextColor; //commands for text color 
  700.     var $ColorFlag; //indicates whether fill and text colors are different 
  701.     var $autoPageBreak; //automatic page breaking 
  702.     var $PageBreakTrigger; //threshold used to trigger page breaks 
  703.     var $InFooter; //flag set when processing footer 
  704.  
  705.     var $InHTMLFooter; 
  706.     var $processingFooter; //flag set when processing footer - added for columns 
  707.     var $processingHeader; //flag set when processing header - added for columns 
  708.     var $ZoomMode; //zoom display mode 
  709.     var $LayoutMode; //layout display mode 
  710.     var $title; //title 
  711.     var $subject; //subject 
  712.     var $author; //author 
  713.     var $keywords; //keywords 
  714.     var $creator; //creator 
  715.  
  716.     var $aliasNbPg; //alias for total number of pages 
  717.     var $aliasNbPgGp; //alias for total number of pages in page group 
  718.  
  719.     //var $aliasNbPgHex;    // mPDF 6 deleted 
  720.     //var $aliasNbPgGpHex;    // mPDF 6 deleted 
  721.  
  722.     var $ispre; 
  723.     var $outerblocktags; 
  724.     var $innerblocktags; 
  725.  
  726.     // ********************************** 
  727.     // ********************************** 
  728.     // ********************************** 
  729.     // ********************************** 
  730.     // ********************************** 
  731.     // ********************************** 
  732.     // ********************************** 
  733.     // ********************************** 
  734.     // ********************************** 
  735.  
  736.     private $tag; 
  737.  
  738.     public function __construct($mode = '', $format = 'A4', $default_font_size = 0, $default_font = '', $mgl = 15, $mgr = 15, $mgt = 16, $mgb = 16, $mgh = 9, $mgf = 9, $orientation = 'P') 
  739.     { 
  740.         /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  741.         if (!class_exists('grad', false)) { 
  742.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/grad.php'); 
  743.         } 
  744.         if (empty($this->grad)) { 
  745.             $this->grad = new grad($this); 
  746.         } 
  747.         /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  748.         /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  749.         if (!class_exists('mpdfform', false)) { 
  750.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/mpdfform.php'); 
  751.         } 
  752.         if (empty($this->mpdfform)) { 
  753.             $this->mpdfform = new mpdfform($this); 
  754.         } 
  755.         /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  756.  
  757.         $this->time0 = microtime(true); 
  758.         //Some checks 
  759.         $this->_dochecks(); 
  760.  
  761.         $this->writingToC = false; 
  762.         $this->layers = array(); 
  763.         $this->current_layer = 0; 
  764.         $this->open_layer_pane = false; 
  765.  
  766.         $this->visibility = 'visible'; 
  767.  
  768.         //Initialization of properties 
  769.         $this->spotColors = array(); 
  770.         $this->spotColorIDs = array(); 
  771.         $this->tableBackgrounds = array(); 
  772.         $this->uniqstr = '20110230'; // mPDF 5.7.2 
  773.         $this->kt_y00 = ''; 
  774.         $this->kt_p00 = ''; 
  775.         $this->iterationCounter = false; 
  776.         $this->BMPonly = array(); 
  777.         $this->page = 0; 
  778.         $this->n = 2; 
  779.         $this->buffer = ''; 
  780.         $this->objectbuffer = array(); 
  781.         $this->pages = array(); 
  782.         $this->OrientationChanges = array(); 
  783.         $this->state = 0; 
  784.         $this->fonts = array(); 
  785.         $this->FontFiles = array(); 
  786.         $this->images = array(); 
  787.         $this->links = array(); 
  788.         $this->InFooter = false; 
  789.         $this->processingFooter = false; 
  790.         $this->processingHeader = false; 
  791.         $this->lasth = 0; 
  792.         $this->FontFamily = ''; 
  793.         $this->FontStyle = ''; 
  794.         $this->FontSizePt = 9; 
  795.         $this->U = false; 
  796.         // Small Caps 
  797.         $this->upperCase = array(); 
  798.         $this->smCapsScale = 1; 
  799.         $this->smCapsStretch = 100; 
  800.         $this->margBuffer = 0; 
  801.         $this->inMeter = false; 
  802.         $this->decimal_offset = 0; 
  803.  
  804.         $this->defTextColor = $this->TextColor = $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0), true); 
  805.         $this->defDrawColor = $this->DrawColor = $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0), true); 
  806.         $this->defFillColor = $this->FillColor = $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255), true); 
  807.  
  808.         //SVG color names array 
  809.         //http://www.w3schools.com/css/css_colornames.asp 
  810.         $this->SVGcolors = array('antiquewhite' => '#FAEBD7', 'aqua' => '#00FFFF', 'aquamarine' => '#7FFFD4', 'beige' => '#F5F5DC', 'black' => '#000000',  
  811.             'blue' => '#0000FF', 'brown' => '#A52A2A', 'cadetblue' => '#5F9EA0', 'chocolate' => '#D2691E', 'cornflowerblue' => '#6495ED', 'crimson' => '#DC143C',

  815.             'gray' => '#808080', 'green' => '#008000', 'greenyellow' => '#ADFF2F', 'hotpink' => '#FF69B4', 'indigo' => '#4B0082', 'khaki' => '#F0E68C',  
  816.             'lavenderblush' => '#FFF0F5', 'lemonchiffon' => '#FFFACD', 'lightcoral' => '#F08080', 'lightgoldenrodyellow' => '#FAFAD2', 'lightgreen' => '#90EE90',  
  817.             'lightsalmon' => '#FFA07A', 'lightskyblue' => '#87CEFA', 'lightslategray' => '#778899', 'lightyellow' => '#FFFFE0', 'lime' => '#00FF00', 'limegreen' => '#32CD32',

  823.             'slategray' => '#708090', 'springgreen' => '#00FF7F', 'steelblue' => '#4682B4', 'tan' => '#D2B48C', 'teal' => '#008080', 'thistle' => '#D8BFD8', 'turquoise' => '#40E0D0',  
  824.             'violetred' => '#D02090', 'white' => '#FFFFFF', 'yellow' => '#FFFF00',  
  825.             'aliceblue' => '#f0f8ff', 'azure' => '#f0ffff', 'bisque' => '#ffe4c4', 'blanchedalmond' => '#ffebcd', 'blueviolet' => '#8a2be2', 'burlywood' => '#deb887',  
  826.             'chartreuse' => '#7fff00', 'coral' => '#ff7f50', 'cornsilk' => '#fff8dc', 'cyan' => '#00ffff', 'darkcyan' => '#008b8b', 'darkgray' => '#a9a9a9',  
  827.             'darkgrey' => '#a9a9a9', 'darkkhaki' => '#bdb76b', 'darkolivegreen' => '#556b2f', 'darkorchid' => '#9932cc', 'darksalmon' => '#e9967a',  
  828.             'darkslateblue' => '#483d8b', 'darkslategrey' => '#2f4f4f', 'darkturquoise' => '#00ced1', 'deeppink' => '#ff1493', 'dimgray' => '#696969',  
  829.             'dimgrey' => '#696969', 'floralwhite' => '#fffaf0', 'ghostwhite' => '#f8f8ff', 'goldenrod' => '#daa520', 'grey' => '#808080', 'honeydew' => '#f0fff0',  
  830.             'indianred' => '#cd5c5c', 'ivory' => '#fffff0', 'lavender' => '#e6e6fa', 'lawngreen' => '#7cfc00', 'lightblue' => '#add8e6', 'lightcyan' => '#e0ffff',  
  831.             'lightgray' => '#d3d3d3', 'lightgrey' => '#d3d3d3', 'lightpink' => '#ffb6c1', 'lightseagreen' => '#20b2aa', 'lightslategrey' => '#778899',  
  832.             'lightsteelblue' => '#b0c4de', 'linen' => '#faf0e6', 'mediumblue' => '#0000cd', 'mediumpurple' => '#9370db', 'mediumslateblue' => '#7b68ee',  
  833.             'mediumturquoise' => '#48d1cc', 'mistyrose' => '#ffe4e1', 'navajowhite' => '#ffdead', 'oldlace' => '#fdf5e6', 'olivedrab' => '#6b8e23', 'orangered' => '#ff4500',  
  834.             'palegoldenrod' => '#eee8aa', 'paleturquoise' => '#afeeee', 'papayawhip' => '#ffefd5', 'peru' => '#cd853f', 'plum' => '#dda0dd', 'rosybrown' => '#bc8f8f',  
  835.             'saddlebrown' => '#8b4513', 'sandybrown' => '#f4a460', 'seashell' => '#fff5ee', 'slateblue' => '#6a5acd', 'slategrey' => '#708090', 'snow' => '#fffafa',  
  836.             'tomato' => '#ff6347', 'violet' => '#ee82ee', 'wheat' => '#f5deb3', 'whitesmoke' => '#f5f5f5', 'yellowgreen' => '#9acd32'); 
  837.  
  838.         // Uppercase alternatives (for Small Caps) 
  839.         if (empty($this->upperCase)) { 
  840.             @include(_MPDF_PATH . 'includes/upperCase.php'); 
  841.         } 
  842.         $this->extrapagebreak = true; // mPDF 6 pagebreaktype 
  843.  
  844.         $this->ColorFlag = false; 
  845.         $this->extgstates = array(); 
  846.  
  847.         $this->mb_enc = 'windows-1252'; 
  848.         $this->directionality = 'ltr'; 
  849.         $this->defaultAlign = 'L'; 
  850.         $this->defaultTableAlign = 'L'; 
  851.  
  852.         $this->fixedPosBlockSave = array(); 
  853.         $this->extraFontSubsets = 0; 
  854.  
  855.         $this->SHYpatterns = array(); 
  856.         $this->loadedSHYdictionary = false; 
  857.         $this->SHYdictionary = array(); 
  858.         $this->SHYdictionaryWords = array(); 
  859.         $this->blockContext = 1; 
  860.         $this->floatDivs = array(); 
  861.         $this->DisplayPreferences = ''; 
  862.  
  863.         $this->patterns = array();  // Tiling patterns used for backgrounds 
  864.         $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  865.         $this->writingHTMLheader = false; // internal flag - used both for writing HTMLHeaders/Footers and FixedPos block 
  866.         $this->writingHTMLfooter = false; // internal flag - used both for writing HTMLHeaders/Footers and FixedPos block 
  867.         $this->gradients = array(); 
  868.  
  869.         $this->kwt_Reference = array(); 
  870.         $this->kwt_BMoutlines = array(); 
  871.         $this->kwt_toc = array(); 
  872.  
  873.         $this->tbrot_BMoutlines = array(); 
  874.         $this->tbrot_toc = array(); 
  875.  
  876.         $this->col_BMoutlines = array(); 
  877.         $this->col_toc = array(); 
  878.         $this->graphs = array(); 
  879.  
  880.         $this->pgsIns = array(); 
  881.         $this->PDFAXwarnings = array(); 
  882.         $this->inlineDisplayOff = false; 
  883.         $this->lSpacingCSS = ''; 
  884.         $this->wSpacingCSS = ''; 
  885.         $this->fixedlSpacing = false; 
  886.         $this->minwSpacing = 0; 
  887.  
  888.  
  889.         $this->baselineC = 0.35; // Baseline for text 
  890.         // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  891.         $this->baselineSup = 0.5; // Sets default change in baseline for <sup> text as factor of preceeding fontsize 
  892.         // 0.35 has been recommended; 0.5 matches applications like MS Word 
  893.         $this->baselineSub = -0.2; // Sets default change in baseline for <sub> text as factor of preceeding fontsize 
  894.         $this->baselineS = 0.3;  // Sets default height for <strike> text as factor of fontsize 
  895.         $this->baselineO = 1.1;  // Sets default height for overline text as factor of fontsize 
  896.  
  897.         $this->noImageFile = str_replace("\\", "/", dirname(__FILE__)) . '/includes/no_image.jpg'; 
  898.         $this->subPos = 0; 
  899.         $this->normalLineheight = 1.3; // This should be overridden in config.php - but it is so important a default value is put here 
  900.         // These are intended as configuration variables, and should be set in config.php - which will override these values; 
  901.         // set here as failsafe as will cause an error if not defined 
  902.         $this->incrementFPR1 = 10; 
  903.         $this->incrementFPR2 = 10; 
  904.         $this->incrementFPR3 = 10; 
  905.         $this->incrementFPR4 = 10; 
  906.  
  907.         $this->fullImageHeight = false; 
  908.         $this->floatbuffer = array(); 
  909.         $this->floatmargins = array(); 
  910.         $this->formobjects = array(); // array of Form Objects for WMF 
  911.         $this->InlineProperties = array(); 
  912.         $this->InlineAnnots = array(); 
  913.         $this->InlineBDF = array(); // mPDF 6 
  914.         $this->InlineBDFctr = 0; // mPDF 6 
  915.         $this->tbrot_Annots = array(); 
  916.         $this->kwt_Annots = array(); 
  917.         $this->columnAnnots = array(); 
  918.         $this->pageDim = array(); 
  919.         $this->breakpoints = array(); // used in columnbuffer 
  920.         $this->tableLevel = 0; 
  921.         $this->tbctr = array(); // counter for nested tables at each level 
  922.         $this->page_box = array(); 
  923.         $this->show_marks = ''; // crop or cross marks 
  924.         $this->kwt = false; 
  925.         $this->kwt_height = 0; 
  926.         $this->kwt_y0 = 0; 
  927.         $this->kwt_x0 = 0; 
  928.         $this->kwt_buffer = array(); 
  929.         $this->kwt_Links = array(); 
  930.         $this->kwt_moved = false; 
  931.         $this->kwt_saved = false; 
  932.         $this->PageNumSubstitutions = array(); 
  933.         $this->base_table_properties = array(); 
  934.         $this->borderstyles = array('inset', 'groove', 'outset', 'ridge', 'dotted', 'dashed', 'solid', 'double'); 
  935.         $this->tbrot_align = 'C'; 
  936.  
  937.         $this->pageHTMLheaders = array(); 
  938.         $this->pageHTMLfooters = array(); 
  939.         $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array(); 
  940.         $this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots = array(); 
  941.  
  942.         $this->HTMLheaderPageForms = array(); 
  943.         $this->columnForms = array(); 
  944.         $this->tbrotForms = array(); 
  945.         $this->useRC128encryption = false; 
  946.         $this->uniqid = ''; 
  947.  
  948.         $this->pageoutput = array(); 
  949.  
  950.         $this->bufferoutput = false; 
  951.         $this->encrypted = false;      //whether document is protected 
  952.         $this->BMoutlines = array(); 
  953.         $this->ColActive = 0;          //Flag indicating that columns are on (the index is being processed) 
  954.         $this->Reference = array();    //Array containing the references 
  955.         $this->CurrCol = 0;               //Current column number 
  956.         $this->ColL = array(0);   // Array of Left pos of columns - absolute - needs Margin correction for Odd-Even 
  957.         $this->ColR = array(0);   // Array of Right pos of columns - absolute pos - needs Margin correction for Odd-Even 
  958.         $this->ChangeColumn = 0; 
  959.         $this->columnbuffer = array(); 
  960.         $this->ColDetails = array();  // Keeps track of some column details 
  961.         $this->columnLinks = array();  // Cross references PageLinks 
  962.         $this->substitute = array();  // Array of substitution strings e.g. <ttz>112</ttz> 
  963.         $this->entsearch = array();  // Array of HTML entities (>ASCII 127) to substitute 
  964.         $this->entsubstitute = array(); // Array of substitution decimal unicode for the Hi entities 
  965.         $this->lastoptionaltag = ''; 
  966.         $this->charset_in = ''; 
  967.         $this->blk = array(); 
  968.         $this->blklvl = 0; 
  969.         $this->tts = false; 
  970.         $this->ttz = false; 
  971.         $this->tta = false; 
  972.         $this->ispre = false; 
  973.  
  974.         $this->checkSIP = false; 
  975.         $this->checkSMP = false; 
  976.         $this->checkCJK = false; 
  977.  
  978.         $this->page_break_after_avoid = false; 
  979.         $this->margin_bottom_collapse = false; 
  980.         $this->tablethead = 0; 
  981.         $this->tabletfoot = 0; 
  982.         $this->table_border_attr_set = 0; 
  983.         $this->table_border_css_set = 0; 
  984.         $this->shrin_k = 1.0; 
  985.         $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit = 0; 
  986.         $this->MarginCorrection = 0; 
  987.  
  988.         $this->tabletheadjustfinished = false; 
  989.         $this->usingCoreFont = false; 
  990.         $this->charspacing = 0; 
  991.  
  992.         $this->autoPageBreak = true; 
  993.  
  994.         require(_MPDF_PATH . 'config.php'); // config data 
  995.  
  996.         $this->_setPageSize($format, $orientation); 
  997.         $this->DefOrientation = $orientation; 
  998.  
  999.         $this->margin_header = $mgh; 
  1000.         $this->margin_footer = $mgf; 
  1001.  
  1002.         $bmargin = $mgb; 
  1003.  
  1004.         $this->DeflMargin = $mgl; 
  1005.         $this->DefrMargin = $mgr; 
  1006.  
  1007.         $this->orig_tMargin = $mgt; 
  1008.         $this->orig_bMargin = $bmargin; 
  1009.         $this->orig_lMargin = $this->DeflMargin; 
  1010.         $this->orig_rMargin = $this->DefrMargin; 
  1011.         $this->orig_hMargin = $this->margin_header; 
  1012.         $this->orig_fMargin = $this->margin_footer; 
  1013.  
  1014.         if ($this->setAutoTopMargin == 'pad') { 
  1015.             $mgt += $this->margin_header; 
  1016.         } 
  1017.         if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin == 'pad') { 
  1018.             $mgb += $this->margin_footer; 
  1019.         } 
  1020.         $this->SetMargins($this->DeflMargin, $this->DefrMargin, $mgt); // sets l r t margin 
  1021.         //Automatic page break 
  1022.         $this->SetAutoPageBreak($this->autoPageBreak, $bmargin); // sets $this->bMargin & PageBreakTrigger 
  1023.  
  1024.         $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  1025.  
  1026.         //Interior cell margin (1 mm) ? not used 
  1027.         $this->cMarginL = 1; 
  1028.         $this->cMarginR = 1; 
  1029.         //Line width (0.2 mm) 
  1030.         $this->LineWidth = .567 / _MPDFK; 
  1031.  
  1032.         //To make the function Footer() work - replaces {nb} with page number 
  1033.         $this->AliasNbPages(); 
  1034.         $this->AliasNbPageGroups(); 
  1035.  
  1036.         //$this->aliasNbPgHex = '{nbHEXmarker}';    // mPDF 6 deleted 
  1037.         //$this->aliasNbPgGpHex = '{nbpgHEXmarker}';    // mPDF 6 deleted 
  1038.         //Enable all tags as default 
  1039.         $this->DisableTags(); 
  1040.         //Full width display mode 
  1041.         $this->SetDisplayMode(100); // fullwidth?        'fullpage' 
  1042.         //Compression 
  1043.         $this->SetCompression(true); 
  1044.         //Set default display preferences 
  1045.         $this->SetDisplayPreferences(''); 
  1046.  
  1047.         // Font data 
  1048.         require(_MPDF_PATH . 'config_fonts.php'); 
  1049.  
  1050.         // check for a custom config file that can add/overwrite the default config 
  1051.         if (defined('_MPDF_SYSTEM_TTFONTS_CONFIG') && file_exists(_MPDF_SYSTEM_TTFONTS_CONFIG)) { 
  1052.             require(_MPDF_SYSTEM_TTFONTS_CONFIG); 
  1053.         } 
  1054.  
  1055.         // Available fonts 
  1056.         $this->available_unifonts = array(); 
  1057.         foreach ($this->fontdata AS $f => $fs) { 
  1058.             if (isset($fs['R']) && $fs['R']) { 
  1059.                 $this->available_unifonts[] = $f; 
  1060.             } 
  1061.             if (isset($fs['B']) && $fs['B']) { 
  1062.                 $this->available_unifonts[] = $f . 'B'; 
  1063.             } 
  1064.             if (isset($fs['I']) && $fs['I']) { 
  1065.                 $this->available_unifonts[] = $f . 'I'; 
  1066.             } 
  1067.             if (isset($fs['BI']) && $fs['BI']) { 
  1068.                 $this->available_unifonts[] = $f . 'BI'; 
  1069.             } 
  1070.         } 
  1071.  
  1072.         $this->default_available_fonts = $this->available_unifonts; 
  1073.  
  1074.         $optcore = false; 
  1075.         $onlyCoreFonts = false; 
  1076.         if (preg_match('/([\-+])aCJK/i', $mode, $m)) { 
  1077.             $mode = preg_replace('/([\-+])aCJK/i', '', $mode); // mPDF 6 
  1078.             if ($m[1] == '+') { 
  1079.                 $this->useAdobeCJK = true; 
  1080.             } else { 
  1081.                 $this->useAdobeCJK = false; 
  1082.             } 
  1083.         } 
  1084.  
  1085.         if (strlen($mode) == 1) { 
  1086.             if ($mode == 's') { 
  1087.                 $this->percentSubset = 100; 
  1088.                 $mode = ''; 
  1089.             } elseif ($mode == 'c') { 
  1090.                 $onlyCoreFonts = true; 
  1091.                 $mode = ''; 
  1092.             } 
  1093.         } elseif (substr($mode, -2) == '-s') { 
  1094.             $this->percentSubset = 100; 
  1095.             $mode = substr($mode, 0, strlen($mode) - 2); 
  1096.         } elseif (substr($mode, -2) == '-c') { 
  1097.             $onlyCoreFonts = true; 
  1098.             $mode = substr($mode, 0, strlen($mode) - 2); 
  1099.         } elseif (substr($mode, -2) == '-x') { 
  1100.             $optcore = true; 
  1101.             $mode = substr($mode, 0, strlen($mode) - 2); 
  1102.         } 
  1103.  
  1104.         // Autodetect if mode is a language_country string (en-GB or en_GB or en) 
  1105.         if ($mode && $mode != 'UTF-8') { // mPDF 6 
  1106.             list ($coreSuitable, $mpdf_pdf_unifont) = GetLangOpts($mode, $this->useAdobeCJK, $this->fontdata); 
  1107.             if ($coreSuitable && $optcore) { 
  1108.                 $onlyCoreFonts = true; 
  1109.             } 
  1110.             if ($mpdf_pdf_unifont) {  // mPDF 6 
  1111.                 $default_font = $mpdf_pdf_unifont; 
  1112.             } 
  1113.             $this->currentLang = $mode; 
  1114.             $this->default_lang = $mode; 
  1115.         } 
  1116.  
  1117.         $this->onlyCoreFonts = $onlyCoreFonts; 
  1118.  
  1119.         if ($this->onlyCoreFonts) { 
  1120.             $this->setMBencoding('windows-1252'); // sets $this->mb_enc 
  1121.         } else { 
  1122.             $this->setMBencoding('UTF-8'); // sets $this->mb_enc 
  1123.         } 
  1124.         @mb_regex_encoding('UTF-8'); // required only for mb_ereg... and mb_split functions 
  1125.         // Adobe CJK fonts 
  1126.         $this->available_CJK_fonts = array('gb', 'big5', 'sjis', 'uhc', 'gbB', 'big5B', 'sjisB', 'uhcB', 'gbI', 'big5I', 'sjisI', 'uhcI',  
  1127.             'gbBI', 'big5BI', 'sjisBI', 'uhcBI'); 
  1128.  
  1129.  
  1130.         //Standard fonts 
  1131.         $this->CoreFonts = array('ccourier' => 'Courier', 'ccourierB' => 'Courier-Bold', 'ccourierI' => 'Courier-Oblique', 'ccourierBI' => 'Courier-BoldOblique',  
  1132.             'chelvetica' => 'Helvetica', 'chelveticaB' => 'Helvetica-Bold', 'chelveticaI' => 'Helvetica-Oblique', 'chelveticaBI' => 'Helvetica-BoldOblique',  
  1133.             'ctimes' => 'Times-Roman', 'ctimesB' => 'Times-Bold', 'ctimesI' => 'Times-Italic', 'ctimesBI' => 'Times-BoldItalic',  
  1134.             'csymbol' => 'Symbol', 'czapfdingbats' => 'ZapfDingbats'); 
  1135.         $this->fontlist = array("ctimes", "ccourier", "chelvetica", "csymbol", "czapfdingbats"); 
  1136.  
  1137.         // Substitutions 
  1138.         $this->setHiEntitySubstitutions(); 
  1139.  
  1140.         if ($this->onlyCoreFonts) { 
  1141.             $this->useSubstitutions = true; 
  1142.             $this->SetSubstitutions(); 
  1143.         } 
  1144.  
  1145.         /** -- HTML-CSS -- */ 
  1146.  
  1147.         if (!class_exists('cssmgr', false)) { 
  1148.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/cssmgr.php'); 
  1149.         } 
  1150.         $this->cssmgr = new cssmgr($this); 
  1151.         // mPDF 6 
  1152.         if (file_exists(_MPDF_PATH . 'mpdf.css')) { 
  1153.             $css = file_get_contents(_MPDF_PATH . 'mpdf.css'); 
  1154.             $this->cssmgr->ReadCSS('<style> ' . $css . ' </style>'); 
  1155.         } 
  1156.         /** -- END HTML-CSS -- */ 
  1157.  
  1158.         if ($default_font == '') { 
  1159.             if ($this->onlyCoreFonts) { 
  1160.                 if (in_array(strtolower($this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-FAMILY']), $this->mono_fonts)) { 
  1161.                     $default_font = 'ccourier'; 
  1162.                 } elseif (in_array(strtolower($this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-FAMILY']), $this->sans_fonts)) { 
  1163.                     $default_font = 'chelvetica'; 
  1164.                 } else { 
  1165.                     $default_font = 'ctimes'; 
  1166.                 } 
  1167.             } else { 
  1168.                 $default_font = $this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-FAMILY']; 
  1169.             } 
  1170.         } 
  1171.         if (!$default_font_size) { 
  1172.             $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-SIZE']); 
  1173.             $default_font_size = $mmsize * (_MPDFK); 
  1174.         } 
  1175.  
  1176.         if ($default_font) { 
  1177.             $this->SetDefaultFont($default_font); 
  1178.         } 
  1179.         if ($default_font_size) { 
  1180.             $this->SetDefaultFontSize($default_font_size); 
  1181.         } 
  1182.  
  1183.         $this->SetLineHeight(); // lineheight is in mm 
  1184.  
  1185.         $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  1186.         $this->HREF = ''; 
  1187.         $this->oldy = -1; 
  1188.         $this->B = 0; 
  1189.         $this->I = 0; 
  1190.  
  1191.         // mPDF 6  Lists 
  1192.         $this->listlvl = 0; 
  1193.         $this->listtype = array(); 
  1194.         $this->listitem = array(); 
  1195.         $this->listcounter = array(); 
  1196.  
  1197.         $this->tdbegin = false; 
  1198.         $this->table = array(); 
  1199.         $this->cell = array(); 
  1200.         $this->col = -1; 
  1201.         $this->row = -1; 
  1202.         $this->cellBorderBuffer = array(); 
  1203.  
  1204.         $this->divbegin = false; 
  1205.         // mPDF 6 
  1206.         $this->cellTextAlign = ''; 
  1207.         $this->cellLineHeight = ''; 
  1208.         $this->cellLineStackingStrategy = ''; 
  1209.         $this->cellLineStackingShift = ''; 
  1210.  
  1211.         $this->divwidth = 0; 
  1212.         $this->divheight = 0; 
  1213.         $this->spanbgcolor = false; 
  1214.         $this->spanborder = false; 
  1215.         $this->spanborddet = array(); 
  1216.  
  1217.         $this->blockjustfinished = false; 
  1218.         $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; //in order to eliminate exceeding left-side spaces 
  1219.         $this->dash_on = false; 
  1220.         $this->dotted_on = false; 
  1221.         $this->textshadow = ''; 
  1222.  
  1223.         $this->currentfontfamily = ''; 
  1224.         $this->currentfontsize = ''; 
  1225.         $this->currentfontstyle = ''; 
  1226.         $this->colorarray = ''; // mPDF 6 
  1227.         $this->spanbgcolorarray = ''; // mPDF 6 
  1228.         $this->textbuffer = array(); 
  1229.         $this->internallink = array(); 
  1230.         $this->basepath = ""; 
  1231.  
  1232.         $this->SetBasePath(''); 
  1233.  
  1234.         $this->textparam = array(); 
  1235.  
  1236.         $this->specialcontent = ''; 
  1237.         $this->selectoption = array(); 
  1238.  
  1239.         /** -- IMPORTS -- */ 
  1240.  
  1241.         $this->tpls = array(); 
  1242.         $this->tpl = 0; 
  1243.         $this->tplprefix = "/TPL"; 
  1244.         $this->res = array(); 
  1245.         if ($this->enableImports) { 
  1246.             $this->SetImportUse(); 
  1247.         } 
  1248.         /** -- END IMPORTS -- */ 
  1249.  
  1250.         $this->tag = new Tag($this); 
  1251.     } 
  1252.  
  1253.     function _setPageSize($format, &$orientation) 
  1254.     { 
  1255.         //Page format 
  1256.         if (is_string($format)) { 
  1257.             if ($format == '') { 
  1258.                 $format = 'A4'; 
  1259.             } 
  1260.             $pfo = 'P'; 
  1261.             if (preg_match('/([0-9a-zA-Z]*)-L/i', $format, $m)) { // e.g. A4-L = A4 landscape 
  1262.                 $format = $m[1]; 
  1263.                 $pfo = 'L'; 
  1264.             } 
  1265.             $format = $this->_getPageFormat($format); 
  1266.             if (!$format) { 
  1267.                 throw new MpdfException('Unknown page format: ' . $format); 
  1268.             } else { 
  1269.                 $orientation = $pfo; 
  1270.             } 
  1271.  
  1272.             $this->fwPt = $format[0]; 
  1273.             $this->fhPt = $format[1]; 
  1274.         } else { 
  1275.             if (!$format[0] || !$format[1]) { 
  1276.                 throw new MpdfException('Invalid page format: ' . $format[0] . ' ' . $format[1]); 
  1277.             } 
  1278.             $this->fwPt = $format[0] * _MPDFK; 
  1279.             $this->fhPt = $format[1] * _MPDFK; 
  1280.         } 
  1281.         $this->fw = $this->fwPt / _MPDFK; 
  1282.         $this->fh = $this->fhPt / _MPDFK; 
  1283.         //Page orientation 
  1284.         $orientation = strtolower($orientation); 
  1285.         if ($orientation == 'p' or $orientation == 'portrait') { 
  1286.             $orientation = 'P'; 
  1287.             $this->wPt = $this->fwPt; 
  1288.             $this->hPt = $this->fhPt; 
  1289.         } elseif ($orientation == 'l' or $orientation == 'landscape') { 
  1290.             $orientation = 'L'; 
  1291.             $this->wPt = $this->fhPt; 
  1292.             $this->hPt = $this->fwPt; 
  1293.         } else 
  1294.             throw new MpdfException('Incorrect orientation: ' . $orientation); 
  1295.         $this->CurOrientation = $orientation; 
  1296.  
  1297.         $this->w = $this->wPt / _MPDFK; 
  1298.         $this->h = $this->hPt / _MPDFK; 
  1299.     } 
  1300.  
  1301.     function _getPageFormat($format) 
  1302.     { 
  1303.         switch (strtoupper($format)) { 
  1304.             case '4A0': { 
  1305.                     $format = array(4767.87, 6740.79); 
  1306.                     break; 
  1307.                 } 
  1308.             case '2A0': { 
  1309.                     $format = array(3370.39, 4767.87); 
  1310.                     break; 
  1311.                 } 
  1312.             case 'A0': { 
  1313.                     $format = array(2383.94, 3370.39); 
  1314.                     break; 
  1315.                 } 
  1316.             case 'A1': { 
  1317.                     $format = array(1683.78, 2383.94); 
  1318.                     break; 
  1319.                 } 
  1320.             case 'A2': { 
  1321.                     $format = array(1190.55, 1683.78); 
  1322.                     break; 
  1323.                 } 
  1324.             case 'A3': { 
  1325.                     $format = array(841.89, 1190.55); 
  1326.                     break; 
  1327.                 } 
  1328.             case 'A4': { 
  1329.                     $format = array(595.28, 841.89); 
  1330.                     break; 
  1331.                 } 
  1332.             case 'A5': { 
  1333.                     $format = array(419.53, 595.28); 
  1334.                     break; 
  1335.                 } 
  1336.             case 'A6': { 
  1337.                     $format = array(297.64, 419.53); 
  1338.                     break; 
  1339.                 } 
  1340.             case 'A7': { 
  1341.                     $format = array(209.76, 297.64); 
  1342.                     break; 
  1343.                 } 
  1344.             case 'A8': { 
  1345.                     $format = array(147.40, 209.76); 
  1346.                     break; 
  1347.                 } 
  1348.             case 'A9': { 
  1349.                     $format = array(104.88, 147.40); 
  1350.                     break; 
  1351.                 } 
  1352.             case 'A10': { 
  1353.                     $format = array(73.70, 104.88); 
  1354.                     break; 
  1355.                 } 
  1356.             case 'B0': { 
  1357.                     $format = array(2834.65, 4008.19); 
  1358.                     break; 
  1359.                 } 
  1360.             case 'B1': { 
  1361.                     $format = array(2004.09, 2834.65); 
  1362.                     break; 
  1363.                 } 
  1364.             case 'B2': { 
  1365.                     $format = array(1417.32, 2004.09); 
  1366.                     break; 
  1367.                 } 
  1368.             case 'B3': { 
  1369.                     $format = array(1000.63, 1417.32); 
  1370.                     break; 
  1371.                 } 
  1372.             case 'B4': { 
  1373.                     $format = array(708.66, 1000.63); 
  1374.                     break; 
  1375.                 } 
  1376.             case 'B5': { 
  1377.                     $format = array(498.90, 708.66); 
  1378.                     break; 
  1379.                 } 
  1380.             case 'B6': { 
  1381.                     $format = array(354.33, 498.90); 
  1382.                     break; 
  1383.                 } 
  1384.             case 'B7': { 
  1385.                     $format = array(249.45, 354.33); 
  1386.                     break; 
  1387.                 } 
  1388.             case 'B8': { 
  1389.                     $format = array(175.75, 249.45); 
  1390.                     break; 
  1391.                 } 
  1392.             case 'B9': { 
  1393.                     $format = array(124.72, 175.75); 
  1394.                     break; 
  1395.                 } 
  1396.             case 'B10': { 
  1397.                     $format = array(87.87, 124.72); 
  1398.                     break; 
  1399.                 } 
  1400.             case 'C0': { 
  1401.                     $format = array(2599.37, 3676.54); 
  1402.                     break; 
  1403.                 } 
  1404.             case 'C1': { 
  1405.                     $format = array(1836.85, 2599.37); 
  1406.                     break; 
  1407.                 } 
  1408.             case 'C2': { 
  1409.                     $format = array(1298.27, 1836.85); 
  1410.                     break; 
  1411.                 } 
  1412.             case 'C3': { 
  1413.                     $format = array(918.43, 1298.27); 
  1414.                     break; 
  1415.                 } 
  1416.             case 'C4': { 
  1417.                     $format = array(649.13, 918.43); 
  1418.                     break; 
  1419.                 } 
  1420.             case 'C5': { 
  1421.                     $format = array(459.21, 649.13); 
  1422.                     break; 
  1423.                 } 
  1424.             case 'C6': { 
  1425.                     $format = array(323.15, 459.21); 
  1426.                     break; 
  1427.                 } 
  1428.             case 'C7': { 
  1429.                     $format = array(229.61, 323.15); 
  1430.                     break; 
  1431.                 } 
  1432.             case 'C8': { 
  1433.                     $format = array(161.57, 229.61); 
  1434.                     break; 
  1435.                 } 
  1436.             case 'C9': { 
  1437.                     $format = array(113.39, 161.57); 
  1438.                     break; 
  1439.                 } 
  1440.             case 'C10': { 
  1441.                     $format = array(79.37, 113.39); 
  1442.                     break; 
  1443.                 } 
  1444.             case 'RA0': { 
  1445.                     $format = array(2437.80, 3458.27); 
  1446.                     break; 
  1447.                 } 
  1448.             case 'RA1': { 
  1449.                     $format = array(1729.13, 2437.80); 
  1450.                     break; 
  1451.                 } 
  1452.             case 'RA2': { 
  1453.                     $format = array(1218.90, 1729.13); 
  1454.                     break; 
  1455.                 } 
  1456.             case 'RA3': { 
  1457.                     $format = array(864.57, 1218.90); 
  1458.                     break; 
  1459.                 } 
  1460.             case 'RA4': { 
  1461.                     $format = array(609.45, 864.57); 
  1462.                     break; 
  1463.                 } 
  1464.             case 'SRA0': { 
  1465.                     $format = array(2551.18, 3628.35); 
  1466.                     break; 
  1467.                 } 
  1468.             case 'SRA1': { 
  1469.                     $format = array(1814.17, 2551.18); 
  1470.                     break; 
  1471.                 } 
  1472.             case 'SRA2': { 
  1473.                     $format = array(1275.59, 1814.17); 
  1474.                     break; 
  1475.                 } 
  1476.             case 'SRA3': { 
  1477.                     $format = array(907.09, 1275.59); 
  1478.                     break; 
  1479.                 } 
  1480.             case 'SRA4': { 
  1481.                     $format = array(637.80, 907.09); 
  1482.                     break; 
  1483.                 } 
  1484.             case 'LETTER': { 
  1485.                     $format = array(612.00, 792.00); 
  1486.                     break; 
  1487.                 } 
  1488.             case 'LEGAL': { 
  1489.                     $format = array(612.00, 1008.00); 
  1490.                     break; 
  1491.                 } 
  1492.             case 'LEDGER': { 
  1493.                     $format = array(1224.00, 792.00); 
  1494.                     break; 
  1495.                 } 
  1496.             case 'TABLOID': { 
  1497.                     $format = array(792.00, 1224.00); 
  1498.                     break; 
  1499.                 } 
  1500.             case 'EXECUTIVE': { 
  1501.                     $format = array(521.86, 756.00); 
  1502.                     break; 
  1503.                 } 
  1504.             case 'FOLIO': { 
  1505.                     $format = array(612.00, 936.00); 
  1506.                     break; 
  1507.                 } 
  1508.             case 'B': { 
  1509.                     $format = array(362.83, 561.26); 
  1510.                     break; 
  1511.                 }  //    'B' format paperback size 128x198mm 
  1512.             case 'A': { 
  1513.                     $format = array(314.65, 504.57); 
  1514.                     break; 
  1515.                 }  //    'A' format paperback size 111x178mm 
  1516.             case 'DEMY': { 
  1517.                     $format = array(382.68, 612.28); 
  1518.                     break; 
  1519.                 }  //    'Demy' format paperback size 135x216mm 
  1520.             case 'ROYAL': { 
  1521.                     $format = array(433.70, 663.30); 
  1522.                     break; 
  1523.                 } //    'Royal' format paperback size 153x234mm 
  1524.             default: { 
  1525.                     $format = array(595.28, 841.89); 
  1526.                     break; 
  1527.                 } 
  1528.         } 
  1529.         return $format; 
  1530.     } 
  1531.  
  1532.     function RestrictUnicodeFonts($res) 
  1533.     { 
  1534.         // $res = array of (Unicode) fonts to restrict to: e.g. norasi|norasiB - language specific 
  1535.         if (count($res)) { // Leave full list of available fonts if passed blank array 
  1536.             $this->available_unifonts = $res; 
  1537.         } else { 
  1538.             $this->available_unifonts = $this->default_available_fonts; 
  1539.         } 
  1540.         if (count($this->available_unifonts) == 0) { 
  1541.             $this->available_unifonts[] = $this->default_available_fonts[0]; 
  1542.         } 
  1543.         $this->available_unifonts = array_values($this->available_unifonts); 
  1544.     } 
  1545.  
  1546.     function setMBencoding($enc) 
  1547.     { 
  1548.         if ($this->mb_enc != $enc) { 
  1549.             $this->mb_enc = $enc; 
  1550.             mb_internal_encoding($this->mb_enc); 
  1551.         } 
  1552.     } 
  1553.  
  1554.     function SetMargins($left, $right, $top) 
  1555.     { 
  1556.         //Set left, top and right margins 
  1557.         $this->lMargin = $left; 
  1558.         $this->rMargin = $right; 
  1559.         $this->tMargin = $top; 
  1560.     } 
  1561.  
  1562.     function ResetMargins() 
  1563.     { 
  1564.         //ReSet left, top margins 
  1565.         if (($this->forcePortraitHeaders || $this->forcePortraitMargins) && $this->DefOrientation == 'P' && $this->CurOrientation == 'L') { 
  1566.             if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page) % 2 == 0)) { // EVEN 
  1567.                 $this->tMargin = $this->orig_rMargin; 
  1568.                 $this->bMargin = $this->orig_lMargin; 
  1569.             } else { // ODD    // OR NOT MIRRORING MARGINS/FOOTERS 
  1570.                 $this->tMargin = $this->orig_lMargin; 
  1571.                 $this->bMargin = $this->orig_rMargin; 
  1572.             } 
  1573.             $this->lMargin = $this->DeflMargin; 
  1574.             $this->rMargin = $this->DefrMargin; 
  1575.             $this->MarginCorrection = 0; 
  1576.             $this->PageBreakTrigger = $this->h - $this->bMargin; 
  1577.         } elseif (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page) % 2 == 0)) { // EVEN 
  1578.             $this->lMargin = $this->DefrMargin; 
  1579.             $this->rMargin = $this->DeflMargin; 
  1580.             $this->MarginCorrection = $this->DefrMargin - $this->DeflMargin; 
  1581.         } else { // ODD    // OR NOT MIRRORING MARGINS/FOOTERS 
  1582.             $this->lMargin = $this->DeflMargin; 
  1583.             $this->rMargin = $this->DefrMargin; 
  1584.             if ($this->mirrorMargins) { 
  1585.                 $this->MarginCorrection = $this->DeflMargin - $this->DefrMargin; 
  1586.             } 
  1587.         } 
  1588.         $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  1589.     } 
  1590.  
  1591.     function SetLeftMargin($margin) 
  1592.     { 
  1593.         //Set left margin 
  1594.         $this->lMargin = $margin; 
  1595.         if ($this->page > 0 and $this->x < $margin) 
  1596.             $this->x = $margin; 
  1597.     } 
  1598.  
  1599.     function SetTopMargin($margin) 
  1600.     { 
  1601.         //Set top margin 
  1602.         $this->tMargin = $margin; 
  1603.     } 
  1604.  
  1605.     function SetRightMargin($margin) 
  1606.     { 
  1607.         //Set right margin 
  1608.         $this->rMargin = $margin; 
  1609.     } 
  1610.  
  1611.     function SetAutoPageBreak($auto, $margin = 0) 
  1612.     { 
  1613.         //Set auto page break mode and triggering margin 
  1614.         $this->autoPageBreak = $auto; 
  1615.         $this->bMargin = $margin; 
  1616.         $this->PageBreakTrigger = $this->h - $margin; 
  1617.     } 
  1618.  
  1619.     function SetDisplayMode($zoom, $layout = 'continuous') 
  1620.     { 
  1621.         //Set display mode in viewer 
  1622.         if ($zoom == 'fullpage' or $zoom == 'fullwidth' or $zoom == 'real' or $zoom == 'default' or ! is_string($zoom)) 
  1623.             $this->ZoomMode = $zoom; 
  1624.         else 
  1625.             throw new MpdfException('Incorrect zoom display mode: ' . $zoom); 
  1626.         if ($layout == 'single' or $layout == 'continuous' or $layout == 'two' or $layout == 'twoleft' or $layout == 'tworight' or $layout == 'default') 
  1627.             $this->LayoutMode = $layout; 
  1628.         else 
  1629.             throw new MpdfException('Incorrect layout display mode: ' . $layout); 
  1630.     } 
  1631.  
  1632.     function SetCompression($compress) 
  1633.     { 
  1634.         //Set page compression 
  1635.         if (function_exists('gzcompress')) 
  1636.             $this->compress = $compress; 
  1637.         else 
  1638.             $this->compress = false; 
  1639.     } 
  1640.  
  1641.     function SetTitle($title) 
  1642.     { 
  1643.         //Title of document // Arrives as UTF-8 
  1644.         $this->title = $title; 
  1645.     } 
  1646.  
  1647.     function SetSubject($subject) 
  1648.     { 
  1649.         //Subject of document 
  1650.         $this->subject = $subject; 
  1651.     } 
  1652.  
  1653.     function SetAuthor($author) 
  1654.     { 
  1655.         //Author of document 
  1656.         $this->author = $author; 
  1657.     } 
  1658.  
  1659.     function SetKeywords($keywords) 
  1660.     { 
  1661.         //Keywords of document 
  1662.         $this->keywords = $keywords; 
  1663.     } 
  1664.  
  1665.     function SetCreator($creator) 
  1666.     { 
  1667.         //Creator of document 
  1668.         $this->creator = $creator; 
  1669.     } 
  1670.  
  1671.     function SetAnchor2Bookmark($x) 
  1672.     { 
  1673.         $this->anchor2Bookmark = $x; 
  1674.     } 
  1675.  
  1676.     function AliasNbPages($alias = '{nb}') 
  1677.     { 
  1678.         //Define an alias for total number of pages 
  1679.         $this->aliasNbPg = $alias; 
  1680.     } 
  1681.  
  1682.     function AliasNbPageGroups($alias = '{nbpg}') 
  1683.     { 
  1684.         //Define an alias for total number of pages in a group 
  1685.         $this->aliasNbPgGp = $alias; 
  1686.     } 
  1687.  
  1688.     function SetAlpha($alpha, $bm = 'Normal', $return = false, $mode = 'B') 
  1689.     { 
  1690.         // alpha: real value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque) 
  1691.         // bm:    blend mode, one of the following: 
  1692.         //          Normal, Multiply, Screen, Overlay, Darken, Lighten, ColorDodge, ColorBurn,  
  1693.         //          HardLight, SoftLight, Difference, Exclusion, Hue, Saturation, Color, Luminosity 
  1694.         // set alpha for stroking (CA) and non-stroking (ca) operations 
  1695.         // mode determines F (fill) S (stroke) B (both) 
  1696.         if (($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) && $alpha != 1) { 
  1697.             if (($this->PDFA && !$this->PDFAauto) || ($this->PDFX && !$this->PDFXauto)) { 
  1698.                 $this->PDFAXwarnings[] = "Image opacity must be 100% (Opacity changed to 100%)"; 
  1699.             } 
  1700.             $alpha = 1; 
  1701.         } 
  1702.         $a = array('BM' => '/' . $bm); 
  1703.         if ($mode == 'F' || $mode == 'B') 
  1704.             $a['ca'] = $alpha; // mPDF 5.7.2 
  1705.         if ($mode == 'S' || $mode == 'B') 
  1706.             $a['CA'] = $alpha; // mPDF 5.7.2 
  1707.         $gs = $this->AddExtGState($a); 
  1708.         if ($return) { 
  1709.             return sprintf('/GS%d gs', $gs); 
  1710.         } else { 
  1711.             $this->_out(sprintf('/GS%d gs', $gs)); 
  1712.         } 
  1713.     } 
  1714.  
  1715.     function AddExtGState($parms) 
  1716.     { 
  1717.         $n = count($this->extgstates); 
  1718.         // check if graphics state already exists 
  1719.         for ($i = 1; $i <= $n; $i++) { 
  1720.             if (count($this->extgstates[$i]['parms']) == count($parms)) { 
  1721.                 $same = true; 
  1722.                 foreach ($this->extgstates[$i]['parms'] AS $k => $v) { 
  1723.                     if (!isset($parms[$k]) || $parms[$k] != $v) { 
  1724.                         $same = false; 
  1725.                         break; 
  1726.                     } 
  1727.                 } 
  1728.                 if ($same) { 
  1729.                     return $i; 
  1730.                 } 
  1731.             } 
  1732.         } 
  1733.         $n++; 
  1734.         $this->extgstates[$n]['parms'] = $parms; 
  1735.         return $n; 
  1736.     } 
  1737.  
  1738.     function SetVisibility($v) 
  1739.     { 
  1740.         if (($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) && $this->visibility != 'visible') { 
  1741.             $this->PDFAXwarnings[] = "Cannot set visibility to anything other than full when using PDFA or PDFX"; 
  1742.             return ''; 
  1743.         } elseif (!$this->PDFA && !$this->PDFX) 
  1744.             $this->pdf_version = '1.5'; 
  1745.         if ($this->visibility != 'visible') { 
  1746.             $this->_out('EMC'); 
  1747.             $this->hasOC = intval($this->hasOC); 
  1748.         } 
  1749.         if ($v == 'printonly') { 
  1750.             $this->_out('/OC /OC1 BDC'); 
  1751.             $this->hasOC = ($this->hasOC | 1); 
  1752.         } elseif ($v == 'screenonly') { 
  1753.             $this->_out('/OC /OC2 BDC'); 
  1754.             $this->hasOC = ($this->hasOC | 2); 
  1755.         } elseif ($v == 'hidden') { 
  1756.             $this->_out('/OC /OC3 BDC'); 
  1757.             $this->hasOC = ($this->hasOC | 4); 
  1758.         } elseif ($v != 'visible') 
  1759.             throw new MpdfException('Incorrect visibility: ' . $v); 
  1760.         $this->visibility = $v; 
  1761.     } 
  1762.  
  1763.     function Open() 
  1764.     { 
  1765.         //Begin document 
  1766.         if ($this->state == 0) { 
  1767.             // Was is function _begindoc() 
  1768.             // Start document 
  1769.             $this->state = 1; 
  1770.             $this->_out('%PDF-' . $this->pdf_version); 
  1771.             $this->_out('%' . chr(226) . chr(227) . chr(207) . chr(211)); // 4 chars > 128 to show binary file 
  1772.         } 
  1773.     } 
  1774.  
  1775.     /** 
  1776.      * Trigger a E_USER_NOTICE so the message is stored in PHP's log 
  1777.      * @param String $message 
  1778.      */ 
  1779.     function Notice( $message ) { 
  1780.         trigger_error( $message ); 
  1781.     } 
  1782.  
  1783.     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ 
  1784.     // DEPRACATED but included for backwards compatability 
  1785.     // Depracated - can use AddPage for all 
  1786.     function AddPages($a = '', $b = '', $c = '', $d = '', $e = '', $f = '', $g = '', $h = '', $i = '', $j = '', $k = '', $l = '', $m = '', $n = '', $o = '', $p = 0, $q = 0, $r = 0, $s = 0, $t = '', $u = '') 
  1787.     { 
  1788.         $this->Notice('function AddPages is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use AddPage or HTML code methods instead.'); 
  1789.     } 
  1790.  
  1791.     function startPageNums() 
  1792.     { 
  1793.         $this->Notice('function startPageNums is depracated as of mPDF 6.'); 
  1794.     } 
  1795.  
  1796.     function setUnvalidatedText($a = '', $b = -1) 
  1797.     { 
  1798.         $this->Notice('function setUnvalidatedText is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use SetWatermarkText instead.'); 
  1799.     } 
  1800.  
  1801.     function SetAutoFont($a) 
  1802.     { 
  1803.         if($a === 0) { 
  1804.             $this->autoLangToFont = false; 
  1805.             $this->autoScriptToLang = false; 
  1806.         } else { 
  1807.             $this->autoLangToFont = true; 
  1808.             $this->autoScriptToLang = true; 
  1809.         } 
  1810.  
  1811.         $this->Notice('function SetAutoFont is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use autoScriptToLang instead. See config.php'); 
  1812.     } 
  1813.  
  1814.     function Reference($a) 
  1815.     { 
  1816.         $this->Notice('function Reference is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use IndexEntry instead.'); 
  1817.     } 
  1818.  
  1819.     function ReferenceSee($a, $b) 
  1820.     { 
  1821.         $this->Notice('function ReferenceSee is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use IndexEntrySee instead.'); 
  1822.     } 
  1823.  
  1824.     function CreateReference($a = 1, $b = '', $c = '', $d = 3, $e = 1, $f = '', $g = 5, $h = '', $i = '', $j = false) 
  1825.     { 
  1826.         $this->Notice('function CreateReference is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use InsertIndex instead.'); 
  1827.     } 
  1828.  
  1829.     function CreateIndex($a = 1, $b = '', $c = '', $d = 3, $e = 1, $f = '', $g = 5, $h = '', $i = '', $j = false) 
  1830.     { 
  1831.         $this->Notice('function CreateIndex is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use InsertIndex instead.'); 
  1832.     } 
  1833.  
  1834.     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ 
  1835.  
  1836.     function Close() 
  1837.     { 
  1838.         // Check old Aliases - now depracated mPDF 6 
  1839.         if (isset($this->UnvalidatedText)) { 
  1840.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->UnvalidatedText is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use $mpdf->watermarkText  instead.'); 
  1841.         } 
  1842.         if (isset($this->TopicIsUnvalidated)) { 
  1843.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->TopicIsUnvalidated is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use $mpdf->showWatermarkText instead.'); 
  1844.         } 
  1845.         if (isset($this->AliasNbPg)) { 
  1846.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->AliasNbPg is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use $mpdf->aliasNbPg instead.'); 
  1847.         } 
  1848.         if (isset($this->AliasNbPgGp)) { 
  1849.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->AliasNbPgGp is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use $mpdf->aliasNbPgGp instead.'); 
  1850.         } 
  1851.         if (isset($this->BiDirectional)) { 
  1852.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->BiDirectional is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use $mpdf->biDirectional instead.'); 
  1853.         } 
  1854.         if (isset($this->Anchor2Bookmark)) { 
  1855.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->Anchor2Bookmark is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use $mpdf->anchor2Bookmark instead.'); 
  1856.         } 
  1857.         if (isset($this->KeepColumns)) { 
  1858.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->KeepColumns is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use $mpdf->keepColumns instead.'); 
  1859.         } 
  1860.         if (isset($this->useOddEven)) { 
  1861.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->useOddEven is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use $mpdf->mirrorMargins instead.'); 
  1862.         } 
  1863.         if (isset($this->useSubstitutionsMB)) { 
  1864.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->useSubstitutionsMB is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use $mpdf->useSubstitutions instead.'); 
  1865.         } 
  1866.         if (isset($this->useLang)) { 
  1867.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->useLang is depracated as of mPDF 6. Please use $mpdf->autoLangToFont instead.'); 
  1868.         } 
  1869.         if (isset($this->useAutoFont)) { 
  1870.             $this->Notice('$mpdf->useAutoFont is depracated. Please use $mpdf->autoScriptToLang instead.'); 
  1871.         } 
  1872.  
  1873.         //Terminate document 
  1874.         if ($this->state == 3) 
  1875.             return; 
  1876.         if ($this->page == 0) 
  1877.             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  1878.         if (count($this->cellBorderBuffer)) { 
  1879.             $this->printcellbuffer(); 
  1880.         } // *TABLES* 
  1881.         if ($this->tablebuffer) { 
  1882.             $this->printtablebuffer(); 
  1883.         } // *TABLES* 
  1884.         /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  1885.  
  1886.         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  1887.             $this->SetColumns(0); 
  1888.             $this->ColActive = 0; 
  1889.             if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { 
  1890.                 $this->printcolumnbuffer(); 
  1891.             } 
  1892.         } 
  1893.         /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  1894.  
  1895.         // BODY Backgrounds 
  1896.         $s = ''; 
  1897.  
  1898.         $s .= $this->PrintBodyBackgrounds(); 
  1899.  
  1900.         $s .= $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(); 
  1901.         $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', "\n" . $s . "\n" . '\\1', $this->pages[$this->page]); 
  1902.         $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  1903.  
  1904.         if ($this->visibility != 'visible') 
  1905.             $this->SetVisibility('visible'); 
  1906.         $this->EndLayer(); 
  1907.  
  1908.         if (!$this->tocontents || !$this->tocontents->TOCmark) { //Page footer 
  1909.             $this->InFooter = true; 
  1910.             $this->Footer(); 
  1911.             $this->InFooter = false; 
  1912.         } 
  1913.         if ($this->tocontents && ($this->tocontents->TOCmark || count($this->tocontents->m_TOC))) { 
  1914.             $this->tocontents->insertTOC(); 
  1915.         } // *TOC* 
  1916.         //Close page 
  1917.         $this->_endpage(); 
  1918.  
  1919.         //Close document 
  1920.         $this->_enddoc(); 
  1921.     } 
  1922.  
  1923.     /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  1924.  
  1925.     function _resizeBackgroundImage($imw, $imh, $cw, $ch, $resize = 0, $repx, $repy, $pba = array(), $size = array()) 
  1926.     { 
  1927.         // pba is background positioning area (from CSS background-origin) may not always be set [x, y, w, h] 
  1928.         // size is from CSS3 background-size - takes precendence over old resize 
  1929.         //    $w - absolute length or % or auto or cover | contain 
  1930.         //    $h - absolute length or % or auto or cover | contain 
  1931.         if (isset($pba['w'])) 
  1932.             $cw = $pba['w']; 
  1933.         if (isset($pba['h'])) 
  1934.             $ch = $pba['h']; 
  1935.  
  1936.         $cw = $cw * _MPDFK; 
  1937.         $ch = $ch * _MPDFK; 
  1938.         if (empty($size) && !$resize) { 
  1939.             return array($imw, $imh, $repx, $repy); 
  1940.         } 
  1941.  
  1942.         if (isset($size['w']) && $size['w']) { 
  1943.             if ($size['w'] == 'contain') { 
  1944.                 // Scale the image, while preserving its intrinsic aspect ratio (if any), to the largest size such that both its width and its height can fit inside the background positioning area. 
  1945.                 // Same as resize==3 
  1946.                 $h = $imh * $cw / $imw; 
  1947.                 $w = $cw; 
  1948.                 if ($h > $ch) { 
  1949.                     $w = $w * $ch / $h; 
  1950.                     $h = $ch; 
  1951.                 } 
  1952.             } elseif ($size['w'] == 'cover') { 
  1953.                 // Scale the image, while preserving its intrinsic aspect ratio (if any), to the smallest size such that both its width and its height can completely cover the background positioning area. 
  1954.                 $h = $imh * $cw / $imw; 
  1955.                 $w = $cw; 
  1956.                 if ($h < $ch) { 
  1957.                     $w = $w * $h / $ch; 
  1958.                     $h = $ch; 
  1959.                 } 
  1960.             } else { 
  1961.                 if (stristr($size['w'], '%')) { 
  1962.                     $size['w'] += 0; 
  1963.                     $size['w'] /= 100; 
  1964.                     $size['w'] = ($cw * $size['w']); 
  1965.                 } 
  1966.                 if (stristr($size['h'], '%')) { 
  1967.                     $size['h'] += 0; 
  1968.                     $size['h'] /= 100; 
  1969.                     $size['h'] = ($ch * $size['h']); 
  1970.                 } 
  1971.                 if ($size['w'] == 'auto' && $size['h'] == 'auto') { 
  1972.                     $w = $imw; 
  1973.                     $h = $imh; 
  1974.                 } elseif ($size['w'] == 'auto' && $size['h'] != 'auto') { 
  1975.                     $w = $imw * $size['h'] / $imh; 
  1976.                     $h = $size['h']; 
  1977.                 } elseif ($size['w'] != 'auto' && $size['h'] == 'auto') { 
  1978.                     $h = $imh * $size['w'] / $imw; 
  1979.                     $w = $size['w']; 
  1980.                 } else { 
  1981.                     $w = $size['w']; 
  1982.                     $h = $size['h']; 
  1983.                 } 
  1984.             } 
  1985.             return array($w, $h, $repx, $repy); 
  1986.         } elseif ($resize == 1 && $imw > $cw) { 
  1987.             $h = $imh * $cw / $imw; 
  1988.             return array($cw, $h, $repx, $repy); 
  1989.         } elseif ($resize == 2 && $imh > $ch) { 
  1990.             $w = $imw * $ch / $imh; 
  1991.             return array($w, $ch, $repx, $repy); 
  1992.         } elseif ($resize == 3) { 
  1993.             $w = $imw; 
  1994.             $h = $imh; 
  1995.             if ($w > $cw) { 
  1996.                 $h = $h * $cw / $w; 
  1997.                 $w = $cw; 
  1998.             } 
  1999.             if ($h > $ch) { 
  2000.                 $w = $w * $ch / $h; 
  2001.                 $h = $ch; 
  2002.             } 
  2003.             return array($w, $h, $repx, $repy); 
  2004.         } elseif ($resize == 4) { 
  2005.             $h = $imh * $cw / $imw; 
  2006.             return array($cw, $h, $repx, $repy); 
  2007.         } elseif ($resize == 5) { 
  2008.             $w = $imw * $ch / $imh; 
  2009.             return array($w, $ch, $repx, $repy); 
  2010.         } elseif ($resize == 6) { 
  2011.             return array($cw, $ch, $repx, $repy); 
  2012.         } 
  2013.         return array($imw, $imh, $repx, $repy); 
  2014.     } 
  2015.  
  2016.     function SetBackground(&$properties, &$maxwidth) 
  2017.     { 
  2018.         if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-ORIGIN']) && ($properties['BACKGROUND-ORIGIN'] == 'border-box' || $properties['BACKGROUND-ORIGIN'] == 'content-box')) { 
  2019.             $origin = $properties['BACKGROUND-ORIGIN']; 
  2020.         } else { 
  2021.             $origin = 'padding-box'; 
  2022.         } 
  2023.         if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-SIZE'])) { 
  2024.             if (stristr($properties['BACKGROUND-SIZE'], 'contain')) { 
  2025.                 $bsw = $bsh = 'contain'; 
  2026.             } elseif (stristr($properties['BACKGROUND-SIZE'], 'cover')) { 
  2027.                 $bsw = $bsh = 'cover'; 
  2028.             } else { 
  2029.                 $bsw = $bsh = 'auto'; 
  2030.                 $sz = preg_split('/\s+/', trim($properties['BACKGROUND-SIZE'])); 
  2031.                 if (count($sz) == 2) { 
  2032.                     $bsw = $sz[0]; 
  2033.                     $bsh = $sz[1]; 
  2034.                 } else { 
  2035.                     $bsw = $sz[0]; 
  2036.                 } 
  2037.                 if (!stristr($bsw, '%') && !stristr($bsw, 'auto')) { 
  2038.                     $bsw = $this->ConvertSize($bsw, $maxwidth, $this->FontSize); 
  2039.                 } 
  2040.                 if (!stristr($bsh, '%') && !stristr($bsh, 'auto')) { 
  2041.                     $bsh = $this->ConvertSize($bsh, $maxwidth, $this->FontSize); 
  2042.                 } 
  2043.             } 
  2044.             $size = array('w' => $bsw, 'h' => $bsh); 
  2045.         } else { 
  2046.             $size = false; 
  2047.         } // mPDF 6 
  2048.         if (preg_match('/(-moz-)*(repeating-)*(linear|radial)-gradient/', $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'])) { 
  2049.             return array('gradient' => $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'], 'origin' => $origin, 'size' => $size); 
  2050.         } else { 
  2051.             $file = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']; 
  2052.             $sizesarray = $this->Image($file, 0, 0, 0, 0, '', '', false, false, false, false, true); 
  2053.             if (isset($sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'])) { 
  2054.                 $image_id = $sizesarray['IMAGE_ID']; 
  2055.                 $orig_w = $sizesarray['WIDTH'] * _MPDFK;  // in user units i.e. mm 
  2056.                 $orig_h = $sizesarray['HEIGHT'] * _MPDFK;  // (using $this->img_dpi) 
  2057.                 if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESOLUTION'])) { 
  2058.                     if (preg_match('/from-image/i', $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESOLUTION']) && isset($sizesarray['set-dpi']) && $sizesarray['set-dpi'] > 0) { 
  2059.                         $orig_w *= $this->img_dpi / $sizesarray['set-dpi']; 
  2060.                         $orig_h *= $this->img_dpi / $sizesarray['set-dpi']; 
  2061.                     } elseif (preg_match('/(\d+)dpi/i', $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESOLUTION'], $m)) { 
  2062.                         $dpi = $m[1]; 
  2063.                         if ($dpi > 0) { 
  2064.                             $orig_w *= $this->img_dpi / $dpi; 
  2065.                             $orig_h *= $this->img_dpi / $dpi; 
  2066.                         } 
  2067.                     } 
  2068.                 } 
  2069.                 $x_repeat = true; 
  2070.                 $y_repeat = true; 
  2071.                 if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'])) { 
  2072.                     if ($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'] == 'no-repeat' || $properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'] == 'repeat-x') { 
  2073.                         $y_repeat = false; 
  2074.                     } 
  2075.                     if ($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'] == 'no-repeat' || $properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'] == 'repeat-y') { 
  2076.                         $x_repeat = false; 
  2077.                     } 
  2078.                 } 
  2079.                 $x_pos = 0; 
  2080.                 $y_pos = 0; 
  2081.                 if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-POSITION'])) { 
  2082.                     $ppos = preg_split('/\s+/', $properties['BACKGROUND-POSITION']); 
  2083.                     $x_pos = $ppos[0]; 
  2084.                     $y_pos = $ppos[1]; 
  2085.                     if (!stristr($x_pos, '%')) { 
  2086.                         $x_pos = $this->ConvertSize($x_pos, $maxwidth, $this->FontSize); 
  2087.                     } 
  2088.                     if (!stristr($y_pos, '%')) { 
  2089.                         $y_pos = $this->ConvertSize($y_pos, $maxwidth, $this->FontSize); 
  2090.                     } 
  2091.                 } 
  2092.                 if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'])) { 
  2093.                     $resize = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']; 
  2094.                 } else { 
  2095.                     $resize = 0; 
  2096.                 } 
  2097.                 if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'])) { 
  2098.                     $opacity = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY']; 
  2099.                 } else { 
  2100.                     $opacity = 1; 
  2101.                 } 
  2102.                 return array('image_id' => $image_id, 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $x_pos, 'y_pos' => $y_pos, 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'resize' => $resize, 'opacity' => $opacity, 'itype' => $sizesarray['itype'], 'origin' => $origin, 'size' => $size); 
  2103.             } 
  2104.         } 
  2105.         return false; 
  2106.     } 
  2107.  
  2108.     /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  2109.  
  2110.     function PrintBodyBackgrounds() 
  2111.     { 
  2112.         $s = ''; 
  2113.         $clx = 0; 
  2114.         $cly = 0; 
  2115.         $clw = $this->w; 
  2116.         $clh = $this->h; 
  2117.         // If using bleed and trim margins in paged media 
  2118.         if ($this->pageDim[$this->page]['outer_width_LR'] || $this->pageDim[$this->page]['outer_width_TB']) { 
  2119.             $clx = $this->pageDim[$this->page]['outer_width_LR'] - $this->pageDim[$this->page]['bleedMargin']; 
  2120.             $cly = $this->pageDim[$this->page]['outer_width_TB'] - $this->pageDim[$this->page]['bleedMargin']; 
  2121.             $clw = $this->w - 2 * $clx; 
  2122.             $clh = $this->h - 2 * $cly; 
  2123.         } 
  2124.  
  2125.         if ($this->bodyBackgroundColor) { 
  2126.             $s .= 'q ' . $this->SetFColor($this->bodyBackgroundColor, true) . "\n"; 
  2127.             if ($this->bodyBackgroundColor{0} == 5) { // RGBa 
  2128.                 $s .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($this->bodyBackgroundColor{4}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  2129.             } elseif ($this->bodyBackgroundColor{0} == 6) { // CMYKa 
  2130.                 $s .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($this->bodyBackgroundColor{5}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  2131.             } 
  2132.             $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re f Q', ($clx * _MPDFK), ($cly * _MPDFK), $clw * _MPDFK, $clh * _MPDFK) . "\n"; 
  2133.         } 
  2134.  
  2135.         /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  2136.         if ($this->bodyBackgroundGradient) { 
  2137.             $g = $this->grad->parseBackgroundGradient($this->bodyBackgroundGradient); 
  2138.             if ($g) { 
  2139.                 $s .= $this->grad->Gradient($clx, $cly, $clw, $clh, (isset($g['gradtype']) ? $g['gradtype'] : null), $g['stops'], $g['colorspace'], $g['coords'], $g['extend'], true); 
  2140.             } 
  2141.         } 
  2142.         if ($this->bodyBackgroundImage) { 
  2143.             if (isset($this->bodyBackgroundImage['gradient']) && $this->bodyBackgroundImage['gradient'] && preg_match('/(-moz-)*(repeating-)*(linear|radial)-gradient/', $this->bodyBackgroundImage['gradient'])) { 
  2144.                 $g = $this->grad->parseMozGradient($this->bodyBackgroundImage['gradient']); 
  2145.                 if ($g) { 
  2146.                     $s .= $this->grad->Gradient($clx, $cly, $clw, $clh, $g['type'], $g['stops'], $g['colorspace'], $g['coords'], $g['extend'], true); 
  2147.                 } 
  2148.             } elseif ($this->bodyBackgroundImage['image_id']) { // Background pattern 
  2149.                 $n = count($this->patterns) + 1; 
  2150.                 // If using resize, uses TrimBox (not including the bleed) 
  2151.                 list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($this->bodyBackgroundImage['orig_w'], $this->bodyBackgroundImage['orig_h'], $clw, $clh, $this->bodyBackgroundImage['resize'], $this->bodyBackgroundImage['x_repeat'], $this->bodyBackgroundImage['y_repeat']); 
  2152.  
  2153.                 $this->patterns[$n] = array('x' => $clx, 'y' => $cly, 'w' => $clw, 'h' => $clh, 'pgh' => $this->h, 'image_id' => $this->bodyBackgroundImage['image_id'], 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $this->bodyBackgroundImage['x_pos'], 'y_pos' => $this->bodyBackgroundImage['y_pos'], 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'itype' => $this->bodyBackgroundImage['itype']); 
  2154.                 if (($this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity'] > 0 || $this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity'] === '0') && $this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity'] < 1) { 
  2155.                     $opac = $this->SetAlpha($this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity'], 'Normal', true); 
  2156.                 } else { 
  2157.                     $opac = ''; 
  2158.                 } 
  2159.                 $s .= sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re f Q', $n, $opac, ($clx * _MPDFK), ($cly * _MPDFK), $clw * _MPDFK, $clh * _MPDFK) . "\n"; 
  2160.             } 
  2161.         } 
  2162.         /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  2163.         return $s; 
  2164.     } 
  2165.  
  2166.     function _setClippingPath($clx, $cly, $clw, $clh) 
  2167.     { 
  2168.         $s = ' q 0 w '; // Line width=0 
  2169.         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($clx) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($cly)) * _MPDFK); // start point TL before the arc 
  2170.         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($clx) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($cly + $clh)) * _MPDFK); // line to BL 
  2171.         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($clx + $clw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($cly + $clh)) * _MPDFK); // line to BR 
  2172.         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($clx + $clw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($cly)) * _MPDFK); // line to TR 
  2173.         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($clx) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($cly)) * _MPDFK); // line to TL 
  2174.         $s .= ' W n '; // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  2175.         return $s; 
  2176.     } 
  2177.  
  2178.     function PrintPageBackgrounds($adjustmenty = 0) 
  2179.     { 
  2180.         $s = ''; 
  2181.  
  2182.         ksort($this->pageBackgrounds); 
  2183.         foreach ($this->pageBackgrounds AS $bl => $pbs) { 
  2184.             foreach ($pbs AS $pb) { 
  2185.                 if ((!isset($pb['image_id']) && !isset($pb['gradient'])) || isset($pb['shadowonly'])) { // Background colour or boxshadow 
  2186.                     if ($pb['z-index'] > 0) { 
  2187.                         $this->current_layer = $pb['z-index']; 
  2188.                         $s .= "\n" . '/OCBZ-index /ZI' . $pb['z-index'] . ' BDC' . "\n"; 
  2189.                     } 
  2190.  
  2191.                     if ($pb['visibility'] != 'visible') { 
  2192.                         if ($pb['visibility'] == 'printonly') 
  2193.                             $s .= '/OC /OC1 BDC' . "\n"; 
  2194.                         elseif ($pb['visibility'] == 'screenonly') 
  2195.                             $s .= '/OC /OC2 BDC' . "\n"; 
  2196.                         elseif ($pb['visibility'] == 'hidden') 
  2197.                             $s .= '/OC /OC3 BDC' . "\n"; 
  2198.                     } 
  2199.                     // Box shadow 
  2200.                     if (isset($pb['shadow']) && $pb['shadow']) { 
  2201.                         $s .= $pb['shadow'] . "\n"; 
  2202.                     } 
  2203.                     if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { 
  2204.                         $s .= $pb['clippath'] . "\n"; 
  2205.                     } 
  2206.                     $s .= 'q ' . $this->SetFColor($pb['col'], true) . "\n"; 
  2207.                     if ($pb['col']{0} == 5) { // RGBa 
  2208.                         $s .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($pb['col']{4}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  2209.                     } elseif ($pb['col']{0} == 6) { // CMYKa 
  2210.                         $s .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($pb['col']{5}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  2211.                     } 
  2212.                     $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re f Q', $pb['x'] * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $pb['y']) * _MPDFK, $pb['w'] * _MPDFK, -$pb['h'] * _MPDFK) . "\n"; 
  2213.                     if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { 
  2214.                         $s .= 'Q' . "\n"; 
  2215.                     } 
  2216.                     if ($pb['visibility'] != 'visible') 
  2217.                         $s .= 'EMC' . "\n"; 
  2218.  
  2219.                     if ($pb['z-index'] > 0) { 
  2220.                         $s .= "\n" . 'EMCBZ-index' . "\n"; 
  2221.                         $this->current_layer = 0; 
  2222.                     } 
  2223.                 } 
  2224.             } 
  2225.             /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  2226.             foreach ($pbs AS $pb) { 
  2227.                 if ((isset($pb['gradient']) && $pb['gradient']) || (isset($pb['image_id']) && $pb['image_id'])) { 
  2228.                     if ($pb['z-index'] > 0) { 
  2229.                         $this->current_layer = $pb['z-index']; 
  2230.                         $s .= "\n" . '/OCGZ-index /ZI' . $pb['z-index'] . ' BDC' . "\n"; 
  2231.                     } 
  2232.                     if ($pb['visibility'] != 'visible') { 
  2233.                         if ($pb['visibility'] == 'printonly') 
  2234.                             $s .= '/OC /OC1 BDC' . "\n"; 
  2235.                         elseif ($pb['visibility'] == 'screenonly') 
  2236.                             $s .= '/OC /OC2 BDC' . "\n"; 
  2237.                         elseif ($pb['visibility'] == 'hidden') 
  2238.                             $s .= '/OC /OC3 BDC' . "\n"; 
  2239.                     } 
  2240.                 } 
  2241.                 if (isset($pb['gradient']) && $pb['gradient']) { 
  2242.                     if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { 
  2243.                         $s .= $pb['clippath'] . "\n"; 
  2244.                     } 
  2245.                     $s .= $this->grad->Gradient($pb['x'], $pb['y'], $pb['w'], $pb['h'], $pb['gradtype'], $pb['stops'], $pb['colorspace'], $pb['coords'], $pb['extend'], true); 
  2246.                     if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { 
  2247.                         $s .= 'Q' . "\n"; 
  2248.                     } 
  2249.                 } elseif (isset($pb['image_id']) && $pb['image_id']) { // Background Image 
  2250.                     $pb['y'] -= $adjustmenty; 
  2251.                     $pb['h'] += $adjustmenty; 
  2252.                     $n = count($this->patterns) + 1; 
  2253.                     list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($pb['orig_w'], $pb['orig_h'], $pb['w'], $pb['h'], $pb['resize'], $pb['x_repeat'], $pb['y_repeat'], $pb['bpa'], $pb['size']); 
  2254.                     $this->patterns[$n] = array('x' => $pb['x'], 'y' => $pb['y'], 'w' => $pb['w'], 'h' => $pb['h'], 'pgh' => $this->h, 'image_id' => $pb['image_id'], 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $pb['x_pos'], 'y_pos' => $pb['y_pos'], 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'itype' => $pb['itype'], 'bpa' => $pb['bpa']); 
  2255.                     $x = $pb['x'] * _MPDFK; 
  2256.                     $y = ($this->h - $pb['y']) * _MPDFK; 
  2257.                     $w = $pb['w'] * _MPDFK; 
  2258.                     $h = -$pb['h'] * _MPDFK; 
  2259.                     if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { 
  2260.                         $s .= $pb['clippath'] . "\n"; 
  2261.                     } 
  2262.                     if ($this->writingHTMLfooter || $this->writingHTMLheader) { // Write each (tiles) image rather than use as a pattern 
  2263.                         $iw = $pb['orig_w'] / _MPDFK; 
  2264.                         $ih = $pb['orig_h'] / _MPDFK; 
  2265.  
  2266.                         $w = $pb['w']; 
  2267.                         $h = $pb['h']; 
  2268.                         $x0 = $pb['x']; 
  2269.                         $y0 = $pb['y']; 
  2270.  
  2271.                         if (isset($pb['bpa']) && $pb['bpa']) { 
  2272.                             $w = $pb['bpa']['w']; 
  2273.                             $h = $pb['bpa']['h']; 
  2274.                             $x0 = $pb['bpa']['x']; 
  2275.                             $y0 = $pb['bpa']['y']; 
  2276.                         } 
  2277.
