  2278.                         if (isset($pb['size']['w']) && $pb['size']['w']) { 
  2279.                             $size = $pb['size']; 
  2280.  
  2281.                             if ($size['w'] == 'contain') { 
  2282.                                 // Scale the image, while preserving its intrinsic aspect ratio (if any), to the largest size such that both its width and its height can fit inside the background positioning area. 
  2283.                                 // Same as resize==3 
  2284.                                 $ih = $ih * $pb['bpa']['w'] / $iw; 
  2285.                                 $iw = $pb['bpa']['w']; 
  2286.                                 if ($ih > $pb['bpa']['h']) { 
  2287.                                     $iw = $iw * $pb['bpa']['h'] / $ih; 
  2288.                                     $ih = $pb['bpa']['h']; 
  2289.                                 } 
  2290.                             } elseif ($size['w'] == 'cover') { 
  2291.                                 // Scale the image, while preserving its intrinsic aspect ratio (if any), to the smallest size such that both its width and its height can completely cover the background positioning area. 
  2292.                                 $ih = $ih * $pb['bpa']['w'] / $iw; 
  2293.                                 $iw = $pb['bpa']['w']; 
  2294.                                 if ($ih < $pb['bpa']['h']) { 
  2295.                                     $iw = $iw * $ih / $pb['bpa']['h']; 
  2296.                                     $ih = $pb['bpa']['h']; 
  2297.                                 } 
  2298.                             } else { 
  2299.                                 if (stristr($size['w'], '%')) { 
  2300.                                     $size['w'] += 0; 
  2301.                                     $size['w'] /= 100; 
  2302.                                     $size['w'] = ($pb['bpa']['w'] * $size['w']); 
  2303.                                 } 
  2304.                                 if (stristr($size['h'], '%')) { 
  2305.                                     $size['h'] += 0; 
  2306.                                     $size['h'] /= 100; 
  2307.                                     $size['h'] = ($pb['bpa']['h'] * $size['h']); 
  2308.                                 } 
  2309.                                 if ($size['w'] == 'auto' && $size['h'] == 'auto') { 
  2310.                                     $iw = $iw; 
  2311.                                     $ih = $ih; 
  2312.                                 } elseif ($size['w'] == 'auto' && $size['h'] != 'auto') { 
  2313.                                     $iw = $iw * $size['h'] / $ih; 
  2314.                                     $ih = $size['h']; 
  2315.                                 } elseif ($size['w'] != 'auto' && $size['h'] == 'auto') { 
  2316.                                     $ih = $ih * $size['w'] / $iw; 
  2317.                                     $iw = $size['w']; 
  2318.                                 } else { 
  2319.                                     $iw = $size['w']; 
  2320.                                     $ih = $size['h']; 
  2321.                                 } 
  2322.                             } 
  2323.                         } 
  2324.  
  2325.                         // Number to repeat 
  2326.                         if ($pb['x_repeat']) { 
  2327.                             $nx = ceil($pb['w'] / $iw) + 1; 
  2328.                         } else { 
  2329.                             $nx = 1; 
  2330.                         } 
  2331.                         if ($pb['y_repeat']) { 
  2332.                             $ny = ceil($pb['h'] / $ih) + 1; 
  2333.                         } else { 
  2334.                             $ny = 1; 
  2335.                         } 
  2336.  
  2337.                         $x_pos = $pb['x_pos']; 
  2338.                         if (stristr($x_pos, '%')) { 
  2339.                             $x_pos += 0; 
  2340.                             $x_pos /= 100; 
  2341.                             $x_pos = ($pb['bpa']['w'] * $x_pos) - ($iw * $x_pos); 
  2342.                         } 
  2343.                         $y_pos = $pb['y_pos']; 
  2344.                         if (stristr($y_pos, '%')) { 
  2345.                             $y_pos += 0; 
  2346.                             $y_pos /= 100; 
  2347.                             $y_pos = ($pb['bpa']['h'] * $y_pos) - ($ih * $y_pos); 
  2348.                         } 
  2349.                         if ($nx > 1) { 
  2350.                             while ($x_pos > ($pb['x'] - $pb['bpa']['x'])) { 
  2351.                                 $x_pos -= $iw; 
  2352.                             } 
  2353.                         } 
  2354.                         if ($ny > 1) { 
  2355.                             while ($y_pos > ($pb['y'] - $pb['bpa']['y'])) { 
  2356.                                 $y_pos -= $ih; 
  2357.                             } 
  2358.                         } 
  2359.                         for ($xi = 0; $xi < $nx; $xi++) { 
  2360.                             for ($yi = 0; $yi < $ny; $yi++) { 
  2361.                                 $x = $x0 + $x_pos + ($iw * $xi); 
  2362.                                 $y = $y0 + $y_pos + ($ih * $yi); 
  2363.                                 if ($pb['opacity'] > 0 && $pb['opacity'] < 1) { 
  2364.                                     $opac = $this->SetAlpha($pb['opacity'], 'Normal', true); 
  2365.                                 } else { 
  2366.                                     $opac = ''; 
  2367.                                 } 
  2368.                                 $s .= sprintf("q %s %.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /I%d Do Q", $opac, $iw * _MPDFK, $ih * _MPDFK, $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y + $ih)) * _MPDFK, $pb['image_id']) . "\n"; 
  2369.                             } 
  2370.                         } 
  2371.                     } else { 
  2372.                         if (($pb['opacity'] > 0 || $pb['opacity'] === '0') && $pb['opacity'] < 1) { 
  2373.                             $opac = $this->SetAlpha($pb['opacity'], 'Normal', true); 
  2374.                         } else { 
  2375.                             $opac = ''; 
  2376.                         } 
  2377.                         $s .= sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re f Q', $n, $opac, $x, $y, $w, $h) . "\n"; 
  2378.                     } 
  2379.                     if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { 
  2380.                         $s .= 'Q' . "\n"; 
  2381.                     } 
  2382.                 } 
  2383.                 if ((isset($pb['gradient']) && $pb['gradient']) || (isset($pb['image_id']) && $pb['image_id'])) { 
  2384.                     if ($pb['visibility'] != 'visible') 
  2385.                         $s .= 'EMC' . "\n"; 
  2386.  
  2387.                     if ($pb['z-index'] > 0) { 
  2388.                         $s .= "\n" . 'EMCGZ-index' . "\n"; 
  2389.                         $this->current_layer = 0; 
  2390.                     } 
  2391.                 } 
  2392.             } 
  2393.             /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  2394.         } 
  2395.         return $s; 
  2396.     } 
  2397.  
  2398.     function PrintTableBackgrounds($adjustmenty = 0) 
  2399.     { 
  2400.         $s = ''; 
  2401.         /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  2402.         ksort($this->tableBackgrounds); 
  2403.         foreach ($this->tableBackgrounds AS $bl => $pbs) { 
  2404.             foreach ($pbs AS $pb) { 
  2405.                 if ((!isset($pb['gradient']) || !$pb['gradient']) && (!isset($pb['image_id']) || !$pb['image_id'])) { 
  2406.                     $s .= 'q ' . $this->SetFColor($pb['col'], true) . "\n"; 
  2407.                     if ($pb['col']{0} == 5) { // RGBa 
  2408.                         $s .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($pb['col']{4}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  2409.                     } elseif ($pb['col']{0} == 6) { // CMYKa 
  2410.                         $s .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($pb['col']{5}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  2411.                     } 
  2412.                     $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re %s Q', $pb['x'] * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $pb['y']) * _MPDFK, $pb['w'] * _MPDFK, -$pb['h'] * _MPDFK, 'f') . "\n"; 
  2413.                 } 
  2414.                 if (isset($pb['gradient']) && $pb['gradient']) { 
  2415.                     if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { 
  2416.                         $s .= $pb['clippath'] . "\n"; 
  2417.                     } 
  2418.                     $s .= $this->grad->Gradient($pb['x'], $pb['y'], $pb['w'], $pb['h'], $pb['gradtype'], $pb['stops'], $pb['colorspace'], $pb['coords'], $pb['extend'], true); 
  2419.                     if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { 
  2420.                         $s .= 'Q' . "\n"; 
  2421.                     } 
  2422.                 } 
  2423.                 if (isset($pb['image_id']) && $pb['image_id']) { // Background pattern 
  2424.                     $pb['y'] -= $adjustmenty; 
  2425.                     $pb['h'] += $adjustmenty; 
  2426.                     $n = count($this->patterns) + 1; 
  2427.                     list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($pb['orig_w'], $pb['orig_h'], $pb['w'], $pb['h'], $pb['resize'], $pb['x_repeat'], $pb['y_repeat']); 
  2428.                     $this->patterns[$n] = array('x' => $pb['x'], 'y' => $pb['y'], 'w' => $pb['w'], 'h' => $pb['h'], 'pgh' => $this->h, 'image_id' => $pb['image_id'], 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $pb['x_pos'], 'y_pos' => $pb['y_pos'], 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'itype' => $pb['itype']); 
  2429.                     $x = $pb['x'] * _MPDFK; 
  2430.                     $y = ($this->h - $pb['y']) * _MPDFK; 
  2431.                     $w = $pb['w'] * _MPDFK; 
  2432.                     $h = -$pb['h'] * _MPDFK; 
  2433.  
  2434.                     // mPDF 5.7.3 
  2435.                     if (($this->writingHTMLfooter || $this->writingHTMLheader) && (!isset($pb['clippath']) || $pb['clippath'] == '')) { 
  2436.                         // Set clipping path 
  2437.                         $pb['clippath'] = sprintf(' q 0 w %.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l %.3F %.3F l %.3F %.3F l %.3F %.3F l W n ', $x, $y, $x, $y + $h, $x + $w, $y + $h, $x + $w, $y, $x, $y); 
  2438.                     } 
  2439.  
  2440.                     if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { 
  2441.                         $s .= $pb['clippath'] . "\n"; 
  2442.                     } 
  2443.  
  2444.                     // mPDF 5.7.3 
  2445.                     if ($this->writingHTMLfooter || $this->writingHTMLheader) { // Write each (tiles) image rather than use as a pattern 
  2446.                         $iw = $pb['orig_w'] / _MPDFK; 
  2447.                         $ih = $pb['orig_h'] / _MPDFK; 
  2448.  
  2449.                         $w = $pb['w']; 
  2450.                         $h = $pb['h']; 
  2451.                         $x0 = $pb['x']; 
  2452.                         $y0 = $pb['y']; 
  2453.  
  2454.                         if (isset($pb['bpa']) && $pb['bpa']) { 
  2455.                             $w = $pb['bpa']['w']; 
  2456.                             $h = $pb['bpa']['h']; 
  2457.                             $x0 = $pb['bpa']['x']; 
  2458.                             $y0 = $pb['bpa']['y']; 
  2459.                         } 
  2460.                         // At present 'bpa' (background page area) is not set for tablebackgrounds - only pagebackgrounds 
  2461.                         // For now, just set it as: 
  2462.                         else { 
  2463.                             $pb['bpa'] = array('x' => $x0, 'y' => $y0, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h); 
  2464.                         } 
  2465.  
  2466.                         if (isset($pb['size']['w']) && $pb['size']['w']) { 
  2467.                             $size = $pb['size']; 
  2468.  
  2469.                             if ($size['w'] == 'contain') { 
  2470.                                 // Scale the image, while preserving its intrinsic aspect ratio (if any), to the largest size such that both its width and its height can fit inside the background positioning area. 
  2471.                                 // Same as resize==3 
  2472.                                 $ih = $ih * $pb['bpa']['w'] / $iw; 
  2473.                                 $iw = $pb['bpa']['w']; 
  2474.                                 if ($ih > $pb['bpa']['h']) { 
  2475.                                     $iw = $iw * $pb['bpa']['h'] / $ih; 
  2476.                                     $ih = $pb['bpa']['h']; 
  2477.                                 } 
  2478.                             } elseif ($size['w'] == 'cover') { 
  2479.                                 // Scale the image, while preserving its intrinsic aspect ratio (if any), to the smallest size such that both its width and its height can completely cover the background positioning area. 
  2480.                                 $ih = $ih * $pb['bpa']['w'] / $iw; 
  2481.                                 $iw = $pb['bpa']['w']; 
  2482.                                 if ($ih < $pb['bpa']['h']) { 
  2483.                                     $iw = $iw * $ih / $pb['bpa']['h']; 
  2484.                                     $ih = $pb['bpa']['h']; 
  2485.                                 } 
  2486.                             } else { 
  2487.                                 if (stristr($size['w'], '%')) { 
  2488.                                     $size['w'] += 0; 
  2489.                                     $size['w'] /= 100; 
  2490.                                     $size['w'] = ($pb['bpa']['w'] * $size['w']); 
  2491.                                 } 
  2492.                                 if (stristr($size['h'], '%')) { 
  2493.                                     $size['h'] += 0; 
  2494.                                     $size['h'] /= 100; 
  2495.                                     $size['h'] = ($pb['bpa']['h'] * $size['h']); 
  2496.                                 } 
  2497.                                 if ($size['w'] == 'auto' && $size['h'] == 'auto') { 
  2498.                                     $iw = $iw; 
  2499.                                     $ih = $ih; 
  2500.                                 } elseif ($size['w'] == 'auto' && $size['h'] != 'auto') { 
  2501.                                     $iw = $iw * $size['h'] / $ih; 
  2502.                                     $ih = $size['h']; 
  2503.                                 } elseif ($size['w'] != 'auto' && $size['h'] == 'auto') { 
  2504.                                     $ih = $ih * $size['w'] / $iw; 
  2505.                                     $iw = $size['w']; 
  2506.                                 } else { 
  2507.                                     $iw = $size['w']; 
  2508.                                     $ih = $size['h']; 
  2509.                                 } 
  2510.                             } 
  2511.                         } 
  2512.  
  2513.                         // Number to repeat 
  2514.                         if (isset($pb['x_repeat']) && $pb['x_repeat']) { 
  2515.                             $nx = ceil($pb['w'] / $iw) + 1; 
  2516.                         } else { 
  2517.                             $nx = 1; 
  2518.                         } 
  2519.                         if (isset($pb['y_repeat']) && $pb['y_repeat']) { 
  2520.                             $ny = ceil($pb['h'] / $ih) + 1; 
  2521.                         } else { 
  2522.                             $ny = 1; 
  2523.                         } 
  2524.  
  2525.                         $x_pos = $pb['x_pos']; 
  2526.                         if (stristr($x_pos, '%')) { 
  2527.                             $x_pos += 0; 
  2528.                             $x_pos /= 100; 
  2529.                             $x_pos = ($pb['bpa']['w'] * $x_pos) - ($iw * $x_pos); 
  2530.                         } 
  2531.                         $y_pos = $pb['y_pos']; 
  2532.                         if (stristr($y_pos, '%')) { 
  2533.                             $y_pos += 0; 
  2534.                             $y_pos /= 100; 
  2535.                             $y_pos = ($pb['bpa']['h'] * $y_pos) - ($ih * $y_pos); 
  2536.                         } 
  2537.                         if ($nx > 1) { 
  2538.                             while ($x_pos > ($pb['x'] - $pb['bpa']['x'])) { 
  2539.                                 $x_pos -= $iw; 
  2540.                             } 
  2541.                         } 
  2542.                         if ($ny > 1) { 
  2543.                             while ($y_pos > ($pb['y'] - $pb['bpa']['y'])) { 
  2544.                                 $y_pos -= $ih; 
  2545.                             } 
  2546.                         } 
  2547.                         for ($xi = 0; $xi < $nx; $xi++) { 
  2548.                             for ($yi = 0; $yi < $ny; $yi++) { 
  2549.                                 $x = $x0 + $x_pos + ($iw * $xi); 
  2550.                                 $y = $y0 + $y_pos + ($ih * $yi); 
  2551.                                 if ($pb['opacity'] > 0 && $pb['opacity'] < 1) { 
  2552.                                     $opac = $this->SetAlpha($pb['opacity'], 'Normal', true); 
  2553.                                 } else { 
  2554.                                     $opac = ''; 
  2555.                                 } 
  2556.                                 $s .= sprintf("q %s %.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /I%d Do Q", $opac, $iw * _MPDFK, $ih * _MPDFK, $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y + $ih)) * _MPDFK, $pb['image_id']) . "\n"; 
  2557.                             } 
  2558.                         } 
  2559.                     } else { 
  2560.                         if (($pb['opacity'] > 0 || $pb['opacity'] === '0') && $pb['opacity'] < 1) { 
  2561.                             $opac = $this->SetAlpha($pb['opacity'], 'Normal', true); 
  2562.                         } else { 
  2563.                             $opac = ''; 
  2564.                         } 
  2565.                         $s .= sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re f Q', $n, $opac, $x, $y, $w, $h) . "\n"; 
  2566.                     } 
  2567.  
  2568.                     if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { 
  2569.                         $s .= 'Q' . "\n"; 
  2570.                     } 
  2571.                 } 
  2572.             } 
  2573.         } 
  2574.         /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  2575.         return $s; 
  2576.     } 
  2577.  
  2578.     function BeginLayer($id) 
  2579.     { 
  2580.         if ($this->current_layer > 0) 
  2581.             $this->EndLayer(); 
  2582.         if ($id < 1) { 
  2583.             return false; 
  2584.         } 
  2585.         if (!isset($this->layers[$id])) { 
  2586.             $this->layers[$id] = array('name' => 'Layer ' . ($id)); 
  2587.             if (($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX)) { 
  2588.                 $this->PDFAXwarnings[] = "Cannot use layers when using PDFA or PDFX"; 
  2589.                 return ''; 
  2590.             } elseif (!$this->PDFA && !$this->PDFX) { 
  2591.                 $this->pdf_version = '1.5'; 
  2592.             } 
  2593.         } 
  2594.         $this->current_layer = $id; 
  2595.         $this->_out('/OCZ-index /ZI' . $id . ' BDC'); 
  2596.  
  2597.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  2598.     } 
  2599.  
  2600.     function EndLayer() 
  2601.     { 
  2602.         if ($this->current_layer > 0) { 
  2603.             $this->_out('EMCZ-index'); 
  2604.             $this->current_layer = 0; 
  2605.         } 
  2606.     } 
  2607.  
  2608.     function AddPageByArray($a) 
  2609.     { 
  2610.         if (!is_array($a)) { 
  2611.             $a = array(); 
  2612.         } 
  2613.         $orientation = (isset($a['orientation']) ? $a['orientation'] : ''); 
  2614.         $condition = (isset($a['condition']) ? $a['condition'] : (isset($a['type']) ? $a['type'] : '')); 
  2615.         $resetpagenum = (isset($a['resetpagenum']) ? $a['resetpagenum'] : ''); 
  2616.         $pagenumstyle = (isset($a['pagenumstyle']) ? $a['pagenumstyle'] : ''); 
  2617.         $suppress = (isset($a['suppress']) ? $a['suppress'] : ''); 
  2618.         $mgl = (isset($a['mgl']) ? $a['mgl'] : (isset($a['margin-left']) ? $a['margin-left'] : '')); 
  2619.         $mgr = (isset($a['mgr']) ? $a['mgr'] : (isset($a['margin-right']) ? $a['margin-right'] : '')); 
  2620.         $mgt = (isset($a['mgt']) ? $a['mgt'] : (isset($a['margin-top']) ? $a['margin-top'] : '')); 
  2621.         $mgb = (isset($a['mgb']) ? $a['mgb'] : (isset($a['margin-bottom']) ? $a['margin-bottom'] : '')); 
  2622.         $mgh = (isset($a['mgh']) ? $a['mgh'] : (isset($a['margin-header']) ? $a['margin-header'] : '')); 
  2623.         $mgf = (isset($a['mgf']) ? $a['mgf'] : (isset($a['margin-footer']) ? $a['margin-footer'] : '')); 
  2624.         $ohname = (isset($a['ohname']) ? $a['ohname'] : (isset($a['odd-header-name']) ? $a['odd-header-name'] : '')); 
  2625.         $ehname = (isset($a['ehname']) ? $a['ehname'] : (isset($a['even-header-name']) ? $a['even-header-name'] : '')); 
  2626.         $ofname = (isset($a['ofname']) ? $a['ofname'] : (isset($a['odd-footer-name']) ? $a['odd-footer-name'] : '')); 
  2627.         $efname = (isset($a['efname']) ? $a['efname'] : (isset($a['even-footer-name']) ? $a['even-footer-name'] : '')); 
  2628.         $ohvalue = (isset($a['ohvalue']) ? $a['ohvalue'] : (isset($a['odd-header-value']) ? $a['odd-header-value'] : 0)); 
  2629.         $ehvalue = (isset($a['ehvalue']) ? $a['ehvalue'] : (isset($a['even-header-value']) ? $a['even-header-value'] : 0)); 
  2630.         $ofvalue = (isset($a['ofvalue']) ? $a['ofvalue'] : (isset($a['odd-footer-value']) ? $a['odd-footer-value'] : 0)); 
  2631.         $efvalue = (isset($a['efvalue']) ? $a['efvalue'] : (isset($a['even-footer-value']) ? $a['even-footer-value'] : 0)); 
  2632.         $pagesel = (isset($a['pagesel']) ? $a['pagesel'] : (isset($a['pageselector']) ? $a['pageselector'] : '')); 
  2633.         $newformat = (isset($a['newformat']) ? $a['newformat'] : (isset($a['sheet-size']) ? $a['sheet-size'] : '')); 
  2634.  
  2635.         $this->AddPage($orientation, $condition, $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress, $mgl, $mgr, $mgt, $mgb, $mgh, $mgf, $ohname, $ehname, $ofname, $efname, $ohvalue, $ehvalue, $ofvalue, $efvalue, $pagesel, $newformat); 
  2636.     } 
  2637.  
  2638.     // mPDF 6 pagebreaktype 
  2639.     function _preForcedPagebreak($pagebreaktype) 
  2640.     { 
  2641.         if ($pagebreaktype == 'cloneall') { 
  2642.             // Close any open block tags 
  2643.             $arr = array(); 
  2644.             $ai = 0; 
  2645.             for ($b = $this->blklvl; $b > 0; $b--) { 
  2646.                 $this->tag->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag'], $arr, $ai); 
  2647.             } 
  2648.             if ($this->blklvl == 0 && !empty($this->textbuffer)) { //Output previously buffered content 
  2649.                 $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer, 1); 
  2650.                 $this->textbuffer = array(); 
  2651.             } 
  2652.         } elseif ($pagebreaktype == 'clonebycss') { 
  2653.             // Close open block tags whilst box-decoration-break==clone 
  2654.             $arr = array(); 
  2655.             $ai = 0; 
  2656.             for ($b = $this->blklvl; $b > 0; $b--) { 
  2657.                 if (isset($this->blk[$b]['box_decoration_break']) && $this->blk[$b]['box_decoration_break'] == 'clone') { 
  2658.                     $this->tag->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag'], $arr, $ai); 
  2659.                 } else { 
  2660.                     if ($b == $this->blklvl && !empty($this->textbuffer)) { //Output previously buffered content 
  2661.                         $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer, 1); 
  2662.                         $this->textbuffer = array(); 
  2663.                     } 
  2664.                     break; 
  2665.                 } 
  2666.             } 
  2667.         } elseif (!empty($this->textbuffer)) { //Output previously buffered content 
  2668.             $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer, 1); 
  2669.             $this->textbuffer = array(); 
  2670.         } 
  2671.     } 
  2672.  
  2673.     // mPDF 6 pagebreaktype 
  2674.     function _postForcedPagebreak($pagebreaktype, $startpage, $save_blk, $save_blklvl) 
  2675.     { 
  2676.         if ($pagebreaktype == 'cloneall') { 
  2677.             $this->blk = array(); 
  2678.             $this->blk[0] = $save_blk[0]; 
  2679.             // Re-open block tags 
  2680.             $this->blklvl = 0; 
  2681.             $arr = array(); 
  2682.             $i = 0; 
  2683.             for ($b = 1; $b <= $save_blklvl; $b++) { 
  2684.                 $this->tag->OpenTag($save_blk[$b]['tag'], $save_blk[$b]['attr'], $arr, $i); 
  2685.             } 
  2686.         } elseif ($pagebreaktype == 'clonebycss') { 
  2687.             $this->blk = array(); 
  2688.             $this->blk[0] = $save_blk[0]; 
  2689.             // Don't re-open tags for lowest level elements - so need to do some adjustments 
  2690.             for ($b = 1; $b <= $this->blklvl; $b++) { 
  2691.                 $this->blk[$b] = $save_blk[$b]; 
  2692.                 $this->blk[$b]['startpage'] = 0; 
  2693.                 $this->blk[$b]['y0'] = $this->y; // ?? $this->tMargin 
  2694.                 if (($this->page - $startpage) % 2) { 
  2695.                     if (isset($this->blk[$b]['x0'])) { 
  2696.                         $this->blk[$b]['x0'] += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  2697.                     } else { 
  2698.                         $this->blk[$b]['x0'] = $this->MarginCorrection; 
  2699.                     } 
  2700.                 } 
  2701.                 //for Float DIV 
  2702.                 $this->blk[$b]['marginCorrected'][$this->page] = true; 
  2703.             } 
  2704.  
  2705.             // Re-open block tags for any that have box_decoration_break==clone 
  2706.             $arr = array(); 
  2707.             $i = 0; 
  2708.             for ($b = $this->blklvl + 1; $b <= $save_blklvl; $b++) { 
  2709.                 if ($b < $this->blklvl) { 
  2710.                     $this->lastblocklevelchange = -1; 
  2711.                 } 
  2712.                 $this->tag->OpenTag($save_blk[$b]['tag'], $save_blk[$b]['attr'], $arr, $i); 
  2713.             } 
  2714.             if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['box_decoration_break'] != 'clone') { 
  2715.                 $this->lastblocklevelchange = -1; 
  2716.             } 
  2717.         } else { 
  2718.             $this->lastblocklevelchange = -1; 
  2719.         } 
  2720.     } 
  2721.  
  2722.     function AddPage($orientation = '', $condition = '', $resetpagenum = '', $pagenumstyle = '', $suppress = '', $mgl = '', $mgr = '', $mgt = '', $mgb = '', $mgh = '', $mgf = '', $ohname = '', $ehname = '', $ofname = '', $efname = '', $ohvalue = 0, $ehvalue = 0, $ofvalue = 0, $efvalue = 0, $pagesel = '', $newformat = '') 
  2723.     { 
  2724.  
  2725.         /** -- CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  2726.         // Float DIV 
  2727.         // Cannot do with columns on, or if any change in page orientation/margins etc. 
  2728.         // If next page already exists - i.e background /headers and footers already written 
  2729.         if ($this->state > 0 && $this->page < count($this->pages)) { 
  2730.             $bak_cml = $this->cMarginL; 
  2731.             $bak_cmr = $this->cMarginR; 
  2732.             $bak_dw = $this->divwidth; 
  2733.             // Paint Div Border if necessary 
  2734.             if ($this->blklvl > 0) { 
  2735.                 $save_tr = $this->table_rotate; // *TABLES* 
  2736.                 $this->table_rotate = 0; // *TABLES* 
  2737.                 if (($this->y > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) || $this->flowingBlockAttr['is_table']) { 
  2738.                     $toplvl = $this->blklvl; 
  2739.                 } else { 
  2740.                     $toplvl = $this->blklvl - 1; 
  2741.                 } 
  2742.                 $sy = $this->y; 
  2743.                 for ($bl = 1; $bl <= $toplvl; $bl++) { 
  2744.                     $this->PaintDivBB('pagebottom', 0, $bl); 
  2745.                 } 
  2746.                 $this->y = $sy; 
  2747.                 $this->table_rotate = $save_tr; // *TABLES* 
  2748.             } 
  2749.             $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(); 
  2750.  
  2751.             // Writes after the marker so not overwritten later by page background etc. 
  2752.             $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', '\\1' . "\n" . $s . "\n", $this->pages[$this->page]); 
  2753.             $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  2754.             $family = $this->FontFamily; 
  2755.             $style = $this->FontStyle; 
  2756.             $size = $this->FontSizePt; 
  2757.             $lw = $this->LineWidth; 
  2758.             $dc = $this->DrawColor; 
  2759.             $fc = $this->FillColor; 
  2760.             $tc = $this->TextColor; 
  2761.             $cf = $this->ColorFlag; 
  2762.  
  2763.             $this->printfloatbuffer(); 
  2764.  
  2765.             //Move to next page 
  2766.             $this->page++; 
  2767.             $this->ResetMargins(); 
  2768.             $this->SetAutoPageBreak($this->autoPageBreak, $this->bMargin); 
  2769.             $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  2770.             $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  2771.             $this->FontFamily = ''; 
  2772.             $this->_out('2 J'); 
  2773.             $this->LineWidth = $lw; 
  2774.             $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F w', $lw * _MPDFK)); 
  2775.             if ($family) 
  2776.                 $this->SetFont($family, $style, $size, true, true); 
  2777.             $this->DrawColor = $dc; 
  2778.             if ($dc != $this->defDrawColor) 
  2779.                 $this->_out($dc); 
  2780.             $this->FillColor = $fc; 
  2781.             if ($fc != $this->defFillColor) 
  2782.                 $this->_out($fc); 
  2783.             $this->TextColor = $tc; 
  2784.             $this->ColorFlag = $cf; 
  2785.             for ($bl = 1; $bl <= $this->blklvl; $bl++) { 
  2786.                 $this->blk[$bl]['y0'] = $this->y; 
  2787.                 // Don't correct more than once for background DIV containing a Float 
  2788.                 if (!isset($this->blk[$bl]['marginCorrected'][$this->page])) { 
  2789.                     $this->blk[$bl]['x0'] += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  2790.                 } 
  2791.                 $this->blk[$bl]['marginCorrected'][$this->page] = true; 
  2792.             } 
  2793.             $this->cMarginL = $bak_cml; 
  2794.             $this->cMarginR = $bak_cmr; 
  2795.             $this->divwidth = $bak_dw; 
  2796.             return ''; 
  2797.         } 
  2798.         /** -- END CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  2799.  
  2800.         //Start a new page 
  2801.         if ($this->state == 0) 
  2802.             $this->Open(); 
  2803.  
  2804.         $bak_cml = $this->cMarginL; 
  2805.         $bak_cmr = $this->cMarginR; 
  2806.         $bak_dw = $this->divwidth; 
  2807.  
  2808.  
  2809.         $bak_lh = $this->lineheight; 
  2810.  
  2811.         $orientation = substr(strtoupper($orientation), 0, 1); 
  2812.         $condition = strtoupper($condition); 
  2813.  
  2814.  
  2815.         if ($condition == 'E') { // only adds new page if needed to create an Even page 
  2816.             if (!$this->mirrorMargins || ($this->page) % 2 == 0) { 
  2817.                 return false; 
  2818.             } 
  2819.         } elseif ($condition == 'O') { // only adds new page if needed to create an Odd page 
  2820.             if (!$this->mirrorMargins || ($this->page) % 2 == 1) { 
  2821.                 return false; 
  2822.             } 
  2823.         } elseif ($condition == 'NEXT-EVEN') { // always adds at least one new page to create an Even page 
  2824.             if (!$this->mirrorMargins) { 
  2825.                 $condition = ''; 
  2826.             } else { 
  2827.                 if ($pagesel) { 
  2828.                     $pbch = $pagesel; 
  2829.                     $pagesel = ''; 
  2830.                 } // *CSS-PAGE* 
  2831.                 else { 
  2832.                     $pbch = false; 
  2833.                 } // *CSS-PAGE* 
  2834.                 $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation, 'O'); 
  2835.                 $this->extrapagebreak = true; // mPDF 6 pagebreaktype 
  2836.                 if ($pbch) { 
  2837.                     $pagesel = $pbch; 
  2838.                 } // *CSS-PAGE* 
  2839.                 $condition = ''; 
  2840.             } 
  2841.         } elseif ($condition == 'NEXT-ODD') { // always adds at least one new page to create an Odd page 
  2842.             if (!$this->mirrorMargins) { 
  2843.                 $condition = ''; 
  2844.             } else { 
  2845.                 if ($pagesel) { 
  2846.                     $pbch = $pagesel; 
  2847.                     $pagesel = ''; 
  2848.                 } // *CSS-PAGE* 
  2849.                 else { 
  2850.                     $pbch = false; 
  2851.                 } // *CSS-PAGE* 
  2852.                 $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation, 'E'); 
  2853.                 $this->extrapagebreak = true; // mPDF 6 pagebreaktype 
  2854.                 if ($pbch) { 
  2855.                     $pagesel = $pbch; 
  2856.                 } // *CSS-PAGE* 
  2857.                 $condition = ''; 
  2858.             } 
  2859.         } 
  2860.  
  2861.  
  2862.         if ($resetpagenum || $pagenumstyle || $suppress) { 
  2863.             $this->PageNumSubstitutions[] = array('from' => ($this->page + 1), 'reset' => $resetpagenum, 'type' => $pagenumstyle, 'suppress' => $suppress); 
  2864.         } 
  2865.  
  2866.  
  2867.         $save_tr = $this->table_rotate; // *TABLES* 
  2868.         $this->table_rotate = 0; // *TABLES* 
  2869.         $save_kwt = $this->kwt; 
  2870.         $this->kwt = 0; 
  2871.         $save_layer = $this->current_layer; 
  2872.         $save_vis = $this->visibility; 
  2873.  
  2874.         if ($this->visibility != 'visible') 
  2875.             $this->SetVisibility('visible'); 
  2876.         $this->EndLayer(); 
  2877.  
  2878.         // Paint Div Border if necessary 
  2879.         //PAINTS BACKGROUND COLOUR OR BORDERS for DIV - DISABLED FOR COLUMNS (cf. AcceptPageBreak) AT PRESENT in ->PaintDivBB 
  2880.         if (!$this->ColActive && $this->blklvl > 0) { 
  2881.             if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) && $this->y == $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0'] && !$this->extrapagebreak && !$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float']) { // mPDF 6 pagebreaktype 
  2882.                 if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'])) { 
  2883.                     $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] ++; 
  2884.                 } else { 
  2885.                     $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] = 1; 
  2886.                 } 
  2887.             } 
  2888.             if ((isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) && $this->y > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) || $this->flowingBlockAttr['is_table'] || $this->extrapagebreak) { 
  2889.                 $toplvl = $this->blklvl; 
  2890.             } // mPDF 6 pagebreaktype 
  2891.             else { 
  2892.                 $toplvl = $this->blklvl - 1; 
  2893.             } 
  2894.             $sy = $this->y; 
  2895.             for ($bl = 1; $bl <= $toplvl; $bl++) { 
  2896.  
  2897.                 if (isset($this->blk[$bl]['z-index']) && $this->blk[$bl]['z-index'] > 0) { 
  2898.                     $this->BeginLayer($this->blk[$bl]['z-index']); 
  2899.                 } 
  2900.                 if (isset($this->blk[$bl]['visibility']) && $this->blk[$bl]['visibility'] && $this->blk[$bl]['visibility'] != 'visible') { 
  2901.                     $this->SetVisibility($this->blk[$bl]['visibility']); 
  2902.                 } 
  2903.                 $this->PaintDivBB('pagebottom', 0, $bl); 
  2904.             } 
  2905.             $this->y = $sy; 
  2906.             // RESET block y0 and x0 - see below 
  2907.         } 
  2908.         $this->extrapagebreak = false; // mPDF 6 pagebreaktype 
  2909.  
  2910.         if ($this->visibility != 'visible') 
  2911.             $this->SetVisibility('visible'); 
  2912.         $this->EndLayer(); 
  2913.  
  2914.         // BODY Backgrounds 
  2915.         if ($this->page > 0) { 
  2916.             $s = ''; 
  2917.             $s .= $this->PrintBodyBackgrounds(); 
  2918.  
  2919.             $s .= $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(); 
  2920.             $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', "\n" . $s . "\n" . '\\1', $this->pages[$this->page]); 
  2921.             $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  2922.         } 
  2923.  
  2924.         $save_kt = $this->keep_block_together; 
  2925.         $this->keep_block_together = 0; 
  2926.  
  2927.         $save_cols = false; 
  2928.         /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  2929.         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  2930.             $save_cols = true; 
  2931.             $save_nbcol = $this->NbCol; // other values of gap and vAlign will not change by setting Columns off 
  2932.             $this->SetColumns(0); 
  2933.         } 
  2934.         /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  2935.  
  2936.  
  2937.         $family = $this->FontFamily; 
  2938.         $style = $this->FontStyle; 
  2939.         $size = $this->FontSizePt; 
  2940.         $this->ColumnAdjust = true; // enables column height adjustment for the page 
  2941.         $lw = $this->LineWidth; 
  2942.         $dc = $this->DrawColor; 
  2943.         $fc = $this->FillColor; 
  2944.         $tc = $this->TextColor; 
  2945.         $cf = $this->ColorFlag; 
  2946.         if ($this->page > 0) { 
  2947.             //Page footer 
  2948.             $this->InFooter = true; 
  2949.  
  2950.             $this->Reset(); 
  2951.             $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  2952.  
  2953.             $this->Footer(); 
  2954.             //Close page 
  2955.             $this->_endpage(); 
  2956.         } 
  2957.  
  2958.  
  2959.         //Start new page 
  2960.         $this->_beginpage($orientation, $mgl, $mgr, $mgt, $mgb, $mgh, $mgf, $ohname, $ehname, $ofname, $efname, $ohvalue, $ehvalue, $ofvalue, $efvalue, $pagesel, $newformat); 
  2961.         if ($this->docTemplate) { 
  2962.             $pagecount = $this->SetSourceFile($this->docTemplate); 
  2963.             if (($this->page - $this->docTemplateStart) > $pagecount) { 
  2964.                 if ($this->docTemplateContinue) { 
  2965.                     $tplIdx = $this->ImportPage($pagecount); 
  2966.                     $this->UseTemplate($tplIdx); 
  2967.                 } 
  2968.             } else { 
  2969.                 $tplIdx = $this->ImportPage(($this->page - $this->docTemplateStart)); 
  2970.                 $this->UseTemplate($tplIdx); 
  2971.             } 
  2972.         } 
  2973.         if ($this->pageTemplate) { 
  2974.             $this->UseTemplate($this->pageTemplate); 
  2975.         } 
  2976.  
  2977.         // Tiling Patterns 
  2978.         $this->_out('___PAGE___START' . $this->uniqstr); 
  2979.         $this->_out('___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS' . $this->uniqstr); 
  2980.         $this->_out('___HEADER___MARKER' . $this->uniqstr); 
  2981.         $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  2982.  
  2983.         //Set line cap style to square 
  2984.         $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  2985.         //Set line width 
  2986.         $this->LineWidth = $lw; 
  2987.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F w', $lw * _MPDFK)); 
  2988.         //Set font 
  2989.         if ($family) 
  2990.             $this->SetFont($family, $style, $size, true, true); // forces write 
  2991.  
  2992.         //Set colors 
  2993.         $this->DrawColor = $dc; 
  2994.         if ($dc != $this->defDrawColor) 
  2995.             $this->_out($dc); 
  2996.         $this->FillColor = $fc; 
  2997.         if ($fc != $this->defFillColor) 
  2998.             $this->_out($fc); 
  2999.         $this->TextColor = $tc; 
  3000.         $this->ColorFlag = $cf; 
  3001.  
  3002.         //Page header 
  3003.         $this->Header(); 
  3004.  
  3005.         //Restore line width 
  3006.         if ($this->LineWidth != $lw) { 
  3007.             $this->LineWidth = $lw; 
  3008.             $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F w', $lw * _MPDFK)); 
  3009.         } 
  3010.         //Restore font 
  3011.         if ($family) 
  3012.             $this->SetFont($family, $style, $size, true, true); // forces write 
  3013.  
  3014.         //Restore colors 
  3015.         if ($this->DrawColor != $dc) { 
  3016.             $this->DrawColor = $dc; 
  3017.             $this->_out($dc); 
  3018.         } 
  3019.         if ($this->FillColor != $fc) { 
  3020.             $this->FillColor = $fc; 
  3021.             $this->_out($fc); 
  3022.         } 
  3023.         $this->TextColor = $tc; 
  3024.         $this->ColorFlag = $cf; 
  3025.         $this->InFooter = false; 
  3026.  
  3027.         if ($save_layer > 0) 
  3028.             $this->BeginLayer($save_layer); 
  3029.  
  3030.         if ($save_vis != 'visible') 
  3031.             $this->SetVisibility($save_vis); 
  3032.  
  3033.         /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  3034.         if ($save_cols) { 
  3035.             // Restore columns 
  3036.             $this->SetColumns($save_nbcol, $this->colvAlign, $this->ColGap); 
  3037.         } 
  3038.         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  3039.             $this->SetCol(0); 
  3040.         } 
  3041.         /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  3042.  
  3043.  
  3044.         //RESET BLOCK BORDER TOP 
  3045.         if (!$this->ColActive) { 
  3046.             for ($bl = 1; $bl <= $this->blklvl; $bl++) { 
  3047.                 $this->blk[$bl]['y0'] = $this->y; 
  3048.                 if (isset($this->blk[$bl]['x0'])) { 
  3049.                     $this->blk[$bl]['x0'] += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  3050.                 } else { 
  3051.                     $this->blk[$bl]['x0'] = $this->MarginCorrection; 
  3052.                 } 
  3053.                 // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV 
  3054.                 $this->blk[$bl]['marginCorrected'][$this->page] = true; 
  3055.             } 
  3056.         } 
  3057.  
  3058.  
  3059.         $this->table_rotate = $save_tr; // *TABLES* 
  3060.         $this->kwt = $save_kwt; 
  3061.  
  3062.         $this->keep_block_together = $save_kt; 
  3063.  
  3064.         $this->cMarginL = $bak_cml; 
  3065.         $this->cMarginR = $bak_cmr; 
  3066.         $this->divwidth = $bak_dw; 
  3067.  
  3068.         $this->lineheight = $bak_lh; 
  3069.     } 
  3070.  
  3071.     function PageNo() 
  3072.     { 
  3073.         //Get current page number 
  3074.         return $this->page; 
  3075.     } 
  3076.  
  3077.     function AddSpotColorsFromFile($file) 
  3078.     { 
  3079.         $colors = @file($file); 
  3080.         if (!$colors) { 
  3081.             throw new MpdfException("Cannot load spot colors file - " . $file); 
  3082.         } 
  3083.         foreach ($colors AS $sc) { 
  3084.             list($name, $c, $m, $y, $k) = preg_split("/\t/", $sc); 
  3085.             $c = intval($c); 
  3086.             $m = intval($m); 
  3087.             $y = intval($y); 
  3088.             $k = intval($k); 
  3089.             $this->AddSpotColor($name, $c, $m, $y, $k); 
  3090.         } 
  3091.     } 
  3092.  
  3093.     function AddSpotColor($name, $c, $m, $y, $k) 
  3094.     { 
  3095.         $name = strtoupper(trim($name)); 
  3096.         if (!isset($this->spotColors[$name])) { 
  3097.             $i = count($this->spotColors) + 1; 
  3098.             $this->spotColors[$name] = array('i' => $i, 'c' => $c, 'm' => $m, 'y' => $y, 'k' => $k); 
  3099.             $this->spotColorIDs[$i] = $name; 
  3100.         } 
  3101.     } 
  3102.  
  3103.     function SetColor($col, $type = '') 
  3104.     { 
  3105.         $out = ''; 
  3106.         if (!$col) { 
  3107.             return ''; 
  3108.         } // mPDF 6 
  3109.         if ($col{0} == 3 || $col{0} == 5) { // RGB / RGBa 
  3110.             $out = sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F rg', ord($col{1}) / 255, ord($col{2}) / 255, ord($col{3}) / 255); 
  3111.         } elseif ($col{0} == 1) { // GRAYSCALE 
  3112.             $out = sprintf('%.3F g', ord($col{1}) / 255); 
  3113.         } elseif ($col{0} == 2) { // SPOT COLOR 
  3114.             $out = sprintf('/CS%d cs %.3F scn', ord($col{1}), ord($col{2}) / 100); 
  3115.         } elseif ($col{0} == 4 || $col{0} == 6) { // CMYK / CMYKa 
  3116.             $out = sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F k', ord($col{1}) / 100, ord($col{2}) / 100, ord($col{3}) / 100, ord($col{4}) / 100); 
  3117.         } 
  3118.         if ($type == 'Draw') { 
  3119.             $out = strtoupper($out); 
  3120.         } // e.g. rg => RG 
  3121.         elseif ($type == 'CodeOnly') { 
  3122.             $out = preg_replace('/\s(rg|g|k)/', '', $out); 
  3123.         } 
  3124.         return $out; 
  3125.     } 
  3126.  
  3127.     function SetDColor($col, $return = false) 
  3128.     { 
  3129.         $out = $this->SetColor($col, 'Draw'); 
  3130.         if ($return) { 
  3131.             return $out; 
  3132.         } 
  3133.         if ($out == '') { 
  3134.             return ''; 
  3135.         } 
  3136.         $this->DrawColor = $out; 
  3137.         if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['DrawColor']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['DrawColor'] != $this->DrawColor) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['DrawColor']))) { 
  3138.             $this->_out($this->DrawColor); 
  3139.         } 
  3140.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['DrawColor'] = $this->DrawColor; 
  3141.     } 
  3142.  
  3143.     function SetFColor($col, $return = false) 
  3144.     { 
  3145.         $out = $this->SetColor($col, 'Fill'); 
  3146.         if ($return) { 
  3147.             return $out; 
  3148.         } 
  3149.         if ($out == '') { 
  3150.             return ''; 
  3151.         } 
  3152.         $this->FillColor = $out; 
  3153.         $this->ColorFlag = ($out != $this->TextColor); 
  3154.         if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor'] != $this->FillColor) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor']))) { 
  3155.             $this->_out($this->FillColor); 
  3156.         } 
  3157.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor'] = $this->FillColor; 
  3158.     } 
  3159.  
  3160.     function SetTColor($col, $return = false) 
  3161.     { 
  3162.         $out = $this->SetColor($col, 'Text'); 
  3163.         if ($return) { 
  3164.             return $out; 
  3165.         } 
  3166.         if ($out == '') { 
  3167.             return ''; 
  3168.         } 
  3169.         $this->TextColor = $out; 
  3170.         $this->ColorFlag = ($this->FillColor != $out); 
  3171.     } 
  3172.  
  3173.     function SetDrawColor($r, $g = -1, $b = -1, $col4 = -1, $return = false) 
  3174.     { 
  3175.         //Set color for all stroking operations 
  3176.         $col = array(); 
  3177.         if (($r == 0 and $g == 0 and $b == 0 && $col4 == -1) or $g == -1) { 
  3178.             $col = $this->ConvertColor($r); 
  3179.         } elseif ($col4 == -1) { 
  3180.             $col = $this->ConvertColor('rgb(' . $r . ', ' . $g . ', ' . $b . ')'); 
  3181.         } else { 
  3182.             $col = $this->ConvertColor('cmyk(' . $r . ', ' . $g . ', ' . $b . ', ' . $col4 . ')'); 
  3183.         } 
  3184.         $out = $this->SetDColor($col, $return); 
  3185.         return $out; 
  3186.     } 
  3187.  
  3188.     function SetFillColor($r, $g = -1, $b = -1, $col4 = -1, $return = false) 
  3189.     { 
  3190.         //Set color for all filling operations 
  3191.         $col = array(); 
  3192.         if (($r == 0 and $g == 0 and $b == 0 && $col4 == -1) or $g == -1) { 
  3193.             $col = $this->ConvertColor($r); 
  3194.         } elseif ($col4 == -1) { 
  3195.             $col = $this->ConvertColor('rgb(' . $r . ', ' . $g . ', ' . $b . ')'); 
  3196.         } else { 
  3197.             $col = $this->ConvertColor('cmyk(' . $r . ', ' . $g . ', ' . $b . ', ' . $col4 . ')'); 
  3198.         } 
  3199.         $out = $this->SetFColor($col, $return); 
  3200.         return $out; 
  3201.     } 
  3202.  
  3203.     function SetTextColor($r, $g = -1, $b = -1, $col4 = -1, $return = false) 
  3204.     { 
  3205.         //Set color for text 
  3206.         $col = array(); 
  3207.         if (($r == 0 and $g == 0 and $b == 0 && $col4 == -1) or $g == -1) { 
  3208.             $col = $this->ConvertColor($r); 
  3209.         } elseif ($col4 == -1) { 
  3210.             $col = $this->ConvertColor('rgb(' . $r . ', ' . $g . ', ' . $b . ')'); 
  3211.         } else { 
  3212.             $col = $this->ConvertColor('cmyk(' . $r . ', ' . $g . ', ' . $b . ', ' . $col4 . ')'); 
  3213.         } 
  3214.         $out = $this->SetTColor($col, $return); 
  3215.         return $out; 
  3216.     } 
  3217.  
  3218.     function _getCharWidth(&$cw, $u, $isdef = true) 
  3219.     { 
  3220.         $w = 0; 
  3221.         if ($u == 0) { 
  3222.             $w = false; 
  3223.         } elseif (isset($cw[$u * 2 + 1])) { 
  3224.             $w = (ord($cw[$u * 2]) << 8) + ord($cw[$u * 2 + 1]); 
  3225.         } 
  3226.         if ($w == 65535) { 
  3227.             return 0; 
  3228.         } elseif ($w) { 
  3229.             return $w; 
  3230.         } elseif ($isdef) { 
  3231.             return false; 
  3232.         } else { 
  3233.             return 0; 
  3234.         } 
  3235.     } 
  3236.  
  3237.     function _charDefined(&$cw, $u) 
  3238.     { 
  3239.         $w = 0; 
  3240.         if ($u == 0) { 
  3241.             return false; 
  3242.         } 
  3243.         if (isset($cw[$u * 2 + 1])) { 
  3244.             $w = (ord($cw[$u * 2]) << 8) + ord($cw[$u * 2 + 1]); 
  3245.         } 
  3246.         if ($w) { 
  3247.             return true; 
  3248.         } else { 
  3249.             return false; 
  3250.         } 
  3251.     } 
  3252.  
  3253.     function GetCharWidthCore($c) 
  3254.     { 
  3255.         //Get width of a single character in the current Core font 
  3256.         $c = (string) $c; 
  3257.         $w = 0; 
  3258.         // Soft Hyphens chr(173) 
  3259.         if ($c == chr(173) && $this->FontFamily != 'csymbol' && $this->FontFamily != 'czapfdingbats') { 
  3260.             return 0; 
  3261.         } elseif (($this->textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS) && isset($this->upperCase[ord($c)])) {  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3262.             $charw = $this->CurrentFont['cw'][chr($this->upperCase[ord($c)])]; 
  3263.             if ($charw !== false) { 
  3264.                 $charw = $charw * $this->smCapsScale * $this->smCapsStretch / 100; 
  3265.                 $w+=$charw; 
  3266.             } 
  3267.         } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][$c])) { 
  3268.             $w += $this->CurrentFont['cw'][$c]; 
  3269.         } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][ord($c)])) { 
  3270.             $w += $this->CurrentFont['cw'][ord($c)]; 
  3271.         } 
  3272.         $w *= ($this->FontSize / 1000); 
  3273.         if ($this->minwSpacing || $this->fixedlSpacing) { 
  3274.             if ($c == ' ') 
  3275.                 $nb_spaces = 1; 
  3276.             else 
  3277.                 $nb_spaces = 0; 
  3278.             $w += $this->fixedlSpacing + ($nb_spaces * $this->minwSpacing); 
  3279.         } 
  3280.         return ($w); 
  3281.     } 
  3282.  
  3283.     function GetCharWidthNonCore($c, $addSubset = true) 
  3284.     { 
  3285.         //Get width of a single character in the current Non-Core font 
  3286.         $c = (string) $c; 
  3287.         $w = 0; 
  3288.         $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($c, $addSubset); 
  3289.         $char = $unicode[0]; 
  3290.         /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  3291.         if ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'Type0') { // CJK Adobe fonts 
  3292.             if ($char == 173) { 
  3293.                 return 0; 
  3294.             } // Soft Hyphens 
  3295.             elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][$char])) { 
  3296.                 $w+=$this->CurrentFont['cw'][$char]; 
  3297.             } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth'])) { 
  3298.                 $w += $this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth']; 
  3299.             } else { 
  3300.                 $w += 500; 
  3301.             } 
  3302.         } else { 
  3303.             /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  3304.             if ($char == 173) { 
  3305.                 return 0; 
  3306.             } // Soft Hyphens 
  3307.             elseif (($this->textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS) && isset($this->upperCase[$char])) { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3308.                 $charw = $this->_getCharWidth($this->CurrentFont['cw'], $this->upperCase[$char]); 
  3309.                 if ($charw !== false) { 
  3310.                     $charw = $charw * $this->smCapsScale * $this->smCapsStretch / 100; 
  3311.                     $w+=$charw; 
  3312.                 } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth'])) { 
  3313.                     $w += $this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth']; 
  3314.                 } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth'])) { 
  3315.                     $w += $this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth']; 
  3316.                 } else { 
  3317.                     $w += 500; 
  3318.                 } 
  3319.             } else { 
  3320.                 $charw = $this->_getCharWidth($this->CurrentFont['cw'], $char); 
  3321.                 if ($charw !== false) { 
  3322.                     $w+=$charw; 
  3323.                 } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth'])) { 
  3324.                     $w += $this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth']; 
  3325.                 } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth'])) { 
  3326.                     $w += $this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth']; 
  3327.                 } else { 
  3328.                     $w += 500; 
  3329.                 } 
  3330.             } 
  3331.         } // *CJK-FONTS* 
  3332.         $w *= ($this->FontSize / 1000); 
  3333.         if ($this->minwSpacing || $this->fixedlSpacing) { 
  3334.             if ($c == ' ') 
  3335.                 $nb_spaces = 1; 
  3336.             else 
  3337.                 $nb_spaces = 0; 
  3338.             $w += $this->fixedlSpacing + ($nb_spaces * $this->minwSpacing); 
  3339.         } 
  3340.         return ($w); 
  3341.     } 
  3342.  
  3343.     function GetCharWidth($c, $addSubset = true) 
  3344.     { 
  3345.         if (!$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  3346.             return $this->GetCharWidthNonCore($c, $addSubset); 
  3347.         } else { 
  3348.             return $this->GetCharWidthCore($c); 
  3349.         } 
  3350.     } 
  3351.  
  3352.     function GetStringWidth($s, $addSubset = true, $OTLdata = false, $textvar = 0, $includeKashida = false) 
  3353.     { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3354.         //Get width of a string in the current font 
  3355.         $s = (string) $s; 
  3356.         $cw = &$this->CurrentFont['cw']; 
  3357.         $w = 0; 
  3358.         $kerning = 0; 
  3359.         $lastchar = 0; 
  3360.         $nb_carac = 0; 
  3361.         $nb_spaces = 0; 
  3362.         $kashida = 0; 
  3363.         // mPDF ITERATION 
  3364.         if ($this->iterationCounter) 
  3365.             $s = preg_replace('/{iteration ([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)}/', '\\1', $s); 
  3366.         if (!$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  3367.             $discards = substr_count($s, "\xc2\xad"); // mPDF 6 soft hyphens [U+00AD] 
  3368.             $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($s, $addSubset); 
  3369.             if ($this->minwSpacing || $this->fixedlSpacing) { 
  3370.                 $nb_spaces = mb_substr_count($s, ' ', $this->mb_enc); 
  3371.                 $nb_carac = count($unicode) - $discards; // mPDF 6 
  3372.                 // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3373.                 // Use GPOS OTL 
  3374.                 if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  3375.                     if (isset($OTLdata['group']) && $OTLdata['group']) { 
  3376.                         $nb_carac -= substr_count($OTLdata['group'], 'M'); 
  3377.                     } 
  3378.                 } 
  3379.             } 
  3380.             /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  3381.             if ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'Type0') { // CJK Adobe fonts 
  3382.                 foreach ($unicode as $char) { 
  3383.                     if ($char == 0x00AD) { 
  3384.                         continue; 
  3385.                     } // mPDF 6 soft hyphens [U+00AD] 
  3386.                     if (isset($cw[$char])) { 
  3387.                         $w+=$cw[$char]; 
  3388.                     } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth'])) { 
  3389.                         $w += $this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth']; 
  3390.                     } else { 
  3391.                         $w += 500; 
  3392.                     } 
  3393.                 } 
  3394.             } else { 
  3395.                 /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  3396.                 foreach ($unicode as $i => $char) { 
  3397.                     if ($char == 0x00AD) { 
  3398.                         continue; 
  3399.                     } // mPDF 6 soft hyphens [U+00AD] 
  3400.                     if (($textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS) && isset($this->upperCase[$char])) { 
  3401.                         $charw = $this->_getCharWidth($cw, $this->upperCase[$char]); 
  3402.                         if ($charw !== false) { 
  3403.                             $charw = $charw * $this->smCapsScale * $this->smCapsStretch / 100; 
  3404.                             $w+=$charw; 
  3405.                         } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth'])) { 
  3406.                             $w += $this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth']; 
  3407.                         } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth'])) { 
  3408.                             $w += $this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth']; 
  3409.                         } else { 
  3410.                             $w += 500; 
  3411.                         } 
  3412.                     } else { 
  3413.                         $charw = $this->_getCharWidth($cw, $char); 
  3414.                         if ($charw !== false) { 
  3415.                             $w+=$charw; 
  3416.                         } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth'])) { 
  3417.                             $w += $this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth']; 
  3418.                         } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth'])) { 
  3419.                             $w += $this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth']; 
  3420.                         } else { 
  3421.                             $w += 500; 
  3422.                         } 
  3423.                         // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3424.                         // Use GPOS OTL 
  3425.                         // ...GetStringWidth... 
  3426.                         if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && ($this->CurrentFont['useOTL'] & 0xFF) && !empty($OTLdata)) { 
  3427.                             if (isset($OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['wDir']) && $OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['wDir'] == 'RTL') { 
  3428.                                 if (isset($OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['XAdvanceR']) && $OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['XAdvanceR']) { 
  3429.                                     $w += $OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['XAdvanceR'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  3430.                                 } 
  3431.                             } else { 
  3432.                                 if (isset($OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['XAdvanceL']) && $OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['XAdvanceL']) { 
  3433.                                     $w += $OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['XAdvanceL'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  3434.                                 } 
  3435.                             } 
  3436.                             // Kashida from GPOS 
  3437.                             // Kashida is set as an absolute length value (already set as a proportion based on useKashida %) 
  3438.                             if ($includeKashida && isset($OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida_space']) && $OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida_space']) { 
  3439.                                 $kashida += $OTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida_space']; 
  3440.                             } 
  3441.                         } 
  3442.                         if (($textvar & FC_KERNING) && $lastchar) { 
  3443.                             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$lastchar][$char])) { 
  3444.                                 $kerning += $this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$lastchar][$char]; 
  3445.                             } 
  3446.                         } 
  3447.                         $lastchar = $char; 
  3448.                     } 
  3449.                 } 
  3450.             } // *CJK-FONTS* 
  3451.         } else { 
  3452.             if ($this->FontFamily != 'csymbol' && $this->FontFamily != 'czapfdingbats') { 
  3453.                 $s = str_replace(chr(173), '', $s); 
  3454.             } 
  3455.             $nb_carac = $l = strlen($s); 
  3456.             if ($this->minwSpacing || $this->fixedlSpacing) { 
  3457.                 $nb_spaces = substr_count($s, ' '); 
  3458.             } 
  3459.             for ($i = 0; $i < $l; $i++) { 
  3460.                 if (($textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS) && isset($this->upperCase[ord($s[$i])])) {  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3461.                     $charw = $cw[chr($this->upperCase[ord($s[$i])])]; 
  3462.                     if ($charw !== false) { 
  3463.                         $charw = $charw * $this->smCapsScale * $this->smCapsStretch / 100; 
  3464.                         $w+=$charw; 
  3465.                     } 
  3466.                 } elseif (isset($cw[$s[$i]])) { 
  3467.                     $w += $cw[$s[$i]]; 
  3468.                 } elseif (isset($cw[ord($s[$i])])) { 
  3469.                     $w += $cw[ord($s[$i])]; 
  3470.                 } 
  3471.                 if (($textvar & FC_KERNING) && $i > 0) { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3472.                     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$s[($i - 1)]][$s[$i]])) { 
  3473.                         $kerning += $this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$s[($i - 1)]][$s[$i]]; 
  3474.                     } 
  3475.                 } 
  3476.             } 
  3477.         } 
  3478.         unset($cw); 
  3479.         if ($textvar & FC_KERNING) { 
  3480.             $w += $kerning; 
  3481.         } // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3482.         $w *= ($this->FontSize / 1000); 
  3483.         $w += (($nb_carac + $nb_spaces) * $this->fixedlSpacing) + ($nb_spaces * $this->minwSpacing); 
  3484.         $w += $kashida / _MPDFK; 
  3485.  
  3486.         return ($w); 
  3487.     } 
  3488.  
  3489.     function SetLineWidth($width) 
  3490.     { 
  3491.         //Set line width 
  3492.         $this->LineWidth = $width; 
  3493.         $lwout = (sprintf('%.3F w', $width * _MPDFK)); 
  3494.         if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineWidth']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineWidth'] != $lwout) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineWidth']))) { 
  3495.             $this->_out($lwout); 
  3496.         } 
  3497.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineWidth'] = $lwout; 
  3498.     } 
  3499.  
  3500.     function Line($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2) 
  3501.     { 
  3502.         //Draw a line 
  3503.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S', $x1 * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y1) * _MPDFK, $x2 * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y2) * _MPDFK)); 
  3504.     } 
  3505.  
  3506.     function Arrow($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $headsize = 3, $fill = 'B', $angle = 25) 
  3507.     { 
  3508.         //F == fill //S == stroke //B == stroke and fill 
  3509.         // angle = splay of arrowhead - 1 - 89 degrees 
  3510.         if ($fill == 'F') 
  3511.             $fill = 'f'; 
  3512.         elseif ($fill == 'FD' or $fill == 'DF' or $fill == 'B') 
  3513.             $fill = 'B'; 
  3514.         else 
  3515.             $fill = 'S'; 
  3516.         $a = atan2(($y2 - $y1), ($x2 - $x1)); 
  3517.         $b = $a + deg2rad($angle); 
  3518.         $c = $a - deg2rad($angle); 
  3519.         $x3 = $x2 - ($headsize * cos($b)); 
  3520.         $y3 = $this->h - ($y2 - ($headsize * sin($b))); 
  3521.         $x4 = $x2 - ($headsize * cos($c)); 
  3522.         $y4 = $this->h - ($y2 - ($headsize * sin($c))); 
  3523.  
  3524.         $x5 = $x3 - ($x3 - $x4) / 2; // mid point of base of arrowhead - to join arrow line to 
  3525.         $y5 = $y3 - ($y3 - $y4) / 2; 
  3526.  
  3527.         $s = ''; 
  3528.         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S', $x1 * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y1) * _MPDFK, $x5 * _MPDFK, $y5 * _MPDFK); 
  3529.         $this->_out($s); 
  3530.  
  3531.         $s = ''; 
  3532.         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l %.3F %.3F l %.3F %.3F l %.3F %.3F l ', $x5 * _MPDFK, $y5 * _MPDFK, $x3 * _MPDFK, $y3 * _MPDFK, $x2 * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y2) * _MPDFK, $x4 * _MPDFK, $y4 * _MPDFK, $x5 * _MPDFK, $y5 * _MPDFK); 
  3533.         $s.=$fill; 
  3534.         $this->_out($s); 
  3535.     } 
  3536.  
  3537.     function Rect($x, $y, $w, $h, $style = '') 
  3538.     { 
  3539.         //Draw a rectangle 
  3540.         if ($style == 'F') 
  3541.             $op = 'f'; 
  3542.         elseif ($style == 'FD' or $style == 'DF') 
  3543.             $op = 'B'; 
  3544.         else 
  3545.             $op = 'S'; 
  3546.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re %s', $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK, $w * _MPDFK, -$h * _MPDFK, $op)); 
  3547.     } 
  3548.  
  3549.     function AddFont($family, $style = '') 
  3550.     { 
  3551.         if (empty($family)) { 
  3552.             return; 
  3553.         } 
  3554.         $family = strtolower($family); 
  3555.         $style = strtoupper($style); 
  3556.         $style = str_replace('U', '', $style); 
  3557.         if ($style == 'IB') 
  3558.             $style = 'BI'; 
  3559.         $fontkey = $family . $style; 
  3560.         // check if the font has been already added 
  3561.         if (isset($this->fonts[$fontkey])) { 
  3562.             return; 
  3563.         } 
  3564.  
  3565.         /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  3566.         if (in_array($family, $this->available_CJK_fonts)) { 
  3567.             if (empty($this->Big5_widths)) { 
  3568.                 require(_MPDF_PATH . 'includes/CJKdata.php'); 
  3569.             } 
  3570.             $this->AddCJKFont($family); // don't need to add style 
  3571.             return; 
  3572.         } 
  3573.         /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  3574.  
  3575.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  3576.             throw new MpdfException("mPDF Error - problem with Font management"); 
  3577.         } 
  3578.  
  3579.         $stylekey = $style; 
  3580.         if (!$style) { 
  3581.             $stylekey = 'R'; 
  3582.         } 
  3583.  
  3584.         if (!isset($this->fontdata[$family][$stylekey]) || !$this->fontdata[$family][$stylekey]) { 
  3585.             throw new MpdfException('mPDF Error - Font is not supported - ' . $family . ' ' . $style); 
  3586.         } 
  3587.  
  3588.         $name = ''; 
  3589.         $originalsize = 0; 
  3590.         $sip = false; 
  3591.         $smp = false; 
  3592.         $useOTL = 0; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3593.         $fontmetrics = ''; // mPDF 6 
  3594.         $haskerninfo = false; 
  3595.         $haskernGPOS = false; 
  3596.         $hassmallcapsGSUB = false; 
  3597.         $BMPselected = false; 
  3598.         $GSUBScriptLang = array(); 
  3599.         $GSUBFeatures = array(); 
  3600.         $GSUBLookups = array(); 
  3601.         $GPOSScriptLang = array(); 
  3602.         $GPOSFeatures = array(); 
  3603.         $GPOSLookups = array(); 
  3604.         if (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.mtx.php')) { 
  3605.             include(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.mtx.php'); 
  3606.         } 
  3607.  
  3608.         $ttffile = ''; 
  3609.         if (defined('_MPDF_SYSTEM_TTFONTS')) { 
  3610.             $ttffile = _MPDF_SYSTEM_TTFONTS . $this->fontdata[$family][$stylekey]; 
  3611.             if (!file_exists($ttffile)) { 
  3612.                 $ttffile = ''; 
  3613.             } 
  3614.         } 
  3615.         if (!$ttffile) { 
  3616.             /** Allow filter to change which file is loaded */ 
  3617.             $ttffile = apply_filters('mpdf_current_font_path', _MPDF_TTFONTPATH . $this->fontdata[$family][$stylekey], $this->fontdata[$family][$stylekey]); 
  3618.  
  3619.             if ( ! is_file($ttffile)) { 
  3620.                 throw new MpdfException("mPDF Error - cannot find TTF TrueType font file - " . $ttffile); 
  3621.             } 
  3622.         } 
  3623.         $ttfstat = stat($ttffile); 
  3624.  
  3625.         if (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['TTCfontID'][$stylekey])) { 
  3626.             $TTCfontID = $this->fontdata[$family]['TTCfontID'][$stylekey]; 
  3627.         } else { 
  3628.             $TTCfontID = 0; 
  3629.         } 
  3630.  
  3631.         $BMPonly = false; 
  3632.         if (in_array($family, $this->BMPonly)) { 
  3633.             $BMPonly = true; 
  3634.         } 
  3635.         $regenerate = false; 
  3636.         if ($BMPonly && !$BMPselected) { 
  3637.             $regenerate = true; 
  3638.         } elseif (!$BMPonly && $BMPselected) { 
  3639.             $regenerate = true; 
  3640.         } 
  3641.         // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3642.         if (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL']) && $this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL'] && $useOTL != $this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL']) { 
  3643.             $regenerate = true; 
  3644.             $useOTL = $this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL']; 
  3645.         } elseif ((!isset($this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL']) || !$this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL']) && $useOTL) { 
  3646.             $regenerate = true; 
  3647.             $useOTL = 0; 
  3648.         } 
  3649.         if (_FONT_DESCRIPTOR != $fontmetrics) { 
  3650.             $regenerate = true; 
  3651.         } // mPDF 6 
  3652.         if (!isset($name) || $originalsize != $ttfstat['size'] || $regenerate) { 
  3653.             if (!class_exists('TTFontFile', false)) { 
  3654.                 include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/ttfontsuni.php'); 
  3655.             } 
  3656.             $ttf = new TTFontFile(); 
  3657.             $ttf->getMetrics($ttffile, $fontkey, $TTCfontID, $this->debugfonts, $BMPonly, $useOTL); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3658.             $cw = $ttf->charWidths; 
  3659.             $kerninfo = $ttf->kerninfo; 
  3660.             if ($kerninfo) 
  3661.                 $haskerninfo = true; 
  3662.             $haskernGPOS = $ttf->haskernGPOS; 
  3663.             $hassmallcapsGSUB = $ttf->hassmallcapsGSUB; 
  3664.             $name = preg_replace('/[ ()]/', '', $ttf->fullName); 
  3665.             $sip = $ttf->sipset; 
  3666.             $smp = $ttf->smpset; 
  3667.             // mPDF 6 
  3668.             $GSUBScriptLang = $ttf->GSUBScriptLang; 
  3669.             $GSUBFeatures = $ttf->GSUBFeatures; 
  3670.             $GSUBLookups = $ttf->GSUBLookups; 
  3671.             $rtlPUAstr = $ttf->rtlPUAstr; 
  3672.             $GPOSScriptLang = $ttf->GPOSScriptLang; 
  3673.             $GPOSFeatures = $ttf->GPOSFeatures; 
  3674.             $GPOSLookups = $ttf->GPOSLookups; 
  3675.             $glyphIDtoUni = $ttf->glyphIDtoUni; 
  3676.  
  3677.  
  3678.             $desc = array( 
  3679.                 'CapHeight' => round($ttf->capHeight),  
  3680.                 'XHeight' => round($ttf->xHeight),  
  3681.                 'FontBBox' => '[' . round($ttf->bbox[0]) . " " . round($ttf->bbox[1]) . " " . round($ttf->bbox[2]) . " " . round($ttf->bbox[3]) . ']', /** FontBBox from head table */ 
  3682.  
  3683.                 /**         'MaxWidth' => round($ttf->advanceWidthMax), // AdvanceWidthMax from hhea table    NB ArialUnicode MS = 31990 ! */ 
  3684.                 'Flags' => $ttf->flags,  
  3685.                 'Ascent' => round($ttf->ascent),  
  3686.                 'Descent' => round($ttf->descent),  
  3687.                 'Leading' => round($ttf->lineGap),  
  3688.                 'ItalicAngle' => $ttf->italicAngle,  
  3689.                 'StemV' => round($ttf->stemV),  
  3690.                 'MissingWidth' => round($ttf->defaultWidth) 
  3691.  ); 
  3692.             $panose = ''; 
  3693.             if (count($ttf->panose)) { 
  3694.                 $panoseArray = array_merge(array($ttf->sFamilyClass, $ttf->sFamilySubClass), $ttf->panose); 
  3695.                 foreach ($panoseArray as $value) 
  3696.                     $panose .= ' ' . dechex($value); 
  3697.             } 
  3698.             $unitsPerEm = round($ttf->unitsPerEm); 
  3699.             $up = round($ttf->underlinePosition); 
  3700.             $ut = round($ttf->underlineThickness); 
  3701.             $strp = round($ttf->strikeoutPosition); // mPDF 6 
  3702.             $strs = round($ttf->strikeoutSize); // mPDF 6 
  3703.             $originalsize = $ttfstat['size'] + 0; 
  3704.             $type = 'TTF'; 
  3705.             //Generate metrics .php file 
  3706.             $s = '<?php' . "\n"; 
  3707.             $s.='$name=\'' . $name . "';\n"; 
  3708.             $s.='$type=\'' . $type . "';\n"; 
  3709.             $s.='$desc=' . var_export($desc, true) . ";\n"; 
  3710.             $s.='$unitsPerEm=' . $unitsPerEm . ";\n"; 
  3711.             $s.='$up=' . $up . ";\n"; 
  3712.             $s.='$ut=' . $ut . ";\n"; 
  3713.             $s.='$strp=' . $strp . ";\n"; // mPDF 6 
  3714.             $s.='$strs=' . $strs . ";\n"; // mPDF 6 
  3715.             $s.='$ttffile=\'' . $ttffile . "';\n"; 
  3716.             $s.='$TTCfontID=\'' . $TTCfontID . "';\n"; 
  3717.             $s.='$originalsize=' . $originalsize . ";\n"; 
  3718.             if ($sip) 
  3719.                 $s.='$sip=true;' . "\n"; 
  3720.             else 
  3721.                 $s.='$sip=false;' . "\n"; 
  3722.             if ($smp) 
  3723.                 $s.='$smp=true;' . "\n"; 
  3724.             else 
  3725.                 $s.='$smp=false;' . "\n"; 
  3726.             if ($BMPonly) 
  3727.                 $s.='$BMPselected=true;' . "\n"; 
  3728.             else 
  3729.                 $s.='$BMPselected=false;' . "\n"; 
  3730.             $s.='$fontkey=\'' . $fontkey . "';\n"; 
  3731.             $s.='$panose=\'' . $panose . "';\n"; 
  3732.             if ($haskerninfo) 
  3733.                 $s.='$haskerninfo=true;' . "\n"; 
  3734.             else 
  3735.                 $s.='$haskerninfo=false;' . "\n"; 
  3736.             if ($haskernGPOS) 
  3737.                 $s.='$haskernGPOS=true;' . "\n"; 
  3738.             else 
  3739.                 $s.='$haskernGPOS=false;' . "\n"; 
  3740.             if ($hassmallcapsGSUB) 
  3741.                 $s.='$hassmallcapsGSUB=true;' . "\n"; 
  3742.             else 
  3743.                 $s.='$hassmallcapsGSUB=false;' . "\n"; 
  3744.             $s.='$fontmetrics=\'' . _FONT_DESCRIPTOR . "';\n"; // mPDF 6 
  3745.  
  3746.             $s.='// TypoAscender/TypoDescender/TypoLineGap = ' . round($ttf->typoAscender) . ', ' . round($ttf->typoDescender) . ', ' . round($ttf->typoLineGap) . "\n"; 
  3747.             $s.='// usWinAscent/usWinDescent = ' . round($ttf->usWinAscent) . ', ' . round(-$ttf->usWinDescent) . "\n"; 
  3748.             $s.='// hhea Ascent/Descent/LineGap = ' . round($ttf->hheaascent) . ', ' . round($ttf->hheadescent) . ', ' . round($ttf->hhealineGap) . "\n"; 
  3749.  
  3750.             //  mPDF 5.7.1 
  3751.             if (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL'])) { 
  3752.                 $s.='$useOTL=' . $this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL'] . ';' . "\n"; 
  3753.             } else 
  3754.                 $s.='$useOTL=0x0000;' . "\n"; 
  3755.             if ($rtlPUAstr) { 
  3756.                 $s.='$rtlPUAstr=\'' . $rtlPUAstr . "';\n"; 
  3757.             } else 
  3758.                 $s.='$rtlPUAstr=\'\';' . "\n"; 
  3759.             if (count($GSUBScriptLang)) { 
  3760.                 $s.='$GSUBScriptLang=' . var_export($GSUBScriptLang, true) . ";\n"; 
  3761.             } 
  3762.             if (count($GSUBFeatures)) { 
  3763.                 $s.='$GSUBFeatures=' . var_export($GSUBFeatures, true) . ";\n"; 
  3764.             } 
  3765.             if (count($GSUBLookups)) { 
  3766.                 $s.='$GSUBLookups=' . var_export($GSUBLookups, true) . ";\n"; 
  3767.             } 
  3768.             if (count($GPOSScriptLang)) { 
  3769.                 $s.='$GPOSScriptLang=' . var_export($GPOSScriptLang, true) . ";\n"; 
  3770.             } 
  3771.             if (count($GPOSFeatures)) { 
  3772.                 $s.='$GPOSFeatures=' . var_export($GPOSFeatures, true) . ";\n"; 
  3773.             } 
  3774.             if (count($GPOSLookups)) { 
  3775.                 $s.='$GPOSLookups=' . var_export($GPOSLookups, true) . ";\n"; 
  3776.             } 
  3777.             if ($kerninfo) { 
  3778.                 $s.='$kerninfo=' . var_export($kerninfo, true) . ";\n"; 
  3779.             } 
  3780.             $s.="?>"; 
  3781.             if (is_writable(dirname(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . 'x'))) { 
  3782.                 $fh = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.mtx.php', "w"); 
  3783.                 fwrite($fh, $s, strlen($s)); 
  3784.                 fclose($fh); 
  3785.                 $fh = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.cw.dat', "wb"); 
  3786.                 fwrite($fh, $cw, strlen($cw)); 
  3787.                 fclose($fh); 
  3788.                 // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3789.                 $fh = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.gid.dat', "wb"); 
  3790.                 fwrite($fh, $glyphIDtoUni, strlen($glyphIDtoUni)); 
  3791.                 fclose($fh); 
  3792.                 if (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.cgm')) 
  3793.                     unlink(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.cgm'); 
  3794.                 if (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.z')) 
  3795.                     unlink(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.z'); 
  3796.                 if (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.cw127.php'))
