  3797.                     unlink(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.cw127.php'); 
  3798.                 if (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.cw')) 
  3799.                     unlink(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.cw'); 
  3800.             } 
  3801.             elseif ($this->debugfonts) { 
  3802.                 throw new MpdfException('Cannot write to the font caching directory - ' . _MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH); 
  3803.             } 
  3804.             unset($ttf); 
  3805.         } else { 
  3806.             $cw = ''; 
  3807.             $glyphIDtoUni = ''; 
  3808.             if (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.cw.dat')) 
  3809.                 $cw = file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.cw.dat'); 
  3810.             if (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.gid.dat')) 
  3811.                 $glyphIDtoUni = file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.gid.dat'); 
  3812.         } 
  3813.  
  3814.         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  3815.         // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3816.         // Use OTL OpenType Table Layout - GSUB 
  3817.         if (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL']) && ($this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL'])) { 
  3818.             if (!class_exists('otl', false)) { 
  3819.                 include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/otl.php'); 
  3820.             } 
  3821.             if (empty($this->otl)) { 
  3822.                 $this->otl = new otl($this); 
  3823.             } 
  3824.         } 
  3825.         /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  3826.  
  3827.         if (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['sip-ext']) && $this->fontdata[$family]['sip-ext']) { 
  3828.             $sipext = $this->fontdata[$family]['sip-ext']; 
  3829.         } else { 
  3830.             $sipext = ''; 
  3831.         } 
  3832.  
  3833.         // Override with values from config_font.php 
  3834.         if (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['Ascent']) && $this->fontdata[$family]['Ascent']) { 
  3835.             $desc['Ascent'] = $this->fontdata[$family]['Ascent']; 
  3836.         } 
  3837.         if (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['Descent']) && $this->fontdata[$family]['Descent']) { 
  3838.             $desc['Descent'] = $this->fontdata[$family]['Descent']; 
  3839.         } 
  3840.         if (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['Leading']) && $this->fontdata[$family]['Leading']) { 
  3841.             $desc['Leading'] = $this->fontdata[$family]['Leading']; 
  3842.         } 
  3843.  
  3844.  
  3845.  
  3846.         $i = count($this->fonts) + $this->extraFontSubsets + 1; 
  3847.         if ($sip || $smp) { 
  3848.             $this->fonts[$fontkey] = array('i' => $i, 'type' => $type, 'name' => $name, 'desc' => $desc, 'panose' => $panose, 'unitsPerEm' => $unitsPerEm, 'up' => $up, 'ut' => $ut, 'strs' => $strs, 'strp' => $strp, 'cw' => $cw, 'ttffile' => $ttffile, 'fontkey' => $fontkey, 'subsets' => array(0 => range(0, 127)), 'subsetfontids' => array($i), 'used' => false, 'sip' => $sip, 'sipext' => $sipext, 'smp' => $smp, 'TTCfontID' => $TTCfontID, 'useOTL' => (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL']) ? $this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL'] : false), 'useKashida' => (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['useKashida']) ? $this->fontdata[$family]['useKashida'] : false), 'GSUBScriptLang' => $GSUBScriptLang, 'GSUBFeatures' => $GSUBFeatures, 'GSUBLookups' => $GSUBLookups, 'GPOSScriptLang' => $GPOSScriptLang, 'GPOSFeatures' => $GPOSFeatures, 'GPOSLookups' => $GPOSLookups, 'rtlPUAstr' => $rtlPUAstr, 'glyphIDtoUni' => $glyphIDtoUni, 'haskerninfo' => $haskerninfo, 'haskernGPOS' => $haskernGPOS, 'hassmallcapsGSUB' => $hassmallcapsGSUB); // mPDF 5.7.1    // mPDF 6 
  3849.         } else { 
  3850.             $ss = array(); 
  3851.             for ($s = 32; $s < 128; $s++) { 
  3852.                 $ss[$s] = $s; 
  3853.             } 
  3854.             $this->fonts[$fontkey] = array('i' => $i, 'type' => $type, 'name' => $name, 'desc' => $desc, 'panose' => $panose, 'unitsPerEm' => $unitsPerEm, 'up' => $up, 'ut' => $ut, 'strs' => $strs, 'strp' => $strp, 'cw' => $cw, 'ttffile' => $ttffile, 'fontkey' => $fontkey, 'subset' => $ss, 'used' => false, 'sip' => $sip, 'sipext' => $sipext, 'smp' => $smp, 'TTCfontID' => $TTCfontID, 'useOTL' => (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL']) ? $this->fontdata[$family]['useOTL'] : false), 'useKashida' => (isset($this->fontdata[$family]['useKashida']) ? $this->fontdata[$family]['useKashida'] : false), 'GSUBScriptLang' => $GSUBScriptLang, 'GSUBFeatures' => $GSUBFeatures, 'GSUBLookups' => $GSUBLookups, 'GPOSScriptLang' => $GPOSScriptLang, 'GPOSFeatures' => $GPOSFeatures, 'GPOSLookups' => $GPOSLookups, 'rtlPUAstr' => $rtlPUAstr, 'glyphIDtoUni' => $glyphIDtoUni, 'haskerninfo' => $haskerninfo, 'haskernGPOS' => $haskernGPOS, 'hassmallcapsGSUB' => $hassmallcapsGSUB); // mPDF 5.7.1    // mPDF 6 
  3855.         } 
  3856.         if ($haskerninfo) { 
  3857.             $this->fonts[$fontkey]['kerninfo'] = $kerninfo; 
  3858.         } 
  3859.         $this->FontFiles[$fontkey] = array('length1' => $originalsize, 'type' => "TTF", 'ttffile' => $ttffile, 'sip' => $sip, 'smp' => $smp); 
  3860.         unset($cw); 
  3861.     } 
  3862.  
  3863.     function SetFont($family, $style = '', $size = 0, $write = true, $forcewrite = false) 
  3864.     { 
  3865.         $family = strtolower($family); 
  3866.         if (!$this->onlyCoreFonts) { 
  3867.             if ($family == 'sans' || $family == 'sans-serif') { 
  3868.                 $family = $this->sans_fonts[0]; 
  3869.             } 
  3870.             if ($family == 'serif') { 
  3871.                 $family = $this->serif_fonts[0]; 
  3872.             } 
  3873.             if ($family == 'mono' || $family == 'monospace') { 
  3874.                 $family = $this->mono_fonts[0]; 
  3875.             } 
  3876.         } 
  3877.         if (isset($this->fonttrans[$family]) && $this->fonttrans[$family]) { 
  3878.             $family = $this->fonttrans[$family]; 
  3879.         } 
  3880.         if ($family == '') { 
  3881.             if ($this->FontFamily) { 
  3882.                 $family = $this->FontFamily; 
  3883.             } elseif ($this->default_font) { 
  3884.                 $family = $this->default_font; 
  3885.             } else { 
  3886.                 throw new MpdfException("No font or default font set!"); 
  3887.             } 
  3888.         } 
  3889.         $this->ReqFontStyle = $style; // required or requested style - used later for artificial bold/italic 
  3890.  
  3891.         if (($family == 'csymbol') || ($family == 'czapfdingbats') || ($family == 'ctimes') || ($family == 'ccourier') || ($family == 'chelvetica')) { 
  3892.             if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  3893.                 if ($family == 'csymbol' || $family == 'czapfdingbats') { 
  3894.                     throw new MpdfException("Symbol and Zapfdingbats cannot be embedded in mPDF (required for PDFA1-b or PDFX/1-a)."); 
  3895.                 } 
  3896.                 if ($family == 'ctimes' || $family == 'ccourier' || $family == 'chelvetica') { 
  3897.                     if (($this->PDFA && !$this->PDFAauto) || ($this->PDFX && !$this->PDFXauto)) { 
  3898.                         $this->PDFAXwarnings[] = "Core Adobe font " . ucfirst($family) . " cannot be embedded in mPDF, which is required for PDFA1-b or PDFX/1-a. (Embedded font will be substituted.)"; 
  3899.                     } 
  3900.                     if ($family == 'chelvetica') { 
  3901.                         $family = 'sans'; 
  3902.                     } 
  3903.                     if ($family == 'ctimes') { 
  3904.                         $family = 'serif'; 
  3905.                     } 
  3906.                     if ($family == 'ccourier') { 
  3907.                         $family = 'mono'; 
  3908.                     } 
  3909.                 } 
  3910.                 $this->usingCoreFont = false; 
  3911.             } else { 
  3912.                 $this->usingCoreFont = true; 
  3913.             } 
  3914.             if ($family == 'csymbol' || $family == 'czapfdingbats') { 
  3915.                 $style = ''; 
  3916.             } 
  3917.         } else { 
  3918.             $this->usingCoreFont = false; 
  3919.         } 
  3920.  
  3921.         // mPDF 5.7.1 
  3922.         if ($style) { 
  3923.             $style = strtoupper($style); 
  3924.             if ($style == 'IB') 
  3925.                 $style = 'BI'; 
  3926.         } 
  3927.         if ($size == 0) 
  3928.             $size = $this->FontSizePt; 
  3929.  
  3930.         $fontkey = $family . $style; 
  3931.  
  3932.         $stylekey = $style; 
  3933.         if (!$stylekey) { 
  3934.             $stylekey = "R"; 
  3935.         } 
  3936.  
  3937.         if (!$this->onlyCoreFonts && !$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  3938.             if (!isset($this->fonts[$fontkey]) || count($this->default_available_fonts) != count($this->available_unifonts)) { // not already added 
  3939.                 /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  3940.                 // CJK fonts 
  3941.                 if (in_array($fontkey, $this->available_CJK_fonts)) { 
  3942.                     if (!isset($this->fonts[$fontkey])) { // already added 
  3943.                         if (empty($this->Big5_widths)) { 
  3944.                             require(_MPDF_PATH . 'includes/CJKdata.php'); 
  3945.                         } 
  3946.                         $this->AddCJKFont($family); // don't need to add style 
  3947.                     } 
  3948.                 } 
  3949.                 // Test to see if requested font/style is available - or substitute 
  3950.                 else 
  3951.                 /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  3952.                 if (!in_array($fontkey, $this->available_unifonts)) { 
  3953.                     // If font[nostyle] exists - set it 
  3954.                     if (in_array($family, $this->available_unifonts)) { 
  3955.                         $style = ''; 
  3956.                     } 
  3957.  
  3958.                     // elseif only one font available - set it (assumes if only one font available it will not have a style) 
  3959.                     elseif (count($this->available_unifonts) == 1) { 
  3960.                         $family = $this->available_unifonts[0]; 
  3961.                         $style = ''; 
  3962.                     } else { 
  3963.                         $found = 0; 
  3964.                         // else substitute font of similar type 
  3965.                         if (in_array($family, $this->sans_fonts)) { 
  3966.                             $i = array_intersect($this->sans_fonts, $this->available_unifonts); 
  3967.                             if (count($i)) { 
  3968.                                 $i = array_values($i); 
  3969.                                 // with requested style if possible 
  3970.                                 if (!in_array(($i[0] . $style), $this->available_unifonts)) { 
  3971.                                     $style = ''; 
  3972.                                 } 
  3973.                                 $family = $i[0]; 
  3974.                                 $found = 1; 
  3975.                             } 
  3976.                         } elseif (in_array($family, $this->serif_fonts)) { 
  3977.                             $i = array_intersect($this->serif_fonts, $this->available_unifonts); 
  3978.                             if (count($i)) { 
  3979.                                 $i = array_values($i); 
  3980.                                 // with requested style if possible 
  3981.                                 if (!in_array(($i[0] . $style), $this->available_unifonts)) { 
  3982.                                     $style = ''; 
  3983.                                 } 
  3984.                                 $family = $i[0]; 
  3985.                                 $found = 1; 
  3986.                             } 
  3987.                         } elseif (in_array($family, $this->mono_fonts)) { 
  3988.                             $i = array_intersect($this->mono_fonts, $this->available_unifonts); 
  3989.                             if (count($i)) { 
  3990.                                 $i = array_values($i); 
  3991.                                 // with requested style if possible 
  3992.                                 if (!in_array(($i[0] . $style), $this->available_unifonts)) { 
  3993.                                     $style = ''; 
  3994.                                 } 
  3995.                                 $family = $i[0]; 
  3996.                                 $found = 1; 
  3997.                             } 
  3998.                         } 
  3999.  
  4000.                         if (!$found) { 
  4001.                             // set first available font 
  4002.                             $fs = $this->available_unifonts[0]; 
  4003.                             preg_match('/^([a-z_0-9\-]+)([BI]{0, 2})$/', $fs, $fas); // Allow "-" 
  4004.                             // with requested style if possible 
  4005.                             $ws = $fas[1] . $style; 
  4006.                             if (in_array($ws, $this->available_unifonts)) { 
  4007.                                 $family = $fas[1]; // leave $style as is 
  4008.                             } elseif (in_array($fas[1], $this->available_unifonts)) { 
  4009.                                 // or without style 
  4010.                                 $family = $fas[1]; 
  4011.                                 $style = ''; 
  4012.                             } else { 
  4013.                                 // or with the style specified 
  4014.                                 $family = $fas[1]; 
  4015.                                 $style = $fas[2]; 
  4016.                             } 
  4017.                         } 
  4018.                     } 
  4019.                     $fontkey = $family . $style; 
  4020.                 } 
  4021.             } 
  4022.             // try to add font (if not already added) 
  4023.             $this->AddFont($family, $style); 
  4024.  
  4025.             //Test if font is already selected 
  4026.             if ($this->FontFamily == $family && $this->FontFamily == $this->currentfontfamily && $this->FontStyle == $style && $this->FontStyle == $this->currentfontstyle && $this->FontSizePt == $size && $this->FontSizePt == $this->currentfontsize && !$forcewrite) { 
  4027.                 return $family; 
  4028.             } 
  4029.  
  4030.             $fontkey = $family . $style; 
  4031.  
  4032.             //Select it 
  4033.             $this->FontFamily = $family; 
  4034.             $this->FontStyle = $style; 
  4035.             $this->FontSizePt = $size; 
  4036.             $this->FontSize = $size / _MPDFK; 
  4037.             $this->CurrentFont = &$this->fonts[$fontkey]; 
  4038.             if ($write) { 
  4039.                 $fontout = (sprintf('BT /F%d %.3F Tf ET', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt)); 
  4040.                 if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] != $fontout) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']))) { 
  4041.                     $this->_out($fontout); 
  4042.                 } 
  4043.                 $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] = $fontout; 
  4044.             } 
  4045.  
  4046.  
  4047.  
  4048.             // Added - currentfont (lowercase) used in HTML2PDF 
  4049.             $this->currentfontfamily = $family; 
  4050.             $this->currentfontsize = $size; 
  4051.             $this->currentfontstyle = $style; 
  4052.             $this->setMBencoding('UTF-8'); 
  4053.         } else {  // if using core fonts 
  4054.             if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  4055.                 throw new MpdfException('Core Adobe fonts cannot be embedded in mPDF (required for PDFA1-b or PDFX/1-a) - cannot use option to use core fonts.'); 
  4056.             } 
  4057.             $this->setMBencoding('windows-1252'); 
  4058.  
  4059.             //Test if font is already selected 
  4060.             if (($this->FontFamily == $family) AND ( $this->FontStyle == $style) AND ( $this->FontSizePt == $size) && !$forcewrite) { 
  4061.                 return $family; 
  4062.             } 
  4063.  
  4064.             if (!isset($this->CoreFonts[$fontkey])) { 
  4065.                 if (in_array($family, $this->serif_fonts)) { 
  4066.                     $family = 'ctimes'; 
  4067.                 } elseif (in_array($family, $this->mono_fonts)) { 
  4068.                     $family = 'ccourier'; 
  4069.                 } else { 
  4070.                     $family = 'chelvetica'; 
  4071.                 } 
  4072.                 $this->usingCoreFont = true; 
  4073.                 $fontkey = $family . $style; 
  4074.             } 
  4075.  
  4076.             if (!isset($this->fonts[$fontkey])) { 
  4077.                 // STANDARD CORE FONTS 
  4078.                 if (isset($this->CoreFonts[$fontkey])) { 
  4079.                     //Load metric file 
  4080.                     $file = $family; 
  4081.                     if ($family == 'ctimes' || $family == 'chelvetica' || $family == 'ccourier') { 
  4082.                         $file.=strtolower($style); 
  4083.                     } 
  4084.                     $file.='.php'; 
  4085.                     include(_MPDF_PATH . 'font/' . $file); 
  4086.                     if (!isset($cw)) { 
  4087.                         throw new MpdfException('Could not include font metric file'); 
  4088.                     } 
  4089.                     $i = count($this->fonts) + $this->extraFontSubsets + 1; 
  4090.                     $this->fonts[$fontkey] = array('i' => $i, 'type' => 'core', 'name' => $this->CoreFonts[$fontkey], 'desc' => $desc, 'up' => $up, 'ut' => $ut, 'cw' => $cw); 
  4091.                     if ($this->useKerning && isset($kerninfo)) { 
  4092.                         $this->fonts[$fontkey]['kerninfo'] = $kerninfo; 
  4093.                     } 
  4094.                 } else { 
  4095.                     throw new MpdfException('mPDF error - Font not defined'); 
  4096.                 } 
  4097.             } 
  4098.             //Test if font is already selected 
  4099.             if (($this->FontFamily == $family) AND ( $this->FontStyle == $style) AND ( $this->FontSizePt == $size) && !$forcewrite) { 
  4100.                 return $family; 
  4101.             } 
  4102.             //Select it 
  4103.             $this->FontFamily = $family; 
  4104.             $this->FontStyle = $style; 
  4105.             $this->FontSizePt = $size; 
  4106.             $this->FontSize = $size / _MPDFK; 
  4107.             $this->CurrentFont = &$this->fonts[$fontkey]; 
  4108.             if ($write) { 
  4109.                 $fontout = (sprintf('BT /F%d %.3F Tf ET', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt)); 
  4110.                 if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] != $fontout) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']))) { 
  4111.                     $this->_out($fontout); 
  4112.                 } 
  4113.                 $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] = $fontout; 
  4114.             } 
  4115.             // Added - currentfont (lowercase) used in HTML2PDF 
  4116.             $this->currentfontfamily = $family; 
  4117.             $this->currentfontsize = $size; 
  4118.             $this->currentfontstyle = $style; 
  4119.         } 
  4120.  
  4121.         return $family; 
  4122.     } 
  4123.  
  4124.     function SetFontSize($size, $write = true) 
  4125.     { 
  4126.         //Set font size in points 
  4127.         if ($this->FontSizePt == $size) 
  4128.             return; 
  4129.         $this->FontSizePt = $size; 
  4130.         $this->FontSize = $size / _MPDFK; 
  4131.         $this->currentfontsize = $size; 
  4132.         if ($write) { 
  4133.             $fontout = (sprintf('BT /F%d %.3F Tf ET', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt)); 
  4134.             // Edited mPDF 3.0 
  4135.             if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] != $fontout) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']))) { 
  4136.                 $this->_out($fontout); 
  4137.             } 
  4138.             $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] = $fontout; 
  4139.         } 
  4140.     } 
  4141.  
  4142.     function AddLink() 
  4143.     { 
  4144.         //Create a new internal link 
  4145.         $n = count($this->links) + 1; 
  4146.         $this->links[$n] = array(0, 0); 
  4147.         return $n; 
  4148.     } 
  4149.  
  4150.     function SetLink($link, $y = 0, $page = -1) 
  4151.     { 
  4152.         //Set destination of internal link 
  4153.         if ($y == -1) 
  4154.             $y = $this->y; 
  4155.         if ($page == -1) 
  4156.             $page = $this->page; 
  4157.         $this->links[$link] = array($page, $y); 
  4158.     } 
  4159.  
  4160.     function Link($x, $y, $w, $h, $link) 
  4161.     { 
  4162.         $l = array($x * _MPDFK, $this->hPt - $y * _MPDFK, $w * _MPDFK, $h * _MPDFK, $link); 
  4163.         if ($this->keep_block_together) { // don't write yet 
  4164.             return; 
  4165.         } elseif ($this->table_rotate) { // *TABLES* 
  4166.             $this->tbrot_Links[$this->page][] = $l; // *TABLES* 
  4167.             return; // *TABLES* 
  4168.         } // *TABLES* 
  4169.         elseif ($this->kwt) { 
  4170.             $this->kwt_Links[$this->page][] = $l; 
  4171.             return; 
  4172.         } 
  4173.  
  4174.         if ($this->writingHTMLheader || $this->writingHTMLfooter) { 
  4175.             $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks[] = $l; 
  4176.             return; 
  4177.         } 
  4178.         //Put a link on the page 
  4179.         $this->PageLinks[$this->page][] = $l; 
  4180.         // Save cross-reference to Column buffer 
  4181.         $ref = count($this->PageLinks[$this->page]) - 1; // *COLUMNS* 
  4182.         $this->columnLinks[$this->CurrCol][INTVAL($this->x)][INTVAL($this->y)] = $ref; // *COLUMNS* 
  4183.     } 
  4184.  
  4185.     function Text($x, $y, $txt, $OTLdata = array(), $textvar = 0, $aixextra = '', $coordsys = '', $return = false) 
  4186.     { 
  4187.         // Output (or return) a string 
  4188.         // Called (internally) by Watermark() & _tableWrite() [rotated cells] & TableHeaderFooter() & WriteText() 
  4189.         // Called also from classes/svg.php 
  4190.         // Expects Font to be set 
  4191.         // Expects input to be mb_encoded if necessary and RTL reversed & OTL processed 
  4192.         // ARTIFICIAL BOLD AND ITALIC 
  4193.         $s = 'q '; 
  4194.         if ($this->falseBoldWeight && strpos($this->ReqFontStyle, "B") !== false && strpos($this->FontStyle, "B") === false) { 
  4195.             $s .= '2 Tr 1 J 1 j '; 
  4196.             $s .= sprintf('%.3F w ', ($this->FontSize / 130) * _MPDFK * $this->falseBoldWeight); 
  4197.             $tc = strtoupper($this->TextColor); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG 
  4198.             if ($this->FillColor != $tc) { 
  4199.                 $s .= $tc . ' '; 
  4200.             }  // stroke (outline) = same colour as text(fill) 
  4201.         } 
  4202.         if (strpos($this->ReqFontStyle, "I") !== false && strpos($this->FontStyle, "I") === false) { 
  4203.             $aix = '1 0 0.261799 1 %.3F %.3F Tm'; 
  4204.         } else { 
  4205.             $aix = '%.3F %.3F Td'; 
  4206.         } 
  4207.  
  4208.         $aix = $aixextra . $aix; 
  4209.  
  4210.         if ($this->ColorFlag) 
  4211.             $s.=$this->TextColor . ' '; 
  4212.  
  4213.         $this->CurrentFont['used'] = true; 
  4214.  
  4215.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  4216.             $txt2 = str_replace(chr(160), chr(32), $txt); 
  4217.         } else { 
  4218.             $txt2 = str_replace(chr(194) . chr(160), chr(32), $txt); 
  4219.         } 
  4220.  
  4221.         $px = $x; 
  4222.         $py = $y; 
  4223.         if ($coordsys != 'SVG') { 
  4224.             $px = $x * _MPDFK; 
  4225.             $py = ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK; 
  4226.         } 
  4227.  
  4228.  
  4229.         /**         * ************** SIMILAR TO Cell() ************************ */ 
  4230.  
  4231.         // IF corefonts AND NOT SmCaps AND NOT Kerning 
  4232.         // Just output text 
  4233.         if ($this->usingCoreFont && !($textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS) && !($textvar & FC_KERNING)) { 
  4234.             $txt2 = $this->_escape($txt2); 
  4235.             $s .=sprintf('BT ' . $aix . ' (%s) Tj ET', $px, $py, $txt2); 
  4236.         } 
  4237.  
  4238.  
  4239.         // IF NOT corefonts [AND NO wordspacing] AND NOT SIP/SMP AND NOT SmCaps AND NOT Kerning AND NOT OTL 
  4240.         // Just output text 
  4241.         elseif (!$this->usingCoreFont && !($textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS) && !($textvar & FC_KERNING) && !(isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && ($this->CurrentFont['useOTL'] & 0xFF) && !empty($OTLdata['GPOSinfo']))) { 
  4242.             // IF SIP/SMP 
  4243.             if ($this->CurrentFont['sip'] || $this->CurrentFont['smp']) { 
  4244.                 $txt2 = $this->UTF8toSubset($txt2); 
  4245.                 $s .=sprintf('BT ' . $aix . ' %s Tj ET', $px, $py, $txt2); 
  4246.             } 
  4247.             // NOT SIP/SMP 
  4248.             else { 
  4249.                 $txt2 = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($txt2, false); 
  4250.                 $txt2 = $this->_escape($txt2); 
  4251.                 $s .=sprintf('BT ' . $aix . ' (%s) Tj ET', $px, $py, $txt2); 
  4252.             } 
  4253.         } 
  4254.  
  4255.         // IF NOT corefonts [AND IS wordspacing] AND NOT SIP AND NOT SmCaps AND NOT Kerning AND NOT OTL 
  4256.         // Not required here (cf. Cell() ) 
  4257.         // ELSE (IF SmCaps || Kerning || OTL) [corefonts or not corefonts; SIP or SMP or BMP] 
  4258.         else { 
  4259.             $s .= $this->applyGPOSpdf($txt2, $aix, $px, $py, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  4260.         } 
  4261.         /**         * ************** END ************************ */ 
  4262.  
  4263.         $s .= ' '; 
  4264.  
  4265.         if (($textvar & FD_UNDERLINE) && $txt != '') { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  4266.             $c = strtoupper($this->TextColor); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG 
  4267.             if ($this->FillColor != $c) { 
  4268.                 $s.= ' ' . $c . ' '; 
  4269.             } 
  4270.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['up']) && $this->CurrentFont['up']) { 
  4271.                 $up = $this->CurrentFont['up']; 
  4272.             } else { 
  4273.                 $up = -100; 
  4274.             } 
  4275.             $adjusty = (-$up / 1000 * $this->FontSize); 
  4276.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['ut']) && $this->CurrentFont['ut']) { 
  4277.                 $ut = $this->CurrentFont['ut'] / 1000 * $this->FontSize; 
  4278.             } else { 
  4279.                 $ut = 60 / 1000 * $this->FontSize; 
  4280.             } 
  4281.             $olw = $this->LineWidth; 
  4282.             $s.=' ' . (sprintf(' %.3F w', $ut * _MPDFK)); 
  4283.             $s.=' ' . $this->_dounderline($x, $y + $adjusty, $txt, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  4284.             $s.=' ' . (sprintf(' %.3F w', $olw * _MPDFK)); 
  4285.             if ($this->FillColor != $c) { 
  4286.                 $s.= ' ' . $this->FillColor . ' '; 
  4287.             } 
  4288.         } 
  4289.         // STRIKETHROUGH 
  4290.         if (($textvar & FD_LINETHROUGH) && $txt != '') { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  4291.             $c = strtoupper($this->TextColor); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG 
  4292.             if ($this->FillColor != $c) { 
  4293.                 $s.= ' ' . $c . ' '; 
  4294.             } 
  4295.             //Superscript and Subscript Y coordinate adjustment (now for striked-through texts) 
  4296.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['CapHeight']) && $this->CurrentFont['desc']['CapHeight']) { 
  4297.                 $ch = $this->CurrentFont['desc']['CapHeight']; 
  4298.             } else { 
  4299.                 $ch = 700; 
  4300.             } 
  4301.             $adjusty = (-$ch / 1000 * $this->FontSize) * 0.35; 
  4302.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['ut']) && $this->CurrentFont['ut']) { 
  4303.                 $ut = $this->CurrentFont['ut'] / 1000 * $this->FontSize; 
  4304.             } else { 
  4305.                 $ut = 60 / 1000 * $this->FontSize; 
  4306.             } 
  4307.             $olw = $this->LineWidth; 
  4308.             $s.=' ' . (sprintf(' %.3F w', $ut * _MPDFK)); 
  4309.             $s.=' ' . $this->_dounderline($x, $y + $adjusty, $txt, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  4310.             $s.=' ' . (sprintf(' %.3F w', $olw * _MPDFK)); 
  4311.             if ($this->FillColor != $c) { 
  4312.                 $s.= ' ' . $this->FillColor . ' '; 
  4313.             } 
  4314.         } 
  4315.         $s .= 'Q'; 
  4316.  
  4317.         if ($return) { 
  4318.             return $s . " \n"; 
  4319.         } 
  4320.         $this->_out($s); 
  4321.     } 
  4322.  
  4323.     /** -- DIRECTW -- */ 
  4324.  
  4325.     function WriteText($x, $y, $txt) 
  4326.     { 
  4327.         // Output a string using Text() but does encoding and text reversing of RTL 
  4328.         $txt = $this->purify_utf8_text($txt); 
  4329.         if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) { 
  4330.             $txt = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txt); 
  4331.         } 
  4332.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  4333.             $txt = mb_convert_encoding($txt, $this->mb_enc, 'UTF-8'); 
  4334.         } 
  4335.  
  4336.         // DIRECTIONALITY 
  4337.         if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregRTLchars . "])/u", $txt)) { 
  4338.             $this->biDirectional = true; 
  4339.         } // *OTL* 
  4340.  
  4341.         $textvar = 0; 
  4342.         $save_OTLtags = $this->OTLtags; 
  4343.         $this->OTLtags = array(); 
  4344.         if ($this->useKerning) { 
  4345.             if ($this->CurrentFont['haskernGPOS']) { 
  4346.                 $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' kern'; 
  4347.             } else { 
  4348.                 $textvar = ($textvar | FC_KERNING); 
  4349.             } 
  4350.         } 
  4351.  
  4352.         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  4353.         // Use OTL OpenType Table Layout - GSUB & GPOS 
  4354.         if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  4355.             $txt = $this->otl->applyOTL($txt, $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']); 
  4356.             $OTLdata = $this->otl->OTLdata; 
  4357.         } 
  4358.         /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  4359.         $this->OTLtags = $save_OTLtags; 
  4360.  
  4361.         $this->magic_reverse_dir($txt, $this->directionality, $OTLdata); 
  4362.  
  4363.         $this->Text($x, $y, $txt, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  4364.     } 
  4365.  
  4366.     function WriteCell($w, $h = 0, $txt = '', $border = 0, $ln = 0, $align = '', $fill = 0, $link = '', $currentx = 0) 
  4367.     { 
  4368.         //Output a cell using Cell() but does encoding and text reversing of RTL 
  4369.         $txt = $this->purify_utf8_text($txt); 
  4370.         if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) { 
  4371.             $txt = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txt); 
  4372.         } 
  4373.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  4374.             $txt = mb_convert_encoding($txt, $this->mb_enc, 'UTF-8'); 
  4375.         } 
  4376.         // DIRECTIONALITY 
  4377.         if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregRTLchars . "])/u", $txt)) { 
  4378.             $this->biDirectional = true; 
  4379.         } // *OTL* 
  4380.  
  4381.         $textvar = 0; 
  4382.         $save_OTLtags = $this->OTLtags; 
  4383.         $this->OTLtags = array(); 
  4384.         if ($this->useKerning) { 
  4385.             if ($this->CurrentFont['haskernGPOS']) { 
  4386.                 $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' kern'; 
  4387.             } else { 
  4388.                 $textvar = ($textvar | FC_KERNING); 
  4389.             } 
  4390.         } 
  4391.  
  4392.         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  4393.         // Use OTL OpenType Table Layout - GSUB & GPOS 
  4394.         if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  4395.             $txt = $this->otl->applyOTL($txt, $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']); 
  4396.             $OTLdata = $this->otl->OTLdata; 
  4397.         } 
  4398.         /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  4399.         $this->OTLtags = $save_OTLtags; 
  4400.  
  4401.         $this->magic_reverse_dir($txt, $this->directionality, $OTLdata); 
  4402.  
  4403.         $this->Cell($w, $h, $txt, $border, $ln, $align, $fill, $link, $currentx, 0, 0, 'M', 0, false, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  4404.     } 
  4405.  
  4406.     /** -- END DIRECTW -- */ 
  4407.  
  4408.     function ResetSpacing() 
  4409.     { 
  4410.         if ($this->ws != 0) { 
  4411.             $this->_out('BT 0 Tw ET'); 
  4412.         } 
  4413.         $this->ws = 0; 
  4414.         if ($this->charspacing != 0) { 
  4415.             $this->_out('BT 0 Tc ET'); 
  4416.         } 
  4417.         $this->charspacing = 0; 
  4418.     } 
  4419.  
  4420.     function SetSpacing($cs, $ws) 
  4421.     { 
  4422.         if (intval($cs * 1000) == 0) { 
  4423.             $cs = 0; 
  4424.         } 
  4425.         if ($cs) { 
  4426.             $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3F Tc ET', $cs)); 
  4427.         } elseif ($this->charspacing != 0) { 
  4428.             $this->_out('BT 0 Tc ET'); 
  4429.         } 
  4430.         $this->charspacing = $cs; 
  4431.         if (intval($ws * 1000) == 0) { 
  4432.             $ws = 0; 
  4433.         } 
  4434.         if ($ws) { 
  4435.             $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3F Tw ET', $ws)); 
  4436.         } elseif ($this->ws != 0) { 
  4437.             $this->_out('BT 0 Tw ET'); 
  4438.         } 
  4439.         $this->ws = $ws; 
  4440.     } 
  4441.  
  4442.     // WORD SPACING 
  4443.     function GetJspacing($nc, $ns, $w, $inclCursive, &$cOTLdata) 
  4444.     { 
  4445.         $kashida_present = false; 
  4446.         $kashida_space = 0; 
  4447.         if ($w > 0 && $inclCursive && isset($this->CurrentFont['useKashida']) && $this->CurrentFont['useKashida'] && !empty($cOTLdata)) { 
  4448.             for ($c = 0; $c < count($cOTLdata); $c++) { 
  4449.                 for ($i = 0; $i < strlen($cOTLdata[$c]['group']); $i++) { 
  4450.                     if (isset($cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida']) && $cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida'] > 0) { 
  4451.                         $kashida_present = true; 
  4452.                         break 2; 
  4453.                     } 
  4454.                 } 
  4455.             } 
  4456.         } 
  4457.  
  4458.         if ($kashida_present) { 
  4459.             $k_ctr = 0;  // Number of kashida points 
  4460.             $k_total = 0;  // Total of kashida values (priority) 
  4461.             // Reset word 
  4462.             $max_kashida_in_word = 0; 
  4463.             $last_kashida_in_word = -1; 
  4464.  
  4465.             for ($c = 0; $c < count($cOTLdata); $c++) { 
  4466.                 for ($i = 0; $i < strlen($cOTLdata[$c]['group']); $i++) { 
  4467.  
  4468.                     if ($cOTLdata[$c]['group']{$i} == 'S') { 
  4469.                         // Save from last word 
  4470.                         if ($max_kashida_in_word) { 
  4471.                             $k_ctr++; 
  4472.                             $k_total = $max_kashida_in_word; 
  4473.                         } 
  4474.                         // Reset word 
  4475.                         $max_kashida_in_word = 0; 
  4476.                         $last_kashida_in_word = -1; 
  4477.                     } 
  4478.  
  4479.                     if (isset($cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida']) && $cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida'] > 0) { 
  4480.                         if ($max_kashida_in_word) { 
  4481.                             if ($cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida'] > $max_kashida_in_word) { 
  4482.                                 $max_kashida_in_word = $cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida']; 
  4483.                                 $cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$last_kashida_in_word]['kashida'] = 0; 
  4484.                                 $last_kashida_in_word = $i; 
  4485.                             } else { 
  4486.                                 $cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida'] = 0; 
  4487.                             } 
  4488.                         } else { 
  4489.                             $max_kashida_in_word = $cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida']; 
  4490.                             $last_kashida_in_word = $i; 
  4491.                         } 
  4492.                     } 
  4493.                 } 
  4494.             } 
  4495.             // Save from last word 
  4496.             if ($max_kashida_in_word) { 
  4497.                 $k_ctr++; 
  4498.                 $k_total = $max_kashida_in_word; 
  4499.             } 
  4500.  
  4501.             // Number of kashida points = $k_ctr 
  4502.             // $useKashida is a % value from CurrentFont/config_fonts.php 
  4503.             // % ratio divided between word-spacing and kashida-spacing 
  4504.             $kashida_space_ratio = intval($this->CurrentFont['useKashida']) / 100; 
  4505.  
  4506.  
  4507.             $kashida_space = $w * $kashida_space_ratio; 
  4508.  
  4509.             $tatw = $this->_getCharWidth($this->CurrentFont['cw'], 0x0640); 
  4510.             // Only use kashida if each allocated kashida width is > 0.01 x width of a tatweel 
  4511.             // Otherwise fontstretch is too small and errors 
  4512.             // If not just leave to adjust word-spacing 
  4513.             if ($tatw && (($kashida_space / $k_ctr) / $tatw) > 0.01) { 
  4514.                 for ($c = 0; $c < count($cOTLdata); $c++) { 
  4515.                     for ($i = 0; $i < strlen($cOTLdata[$c]['group']); $i++) { 
  4516.                         if (isset($cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida']) && $cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida'] > 0) { 
  4517.                             // At this point kashida is a number representing priority (higher number - higher priority) 
  4518.                             // We are now going to set it as an actual length 
  4519.                             // This shares it equally amongst words: 
  4520.                             $cOTLdata[$c]['GPOSinfo'][$i]['kashida_space'] = (1 / $k_ctr) * $kashida_space; 
  4521.                         } 
  4522.                     } 
  4523.                 } 
  4524.                 $w -= $kashida_space; 
  4525.             } 
  4526.         } 
  4527.  
  4528.         $ws = 0; 
  4529.         $charspacing = 0; 
  4530.         $ww = $this->jSWord; 
  4531.         $ncx = $nc - 1; 
  4532.         if ($nc == 0) { 
  4533.             return array(0, 0, 0); 
  4534.         } 
  4535.         // Only word spacing allowed / possible 
  4536.         elseif ($this->fixedlSpacing !== false || $inclCursive) { 
  4537.             if ($ns) { 
  4538.                 $ws = $w / $ns; 
  4539.             } 
  4540.         } elseif ($nc == 1) { 
  4541.             $charspacing = $w; 
  4542.         } elseif (!$ns) { 
  4543.             $charspacing = $w / ($ncx ); 
  4544.             if (($this->jSmaxChar > 0) && ($charspacing > $this->jSmaxChar)) { 
  4545.                 $charspacing = $this->jSmaxChar; 
  4546.             } 
  4547.         } elseif ($ns == ($ncx )) { 
  4548.             $charspacing = $w / $ns; 
  4549.         } else { 
  4550.             if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  4551.                 $cs = ($w * (1 - $this->jSWord)) / ($ncx ); 
  4552.                 if (($this->jSmaxChar > 0) && ($cs > $this->jSmaxChar)) { 
  4553.                     $cs = $this->jSmaxChar; 
  4554.                     $ww = 1 - (($cs * ($ncx )) / $w); 
  4555.                 } 
  4556.                 $charspacing = $cs; 
  4557.                 $ws = ($w * ($ww) ) / $ns; 
  4558.             } else { 
  4559.                 $cs = ($w * (1 - $this->jSWord)) / ($ncx - $ns); 
  4560.                 if (($this->jSmaxChar > 0) && ($cs > $this->jSmaxChar)) { 
  4561.                     $cs = $this->jSmaxChar; 
  4562.                     $ww = 1 - (($cs * ($ncx - $ns)) / $w); 
  4563.                 } 
  4564.                 $charspacing = $cs; 
  4565.                 $ws = (($w * ($ww) ) / $ns) - $charspacing; 
  4566.             } 
  4567.         } 
  4568.         return array($charspacing, $ws, $kashida_space); 
  4569.     } 
  4570.  
  4571.     function Cell($w, $h = 0, $txt = '', $border = 0, $ln = 0, $align = '', $fill = 0, $link = '', $currentx = 0, $lcpaddingL = 0, $lcpaddingR = 0, $valign = 'M', $spanfill = 0, $exactWidth = false, $OTLdata = false, $textvar = 0, $lineBox = false) 
  4572.     {  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  4573.         //Output a cell 
  4574.         // Expects input to be mb_encoded if necessary and RTL reversed 
  4575.         // NON_BREAKING SPACE 
  4576.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  4577.             $txt = str_replace(chr(160), chr(32), $txt); 
  4578.         } else { 
  4579.             $txt = str_replace(chr(194) . chr(160), chr(32), $txt); 
  4580.         } 
  4581.  
  4582.         $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  4583.         // Automatic page break 
  4584.         // Allows PAGE-BREAK-AFTER = avoid to work 
  4585.         if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl])) { 
  4586.             $bottom = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_bottom']; 
  4587.         } else { 
  4588.             $bottom = 0; 
  4589.         } 
  4590.         if (!$this->tableLevel && (($this->y + $this->divheight > $this->PageBreakTrigger) || ($this->y + $h > $this->PageBreakTrigger) || 
  4591.             ($this->y + ($h * 2) + $bottom > $this->PageBreakTrigger && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['page_break_after_avoid'])) and ! $this->InFooter and $this->AcceptPageBreak()) { // mPDF 5.7.2 
  4592.             $x = $this->x; //Current X position 
  4593.             // WORD SPACING 
  4594.             $ws = $this->ws; //Word Spacing 
  4595.             $charspacing = $this->charspacing; //Character Spacing 
  4596.             $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  4597.  
  4598.             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  4599.             // Added to correct for OddEven Margins 
  4600.             $x += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  4601.             if ($currentx) { 
  4602.                 $currentx += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  4603.             } 
  4604.             $this->x = $x; 
  4605.             // WORD SPACING 
  4606.             $this->SetSpacing($charspacing, $ws); 
  4607.         } 
  4608.  
  4609.         // Test: to put line through centre of cell: $this->Line($this->x, $this->y+($h/2), $this->x+50, $this->y+($h/2)); 
  4610.         // Test: to put border around cell as it is specified: $border='LRTB'; 
  4611.  
  4612.  
  4613.         /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  4614.         // COLS 
  4615.         // COLUMN CHANGE 
  4616.         if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) { 
  4617.             if ($currentx) { 
  4618.                 $currentx += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  4619.             } 
  4620.             $this->x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  4621.         } 
  4622.  
  4623.         // COLUMNS Update/overwrite the lowest bottom of printing y value for a column 
  4624.         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  4625.             if ($h) { 
  4626.                 $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y + $h; 
  4627.             } else { 
  4628.                 $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y + $this->divheight; 
  4629.             } 
  4630.         } 
  4631.         /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  4632.  
  4633.  
  4634.         if ($w == 0) 
  4635.             $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  4636.         $s = ''; 
  4637.         if ($fill == 1 && $this->FillColor) { 
  4638.             if ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor'] != $this->FillColor) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor'])) { 
  4639.                 $s .= $this->FillColor . ' '; 
  4640.             } 
  4641.             $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor'] = $this->FillColor; 
  4642.         } 
  4643.  
  4644.  
  4645.         if ($lineBox && isset($lineBox['boxtop']) && $txt) { // i.e. always from WriteFlowingBlock/finishFlowingBlock (but not objects - 
  4646.             // which only have $lineBox['top'] set) 
  4647.             $boxtop = $this->y + $lineBox['boxtop']; 
  4648.             $boxbottom = $this->y + $lineBox['boxbottom']; 
  4649.             $glyphYorigin = $lineBox['glyphYorigin']; 
  4650.             $baseline_shift = $lineBox['baseline-shift']; 
  4651.             $bord_boxtop = $bg_boxtop = $boxtop = $boxtop - $baseline_shift; 
  4652.             $bord_boxbottom = $bg_boxbottom = $boxbottom = $boxbottom - $baseline_shift; 
  4653.             $bord_boxheight = $bg_boxheight = $boxheight = $boxbottom - $boxtop; 
  4654.  
  4655.             // If inline element BACKGROUND has bounding box set by parent element: 
  4656.             if (isset($lineBox['background-boxtop'])) { 
  4657.                 $bg_boxtop = $this->y + $lineBox['background-boxtop'] - $lineBox['background-baseline-shift']; 
  4658.                 $bg_boxbottom = $this->y + $lineBox['background-boxbottom'] - $lineBox['background-baseline-shift']; 
  4659.                 $bg_boxheight = $bg_boxbottom - $bg_boxtop; 
  4660.             } 
  4661.             // If inline element BORDER has bounding box set by parent element: 
  4662.             if (isset($lineBox['border-boxtop'])) { 
  4663.                 $bord_boxtop = $this->y + $lineBox['border-boxtop'] - $lineBox['border-baseline-shift']; 
  4664.                 $bord_boxbottom = $this->y + $lineBox['border-boxbottom'] - $lineBox['border-baseline-shift']; 
  4665.                 $bord_boxheight = $bord_boxbottom - $bord_boxtop; 
  4666.             } 
  4667.         } else { 
  4668.             $boxtop = $this->y; 
  4669.             $boxheight = $h; 
  4670.             $boxbottom = $this->y + $h; 
  4671.             $baseline_shift = 0; 
  4672.             if ($txt != '') { 
  4673.                 // FONT SIZE - this determines the baseline caculation 
  4674.                 $bfs = $this->FontSize; 
  4675.                 //Calculate baseline Superscript and Subscript Y coordinate adjustment 
  4676.                 $bfx = $this->baselineC; 
  4677.                 $baseline = $bfx * $bfs; 
  4678.  
  4679.                 if ($textvar & FA_SUPERSCRIPT) { 
  4680.                     $baseline_shift = $this->textparam['text-baseline']; 
  4681.                 } // mPDF 5.7.1    // mPDF 6 
  4682.                 elseif ($textvar & FA_SUBSCRIPT) { 
  4683.                     $baseline_shift = $this->textparam['text-baseline']; 
  4684.                 } // mPDF 5.7.1    // mPDF 6 
  4685.                 elseif ($this->bullet) { 
  4686.                     $baseline += ($bfx - 0.7) * $this->FontSize; 
  4687.                 } 
  4688.  
  4689.                 // Vertical align (for Images) 
  4690.                 if ($valign == 'T') { 
  4691.                     $va = (0.5 * $bfs * $this->normalLineheight); 
  4692.                 } elseif ($valign == 'B') { 
  4693.                     $va = $h - (0.5 * $bfs * $this->normalLineheight); 
  4694.                 } else { 
  4695.                     $va = 0.5 * $h; 
  4696.                 } // Middle 
  4697.                 // ONLY SET THESE IF WANT TO CONFINE BORDER +/- FILL TO FIT FONTSIZE - NOT FULL CELL AS IS ORIGINAL FUNCTION 
  4698.                 // spanfill or spanborder are set in FlowingBlock functions 
  4699.                 if ($spanfill || !empty($this->spanborddet) || $link != '') { 
  4700.                     $exth = 0.2; // Add to fontsize to increase height of background / link / border 
  4701.                     $boxtop = $this->y + $baseline + $va - ($this->FontSize * (1 + $exth / 2) * (0.5 + $bfx)); 
  4702.                     $boxheight = $this->FontSize * (1 + $exth); 
  4703.                     $boxbottom = $boxtop + $boxheight; 
  4704.                 } 
  4705.                 $glyphYorigin = $baseline + $va; 
  4706.             } 
  4707.             $boxtop -= $baseline_shift; 
  4708.             $boxbottom -= $baseline_shift; 
  4709.             $bord_boxtop = $bg_boxtop = $boxtop; 
  4710.             $bord_boxbottom = $bg_boxbottom = $boxbottom; 
  4711.             $bord_boxheight = $bg_boxheight = $boxheight = $boxbottom - $boxtop; 
  4712.         } 
  4713.  
  4714.  
  4715.         $bbw = $tbw = $lbw = $rbw = 0; // Border widths 
  4716.         if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  4717.             if (!isset($this->spanborddet['B'])) { 
  4718.                 $this->spanborddet['B'] = array('s' => 0, 'style' => '', 'w' => 0); 
  4719.             } 
  4720.             if (!isset($this->spanborddet['T'])) { 
  4721.                 $this->spanborddet['T'] = array('s' => 0, 'style' => '', 'w' => 0); 
  4722.             } 
  4723.             if (!isset($this->spanborddet['L'])) { 
  4724.                 $this->spanborddet['L'] = array('s' => 0, 'style' => '', 'w' => 0); 
  4725.             } 
  4726.             if (!isset($this->spanborddet['R'])) { 
  4727.                 $this->spanborddet['R'] = array('s' => 0, 'style' => '', 'w' => 0); 
  4728.             } 
  4729.             $bbw = $this->spanborddet['B']['w']; 
  4730.             $tbw = $this->spanborddet['T']['w']; 
  4731.             $lbw = $this->spanborddet['L']['w']; 
  4732.             $rbw = $this->spanborddet['R']['w']; 
  4733.         } 
  4734.         if ($fill == 1 || $border == 1 || !empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  4735.             if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  4736.                 if ($fill == 1) { 
  4737.                     $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re f ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bg_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK, ($w + $lbw + $rbw) * _MPDFK, (-$bg_boxheight - $tbw - $bbw) * _MPDFK); 
  4738.                 } 
  4739.                 $s.= ' q '; 
  4740.                 $dashon = 3; 
  4741.                 $dashoff = 3.5; 
  4742.                 $dot = 2.5; 
  4743.                 if ($tbw) { 
  4744.                     $short = 0; 
  4745.                     if ($this->spanborddet['T']['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  4746.                         $s.=sprintf(' 0 j 0 J [%.3F %.3F] 0 d ', $tbw * $dashon * _MPDFK, $tbw * $dashoff * _MPDFK); 
  4747.                     } elseif ($this->spanborddet['T']['style'] == 'dotted') { 
  4748.                         $s.=sprintf(' 1 j 1 J [%.3F %.3F] %.3F d ', 0.001, $tbw * $dot * _MPDFK, -$tbw / 2 * _MPDFK); 
  4749.                         $short = $tbw / 2; 
  4750.                     } else { 
  4751.                         $s.=' 0 j 0 J [] 0 d '; 
  4752.                     } 
  4753.                     if ($this->spanborddet['T']['style'] != 'dotted') { 
  4754.                         $s .= 'q '; 
  4755.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK); 
  4756.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x + $w + $rbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK); 
  4757.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop) * _MPDFK); 
  4758.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop) * _MPDFK); 
  4759.                         $s .= ' h W n '; // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  4760.                     } 
  4761.                     $c = $this->SetDColor($this->spanborddet['T']['c'], true); 
  4762.                     if ($this->spanborddet['T']['style'] == 'double') { 
  4763.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $tbw / 3 * _MPDFK); 
  4764.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw * 5 / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw * 5 / 6) * _MPDFK); 
  4765.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw / 6) * _MPDFK); 
  4766.                     } elseif ($this->spanborddet['T']['style'] == 'dotted') { 
  4767.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $tbw * _MPDFK); 
  4768.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw - $short) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw / 2) * _MPDFK); 
  4769.                     } else { 
  4770.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $tbw * _MPDFK); 
  4771.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw - $short) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw / 2) * _MPDFK); 
  4772.                     } 
  4773.                     if ($this->spanborddet['T']['style'] != 'dotted') { 
  4774.                         $s .= ' Q '; 
  4775.                     } 
  4776.                 } 
  4777.                 if ($bbw) { 
  4778.                     $short = 0; 
  4779.                     if ($this->spanborddet['B']['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  4780.                         $s.=sprintf(' 0 j 0 J [%.3F %.3F] 0 d ', $bbw * $dashon * _MPDFK, $bbw * $dashoff * _MPDFK); 
  4781.                     } elseif ($this->spanborddet['B']['style'] == 'dotted') { 
  4782.                         $s.=sprintf(' 1 j 1 J [%.3F %.3F] %.3F d ', 0.001, $bbw * $dot * _MPDFK, -$bbw / 2 * _MPDFK); 
  4783.                         $short = $bbw / 2; 
  4784.                     } else { 
  4785.                         $s.=' 0 j 0 J [] 0 d '; 
  4786.                     } 
  4787.                     if ($this->spanborddet['B']['style'] != 'dotted') { 
  4788.                         $s .= 'q '; 
  4789.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw) * _MPDFK); 
  4790.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x + $w + $rbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw) * _MPDFK); 
  4791.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom) * _MPDFK); 
  4792.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom) * _MPDFK); 
  4793.                         $s .= ' h W n '; // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  4794.                     } 
  4795.                     $c = $this->SetDColor($this->spanborddet['B']['c'], true); 
  4796.                     if ($this->spanborddet['B']['style'] == 'double') { 
  4797.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $bbw / 3 * _MPDFK); 
  4798.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw - $short) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw / 6) * _MPDFK); 
  4799.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw * 5 / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw - $short) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw * 5 / 6) * _MPDFK); 
  4800.                     } elseif ($this->spanborddet['B']['style'] == 'dotted') { 
  4801.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $bbw * _MPDFK); 
  4802.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw - $short) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw / 2) * _MPDFK); 
  4803.                     } else { 
  4804.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $bbw * _MPDFK); 
  4805.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw - $short) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw / 2) * _MPDFK); 
  4806.                     } 
  4807.                     if ($this->spanborddet['B']['style'] != 'dotted') { 
  4808.                         $s .= ' Q '; 
  4809.                     } 
  4810.                 } 
  4811.                 if ($lbw) { 
  4812.                     $short = 0; 
  4813.                     if ($this->spanborddet['L']['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  4814.                         $s.=sprintf(' 0 j 0 J [%.3F %.3F] 0 d ', $lbw * $dashon * _MPDFK, $lbw * $dashoff * _MPDFK); 
  4815.                     } elseif ($this->spanborddet['L']['style'] == 'dotted') { 
  4816.                         $s.=sprintf(' 1 j 1 J [%.3F %.3F] %.3F d ', 0.001, $lbw * $dot * _MPDFK, -$lbw / 2 * _MPDFK); 
  4817.                         $short = $lbw / 2; 
  4818.                     } else { 
  4819.                         $s.=' 0 j 0 J [] 0 d '; 
  4820.                     } 
  4821.                     if ($this->spanborddet['L']['style'] != 'dotted') { 
  4822.                         $s .= 'q '; 
  4823.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw) * _MPDFK); 
  4824.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom) * _MPDFK); 
  4825.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop) * _MPDFK); 
  4826.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x - $lbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK); 
  4827.                         $s .= ' h W n '; // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  4828.                     } 
  4829.                     $c = $this->SetDColor($this->spanborddet['L']['c'], true); 
  4830.                     if ($this->spanborddet['L']['style'] == 'double') { 
  4831.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $lbw / 3 * _MPDFK); 
  4832.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->x - $lbw / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw + $short) * _MPDFK); 
  4833.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw * 5 / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->x - $lbw * 5 / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw + $short) * _MPDFK); 
  4834.                     } elseif ($this->spanborddet['L']['style'] == 'dotted') { 
  4835.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $lbw * _MPDFK); 
  4836.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->x - $lbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw + $short) * _MPDFK); 
  4837.                     } else { 
  4838.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $lbw * _MPDFK); 
  4839.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x - $lbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->x - $lbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw + $short) * _MPDFK); 
  4840.                     } 
  4841.                     if ($this->spanborddet['L']['style'] != 'dotted') { 
  4842.                         $s .= ' Q '; 
  4843.                     } 
  4844.                 } 
  4845.                 if ($rbw) { 
  4846.                     $short = 0; 
  4847.                     if ($this->spanborddet['R']['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  4848.                         $s.=sprintf(' 0 j 0 J [%.3F %.3F] 0 d ', $rbw * $dashon * _MPDFK, $rbw * $dashoff * _MPDFK); 
  4849.                     } elseif ($this->spanborddet['R']['style'] == 'dotted') { 
  4850.                         $s.=sprintf(' 1 j 1 J [%.3F %.3F] %.3F d ', 0.001, $rbw * $dot * _MPDFK, -$rbw / 2 * _MPDFK); 
  4851.                         $short = $rbw / 2; 
  4852.                     } else { 
  4853.                         $s.=' 0 j 0 J [] 0 d '; 
  4854.                     } 
  4855.                     if ($this->spanborddet['R']['style'] != 'dotted') { 
  4856.                         $s .= 'q '; 
  4857.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($this->x + $w + $rbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw) * _MPDFK); 
  4858.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom) * _MPDFK); 
  4859.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop) * _MPDFK); 
  4860.                         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($this->x + $w + $rbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK); 
  4861.                         $s .= ' h W n '; // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  4862.                     } 
  4863.                     $c = $this->SetDColor($this->spanborddet['R']['c'], true); 
  4864.                     if ($this->spanborddet['R']['style'] == 'double') { 
  4865.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $rbw / 3 * _MPDFK); 
  4866.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x + $w + $rbw / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw + $short) * _MPDFK); 
  4867.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x + $w + $rbw * 5 / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw * 5 / 6) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw + $short) * _MPDFK); 
  4868.                     } elseif ($this->spanborddet['R']['style'] == 'dotted') { 
  4869.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $rbw * _MPDFK); 
  4870.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x + $w + $rbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw + $short) * _MPDFK); 
  4871.                     } else { 
  4872.                         $s.=sprintf(' %s %.3F w ', $c, $rbw * _MPDFK); 
  4873.                         $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($this->x + $w + $rbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop + $tbw) * _MPDFK, ($this->x + $w + $rbw / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxbottom - $bbw + $short) * _MPDFK); 
  4874.                     } 
  4875.                     if ($this->spanborddet['R']['style'] != 'dotted') { 
  4876.                         $s .= ' Q '; 
  4877.                     } 
  4878.                 } 
  4879.                 $s.= ' Q '; 
  4880.             } else { // If "border", does not come from WriteFlowingBlock or FinishFlowingBlock 
  4881.                 if ($fill == 1) 
  4882.                     $op = ($border == 1) ? 'B' : 'f'; 
  4883.                 else 
  4884.                     $op = 'S'; 
  4885.                 $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re %s ', $this->x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bg_boxtop) * _MPDFK, $w * _MPDFK, -$bg_boxheight * _MPDFK, $op); 
  4886.             } 
  4887.         } 
  4888.  
  4889.         if (is_string($border)) { // If "border", does not come from WriteFlowingBlock or FinishFlowingBlock 
  4890.             $x = $this->x; 
  4891.             $y = $this->y; 
  4892.             if (is_int(strpos($border, 'L'))) 
  4893.                 $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop) * _MPDFK, $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($bord_boxbottom)) * _MPDFK); 
  4894.             if (is_int(strpos($border, 'T'))) 
  4895.                 $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop) * _MPDFK, ($x + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop) * _MPDFK); 
  4896.             if (is_int(strpos($border, 'R'))) 
  4897.                 $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', ($x + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bord_boxtop) * _MPDFK, ($x + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($bord_boxbottom)) * _MPDFK); 
  4898.             if (is_int(strpos($border, 'B'))) 
  4899.                 $s.=sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S ', $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($bord_boxbottom)) * _MPDFK, ($x + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($bord_boxbottom)) * _MPDFK); 
  4900.         } 
  4901.  
  4902.         if ($txt != '') { 
  4903.  
  4904.  
  4905.             if ($exactWidth) 
  4906.                 $stringWidth = $w; 
  4907.             else 
  4908.                 $stringWidth = $this->GetStringWidth($txt, true, $OTLdata, $textvar) + ( $this->charspacing * mb_strlen($txt, $this->mb_enc) / _MPDFK ) + ( $this->ws * mb_substr_count($txt, ' ', $this->mb_enc) / _MPDFK ); 
  4909.  
  4910.             // Set x OFFSET FOR PRINTING 
  4911.             if ($align == 'R') { 
  4912.                 $dx = $w - $this->cMarginR - $stringWidth - $lcpaddingR; 
  4913.             } elseif ($align == 'C') { 
  4914.                 $dx = (($w - $stringWidth ) / 2); 
  4915.             } elseif ($align == 'L' or $align == 'J') 
  4916.                 $dx = $this->cMarginL + $lcpaddingL; 
  4917.             else 
  4918.                 $dx = 0; 
  4919.  
  4920.             if ($this->ColorFlag) 
  4921.                 $s .='q ' . $this->TextColor . ' '; 
  4922.  
  4923.             // OUTLINE 
  4924.             if (isset($this->textparam['outline-s']) && $this->textparam['outline-s'] && !($textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS)) { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  4925.                 $s .=' ' . sprintf('%.3F w', $this->LineWidth * _MPDFK) . ' '; 
  4926.                 $s .=" $this->DrawColor "; 
  4927.                 $s .=" 2 Tr "; 
  4928.             } elseif ($this->falseBoldWeight && strpos($this->ReqFontStyle, "B") !== false && strpos($this->FontStyle, "B") === false && !($textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS)) { // can't use together with OUTLINE or Small Caps    // mPDF 5.7.1    ??? why not with SmallCaps ??? 
  4929.                 $s .= ' 2 Tr 1 J 1 j '; 
  4930.                 $s .= ' ' . sprintf('%.3F w', ($this->FontSize / 130) * _MPDFK * $this->falseBoldWeight) . ' '; 
  4931.                 $tc = strtoupper($this->TextColor); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG 
  4932.                 if ($this->FillColor != $tc) { 
  4933.                     $s .= ' ' . $tc . ' '; 
  4934.                 }  // stroke (outline) = same colour as text(fill) 
  4935.             } else { 
  4936.                 $s .=" 0 Tr "; 
  4937.             } 
  4938.  
  4939.             if (strpos($this->ReqFontStyle, "I") !== false && strpos($this->FontStyle, "I") === false) { // Artificial italic 
  4940.                 $aix = '1 0 0.261799 1 %.3F %.3F Tm '; 
  4941.             } else { 
  4942.                 $aix = '%.3F %.3F Td '; 
  4943.             } 
  4944.  
  4945.             $px = ($this->x + $dx) * _MPDFK; 
  4946.             $py = ($this->h - ($this->y + $glyphYorigin - $baseline_shift)) * _MPDFK; 
  4947.  
  4948.             // THE TEXT 
  4949.             $txt2 = $txt; 
  4950.             $sub = ''; 
  4951.             $this->CurrentFont['used'] = true; 
  4952.  
  4953.             /**             * ************** SIMILAR TO Text() ************************ */ 
  4954.  
  4955.             // IF corefonts AND NOT SmCaps AND NOT Kerning 
  4956.             // Just output text; charspacing and wordspacing already set by charspacing (Tc) and ws (Tw) 
  4957.             if ($this->usingCoreFont && !($textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS) && !($textvar & FC_KERNING)) { 
  4958.                 $txt2 = $this->_escape($txt2); 
  4959.                 $sub .=sprintf('BT ' . $aix . ' (%s) Tj ET', $px, $py, $txt2); 
  4960.             } 
  4961.  
  4962.  
  4963.             // IF NOT corefonts AND NO wordspacing AND NOT SIP/SMP AND NOT SmCaps AND NOT Kerning AND NOT OTL 
  4964.             // Just output text 
  4965.             elseif (!$this->usingCoreFont && !$this->ws && !($textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS) && !($textvar & FC_KERNING) && !(isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && ($this->CurrentFont['useOTL'] & 0xFF) && !empty($OTLdata['GPOSinfo']))) { 
  4966.                 // IF SIP/SMP 
  4967.                 if ((isset($this->CurrentFont['sip']) && $this->CurrentFont['sip']) || (isset($this->CurrentFont['smp']) && $this->CurrentFont['smp'])) { 
  4968.                     $txt2 = $this->UTF8toSubset($txt2); 
  4969.                     $sub .=sprintf('BT ' . $aix . ' %s Tj ET', $px, $py, $txt2); 
  4970.                 } 
  4971.                 // NOT SIP/SMP 
  4972.                 else { 
  4973.                     $txt2 = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($txt2, false); 
  4974.                     $txt2 = $this->_escape($txt2); 
  4975.                     $sub .=sprintf('BT ' . $aix . ' (%s) Tj ET', $px, $py, $txt2); 
  4976.                 } 
  4977.             } 
  4978.  
  4979.  
  4980.             // IF NOT corefonts AND IS wordspacing AND NOT SIP AND NOT SmCaps AND NOT Kerning AND NOT OTL 
  4981.             // Output text word by word with an adjustment to the intercharacter spacing for SPACEs to form word spacing 
  4982.             // IF multibyte - Tw has no effect - need to do word spacing using an adjustment before each space 
  4983.             elseif (!$this->usingCoreFont && $this->ws && !((isset($this->CurrentFont['sip']) && $this->CurrentFont['sip']) || (isset($this->CurrentFont['smp']) && $this->CurrentFont['smp'])) && !($textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS) && !($textvar & FC_KERNING) && !(isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && ($this->CurrentFont['useOTL'] & 0xFF) && (!empty($OTLdata['GPOSinfo']) || (strpos($OTLdata['group'], 'M') !== false && $this->charspacing)) )) { 
  4984.                 $space = " "; 
  4985.                 $space = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($space, false); 
  4986.                 $space = $this->_escape($space); 
  4987.                 $sub .=sprintf('BT ' . $aix . ' %.3F Tc [', $px, $py, $this->charspacing); 
  4988.                 $t = explode(' ', $txt2); 
  4989.                 $numt = count($t); 
  4990.                 for ($i = 0; $i < $numt; $i++) { 
  4991.                     $tx = $t[$i]; 
  4992.                     $tx = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($tx, false); 
  4993.                     $tx = $this->_escape($tx); 
  4994.                     $sub .=sprintf('(%s) ', $tx); 
  4995.                     if (($i + 1) < $numt) { 
  4996.                         $adj = -($this->ws) * 1000 / $this->FontSizePt; 
  4997.                         $sub .=sprintf('%d(%s) ', $adj, $space); 
  4998.                     } 
  4999.                 } 
  5000.                 $sub .='] TJ '; 
  5001.                 $sub .=' ET'; 
  5002.             } 
  5003.  
  5004.  
  5005.             // ELSE (IF SmCaps || Kerning || OTL) [corefonts or not corefonts; SIP or SMP or BMP] 
  5006.             else { 
  5007.                 $sub = $this->applyGPOSpdf($txt, $aix, $px, $py, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  5008.             } 
  5009.  
  5010.             /**             * ************** END SIMILAR TO Text() ************************ */ 
  5011.  
  5012.             if ($this->shrin_k > 1) { 
  5013.                 $shrin_k = $this->shrin_k; 
  5014.             } else { 
  5015.                 $shrin_k = 1; 
  5016.             } 
  5017.             // UNDERLINE 
  5018.             if ($textvar & FD_UNDERLINE) { // mPDF 5.7.1    // mPDF 6 
  5019.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  5020.                 $c = $this->textparam['u-decoration']['color']; 
  5021.                 if ($this->FillColor != $c) { 
  5022.                     $sub .= ' ' . $c . ' '; 
  5023.                 } 
  5024.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  5025.                 $decorationfontkey = $this->textparam['u-decoration']['fontkey']; 
  5026.                 $decorationfontsize = $this->textparam['u-decoration']['fontsize'] / $shrin_k; 
  5027.                 if (isset($this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['ut']) && $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['ut']) { 
  5028.                     $ut = $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['ut'] / 1000 * $decorationfontsize; 
  5029.                 } else { 
  5030.                     $ut = 60 / 1000 * $decorationfontsize; 
  5031.                 } 
  5032.                 if (isset($this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['up']) && $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['up']) { 
  5033.                     $up = $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['up']; 
  5034.                 } else { 
  5035.                     $up = -100; 
  5036.                 } 
  5037.                 $adjusty = (-$up / 1000 * $decorationfontsize) + $ut / 2; 
  5038.                 $ubaseline = $glyphYorigin - $this->textparam['u-decoration']['baseline'] / $shrin_k; 
  5039.                 $olw = $this->LineWidth; 
  5040.                 $sub .=' ' . (sprintf(' %.3F w 0 j 0 J ', $ut * _MPDFK)); 
  5041.                 $sub .=' ' . $this->_dounderline($this->x + $dx, $this->y + $ubaseline + $adjusty, $txt, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  5042.                 $sub .=' ' . (sprintf(' %.3F w 2 j 2 J ', $olw * _MPDFK)); 
  5043.                 if ($this->FillColor != $c) { 
  5044.                     $sub .= ' ' . $this->FillColor . ' '; 
  5045.                 } 
  5046.             } 
  5047.  
  5048.             // STRIKETHROUGH 
  5049.             if ($textvar & FD_LINETHROUGH) { // mPDF 5.7.1    // mPDF 6 
  5050.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  5051.                 $c = $this->textparam['s-decoration']['color']; 
  5052.                 if ($this->FillColor != $c) { 
  5053.                     $sub .= ' ' . $c . ' '; 
  5054.                 } 
  5055.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  5056.                 $decorationfontkey = $this->textparam['s-decoration']['fontkey']; 
  5057.                 $decorationfontsize = $this->textparam['s-decoration']['fontsize'] / $shrin_k; 
  5058.                 // Use yStrikeoutSize from OS/2 if available 
  5059.                 if (isset($this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['strs']) && $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['strs']) { 
  5060.                     $ut = $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['strs'] / 1000 * $decorationfontsize; 
  5061.                 } 
  5062.                 // else use underlineThickness from post if available 
  5063.                 elseif (isset($this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['ut']) && $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['ut']) { 
  5064.                     $ut = $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['ut'] / 1000 * $decorationfontsize; 
  5065.                 } else { 
  5066.                     $ut = 50 / 1000 * $decorationfontsize; 
  5067.                 } 
  5068.                 // Use yStrikeoutPosition from OS/2 if available 
  5069.                 if (isset($this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['strp']) && $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['strp']) { 
  5070.                     $up = $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['strp']; 
  5071.                     $adjusty = (-$up / 1000 * $decorationfontsize); 
  5072.                 } 
  5073.                 // else use a fraction ($this->baselineS) of CapHeight 
  5074.                 else { 
  5075.                     if (isset($this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['desc']['CapHeight']) && $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['desc']['CapHeight']) { 
  5076.                         $ch = $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['desc']['CapHeight']; 
  5077.                     } else { 
  5078.                         $ch = 700; 
  5079.                     } 
  5080.                     $adjusty = (-$ch / 1000 * $decorationfontsize) * $this->baselineS; 
  5081.                 } 
  5082.  
  5083.                 $sbaseline = $glyphYorigin - $this->textparam['s-decoration']['baseline'] / $shrin_k; 
  5084.                 $olw = $this->LineWidth; 
  5085.                 $sub .=' ' . (sprintf(' %.3F w 0 j 0 J ', $ut * _MPDFK)); 
  5086.                 $sub .=' ' . $this->_dounderline($this->x + $dx, $this->y + $sbaseline + $adjusty, $txt, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  5087.                 $sub .=' ' . (sprintf(' %.3F w 2 j 2 J ', $olw * _MPDFK)); 
  5088.                 if ($this->FillColor != $c) { 
  5089.                     $sub .= ' ' . $this->FillColor . ' '; 
  5090.                 } 
  5091.             } 
  5092.  
  5093.             // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  5094.             // OVERLINE 
  5095.             if ($textvar & FD_OVERLINE) { // mPDF 5.7.1    // mPDF 6 
  5096.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  5097.                 $c = $this->textparam['o-decoration']['color']; 
  5098.                 if ($this->FillColor != $c) { 
  5099.                     $sub .= ' ' . $c . ' '; 
  5100.                 } 
  5101.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  5102.                 $decorationfontkey = $this->textparam['o-decoration']['fontkey'] / $shrin_k; 
  5103.                 $decorationfontsize = $this->textparam['o-decoration']['fontsize']; 
  5104.                 if (isset($this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['ut']) && $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['ut']) { 
  5105.                     $ut = $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['ut'] / 1000 * $decorationfontsize; 
  5106.                 } else { 
  5107.                     $ut = 60 / 1000 * $decorationfontsize; 
  5108.                 } 
  5109.                 if (isset($this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['desc']['CapHeight']) && $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['desc']['CapHeight']) { 
  5110.                     $ch = $this->fonts[$decorationfontkey]['desc']['CapHeight']; 
  5111.                 } else { 
  5112.                     $ch = 700; 
  5113.                 } 
  5114.                 $adjusty = (-$ch / 1000 * $decorationfontsize) * $this->baselineO; 
  5115.                 $obaseline = $glyphYorigin - $this->textparam['o-decoration']['baseline'] / $shrin_k; 
  5116.                 $olw = $this->LineWidth; 
  5117.                 $sub .=' ' . (sprintf(' %.3F w 0 j 0 J ', $ut * _MPDFK)); 
  5118.                 $sub .=' ' . $this->_dounderline($this->x + $dx, $this->y + $obaseline + $adjusty, $txt, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  5119.                 $sub .=' ' . (sprintf(' %.3F w 2 j 2 J ', $olw * _MPDFK)); 
  5120.                 if ($this->FillColor != $c) { 
  5121.                     $sub .= ' ' . $this->FillColor . ' '; 
  5122.                 } 
  5123.             } 
  5124.
