  5125.             // TEXT SHADOW 
  5126.             if ($this->textshadow) {  // First to process is last in CSS comma separated shadows 
  5127.                 foreach ($this->textshadow AS $ts) { 
  5128.                     $s .= ' q '; 
  5129.                     $s .= $this->SetTColor($ts['col'], true) . "\n"; 
  5130.                     if ($ts['col']{0} == 5 && ord($ts['col']{4}) < 100) { // RGBa 
  5131.                         $s .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($ts['col']{4}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  5132.                     } elseif ($ts['col']{0} == 6 && ord($ts['col']{5}) < 100) { // CMYKa 
  5133.                         $s .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($ts['col']{5}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  5134.                     } elseif ($ts['col']{0} == 1 && $ts['col']{2} == 1 && ord($ts['col']{3}) < 100) { // Gray 
  5135.                         $s .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($ts['col']{3}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  5136.                     } 
  5137.                     $s .= sprintf(' 1 0 0 1 %.4F %.4F cm', $ts['x'] * _MPDFK, -$ts['y'] * _MPDFK) . "\n"; 
  5138.                     $s .= $sub; 
  5139.                     $s .= ' Q '; 
  5140.                 } 
  5141.             } 
  5142.  
  5143.             $s .= $sub; 
  5144.  
  5145.             // COLOR 
  5146.             if ($this->ColorFlag) 
  5147.                 $s .=' Q'; 
  5148.  
  5149.             // LINK 
  5150.             if ($link != '') { 
  5151.                 $this->Link($this->x, $boxtop, $w, $boxheight, $link); 
  5152.             } 
  5153.         } 
  5154.         if ($s) 
  5155.             $this->_out($s); 
  5156.  
  5157.         // WORD SPACING 
  5158.         if ($this->ws && !$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  5159.             $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3F Tc ET', $this->charspacing)); 
  5160.         } 
  5161.         $this->lasth = $h; 
  5162.         if (strpos($txt, "\n") !== false) 
  5163.             $ln = 1; // cell recognizes \n from <BR> tag 
  5164.         if ($ln > 0) { 
  5165.             //Go to next line 
  5166.             $this->y += $h; 
  5167.             if ($ln == 1) { 
  5168.                 //Move to next line 
  5169.                 if ($currentx != 0) { 
  5170.                     $this->x = $currentx; 
  5171.                 } else { 
  5172.                     $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  5173.                 } 
  5174.             } 
  5175.         } else 
  5176.             $this->x+=$w; 
  5177.     } 
  5178.  
  5179.     function applyGPOSpdf($txt, $aix, $x, $y, $OTLdata, $textvar = 0) 
  5180.     { 
  5181.         // Generate PDF string 
  5182.         //============================== 
  5183.         if ((isset($this->CurrentFont['sip']) && $this->CurrentFont['sip']) || (isset($this->CurrentFont['smp']) && $this->CurrentFont['smp'])) { 
  5184.             $sipset = true; 
  5185.         } else { 
  5186.             $sipset = false; 
  5187.         } 
  5188.  
  5189.         if ($textvar & FC_SMALLCAPS) { 
  5190.             $smcaps = true; 
  5191.         } // IF SmallCaps using transformation, NOT OTL 
  5192.         else { 
  5193.             $smcaps = false; 
  5194.         } 
  5195.  
  5196.         if ($sipset) { 
  5197.             $fontid = $last_fontid = $original_fontid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][0]; 
  5198.         } else { 
  5199.             $fontid = $last_fontid = $original_fontid = $this->CurrentFont['i']; 
  5200.         } 
  5201.         $SmallCapsON = false;  // state: uppercase/not 
  5202.         $lastSmallCapsON = false; // state: uppercase/not 
  5203.         $last_fontsize = $fontsize = $this->FontSizePt; 
  5204.         $last_fontstretch = $fontstretch = 100; 
  5205.         $groupBreak = false; 
  5206.  
  5207.         $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($txt); 
  5208.  
  5209.         $GPOSinfo = (isset($OTLdata['GPOSinfo']) ? $OTLdata['GPOSinfo'] : array()); 
  5210.         $charspacing = ($this->charspacing * 1000 / $this->FontSizePt); 
  5211.         $wordspacing = ($this->ws * 1000 / $this->FontSizePt); 
  5212.  
  5213.         $XshiftBefore = 0; 
  5214.         $XshiftAfter = 0; 
  5215.         $lastYPlacement = 0; 
  5216.  
  5217.         if ($sipset) { 
  5218.             // mPDF 6  DELETED ******** 
  5219.             //        $txt= preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($this->aliasNbPg, '/').'/', chr(7), $txt);    // ? Need to adjust OTL info 
  5220.             //        $txt= preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($this->aliasNbPgGp, '/').'/', chr(8), $txt);    // ? Need to adjust OTL info 
  5221.             $tj = '<'; 
  5222.         } else { 
  5223.             $tj = '('; 
  5224.         } 
  5225.  
  5226.         for ($i = 0; $i < count($unicode); $i++) { 
  5227.             $c = $unicode[$i]; 
  5228.             $tx = ''; 
  5229.             $XshiftBefore = $XshiftAfter; 
  5230.             $XshiftAfter = 0; 
  5231.             $YPlacement = 0; 
  5232.             $groupBreak = false; 
  5233.             $kashida = 0; 
  5234.             if (!empty($OTLdata)) { 
  5235.                 // YPlacement from GPOS 
  5236.                 if (isset($GPOSinfo[$i]['YPlacement']) && $GPOSinfo[$i]['YPlacement']) { 
  5237.                     $YPlacement = $GPOSinfo[$i]['YPlacement'] * $this->FontSizePt / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  5238.                     $groupBreak = true; 
  5239.                 } 
  5240.                 // XPlacement from GPOS 
  5241.                 if (isset($GPOSinfo[$i]['XPlacement']) && $GPOSinfo[$i]['XPlacement']) { 
  5242.  
  5243.                     if (!isset($GPOSinfo[$i]['wDir']) || $GPOSinfo[$i]['wDir'] != 'RTL') { 
  5244.                         if (isset($GPOSinfo[$i]['BaseWidth'])) { 
  5245.                             $GPOSinfo[$i]['XPlacement'] -= $GPOSinfo[$i]['BaseWidth']; 
  5246.                         } 
  5247.                     } 
  5248.  
  5249.                     // Convert to PDF Text space (thousandths of a unit ); 
  5250.                     $XshiftBefore += $GPOSinfo[$i]['XPlacement'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  5251.                     $XshiftAfter += -$GPOSinfo[$i]['XPlacement'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  5252.                 } 
  5253.  
  5254.                 // Kashida from GPOS 
  5255.                 // Kashida is set as an absolute length value, but to adjust text needs to be converted to 
  5256.                 // font-related size 
  5257.                 if (isset($GPOSinfo[$i]['kashida_space']) && $GPOSinfo[$i]['kashida_space']) { 
  5258.                     $kashida = $GPOSinfo[$i]['kashida_space']; 
  5259.                 } 
  5260.  
  5261.                 if ($c == 32) { // word spacing 
  5262.                     $XshiftAfter += $wordspacing; 
  5263.                 } 
  5264.  
  5265.                 if (substr($OTLdata['group'], ($i + 1), 1) != 'M') { // Don't add inter-character spacing before Marks 
  5266.                     $XshiftAfter += $charspacing; 
  5267.                 } 
  5268.  
  5269.                 // ...applyGPOSpdf... 
  5270.                 // XAdvance from GPOS - Convert to PDF Text space (thousandths of a unit ); 
  5271.                 if (((isset($GPOSinfo[$i]['wDir']) && $GPOSinfo[$i]['wDir'] != 'RTL') || !isset($GPOSinfo[$i]['wDir'])) && isset($GPOSinfo[$i]['XAdvanceL']) && $GPOSinfo[$i]['XAdvanceL']) { 
  5272.                     $XshiftAfter += $GPOSinfo[$i]['XAdvanceL'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  5273.                 } elseif (isset($GPOSinfo[$i]['wDir']) && $GPOSinfo[$i]['wDir'] == 'RTL' && isset($GPOSinfo[$i]['XAdvanceR']) && $GPOSinfo[$i]['XAdvanceR']) { 
  5274.                     $XshiftAfter += $GPOSinfo[$i]['XAdvanceR'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  5275.                 } 
  5276.             } 
  5277.             // Character & Word spacing - if NOT OTL 
  5278.             else { 
  5279.                 $XshiftAfter += $charspacing; 
  5280.                 if ($c == 32) { 
  5281.                     $XshiftAfter += $wordspacing; 
  5282.                 } 
  5283.             } 
  5284.  
  5285.             // IF Kerning done using pairs rather than OTL 
  5286.             if ($textvar & FC_KERNING) { 
  5287.                 if ($i > 0 && isset($this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$unicode[($i - 1)]][$unicode[$i]])) { 
  5288.                     $XshiftBefore += $this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$unicode[($i - 1)]][$unicode[$i]]; 
  5289.                 } 
  5290.             } 
  5291.  
  5292.             if ($YPlacement != $lastYPlacement) { 
  5293.                 $groupBreak = true; 
  5294.             } 
  5295.  
  5296.             if ($XshiftBefore) {  // +ve value in PDF moves to the left 
  5297.                 // If Fontstretch is ongoing, need to adjust X adjustments because these will be stretched out. 
  5298.                 $XshiftBefore *= 100 / $last_fontstretch; 
  5299.                 if ($sipset) { 
  5300.                     $tj .= sprintf('>%d<', (-$XshiftBefore)); 
  5301.                 } else { 
  5302.                     $tj .= sprintf(')%d(', (-$XshiftBefore)); 
  5303.                 } 
  5304.             } 
  5305.  
  5306.             // Small-Caps 
  5307.             if ($smcaps) { 
  5308.                 if (isset($this->upperCase[$c])) { 
  5309.                     $c = $this->upperCase[$c]; 
  5310.                     //$this->CurrentFont['subset'][$this->upperCase[$c]] = $this->upperCase[$c];    // add the CAP to subset 
  5311.                     $SmallCapsON = true; 
  5312.                     // For $sipset 
  5313.                     if (!$lastSmallCapsON) {   // Turn ON SmallCaps 
  5314.                         $groupBreak = true; 
  5315.                         $fontstretch = $this->smCapsStretch; 
  5316.                         $fontsize = $this->FontSizePt * $this->smCapsScale; 
  5317.                     } 
  5318.                 } else { 
  5319.                     $SmallCapsON = false; 
  5320.                     if ($lastSmallCapsON) {  // Turn OFF SmallCaps 
  5321.                         $groupBreak = true; 
  5322.                         $fontstretch = 100; 
  5323.                         $fontsize = $this->FontSizePt; 
  5324.                     } 
  5325.                 } 
  5326.             } 
  5327.  
  5328.             // Prepare Text and Select Font ID 
  5329.             if ($sipset) { 
  5330.                 // mPDF 6  DELETED ******** 
  5331.                 //if ($c == 7 || $c == 8) { 
  5332.                 //    if ($original_fontid != $last_fontid) { 
  5333.                 //        $groupBreak = true; 
  5334.                 //        $fontid = $original_fontid; 
  5335.                 //    } 
  5336.                 //    if ($c == 7) { $tj .= $this->aliasNbPgHex; } 
  5337.                 //    else { $tj .= $this->aliasNbPgGpHex; } 
  5338.                 //    continue; 
  5339.                 //} 
  5340.                 for ($j = 0; $j < 99; $j++) { 
  5341.                     $init = array_search($c, $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$j]); 
  5342.                     if ($init !== false) { 
  5343.                         if ($this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$j] != $last_fontid) { 
  5344.                             $groupBreak = true; 
  5345.                             $fontid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$j]; 
  5346.                         } 
  5347.                         $tx = sprintf("%02s", strtoupper(dechex($init))); 
  5348.                         break; 
  5349.                     } elseif (count($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$j]) < 255) { 
  5350.                         $n = count($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$j]); 
  5351.                         $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$j][$n] = $c; 
  5352.                         if ($this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$j] != $last_fontid) { 
  5353.                             $groupBreak = true; 
  5354.                             $fontid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$j]; 
  5355.                         } 
  5356.                         $tx = sprintf("%02s", strtoupper(dechex($n))); 
  5357.                         break; 
  5358.                     } elseif (!isset($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][($j + 1)])) { 
  5359.                         $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][($j + 1)] = array(0 => 0); 
  5360.                         $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][($j + 1)] = count($this->fonts) + $this->extraFontSubsets + 1; 
  5361.                         $this->extraFontSubsets++; 
  5362.                     } 
  5363.                 } 
  5364.             } else { 
  5365.                 $tx = code2utf($c); 
  5366.                 if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  5367.                     $tx = utf8_decode($tx); 
  5368.                 } else { 
  5369.                     $tx = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($tx, false); 
  5370.                 } 
  5371.                 $tx = $this->_escape($tx); 
  5372.             } 
  5373.  
  5374.             // If any settings require a new Text Group 
  5375.             if ($groupBreak || $fontstretch != $last_fontstretch) { 
  5376.                 if ($sipset) { 
  5377.                     $tj .= '>] TJ '; 
  5378.                 } else { 
  5379.                     $tj .= ')] TJ '; 
  5380.                 } 
  5381.                 if ($fontid != $last_fontid || $fontsize != $last_fontsize) { 
  5382.                     $tj .= sprintf(' /F%d %.3F Tf ', $fontid, $fontsize); 
  5383.                 } 
  5384.                 if ($fontstretch != $last_fontstretch) { 
  5385.                     $tj .= sprintf('%d Tz ', $fontstretch); 
  5386.                 } 
  5387.                 if ($YPlacement != $lastYPlacement) { 
  5388.                     $tj .= sprintf('%.3F Ts ', $YPlacement); 
  5389.                 } 
  5390.                 if ($sipset) { 
  5391.                     $tj .= '[<'; 
  5392.                 } else { 
  5393.                     $tj .= '[('; 
  5394.                 } 
  5395.             } 
  5396.  
  5397.             // Output the code for the txt character 
  5398.             $tj .= $tx; 
  5399.             $lastSmallCapsON = $SmallCapsON; 
  5400.             $last_fontid = $fontid; 
  5401.             $last_fontsize = $fontsize; 
  5402.             $last_fontstretch = $fontstretch; 
  5403.  
  5404.             // Kashida 
  5405.             if ($kashida) { 
  5406.                 $c = 0x0640; // add the Tatweel U+0640 
  5407.                 if (isset($this->CurrentFont['subset'])) { 
  5408.                     $this->CurrentFont['subset'][$c] = $c; 
  5409.                 } 
  5410.                 $kashida *= 1000 / $this->FontSizePt; 
  5411.                 $tatw = $this->_getCharWidth($this->CurrentFont['cw'], 0x0640); 
  5412.  
  5413.                 // Get YPlacement from next Base character 
  5414.                 $nextbase = $i + 1; 
  5415.                 while ($OTLdata['group']{$nextbase} != 'C') { 
  5416.                     $nextbase++; 
  5417.                 } 
  5418.                 if (isset($GPOSinfo[$nextbase]) && isset($GPOSinfo[$nextbase]['YPlacement']) && $GPOSinfo[$nextbase]['YPlacement']) { 
  5419.                     $YPlacement = $GPOSinfo[$nextbase]['YPlacement'] * $this->FontSizePt / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  5420.                 } 
  5421.  
  5422.                 // Prepare Text and Select Font ID 
  5423.                 if ($sipset) { 
  5424.                     for ($j = 0; $j < 99; $j++) { 
  5425.                         $init = array_search($c, $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$j]); 
  5426.                         if ($init !== false) { 
  5427.                             if ($this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$j] != $last_fontid) { 
  5428.                                 $fontid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$j]; 
  5429.                             } 
  5430.                             $tx = sprintf("%02s", strtoupper(dechex($init))); 
  5431.                             break; 
  5432.                         } elseif (count($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$j]) < 255) { 
  5433.                             $n = count($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$j]); 
  5434.                             $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$j][$n] = $c; 
  5435.                             if ($this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$j] != $last_fontid) { 
  5436.                                 $fontid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$j]; 
  5437.                             } 
  5438.                             $tx = sprintf("%02s", strtoupper(dechex($n))); 
  5439.                             break; 
  5440.                         } elseif (!isset($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][($j + 1)])) { 
  5441.                             $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][($j + 1)] = array(0 => 0); 
  5442.                             $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][($j + 1)] = count($this->fonts) + $this->extraFontSubsets + 1; 
  5443.                             $this->extraFontSubsets++; 
  5444.                         } 
  5445.                     } 
  5446.                 } else { 
  5447.                     $tx = code2utf($c); 
  5448.                     $tx = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($tx, false); 
  5449.                     $tx = $this->_escape($tx); 
  5450.                 } 
  5451.  
  5452.                 if ($kashida > $tatw) { 
  5453.                     // Insert multiple tatweel characters, repositioning the last one to give correct total length 
  5454.                     $fontstretch = 100; 
  5455.                     $nt = intval($kashida / $tatw); 
  5456.                     $nudgeback = (($nt + 1) * $tatw) - $kashida; 
  5457.                     $optx = str_repeat($tx, $nt); 
  5458.                     if ($sipset) { 
  5459.                         $optx .= sprintf('>%d<', ($nudgeback)); 
  5460.                     } else { 
  5461.                         $optx .= sprintf(')%d(', ($nudgeback)); 
  5462.                     } 
  5463.                     $optx .= $tx; // #last 
  5464.                 } else { 
  5465.                     // Insert single tatweel character and use fontstretch to get correct length 
  5466.                     $fontstretch = ($kashida / $tatw) * 100; 
  5467.                     $optx = $tx; 
  5468.                 } 
  5469.  
  5470.                 if ($sipset) { 
  5471.                     $tj .= '>] TJ '; 
  5472.                 } else { 
  5473.                     $tj .= ')] TJ '; 
  5474.                 } 
  5475.                 if ($fontid != $last_fontid || $fontsize != $last_fontsize) { 
  5476.                     $tj .= sprintf(' /F%d %.3F Tf ', $fontid, $fontsize); 
  5477.                 } 
  5478.                 if ($fontstretch != $last_fontstretch) { 
  5479.                     $tj .= sprintf('%d Tz ', $fontstretch); 
  5480.                 } 
  5481.                 $tj .= sprintf('%.3F Ts ', $YPlacement); 
  5482.                 if ($sipset) { 
  5483.                     $tj .= '[<'; 
  5484.                 } else { 
  5485.                     $tj .= '[('; 
  5486.                 } 
  5487.  
  5488.                 // Output the code for the txt character(s) 
  5489.                 $tj .= $optx; 
  5490.                 $last_fontid = $fontid; 
  5491.                 $last_fontstretch = $fontstretch; 
  5492.                 $fontstretch = 100; 
  5493.             } 
  5494.  
  5495.             $lastYPlacement = $YPlacement; 
  5496.         } 
  5497.  
  5498.  
  5499.         // Finish up 
  5500.         if ($sipset) { 
  5501.             $tj .= '>'; 
  5502.             if ($XshiftAfter) { 
  5503.                 $tj .= sprintf('%d', (-$XshiftAfter)); 
  5504.             } 
  5505.             if ($last_fontid != $original_fontid) { 
  5506.                 $tj .= '] TJ '; 
  5507.                 $tj .= sprintf(' /F%d %.3F Tf ', $original_fontid, $fontsize); 
  5508.                 $tj .= '['; 
  5509.             } 
  5510.             $tj = preg_replace('/([^\\\])<>/', '\\1 ', $tj); 
  5511.         } else { 
  5512.             $tj .= ')'; 
  5513.             if ($XshiftAfter) { 
  5514.                 $tj .= sprintf('%d', (-$XshiftAfter)); 
  5515.             } 
  5516.             if ($last_fontid != $original_fontid) { 
  5517.                 $tj .= '] TJ '; 
  5518.                 $tj .= sprintf(' /F%d %.3F Tf ', $original_fontid, $fontsize); 
  5519.                 $tj .= '['; 
  5520.             } 
  5521.             $tj = preg_replace('/([^\\\])\(\)/', '\\1 ', $tj); 
  5522.         } 
  5523.  
  5524.  
  5525.         $s = sprintf(' BT ' . $aix . ' 0 Tc 0 Tw [%s] TJ ET ', $x, $y, $tj); 
  5526.  
  5527.         //echo $s."\n\n"; // exit; 
  5528.  
  5529.         return $s; 
  5530.     } 
  5531.  
  5532.     function _kern($txt, $mode, $aix, $x, $y) 
  5533.     { 
  5534.         if ($mode == 'MBTw') { // Multibyte requiring word spacing 
  5535.             $space = ' '; 
  5536.             //Convert string to UTF-16BE without BOM 
  5537.             $space = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($space, false); 
  5538.             $space = $this->_escape($space); 
  5539.             $s = sprintf(' BT ' . $aix, $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK); 
  5540.             $t = explode(' ', $txt); 
  5541.             for ($i = 0; $i < count($t); $i++) { 
  5542.                 $tx = $t[$i]; 
  5543.  
  5544.                 $tj = '('; 
  5545.                 $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($tx); 
  5546.                 for ($ti = 0; $ti < count($unicode); $ti++) { 
  5547.                     if ($ti > 0 && isset($this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$unicode[($ti - 1)]][$unicode[$ti]])) { 
  5548.                         $kern = -$this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$unicode[($ti - 1)]][$unicode[$ti]]; 
  5549.                         $tj .= sprintf(')%d(', $kern); 
  5550.                     } 
  5551.                     $tc = code2utf($unicode[$ti]); 
  5552.                     $tc = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($tc, false); 
  5553.                     $tj .= $this->_escape($tc); 
  5554.                 } 
  5555.                 $tj .= ')'; 
  5556.                 $s.=sprintf(' %.3F Tc [%s] TJ', $this->charspacing, $tj); 
  5557.  
  5558.  
  5559.                 if (($i + 1) < count($t)) { 
  5560.                     $s.=sprintf(' %.3F Tc (%s) Tj', $this->ws + $this->charspacing, $space); 
  5561.                 } 
  5562.             } 
  5563.             $s.=' ET '; 
  5564.         } elseif (!$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  5565.             $s = ''; 
  5566.             $tj = '('; 
  5567.             $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($txt); 
  5568.             for ($i = 0; $i < count($unicode); $i++) { 
  5569.                 if ($i > 0 && isset($this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$unicode[($i - 1)]][$unicode[$i]])) { 
  5570.                     $kern = -$this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$unicode[($i - 1)]][$unicode[$i]]; 
  5571.                     $tj .= sprintf(')%d(', $kern); 
  5572.                 } 
  5573.                 $tx = code2utf($unicode[$i]); 
  5574.                 $tx = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($tx, false); 
  5575.                 $tj .= $this->_escape($tx); 
  5576.             } 
  5577.             $tj .= ')'; 
  5578.             $s.=sprintf(' BT ' . $aix . ' [%s] TJ ET ', $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK, $tj); 
  5579.         } else { // CORE Font 
  5580.             $s = ''; 
  5581.             $tj = '('; 
  5582.             $l = strlen($txt); 
  5583.             for ($i = 0; $i < $l; $i++) { 
  5584.                 if ($i > 0 && isset($this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$txt[($i - 1)]][$txt[$i]])) { 
  5585.                     $kern = -$this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$txt[($i - 1)]][$txt[$i]]; 
  5586.                     $tj .= sprintf(')%d(', $kern); 
  5587.                 } 
  5588.                 $tj .= $this->_escape($txt[$i]); 
  5589.             } 
  5590.             $tj .= ')'; 
  5591.             $s.=sprintf(' BT ' . $aix . ' [%s] TJ ET ', $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK, $tj); 
  5592.         } 
  5593.  
  5594.         return $s; 
  5595.     } 
  5596.  
  5597.     function MultiCell($w, $h, $txt, $border = 0, $align = '', $fill = 0, $link = '', $directionality = 'ltr', $encoded = false, $OTLdata = false, $maxrows = false) 
  5598.     { 
  5599.         // maxrows is called from mpdfform->TEXTAREA 
  5600.         // Parameter (pre-)encoded - When called internally from form::textarea - mb_encoding already done and OTL - but not reverse RTL 
  5601.         if (!$encoded) { 
  5602.             $txt = $this->purify_utf8_text($txt); 
  5603.             if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) { 
  5604.                 $txt = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txt); 
  5605.             } 
  5606.             if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  5607.                 $txt = mb_convert_encoding($txt, $this->mb_enc, 'UTF-8'); 
  5608.             } 
  5609.             if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregRTLchars . "])/u", $txt)) { 
  5610.                 $this->biDirectional = true; 
  5611.             } // *OTL* 
  5612.             /** -- OTL -- */ 
  5613.             $OTLdata = array(); 
  5614.             // Use OTL OpenType Table Layout - GSUB & GPOS 
  5615.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  5616.                 $txt = $this->otl->applyOTL($txt, $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']); 
  5617.                 $OTLdata = $this->otl->OTLdata; 
  5618.             } 
  5619.             if ($directionality == 'rtl' || $this->biDirectional) { 
  5620.                 if (!isset($OTLdata)) { 
  5621.                     $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($txt, false); 
  5622.                     $is_strong = false; 
  5623.                     $this->getBasicOTLdata($OTLdata, $unicode, $is_strong); 
  5624.                 } 
  5625.             } 
  5626.             /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  5627.         } 
  5628.         if (!$align) { 
  5629.             $align = $this->defaultAlign; 
  5630.         } 
  5631.  
  5632.         //Output text with automatic or explicit line breaks 
  5633.         $cw = &$this->CurrentFont['cw']; 
  5634.         if ($w == 0) 
  5635.             $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  5636.  
  5637.         $wmax = ($w - ($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR)); 
  5638.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  5639.             $s = str_replace("\r", '', $txt); 
  5640.             $nb = strlen($s); 
  5641.             while ($nb > 0 and $s[$nb - 1] == "\n") 
  5642.                 $nb--; 
  5643.         } else { 
  5644.             $s = str_replace("\r", '', $txt); 
  5645.             $nb = mb_strlen($s, $this->mb_enc); 
  5646.             while ($nb > 0 and mb_substr($s, $nb - 1, 1, $this->mb_enc) == "\n") 
  5647.                 $nb--; 
  5648.         } 
  5649.         $b = 0; 
  5650.         if ($border) { 
  5651.             if ($border == 1) { 
  5652.                 $border = 'LTRB'; 
  5653.                 $b = 'LRT'; 
  5654.                 $b2 = 'LR'; 
  5655.             } else { 
  5656.                 $b2 = ''; 
  5657.                 if (is_int(strpos($border, 'L'))) 
  5658.                     $b2.='L'; 
  5659.                 if (is_int(strpos($border, 'R'))) 
  5660.                     $b2.='R'; 
  5661.                 $b = is_int(strpos($border, 'T')) ? $b2 . 'T' : $b2; 
  5662.             } 
  5663.         } 
  5664.         $sep = -1; 
  5665.         $i = 0; 
  5666.         $j = 0; 
  5667.         $l = 0; 
  5668.         $ns = 0; 
  5669.         $nl = 1; 
  5670.  
  5671.         $rows = 0; 
  5672.         $start_y = $this->y; 
  5673.  
  5674.         if (!$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  5675.             $inclCursive = false; 
  5676.             if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregCURSchars . "])/u", $s)) { 
  5677.                 $inclCursive = true; 
  5678.             } 
  5679.             while ($i < $nb) { 
  5680.                 //Get next character 
  5681.                 $c = mb_substr($s, $i, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  5682.                 if ($c == "\n") { 
  5683.                     //Explicit line break 
  5684.                     // WORD SPACING 
  5685.                     $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  5686.                     $tmp = rtrim(mb_substr($s, $j, $i - $j, $this->mb_enc)); 
  5687.                     $tmpOTLdata = false; 
  5688.                     /** -- OTL -- */ 
  5689.                     if (isset($OTLdata)) { 
  5690.                         $tmpOTLdata = $this->otl->sliceOTLdata($OTLdata, $j, $i - $j); 
  5691.                         $this->otl->trimOTLdata($tmpOTLdata, false, true); 
  5692.                         $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp, $directionality, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5693.                     } 
  5694.                     /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  5695.                     $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmp, $b, 2, $align, $fill, $link, 0, 0, 0, 'M', 0, false, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5696.                     if ($maxrows != false && isset($this->mpdfform) && ($this->y - $start_y) / $h > $maxrows) { 
  5697.                         return false; 
  5698.                     } 
  5699.                     $i++; 
  5700.                     $sep = -1; 
  5701.                     $j = $i; 
  5702.                     $l = 0; 
  5703.                     $ns = 0; 
  5704.                     $nl++; 
  5705.                     if ($border and $nl == 2) 
  5706.                         $b = $b2; 
  5707.                     continue; 
  5708.                 } 
  5709.                 if ($c == " ") { 
  5710.                     $sep = $i; 
  5711.                     $ls = $l; 
  5712.                     $ns++; 
  5713.                 } 
  5714.  
  5715.                 $l += $this->GetCharWidthNonCore($c); 
  5716.  
  5717.                 if ($l > $wmax) { 
  5718.                     //Automatic line break 
  5719.                     if ($sep == -1) { // Only one word 
  5720.                         if ($i == $j) 
  5721.                             $i++; 
  5722.                         // WORD SPACING 
  5723.                         $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  5724.                         $tmp = rtrim(mb_substr($s, $j, $i - $j, $this->mb_enc)); 
  5725.                         $tmpOTLdata = false; 
  5726.                         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  5727.                         if (isset($OTLdata)) { 
  5728.                             $tmpOTLdata = $this->otl->sliceOTLdata($OTLdata, $j, $i - $j); 
  5729.                             $this->otl->trimOTLdata($tmpOTLdata, false, true); 
  5730.                             $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp, $directionality, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5731.                         } 
  5732.                         /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  5733.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmp, $b, 2, $align, $fill, $link, 0, 0, 0, 'M', 0, false, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5734.                     } else { 
  5735.                         $tmp = rtrim(mb_substr($s, $j, $sep - $j, $this->mb_enc)); 
  5736.                         $tmpOTLdata = false; 
  5737.                         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  5738.                         if (isset($OTLdata)) { 
  5739.                             $tmpOTLdata = $this->otl->sliceOTLdata($OTLdata, $j, $sep - $j); 
  5740.                             $this->otl->trimOTLdata($tmpOTLdata, false, true); 
  5741.                         } 
  5742.                         /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  5743.                         if ($align == 'J') { 
  5744.                             ////////////////////////////////////////// 
  5745.                             // JUSTIFY J using Unicode fonts (Word spacing doesn't work) 
  5746.                             // WORD SPACING UNICODE 
  5747.                             // Change NON_BREAKING SPACE to spaces so they are 'spaced' properly 
  5748.                             $tmp = str_replace(chr(194) . chr(160), chr(32), $tmp); 
  5749.                             $len_ligne = $this->GetStringWidth($tmp, false, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5750.                             $nb_carac = mb_strlen($tmp, $this->mb_enc); 
  5751.                             $nb_spaces = mb_substr_count($tmp, ' ', $this->mb_enc); 
  5752.                             // Take off number of Marks 
  5753.                             // Use GPOS OTL 
  5754.                             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && ($this->CurrentFont['useOTL'])) { 
  5755.                                 if (isset($tmpOTLdata['group']) && $tmpOTLdata['group']) { 
  5756.                                     $nb_carac -= substr_count($tmpOTLdata['group'], 'M'); 
  5757.                                 } 
  5758.                             } 
  5759.  
  5760.                             list($charspacing, $ws, $kashida) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac, $nb_spaces, ((($wmax) - $len_ligne) * _MPDFK), $inclCursive, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5761.                             $this->SetSpacing($charspacing, $ws); 
  5762.                             ////////////////////////////////////////// 
  5763.                         } 
  5764.                         if (isset($OTLdata)) { 
  5765.                             $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp, $directionality, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5766.                         } 
  5767.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmp, $b, 2, $align, $fill, $link, 0, 0, 0, 'M', 0, false, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5768.                         $i = $sep + 1; 
  5769.                     } 
  5770.                     if ($maxrows != false && isset($this->mpdfform) && ($this->y - $start_y) / $h > $maxrows) { 
  5771.                         return false; 
  5772.                     } 
  5773.                     $sep = -1; 
  5774.                     $j = $i; 
  5775.                     $l = 0; 
  5776.                     $ns = 0; 
  5777.                     $nl++; 
  5778.                     if ($border and $nl == 2) 
  5779.                         $b = $b2; 
  5780.                 } else 
  5781.                     $i++; 
  5782.             } 
  5783.             //Last chunk 
  5784.             // WORD SPACING 
  5785.  
  5786.             $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  5787.         } 
  5788.  
  5789.  
  5790.         else { 
  5791.  
  5792.             while ($i < $nb) { 
  5793.                 //Get next character 
  5794.                 $c = $s[$i]; 
  5795.                 if ($c == "\n") { 
  5796.                     //Explicit line break 
  5797.                     // WORD SPACING 
  5798.                     $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  5799.                     $this->Cell($w, $h, substr($s, $j, $i - $j), $b, 2, $align, $fill, $link); 
  5800.                     if ($maxrows != false && isset($this->mpdfform) && ($this->y - $start_y) / $h > $maxrows) { 
  5801.                         return false; 
  5802.                     } 
  5803.                     $i++; 
  5804.                     $sep = -1; 
  5805.                     $j = $i; 
  5806.                     $l = 0; 
  5807.                     $ns = 0; 
  5808.                     $nl++; 
  5809.                     if ($border and $nl == 2) 
  5810.                         $b = $b2; 
  5811.                     continue; 
  5812.                 } 
  5813.                 if ($c == " ") { 
  5814.                     $sep = $i; 
  5815.                     $ls = $l; 
  5816.                     $ns++; 
  5817.                 } 
  5818.  
  5819.                 $l += $this->GetCharWidthCore($c); 
  5820.                 if ($l > $wmax) { 
  5821.                     //Automatic line break 
  5822.                     if ($sep == -1) { 
  5823.                         if ($i == $j) 
  5824.                             $i++; 
  5825.                         // WORD SPACING 
  5826.                         $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  5827.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, substr($s, $j, $i - $j), $b, 2, $align, $fill, $link); 
  5828.                     } 
  5829.                     else { 
  5830.                         if ($align == 'J') { 
  5831.                             $tmp = rtrim(substr($s, $j, $sep - $j)); 
  5832.                             ////////////////////////////////////////// 
  5833.                             // JUSTIFY J using Unicode fonts (Word spacing doesn't work) 
  5834.                             // WORD SPACING NON_UNICODE/CJK 
  5835.                             // Change NON_BREAKING SPACE to spaces so they are 'spaced' properly 
  5836.                             $tmp = str_replace(chr(160), chr(32), $tmp); 
  5837.                             $len_ligne = $this->GetStringWidth($tmp); 
  5838.                             $nb_carac = strlen($tmp); 
  5839.                             $nb_spaces = substr_count($tmp, ' '); 
  5840.                             $tmpOTLdata = array(); 
  5841.                             list($charspacing, $ws, $kashida) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac, $nb_spaces, ((($wmax) - $len_ligne) * _MPDFK), false, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5842.                             $this->SetSpacing($charspacing, $ws); 
  5843.                             ////////////////////////////////////////// 
  5844.                         } 
  5845.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, substr($s, $j, $sep - $j), $b, 2, $align, $fill, $link); 
  5846.                         $i = $sep + 1; 
  5847.                     } 
  5848.                     if ($maxrows != false && isset($this->mpdfform) && ($this->y - $start_y) / $h > $maxrows) { 
  5849.                         return false; 
  5850.                     } 
  5851.                     $sep = -1; 
  5852.                     $j = $i; 
  5853.                     $l = 0; 
  5854.                     $ns = 0; 
  5855.                     $nl++; 
  5856.                     if ($border and $nl == 2) 
  5857.                         $b = $b2; 
  5858.                 } else 
  5859.                     $i++; 
  5860.             } 
  5861.             //Last chunk 
  5862.             // WORD SPACING 
  5863.  
  5864.             $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  5865.         } 
  5866.         //Last chunk 
  5867.         if ($border and is_int(strpos($border, 'B'))) 
  5868.             $b.='B'; 
  5869.         if (!$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  5870.             $tmp = rtrim(mb_substr($s, $j, $i - $j, $this->mb_enc)); 
  5871.             $tmpOTLdata = false; 
  5872.             /** -- OTL -- */ 
  5873.             if (isset($OTLdata)) { 
  5874.                 $tmpOTLdata = $this->otl->sliceOTLdata($OTLdata, $j, $i - $j); 
  5875.                 $this->otl->trimOTLdata($tmpOTLdata, false, true); 
  5876.                 $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp, $directionality, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5877.             } 
  5878.             /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  5879.             $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmp, $b, 2, $align, $fill, $link, 0, 0, 0, 'M', 0, false, $tmpOTLdata); 
  5880.         } else { 
  5881.             $this->Cell($w, $h, substr($s, $j, $i - $j), $b, 2, $align, $fill, $link); 
  5882.         } 
  5883.         $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  5884.     } 
  5885.  
  5886.     /** -- DIRECTW -- */ 
  5887.  
  5888.     function Write($h, $txt, $currentx = 0, $link = '', $directionality = 'ltr', $align = '') 
  5889.     { 
  5890.         if (!class_exists('directw', false)) { 
  5891.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/directw.php'); 
  5892.         } 
  5893.         if (empty($this->directw)) { 
  5894.             $this->directw = new directw($this); 
  5895.         } 
  5896.         $this->directw->Write($h, $txt, $currentx, $link, $directionality, $align); 
  5897.     } 
  5898.  
  5899.     /** -- END DIRECTW -- */ 
  5900.  
  5901.  
  5902.     /** -- HTML-CSS -- */ 
  5903.  
  5904.     function saveInlineProperties() 
  5905.     { 
  5906.         $saved = array(); 
  5907.         $saved['family'] = $this->FontFamily; 
  5908.         $saved['style'] = $this->FontStyle; 
  5909.         $saved['sizePt'] = $this->FontSizePt; 
  5910.         $saved['size'] = $this->FontSize; 
  5911.         $saved['HREF'] = $this->HREF; 
  5912.         $saved['textvar'] = $this->textvar; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  5913.         $saved['OTLtags'] = $this->OTLtags; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  5914.         $saved['textshadow'] = $this->textshadow; 
  5915.         $saved['linewidth'] = $this->LineWidth; 
  5916.         $saved['drawcolor'] = $this->DrawColor; 
  5917.         $saved['textparam'] = $this->textparam; 
  5918.         $saved['lSpacingCSS'] = $this->lSpacingCSS; 
  5919.         $saved['wSpacingCSS'] = $this->wSpacingCSS; 
  5920.         $saved['I'] = $this->I; 
  5921.         $saved['B'] = $this->B; 
  5922.         $saved['colorarray'] = $this->colorarray; 
  5923.         $saved['bgcolorarray'] = $this->spanbgcolorarray; 
  5924.         $saved['border'] = $this->spanborddet; 
  5925.         $saved['color'] = $this->TextColor; 
  5926.         $saved['bgcolor'] = $this->FillColor; 
  5927.         $saved['lang'] = $this->currentLang; 
  5928.         $saved['fontLanguageOverride'] = $this->fontLanguageOverride; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  5929.         $saved['display_off'] = $this->inlineDisplayOff; 
  5930.  
  5931.         return $saved; 
  5932.     } 
  5933.  
  5934.     function restoreInlineProperties(&$saved) 
  5935.     { 
  5936.         $FontFamily = $saved['family']; 
  5937.         $this->FontStyle = $saved['style']; 
  5938.         $this->FontSizePt = $saved['sizePt']; 
  5939.         $this->FontSize = $saved['size']; 
  5940.  
  5941.         $this->currentLang = $saved['lang']; 
  5942.         $this->fontLanguageOverride = $saved['fontLanguageOverride']; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  5943.  
  5944.         $this->ColorFlag = ($this->FillColor != $this->TextColor); //Restore ColorFlag as well 
  5945.  
  5946.         $this->HREF = $saved['HREF']; 
  5947.         $this->textvar = $saved['textvar']; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  5948.         $this->OTLtags = $saved['OTLtags']; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  5949.         $this->textshadow = $saved['textshadow']; 
  5950.         $this->LineWidth = $saved['linewidth']; 
  5951.         $this->DrawColor = $saved['drawcolor']; 
  5952.         $this->textparam = $saved['textparam']; 
  5953.         $this->inlineDisplayOff = $saved['display_off']; 
  5954.  
  5955.         $this->lSpacingCSS = $saved['lSpacingCSS']; 
  5956.         if (($this->lSpacingCSS || $this->lSpacingCSS === '0') && strtoupper($this->lSpacingCSS) != 'NORMAL') { 
  5957.             $this->fixedlSpacing = $this->ConvertSize($this->lSpacingCSS, $this->FontSize); 
  5958.         } else { 
  5959.             $this->fixedlSpacing = false; 
  5960.         } 
  5961.         $this->wSpacingCSS = $saved['wSpacingCSS']; 
  5962.         if ($this->wSpacingCSS && strtoupper($this->wSpacingCSS) != 'NORMAL') { 
  5963.             $this->minwSpacing = $this->ConvertSize($this->wSpacingCSS, $this->FontSize); 
  5964.         } else { 
  5965.             $this->minwSpacing = 0; 
  5966.         } 
  5967.  
  5968.         $this->SetFont($FontFamily, $saved['style'], $saved['sizePt'], false); 
  5969.  
  5970.         $this->currentfontstyle = $saved['style']; 
  5971.         $this->currentfontsize = $saved['sizePt']; 
  5972.         $this->SetStylesArray(array('B' => $saved['B'], 'I' => $saved['I'])); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  5973.  
  5974.         $this->TextColor = $saved['color']; 
  5975.         $this->FillColor = $saved['bgcolor']; 
  5976.         $this->colorarray = $saved['colorarray']; 
  5977.         $cor = $saved['colorarray']; 
  5978.         if ($cor) 
  5979.             $this->SetTColor($cor); 
  5980.         $this->spanbgcolorarray = $saved['bgcolorarray']; 
  5981.         $cor = $saved['bgcolorarray']; 
  5982.         if ($cor) 
  5983.             $this->SetFColor($cor); 
  5984.         $this->spanborddet = $saved['border']; 
  5985.     } 
  5986.  
  5987.     // Used when ColActive for tables - updated to return first block with background fill OR borders 
  5988.     function GetFirstBlockFill() 
  5989.     { 
  5990.         // Returns the first blocklevel that uses a bgcolor fill 
  5991.         $startfill = 0; 
  5992.         for ($i = 1; $i <= $this->blklvl; $i++) { 
  5993.             if ($this->blk[$i]['bgcolor'] || $this->blk[$i]['border_left']['w'] || $this->blk[$i]['border_right']['w'] || $this->blk[$i]['border_top']['w'] || $this->blk[$i]['border_bottom']['w']) { 
  5994.                 $startfill = $i; 
  5995.                 break; 
  5996.             } 
  5997.         } 
  5998.         return $startfill; 
  5999.     } 
  6000.  
  6001.     //-------------------------FLOWING BLOCK------------------------------------// 
  6002.     //The following functions were originally written by Damon Kohler           // 
  6003.     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------// 
  6004.  
  6005.     function saveFont() 
  6006.     { 
  6007.         $saved = array(); 
  6008.         $saved['family'] = $this->FontFamily; 
  6009.         $saved['style'] = $this->FontStyle; 
  6010.         $saved['sizePt'] = $this->FontSizePt; 
  6011.         $saved['size'] = $this->FontSize; 
  6012.         $saved['curr'] = &$this->CurrentFont; 
  6013.         $saved['lang'] = $this->currentLang; // mPDF 6 
  6014.         $saved['color'] = $this->TextColor; 
  6015.         $saved['spanbgcolor'] = $this->spanbgcolor; 
  6016.         $saved['spanbgcolorarray'] = $this->spanbgcolorarray; 
  6017.         $saved['bord'] = $this->spanborder; 
  6018.         $saved['border'] = $this->spanborddet; 
  6019.         $saved['HREF'] = $this->HREF; 
  6020.         $saved['textvar'] = $this->textvar; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6021.         $saved['textshadow'] = $this->textshadow; 
  6022.         $saved['linewidth'] = $this->LineWidth; 
  6023.         $saved['drawcolor'] = $this->DrawColor; 
  6024.         $saved['textparam'] = $this->textparam; 
  6025.         $saved['ReqFontStyle'] = $this->ReqFontStyle; 
  6026.         $saved['fixedlSpacing'] = $this->fixedlSpacing; 
  6027.         $saved['minwSpacing'] = $this->minwSpacing; 
  6028.         return $saved; 
  6029.     } 
  6030.  
  6031.     function restoreFont(&$saved, $write = true) 
  6032.     { 
  6033.         if (!isset($saved) || empty($saved)) 
  6034.             return; 
  6035.  
  6036.         $this->FontFamily = $saved['family']; 
  6037.         $this->FontStyle = $saved['style']; 
  6038.         $this->FontSizePt = $saved['sizePt']; 
  6039.         $this->FontSize = $saved['size']; 
  6040.         $this->CurrentFont = &$saved['curr']; 
  6041.         $this->currentLang = $saved['lang']; // mPDF 6 
  6042.         $this->TextColor = $saved['color']; 
  6043.         $this->spanbgcolor = $saved['spanbgcolor']; 
  6044.         $this->spanbgcolorarray = $saved['spanbgcolorarray']; 
  6045.         $this->spanborder = $saved['bord']; 
  6046.         $this->spanborddet = $saved['border']; 
  6047.         $this->ColorFlag = ($this->FillColor != $this->TextColor); //Restore ColorFlag as well 
  6048.         $this->HREF = $saved['HREF']; 
  6049.         $this->fixedlSpacing = $saved['fixedlSpacing']; 
  6050.         $this->minwSpacing = $saved['minwSpacing']; 
  6051.         $this->textvar = $saved['textvar'];  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6052.         $this->textshadow = $saved['textshadow']; 
  6053.         $this->LineWidth = $saved['linewidth']; 
  6054.         $this->DrawColor = $saved['drawcolor']; 
  6055.         $this->textparam = $saved['textparam']; 
  6056.         if ($write) { 
  6057.             $this->SetFont($saved['family'], $saved['style'], $saved['sizePt'], true, true); // force output 
  6058.             $fontout = (sprintf('BT /F%d %.3F Tf ET', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt)); 
  6059.             if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] != $fontout) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']))) { 
  6060.                 $this->_out($fontout); 
  6061.             } 
  6062.             $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] = $fontout; 
  6063.         } else 
  6064.             $this->SetFont($saved['family'], $saved['style'], $saved['sizePt'], false); 
  6065.         $this->ReqFontStyle = $saved['ReqFontStyle']; 
  6066.     } 
  6067.  
  6068.     function newFlowingBlock($w, $h, $a = '', $is_table = false, $blockstate = 0, $newblock = true, $blockdir = 'ltr', $table_draft = false) 
  6069.     { 
  6070.         if (!$a) { 
  6071.             if ($blockdir == 'rtl') { 
  6072.                 $a = 'R'; 
  6073.             } else { 
  6074.                 $a = 'L'; 
  6075.             } 
  6076.         } 
  6077.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['width'] = ($w * _MPDFK); 
  6078.         // line height in user units 
  6079.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['is_table'] = $is_table; 
  6080.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['table_draft'] = $table_draft; 
  6081.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['height'] = $h; 
  6082.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['lineCount'] = 0; 
  6083.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['align'] = $a; 
  6084.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['font'] = array(); 
  6085.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['content'] = array(); 
  6086.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['contentB'] = array(); 
  6087.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['contentWidth'] = 0; 
  6088.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['blockstate'] = $blockstate; 
  6089.  
  6090.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['newblock'] = $newblock; 
  6091.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['valign'] = 'M'; 
  6092.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['blockdir'] = $blockdir; 
  6093.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['cOTLdata'] = array(); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6094.         $this->flowingBlockAttr['lastBidiText'] = ''; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6095.         if (!empty($this->otl)) { 
  6096.             $this->otl->lastBidiStrongType = ''; 
  6097.         } // *OTL* 
  6098.     } 
  6099.  
  6100.     function finishFlowingBlock($endofblock = false, $next = '') 
  6101.     { 
  6102.         $currentx = $this->x; 
  6103.         //prints out the last chunk 
  6104.         $is_table = $this->flowingBlockAttr['is_table']; 
  6105.         $table_draft = $this->flowingBlockAttr['table_draft']; 
  6106.         $maxWidth = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['width']; 
  6107.         $stackHeight = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['height']; 
  6108.         $align = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['align']; 
  6109.         $content = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['content']; 
  6110.         $contentB = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['contentB']; 
  6111.         $font = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['font']; 
  6112.         $contentWidth = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['contentWidth']; 
  6113.         $lineCount = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['lineCount']; 
  6114.         $valign = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['valign']; 
  6115.         $blockstate = $this->flowingBlockAttr['blockstate']; 
  6116.  
  6117.         $cOTLdata = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['cOTLdata']; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6118.         $newblock = $this->flowingBlockAttr['newblock']; 
  6119.         $blockdir = $this->flowingBlockAttr['blockdir']; 
  6120.  
  6121.         // *********** BLOCK BACKGROUND COLOR *****************// 
  6122.         if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolor'] && !$is_table) { 
  6123.             $fill = 0; 
  6124.         } else { 
  6125.             $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  6126.             $fill = 0; 
  6127.         } 
  6128.  
  6129.         $hanger = ''; 
  6130.         // Always right trim! 
  6131.         // Right trim last content and adjust width if needed to justify (later) 
  6132.         if (isset($content[count($content) - 1]) && preg_match('/[ ]+$/', $content[count($content) - 1], $m)) { 
  6133.             $strip = strlen($m[0]); 
  6134.             $content[count($content) - 1] = substr($content[count($content) - 1], 0, (strlen($content[count($content) - 1]) - $strip)); 
  6135.             /** -- OTL -- */ 
  6136.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  6137.                 $this->otl->trimOTLdata($cOTLdata[count($cOTLdata) - 1], false, true); 
  6138.             } 
  6139.             /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  6140.         } 
  6141.  
  6142.         // the amount of space taken up so far in user units 
  6143.         $usedWidth = 0; 
  6144.  
  6145.         // COLS 
  6146.         $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  6147.  
  6148.         if ($this->ColActive && !$is_table) { 
  6149.             $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  6150.         } // *COLUMNS* 
  6151.         // Print out each chunk 
  6152.  
  6153.         /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  6154.         if ($is_table) { 
  6155.             $ipaddingL = 0; 
  6156.             $ipaddingR = 0; 
  6157.             $paddingL = 0; 
  6158.             $paddingR = 0; 
  6159.         } else { 
  6160.             /** -- END TABLES -- */ 
  6161.             $ipaddingL = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left']; 
  6162.             $ipaddingR = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right']; 
  6163.             $paddingL = ($ipaddingL * _MPDFK); 
  6164.             $paddingR = ($ipaddingR * _MPDFK); 
  6165.             $this->cMarginL = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w']; 
  6166.             $this->cMarginR = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['w']; 
  6167.  
  6168.             // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV 
  6169.             $fpaddingR = 0; 
  6170.             $fpaddingL = 0; 
  6171.             /** -- CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  6172.             if (count($this->floatDivs)) { 
  6173.                 list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl); 
  6174.                 if ($r_exists) { 
  6175.                     $fpaddingR = $r_width; 
  6176.                 } 
  6177.                 if ($l_exists) { 
  6178.                     $fpaddingL = $l_width; 
  6179.                 } 
  6180.             } 
  6181.             /** -- END CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  6182.  
  6183.             $usey = $this->y + 0.002; 
  6184.             if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && ($lineCount == 0)) { 
  6185.                 $usey += $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  6186.             } 
  6187.             /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  6188.             // If float exists at this level 
  6189.             if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['R']['skipline']) { 
  6190.                 $fpaddingR += $this->floatmargins['R']['w']; 
  6191.             } 
  6192.             if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['L']['skipline']) { 
  6193.                 $fpaddingL += $this->floatmargins['L']['w']; 
  6194.             } 
  6195.             /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  6196.         } // *TABLES* 
  6197.  
  6198.  
  6199.         $lineBox = array(); 
  6200.  
  6201.         $this->_setInlineBlockHeights($lineBox, $stackHeight, $content, $font, $is_table); 
  6202.  
  6203.         if ($is_table && count($content) == 0) { 
  6204.             $stackHeight = 0; 
  6205.         } 
  6206.  
  6207.         if ($table_draft) { 
  6208.             $this->y += $stackHeight; 
  6209.             $this->objectbuffer = array(); 
  6210.             return 0; 
  6211.         } 
  6212.  
  6213.         // While we're at it, check if contains cursive text 
  6214.         // Change NBSP to SPACE. 
  6215.         // Re-calculate contentWidth 
  6216.         $contentWidth = 0; 
  6217.  
  6218.         foreach ($content as $k => $chunk) { 
  6219.             $this->restoreFont($font[$k], false); 
  6220.             if (!isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) || (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && !$this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
  6221.                 // Soft Hyphens chr(173) 
  6222.                 if (!$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  6223.                     /** -- OTL -- */ 
  6224.                     // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6225.                     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  6226.                         $this->otl->removeChar($chunk, $cOTLdata[$k], "\xc2\xad"); 
  6227.                         $this->otl->replaceSpace($chunk, $cOTLdata[$k]); 
  6228.                         $content[$k] = $chunk; 
  6229.                     } 
  6230.                     /** -- END OTL -- */ else {  // *OTL* 
  6231.                         $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace("\xc2\xad", '', $chunk); 
  6232.                         $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace(chr(194) . chr(160), chr(32), $chunk); 
  6233.                     } // *OTL* 
  6234.                 } elseif ($this->FontFamily != 'csymbol' && $this->FontFamily != 'czapfdingbats') { 
  6235.                     $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace(chr(173), '', $chunk); 
  6236.                     $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace(chr(160), chr(32), $chunk); 
  6237.                 } 
  6238.                 $contentWidth += $this->GetStringWidth($chunk, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$k]) ? $cOTLdata[$k] : false), $this->textvar) * _MPDFK; 
  6239.             } elseif (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]) { 
  6240.                 // LIST MARKERS    // mPDF 6  Lists 
  6241.                 if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'image' && isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarker']) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarker'] && $this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarkerposition'] == 'outside') { 
  6242.                     // do nothing 
  6243.                 } else { 
  6244.                     $contentWidth += $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-WIDTH'] * _MPDFK; 
  6245.                 } 
  6246.             } 
  6247.         } 
  6248.  
  6249.         if (isset($font[count($font) - 1])) { 
  6250.             $lastfontreqstyle = (isset($font[count($font) - 1]['ReqFontStyle']) ? $font[count($font) - 1]['ReqFontStyle'] : ''); 
  6251.             $lastfontstyle = (isset($font[count($font) - 1]['style']) ? $font[count($font) - 1]['style'] : ''); 
  6252.         } else { 
  6253.             $lastfontreqstyle = null; 
  6254.             $lastfontstyle = null; 
  6255.         } 
  6256.         if ($blockdir == 'ltr' && strpos($lastfontreqstyle, "I") !== false && strpos($lastfontstyle, "I") === false) { // Artificial italic 
  6257.             $lastitalic = $this->FontSize * 0.15 * _MPDFK; 
  6258.         } else { 
  6259.             $lastitalic = 0; 
  6260.         } 
  6261.  
  6262.         // Get PAGEBREAK TO TEST for height including the bottom border/padding 
  6263.         $check_h = max($this->divheight, $stackHeight); 
  6264.  
  6265.         // This fixes a proven bug... 
  6266.         if ($endofblock && $newblock && $blockstate == 0 && !$content) { 
  6267.             $check_h = 0; 
  6268.         } 
  6269.         // but ? needs to fix potentially more widespread... 
  6270.         //    if (!$content) {  $check_h = 0; } 
  6271.  
  6272.         if ($this->blklvl > 0 && !$is_table) { 
  6273.             if ($endofblock && $blockstate > 1) { 
  6274.                 if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['page_break_after_avoid']) { 
  6275.                     $check_h += $stackHeight; 
  6276.                 } 
  6277.                 $check_h += ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w']); 
  6278.             } 
  6279.             if (($newblock && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && $lineCount == 0) || ($endofblock && $blockstate == 3 && $lineCount == 0)) { 
  6280.                 $check_h += ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']); 
  6281.             } 
  6282.         } 
  6283.  
  6284.         // Force PAGE break if column height cannot take check-height 
  6285.         if ($this->ColActive && $check_h > ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $this->y0)) { 
  6286.             $this->SetCol($this->NbCol - 1); 
  6287.         } 
  6288.  
  6289.         // Avoid just border/background-color moved on to next page 
  6290.         if ($endofblock && $blockstate > 1 && !$content) { 
  6291.             $buff = $this->margBuffer; 
  6292.         } else { 
  6293.             $buff = 0; 
  6294.         } 
  6295.  
  6296.  
  6297.         // PAGEBREAK 
  6298.         if (!$is_table && ($this->y + $check_h) > ($this->PageBreakTrigger + $buff) and ! $this->InFooter and $this->AcceptPageBreak()) { 
  6299.             $bak_x = $this->x; //Current X position 
  6300.             // WORD SPACING 
  6301.             $ws = $this->ws; //Word Spacing 
  6302.             $charspacing = $this->charspacing; //Character Spacing 
  6303.             $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  6304.  
  6305.             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  6306.  
  6307.             $this->x = $bak_x; 
  6308.             // Added to correct for OddEven Margins 
  6309.             $currentx += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  6310.             $this->x += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  6311.  
  6312.             // WORD SPACING 
  6313.             $this->SetSpacing($charspacing, $ws); 
  6314.         } 
  6315.  
  6316.  
  6317.         /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  6318.         // COLS 
  6319.         // COLUMN CHANGE 
  6320.         if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) { 
  6321.             $currentx += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  6322.             $this->x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  6323.             $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  6324.         } 
  6325.  
  6326.  
  6327.         if ($this->ColActive && !$is_table) { 
  6328.             $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  6329.         } 
  6330.         /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  6331.  
  6332.         // TOP MARGIN 
  6333.         if ($newblock && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top']) && $lineCount == 0 && !$is_table) { 
  6334.             $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'], $this->blklvl - 1, true, $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_collapse']); 
  6335.             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  6336.                 $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  6337.             } // *COLUMNS* 
  6338.         } 
  6339.  
  6340.         if ($newblock && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && $lineCount == 0 && !$is_table) { 
  6341.             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0'] = $this->y; 
  6342.             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] = $this->page; 
  6343.             if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float']) { 
  6344.                 $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_start_y'] = $this->y; 
  6345.             } 
  6346.             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  6347.                 $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  6348.             } // *COLUMNS* 
  6349.         } 
  6350.  
  6351.         // Paragraph INDENT 
  6352.         $WidthCorrection = 0; 
  6353.         if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent']) && ($lineCount == 0) && (!$is_table) && ($align != 'C')) { 
  6354.             $ti = $this->ConvertSize($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent'], $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'], $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']['size'], false);  // mPDF 5.7.4 
  6355.             $WidthCorrection = ($ti * _MPDFK); 
  6356.         } 
  6357.  
  6358.  
  6359.         // PADDING and BORDER spacing/fill 
  6360.         if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top']) || ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top'])) && ($lineCount == 0) && (!$is_table)) { 
  6361.             // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom 
  6362.             $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w'], -3, true, false, 1); 
  6363.             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  6364.                 $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  6365.             } // *COLUMNS* 
  6366.             $this->x = $currentx; 
  6367.         } 
  6368.  
  6369.  
  6370.         // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV 
  6371.         $fpaddingR = 0; 
  6372.         $fpaddingL = 0; 
  6373.         /** -- CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  6374.         if (count($this->floatDivs)) { 
  6375.             list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl); 
  6376.             if ($r_exists) { 
  6377.                 $fpaddingR = $r_width; 
  6378.             } 
  6379.             if ($l_exists) { 
  6380.                 $fpaddingL = $l_width; 
  6381.             } 
  6382.         } 
  6383.         /** -- END CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  6384.  
  6385.         $usey = $this->y + 0.002; 
  6386.         if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && ($lineCount == 0)) { 
  6387.             $usey += $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  6388.         } 
  6389.         /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  6390.         // If float exists at this level 
  6391.         if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['R']['skipline']) { 
  6392.             $fpaddingR += $this->floatmargins['R']['w']; 
  6393.         } 
  6394.         if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['L']['skipline']) { 
  6395.             $fpaddingL += $this->floatmargins['L']['w']; 
  6396.         } 
  6397.         /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  6398.  
  6399.  
  6400.         if ($content) { 
  6401.  
  6402.             // In FinishFlowing Block no lines are justified as it is always last line 
  6403.             // but if CJKorphan has allowed content width to go over max width, use J charspacing to compress line 
  6404.             // JUSTIFICATION J - NOT! 
  6405.             $nb_carac = 0; 
  6406.             $nb_spaces = 0; 
  6407.             $jcharspacing = 0; 
  6408.             $jkashida = 0; 
  6409.             $jws = 0; 
  6410.             $inclCursive = false; 
  6411.             $dottab = false; 
  6412.             foreach ($content as $k => $chunk) { 
  6413.                 if (!isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) || (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && !$this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
  6414.                     $nb_carac += mb_strlen($chunk, $this->mb_enc); 
  6415.                     $nb_spaces += mb_substr_count($chunk, ' ', $this->mb_enc); 
  6416.                     // mPDF 6 
  6417.                     // Use GPOS OTL 
  6418.                     $this->restoreFont($font[$k], false); 
  6419.                     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  6420.                         if (isset($cOTLdata[$k]['group']) && $cOTLdata[$k]['group']) { 
  6421.                             $nb_marks = substr_count($cOTLdata[$k]['group'], 'M'); 
  6422.                             $nb_carac -= $nb_marks; 
  6423.                         } 
  6424.                         if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregCURSchars . "])/u", $chunk)) { 
  6425.                             $inclCursive = true; 
  6426.                         } 
  6427.                     } 
  6428.                 } else { 
  6429.                     $nb_carac ++;  // mPDF 6 allow spacing for inline object 
  6430.                     if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'dottab') { 
  6431.                         $dottab = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['outdent']; 
  6432.                     } 
  6433.                 } 
  6434.             } 
  6435.  
  6436.             // DIRECTIONALITY RTL 
  6437.             $chunkorder = range(0, count($content) - 1); // mPDF 6 
  6438.             /** -- OTL -- */ 
  6439.             // mPDF 6 
  6440.             if ($blockdir == 'rtl' || $this->biDirectional) { 
  6441.                 $this->otl->_bidiReorder($chunkorder, $content, $cOTLdata, $blockdir); 
  6442.                 // From this point on, $content and $cOTLdata may contain more elements (and re-ordered) compared to 
  6443.                 // $this->objectbuffer and $font ($chunkorder contains the mapping) 
  6444.             } 
  6445.             /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  6446.  
  6447.             // Remove any XAdvance from OTL data at end of line 
  6448.             // And correct for XPlacement on last character 
  6449.             // BIDI is applied 
  6450.             foreach ($chunkorder AS $aord => $k) { 
  6451.                 if (count($cOTLdata)) { 
  6452.                     $this->restoreFont($font[$k], false); 
  6453.                     // ...FinishFlowingBlock... 
  6454.                     if ($aord == count($chunkorder) - 1 && isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['group'])) { // Last chunk on line 
  6455.                         $nGPOS = strlen($cOTLdata[$aord]['group']) - 1; // Last character 
  6456.                         if (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceL']) || isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceR'])) { 
  6457.                             if (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceL'])) { 
  6458.                                 $w = $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceL'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  6459.                             } else { 
  6460.                                 $w = $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceR'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  6461.                             } 
  6462.                             $w *= ($this->FontSize / 1000); 
  6463.                             $contentWidth -= $w * _MPDFK; 
  6464.                             $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceL'] = 0; 
  6465.                             $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceR'] = 0; 
  6466.                         } 
  6467.  
  6468.                         // If last character has an XPlacement set, adjust width calculation, and add to XAdvance to account for it 
  6469.                         if (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XPlacement'])) { 
  6470.                             $w = -$cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XPlacement'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  6471.                             $w *= ($this->FontSize / 1000); 
  6472.                             $contentWidth -= $w * _MPDFK; 
  6473.                             $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceL'] = $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XPlacement']; 
  6474.                             $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceR'] = $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XPlacement']; 
  6475.                         } 
  6476.                     } 
  6477.                 } 
  6478.             } 
  6479.  
  6480.             // if it's justified, we need to find the char/word spacing (or if orphans have allowed length of line to go over the maxwidth) 
  6481.             // If "orphans" in fact is just a final space - ignore this 
  6482.             $lastchar = mb_substr($content[(count($chunkorder) - 1)], mb_strlen($content[(count($chunkorder) - 1)], $this->mb_enc) - 1, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  6483.             if (preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKoverflow . "]/u", $lastchar)) { 
  6484.                 $CJKoverflow = true; 
  6485.             } else { 
  6486.                 $CJKoverflow = false; 
  6487.             } 
  6488.             if ((((($contentWidth + $lastitalic) > $maxWidth) && ($content[(count($chunkorder) - 1)] != ' ') ) || 
  6489.                 (!$endofblock && $align == 'J' && ($next == 'image' || $next == 'select' || $next == 'input' || $next == 'textarea' || ($next == 'br' && $this->justifyB4br)))) && !($CJKoverflow && $this->allowCJKoverflow)) { 
  6490.                 // WORD SPACING 
  6491.                 list($jcharspacing, $jws, $jkashida) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac, $nb_spaces, ($maxWidth - $lastitalic - $contentWidth - $WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) * _MPDFK) - ($paddingL + $paddingR + (($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * _MPDFK) )), $inclCursive, $cOTLdata); 
  6492.             } 
  6493.             /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ elseif ($this->checkCJK && $align == 'J' && $CJKoverflow && $this->allowCJKoverflow && $this->CJKforceend) { 
  6494.                 // force-end overhang 
  6495.                 $hanger = mb_substr($content[(count($chunkorder) - 1)], mb_strlen($content[(count($chunkorder) - 1)], $this->mb_enc) - 1, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  6496.                 if (preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKoverflow . "]/u", $hanger)) { 
  6497.                     $content[(count($chunkorder) - 1)] = mb_substr($content[(count($chunkorder) - 1)], 0, mb_strlen($content[(count($chunkorder) - 1)], $this->mb_enc) - 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  6498.                     $this->restoreFont($font[$chunkorder[count($chunkorder) - 1]], false); 
  6499.                     $contentWidth -= $this->GetStringWidth($hanger) * _MPDFK; 
  6500.                     $nb_carac -= 1; 
  6501.                     list($jcharspacing, $jws, $jkashida) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac, $nb_spaces, ($maxWidth - $lastitalic - $contentWidth - $WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) * _MPDFK) - ($paddingL + $paddingR + (($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * _MPDFK) )), $inclCursive, $cOTLdata); 
  6502.                 } 
  6503.             } 
  6504.             /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  6505.  
  6506.             // Check if will fit at word/char spacing of previous line - if so continue it 
  6507.             // but only allow a maximum of $this->jSmaxWordLast and $this->jSmaxCharLast 
  6508.             elseif ($contentWidth < ($maxWidth - $lastitalic - $WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) * _MPDFK) - ($paddingL + $paddingR + (($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * _MPDFK))) && !$this->fixedlSpacing) { 
  6509.                 if ($this->ws > $this->jSmaxWordLast) { 
  6510.                     $jws = $this->jSmaxWordLast; 
  6511.                 } 
  6512.                 if ($this->charspacing > $this->jSmaxCharLast) { 
  6513.                     $jcharspacing = $this->jSmaxCharLast; 
  6514.                 } 
  6515.                 $check = $maxWidth - $lastitalic - $WidthCorrection - $contentWidth - (($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) * _MPDFK) - ($paddingL + $paddingR + (($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * _MPDFK) ) - ( $jcharspacing * $nb_carac) - ( $jws * $nb_spaces); 
  6516.                 if ($check <= 0) { 
  6517.                     $jcharspacing = 0; 
  6518.                     $jws = 0; 
  6519.                 } 
  6520.             } 
  6521.  
  6522.             $empty = $maxWidth - $lastitalic - $WidthCorrection - $contentWidth - (($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) * _MPDFK) - ($paddingL + $paddingR + (($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * _MPDFK) ); 
  6523.  
  6524.  
  6525.             $empty -= ($jcharspacing * ($nb_carac - 1)); // mPDF 6 nb_carac MINUS 1 
  6526.             $empty -= ($jws * $nb_spaces); 
  6527.             $empty -= ($jkashida); 
  6528.  
  6529.             $empty /= _MPDFK; 
  6530.  
  6531.             if (!$is_table) { 
  6532.                 $this->maxPosR = max($this->maxPosR, ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_right_margin'] - $empty)); 
  6533.                 $this->maxPosL = min($this->maxPosL, ($this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'] + $empty)); 
  6534.             } 
  6535.  
  6536.             $arraysize = count($chunkorder); 
  6537.  
  6538.             $margins = ($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) + ($ipaddingL + $ipaddingR + $fpaddingR + $fpaddingR ); 
  6539.  
  6540.             if (!$is_table) { 
  6541.                 $this->DivLn($stackHeight, $this->blklvl, false); 
  6542.             } // false -> don't advance y 
  6543.  
  6544.             $this->x = $currentx + $this->cMarginL + $ipaddingL + $fpaddingL; 
  6545.             if ($dottab !== false && $blockdir == 'rtl') { 
  6546.                 $this->x -= $dottab; 
  6547.             } elseif ($align == 'R') { 
  6548.                 $this->x += $empty; 
  6549.             } elseif ($align == 'J' && $blockdir == 'rtl') { 
  6550.                 $this->x += $empty; 
  6551.             } elseif ($align == 'C') { 
  6552.                 $this->x += ($empty / 2); 
  6553.             } 
  6554.  
  6555.             // Paragraph INDENT 
  6556.             $WidthCorrection = 0; 
  6557.             if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent']) && ($lineCount == 0) && (!$is_table) && ($align != 'C')) { 
  6558.                 $ti = $this->ConvertSize($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent'], $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'], $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']['size'], false);  // mPDF 5.7.4 
  6559.                 if ($blockdir != 'rtl') { 
  6560.                     $this->x += $ti; 
  6561.                 } // mPDF 6 
  6562.             } 
  6563.  
  6564.             foreach ($chunkorder AS $aord => $k) { // mPDF 5.7 
  6565.                 $chunk = $content[$aord]; 
  6566.                 if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]) { 
  6567.  
  6568.                     $xadj = $this->x - $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-X']; 
  6569.                     $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-X'] += $xadj; 
  6570.                     $this->objectbuffer[$k]['BORDER-X'] += $xadj; 
  6571.                     $this->objectbuffer[$k]['INNER-X'] += $xadj; 
  6572.  
  6573.                     if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'listmarker') { 
  6574.                         $this->objectbuffer[$k]['lineBox'] = $lineBox[-1]; // Block element details for glyph-origin 
  6575.                     } 
  6576.                     $yadj = $this->y - $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-Y']; 
  6577.                     if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'dottab') { // mPDF 6 DOTTAB 
  6578.                         $this->objectbuffer[$k]['lineBox'] = $lineBox[$k]; // element details for glyph-origin 
  6579.                     } 
  6580.                     if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] != 'dottab') { // mPDF 6 DOTTAB 
  6581.                         $yadj += $lineBox[$k]['top']; 
  6582.                     } 
  6583.                     $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  6584.                     $this->objectbuffer[$k]['BORDER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  6585.                     $this->objectbuffer[$k]['INNER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  6586.                 } 
  6587.  
  6588.                 $this->restoreFont($font[$k]);  // mPDF 5.7 
  6589.
