  6590.                 if ($is_table && substr($align, 0, 1) == 'D' && $aord == 0) { 
  6591.                     $dp = $this->decimal_align[substr($align, 0, 2)]; 
  6592.                     $s = preg_split('/' . preg_quote($dp, '/') . '/', $content[0], 2);  // ? needs to be /u if not core 
  6593.                     $s0 = $this->GetStringWidth($s[0], false); 
  6594.                     $this->x += ($this->decimal_offset - $s0); 
  6595.                 } 
  6596.  
  6597.                 $this->SetSpacing(($this->fixedlSpacing * _MPDFK) + $jcharspacing, ($this->fixedlSpacing + $this->minwSpacing) * _MPDFK + $jws); 
  6598.                 $this->fixedlSpacing = false; 
  6599.                 $this->minwSpacing = 0; 
  6600.  
  6601.                 $save_vis = $this->visibility; 
  6602.                 if (isset($this->textparam['visibility']) && $this->textparam['visibility'] && $this->textparam['visibility'] != $this->visibility) { 
  6603.                     $this->SetVisibility($this->textparam['visibility']); 
  6604.                 } 
  6605.  
  6606.                 // *********** SPAN BACKGROUND COLOR ***************** // 
  6607.                 if (isset($this->spanbgcolor) && $this->spanbgcolor) { 
  6608.                     $cor = $this->spanbgcolorarray; 
  6609.                     $this->SetFColor($cor); 
  6610.                     $save_fill = $fill; 
  6611.                     $spanfill = 1; 
  6612.                     $fill = 1; 
  6613.                 } 
  6614.                 if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  6615.                     if (strpos($contentB[$k], 'L') !== false && isset($this->spanborddet['L'])) 
  6616.                         $this->x += $this->spanborddet['L']['w']; 
  6617.                     if (strpos($contentB[$k], 'L') === false) 
  6618.                         $this->spanborddet['L']['s'] = $this->spanborddet['L']['w'] = 0; 
  6619.                     if (strpos($contentB[$k], 'R') === false) 
  6620.                         $this->spanborddet['R']['s'] = $this->spanborddet['R']['w'] = 0; 
  6621.                 } 
  6622.                 // WORD SPACING 
  6623.                 // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6624.                 $stringWidth = $this->GetStringWidth($chunk, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]) ? $cOTLdata[$aord] : false), $this->textvar); 
  6625.                 $nch = mb_strlen($chunk, $this->mb_enc); 
  6626.                 // Use GPOS OTL 
  6627.                 if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  6628.                     if (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['group']) && $cOTLdata[$aord]['group']) { 
  6629.                         $nch -= substr_count($cOTLdata[$aord]['group'], 'M'); 
  6630.                     } 
  6631.                 } 
  6632.                 $stringWidth += ( $this->charspacing * $nch / _MPDFK ); 
  6633.  
  6634.                 $stringWidth += ( $this->ws * mb_substr_count($chunk, ' ', $this->mb_enc) / _MPDFK ); 
  6635.  
  6636.                 if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
  6637.                     if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'dottab') { 
  6638.                         $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-WIDTH'] +=$empty; 
  6639.                         $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-WIDTH'] +=$this->objectbuffer[$k]['outdent']; 
  6640.                     } 
  6641.                     // LIST MARKERS    // mPDF 6  Lists 
  6642.                     if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'image' && isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarker']) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarker'] && $this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarkerposition'] == 'outside') { 
  6643.                         // do nothing 
  6644.                     } else { 
  6645.                         $stringWidth = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-WIDTH']; 
  6646.                     } 
  6647.                 } 
  6648.  
  6649.                 if ($stringWidth == 0) { 
  6650.                     $stringWidth = 0.000001; 
  6651.                 } 
  6652.                 if ($aord == $arraysize - 1) { // mPDF 5.7 
  6653.                     // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6654.                     if ($this->checkCJK && $CJKoverflow && $align == 'J' && $this->allowCJKoverflow && $hanger && $this->CJKforceend) { 
  6655.                         // force-end overhang 
  6656.                         $this->Cell($stringWidth, $stackHeight, $chunk, '', 0, '', $fill, $this->HREF, $currentx, 0, 0, 'M', $fill, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]) ? $cOTLdata[$aord] : false), $this->textvar, (isset($lineBox[$k]) ? $lineBox[$k] : false));  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6657.                         $this->Cell($this->GetStringWidth($hanger), $stackHeight, $hanger, '', 1, '', $fill, $this->HREF, $currentx, 0, 0, 'M', $fill, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]) ? $cOTLdata[$aord] : false), $this->textvar, (isset($lineBox[$k]) ? $lineBox[$k] : false)); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6658.                     } else { 
  6659.                         $this->Cell($stringWidth, $stackHeight, $chunk, '', 1, '', $fill, $this->HREF, $currentx, 0, 0, 'M', $fill, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]) ? $cOTLdata[$aord] : false), $this->textvar, (isset($lineBox[$k]) ? $lineBox[$k] : false)); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6660.                     } 
  6661.                 } else 
  6662.                     $this->Cell($stringWidth, $stackHeight, $chunk, '', 0, '', $fill, $this->HREF, 0, 0, 0, 'M', $fill, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]) ? $cOTLdata[$aord] : false), $this->textvar, (isset($lineBox[$k]) ? $lineBox[$k] : false)); //first or middle part    // mPDF 5.7.1 
  6663.  
  6664.  
  6665.                 if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  6666.                     if (strpos($contentB[$k], 'R') !== false && $aord != $arraysize - 1) 
  6667.                         $this->x += $this->spanborddet['R']['w']; 
  6668.                 } 
  6669.                 // *********** SPAN BACKGROUND COLOR OFF - RESET BLOCK BGCOLOR ***************** // 
  6670.                 if (isset($spanfill) && $spanfill) { 
  6671.                     $fill = $save_fill; 
  6672.                     $spanfill = 0; 
  6673.                     if ($fill) { 
  6674.                         $this->SetFColor($bcor); 
  6675.                     } 
  6676.                 } 
  6677.                 if (isset($this->textparam['visibility']) && $this->textparam['visibility'] && $this->visibility != $save_vis) { 
  6678.                     $this->SetVisibility($save_vis); 
  6679.                 } 
  6680.             } 
  6681.  
  6682.             $this->printobjectbuffer($is_table, $blockdir); 
  6683.             $this->objectbuffer = array(); 
  6684.             $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  6685.         } // END IF CONTENT 
  6686.  
  6687.         /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  6688.         // Update values if set to skipline 
  6689.         if ($this->floatmargins) { 
  6690.             $this->_advanceFloatMargins(); 
  6691.         } 
  6692.  
  6693.  
  6694.         if ($endofblock && $blockstate > 1) { 
  6695.             // If float exists at this level 
  6696.             if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']['y1'])) { 
  6697.                 $fry1 = $this->floatmargins['R']['y1']; 
  6698.             } else { 
  6699.                 $fry1 = 0; 
  6700.             } 
  6701.             if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']['y1'])) { 
  6702.                 $fly1 = $this->floatmargins['L']['y1']; 
  6703.             } else { 
  6704.                 $fly1 = 0; 
  6705.             } 
  6706.             if ($this->y < $fry1 || $this->y < $fly1) { 
  6707.                 $drop = max($fry1, $fly1) - $this->y; 
  6708.                 $this->DivLn($drop); 
  6709.                 $this->x = $currentx; 
  6710.             } 
  6711.         } 
  6712.         /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  6713.  
  6714.  
  6715.         // PADDING and BORDER spacing/fill 
  6716.         if ($endofblock && ($blockstate > 1) && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] || $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom'] || $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_height']) && (!$is_table)) { 
  6717.             // If CSS height set, extend bottom - if on same page as block started, and CSS HEIGHT > actual height,  
  6718.             // and does not force pagebreak 
  6719.             $extra = 0; 
  6720.             if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_height']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_height'] && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] == $this->page) { 
  6721.                 // predicted height 
  6722.                 $h1 = ($this->y - $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w']; 
  6723.                 if ($h1 < ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_height'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'])) { 
  6724.                     $extra = ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_height'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top']) - $h1; 
  6725.                 } 
  6726.                 if ($this->y + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w'] + $extra > $this->PageBreakTrigger) { 
  6727.                     $extra = $this->PageBreakTrigger - ($this->y + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w']); 
  6728.                 } 
  6729.             } 
  6730.  
  6731.             // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom 
  6732.             $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w'] + $extra, -3, true, false, 2); 
  6733.             $this->x = $currentx; 
  6734.  
  6735.             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  6736.                 $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  6737.             } // *COLUMNS* 
  6738.         } 
  6739.  
  6740.         // SET Bottom y1 of block (used for painting borders) 
  6741.         if (($endofblock) && ($blockstate > 1) && (!$is_table)) { 
  6742.             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y1'] = $this->y; 
  6743.         } 
  6744.  
  6745.         // BOTTOM MARGIN 
  6746.         if (($endofblock) && ($blockstate > 1) && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_bottom']) && (!$is_table)) { 
  6747.             if ($this->y + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_bottom'] < $this->PageBreakTrigger and ! $this->InFooter) { 
  6748.                 $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_bottom'], $this->blklvl - 1, true, $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_collapse']); 
  6749.                 if ($this->ColActive) { 
  6750.                     $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  6751.                 } // *COLUMNS* 
  6752.             } 
  6753.         } 
  6754.  
  6755.         // Reset lineheight 
  6756.         $stackHeight = $this->divheight; 
  6757.     } 
  6758.  
  6759.     function printobjectbuffer($is_table = false, $blockdir = false) 
  6760.     { 
  6761.         if (!$blockdir) { 
  6762.             $blockdir = $this->directionality; 
  6763.         } 
  6764.         if ($is_table && $this->shrin_k > 1) { 
  6765.             $k = $this->shrin_k; 
  6766.         } else { 
  6767.             $k = 1; 
  6768.         } 
  6769.         $save_y = $this->y; 
  6770.         $save_x = $this->x; 
  6771.         $save_currentfontfamily = $this->FontFamily; 
  6772.         $save_currentfontsize = $this->FontSizePt; 
  6773.         $save_currentfontstyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  6774.         if ($blockdir == 'rtl') { 
  6775.             $rtlalign = 'R'; 
  6776.         } else { 
  6777.             $rtlalign = 'L'; 
  6778.         } 
  6779.         foreach ($this->objectbuffer AS $ib => $objattr) { 
  6780.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'bookmark' || $objattr['type'] == 'indexentry' || $objattr['type'] == 'toc') { 
  6781.                 $x = $objattr['OUTER-X']; 
  6782.                 $y = $objattr['OUTER-Y']; 
  6783.                 $this->y = $y - $this->FontSize / 2; 
  6784.                 $this->x = $x; 
  6785.                 if ($objattr['type'] == 'bookmark') { 
  6786.                     $this->Bookmark($objattr['CONTENT'], $objattr['bklevel'], $y - $this->FontSize); 
  6787.                 } // *BOOKMARKS* 
  6788.                 if ($objattr['type'] == 'indexentry') { 
  6789.                     $this->IndexEntry($objattr['CONTENT']); 
  6790.                 } // *INDEX* 
  6791.                 if ($objattr['type'] == 'toc') { 
  6792.                     $this->TOC_Entry($objattr['CONTENT'], $objattr['toclevel'], (isset($objattr['toc_id']) ? $objattr['toc_id'] : '')); 
  6793.                 } // *TOC* 
  6794.             } 
  6795.             /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ elseif ($objattr['type'] == 'annot') { 
  6796.                 if ($objattr['POS-X']) { 
  6797.                     $x = $objattr['POS-X']; 
  6798.                 } elseif ($this->annotMargin <> 0) { 
  6799.                     $x = -$objattr['OUTER-X']; 
  6800.                 } else { 
  6801.                     $x = $objattr['OUTER-X']; 
  6802.                 } 
  6803.                 if ($objattr['POS-Y']) { 
  6804.                     $y = $objattr['POS-Y']; 
  6805.                 } else { 
  6806.                     $y = $objattr['OUTER-Y'] - $this->FontSize / 2; 
  6807.                 } 
  6808.                 // Create a dummy entry in the _out/columnBuffer with position sensitive data,  
  6809.                 // linking $y-1 in the Columnbuffer with entry in $this->columnAnnots 
  6810.                 // and when columns are split in length will not break annotation from current line 
  6811.                 $this->y = $y - 1; 
  6812.                 $this->x = $x - 1; 
  6813.                 $this->Line($x - 1, $y - 1, $x - 1, $y - 1); 
  6814.                 $this->Annotation($objattr['CONTENT'], $x, $y, $objattr['ICON'], $objattr['AUTHOR'], $objattr['SUBJECT'], $objattr['OPACITY'], $objattr['COLOR'], (isset($objattr['POPUP']) ? $objattr['POPUP'] : ''), (isset($objattr['FILE']) ? $objattr['FILE'] : '')); 
  6815.             } 
  6816.             /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ else { 
  6817.                 $y = $objattr['OUTER-Y']; 
  6818.                 $x = $objattr['OUTER-X']; 
  6819.                 $w = $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH']; 
  6820.                 $h = $objattr['OUTER-HEIGHT']; 
  6821.                 if (isset($objattr['text'])) { 
  6822.                     $texto = $objattr['text']; 
  6823.                 } 
  6824.                 $this->y = $y; 
  6825.                 $this->x = $x; 
  6826.                 if (isset($objattr['fontfamily'])) { 
  6827.                     $this->SetFont($objattr['fontfamily'], '', $objattr['fontsize']); 
  6828.                 } 
  6829.             } 
  6830.  
  6831.             // HR 
  6832.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'hr') { 
  6833.                 $this->SetDColor($objattr['color']); 
  6834.                 switch ($objattr['align']) { 
  6835.                     case 'C': 
  6836.                         $empty = $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'] - $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']; 
  6837.                         $empty /= 2; 
  6838.                         $x += $empty; 
  6839.                         break; 
  6840.                     case 'R': 
  6841.                         $empty = $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'] - $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']; 
  6842.                         $x += $empty; 
  6843.                         break; 
  6844.                 } 
  6845.                 $oldlinewidth = $this->LineWidth; 
  6846.                 $this->SetLineWidth($objattr['linewidth'] / $k); 
  6847.                 $this->y += ($objattr['linewidth'] / 2) + $objattr['margin_top'] / $k; 
  6848.                 $this->Line($x, $this->y, $x + $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'], $this->y); 
  6849.                 $this->SetLineWidth($oldlinewidth); 
  6850.                 $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  6851.             } 
  6852.             // IMAGE 
  6853.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'image') { 
  6854.                 // mPDF 5.7.3 TRANSFORMS 
  6855.                 if (isset($objattr['transform'])) { 
  6856.                     $this->_out("\n" . '% BTR'); // Begin Transform 
  6857.                 } 
  6858.                 if (isset($objattr['z-index']) && $objattr['z-index'] > 0 && $this->current_layer == 0) { 
  6859.                     $this->BeginLayer($objattr['z-index']); 
  6860.                 } 
  6861.                 if (isset($objattr['visibility']) && $objattr['visibility'] != 'visible' && $objattr['visibility']) { 
  6862.                     $this->SetVisibility($objattr['visibility']); 
  6863.                 } 
  6864.                 if (isset($objattr['opacity'])) { 
  6865.                     $this->SetAlpha($objattr['opacity']); 
  6866.                 } 
  6867.  
  6868.                 $obiw = $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']; 
  6869.                 $obih = $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT']; 
  6870.                 $sx = $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] * _MPDFK / $objattr['orig_w']; 
  6871.                 $sy = abs($objattr['INNER-HEIGHT']) * _MPDFK / abs($objattr['orig_h']); 
  6872.                 $sx = ($objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] * _MPDFK / $objattr['orig_w']); 
  6873.                 $sy = ($objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] * _MPDFK / $objattr['orig_h']); 
  6874.  
  6875.                 $rotate = 0; 
  6876.                 if (isset($objattr['ROTATE'])) { 
  6877.                     $rotate = $objattr['ROTATE']; 
  6878.                 } 
  6879.                 if ($rotate == 90) { 
  6880.                     // Clockwise 
  6881.                     $obiw = $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT']; 
  6882.                     $obih = $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']; 
  6883.                     $tr = $this->transformTranslate(0, -$objattr['INNER-WIDTH'], true); 
  6884.                     $tr .= ' ' . $this->transformRotate(90, $objattr['INNER-X'], ($objattr['INNER-Y'] + $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']), true); 
  6885.                     $sx = $obiw * _MPDFK / $objattr['orig_h']; 
  6886.                     $sy = $obih * _MPDFK / $objattr['orig_w']; 
  6887.                 } elseif ($rotate == -90 || $rotate == 270) { 
  6888.                     // AntiClockwise 
  6889.                     $obiw = $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT']; 
  6890.                     $obih = $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']; 
  6891.                     $tr = $this->transformTranslate($objattr['INNER-WIDTH'], ($objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] - $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']), true); 
  6892.                     $tr .= ' ' . $this->transformRotate(-90, $objattr['INNER-X'], ($objattr['INNER-Y'] + $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']), true); 
  6893.                     $sx = $obiw * _MPDFK / $objattr['orig_h']; 
  6894.                     $sy = $obih * _MPDFK / $objattr['orig_w']; 
  6895.                 } elseif ($rotate == 180) { 
  6896.                     // Mirror 
  6897.                     $tr = $this->transformTranslate($objattr['INNER-WIDTH'], -$objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'], true); 
  6898.                     $tr .= ' ' . $this->transformRotate(180, $objattr['INNER-X'], ($objattr['INNER-Y'] + $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT']), true); 
  6899.                 } else { 
  6900.                     $tr = ''; 
  6901.                 } 
  6902.                 $tr = trim($tr); 
  6903.                 if ($tr) { 
  6904.                     $tr .= ' '; 
  6905.                 } 
  6906.                 $gradmask = ''; 
  6907.  
  6908.                 // mPDF 5.7.3 TRANSFORMS 
  6909.                 $tr2 = ''; 
  6910.                 if (isset($objattr['transform'])) { 
  6911.                     $maxsize_x = $w; 
  6912.                     $maxsize_y = $h; 
  6913.                     $cx = $x + $w / 2; 
  6914.                     $cy = $y + $h / 2; 
  6915.                     preg_match_all('/(translatex|translatey|translate|scalex|scaley|scale|rotate|skewX|skewY|skew)\((.*?)\)/is', $objattr['transform'], $m); 
  6916.                     if (count($m[0])) { 
  6917.                         for ($i = 0; $i < count($m[0]); $i++) { 
  6918.                             $c = strtolower($m[1][$i]); 
  6919.                             $v = trim($m[2][$i]); 
  6920.                             $vv = preg_split('/[ , ]+/', $v); 
  6921.                             if ($c == 'translate' && count($vv)) { 
  6922.                                 $translate_x = $this->ConvertSize($vv[0], $maxsize_x, false, false); 
  6923.                                 if (count($vv) == 2) { 
  6924.                                     $translate_y = $this->ConvertSize($vv[1], $maxsize_y, false, false); 
  6925.                                 } else { 
  6926.                                     $translate_y = 0; 
  6927.                                 } 
  6928.                                 $tr2 .= $this->transformTranslate($translate_x, $translate_y, true) . ' '; 
  6929.                             } elseif ($c == 'translatex' && count($vv)) { 
  6930.                                 $translate_x = $this->ConvertSize($vv[0], $maxsize_x, false, false); 
  6931.                                 $tr2 .= $this->transformTranslate($translate_x, 0, true) . ' '; 
  6932.                             } elseif ($c == 'translatey' && count($vv)) { 
  6933.                                 $translate_y = $this->ConvertSize($vv[1], $maxsize_y, false, false); 
  6934.                                 $tr2 .= $this->transformTranslate(0, $translate_y, true) . ' '; 
  6935.                             } elseif ($c == 'scale' && count($vv)) { 
  6936.                                 $scale_x = $vv[0] * 100; 
  6937.                                 if (count($vv) == 2) { 
  6938.                                     $scale_y = $vv[1] * 100; 
  6939.                                 } else { 
  6940.                                     $scale_y = $scale_x; 
  6941.                                 } 
  6942.                                 $tr2 .= $this->transformScale($scale_x, $scale_y, $cx, $cy, true) . ' '; 
  6943.                             } elseif ($c == 'scalex' && count($vv)) { 
  6944.                                 $scale_x = $vv[0] * 100; 
  6945.                                 $tr2 .= $this->transformScale($scale_x, 0, $cx, $cy, true) . ' '; 
  6946.                             } elseif ($c == 'scaley' && count($vv)) { 
  6947.                                 $scale_y = $vv[1] * 100; 
  6948.                                 $tr2 .= $this->transformScale(0, $scale_y, $cx, $cy, true) . ' '; 
  6949.                             } elseif ($c == 'skew' && count($vv)) { 
  6950.                                 $angle_x = $this->ConvertAngle($vv[0], false); 
  6951.                                 if (count($vv) == 2) { 
  6952.                                     $angle_y = $this->ConvertAngle($vv[1], false); 
  6953.                                 } else { 
  6954.                                     $angle_y = 0; 
  6955.                                 } 
  6956.                                 $tr2 .= $this->transformSkew($angle_x, $angle_y, $cx, $cy, true) . ' '; 
  6957.                             } elseif ($c == 'skewx' && count($vv)) { 
  6958.                                 $angle = $this->ConvertAngle($vv[0], false); 
  6959.                                 $tr2 .= $this->transformSkew($angle, 0, $cx, $cy, true) . ' '; 
  6960.                             } elseif ($c == 'skewy' && count($vv)) { 
  6961.                                 $angle = $this->ConvertAngle($vv[0], false); 
  6962.                                 $tr2 .= $this->transformSkew(0, $angle, $cx, $cy, true) . ' '; 
  6963.                             } elseif ($c == 'rotate' && count($vv)) { 
  6964.                                 $angle = $this->ConvertAngle($vv[0]); 
  6965.                                 $tr2 .= $this->transformRotate($angle, $cx, $cy, true) . ' '; 
  6966.                             } 
  6967.                         } 
  6968.                     } 
  6969.                 } 
  6970.  
  6971.                 // LIST MARKERS (Images)    // mPDF 6  Lists 
  6972.                 if (isset($objattr['listmarker']) && $objattr['listmarker'] && $objattr['listmarkerposition'] == 'outside') { 
  6973.                     $mw = $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH']; 
  6974.                     //  NB If change marker-offset, also need to alter in function _getListMarkerWidth 
  6975.                     $adjx = $this->ConvertSize($this->list_marker_offset, $this->FontSize); 
  6976.                     if ($objattr['dir'] == 'rtl') { 
  6977.                         $objattr['INNER-X'] += $adjx; 
  6978.                     } else { 
  6979.                         $objattr['INNER-X'] -= $adjx; 
  6980.                         $objattr['INNER-X'] -= $mw; 
  6981.                     } 
  6982.                 } 
  6983.                 // mPDF 5.7.3 TRANSFORMS / BACKGROUND COLOR 
  6984.                 // Transform also affects image background 
  6985.                 if ($tr2) { 
  6986.                     $this->_out('q ' . $tr2 . ' '); 
  6987.                 } 
  6988.                 if (isset($objattr['bgcolor']) && $objattr['bgcolor']) { 
  6989.                     $bgcol = $objattr['bgcolor']; 
  6990.                     $this->SetFColor($bgcol); 
  6991.                     $this->Rect($x, $y, $w, $h, 'F'); 
  6992.                     $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  6993.                 } 
  6994.                 if ($tr2) { 
  6995.                     $this->_out('Q'); 
  6996.                 } 
  6997.  
  6998.                 /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  6999.                 if (isset($objattr['GRADIENT-MASK'])) { 
  7000.                     $g = $this->grad->parseMozGradient($objattr['GRADIENT-MASK']); 
  7001.                     if ($g) { 
  7002.                         $dummy = $this->grad->Gradient($objattr['INNER-X'], $objattr['INNER-Y'], $obiw, $obih, $g['type'], $g['stops'], $g['colorspace'], $g['coords'], $g['extend'], true, true); 
  7003.                         $gradmask = '/TGS' . count($this->gradients) . ' gs '; 
  7004.                     } 
  7005.                 } 
  7006.                 /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  7007.                 /** -- IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  7008.                 if (isset($objattr['itype']) && $objattr['itype'] == 'wmf') { 
  7009.                     $outstring = sprintf('q ' . $tr . $tr2 . '%.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, -$sy, $objattr['INNER-X'] * _MPDFK - $sx * $objattr['wmf_x'], (($this->h - $objattr['INNER-Y']) * _MPDFK) + $sy * $objattr['wmf_y'], $objattr['ID']); // mPDF 5.7.3 TRANSFORMS 
  7010.                 } else 
  7011.                 /** -- END IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  7012.                 if (isset($objattr['itype']) && $objattr['itype'] == 'svg') { 
  7013.                     $outstring = sprintf('q ' . $tr . $tr2 . '%.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, -$sy, $objattr['INNER-X'] * _MPDFK - $sx * $objattr['wmf_x'], (($this->h - $objattr['INNER-Y']) * _MPDFK) + $sy * $objattr['wmf_y'], $objattr['ID']); // mPDF 5.7.3 TRANSFORMS 
  7014.                 } else { 
  7015.                     $outstring = sprintf("q " . $tr . $tr2 . "%.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm " . $gradmask . "/I%d Do Q", $obiw * _MPDFK, $obih * _MPDFK, $objattr['INNER-X'] * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($objattr['INNER-Y'] + $obih )) * _MPDFK, $objattr['ID']); // mPDF 5.7.3 TRANSFORMS 
  7016.                 } 
  7017.                 $this->_out($outstring); 
  7018.                 // LINK 
  7019.                 if (isset($objattr['link'])) 
  7020.                     $this->Link($objattr['INNER-X'], $objattr['INNER-Y'], $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'], $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'], $objattr['link']); 
  7021.                 if (isset($objattr['opacity'])) { 
  7022.                     $this->SetAlpha(1); 
  7023.                 } 
  7024.  
  7025.                 // mPDF 5.7.3 TRANSFORMS 
  7026.                 // Transform also affects image borders 
  7027.                 if ($tr2) { 
  7028.                     $this->_out('q ' . $tr2 . ' '); 
  7029.                 } 
  7030.                 if ((isset($objattr['border_top']) && $objattr['border_top'] > 0) || (isset($objattr['border_left']) && $objattr['border_left'] > 0) || (isset($objattr['border_right']) && $objattr['border_right'] > 0) || (isset($objattr['border_bottom']) && $objattr['border_bottom'] > 0)) { 
  7031.                     $this->PaintImgBorder($objattr, $is_table); 
  7032.                 } 
  7033.                 if ($tr2) { 
  7034.                     $this->_out('Q'); 
  7035.                 } 
  7036.  
  7037.                 if (isset($objattr['visibility']) && $objattr['visibility'] != 'visible' && $objattr['visibility']) { 
  7038.                     $this->SetVisibility('visible'); 
  7039.                 } 
  7040.                 if (isset($objattr['z-index']) && $objattr['z-index'] > 0 && $this->current_layer == 0) { 
  7041.                     $this->EndLayer(); 
  7042.                 } 
  7043.                 // mPDF 5.7.3 TRANSFORMS 
  7044.                 if (isset($objattr['transform'])) { 
  7045.                     $this->_out("\n" . '% ETR'); // End Transform 
  7046.                 } 
  7047.             } 
  7048.  
  7049.             /** -- BARCODES -- */ 
  7050.             // BARCODE 
  7051.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'barcode') { 
  7052.                 $bgcol = $this->ConvertColor(255); 
  7053.                 if (isset($objattr['bgcolor']) && $objattr['bgcolor']) { 
  7054.                     $bgcol = $objattr['bgcolor']; 
  7055.                 } 
  7056.                 $col = $this->ConvertColor(0); 
  7057.                 if (isset($objattr['color']) && $objattr['color']) { 
  7058.                     $col = $objattr['color']; 
  7059.                 } 
  7060.                 $this->SetFColor($bgcol); 
  7061.                 $this->Rect($objattr['BORDER-X'], $objattr['BORDER-Y'], $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'], $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'], 'F'); 
  7062.                 $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  7063.                 if (isset($objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'])) { 
  7064.                     $this->PaintImgBorder($objattr, $is_table); 
  7065.                 } 
  7066.                 if ($objattr['btype'] == 'EAN13' || $objattr['btype'] == 'ISBN' || $objattr['btype'] == 'ISSN' || $objattr['btype'] == 'UPCA' || $objattr['btype'] == 'UPCE' || $objattr['btype'] == 'EAN8') { 
  7067.                     $this->WriteBarcode($objattr['code'], $objattr['showtext'], $objattr['INNER-X'], $objattr['INNER-Y'], $objattr['bsize'], 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, $objattr['bheight'], $bgcol, $col, $objattr['btype'], $objattr['bsupp'], (isset($objattr['bsupp_code']) ? $objattr['bsupp_code'] : ''), $k); 
  7068.                 } 
  7069.                 // QR-code 
  7070.                 elseif ($objattr['btype'] == 'QR') { 
  7071.                     if (!class_exists('QRcode', false)) { 
  7072.                         include(_MPDF_PATH . 'qrcode/qrcode.class.php'); 
  7073.                     } 
  7074.                     $this->qrcode = new QRcode($objattr['code'], $objattr['errorlevel']); 
  7075.                     $this->qrcode->displayFPDF($this, $objattr['INNER-X'], $objattr['INNER-Y'], $objattr['bsize'] * 25, array(255, 255, 255), array(0, 0, 0)); 
  7076.                 } else { 
  7077.                     $this->WriteBarcode2($objattr['code'], $objattr['INNER-X'], $objattr['INNER-Y'], $objattr['bsize'], $objattr['bheight'], $bgcol, $col, $objattr['btype'], $objattr['pr_ratio'], $k); 
  7078.                 } 
  7079.             } 
  7080.             /** -- END BARCODES -- */ 
  7081.  
  7082.             // TEXT CIRCLE 
  7083.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'textcircle') { 
  7084.                 $bgcol = ''; 
  7085.                 if (isset($objattr['bgcolor']) && $objattr['bgcolor']) { 
  7086.                     $bgcol = $objattr['bgcolor']; 
  7087.                 } 
  7088.                 $col = $this->ConvertColor(0); 
  7089.                 if (isset($objattr['color']) && $objattr['color']) { 
  7090.                     $col = $objattr['color']; 
  7091.                 } 
  7092.                 $this->SetTColor($col); 
  7093.                 $this->SetFColor($bgcol); 
  7094.                 if ($bgcol) 
  7095.                     $this->Rect($objattr['BORDER-X'], $objattr['BORDER-Y'], $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'], $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'], 'F'); 
  7096.                 $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  7097.                 if (isset($objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'])) { 
  7098.                     $this->PaintImgBorder($objattr, $is_table); 
  7099.                 } 
  7100.                 if (!class_exists('directw', false)) { 
  7101.                     include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/directw.php'); 
  7102.                 } 
  7103.                 if (empty($this->directw)) { 
  7104.                     $this->directw = new directw($this); 
  7105.                 } 
  7106.                 if (isset($objattr['top-text'])) { 
  7107.                     $this->directw->CircularText($objattr['INNER-X'] + $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] / 2, $objattr['INNER-Y'] + $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] / 2, $objattr['r'] / $k, $objattr['top-text'], 'top', $objattr['fontfamily'], $objattr['fontsize'] / $k, $objattr['fontstyle'], $objattr['space-width'], $objattr['char-width'], (isset($objattr['divider']) ? $objattr['divider'] : '')); 
  7108.                 } 
  7109.                 if (isset($objattr['bottom-text'])) { 
  7110.                     $this->directw->CircularText($objattr['INNER-X'] + $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] / 2, $objattr['INNER-Y'] + $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] / 2, $objattr['r'] / $k, $objattr['bottom-text'], 'bottom', $objattr['fontfamily'], $objattr['fontsize'] / $k, $objattr['fontstyle'], $objattr['space-width'], $objattr['char-width'], (isset($objattr['divider']) ? $objattr['divider'] : '')); 
  7111.                 } 
  7112.             } 
  7113.  
  7114.             $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  7115.  
  7116.             // LIST MARKERS (Text or bullets)    // mPDF 6  Lists 
  7117.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'listmarker') { 
  7118.                 if (isset($objattr['fontfamily'])) { 
  7119.                     $this->SetFont($objattr['fontfamily'], $objattr['fontstyle'], $objattr['fontsizept']); 
  7120.                 } 
  7121.                 $col = $this->ConvertColor(0); 
  7122.                 if (isset($objattr['colorarray']) && ($objattr['colorarray'])) { 
  7123.                     $col = $objattr['colorarray']; 
  7124.                 } 
  7125.  
  7126.                 if (isset($objattr['bullet']) && $objattr['bullet']) { // Used for position "outside" only 
  7127.                     $type = $objattr['bullet']; 
  7128.                     $size = $objattr['size']; 
  7129.  
  7130.                     if ($objattr['listmarkerposition'] == 'inside') { 
  7131.                         $adjx = $size / 2; 
  7132.                         if ($objattr['dir'] == 'rtl') { 
  7133.                             $adjx += $objattr['offset']; 
  7134.                         } 
  7135.                         $this->x += $adjx; 
  7136.                     } else { 
  7137.                         $adjx = $objattr['offset']; 
  7138.                         $adjx += $size / 2; 
  7139.                         if ($objattr['dir'] == 'rtl') { 
  7140.                             $this->x += $adjx; 
  7141.                         } else { 
  7142.                             $this->x -= $adjx; 
  7143.                         } 
  7144.                     } 
  7145.  
  7146.                     $yadj = $objattr['lineBox']['glyphYorigin']; 
  7147.                     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['XHeight']) && $this->CurrentFont['desc']['XHeight']) { 
  7148.                         $xh = $this->CurrentFont['desc']['XHeight']; 
  7149.                     } else { 
  7150.                         $xh = 500; 
  7151.                     } 
  7152.                     $yadj -= ($this->FontSize * $xh / 1000) * 0.625; // Vertical height of bullet (centre) from baseline= XHeight * 0.625 
  7153.                     $this->y += $yadj; 
  7154.  
  7155.                     $this->_printListBullet($this->x, $this->y, $size, $type, $col); 
  7156.                 } else { 
  7157.                     $this->SetTColor($col); 
  7158.                     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($texto); 
  7159.                     //  NB If change marker-offset, also need to alter in function _getListMarkerWidth 
  7160.                     $adjx = $this->ConvertSize($this->list_marker_offset, $this->FontSize); 
  7161.                     if ($objattr['dir'] == 'rtl') { 
  7162.                         $align = 'L'; 
  7163.                         $this->x += $adjx; 
  7164.                     } else { 
  7165.                         // Use these lines to set as marker-offset, right-aligned - default 
  7166.                         $align = 'R'; 
  7167.                         $this->x -= $adjx; 
  7168.                         $this->x -= $w; 
  7169.                     } 
  7170.                     $this->Cell($w, $this->FontSize, $texto, 0, 0, $align, 0, '', 0, 0, 0, 'T', 0, false, false, 0, $objattr['lineBox']); 
  7171.                     $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  7172.                 } 
  7173.             } 
  7174.  
  7175.             // DOT-TAB 
  7176.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'dottab') { 
  7177.                 if (isset($objattr['fontfamily'])) { 
  7178.                     $this->SetFont($objattr['fontfamily'], '', $objattr['fontsize']); 
  7179.                 } 
  7180.                 $sp = $this->GetStringWidth(' '); 
  7181.                 $nb = floor(($w - 2 * $sp) / $this->GetStringWidth('.')); 
  7182.                 if ($nb > 0) { 
  7183.                     $dots = ' ' . str_repeat('.', $nb) . ' '; 
  7184.                 } else { 
  7185.                     $dots = ' '; 
  7186.                 } 
  7187.                 $col = $this->ConvertColor(0); 
  7188.                 if (isset($objattr['colorarray']) && ($objattr['colorarray'])) { 
  7189.                     $col = $objattr['colorarray']; 
  7190.                 } 
  7191.                 $this->SetTColor($col); 
  7192.                 $save_dh = $this->divheight; 
  7193.                 $save_sbd = $this->spanborddet; 
  7194.                 $save_textvar = $this->textvar; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7195.                 $this->spanborddet = ''; 
  7196.                 $this->divheight = 0; 
  7197.                 $this->textvar = 0x00; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7198.  
  7199.                 $this->Cell($w, $h, $dots, 0, 0, 'C', 0, '', 0, 0, 0, 'T', 0, false, false, 0, $objattr['lineBox']); // mPDF 6 DOTTAB 
  7200.                 $this->spanborddet = $save_sbd; 
  7201.                 $this->textvar = $save_textvar; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7202.                 $this->divheight = $save_dh; 
  7203.                 $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  7204.             } 
  7205.  
  7206.             /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  7207.             // TEXT/PASSWORD INPUT 
  7208.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'input' && ($objattr['subtype'] == 'TEXT' || $objattr['subtype'] == 'PASSWORD')) { 
  7209.                 $this->mpdfform->print_ob_text($objattr, $w, $h, $texto, $rtlalign, $k, $blockdir); 
  7210.             } 
  7211.  
  7212.             // TEXTAREA 
  7213.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'textarea') { 
  7214.                 $this->mpdfform->print_ob_textarea($objattr, $w, $h, $texto, $rtlalign, $k, $blockdir); 
  7215.             } 
  7216.  
  7217.             // SELECT 
  7218.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'select') { 
  7219.                 $this->mpdfform->print_ob_select($objattr, $w, $h, $texto, $rtlalign, $k, $blockdir); 
  7220.             } 
  7221.  
  7222.  
  7223.             // INPUT/BUTTON as IMAGE 
  7224.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'input' && $objattr['subtype'] == 'IMAGE') { 
  7225.                 $this->mpdfform->print_ob_imageinput($objattr, $w, $h, $texto, $rtlalign, $k, $blockdir); 
  7226.             } 
  7227.  
  7228.             // BUTTON 
  7229.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'input' && ($objattr['subtype'] == 'SUBMIT' || $objattr['subtype'] == 'RESET' || $objattr['subtype'] == 'BUTTON')) { 
  7230.                 $this->mpdfform->print_ob_button($objattr, $w, $h, $texto, $rtlalign, $k, $blockdir); 
  7231.             } 
  7232.  
  7233.             // CHECKBOX 
  7234.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'input' && ($objattr['subtype'] == 'CHECKBOX')) { 
  7235.                 $this->mpdfform->print_ob_checkbox($objattr, $w, $h, $texto, $rtlalign, $k, $blockdir, $x, $y); 
  7236.             } 
  7237.             // RADIO 
  7238.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'input' && ($objattr['subtype'] == 'RADIO')) { 
  7239.                 $this->mpdfform->print_ob_radio($objattr, $w, $h, $texto, $rtlalign, $k, $blockdir, $x, $y); 
  7240.             } 
  7241.             /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  7242.         } 
  7243.         $this->SetFont($save_currentfontfamily, $save_currentfontstyle, $save_currentfontsize); 
  7244.         $this->y = $save_y; 
  7245.         $this->x = $save_x; 
  7246.         unset($content); 
  7247.     } 
  7248.  
  7249.     function _printListBullet($x, $y, $size, $type, $color) 
  7250.     { 
  7251.         // x and y are the centre of the bullet; size is the width and/or height in mm 
  7252.         $fcol = $this->SetTColor($color, true); 
  7253.         $lcol = strtoupper($fcol); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG 
  7254.         $this->_out(sprintf('q %s %s', $lcol, $fcol)); 
  7255.         $this->_out('0 j 0 J [] 0 d'); 
  7256.         if ($type == 'square') { 
  7257.             $size *= 0.85; // Smaller to appear the same size as circle/disc 
  7258.             $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re f', ($x - $size / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y + $size / 2) * _MPDFK, ($size) * _MPDFK, (-$size) * _MPDFK)); 
  7259.         } elseif ($type == 'disc') { 
  7260.             $this->Circle($x, $y, $size / 2, 'F'); // Fill 
  7261.         } elseif ($type == 'circle') { 
  7262.             $lw = $size / 12; // Line width 
  7263.             $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F w ', $lw * _MPDFK)); 
  7264.             $this->Circle($x, $y, $size / 2 - $lw / 2, 'S'); // Stroke 
  7265.         } 
  7266.         $this->_out('Q'); 
  7267.     } 
  7268.  
  7269.     // mPDF 6 
  7270.     // Get previous character and move pointers 
  7271.     function _moveToPrevChar(&$contentctr, &$charctr, $content) 
  7272.     { 
  7273.         $lastchar = false; 
  7274.         $charctr--; 
  7275.         while ($charctr < 0) { // go back to previous $content[] 
  7276.             $contentctr--; 
  7277.             if ($contentctr < 0) { 
  7278.                 return false; 
  7279.             } 
  7280.             if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7281.                 $charctr = strlen($content[$contentctr]) - 1; 
  7282.             } else { 
  7283.                 $charctr = mb_strlen($content[$contentctr], $this->mb_enc) - 1; 
  7284.             } 
  7285.         } 
  7286.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7287.             $lastchar = $content[$contentctr][$charctr]; 
  7288.         } else { 
  7289.             $lastchar = mb_substr($content[$contentctr], $charctr, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  7290.         } 
  7291.         return $lastchar; 
  7292.     } 
  7293.  
  7294.     // Get previous character 
  7295.     function _getPrevChar($contentctr, $charctr, $content) 
  7296.     { 
  7297.         $lastchar = false; 
  7298.         $charctr--; 
  7299.         while ($charctr < 0) { // go back to previous $content[] 
  7300.             $contentctr--; 
  7301.             if ($contentctr < 0) { 
  7302.                 return false; 
  7303.             } 
  7304.             if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7305.                 $charctr = strlen($content[$contentctr]) - 1; 
  7306.             } else { 
  7307.                 $charctr = mb_strlen($content[$contentctr], $this->mb_enc) - 1; 
  7308.             } 
  7309.         } 
  7310.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7311.             $lastchar = $content[$contentctr][$charctr]; 
  7312.         } else { 
  7313.             $lastchar = mb_substr($content[$contentctr], $charctr, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  7314.         } 
  7315.         return $lastchar; 
  7316.     } 
  7317.  
  7318.     function WriteFlowingBlock($s, $sOTLdata) 
  7319.     { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7320.         $currentx = $this->x; 
  7321.         $is_table = $this->flowingBlockAttr['is_table']; 
  7322.         $table_draft = $this->flowingBlockAttr['table_draft']; 
  7323.         // width of all the content so far in points 
  7324.         $contentWidth = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['contentWidth']; 
  7325.         // cell width in points 
  7326.         $maxWidth = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['width']; 
  7327.         $lineCount = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['lineCount']; 
  7328.         // line height in user units 
  7329.         $stackHeight = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['height']; 
  7330.         $align = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['align']; 
  7331.         $content = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['content']; 
  7332.         $contentB = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['contentB']; 
  7333.         $font = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['font']; 
  7334.         $valign = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['valign']; 
  7335.         $blockstate = $this->flowingBlockAttr['blockstate']; 
  7336.         $cOTLdata = & $this->flowingBlockAttr['cOTLdata']; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7337.  
  7338.         $newblock = $this->flowingBlockAttr['newblock']; 
  7339.         $blockdir = $this->flowingBlockAttr['blockdir']; 
  7340.  
  7341.         // *********** BLOCK BACKGROUND COLOR ***************** // 
  7342.         if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolor'] && !$is_table) { 
  7343.             $fill = 0; 
  7344.         } else { 
  7345.             $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  7346.             $fill = 0; 
  7347.         } 
  7348.         $font[] = $this->saveFont(); 
  7349.         $content[] = ''; 
  7350.         $contentB[] = ''; 
  7351.         $cOTLdata[] = $sOTLdata; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7352.         $currContent = & $content[count($content) - 1]; 
  7353.  
  7354.         $CJKoverflow = false; 
  7355.         $Oikomi = false; // mPDF 6 
  7356.         $hanger = ''; 
  7357.  
  7358.         // COLS 
  7359.         $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  7360.         if ($this->ColActive && !$is_table) { 
  7361.             $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  7362.         } // *COLUMNS* 
  7363.  
  7364.         /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  7365.         if ($is_table) { 
  7366.             $ipaddingL = 0; 
  7367.             $ipaddingR = 0; 
  7368.             $paddingL = 0; 
  7369.             $paddingR = 0; 
  7370.             $cpaddingadjustL = 0; 
  7371.             $cpaddingadjustR = 0; 
  7372.             // Added mPDF 3.0 
  7373.             $fpaddingR = 0; 
  7374.             $fpaddingL = 0; 
  7375.         } else { 
  7376.             /** -- END TABLES -- */ 
  7377.             $ipaddingL = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left']; 
  7378.             $ipaddingR = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right']; 
  7379.             $paddingL = ($ipaddingL * _MPDFK); 
  7380.             $paddingR = ($ipaddingR * _MPDFK); 
  7381.             $this->cMarginL = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w']; 
  7382.             $cpaddingadjustL = -$this->cMarginL; 
  7383.             $this->cMarginR = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['w']; 
  7384.             $cpaddingadjustR = -$this->cMarginR; 
  7385.             // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV 
  7386.             $fpaddingR = 0; 
  7387.             $fpaddingL = 0; 
  7388.             /** -- CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  7389.             if (count($this->floatDivs)) { 
  7390.                 list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl); 
  7391.                 if ($r_exists) { 
  7392.                     $fpaddingR = $r_width; 
  7393.                 } 
  7394.                 if ($l_exists) { 
  7395.                     $fpaddingL = $l_width; 
  7396.                 } 
  7397.             } 
  7398.             /** -- END CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  7399.  
  7400.             $usey = $this->y + 0.002; 
  7401.             if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && ($lineCount == 0)) { 
  7402.                 $usey += $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  7403.             } 
  7404.             /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  7405.             // If float exists at this level 
  7406.             if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['R']['skipline']) { 
  7407.                 $fpaddingR += $this->floatmargins['R']['w']; 
  7408.             } 
  7409.             if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['L']['skipline']) { 
  7410.                 $fpaddingL += $this->floatmargins['L']['w']; 
  7411.             } 
  7412.             /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  7413.         } // *TABLES* 
  7414.         //OBJECTS - IMAGES & FORM Elements (NB has already skipped line/page if required - in printbuffer) 
  7415.         if (substr($s, 0, 3) == "\xbb\xa4\xac") { //identifier has been identified! 
  7416.             $objattr = $this->_getObjAttr($s); 
  7417.             $h_corr = 0; 
  7418.             if ($is_table) { // *TABLES* 
  7419.                 $maximumW = ($maxWidth / _MPDFK) - ($this->cellPaddingL + $this->cMarginL + $this->cellPaddingR + $this->cMarginR);  // *TABLES* 
  7420.             } // *TABLES* 
  7421.             else { // *TABLES* 
  7422.                 if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && ($lineCount == 0) && (!$is_table)) { 
  7423.                     $h_corr = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  7424.                 } 
  7425.                 $maximumW = ($maxWidth / _MPDFK) - ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['w'] + $fpaddingL + $fpaddingR ); 
  7426.             } // *TABLES* 
  7427.             $objattr = $this->inlineObject($objattr['type'], $this->lMargin + $fpaddingL + ($contentWidth / _MPDFK), ($this->y + $h_corr), $objattr, $this->lMargin, ($contentWidth / _MPDFK), $maximumW, $stackHeight, true, $is_table); 
  7428.  
  7429.             // SET LINEHEIGHT for this line ================ RESET AT END 
  7430.             $stackHeight = MAX($stackHeight, $objattr['OUTER-HEIGHT']); 
  7431.             $this->objectbuffer[count($content) - 1] = $objattr; 
  7432.             // if (isset($objattr['vertical-align'])) { $valign = $objattr['vertical-align']; } 
  7433.             // else { $valign = ''; } 
  7434.             // LIST MARKERS    // mPDF 6  Lists 
  7435.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'image' && isset($objattr['listmarker']) && $objattr['listmarker'] && $objattr['listmarkerposition'] == 'outside') { 
  7436.                 // do nothing 
  7437.             } else { 
  7438.                 $contentWidth += ($objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'] * _MPDFK); 
  7439.             } 
  7440.             return; 
  7441.         } 
  7442.  
  7443.         $lbw = $rbw = 0; // Border widths 
  7444.         if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  7445.             if (isset($this->spanborddet['L'])) 
  7446.                 $lbw = $this->spanborddet['L']['w']; 
  7447.             if (isset($this->spanborddet['R'])) 
  7448.                 $rbw = $this->spanborddet['R']['w']; 
  7449.         } 
  7450.  
  7451.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7452.             $clen = strlen($s); 
  7453.         } else { 
  7454.             $clen = mb_strlen($s, $this->mb_enc); 
  7455.         } 
  7456.  
  7457.         // for every character in the string 
  7458.         for ($i = 0; $i < $clen; $i++) { 
  7459.  
  7460.             // extract the current character 
  7461.             // get the width of the character in points 
  7462.             if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7463.                 $c = $s[$i]; 
  7464.                 // Soft Hyphens chr(173) 
  7465.                 $cw = ($this->GetCharWidthCore($c) * _MPDFK); 
  7466.                 if (($this->textvar & FC_KERNING) && $i > 0) { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7467.                     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$s[($i - 1)]][$c])) { 
  7468.                         $cw += ($this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$s[($i - 1)]][$c] * $this->FontSizePt / 1000 ); 
  7469.                     } 
  7470.                 } 
  7471.             } else { 
  7472.                 $c = mb_substr($s, $i, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  7473.                 $cw = ($this->GetCharWidthNonCore($c, false) * _MPDFK); 
  7474.                 // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7475.                 // Use OTL GPOS 
  7476.                 if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && ($this->CurrentFont['useOTL'] & 0xFF)) { 
  7477.                     // ...WriteFlowingBlock... 
  7478.                     // Only  add XAdvanceL (not sure at present whether RTL or LTR writing direction) 
  7479.                     // At this point, XAdvanceL and XAdvanceR will balance 
  7480.                     if (isset($sOTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['XAdvanceL'])) { 
  7481.                         $cw += $sOTLdata['GPOSinfo'][$i]['XAdvanceL'] * (1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']) * ($this->FontSize / 1000) * _MPDFK; 
  7482.                     } 
  7483.                 } 
  7484.                 if (($this->textvar & FC_KERNING) && $i > 0) { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7485.                     $lastc = mb_substr($s, ($i - 1), 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  7486.                     $ulastc = $this->UTF8StringToArray($lastc, false); 
  7487.                     $uc = $this->UTF8StringToArray($c, false); 
  7488.                     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$ulastc[0]][$uc[0]])) { 
  7489.                         $cw += ($this->CurrentFont['kerninfo'][$ulastc[0]][$uc[0]] * $this->FontSizePt / 1000 ); 
  7490.                     } 
  7491.                 } 
  7492.             } 
  7493.  
  7494.             if ($i == 0) { 
  7495.                 $cw += $lbw * _MPDFK; 
  7496.                 $contentB[(count($contentB) - 1)] .= 'L'; 
  7497.             } 
  7498.             if ($i == ($clen - 1)) { 
  7499.                 $cw += $rbw * _MPDFK; 
  7500.                 $contentB[(count($contentB) - 1)] .= 'R'; 
  7501.             } 
  7502.             if ($c == ' ') { 
  7503.                 $currContent .= $c; 
  7504.                 $contentWidth += $cw; 
  7505.                 continue; 
  7506.             } 
  7507.  
  7508.             // Paragraph INDENT 
  7509.             $WidthCorrection = 0; 
  7510.             if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent']) && ($lineCount == 0) && (!$is_table) && ($align != 'C')) { 
  7511.                 $ti = $this->ConvertSize($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent'], $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'], $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']['size'], false);  // mPDF 5.7.4 
  7512.                 $WidthCorrection = ($ti * _MPDFK); 
  7513.             } 
  7514.             // OUTDENT 
  7515.             foreach ($this->objectbuffer AS $k => $objattr) {   // mPDF 6 DOTTAB 
  7516.                 if ($objattr['type'] == 'dottab') { 
  7517.                     $WidthCorrection -= ($objattr['outdent'] * _MPDFK); 
  7518.                     break; 
  7519.                 } 
  7520.             } 
  7521.  
  7522.  
  7523.             // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV 
  7524.             $fpaddingR = 0; 
  7525.             $fpaddingL = 0; 
  7526.             /** -- CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  7527.             if (count($this->floatDivs)) { 
  7528.                 list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl); 
  7529.                 if ($r_exists) { 
  7530.                     $fpaddingR = $r_width; 
  7531.                 } 
  7532.                 if ($l_exists) { 
  7533.                     $fpaddingL = $l_width; 
  7534.                 } 
  7535.             } 
  7536.             /** -- END CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  7537.  
  7538.             $usey = $this->y + 0.002; 
  7539.             if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && ($lineCount == 0)) { 
  7540.                 $usey += $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  7541.             } 
  7542.  
  7543.             /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  7544.             // If float exists at this level 
  7545.             if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['R']['skipline']) { 
  7546.                 $fpaddingR += $this->floatmargins['R']['w']; 
  7547.             } 
  7548.             if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['L']['skipline']) { 
  7549.                 $fpaddingL += $this->floatmargins['L']['w']; 
  7550.             } 
  7551.             /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  7552.  
  7553.  
  7554.             // try adding another char 
  7555.             if (( $contentWidth + $cw > $maxWidth - $WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) * _MPDFK) - ($paddingL + $paddingR + (($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * _MPDFK) ) + 0.001)) {// 0.001 is to correct for deviations converting mm=>pts 
  7556.                 // it won't fit, output what we already have 
  7557.                 $lineCount++; 
  7558.  
  7559.                 // contains any content that didn't make it into this print 
  7560.                 $savedContent = ''; 
  7561.                 $savedContentB = ''; 
  7562.                 $savedOTLdata = array(); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7563.                 $savedFont = array(); 
  7564.                 $savedObj = array(); 
  7565.                 $savedPreOTLdata = array(); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7566.                 $savedPreContent = array(); 
  7567.                 $savedPreContentB = array(); 
  7568.                 $savedPreFont = array(); 
  7569.  
  7570.                 // mPDF 6 
  7571.                 // New line-breaking algorithm 
  7572.                 ///////////////////// 
  7573.                 // LINE BREAKING 
  7574.                 ///////////////////// 
  7575.                 $breakfound = false; 
  7576.                 $contentctr = count($content) - 1; 
  7577.                 if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7578.                     $charctr = strlen($currContent); 
  7579.                 } else { 
  7580.                     $charctr = mb_strlen($currContent, $this->mb_enc); 
  7581.                 } 
  7582.                 $checkchar = $c; 
  7583.                 $prevchar = $this->_getPrevChar($contentctr, $charctr, $content); 
  7584.  
  7585.                 /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  7586.                 ///////////////////// 
  7587.                 // 1) CJK Overflowing a) punctuation or b) Oikomi 
  7588.                 ///////////////////// 
  7589.                 // Next character ($c) is suitable to add as overhanging or squeezed punctuation, or Oikomi 
  7590.                 if ($CJKoverflow || $Oikomi) { // If flag already set 
  7591.                     $CJKoverflow = false; 
  7592.                     $Oikomi = false; 
  7593.                     $breakfound = true; 
  7594.                 } 
  7595.                 if (!$this->usingCoreFont && !$breakfound && $this->checkCJK) { 
  7596.                     // Get next/following character (in this chunk) 
  7597.                     $followingchar = ''; 
  7598.                     if ($i < ($clen - 1)) { 
  7599.                         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7600.                             $followingchar = $s[$i + 1]; 
  7601.                         } else { 
  7602.                             $followingchar = mb_substr($s, $i + 1, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  7603.                         } 
  7604.                     } 
  7605.                     ///////////////////// 
  7606.                     // 1a) Overflow punctuation 
  7607.                     ///////////////////// 
  7608.                     if (preg_match("/[" . $this->pregCJKchars . "]/u", $prevchar) && preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKoverflow . "]/u", $checkchar) && $this->allowCJKorphans) { 
  7609.                         // add character onto this line 
  7610.                         $currContent .= $c; 
  7611.                         $contentWidth += $cw; 
  7612.                         $CJKoverflow = true; // Set flag 
  7613.                         continue; 
  7614.                     } 
  7615.                     ///////////////////// 
  7616.                     // 1b) Try squeezing another character(s) onto this line = Oikomi, if character cannot end line 
  7617.                     //  or next character cannot start line (and not splitting CJK numerals) 
  7618.                     ///////////////////// 
  7619.                     // NB otherwise it move lastchar(s) to next line to keep $c company = Oidashi, which is done below in standard way 
  7620.                     elseif (preg_match("/[" . $this->pregCJKchars . "]/u", $checkchar) && $this->allowCJKorphans && 
  7621.                         (preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKleading . "]/u", $followingchar) || preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKfollowing . "]/u", $checkchar)) && 
  7622.                         !preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKleading . "]/u", $checkchar) && !preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKfollowing . "]/u", $followingchar) && 
  7623.                         !(preg_match("/[0-9\x{ff10}-\x{ff19}]/u", $followingchar) && preg_match("/[0-9\x{ff10}-\x{ff19}]/u", $checkchar))) { 
  7624.                         // add character onto this line 
  7625.                         $currContent .= $c; 
  7626.                         $contentWidth += $cw; 
  7627.                         $Oikomi = true; // Set flag 
  7628.                         continue; 
  7629.                     } 
  7630.                 } 
  7631.                 /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  7632.                 /** -- HYPHENATION -- */ 
  7633.                 ///////////////////// 
  7634.                 // AUTOMATIC HYPHENATION 
  7635.                 // 2) Automatic hyphen in current word (does not cross tags) 
  7636.                 ///////////////////// 
  7637.                 if (isset($this->textparam['hyphens']) && $this->textparam['hyphens'] == 1) { 
  7638.                     $currWord = ''; 
  7639.                     // Look back and ahead to get current word 
  7640.                     for ($ac = $charctr - 1; $ac >= 0; $ac--) { 
  7641.                         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7642.                             $addc = substr($currContent, $ac, 1); 
  7643.                         } else { 
  7644.                             $addc = mb_substr($currContent, $ac, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  7645.                         } 
  7646.                         if ($addc == ' ') { 
  7647.                             break; 
  7648.                         } 
  7649.                         $currWord = $addc . $currWord; 
  7650.                     } 
  7651.                     $start = $ac + 1; 
  7652.                     for ($ac = $i; $ac < ($clen - 1); $ac++) { 
  7653.                         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7654.                             $addc = substr($s, $ac, 1); 
  7655.                         } else { 
  7656.                             $addc = mb_substr($s, $ac, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  7657.                         } 
  7658.                         if ($addc == ' ') { 
  7659.                             break; 
  7660.                         } 
  7661.                         $currWord .= $addc; 
  7662.                     } 
  7663.                     $ptr = $this->hyphenateWord($currWord, $charctr - $start); 
  7664.                     if ($ptr > -1) { 
  7665.                         $breakfound = array($contentctr, $start + $ptr, $contentctr, $start + $ptr, 'hyphen'); 
  7666.                     } 
  7667.                 } 
  7668.                 /** -- END HYPHENATION -- */ 
  7669.  
  7670.                 // Search backwards to find first line-break opportunity 
  7671.                 while ($breakfound == false && $prevchar !== false) { 
  7672.                     $cutcontentctr = $contentctr; 
  7673.                     $cutcharctr = $charctr; 
  7674.                     $prevchar = $this->_moveToPrevChar($contentctr, $charctr, $content); 
  7675.                     ///////////////////// 
  7676.                     // 3) Break at SPACE 
  7677.                     ///////////////////// 
  7678.                     if ($prevchar == ' ') { 
  7679.                         $breakfound = array($contentctr, $charctr, $cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, 'discard'); 
  7680.                     } 
  7681.                     ///////////////////// 
  7682.                     // 4) Break at U+200B in current word (Khmer, Lao & Thai Invisible word boundary, and Tibetan) 
  7683.                     ///////////////////// 
  7684.                     elseif ($prevchar == "\xe2\x80\x8b") { // U+200B Zero-width Word Break 
  7685.                         $breakfound = array($contentctr, $charctr, $cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, 'discard'); 
  7686.                     } 
  7687.                     ///////////////////// 
  7688.                     // 5) Break at Hard HYPHEN '-' or U+2010 
  7689.                     ///////////////////// 
  7690.                     elseif (isset($this->textparam['hyphens']) && $this->textparam['hyphens'] != 2 && ($prevchar == '-' || $prevchar == "\xe2\x80\x90")) { 
  7691.                         // Don't break a URL 
  7692.                         // Look back to get first part of current word 
  7693.                         $checkw = ''; 
  7694.                         for ($ac = $charctr - 1; $ac >= 0; $ac--) { 
  7695.                             if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7696.                                 $addc = substr($currContent, $ac, 1); 
  7697.                             } else { 
  7698.                                 $addc = mb_substr($currContent, $ac, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  7699.                             } 
  7700.                             if ($addc == ' ') { 
  7701.                                 break; 
  7702.                             } 
  7703.                             $checkw = $addc . $checkw; 
  7704.                         } 
  7705.                         // Don't break if HyphenMinus AND (a URL or before a numeral or before a >) 
  7706.                         if ((!preg_match('/(http:|ftp:|https:|www\.)/', $checkw) && $checkchar != '>' && !preg_match('/[0-9]/', $checkchar)) || $prevchar == "\xe2\x80\x90") { 
  7707.                             $breakfound = array($cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, $cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, 'cut'); 
  7708.                         } 
  7709.                     } 
  7710.                     ///////////////////// 
  7711.                     // 6) Break at Soft HYPHEN (replace with hard hyphen) 
  7712.                     ///////////////////// 
  7713.                     elseif (isset($this->textparam['hyphens']) && $this->textparam['hyphens'] != 2 && !$this->usingCoreFont && $prevchar == "\xc2\xad") { 
  7714.                         $breakfound = array($cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, $cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, 'cut'); 
  7715.                         $content[$contentctr] = mb_substr($content[$contentctr], 0, $charctr, $this->mb_enc) . '-' . mb_substr($content[$contentctr], $charctr + 1, mb_strlen($content[$contentctr]), $this->mb_enc); 
  7716.                         if (!empty($cOTLdata[$contentctr])) { 
  7717.                             $cOTLdata[$contentctr]['char_data'][$charctr] = array('bidi_class' => 9, 'uni' => 45); 
  7718.                             $cOTLdata[$contentctr]['group'][$charctr] = 'C'; 
  7719.                         } 
  7720.                     } elseif (isset($this->textparam['hyphens']) && $this->textparam['hyphens'] != 2 && $this->FontFamily != 'csymbol' && $this->FontFamily != 'czapfdingbats' && $prevchar == chr(173)) { 
  7721.                         $breakfound = array($cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, $cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, 'cut'); 
  7722.                         $content[$contentctr] = substr($content[$contentctr], 0, $charctr) . '-' . substr($content[$contentctr], $charctr + 1); 
  7723.                     } 
  7724.                     /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  7725.                     ///////////////////// 
  7726.                     // 7) Break at CJK characters (unless forbidden characters to end or start line) 
  7727.                     // CJK Avoiding line break in the middle of numerals 
  7728.                     ///////////////////// 
  7729.                     elseif (!$this->usingCoreFont && $this->checkCJK && preg_match("/[" . $this->pregCJKchars . "]/u", $checkchar) && 
  7730.                         !preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKfollowing . "]/u", $checkchar) && !preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKleading . "]/u", $prevchar) && 
  7731.                         !(preg_match("/[0-9\x{ff10}-\x{ff19}]/u", $prevchar) && preg_match("/[0-9\x{ff10}-\x{ff19}]/u", $checkchar))) { 
  7732.                         $breakfound = array($cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, $cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, 'cut'); 
  7733.                     } 
  7734.                     /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  7735.                     ///////////////////// 
  7736.                     // 8) Break at OBJECT (Break before all objects here - selected objects are moved forward to next line below e.g. dottab) 
  7737.                     ///////////////////// 
  7738.                     if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$contentctr])) { 
  7739.                         $breakfound = array($cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, $cutcontentctr, $cutcharctr, 'cut'); 
  7740.                     } 
  7741.  
  7742.  
  7743.                     $checkchar = $prevchar; 
  7744.                 } 
  7745.  
  7746.                 // If a line-break opportunity found: 
  7747.                 if (is_array($breakfound)) { 
  7748.                     $contentctr = $breakfound[0]; 
  7749.                     $charctr = $breakfound[1]; 
  7750.                     $cutcontentctr = $breakfound[2]; 
  7751.                     $cutcharctr = $breakfound[3]; 
  7752.                     $type = $breakfound[4]; 
  7753.                     // Cache chunks which are already processed, but now need to be passed on to the new line 
  7754.                     for ($ix = count($content) - 1; $ix > $cutcontentctr; $ix--) { 
  7755.                         // save and crop off any subsequent chunks 
  7756.                         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  7757.                         if (!empty($sOTLdata)) { 
  7758.                             $tmpOTL = array_pop($cOTLdata); 
  7759.                             $savedPreOTLdata[] = $tmpOTL; 
  7760.                         } 
  7761.                         /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  7762.                         $savedPreContent[] = array_pop($content); 
  7763.                         $savedPreContentB[] = array_pop($contentB); 
  7764.                         $savedPreFont[] = array_pop($font); 
  7765.                     } 
  7766.  
  7767.                     // Next cache the part which will start the next line 
  7768.                     if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7769.                         $savedPreContent[] = substr($content[$cutcontentctr], $cutcharctr); 
  7770.                     } else { 
  7771.                         $savedPreContent[] = mb_substr($content[$cutcontentctr], $cutcharctr, mb_strlen($content[$cutcontentctr]), $this->mb_enc); 
  7772.                     } 
  7773.                     $savedPreContentB[] = preg_replace('/L/', '', $contentB[$cutcontentctr]); 
  7774.                     $savedPreFont[] = $font[$cutcontentctr]; 
  7775.                     /** -- OTL -- */ 
  7776.                     if (!empty($sOTLdata)) { 
  7777.                         $savedPreOTLdata[] = $this->otl->splitOTLdata($cOTLdata[$cutcontentctr], $cutcharctr, $cutcharctr); 
  7778.                     } 
  7779.                     /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  7780.  
  7781.  
  7782.                     // Finally adjust the Current content which ends this line 
  7783.                     if ($cutcharctr == 0 && $type == 'discard') { 
  7784.                         array_pop($content); 
  7785.                         array_pop($contentB); 
  7786.                         array_pop($font); 
  7787.                         array_pop($cOTLdata); 
  7788.                     } 
  7789.  
  7790.                     $currContent = & $content[count($content) - 1]; 
  7791.                     if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7792.                         $currContent = substr($currContent, 0, $charctr); 
  7793.                     } else { 
  7794.                         $currContent = mb_substr($currContent, 0, $charctr, $this->mb_enc); 
  7795.                     } 
  7796.  
  7797.                     if (!empty($sOTLdata)) { 
  7798.                         $savedPreOTLdata[] = $this->otl->splitOTLdata($cOTLdata[(count($cOTLdata) - 1)], mb_strlen($currContent, $this->mb_enc)); 
  7799.                     } 
  7800.  
  7801.                     if (strpos($contentB[(count($contentB) - 1)], 'R') !== false) {   // ??? 
  7802.                         $contentB[count($content) - 1] = preg_replace('/R/', '', $contentB[count($content) - 1]); // ??? 
  7803.                     } 
  7804.  
  7805.                     if ($type == 'hyphen') { 
  7806.                         $currContent .= '-'; 
  7807.                         if (!empty($cOTLdata[(count($cOTLdata) - 1)])) { 
  7808.                             $cOTLdata[(count($cOTLdata) - 1)]['char_data'][] = array('bidi_class' => 9, 'uni' => 45); 
  7809.                             $cOTLdata[(count($cOTLdata) - 1)]['group'] .= 'C'; 
  7810.                         } 
  7811.                     } 
  7812.  
  7813.                     $savedContent = ''; 
  7814.                     $savedContentB = ''; 
  7815.                     $savedFont = array(); 
  7816.                     $savedOTLdata = array(); 
  7817.                 } 
  7818.                 // If no line-break opportunity found - split at current position 
  7819.                 // or - Next character ($c) is suitable to add as overhanging or squeezed punctuation, or Oikomi, as set above by: 
  7820.                 // 1) CJK Overflowing a) punctuation or b) Oikomi 
  7821.                 // in which case $breakfound==1 and NOT array 
  7822.  
  7823.                 if (!is_array($breakfound)) { 
  7824.                     $savedFont = $this->saveFont(); 
  7825.                     if (!empty($sOTLdata)) { 
  7826.                         $savedOTLdata = $this->otl->splitOTLdata($cOTLdata[(count($cOTLdata) - 1)], mb_strlen($currContent, $this->mb_enc)); 
  7827.                     } 
  7828.                 } 
  7829.  
  7830.                 if ($content[count($content) - 1] == '' && !isset($this->objectbuffer[count($content) - 1])) { 
  7831.                     array_pop($content); 
  7832.                     array_pop($contentB); 
  7833.                     array_pop($font); 
  7834.                     array_pop($cOTLdata); 
  7835.                     $currContent = & $content[count($content) - 1]; 
  7836.                 } 
  7837.  
  7838.                 // Right Trim current content - including CJK space, and for OTLdata 
  7839.                 // incl. CJK - strip CJK space at end of line 　 = \xe3\x80\x80 = CJK space 
  7840.                 $currContent = rtrim($currContent); 
  7841.                 if ($this->checkCJK) { 
  7842.                     $currContent = preg_replace("/\xe3\x80\x80$/", '', $currContent); 
  7843.                 } // *CJK-FONTS* 
  7844.                 /** -- OTL -- */ 
  7845.                 if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  7846.                     $this->otl->trimOTLdata($cOTLdata[count($cOTLdata) - 1], false, true); // NB also does U+3000 
  7847.                 } 
  7848.                 /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  7849.  
  7850.  
  7851.                 // Selected OBJECTS are moved forward to next line, unless they come before a space or U+200B (type='discard') 
  7852.                 if (isset($this->objectbuffer[(count($content) - 1)]) && (!isset($type) || $type != 'discard')) { 
  7853.                     $objtype = $this->objectbuffer[(count($content) - 1)]['type']; 
  7854.                     if ($objtype == 'dottab' || $objtype == 'bookmark' || $objtype == 'indexentry' || $objtype == 'toc' || $objtype == 'annot') { 
  7855.                         $savedObj = array_pop($this->objectbuffer); 
  7856.                     } 
  7857.                 } 
  7858.  
  7859.  
  7860.                 // Decimal alignment (cancel if wraps to > 1 line) 
  7861.                 if ($is_table && substr($align, 0, 1) == 'D') { 
  7862.                     $align = substr($align, 2, 1); 
  7863.                 } 
  7864.  
  7865.                 $lineBox = array(); 
  7866.  
  7867.                 $this->_setInlineBlockHeights($lineBox, $stackHeight, $content, $font, $is_table); 
  7868.  
  7869.                 // update $contentWidth since it has changed with cropping 
  7870.                 $contentWidth = 0; 
  7871.  
  7872.                 $inclCursive = false; 
  7873.                 foreach ($content as $k => $chunk) { 
  7874.                     if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]) { 
  7875.                         // LIST MARKERS 
  7876.                         if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'image' && isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarker']) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarker']) { 
  7877.                             if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarkerposition'] != 'outside') { 
  7878.                                 $contentWidth += $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-WIDTH'] * _MPDFK; 
  7879.                             } 
  7880.                         } else { 
  7881.                             $contentWidth += $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-WIDTH'] * _MPDFK;
