  7882.                         } 
  7883.                     } elseif (!isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) || (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && !$this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
  7884.                         $this->restoreFont($font[$k], false); 
  7885.                         if ($this->checkCJK && $k == count($content) - 1 && $CJKoverflow && $align == 'J' && $this->allowCJKoverflow && $this->CJKforceend) { 
  7886.                             // force-end overhang 
  7887.                             $hanger = mb_substr($chunk, mb_strlen($chunk, $this->mb_enc) - 1, 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  7888.                             // Probably ought to do something with char_data and GPOS in cOTLdata... 
  7889.                             $content[$k] = $chunk = mb_substr($chunk, 0, mb_strlen($chunk, $this->mb_enc) - 1, $this->mb_enc); 
  7890.                         } 
  7891.  
  7892.                         // Soft Hyphens chr(173) + Replace NBSP with SPACE + Set inclcursive if includes CURSIVE TEXT 
  7893.                         if (!$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  7894.                             /** -- OTL -- */ 
  7895.                             if ((isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) || !empty($sOTLdata)) { 
  7896.                                 $this->otl->removeChar($chunk, $cOTLdata[$k], "\xc2\xad"); 
  7897.                                 $this->otl->replaceSpace($chunk, $cOTLdata[$k]); // NBSP -> space 
  7898.                                 if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregCURSchars . "])/u", $chunk)) { 
  7899.                                     $inclCursive = true; 
  7900.                                 } 
  7901.                                 $content[$k] = $chunk; 
  7902.                             } 
  7903.                             /** -- END OTL -- */ else {  // *OTL* 
  7904.                                 $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace("\xc2\xad", '', $chunk); 
  7905.                                 $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace(chr(194) . chr(160), chr(32), $chunk); 
  7906.                             } // *OTL* 
  7907.                         } elseif ($this->FontFamily != 'csymbol' && $this->FontFamily != 'czapfdingbats') { 
  7908.                             $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace(chr(173), '', $chunk); 
  7909.                             $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace(chr(160), chr(32), $chunk); 
  7910.                         } 
  7911.  
  7912.                         $contentWidth += $this->GetStringWidth($chunk, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$k]) ? $cOTLdata[$k] : false), $this->textvar) * _MPDFK;  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  7913.                         if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  7914.                             if (isset($this->spanborddet['L']['w']) && strpos($contentB[$k], 'L') !== false) 
  7915.                                 $contentWidth += $this->spanborddet['L']['w'] * _MPDFK; 
  7916.                             if (isset($this->spanborddet['R']['w']) && strpos($contentB[$k], 'R') !== false) 
  7917.                                 $contentWidth += $this->spanborddet['R']['w'] * _MPDFK; 
  7918.                         } 
  7919.                     } 
  7920.                 } 
  7921.  
  7922.                 $lastfontreqstyle = (isset($font[count($font) - 1]['ReqFontStyle']) ? $font[count($font) - 1]['ReqFontStyle'] : ''); 
  7923.                 $lastfontstyle = (isset($font[count($font) - 1]['style']) ? $font[count($font) - 1]['style'] : ''); 
  7924.                 if ($blockdir == 'ltr' && strpos($lastfontreqstyle, "I") !== false && strpos($lastfontstyle, "I") === false) { // Artificial italic 
  7925.                     $lastitalic = $this->FontSize * 0.15 * _MPDFK; 
  7926.                 } else { 
  7927.                     $lastitalic = 0; 
  7928.                 } 
  7929.  
  7930.  
  7931.  
  7932.  
  7933.                 // NOW FORMAT THE LINE TO OUTPUT 
  7934.                 if (!$table_draft) { 
  7935.                     // DIRECTIONALITY RTL 
  7936.                     $chunkorder = range(0, count($content) - 1); // mPDF 5.7 
  7937.                     /** -- OTL -- */ 
  7938.                     // mPDF 6 
  7939.                     if ($blockdir == 'rtl' || $this->biDirectional) { 
  7940.                         $this->otl->_bidiReorder($chunkorder, $content, $cOTLdata, $blockdir); 
  7941.                         // From this point on, $content and $cOTLdata may contain more elements (and re-ordered) compared to 
  7942.                         // $this->objectbuffer and $font ($chunkorder contains the mapping) 
  7943.                     } 
  7944.  
  7945.                     /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  7946.                     // Remove any XAdvance from OTL data at end of line 
  7947.                     foreach ($chunkorder AS $aord => $k) { 
  7948.                         if (count($cOTLdata)) { 
  7949.                             $this->restoreFont($font[$k], false); 
  7950.                             // ...WriteFlowingBlock... 
  7951.                             if ($aord == count($chunkorder) - 1 && isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['group'])) { // Last chunk on line 
  7952.                                 $nGPOS = strlen($cOTLdata[$aord]['group']) - 1; // Last character 
  7953.                                 if (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceL']) || isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceR'])) { 
  7954.                                     if (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceL'])) { 
  7955.                                         $w = $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceL'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  7956.                                     } else { 
  7957.                                         $w = $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceR'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  7958.                                     } 
  7959.                                     $w *= ($this->FontSize / 1000); 
  7960.                                     $contentWidth -= $w * _MPDFK; 
  7961.                                     $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceL'] = 0; 
  7962.                                     $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceR'] = 0; 
  7963.                                 } 
  7964.  
  7965.                                 // If last character has an XPlacement set, adjust width calculation, and add to XAdvance to account for it 
  7966.                                 if (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XPlacement'])) { 
  7967.                                     $w = -$cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XPlacement'] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']; 
  7968.                                     $w *= ($this->FontSize / 1000); 
  7969.                                     $contentWidth -= $w * _MPDFK; 
  7970.                                     $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceL'] = $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XPlacement']; 
  7971.                                     $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XAdvanceR'] = $cOTLdata[$aord]['GPOSinfo'][$nGPOS]['XPlacement']; 
  7972.                                 } 
  7973.                             } 
  7974.                         } 
  7975.                     } 
  7976.  
  7977.                     // JUSTIFICATION J 
  7978.                     $jcharspacing = 0; 
  7979.                     $jws = 0; 
  7980.                     $nb_carac = 0; 
  7981.                     $nb_spaces = 0; 
  7982.                     $jkashida = 0; 
  7983.                     // if it's justified, we need to find the char/word spacing (or if hanger $this->CJKforceend) 
  7984.                     if (($align == 'J' && !$CJKoverflow) || (($contentWidth + $lastitalic > $maxWidth - $WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) * _MPDFK) - ($paddingL + $paddingR + (($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * _MPDFK) ) + 0.001) && (!$CJKoverflow || ($CJKoverflow && !$this->allowCJKoverflow))) || $CJKoverflow && $align == 'J' && $this->allowCJKoverflow && $hanger && $this->CJKforceend) {   // 0.001 is to correct for deviations converting mm=>pts 
  7985.                         // JUSTIFY J (Use character spacing) 
  7986.                         // WORD SPACING 
  7987.                         foreach ($chunkorder AS $aord => $k) { // mPDF 5.7 
  7988.                             $chunk = $content[$aord]; 
  7989.                             if (!isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) || (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && !$this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
  7990.                                 $nb_carac += mb_strlen($chunk, $this->mb_enc); 
  7991.                                 $nb_spaces += mb_substr_count($chunk, ' ', $this->mb_enc); 
  7992.                                 // Use GPOS OTL 
  7993.                                 if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && ($this->CurrentFont['useOTL'] & 0xFF)) { 
  7994.                                     if (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['group']) && $cOTLdata[$aord]['group']) { 
  7995.                                         $nb_carac -= substr_count($cOTLdata[$aord]['group'], 'M'); 
  7996.                                     } 
  7997.                                 } 
  7998.                             } else { 
  7999.                                 $nb_carac ++; 
  8000.                             } // mPDF 6 allow spacing for inline object 
  8001.                         } 
  8002.                         // GetJSpacing adds kashida spacing to GPOSinfo if appropriate for Font 
  8003.                         list($jcharspacing, $jws, $jkashida) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac, $nb_spaces, ($maxWidth - $lastitalic - $contentWidth - $WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) * _MPDFK) - ($paddingL + $paddingR + (($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * _MPDFK) )), $inclCursive, $cOTLdata); 
  8004.                     } 
  8005.  
  8006.                     // WORD SPACING 
  8007.                     $empty = $maxWidth - $lastitalic - $WidthCorrection - $contentWidth - (($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) * _MPDFK) - ($paddingL + $paddingR + (($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * _MPDFK) ); 
  8008.  
  8009.                     $empty -= ($jcharspacing * ($nb_carac - 1)); // mPDF 6 nb_carac MINUS 1 
  8010.                     $empty -= ($jws * $nb_spaces); 
  8011.                     $empty -= ($jkashida); 
  8012.                     $empty /= _MPDFK; 
  8013.  
  8014.                     $b = ''; //do not use borders 
  8015.                     // Get PAGEBREAK TO TEST for height including the top border/padding 
  8016.                     $check_h = max($this->divheight, $stackHeight); 
  8017.                     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && ($this->blklvl > 0) && ($lineCount == 1) && (!$is_table)) { 
  8018.                         $check_h += ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']); 
  8019.                     } 
  8020.  
  8021.                     if ($this->ColActive && $check_h > ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $this->y0)) { 
  8022.                         $this->SetCol($this->NbCol - 1); 
  8023.                     } 
  8024.  
  8025.                     // PAGEBREAK 
  8026.                     // 'If' below used in order to fix "first-line of other page with justify on" bug 
  8027.                     if (!$is_table && ($this->y + $check_h) > $this->PageBreakTrigger and ! $this->InFooter and $this->AcceptPageBreak()) { 
  8028.                         $bak_x = $this->x; //Current X position 
  8029.                         // WORD SPACING 
  8030.                         $ws = $this->ws; //Word Spacing 
  8031.                         $charspacing = $this->charspacing; //Character Spacing 
  8032.                         $this->ResetSpacing(); 
  8033.  
  8034.                         $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  8035.  
  8036.                         $this->x = $bak_x; 
  8037.                         // Added to correct for OddEven Margins 
  8038.                         $currentx += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  8039.                         $this->x += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  8040.  
  8041.                         // WORD SPACING 
  8042.                         $this->SetSpacing($charspacing, $ws); 
  8043.                     } 
  8044.  
  8045.                     if ($this->kwt && !$is_table) { // mPDF 5.7+ 
  8046.                         $this->printkwtbuffer(); 
  8047.                         $this->kwt = false; 
  8048.                     } 
  8049.  
  8050.  
  8051.                     /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  8052.                     // COLS 
  8053.                     // COLUMN CHANGE 
  8054.                     if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) { 
  8055.                         $currentx += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  8056.                         $this->x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  8057.                         $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  8058.                     } 
  8059.  
  8060.                     if ($this->ColActive && !$is_table) { 
  8061.                         $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  8062.                     } // *COLUMNS* 
  8063.                     /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  8064.  
  8065.                     // TOP MARGIN 
  8066.                     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top']) && ($lineCount == 1) && (!$is_table)) { 
  8067.                         $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'], $this->blklvl - 1, true, $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_collapse']); 
  8068.                         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  8069.                             $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  8070.                         } // *COLUMNS* 
  8071.                     } 
  8072.  
  8073.  
  8074.                     // Update y0 for top of block (used to paint border) 
  8075.                     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && ($lineCount == 1) && (!$is_table)) { 
  8076.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0'] = $this->y; 
  8077.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] = $this->page; 
  8078.                         if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float']) { 
  8079.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_start_y'] = $this->y; 
  8080.                         } 
  8081.                     } 
  8082.  
  8083.                     // TOP PADDING and BORDER spacing/fill 
  8084.                     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top']) || ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top'])) && ($lineCount == 1) && (!$is_table)) { 
  8085.                         // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom 
  8086.                         $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w'], -3, true, false, 1); 
  8087.                         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  8088.                             $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  8089.                         } // *COLUMNS* 
  8090.                     } 
  8091.  
  8092.                     $arraysize = count($chunkorder); 
  8093.  
  8094.                     $margins = ($this->cMarginL + $this->cMarginR) + ($ipaddingL + $ipaddingR + $fpaddingR + $fpaddingR ); 
  8095.  
  8096.                     // PAINT BACKGROUND FOR THIS LINE 
  8097.                     if (!$is_table) { 
  8098.                         $this->DivLn($stackHeight, $this->blklvl, false); 
  8099.                     } // false -> don't advance y 
  8100.  
  8101.                     $this->x = $currentx + $this->cMarginL + $ipaddingL + $fpaddingL; 
  8102.                     if ($align == 'R') { 
  8103.                         $this->x += $empty; 
  8104.                     } elseif ($align == 'C') { 
  8105.                         $this->x += ($empty / 2); 
  8106.                     } 
  8107.  
  8108.                     // Paragraph INDENT 
  8109.                     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent']) && ($newblock) && ($blockstate == 1 || $blockstate == 3) && ($lineCount == 1) && (!$is_table) && ($blockdir != 'rtl') && ($align != 'C')) { 
  8110.                         $ti = $this->ConvertSize($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent'], $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'], $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']['size'], false);  // mPDF 5.7.4 
  8111.                         $this->x += $ti; 
  8112.                     } 
  8113.  
  8114.                     // BIDI magic_reverse moved upwards from here 
  8115.  
  8116.                     foreach ($chunkorder AS $aord => $k) { // mPDF 5.7 
  8117.                         $chunk = $content[$aord]; 
  8118.  
  8119.                         if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]) { 
  8120.                             $xadj = $this->x - $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-X']; 
  8121.                             $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-X'] += $xadj; 
  8122.                             $this->objectbuffer[$k]['BORDER-X'] += $xadj; 
  8123.                             $this->objectbuffer[$k]['INNER-X'] += $xadj; 
  8124.  
  8125.                             if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'listmarker') { 
  8126.                                 $this->objectbuffer[$k]['lineBox'] = $lineBox[-1]; // Block element details for glyph-origin 
  8127.                             } 
  8128.                             $yadj = $this->y - $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-Y']; 
  8129.                             if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'dottab') { // mPDF 6 DOTTAB 
  8130.                                 $this->objectbuffer[$k]['lineBox'] = $lineBox[$k]; // element details for glyph-origin 
  8131.                             } 
  8132.                             if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] != 'dottab') { // mPDF 6 DOTTAB 
  8133.                                 $yadj += $lineBox[$k]['top']; 
  8134.                             } 
  8135.                             $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  8136.                             $this->objectbuffer[$k]['BORDER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  8137.                             $this->objectbuffer[$k]['INNER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  8138.                         } 
  8139.  
  8140.                         $this->restoreFont($font[$k]);  // mPDF 5.7 
  8141.  
  8142.                         $this->SetSpacing(($this->fixedlSpacing * _MPDFK) + $jcharspacing, ($this->fixedlSpacing + $this->minwSpacing) * _MPDFK + $jws); 
  8143.                         // Now unset these values so they don't influence GetStringwidth below or in fn. Cell 
  8144.                         $this->fixedlSpacing = false; 
  8145.                         $this->minwSpacing = 0; 
  8146.  
  8147.                         $save_vis = $this->visibility; 
  8148.                         if (isset($this->textparam['visibility']) && $this->textparam['visibility'] && $this->textparam['visibility'] != $this->visibility) { 
  8149.                             $this->SetVisibility($this->textparam['visibility']); 
  8150.                         } 
  8151.                         // *********** SPAN BACKGROUND COLOR ***************** // 
  8152.                         if ($this->spanbgcolor) { 
  8153.                             $cor = $this->spanbgcolorarray; 
  8154.                             $this->SetFColor($cor); 
  8155.                             $save_fill = $fill; 
  8156.                             $spanfill = 1; 
  8157.                             $fill = 1; 
  8158.                         } 
  8159.                         if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  8160.                             if (strpos($contentB[$k], 'L') !== false) 
  8161.                                 $this->x += (isset($this->spanborddet['L']['w']) ? $this->spanborddet['L']['w'] : 0); 
  8162.                             if (strpos($contentB[$k], 'L') === false) 
  8163.                                 $this->spanborddet['L']['s'] = $this->spanborddet['L']['w'] = 0; 
  8164.                             if (strpos($contentB[$k], 'R') === false) 
  8165.                                 $this->spanborddet['R']['s'] = $this->spanborddet['R']['w'] = 0; 
  8166.                         } 
  8167.  
  8168.                         // WORD SPACING 
  8169.                         // StringWidth this time includes any kashida spacing 
  8170.                         $stringWidth = $this->GetStringWidth($chunk, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]) ? $cOTLdata[$aord] : false), $this->textvar, true); 
  8171.  
  8172.                         $nch = mb_strlen($chunk, $this->mb_enc); 
  8173.                         // Use GPOS OTL 
  8174.                         if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && ($this->CurrentFont['useOTL'] & 0xFF)) { 
  8175.                             if (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]['group']) && $cOTLdata[$aord]['group']) { 
  8176.                                 $nch -= substr_count($cOTLdata[$aord]['group'], 'M'); 
  8177.                             } 
  8178.                         } 
  8179.                         $stringWidth += ( $this->charspacing * $nch / _MPDFK ); 
  8180.  
  8181.                         $stringWidth += ( $this->ws * mb_substr_count($chunk, ' ', $this->mb_enc) / _MPDFK ); 
  8182.  
  8183.                         if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
  8184.                             // LIST MARKERS    // mPDF 6  Lists 
  8185.                             if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'image' && isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarker']) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarker'] && $this->objectbuffer[$k]['listmarkerposition'] == 'outside') { 
  8186.                                 $stringWidth = 0; 
  8187.                             } else { 
  8188.                                 $stringWidth = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-WIDTH']; 
  8189.                             } 
  8190.                         } 
  8191.  
  8192.                         if ($stringWidth == 0) { 
  8193.                             $stringWidth = 0.000001; 
  8194.                         } 
  8195.  
  8196.                         if ($aord == $arraysize - 1) { 
  8197.                             $stringWidth -= ( $this->charspacing / _MPDFK ); 
  8198.                             if ($this->checkCJK && $CJKoverflow && $align == 'J' && $this->allowCJKoverflow && $hanger && $this->CJKforceend) { 
  8199.                                 // force-end overhang 
  8200.                                 $this->Cell($stringWidth, $stackHeight, $chunk, '', 0, '', $fill, $this->HREF, $currentx, 0, 0, 'M', $fill, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]) ? $cOTLdata[$aord] : false), $this->textvar, (isset($lineBox[$k]) ? $lineBox[$k] : false)); 
  8201.                                 $this->Cell($this->GetStringWidth($hanger), $stackHeight, $hanger, '', 1, '', $fill, $this->HREF, $currentx, 0, 0, 'M', $fill, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]) ? $cOTLdata[$aord] : false), $this->textvar, (isset($lineBox[$k]) ? $lineBox[$k] : false)); 
  8202.                             } else { 
  8203.                                 $this->Cell($stringWidth, $stackHeight, $chunk, '', 1, '', $fill, $this->HREF, $currentx, 0, 0, 'M', $fill, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]) ? $cOTLdata[$aord] : false), $this->textvar, (isset($lineBox[$k]) ? $lineBox[$k] : false)); //mono-style line or last part (skips line) 
  8204.                             } 
  8205.                         } else 
  8206.                             $this->Cell($stringWidth, $stackHeight, $chunk, '', 0, '', $fill, $this->HREF, 0, 0, 0, 'M', $fill, true, (isset($cOTLdata[$aord]) ? $cOTLdata[$aord] : false), $this->textvar, (isset($lineBox[$k]) ? $lineBox[$k] : false)); //first or middle part 
  8207.  
  8208.                         if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  8209.                             if (strpos($contentB[$k], 'R') !== false && $aord != $arraysize - 1) 
  8210.                                 $this->x += $this->spanborddet['R']['w']; 
  8211.                         } 
  8212.                         // *********** SPAN BACKGROUND COLOR OFF - RESET BLOCK BGCOLOR ***************** // 
  8213.                         if (isset($spanfill) && $spanfill) { 
  8214.                             $fill = $save_fill; 
  8215.                             $spanfill = 0; 
  8216.                             if ($fill) { 
  8217.                                 $this->SetFColor($bcor); 
  8218.                             } 
  8219.                         } 
  8220.                         if (isset($this->textparam['visibility']) && $this->textparam['visibility'] && $this->visibility != $save_vis) { 
  8221.                             $this->SetVisibility($save_vis); 
  8222.                         } 
  8223.                     } 
  8224.                 } elseif ($table_draft) { 
  8225.                     $this->y += $stackHeight; 
  8226.                 } 
  8227.  
  8228.                 if (!$is_table) { 
  8229.                     $this->maxPosR = max($this->maxPosR, ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_right_margin'])); 
  8230.                     $this->maxPosL = min($this->maxPosL, ($this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'])); 
  8231.                 } 
  8232.  
  8233.                 // move on to the next line, reset variables, tack on saved content and current char 
  8234.  
  8235.                 if (!$table_draft) 
  8236.                     $this->printobjectbuffer($is_table, $blockdir); 
  8237.                 $this->objectbuffer = array(); 
  8238.  
  8239.  
  8240.                 /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  8241.                 // Update values if set to skipline 
  8242.                 if ($this->floatmargins) { 
  8243.                     $this->_advanceFloatMargins(); 
  8244.                 } 
  8245.                 /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  8246.  
  8247.                 // Reset lineheight 
  8248.                 $stackHeight = $this->divheight; 
  8249.                 $valign = 'M'; 
  8250.  
  8251.                 $font = array(); 
  8252.                 $content = array(); 
  8253.                 $contentB = array(); 
  8254.                 $cOTLdata = array(); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  8255.                 $contentWidth = 0; 
  8256.                 if (!empty($savedObj)) { 
  8257.                     $this->objectbuffer[] = $savedObj; 
  8258.                     $font[] = $savedFont; 
  8259.                     $content[] = ''; 
  8260.                     $contentB[] = ''; 
  8261.                     $cOTLdata[] = array(); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  8262.                     $contentWidth += $savedObj['OUTER-WIDTH'] * _MPDFK; 
  8263.                 } 
  8264.                 if (count($savedPreContent) > 0) { 
  8265.                     for ($ix = count($savedPreContent) - 1; $ix >= 0; $ix--) { 
  8266.                         $font[] = $savedPreFont[$ix]; 
  8267.                         $content[] = $savedPreContent[$ix]; 
  8268.                         $contentB[] = $savedPreContentB[$ix]; 
  8269.                         if (!empty($sOTLdata)) { 
  8270.                             $cOTLdata[] = $savedPreOTLdata[$ix]; 
  8271.                         } 
  8272.                         $this->restoreFont($savedPreFont[$ix]); 
  8273.                         $lbw = $rbw = 0; // Border widths 
  8274.                         if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  8275.                             $lbw = (isset($this->spanborddet['L']['w']) ? $this->spanborddet['L']['w'] : 0); 
  8276.                             $rbw = (isset($this->spanborddet['R']['w']) ? $this->spanborddet['R']['w'] : 0); 
  8277.                         } 
  8278.                         if ($ix > 0) { 
  8279.                             $contentWidth += $this->GetStringWidth($savedPreContent[$ix], true, (isset($savedPreOTLdata[$ix]) ? $savedPreOTLdata[$ix] : false), $this->textvar) * _MPDFK; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  8280.                             if (strpos($savedPreContentB[$ix], 'L') !== false) 
  8281.                                 $contentWidth += $lbw; 
  8282.                             if (strpos($savedPreContentB[$ix], 'R') !== false) 
  8283.                                 $contentWidth += $rbw; 
  8284.                         } 
  8285.                     } 
  8286.                     $savedPreContent = array(); 
  8287.                     $savedPreContentB = array(); 
  8288.                     $savedPreOTLdata = array(); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  8289.                     $savedPreFont = array(); 
  8290.                     $content[(count($content) - 1)] .= $c; 
  8291.                 } 
  8292.                 else { 
  8293.                     $font[] = $savedFont; 
  8294.                     $content[] = $savedContent . $c; 
  8295.                     $contentB[] = $savedContentB; 
  8296.                     $cOTLdata[] = $savedOTLdata; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  8297.                 } 
  8298.  
  8299.                 $currContent = & $content[(count($content) - 1)]; 
  8300.                 $this->restoreFont($font[(count($font) - 1)]); // mPDF 6.0 
  8301.  
  8302.                 /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  8303.                 // CJK - strip CJK space at start of line 
  8304.                 // 　 = \xe3\x80\x80 = CJK space 
  8305.                 if ($this->checkCJK && $currContent == "\xe3\x80\x80") { 
  8306.                     $currContent = ''; 
  8307.                     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  8308.                         $this->otl->trimOTLdata($cOTLdata[count($cOTLdata) - 1], true, false); // left trim U+3000 
  8309.                     } 
  8310.                 } 
  8311.                 /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  8312.  
  8313.                 $lbw = $rbw = 0; // Border widths 
  8314.                 if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  8315.                     $lbw = (isset($this->spanborddet['L']['w']) ? $this->spanborddet['L']['w'] : 0); 
  8316.                     $rbw = (isset($this->spanborddet['R']['w']) ? $this->spanborddet['R']['w'] : 0); 
  8317.                 } 
  8318.  
  8319.                 $contentWidth += $this->GetStringWidth($currContent, false, (isset($cOTLdata[(count($cOTLdata) - 1)]) ? $cOTLdata[(count($cOTLdata) - 1)] : false), $this->textvar) * _MPDFK; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  8320.                 if (strpos($savedContentB, 'L') !== false) 
  8321.                     $contentWidth += $lbw; 
  8322.                 $CJKoverflow = false; 
  8323.                 $hanger = ''; 
  8324.             } 
  8325.             // another character will fit, so add it on 
  8326.             else { 
  8327.                 $contentWidth += $cw; 
  8328.                 $currContent .= $c; 
  8329.             } 
  8330.         } 
  8331.  
  8332.         unset($content); 
  8333.         unset($contentB); 
  8334.     } 
  8335.  
  8336.     //----------------------END OF FLOWING BLOCK------------------------------------// 
  8337.  
  8338.  
  8339.     /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  8340.     // Update values if set to skipline 
  8341.     function _advanceFloatMargins() 
  8342.     { 
  8343.         // Update floatmargins - L 
  8344.         if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] && $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] != $this->y) { 
  8345.             $yadj = $this->y - $this->floatmargins['L']['y0']; 
  8346.             $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] = $this->y; 
  8347.             $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] += $yadj; 
  8348.  
  8349.             // Update objattr in floatbuffer 
  8350.             if ($this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['L']['id']]['border_left']['w']) { 
  8351.                 $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['L']['id']]['BORDER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  8352.             } 
  8353.             $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['L']['id']]['INNER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  8354.             $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['L']['id']]['OUTER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  8355.  
  8356.             // Unset values 
  8357.             $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['L']['id']]['skipline'] = false; 
  8358.             $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] = false; 
  8359.             $this->floatmargins['L']['id'] = ''; 
  8360.         } 
  8361.         // Update floatmargins - R 
  8362.         if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $this->floatmargins['R']['skipline'] && $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] != $this->y) { 
  8363.             $yadj = $this->y - $this->floatmargins['R']['y0']; 
  8364.             $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] = $this->y; 
  8365.             $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] += $yadj; 
  8366.  
  8367.             // Update objattr in floatbuffer 
  8368.             if ($this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['R']['id']]['border_left']['w']) { 
  8369.                 $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['R']['id']]['BORDER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  8370.             } 
  8371.             $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['R']['id']]['INNER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  8372.             $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['R']['id']]['OUTER-Y'] += $yadj; 
  8373.  
  8374.             // Unset values 
  8375.             $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['R']['id']]['skipline'] = false; 
  8376.             $this->floatmargins['R']['skipline'] = false; 
  8377.             $this->floatmargins['R']['id'] = ''; 
  8378.         } 
  8379.     } 
  8380.  
  8381.     /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  8382.  
  8383.  
  8384.  
  8385.     /** -- END HTML-CSS -- */ 
  8386.  
  8387.     function _SetTextRendering($mode) 
  8388.     { 
  8389.         if (!(($mode == 0) || ($mode == 1) || ($mode == 2))) 
  8390.             throw new MpdfException("Text rendering mode should be 0, 1 or 2 (value : $mode)"); 
  8391.         $tr = ($mode . ' Tr'); 
  8392.         if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] != $tr) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']))) { 
  8393.             $this->_out($tr); 
  8394.         } 
  8395.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] = $tr; 
  8396.     } 
  8397.  
  8398.     function SetTextOutline($params = array()) 
  8399.     { 
  8400.         if (isset($params['outline-s']) && $params['outline-s']) { 
  8401.             $this->SetLineWidth($params['outline-WIDTH']); 
  8402.             $this->SetDColor($params['outline-COLOR']); 
  8403.             $tr = ('2 Tr'); 
  8404.             if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] != $tr) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']))) { 
  8405.                 $this->_out($tr); 
  8406.             } 
  8407.             $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] = $tr; 
  8408.         } else { //Now resets all values 
  8409.             $this->SetLineWidth(0.2); 
  8410.             $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  8411.             $this->_SetTextRendering(0); 
  8412.             $tr = ('0 Tr'); 
  8413.             if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] != $tr) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']))) { 
  8414.                 $this->_out($tr); 
  8415.             } 
  8416.             $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] = $tr; 
  8417.         } 
  8418.     } 
  8419.  
  8420.     function Image($file, $x, $y, $w = 0, $h = 0, $type = '', $link = '', $paint = true, $constrain = true, $watermark = false, $shownoimg = true, $allowvector = true) 
  8421.     { 
  8422.         $orig_srcpath = $file; 
  8423.         $this->GetFullPath($file); 
  8424.  
  8425.         $info = $this->_getImage($file, true, $allowvector, $orig_srcpath); 
  8426.         if (!$info && $paint) { 
  8427.             $info = $this->_getImage($this->noImageFile); 
  8428.             if ($info) { 
  8429.                 $file = $this->noImageFile; 
  8430.                 $w = ($info['w'] * (25.4 / $this->dpi));  // 14 x 16px 
  8431.                 $h = ($info['h'] * (25.4 / $this->dpi));  // 14 x 16px 
  8432.             } 
  8433.         } 
  8434.         if (!$info) 
  8435.             return false; 
  8436.         //Automatic width and height calculation if needed 
  8437.         if ($w == 0 and $h == 0) { 
  8438.             /** -- IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  8439.             if ($info['type'] == 'wmf') { 
  8440.                 // WMF units are twips (1/20pt) 
  8441.                 // divide by 20 to get points 
  8442.                 // divide by k to get user units 
  8443.                 $w = abs($info['w']) / (20 * _MPDFK); 
  8444.                 $h = abs($info['h']) / (20 * _MPDFK); 
  8445.             } else 
  8446.             /** -- END IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  8447.             if ($info['type'] == 'svg') { 
  8448.                 // returned SVG units are pts 
  8449.                 // divide by k to get user units (mm) 
  8450.                 $w = abs($info['w']) / _MPDFK; 
  8451.                 $h = abs($info['h']) / _MPDFK; 
  8452.             } else { 
  8453.                 //Put image at default image dpi 
  8454.                 $w = ($info['w'] / _MPDFK) * (72 / $this->img_dpi); 
  8455.                 $h = ($info['h'] / _MPDFK) * (72 / $this->img_dpi); 
  8456.             } 
  8457.         } 
  8458.         if ($w == 0) 
  8459.             $w = abs($h * $info['w'] / $info['h']); 
  8460.         if ($h == 0) 
  8461.             $h = abs($w * $info['h'] / $info['w']); 
  8462.  
  8463.         /** -- WATERMARK -- */ 
  8464.         if ($watermark) { 
  8465.             $maxw = $this->w; 
  8466.             $maxh = $this->h; 
  8467.             // Size = D PF or array 
  8468.             if (is_array($this->watermark_size)) { 
  8469.                 $w = $this->watermark_size[0]; 
  8470.                 $h = $this->watermark_size[1]; 
  8471.             } elseif (!is_string($this->watermark_size)) { 
  8472.                 $maxw -= $this->watermark_size * 2; 
  8473.                 $maxh -= $this->watermark_size * 2; 
  8474.                 $w = $maxw; 
  8475.                 $h = abs($w * $info['h'] / $info['w']); 
  8476.                 if ($h > $maxh) { 
  8477.                     $h = $maxh; 
  8478.                     $w = abs($h * $info['w'] / $info['h']); 
  8479.                 } 
  8480.             } elseif ($this->watermark_size == 'F') { 
  8481.                 if ($this->ColActive) { 
  8482.                     $maxw = $this->w - ($this->DeflMargin + $this->DefrMargin); 
  8483.                 } else { 
  8484.                     $maxw = $this->pgwidth; 
  8485.                 } 
  8486.                 $maxh = $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin); 
  8487.                 $w = $maxw; 
  8488.                 $h = abs($w * $info['h'] / $info['w']); 
  8489.                 if ($h > $maxh) { 
  8490.                     $h = $maxh; 
  8491.                     $w = abs($h * $info['w'] / $info['h']); 
  8492.                 } 
  8493.             } elseif ($this->watermark_size == 'P') { // Default P 
  8494.                 $w = $maxw; 
  8495.                 $h = abs($w * $info['h'] / $info['w']); 
  8496.                 if ($h > $maxh) { 
  8497.                     $h = $maxh; 
  8498.                     $w = abs($h * $info['w'] / $info['h']); 
  8499.                 } 
  8500.             } 
  8501.             // Automatically resize to maximum dimensions of page if too large 
  8502.             if ($w > $maxw) { 
  8503.                 $w = $maxw; 
  8504.                 $h = abs($w * $info['h'] / $info['w']); 
  8505.             } 
  8506.             if ($h > $maxh) { 
  8507.                 $h = $maxh; 
  8508.                 $w = abs($h * $info['w'] / $info['h']); 
  8509.             } 
  8510.             // Position 
  8511.             if (is_array($this->watermark_pos)) { 
  8512.                 $x = $this->watermark_pos[0]; 
  8513.                 $y = $this->watermark_pos[1]; 
  8514.             } elseif ($this->watermark_pos == 'F') { // centred on printable area 
  8515.                 if ($this->ColActive) { // *COLUMNS* 
  8516.                     if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page) % 2 == 0)) { 
  8517.                         $xadj = $this->DeflMargin - $this->DefrMargin; 
  8518.                     } // *COLUMNS* 
  8519.                     else { 
  8520.                         $xadj = 0; 
  8521.                     } // *COLUMNS* 
  8522.                     $x = ($this->DeflMargin - $xadj + ($this->w - ($this->DeflMargin + $this->DefrMargin)) / 2) - ($w / 2); // *COLUMNS* 
  8523.                 } // *COLUMNS* 
  8524.                 else {  // *COLUMNS* 
  8525.                     $x = ($this->lMargin + ($this->pgwidth) / 2) - ($w / 2); 
  8526.                 } // *COLUMNS* 
  8527.                 $y = ($this->tMargin + ($this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin)) / 2) - ($h / 2); 
  8528.             } else { // default P - centred on whole page 
  8529.                 $x = ($this->w / 2) - ($w / 2); 
  8530.                 $y = ($this->h / 2) - ($h / 2); 
  8531.             } 
  8532.             /** -- IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  8533.             if ($info['type'] == 'wmf') { 
  8534.                 $sx = $w * _MPDFK / $info['w']; 
  8535.                 $sy = -$h * _MPDFK / $info['h']; 
  8536.                 $outstring = sprintf('q %.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, $sy, $x * _MPDFK - $sx * $info['x'], (($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK) - $sy * $info['y'], $info['i']); 
  8537.             } else 
  8538.             /** -- END IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  8539.             if ($info['type'] == 'svg') { 
  8540.                 $sx = $w * _MPDFK / $info['w']; 
  8541.                 $sy = -$h * _MPDFK / $info['h']; 
  8542.                 $outstring = sprintf('q %.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, $sy, $x * _MPDFK - $sx * $info['x'], (($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK) - $sy * $info['y'], $info['i']); 
  8543.             } else { 
  8544.                 $outstring = sprintf("q %.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /I%d Do Q", $w * _MPDFK, $h * _MPDFK, $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y + $h)) * _MPDFK, $info['i']); 
  8545.             } 
  8546.  
  8547.             if ($this->watermarkImgBehind) { 
  8548.                 $outstring = $this->watermarkImgAlpha . "\n" . $outstring . "\n" . $this->SetAlpha(1, 'Normal', true) . "\n"; 
  8549.                 $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', "\n" . $outstring . "\n" . '\\1', $this->pages[$this->page]); 
  8550.             } else { 
  8551.                 $this->_out($outstring); 
  8552.             } 
  8553.  
  8554.             return 0; 
  8555.         } // end of IF watermark 
  8556.         /** -- END WATERMARK -- */ 
  8557.  
  8558.         if ($constrain) { 
  8559.             // Automatically resize to maximum dimensions of page if too large 
  8560.             if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) { 
  8561.                 $maxw = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; 
  8562.             } else { 
  8563.                 $maxw = $this->pgwidth; 
  8564.             } 
  8565.             if ($w > $maxw) { 
  8566.                 $w = $maxw; 
  8567.                 $h = abs($w * $info['h'] / $info['w']); 
  8568.             } 
  8569.             if ($h > $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin + 1)) {  // see below - +10 to avoid drawing too close to border of page 
  8570.                 $h = $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin + 1); 
  8571.                 if ($this->fullImageHeight) { 
  8572.                     $h = $this->fullImageHeight; 
  8573.                 } 
  8574.                 $w = abs($h * $info['w'] / $info['h']); 
  8575.             } 
  8576.  
  8577.  
  8578.             //Avoid drawing out of the paper(exceeding width limits). 
  8579.             //if ( ($x + $w) > $this->fw ) { 
  8580.             if (($x + $w) > $this->w) { 
  8581.                 $x = $this->lMargin; 
  8582.                 $y += 5; 
  8583.             } 
  8584.  
  8585.             $changedpage = false; 
  8586.             $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  8587.             //Avoid drawing out of the page. 
  8588.             if ($y + $h > $this->PageBreakTrigger and ! $this->InFooter and $this->AcceptPageBreak()) { 
  8589.                 $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  8590.                 // Added to correct for OddEven Margins 
  8591.                 $x = $x + $this->MarginCorrection; 
  8592.                 $y = $this->tMargin; // mPDF 5.7.3 
  8593.                 $changedpage = true; 
  8594.             } 
  8595.             /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  8596.             // COLS 
  8597.             // COLUMN CHANGE 
  8598.             if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) { 
  8599.                 $y = $this->y0; 
  8600.                 $x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  8601.                 $this->x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  8602.             } 
  8603.             /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  8604.         } // end of IF constrain 
  8605.  
  8606.         /** -- IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  8607.         if ($info['type'] == 'wmf') { 
  8608.             $sx = $w * _MPDFK / $info['w']; 
  8609.             $sy = -$h * _MPDFK / $info['h']; 
  8610.             $outstring = sprintf('q %.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, $sy, $x * _MPDFK - $sx * $info['x'], (($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK) - $sy * $info['y'], $info['i']); 
  8611.         } else 
  8612.         /** -- END IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  8613.         if ($info['type'] == 'svg') { 
  8614.             $sx = $w * _MPDFK / $info['w']; 
  8615.             $sy = -$h * _MPDFK / $info['h']; 
  8616.             $outstring = sprintf('q %.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, $sy, $x * _MPDFK - $sx * $info['x'], (($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK) - $sy * $info['y'], $info['i']); 
  8617.         } else { 
  8618.             $outstring = sprintf("q %.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /I%d Do Q", $w * _MPDFK, $h * _MPDFK, $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y + $h)) * _MPDFK, $info['i']); 
  8619.         } 
  8620.  
  8621.         if ($paint) { 
  8622.             $this->_out($outstring); 
  8623.             if ($link) 
  8624.                 $this->Link($x, $y, $w, $h, $link); 
  8625.  
  8626.             // Avoid writing text on top of the image. // THIS WAS OUTSIDE THE if ($paint) bit!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 
  8627.             $this->y = $y + $h; 
  8628.         } 
  8629.  
  8630.         //Return width-height array 
  8631.         $sizesarray['WIDTH'] = $w; 
  8632.         $sizesarray['HEIGHT'] = $h; 
  8633.         $sizesarray['X'] = $x; //Position before painting image 
  8634.         $sizesarray['Y'] = $y; //Position before painting image 
  8635.         $sizesarray['OUTPUT'] = $outstring; 
  8636.  
  8637.         $sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'] = $info['i']; 
  8638.         $sizesarray['itype'] = $info['type']; 
  8639.         $sizesarray['set-dpi'] = (isset($info['set-dpi']) ? $info['set-dpi'] : 0); 
  8640.         return $sizesarray; 
  8641.     } 
  8642.  
  8643.     //============================================================= 
  8644.     //============================================================= 
  8645.     //============================================================= 
  8646.     //============================================================= 
  8647.     //============================================================= 
  8648.     /** -- HTML-CSS -- */ 
  8649.  
  8650.     function _getObjAttr($t) 
  8651.     { 
  8652.         $c = explode("\xbb\xa4\xac", $t, 2); 
  8653.         $c = explode(", ", $c[1], 2); 
  8654.         foreach ($c as $v) { 
  8655.             $v = explode("=", $v, 2); 
  8656.             $sp[$v[0]] = $v[1]; 
  8657.         } 
  8658.         return (unserialize($sp['objattr'])); 
  8659.     } 
  8660.  
  8661.     function inlineObject($type, $x, $y, $objattr, $Lmargin, $widthUsed, $maxWidth, $lineHeight, $paint = false, $is_table = false) 
  8662.     { 
  8663.         if ($is_table) { 
  8664.             $k = $this->shrin_k; 
  8665.         } else { 
  8666.             $k = 1; 
  8667.         } 
  8668.  
  8669.         // NB $x is only used when paint=true 
  8670.         // Lmargin not used 
  8671.         $w = 0; 
  8672.         if (isset($objattr['width'])) { 
  8673.             $w = $objattr['width'] / $k; 
  8674.         } 
  8675.         $h = 0; 
  8676.         if (isset($objattr['height'])) { 
  8677.             $h = abs($objattr['height'] / $k); 
  8678.         } 
  8679.         $widthLeft = $maxWidth - $widthUsed; 
  8680.         $maxHeight = $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin + 10); 
  8681.         if ($this->fullImageHeight) { 
  8682.             $maxHeight = $this->fullImageHeight; 
  8683.         } 
  8684.         // For Images 
  8685.         if (isset($objattr['border_left'])) { 
  8686.             $extraWidth = ($objattr['border_left']['w'] + $objattr['border_right']['w'] + $objattr['margin_left'] + $objattr['margin_right']) / $k; 
  8687.             $extraHeight = ($objattr['border_top']['w'] + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] + $objattr['margin_top'] + $objattr['margin_bottom']) / $k; 
  8688.  
  8689.             if ($type == 'image' || $type == 'barcode' || $type == 'textcircle') { 
  8690.                 $extraWidth += ($objattr['padding_left'] + $objattr['padding_right']) / $k; 
  8691.                 $extraHeight += ($objattr['padding_top'] + $objattr['padding_bottom']) / $k; 
  8692.             } 
  8693.         } 
  8694.  
  8695.         if (!isset($objattr['vertical-align'])) { 
  8696.             if ($objattr['type'] == 'select') { 
  8697.                 $objattr['vertical-align'] = 'M'; 
  8698.             } else { 
  8699.                 $objattr['vertical-align'] = 'BS'; 
  8700.             } 
  8701.         } // mPDF 6 
  8702.  
  8703.         if ($type == 'image' || (isset($objattr['subtype']) && $objattr['subtype'] == 'IMAGE')) { 
  8704.             if (isset($objattr['itype']) && ($objattr['itype'] == 'wmf' || $objattr['itype'] == 'svg')) { 
  8705.                 $file = $objattr['file']; 
  8706.                 $info = $this->formobjects[$file]; 
  8707.             } elseif (isset($objattr['file'])) { 
  8708.                 $file = $objattr['file']; 
  8709.                 $info = $this->images[$file]; 
  8710.             } 
  8711.         } 
  8712.         if ($type == 'annot' || $type == 'bookmark' || $type == 'indexentry' || $type == 'toc') { 
  8713.             $w = 0.00001; 
  8714.             $h = 0.00001; 
  8715.         } 
  8716.  
  8717.         // TEST whether need to skipline 
  8718.         if (!$paint) { 
  8719.             if ($type == 'hr') { // always force new line 
  8720.                 if (($y + $h + $lineHeight > $this->PageBreakTrigger) && !$this->InFooter && !$is_table) { 
  8721.                     return array(-2, $w, $h); 
  8722.                 } // New page + new line 
  8723.                 else { 
  8724.                     return array(1, $w, $h); 
  8725.                 } // new line 
  8726.             } else { 
  8727.                 // LIST MARKERS    // mPDF 6  Lists 
  8728.                 $displayheight = $h; 
  8729.                 $displaywidth = $w; 
  8730.                 if ($objattr['type'] == 'image' && isset($objattr['listmarker']) && $objattr['listmarker']) { 
  8731.                     $displayheight = 0; 
  8732.                     if ($objattr['listmarkerposition'] == 'outside') { 
  8733.                         $displaywidth = 0; 
  8734.                     } 
  8735.                 } 
  8736.  
  8737.                 if ($widthUsed > 0 && $displaywidth > $widthLeft && (!$is_table || $type != 'image')) {  // New line needed 
  8738.                     // mPDF 6  Lists 
  8739.                     if (($y + $displayheight + $lineHeight > $this->PageBreakTrigger) && !$this->InFooter) { 
  8740.                         return array(-2, $w, $h); 
  8741.                     } // New page + new line 
  8742.                     return array(1, $w, $h); // new line 
  8743.                 } elseif ($widthUsed > 0 && $displaywidth > $widthLeft && $is_table) {  // New line needed in TABLE 
  8744.                     return array(1, $w, $h); // new line 
  8745.                 } 
  8746.                 // Will fit on line but NEW PAGE REQUIRED 
  8747.                 elseif (($y + $displayheight > $this->PageBreakTrigger) && !$this->InFooter && !$is_table) { 
  8748.                     return array(-1, $w, $h); 
  8749.                 } // mPDF 6  Lists 
  8750.                 else { 
  8751.                     return array(0, $w, $h); 
  8752.                 } 
  8753.             } 
  8754.         } 
  8755.  
  8756.         if ($type == 'annot' || $type == 'bookmark' || $type == 'indexentry' || $type == 'toc') { 
  8757.             $w = 0.00001; 
  8758.             $h = 0.00001; 
  8759.             $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] = 0; 
  8760.             $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] = 0; 
  8761.             $objattr['BORDER-X'] = $x; 
  8762.             $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = $y; 
  8763.             $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = 0; 
  8764.             $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] = 0; 
  8765.             $objattr['INNER-X'] = $x; 
  8766.             $objattr['INNER-Y'] = $y; 
  8767.         } 
  8768.  
  8769.         if ($type == 'image') { 
  8770.             // Automatically resize to width remaining 
  8771.             if ($w > ($widthLeft + 0.0001) && !$is_table) { // mPDF 5.7.4  0.0001 to allow for rounding errors when w==maxWidth 
  8772.                 $w = $widthLeft; 
  8773.                 $h = abs($w * $info['h'] / $info['w']); 
  8774.             } 
  8775.             $img_w = $w - $extraWidth; 
  8776.             $img_h = $h - $extraHeight; 
  8777.  
  8778.             $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] = $img_w + $objattr['padding_left'] / $k + $objattr['padding_right'] / $k + (($objattr['border_left']['w'] / $k + $objattr['border_right']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8779.             $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h + $objattr['padding_top'] / $k + $objattr['padding_bottom'] / $k + (($objattr['border_top']['w'] / $k + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8780.             $objattr['BORDER-X'] = $x + $objattr['margin_left'] / $k + (($objattr['border_left']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8781.             $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['margin_top'] / $k + (($objattr['border_top']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8782.             $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $img_w; 
  8783.             $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h; 
  8784.             $objattr['INNER-X'] = $x + $objattr['padding_left'] / $k + $objattr['margin_left'] / $k + ($objattr['border_left']['w'] / $k); 
  8785.             $objattr['INNER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['padding_top'] / $k + $objattr['margin_top'] / $k + ($objattr['border_top']['w'] / $k); 
  8786.             $objattr['ID'] = $info['i']; 
  8787.         } 
  8788.  
  8789.         if ($type == 'input' && $objattr['subtype'] == 'IMAGE') { 
  8790.             $img_w = $w - $extraWidth; 
  8791.             $img_h = $h - $extraHeight; 
  8792.             $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] = $img_w + (($objattr['border_left']['w'] / $k + $objattr['border_right']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8793.             $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h + (($objattr['border_top']['w'] / $k + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8794.             $objattr['BORDER-X'] = $x + $objattr['margin_left'] / $k + (($objattr['border_left']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8795.             $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['margin_top'] / $k + (($objattr['border_top']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8796.             $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $img_w; 
  8797.             $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h; 
  8798.             $objattr['INNER-X'] = $x + $objattr['margin_left'] / $k + ($objattr['border_left']['w'] / $k); 
  8799.             $objattr['INNER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['margin_top'] / $k + ($objattr['border_top']['w'] / $k); 
  8800.             $objattr['ID'] = $info['i']; 
  8801.         } 
  8802.  
  8803.         if ($type == 'barcode' || $type == 'textcircle') { 
  8804.             $b_w = $w - $extraWidth; 
  8805.             $b_h = $h - $extraHeight; 
  8806.             $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] = $b_w + $objattr['padding_left'] / $k + $objattr['padding_right'] / $k + (($objattr['border_left']['w'] / $k + $objattr['border_right']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8807.             $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] = $b_h + $objattr['padding_top'] / $k + $objattr['padding_bottom'] / $k + (($objattr['border_top']['w'] / $k + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8808.             $objattr['BORDER-X'] = $x + $objattr['margin_left'] / $k + (($objattr['border_left']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8809.             $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['margin_top'] / $k + (($objattr['border_top']['w'] / $k) / 2); 
  8810.             $objattr['INNER-X'] = $x + $objattr['padding_left'] / $k + $objattr['margin_left'] / $k + ($objattr['border_left']['w'] / $k); 
  8811.             $objattr['INNER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['padding_top'] / $k + $objattr['margin_top'] / $k + ($objattr['border_top']['w'] / $k); 
  8812.             $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $b_w; 
  8813.             $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] = $b_h; 
  8814.         } 
  8815.  
  8816.  
  8817.         if ($type == 'textarea') { 
  8818.             // Automatically resize to width remaining 
  8819.             if ($w > $widthLeft && !$is_table) { 
  8820.                 $w = $widthLeft; 
  8821.             } 
  8822.             // This used to resize height to maximum remaining on page ? why. Causes problems when in table and causing a new column 
  8823.             //    if (($y + $h > $this->PageBreakTrigger) && !$this->InFooter) { 
  8824.             //        $h=$this->h - $y - $this->bMargin; 
  8825.             //    } 
  8826.         } 
  8827.  
  8828.         if ($type == 'hr') { 
  8829.             if ($is_table) { 
  8830.                 $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $maxWidth * $objattr['W-PERCENT'] / 100; 
  8831.                 $objattr['width'] = $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']; 
  8832.                 $w = $maxWidth; 
  8833.             } else { 
  8834.                 if ($w > $maxWidth) { 
  8835.                     $w = $maxWidth; 
  8836.                 } 
  8837.                 $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $w; 
  8838.                 $w = $maxWidth; 
  8839.             } 
  8840.         } 
  8841.  
  8842.  
  8843.  
  8844.         if (($type == 'select') || ($type == 'input' && ($objattr['subtype'] == 'TEXT' || $objattr['subtype'] == 'PASSWORD'))) { 
  8845.             // Automatically resize to width remaining 
  8846.             if ($w > $widthLeft && !$is_table) { 
  8847.                 $w = $widthLeft; 
  8848.             } 
  8849.         } 
  8850.  
  8851.         if ($type == 'textarea' || $type == 'select' || $type == 'input') { 
  8852.             if (isset($objattr['fontsize'])) 
  8853.                 $objattr['fontsize'] /= $k; 
  8854.             if (isset($objattr['linewidth'])) 
  8855.                 $objattr['linewidth'] /= $k; 
  8856.         } 
  8857.  
  8858.         if (!isset($objattr['BORDER-Y'])) { 
  8859.             $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = 0; 
  8860.         } 
  8861.         if (!isset($objattr['BORDER-X'])) { 
  8862.             $objattr['BORDER-X'] = 0; 
  8863.         } 
  8864.         if (!isset($objattr['INNER-Y'])) { 
  8865.             $objattr['INNER-Y'] = 0; 
  8866.         } 
  8867.         if (!isset($objattr['INNER-X'])) { 
  8868.             $objattr['INNER-X'] = 0; 
  8869.         } 
  8870.  
  8871.         //Return width-height array 
  8872.         $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'] = $w; 
  8873.         $objattr['OUTER-HEIGHT'] = $h; 
  8874.         $objattr['OUTER-X'] = $x; 
  8875.         $objattr['OUTER-Y'] = $y; 
  8876.         return $objattr; 
  8877.     } 
  8878.  
  8879.     /** -- END HTML-CSS -- */ 
  8880.  
  8881.     //============================================================= 
  8882.     //============================================================= 
  8883.     //============================================================= 
  8884.     //============================================================= 
  8885.     //============================================================= 
  8886.  
  8887.     function SetLineJoin($mode = 0) 
  8888.     { 
  8889.         $s = sprintf('%d j', $mode); 
  8890.         if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineJoin']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineJoin'] != $s) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineJoin']))) { 
  8891.             $this->_out($s); 
  8892.         } 
  8893.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineJoin'] = $s; 
  8894.     } 
  8895.  
  8896.     function SetLineCap($mode = 2) 
  8897.     { 
  8898.         $s = sprintf('%d J', $mode); 
  8899.         if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineCap']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineCap'] != $s) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineCap']))) { 
  8900.             $this->_out($s); 
  8901.         } 
  8902.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineCap'] = $s; 
  8903.     } 
  8904.  
  8905.     function SetDash($black = false, $white = false) 
  8906.     { 
  8907.         if ($black and $white) 
  8908.             $s = sprintf('[%.3F %.3F] 0 d', $black * _MPDFK, $white * _MPDFK); 
  8909.         else 
  8910.             $s = '[] 0 d'; 
  8911.         if ($this->page > 0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Dash']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Dash'] != $s) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Dash']))) { 
  8912.             $this->_out($s); 
  8913.         } 
  8914.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Dash'] = $s; 
  8915.     } 
  8916.  
  8917.     function SetDisplayPreferences($preferences) 
  8918.     { 
  8919.         // String containing any or none of /HideMenubar/HideToolbar/HideWindowUI/DisplayDocTitle/CenterWindow/FitWindow 
  8920.         $this->DisplayPreferences .= $preferences; 
  8921.     } 
  8922.  
  8923.     function Ln($h = '', $collapsible = 0) 
  8924.     { 
  8925.         // Added collapsible to allow collapsible top-margin on new page 
  8926.         //Line feed; default value is last cell height 
  8927.         $this->x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin']; 
  8928.         if ($collapsible && ($this->y == $this->tMargin) && (!$this->ColActive)) { 
  8929.             $h = 0; 
  8930.         } 
  8931.         if (is_string($h)) 
  8932.             $this->y+=$this->lasth; 
  8933.         else 
  8934.             $this->y+=$h; 
  8935.     } 
  8936.  
  8937.     /** -- HTML-CSS -- */ 
  8938.  
  8939.     function DivLn($h, $level = -3, $move_y = true, $collapsible = false, $state = 0) 
  8940.     { 
  8941.         // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom 
  8942.         // Used in Columns and keep-with-table i.e. "kwt" 
  8943.         // writes background block by block so it can be repositioned 
  8944.         // and also used in writingFlowingBlock at top and bottom of blocks to move y (not to draw/paint anything) 
  8945.         // adds lines (y) where DIV bgcolors are filled in 
  8946.         // this->x is returned as it was 
  8947.         // allows .00001 as nominal height used for bookmarks/annotations etc. 
  8948.         if ($collapsible && (sprintf("%0.4f", $this->y) == sprintf("%0.4f", $this->tMargin)) && (!$this->ColActive)) { 
  8949.             return; 
  8950.         } 
  8951.  
  8952.         // mPDF 6 Columns 
  8953.         //   if ($collapsible && (sprintf("%0.4f", $this->y)==sprintf("%0.4f", $this->y0)) && ($this->ColActive) && $this->CurrCol == 0) { return; }    // *COLUMNS* 
  8954.         if ($collapsible && (sprintf("%0.4f", $this->y) == sprintf("%0.4f", $this->y0)) && ($this->ColActive)) { 
  8955.             return; 
  8956.         } // *COLUMNS* 
  8957.         // Still use this method if columns or keep-with-table, as it allows repositioning later 
  8958.         // otherwise, now uses PaintDivBB() 
  8959.         if (!$this->ColActive && !$this->kwt) { 
  8960.             if ($move_y && !$this->ColActive) { 
  8961.                 $this->y += $h; 
  8962.             } 
  8963.             return; 
  8964.         } 
  8965.  
  8966.         if ($level == -3) { 
  8967.             $level = $this->blklvl; 
  8968.         } 
  8969.         $firstblockfill = $this->GetFirstBlockFill(); 
  8970.         if ($firstblockfill && $this->blklvl > 0 && $this->blklvl >= $firstblockfill) { 
  8971.             $last_x = 0; 
  8972.             $last_w = 0; 
  8973.             $last_fc = $this->FillColor; 
  8974.             $bak_x = $this->x; 
  8975.             $bak_h = $this->divheight; 
  8976.             $this->divheight = 0; // Temporarily turn off divheight - as Cell() uses it to check for PageBreak 
  8977.             for ($blvl = $firstblockfill; $blvl <= $level; $blvl++) { 
  8978.                 $this->x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$blvl]['outer_left_margin']; 
  8979.                 // mPDF 6 
  8980.                 if ($this->blk[$blvl]['bgcolor']) { 
  8981.                     $this->SetFColor($this->blk[$blvl]['bgcolorarray']); 
  8982.                 } 
  8983.                 if ($last_x != ($this->lMargin + $this->blk[$blvl]['outer_left_margin']) || ($last_w != $this->blk[$blvl]['width']) || $last_fc != $this->FillColor || (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['s']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['s']) || (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['s']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['s']) || (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['s']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['s']) || (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['s']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['s'])) { 
  8984.                     $x = $this->x; 
  8985.                     $this->Cell(($this->blk[$blvl]['width']), $h, '', '', 0, '', 1); 
  8986.                     $this->x = $x; 
  8987.                     if (!$this->keep_block_together && !$this->writingHTMLheader && !$this->writingHTMLfooter) { 
  8988.                         // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom 
  8989.                         if ($blvl == $this->blklvl) { 
  8990.                             $this->PaintDivLnBorder($state, $blvl, $h); 
  8991.                         } else { 
  8992.                             $this->PaintDivLnBorder(0, $blvl, $h); 
  8993.                         } 
  8994.                     } 
  8995.                 } 
  8996.                 $last_x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$blvl]['outer_left_margin']; 
  8997.                 $last_w = $this->blk[$blvl]['width']; 
  8998.                 $last_fc = $this->FillColor; 
  8999.             } 
  9000.             // Reset current block fill 
  9001.             if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'])) { 
  9002.                 $bcor = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray']; 
  9003.                 $this->SetFColor($bcor); 
  9004.             } 
  9005.             $this->x = $bak_x; 
  9006.             $this->divheight = $bak_h; 
  9007.         } 
  9008.         if ($move_y) { 
  9009.             $this->y += $h; 
  9010.         } 
  9011.     } 
  9012.  
  9013.     /** -- END HTML-CSS -- */ 
  9014.  
  9015.     function SetX($x) 
  9016.     { 
  9017.         //Set x position 
  9018.         if ($x >= 0) 
  9019.             $this->x = $x; 
  9020.         else 
  9021.             $this->x = $this->w + $x; 
  9022.     } 
  9023.  
  9024.     function SetY($y) 
  9025.     { 
  9026.         //Set y position and reset x 
  9027.         $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  9028.         if ($y >= 0) 
  9029.             $this->y = $y; 
  9030.         else 
  9031.             $this->y = $this->h + $y; 
  9032.     } 
  9033.  
  9034.     function SetXY($x, $y) 
  9035.     { 
  9036.         //Set x and y positions 
  9037.         $this->SetY($y); 
  9038.         $this->SetX($x); 
  9039.     } 
  9040.  
  9041.     function Output($name = '', $dest = '') 
  9042.     { 
  9043.         //Output PDF to some destination 
  9044.         if ($this->showStats) { 
  9045.             $this->WriteHTML('<div>Generated in ' . sprintf('%.2F', (microtime(true) - $this->time0)) . ' seconds</div>'); 
  9046.             $this->WriteHTML('<div>Compiled in ' . sprintf('%.2F', (microtime(true) - $this->time0)) . ' seconds (total)</div>'); 
  9047.             $this->WriteHTML('<div>Peak Memory usage ' . number_format((memory_get_peak_usage(true) / (1024 * 1024)), 2) . ' MB</div>'); 
  9048.             $this->WriteHTML('<div>Number of fonts ' . count($this->fonts) . '</div>'); 
  9049.         } 
  9050.  
  9051.         /** Finish document if necessary */ 
  9052.         if($this->state < 3) { 
  9053.             $this->Close(); 
  9054.         } 
  9055.  
  9056.         if (($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) && $this->encrypted) { 
  9057.             throw new MpdfException("PDFA1-b or PDFX/1-a does not permit encryption of documents."); 
  9058.         } 
  9059.         if (count($this->PDFAXwarnings) && (($this->PDFA && !$this->PDFAauto) || ($this->PDFX && !$this->PDFXauto))) { 
  9060.             if ($this->PDFA) { 
  9061.                 echo '<div>WARNING - This file could not be generated as it stands as a PDFA1-b compliant file.</div>'; 
  9062.                 echo '<div>These issues can be automatically fixed by mPDF using <i>$mpdf->PDFAauto=true;</i></div>'; 
  9063.                 echo '<div>Action that mPDF will take to automatically force PDFA1-b compliance are shown in brackets.</div>'; 
  9064.             } else { 
  9065.                 echo '<div>WARNING - This file could not be generated as it stands as a PDFX/1-a compliant file.</div>'; 
  9066.                 echo '<div>These issues can be automatically fixed by mPDF using <i>$mpdf->PDFXauto=true;</i></div>'; 
  9067.                 echo '<div>Action that mPDF will take to automatically force PDFX/1-a compliance are shown in brackets.</div>'; 
  9068.             } 
  9069.             echo '<div>Warning(s) generated:</div><ul>'; 
  9070.             $this->PDFAXwarnings = array_unique($this->PDFAXwarnings); 
  9071.             foreach ($this->PDFAXwarnings AS $w) { 
  9072.                 echo '<li>' . $w . '</li>'; 
  9073.             } 
  9074.             echo '</ul>'; 
  9075.             exit; 
  9076.         } 
  9077.  
  9078.         if (is_bool($dest)) { 
  9079.             $dest = $dest ? 'D' : 'F'; 
  9080.         } 
  9081.  
  9082.         $dest = strtoupper($dest); 
  9083.  
  9084.         if ($dest == '') { 
  9085.             if ($name == '') { 
  9086.                 $name = 'mpdf.pdf'; 
  9087.                 $dest = 'I'; 
  9088.             } else { 
  9089.                 $dest = 'F'; 
  9090.             } 
  9091.         } 
  9092.  
  9093.         $dest = apply_filters('mpdf_output_destination', $dest, $name); 
  9094.         $name = apply_filters('mpdf_output_name', $name, $dest); 
  9095.  
  9096.         switch ($dest) { 
  9097.             case 'I': 
  9098.                 if ($this->debug && !$this->allow_output_buffering && ob_get_contents()) { 
  9099.                     throw new MpdfException('Output has already been sent from the script - PDF file generation aborted.'); 
  9100.                 } 
  9101.                 //Send to standard output 
  9102.                 if (PHP_SAPI != 'cli') { 
  9103.                     //We send to a browser 
  9104.                     header('Content-Type: application/pdf'); 
  9105.                     if (headers_sent()) { 
  9106.                         throw new MpdfException('Some data has already been output to browser, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  9107.                     } 
  9108.  
  9109.                     if (!isset($_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING']) || empty($_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING'])) { 
  9110.                         // don't use length if server using compression 
  9111.                         header('Content-Length: ' . strlen($this->buffer)); 
  9112.                     } 
  9113.                     header('Content-disposition: inline; filename="' . $name . '"'); 
  9114.                     header('Cache-Control: public, must-revalidate, max-age=0'); 
  9115.                     header('Pragma: public'); 
  9116.                     header('Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'); 
  9117.                     header('Last-Modified: ' . gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s') . ' GMT'); 
  9118.                 } 
  9119.                 echo $this->buffer; 
  9120.                 exit; 
  9121.             break; 
  9122.  
  9123.             case 'D': 
  9124.                 //Download file 
  9125.                 header('Content-Description: File Transfer'); 
  9126.                 if (headers_sent()) { 
  9127.                     throw new MpdfException('Some data has already been output to browser, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  9128.                 } 
  9129.                 header('Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary'); 
  9130.                 header('Cache-Control: public, must-revalidate, max-age=0'); 
  9131.                 header('Pragma: public'); 
  9132.                 header('Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'); 
  9133.                 header('Last-Modified: ' . gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s') . ' GMT'); 
  9134.                 header('Content-Type: application/force-download'); 
  9135.                 header('Content-Type: application/octet-stream', false); 
  9136.                 header('Content-Type: application/download', false); 
  9137.                 header('Content-Type: application/pdf', false); 
  9138.                 if (!isset($_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING']) || empty($_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING'])) { 
  9139.                     // don't use length if server using compression 
  9140.                     header('Content-Length: ' . strlen($this->buffer)); 
  9141.                 } 
  9142.                 header('Content-disposition: attachment; filename="' . $name . '"'); 
  9143.                 echo $this->buffer; 
  9144.                 exit; 
  9145.  
  9146.             break; 
  9147.  
  9148.             case 'F': 
  9149.                 //Save to local file 
  9150.                 $f = fopen($name, 'wb'); 
  9151.                 if (!$f) { 
  9152.                     throw new MpdfException('Unable to create output file: ' . $name); 
  9153.                 } 
  9154.                 fwrite($f, $this->buffer, strlen($this->buffer)); 
  9155.                 fclose($f); 
  9156.             break; 
  9157.  
  9158.             case 'S': 
  9159.                 //Return as a string 
  9160.                 return $this->buffer; 
  9161.             break; 
  9162.  
  9163.             default: 
  9164.                 throw new MpdfException('Incorrect output destination: ' . $dest); 
  9165.             break; 
  9166.         } 
  9167.  
  9168.         return ''; 
  9169.     } 
  9170.  
  9171.     // ***************************************************************************** 
  9172.     //                                                                             * 
  9173.     //                             Protected methods                               * 
  9174.     //                                                                             * 
  9175.     // ***************************************************************************** 
  9176.     function _dochecks() 
  9177.     { 
  9178.         //Check for locale-related bug 
  9179.         if (1.1 == 1) 
  9180.             throw new MpdfException('Don\'t alter the locale before including mPDF'); 
  9181.         //Check for decimal separator 
  9182.         if (sprintf('%.1f', 1.0) != '1.0') 
  9183.             setlocale(LC_NUMERIC, 'C'); 
  9184.         $mqr = ini_get("magic_quotes_runtime"); 
  9185.         if ($mqr) { 
  9186.             throw new MpdfException('mPDF requires magic_quotes_runtime to be turned off e.g. by using ini_set("magic_quotes_runtime", 0);'); 
  9187.         } 
  9188.     } 
  9189.  
  9190.     function _puthtmlheaders() 
  9191.     { 
  9192.         $this->state = 2; 
  9193.         $nb = $this->page; 
  9194.         for ($n = 1; $n <= $nb; $n++) { 
  9195.             if ($this->mirrorMargins && $n % 2 == 0) { 
  9196.                 $OE = 'E'; 
  9197.             } // EVEN 
  9198.             else { 
  9199.                 $OE = 'O'; 
  9200.             } 
  9201.             $this->page = $n; 
  9202.             $pn = $this->docPageNum($n); 
  9203.             if ($pn) 
  9204.                 $pnstr = $this->pagenumPrefix . $pn . $this->pagenumSuffix; 
  9205.             else { 
  9206.                 $pnstr = ''; 
  9207.             } 
  9208.             $pnt = $this->docPageNumTotal($n); 
  9209.             if ($pnt) 
  9210.                 $pntstr = $this->nbpgPrefix . $pnt . $this->nbpgSuffix; 
  9211.             else { 
  9212.                 $pntstr = ''; 
  9213.             } 
  9214.             if (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE])) { 
  9215.                 $html = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['html']; 
  9216.                 $this->lMargin = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['ml']; 
  9217.                 $this->rMargin = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['mr']; 
  9218.                 $this->tMargin = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['mh']; 
  9219.                 $this->bMargin = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['mf']; 
  9220.                 $this->margin_header = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['mh']; 
  9221.                 $this->margin_footer = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['mf']; 
  9222.                 $this->w = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['pw']; 
  9223.                 $this->h = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['ph']; 
  9224.                 $rotate = (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['rotate']) ? $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['rotate'] : null); 
  9225.                 $this->Reset(); 
  9226.                 $this->pageoutput[$n] = array(); 
  9227.                 $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  9228.                 $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  9229.                 $this->y = $this->margin_header; 
  9230.                 $html = str_replace('{PAGENO}', $pnstr, $html);
