  9231.                 $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPgGp, $pntstr, $html); // {nbpg} 
  9232.                 $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPg, $nb, $html); // {nb} 
  9233.                 $html = preg_replace_callback('/\{DATE\s+(.*?)\}/', array($this, 'date_callback'), $html); // mPDF 5.7 
  9234.  
  9235.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array(); 
  9236.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots = array(); 
  9237.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageForms = array(); 
  9238.                 $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  9239.  
  9240.                 $this->writingHTMLheader = true; 
  9241.                 $this->WriteHTML($html, 4); // parameter 4 saves output to $this->headerbuffer 
  9242.                 $this->writingHTMLheader = false; 
  9243.                 $this->Reset(); 
  9244.                 $this->pageoutput[$n] = array(); 
  9245.  
  9246.                 $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(); 
  9247.                 $this->headerbuffer = $s . $this->headerbuffer; 
  9248.                 $os = ''; 
  9249.                 if ($rotate) { 
  9250.                     $os .= sprintf('q 0 -1 1 0 0 %.3F cm ', ($this->w * _MPDFK)); 
  9251.                     // To rotate the other way i.e. Header to left of page: 
  9252.                     //$os .= sprintf('q 0 1 -1 0 %.3F %.3F cm ', ($this->h*_MPDFK), (($this->rMargin - $this->lMargin )*_MPDFK)); 
  9253.                 } 
  9254.                 $os .= $this->headerbuffer; 
  9255.                 if ($rotate) { 
  9256.                     $os .= ' Q' . "\n"; 
  9257.                 } 
  9258.  
  9259.                 // Writes over the page background but behind any other output on page 
  9260.                 $os = preg_replace('/\\\\/', '\\\\\\\\', $os); 
  9261.                 $this->pages[$n] = preg_replace('/(___HEADER___MARKER' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', "\n" . $os . "\n" . '\\1', $this->pages[$n]); 
  9262.  
  9263.                 $lks = $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks; 
  9264.                 foreach ($lks AS $lk) { 
  9265.                     if ($rotate) { 
  9266.                         $lw = $lk[2]; 
  9267.                         $lh = $lk[3]; 
  9268.                         $lk[2] = $lh; 
  9269.                         $lk[3] = $lw; // swap width and height 
  9270.                         $ax = $lk[0] / _MPDFK; 
  9271.                         $ay = $lk[1] / _MPDFK; 
  9272.                         $bx = $ay - ($lh / _MPDFK); 
  9273.                         $by = $this->w - $ax; 
  9274.                         $lk[0] = $bx * _MPDFK; 
  9275.                         $lk[1] = ($this->h - $by) * _MPDFK - $lw; 
  9276.                     } 
  9277.                     $this->PageLinks[$n][] = $lk; 
  9278.                 } 
  9279.                 /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  9280.                 foreach ($this->HTMLheaderPageForms AS $f) { 
  9281.                     $this->mpdfform->forms[$f['n']] = $f; 
  9282.                 } 
  9283.                 /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  9284.             } 
  9285.             if (isset($this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE])) { 
  9286.                 $html = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['html']; 
  9287.                 $this->lMargin = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['ml']; 
  9288.                 $this->rMargin = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['mr']; 
  9289.                 $this->tMargin = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['mh']; 
  9290.                 $this->bMargin = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['mf']; 
  9291.                 $this->margin_header = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['mh']; 
  9292.                 $this->margin_footer = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['mf']; 
  9293.                 $this->w = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['pw']; 
  9294.                 $this->h = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['ph']; 
  9295.                 $rotate = (isset($this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['rotate']) ? $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['rotate'] : null); 
  9296.                 $this->Reset(); 
  9297.                 $this->pageoutput[$n] = array(); 
  9298.                 $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  9299.                 $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  9300.                 $top_y = $this->y = $this->h - $this->margin_footer; 
  9301.  
  9302.                 // if bottom-margin==0, corrects to avoid division by zero 
  9303.                 if ($this->y == $this->h) { 
  9304.                     $top_y = $this->y = ($this->h - 0.1); 
  9305.                 } 
  9306.                 $html = str_replace('{PAGENO}', $pnstr, $html); 
  9307.                 $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPgGp, $pntstr, $html); // {nbpg} 
  9308.                 $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPg, $nb, $html); // {nb} 
  9309.                 $html = preg_replace_callback('/\{DATE\s+(.*?)\}/', array($this, 'date_callback'), $html); // mPDF 5.7 
  9310.  
  9311.  
  9312.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array(); 
  9313.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots = array(); 
  9314.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageForms = array(); 
  9315.                 $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  9316.  
  9317.                 $this->writingHTMLfooter = true; 
  9318.                 $this->InFooter = true; 
  9319.                 $this->WriteHTML($html, 4); // parameter 4 saves output to $this->headerbuffer 
  9320.                 $this->InFooter = false; 
  9321.                 $this->Reset(); 
  9322.                 $this->pageoutput[$n] = array(); 
  9323.  
  9324.                 $fheight = $this->y - $top_y; 
  9325.                 $adj = -$fheight; 
  9326.  
  9327.                 $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(-$adj); 
  9328.                 $this->headerbuffer = $s . $this->headerbuffer; 
  9329.                 $this->writingHTMLfooter = false; // mPDF 5.7.3  (moved after PrintPageBackgrounds so can adjust position of images in footer) 
  9330.  
  9331.                 $os = ''; 
  9332.                 $os .= $this->StartTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  9333.                 if ($rotate) { 
  9334.                     $os .= sprintf('q 0 -1 1 0 0 %.3F cm ', ($this->w * _MPDFK)); 
  9335.                     // To rotate the other way i.e. Header to left of page: 
  9336.                     //$os .= sprintf('q 0 1 -1 0 %.3F %.3F cm ', ($this->h*_MPDFK), (($this->rMargin - $this->lMargin )*_MPDFK)); 
  9337.                 } 
  9338.                 $os .= $this->transformTranslate(0, $adj, true) . "\n"; 
  9339.                 $os .= $this->headerbuffer; 
  9340.                 if ($rotate) { 
  9341.                     $os .= ' Q' . "\n"; 
  9342.                 } 
  9343.                 $os .= $this->StopTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  9344.                 // Writes over the page background but behind any other output on page 
  9345.                 $os = preg_replace('/\\\\/', '\\\\\\\\', $os); 
  9346.                 $this->pages[$n] = preg_replace('/(___HEADER___MARKER' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', "\n" . $os . "\n" . '\\1', $this->pages[$n]); 
  9347.  
  9348.                 $lks = $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks; 
  9349.                 foreach ($lks AS $lk) { 
  9350.                     $lk[1] -= $adj * _MPDFK; 
  9351.                     if ($rotate) { 
  9352.                         $lw = $lk[2]; 
  9353.                         $lh = $lk[3]; 
  9354.                         $lk[2] = $lh; 
  9355.                         $lk[3] = $lw; // swap width and height 
  9356.  
  9357.                         $ax = $lk[0] / _MPDFK; 
  9358.                         $ay = $lk[1] / _MPDFK; 
  9359.                         $bx = $ay - ($lh / _MPDFK); 
  9360.                         $by = $this->w - $ax; 
  9361.                         $lk[0] = $bx * _MPDFK; 
  9362.                         $lk[1] = ($this->h - $by) * _MPDFK - $lw; 
  9363.                     } 
  9364.                     $this->PageLinks[$n][] = $lk; 
  9365.                 } 
  9366.                 /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  9367.                 foreach ($this->HTMLheaderPageForms AS $f) { 
  9368.                     $f['y'] += $adj; 
  9369.                     $this->mpdfform->forms[$f['n']] = $f; 
  9370.                 } 
  9371.                 /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  9372.             } 
  9373.         } 
  9374.         $this->page = $nb; 
  9375.         $this->state = 1; 
  9376.     } 
  9377.  
  9378.     function _putpages() 
  9379.     { 
  9380.         $nb = $this->page; 
  9381.         $filter = ($this->compress) ? '/Filter /FlateDecode ' : ''; 
  9382.  
  9383.         if ($this->DefOrientation == 'P') { 
  9384.             $defwPt = $this->fwPt; 
  9385.             $defhPt = $this->fhPt; 
  9386.         } else { 
  9387.             $defwPt = $this->fhPt; 
  9388.             $defhPt = $this->fwPt; 
  9389.         } 
  9390.         $annotid = (3 + 2 * $nb); 
  9391.  
  9392.         // Active Forms 
  9393.         $totaladdnum = 0; 
  9394.         for ($n = 1; $n <= $nb; $n++) { 
  9395.             if (isset($this->PageLinks[$n])) { 
  9396.                 $totaladdnum += count($this->PageLinks[$n]); 
  9397.             } 
  9398.             /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  9399.             if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$n])) { 
  9400.                 foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$n] as $k => $pl) { 
  9401.                     if (!empty($pl['opt']['popup']) || !empty($pl['opt']['file'])) { 
  9402.                         $totaladdnum += 2; 
  9403.                     } else { 
  9404.                         $totaladdnum++; 
  9405.                     } 
  9406.                 } 
  9407.             } 
  9408.             /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  9409.  
  9410.             /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  9411.             if (count($this->mpdfform->forms) > 0) { 
  9412.                 $this->mpdfform->countPageForms($n, $totaladdnum); 
  9413.             } 
  9414.             /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  9415.         } 
  9416.         /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  9417.         // Make a note in the radio button group of the obj_id it will have 
  9418.         $ctr = 0; 
  9419.         if (count($this->mpdfform->form_radio_groups)) { 
  9420.             foreach ($this->mpdfform->form_radio_groups AS $name => $frg) { 
  9421.                 $this->mpdfform->form_radio_groups[$name]['obj_id'] = $annotid + $totaladdnum + $ctr; 
  9422.                 $ctr++; 
  9423.             } 
  9424.         } 
  9425.         /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  9426.  
  9427.         // Select unused fonts (usually default font) 
  9428.         $unused = array(); 
  9429.         foreach ($this->fonts as $fk => $font) { 
  9430.             if (isset($font['type']) && $font['type'] == 'TTF' && !$font['used']) { 
  9431.                 $unused[] = $fk; 
  9432.             } 
  9433.         } 
  9434.  
  9435.  
  9436.         for ($n = 1; $n <= $nb; $n++) { 
  9437.             $thispage = $this->pages[$n]; 
  9438.             if (isset($this->OrientationChanges[$n])) { 
  9439.                 $hPt = $this->pageDim[$n]['w'] * _MPDFK; 
  9440.                 $wPt = $this->pageDim[$n]['h'] * _MPDFK; 
  9441.                 $owidthPt_LR = $this->pageDim[$n]['outer_width_TB'] * _MPDFK; 
  9442.                 $owidthPt_TB = $this->pageDim[$n]['outer_width_LR'] * _MPDFK; 
  9443.             } else { 
  9444.                 $wPt = $this->pageDim[$n]['w'] * _MPDFK; 
  9445.                 $hPt = $this->pageDim[$n]['h'] * _MPDFK; 
  9446.                 $owidthPt_LR = $this->pageDim[$n]['outer_width_LR'] * _MPDFK; 
  9447.                 $owidthPt_TB = $this->pageDim[$n]['outer_width_TB'] * _MPDFK; 
  9448.             } 
  9449.             // Remove references to unused fonts (usually default font) 
  9450.             foreach ($unused as $fk) { 
  9451.                 if ($this->fonts[$fk]['sip'] || $this->fonts[$fk]['smp']) { 
  9452.                     foreach ($this->fonts[$fk]['subsetfontids'] AS $k => $fid) { 
  9453.                         $thispage = preg_replace('/\s\/F' . $fid . ' \d[\d.]* Tf\s/is', ' ', $thispage); 
  9454.                     } 
  9455.                 } else { 
  9456.                     $thispage = preg_replace('/\s\/F' . $this->fonts[$fk]['i'] . ' \d[\d.]* Tf\s/is', ' ', $thispage); 
  9457.                 } 
  9458.             } 
  9459.             // Clean up repeated /GS1 gs statements 
  9460.             // For some reason using + for repetition instead of {2, 20} crashes PHP Script Interpreter ??? 
  9461.             $thispage = preg_replace('/(\/GS1 gs\n) {2, 20}/', "/GS1 gs\n", $thispage); 
  9462.  
  9463.             $thispage = preg_replace('/(\s*___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS' . $this->uniqstr . '\s*)/', " ", $thispage); 
  9464.             $thispage = preg_replace('/(\s*___HEADER___MARKER' . $this->uniqstr . '\s*)/', " ", $thispage); 
  9465.             $thispage = preg_replace('/(\s*___PAGE___START' . $this->uniqstr . '\s*)/', " ", $thispage); 
  9466.             $thispage = preg_replace('/(\s*___TABLE___BACKGROUNDS' . $this->uniqstr . '\s*)/', " ", $thispage); 
  9467.             // mPDF 5.7.3 TRANSFORMS 
  9468.             while (preg_match('/(\% BTR(.*?)\% ETR)/is', $thispage, $m)) { 
  9469.                 $thispage = preg_replace('/(\% BTR.*?\% ETR)/is', '', $thispage, 1) . "\n" . $m[2]; 
  9470.             } 
  9471.  
  9472.             //Page 
  9473.             $this->_newobj(); 
  9474.             $this->_out('<</Type /Page'); 
  9475.             $this->_out('/Parent 1 0 R'); 
  9476.             if (isset($this->OrientationChanges[$n])) { 
  9477.                 $this->_out(sprintf('/MediaBox [0 0 %.3F %.3F]', $hPt, $wPt)); 
  9478.                 //If BleedBox is defined, it must be larger than the TrimBox, but smaller than the MediaBox 
  9479.                 $bleedMargin = $this->pageDim[$n]['bleedMargin'] * _MPDFK; 
  9480.                 if ($bleedMargin && ($owidthPt_TB || $owidthPt_LR)) { 
  9481.                     $x0 = $owidthPt_TB - $bleedMargin; 
  9482.                     $y0 = $owidthPt_LR - $bleedMargin; 
  9483.                     $x1 = $hPt - $owidthPt_TB + $bleedMargin; 
  9484.                     $y1 = $wPt - $owidthPt_LR + $bleedMargin; 
  9485.                     $this->_out(sprintf('/BleedBox [%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F]', $x0, $y0, $x1, $y1)); 
  9486.                 } 
  9487.                 $this->_out(sprintf('/TrimBox [%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F]', $owidthPt_TB, $owidthPt_LR, ($hPt - $owidthPt_TB), ($wPt - $owidthPt_LR))); 
  9488.                 if (isset($this->OrientationChanges[$n]) && $this->displayDefaultOrientation) { 
  9489.                     if ($this->DefOrientation == 'P') { 
  9490.                         $this->_out('/Rotate 270'); 
  9491.                     } else { 
  9492.                         $this->_out('/Rotate 90'); 
  9493.                     } 
  9494.                 } 
  9495.             } 
  9496.             //elseif($wPt != $defwPt || $hPt != $defhPt) { 
  9497.             else { 
  9498.                 $this->_out(sprintf('/MediaBox [0 0 %.3F %.3F]', $wPt, $hPt)); 
  9499.                 $bleedMargin = $this->pageDim[$n]['bleedMargin'] * _MPDFK; 
  9500.                 if ($bleedMargin && ($owidthPt_TB || $owidthPt_LR)) { 
  9501.                     $x0 = $owidthPt_LR - $bleedMargin; 
  9502.                     $y0 = $owidthPt_TB - $bleedMargin; 
  9503.                     $x1 = $wPt - $owidthPt_LR + $bleedMargin; 
  9504.                     $y1 = $hPt - $owidthPt_TB + $bleedMargin; 
  9505.                     $this->_out(sprintf('/BleedBox [%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F]', $x0, $y0, $x1, $y1)); 
  9506.                 } 
  9507.                 $this->_out(sprintf('/TrimBox [%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F]', $owidthPt_LR, $owidthPt_TB, ($wPt - $owidthPt_LR), ($hPt - $owidthPt_TB))); 
  9508.             } 
  9509.             $this->_out('/Resources 2 0 R'); 
  9510.  
  9511.             // Important to keep in RGB colorSpace when using transparency 
  9512.             if (!$this->PDFA && !$this->PDFX) { 
  9513.                 if ($this->restrictColorSpace == 3) 
  9514.                     $this->_out('/Group << /Type /Group /S /Transparency /CS /DeviceCMYK >> '); 
  9515.                 elseif ($this->restrictColorSpace == 1) 
  9516.                     $this->_out('/Group << /Type /Group /S /Transparency /CS /DeviceGray >> '); 
  9517.                 else 
  9518.                     $this->_out('/Group << /Type /Group /S /Transparency /CS /DeviceRGB >> '); 
  9519.             } 
  9520.  
  9521.             $annotsnum = 0; 
  9522.             $embeddedfiles = array(); // mPDF 5.7.2 /EmbeddedFiles 
  9523.  
  9524.             if (isset($this->PageLinks[$n])) { 
  9525.                 $annotsnum += count($this->PageLinks[$n]); 
  9526.             } 
  9527.             /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  9528.             if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$n])) { 
  9529.                 foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$n] as $k => $pl) { 
  9530.                     if (!empty($pl['opt']['file'])) { 
  9531.                         $embeddedfiles[$annotsnum + 1] = true; 
  9532.                     } // mPDF 5.7.2 /EmbeddedFiles 
  9533.                     if (!empty($pl['opt']['popup']) || !empty($pl['opt']['file'])) { 
  9534.                         $annotsnum += 2; 
  9535.                     } else { 
  9536.                         $annotsnum++; 
  9537.                     } 
  9538.                     $this->PageAnnots[$n][$k]['pageobj'] = $this->n; 
  9539.                 } 
  9540.             } 
  9541.             /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  9542.  
  9543.             /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  9544.             // Active Forms 
  9545.             $formsnum = 0; 
  9546.             if (count($this->mpdfform->forms) > 0) { 
  9547.                 foreach ($this->mpdfform->forms as $val) { 
  9548.                     if ($val['page'] == $n) 
  9549.                         $formsnum++; 
  9550.                 } 
  9551.             } 
  9552.             /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  9553.             if ($annotsnum || $formsnum) { 
  9554.                 $s = '/Annots [ '; 
  9555.                 for ($i = 0; $i < $annotsnum; $i++) { 
  9556.                     if (!isset($embeddedfiles[$i])) { 
  9557.                         $s .= ($annotid + $i) . ' 0 R '; 
  9558.                     } // mPDF 5.7.2 /EmbeddedFiles 
  9559.                 } 
  9560.                 $annotid += $annotsnum; 
  9561.                 /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  9562.                 if (count($this->mpdfform->forms) > 0) { 
  9563.                     $this->mpdfform->addFormIds($n, $s, $annotid); 
  9564.                 } 
  9565.                 /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  9566.                 $s .= '] '; 
  9567.                 $this->_out($s); 
  9568.             } 
  9569.  
  9570.             $this->_out('/Contents ' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R>>'); 
  9571.             $this->_out('endobj'); 
  9572.  
  9573.             //Page content 
  9574.             $this->_newobj(); 
  9575.             $p = ($this->compress) ? gzcompress($thispage) : $thispage; 
  9576.             $this->_out('<<' . $filter . '/Length ' . strlen($p) . '>>'); 
  9577.             $this->_putstream($p); 
  9578.             $this->_out('endobj'); 
  9579.         } 
  9580.         $this->_putannots(); // mPDF 5.7.2 
  9581.         //Pages root 
  9582.         $this->offsets[1] = strlen($this->buffer); 
  9583.         $this->_out('1 0 obj'); 
  9584.         $this->_out('<</Type /Pages'); 
  9585.         $kids = '/Kids ['; 
  9586.         for ($i = 0; $i < $nb; $i++) 
  9587.             $kids.=(3 + 2 * $i) . ' 0 R '; 
  9588.         $this->_out($kids . ']'); 
  9589.         $this->_out('/Count ' . $nb); 
  9590.         $this->_out(sprintf('/MediaBox [0 0 %.3F %.3F]', $defwPt, $defhPt)); 
  9591.         $this->_out('>>'); 
  9592.         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  9593.     } 
  9594.  
  9595.     function _putannots() 
  9596.     { // mPDF 5.7.2 
  9597.         $filter = ($this->compress) ? '/Filter /FlateDecode ' : ''; 
  9598.         $nb = $this->page; 
  9599.         for ($n = 1; $n <= $nb; $n++) { 
  9600.             $annotobjs = array(); 
  9601.             if (isset($this->PageLinks[$n]) || isset($this->PageAnnots[$n]) || count($this->mpdfform->forms) > 0) { 
  9602.                 $wPt = $this->pageDim[$n]['w'] * _MPDFK; 
  9603.                 $hPt = $this->pageDim[$n]['h'] * _MPDFK; 
  9604.  
  9605.                 //Links 
  9606.                 if (isset($this->PageLinks[$n])) { 
  9607.                     foreach ($this->PageLinks[$n] as $key => $pl) { 
  9608.                         $this->_newobj(); 
  9609.                         $annot = ''; 
  9610.                         $rect = sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F', $pl[0], $pl[1], $pl[0] + $pl[2], $pl[1] - $pl[3]); 
  9611.                         $annot .= '<</Type /Annot /Subtype /Link /Rect [' . $rect . ']'; 
  9612.                         $annot .= ' /Contents ' . $this->_UTF16BEtextstring($pl[4]); 
  9613.                         $annot .= ' /NM ' . $this->_textstring(sprintf('%04u-%04u', $n, $key)); 
  9614.                         $annot .= ' /M ' . $this->_textstring('D:' . date('YmdHis')); 
  9615.                         $annot .= ' /Border [0 0 0]'; 
  9616.                         // Use this (instead of /Border) to specify border around link 
  9617.                         //        $annot .= ' /BS <</W 1';    // Width on points; 0 = no line 
  9618.                         //        $annot .= ' /S /D';        // style - [S]olid, [D]ashed, [B]eveled, [I]nset, [U]nderline 
  9619.                         //        $annot .= ' /D [3 2]';        // Dash array - if dashed 
  9620.                         //        $annot .= ' >>'; 
  9621.                         //        $annot .= ' /C [1 0 0]';    // Color RGB 
  9622.  
  9623.                         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  9624.                             $annot .= ' /F 28'; 
  9625.                         } 
  9626.                         if (strpos($pl[4], '@') === 0) { 
  9627.                             $p = substr($pl[4], 1); 
  9628.                             //    $h=isset($this->OrientationChanges[$p]) ? $wPt : $hPt; 
  9629.                             $htarg = $this->pageDim[$p]['h'] * _MPDFK; 
  9630.                             $annot.=sprintf(' /Dest [%d 0 R /XYZ 0 %.3F null]>>', 1 + 2 * $p, $htarg); 
  9631.                         } elseif (is_string($pl[4])) { 
  9632.                             $annot .= ' /A <</S /URI /URI ' . $this->_textstring($pl[4]) . '>> >>'; 
  9633.                         } else { 
  9634.                             $l = $this->links[$pl[4]]; 
  9635.                             // may not be set if #link points to non-existent target 
  9636.                             if (isset($this->pageDim[$l[0]]['h'])) { 
  9637.                                 $htarg = $this->pageDim[$l[0]]['h'] * _MPDFK; 
  9638.                             } else { 
  9639.                                 $htarg = $this->h * _MPDFK; 
  9640.                             } // doesn't really matter 
  9641.                             $annot.=sprintf(' /Dest [%d 0 R /XYZ 0 %.3F null]>>', 1 + 2 * $l[0], $htarg - $l[1] * _MPDFK); 
  9642.                         } 
  9643.                         $this->_out($annot); 
  9644.                         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  9645.                     } 
  9646.                 } 
  9647.  
  9648.  
  9649.                 /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  9650.                 if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$n])) { 
  9651.                     foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$n] as $key => $pl) { 
  9652.                         if ($pl['opt']['file']) { 
  9653.                             $FileAttachment = true; 
  9654.                         } else { 
  9655.                             $FileAttachment = false; 
  9656.                         } 
  9657.                         $this->_newobj(); 
  9658.                         $annot = ''; 
  9659.                         $pl['opt'] = array_change_key_case($pl['opt'], CASE_LOWER); 
  9660.                         $x = $pl['x']; 
  9661.                         if ($this->annotMargin <> 0 || $x == 0 || $x < 0) { // Odd page 
  9662.                             $x = ($wPt / _MPDFK) - $this->annotMargin; 
  9663.                         } 
  9664.                         $w = $h = 0; 
  9665.                         $a = $x * _MPDFK; 
  9666.                         $b = $hPt - ($pl['y'] * _MPDFK); 
  9667.                         $annot .= '<</Type /Annot '; 
  9668.                         if ($FileAttachment) { 
  9669.                             $annot .= '/Subtype /FileAttachment '; 
  9670.                             // Need to set a size for FileAttachment icons 
  9671.                             if ($pl['opt']['icon'] == 'Paperclip') { 
  9672.                                 $w = 8.235; 
  9673.                                 $h = 20; 
  9674.                             } // 7, 17 
  9675.                             elseif ($pl['opt']['icon'] == 'Tag') { 
  9676.                                 $w = 20; 
  9677.                                 $h = 16; 
  9678.                             } elseif ($pl['opt']['icon'] == 'Graph') { 
  9679.                                 $w = 20; 
  9680.                                 $h = 20; 
  9681.                             } else { 
  9682.                                 $w = 14; 
  9683.                                 $h = 20; 
  9684.                             }  // PushPin 
  9685.                             $f = $pl['opt']['file']; 
  9686.                             $f = preg_replace('/^.*\//', '', $f); 
  9687.                             $f = preg_replace('/[^a-zA-Z0-9._]/', '', $f); 
  9688.                             $annot .= '/FS <</Type /Filespec /F (' . $f . ')'; 
  9689.                             $annot .= '/EF <</F ' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R>>'; 
  9690.                             $annot .= '>>'; 
  9691.                         } else { 
  9692.                             $annot .= '/Subtype /Text'; 
  9693.                             $w = 20; 
  9694.                             $h = 20;  // mPDF 6 
  9695.                         } 
  9696.                         $rect = sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F', $a, $b - $h, $a + $w, $b); 
  9697.                         $annot .= ' /Rect [' . $rect . ']'; 
  9698.  
  9699.                         // contents = description of file in free text 
  9700.                         $annot .= ' /Contents ' . $this->_UTF16BEtextstring($pl['txt']); 
  9701.  
  9702.                         $annot .= ' /NM ' . $this->_textstring(sprintf('%04u-%04u', $n, (2000 + $key))); 
  9703.                         $annot .= ' /M ' . $this->_textstring('D:' . date('YmdHis')); 
  9704.                         $annot .= ' /CreationDate ' . $this->_textstring('D:' . date('YmdHis')); 
  9705.                         $annot .= ' /Border [0 0 0]'; 
  9706.                         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  9707.                             $annot .= ' /F 28'; 
  9708.                             $annot .= ' /CA 1'; 
  9709.                         } elseif ($pl['opt']['ca'] > 0) { 
  9710.                             $annot .= ' /CA ' . $pl['opt']['ca']; 
  9711.                         } 
  9712.  
  9713.                         $annotcolor = ' /C ['; 
  9714.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['c']) AND $pl['opt']['c']) { 
  9715.                             $col = $pl['opt']['c']; 
  9716.                             if ($col{0} == 3 || $col{0} == 5) { 
  9717.                                 $annotcolor .= sprintf("%.3F %.3F %.3F", ord($col{1}) / 255, ord($col{2}) / 255, ord($col{3}) / 255); 
  9718.                             } elseif ($col{0} == 1) { 
  9719.                                 $annotcolor .= sprintf("%.3F", ord($col{1}) / 255); 
  9720.                             } elseif ($col{0} == 4 || $col{0} == 6) { 
  9721.                                 $annotcolor .= sprintf("%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F", ord($col{1}) / 100, ord($col{2}) / 100, ord($col{3}) / 100, ord($col{4}) / 100); 
  9722.                             } else { 
  9723.                                 $annotcolor .= '1 1 0'; 
  9724.                             } 
  9725.                         } else { 
  9726.                             $annotcolor .= '1 1 0'; 
  9727.                         } 
  9728.                         $annotcolor .= ']'; 
  9729.                         $annot .= $annotcolor; 
  9730.                         // Usually Author 
  9731.                         // Use as Title for fileattachment 
  9732.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['t']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['t'])) { 
  9733.                             $annot .= ' /T ' . $this->_UTF16BEtextstring($pl['opt']['t']); 
  9734.                         } 
  9735.                         if ($FileAttachment) { 
  9736.                             $iconsapp = array('Paperclip', 'Graph', 'PushPin', 'Tag'); 
  9737.                         } else { 
  9738.                             $iconsapp = array('Comment', 'Help', 'Insert', 'Key', 'NewParagraph', 'Note', 'Paragraph'); 
  9739.                         } 
  9740.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['icon']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['icon'], $iconsapp)) { 
  9741.                             $annot .= ' /Name /' . $pl['opt']['icon']; 
  9742.                         } elseif ($FileAttachment) { 
  9743.                             $annot .= ' /Name /PushPin'; 
  9744.                         } else { 
  9745.                             $annot .= ' /Name /Note'; 
  9746.                         } 
  9747.                         if (!$FileAttachment) { 
  9748.                             // /Subj is PDF 1.5 spec. 
  9749.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['subj']) && !$this->PDFA && !$this->PDFX) { 
  9750.                                 $annot .= ' /Subj ' . $this->_UTF16BEtextstring($pl['opt']['subj']); 
  9751.                             } 
  9752.                             if (!empty($pl['opt']['popup'])) { 
  9753.                                 $annot .= ' /Open true'; 
  9754.                                 $annot .= ' /Popup ' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R'; 
  9755.                             } else { 
  9756.                                 $annot .= ' /Open false'; 
  9757.                             } 
  9758.                         } 
  9759.                         $annot .= ' /P ' . $pl['pageobj'] . ' 0 R'; 
  9760.                         $annot .= '>>'; 
  9761.                         $this->_out($annot); 
  9762.                         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  9763.  
  9764.                         if ($FileAttachment) { 
  9765.                             $file = @file_get_contents($pl['opt']['file']); 
  9766.                             if (!$file) { 
  9767.                                 throw new MpdfException('mPDF Error: Cannot access file attachment - ' . $pl['opt']['file']); 
  9768.                             } 
  9769.                             $filestream = gzcompress($file); 
  9770.                             $this->_newobj(); 
  9771.                             $this->_out('<</Type /EmbeddedFile'); 
  9772.                             $this->_out('/Length ' . strlen($filestream)); 
  9773.                             $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode'); 
  9774.                             $this->_out('>>'); 
  9775.                             $this->_putstream($filestream); 
  9776.                             $this->_out('endobj'); 
  9777.                         } elseif (!empty($pl['opt']['popup'])) { 
  9778.                             $this->_newobj(); 
  9779.                             $annot = ''; 
  9780.                             if (is_array($pl['opt']['popup']) && isset($pl['opt']['popup'][0])) { 
  9781.                                 $x = $pl['opt']['popup'][0] * _MPDFK; 
  9782.                             } else { 
  9783.                                 $x = $pl['x'] * _MPDFK; 
  9784.                             } 
  9785.                             if (is_array($pl['opt']['popup']) && isset($pl['opt']['popup'][1])) { 
  9786.                                 $y = $hPt - ($pl['opt']['popup'][1] * _MPDFK); 
  9787.                             } else { 
  9788.                                 $y = $hPt - ($pl['y'] * _MPDFK); 
  9789.                             } 
  9790.                             if (is_array($pl['opt']['popup']) && isset($pl['opt']['popup'][2])) { 
  9791.                                 $w = $pl['opt']['popup'][2] * _MPDFK; 
  9792.                             } else { 
  9793.                                 $w = 180; 
  9794.                             } 
  9795.                             if (is_array($pl['opt']['popup']) && isset($pl['opt']['popup'][3])) { 
  9796.                                 $h = $pl['opt']['popup'][3] * _MPDFK; 
  9797.                             } else { 
  9798.                                 $h = 120; 
  9799.                             } 
  9800.                             $rect = sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F', $x, $y - $h, $x + $w, $y); 
  9801.                             $annot .= '<</Type /Annot /Subtype /Popup /Rect [' . $rect . ']'; 
  9802.                             $annot .= ' /M ' . $this->_textstring('D:' . date('YmdHis')); 
  9803.                             if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  9804.                                 $annot .= ' /F 28'; 
  9805.                             } 
  9806.                             $annot .= ' /Parent ' . ($this->n - 1) . ' 0 R'; 
  9807.                             $annot .= '>>'; 
  9808.                             $this->_out($annot); 
  9809.                             $this->_out('endobj'); 
  9810.                         } 
  9811.                     } 
  9812.                 } 
  9813.                 /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  9814.  
  9815.                 /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  9816.                 // Active Forms 
  9817.                 if (count($this->mpdfform->forms) > 0) { 
  9818.                     $this->mpdfform->_putFormItems($n, $hPt); 
  9819.                 } 
  9820.                 /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  9821.             } 
  9822.         } 
  9823.         /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  9824.         // Active Forms - Radio Button Group entries 
  9825.         // Output Radio Button Group form entries (radio_on_obj_id already determined) 
  9826.         if (count($this->mpdfform->form_radio_groups)) { 
  9827.             $this->mpdfform->_putRadioItems($n); 
  9828.         } 
  9829.         /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  9830.     } 
  9831.  
  9832.     /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  9833.  
  9834.     function Annotation($text, $x = 0, $y = 0, $icon = 'Note', $author = '', $subject = '', $opacity = 0, $colarray = false, $popup = '', $file = '') 
  9835.     { 
  9836.         if (is_array($colarray) && count($colarray) == 3) { 
  9837.             $colarray = $this->ConvertColor('rgb(' . $colarray[0] . ', ' . $colarray[1] . ', ' . $colarray[2] . ')'); 
  9838.         } 
  9839.         if ($colarray === false) { 
  9840.             $colarray = $this->ConvertColor('yellow'); 
  9841.         } 
  9842.         if ($x == 0) { 
  9843.             $x = $this->x; 
  9844.         } 
  9845.         if ($y == 0) { 
  9846.             $y = $this->y; 
  9847.         } 
  9848.         $page = $this->page; 
  9849.         if ($page < 1) { // Document has not been started - assume it's for first page 
  9850.             $page = 1; 
  9851.             if ($x == 0) { 
  9852.                 $x = $this->lMargin; 
  9853.             } 
  9854.             if ($y == 0) { 
  9855.                 $y = $this->tMargin; 
  9856.             } 
  9857.         } 
  9858.  
  9859.         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  9860.             if (($this->PDFA && !$this->PDFAauto) || ($this->PDFX && !$this->PDFXauto)) { 
  9861.                 $this->PDFAXwarnings[] = "Annotation markers cannot be semi-transparent in PDFA1-b or PDFX/1-a, so they may make underlying text unreadable. (Annotation markers moved to right margin)"; 
  9862.             } 
  9863.             $x = ($this->w) - $this->rMargin * 0.66; 
  9864.         } 
  9865.         if (!$this->annotMargin) { 
  9866.             $y -= $this->FontSize / 2; 
  9867.         } 
  9868.  
  9869.         if (!$opacity && $this->annotMargin) { 
  9870.             $opacity = 1; 
  9871.         } elseif (!$opacity) { 
  9872.             $opacity = $this->annotOpacity; 
  9873.         } 
  9874.  
  9875.         $an = array('txt' => $text, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'opt' => array('Icon' => $icon, 'T' => $author, 'Subj' => $subject, 'C' => $colarray, 'CA' => $opacity, 'popup' => $popup, 'file' => $file)); 
  9876.  
  9877.         if ($this->keep_block_together) { // don't write yet 
  9878.             return; 
  9879.         } elseif ($this->table_rotate) { 
  9880.             $this->tbrot_Annots[$this->page][] = $an; 
  9881.             return; 
  9882.         } elseif ($this->kwt) { 
  9883.             $this->kwt_Annots[$this->page][] = $an; 
  9884.             return; 
  9885.         } 
  9886.         if ($this->writingHTMLheader || $this->writingHTMLfooter) { 
  9887.             $this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots[] = $an; 
  9888.             return; 
  9889.         } 
  9890.         //Put an Annotation on the page 
  9891.         $this->PageAnnots[$page][] = $an; 
  9892.         /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  9893.         // Save cross-reference to Column buffer 
  9894.         $ref = count($this->PageAnnots[$this->page]) - 1; 
  9895.         $this->columnAnnots[$this->CurrCol][INTVAL($this->x)][INTVAL($this->y)] = $ref; 
  9896.         /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  9897.     } 
  9898.  
  9899.     /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  9900.  
  9901.     function _putfonts() 
  9902.     { 
  9903.         $nf = $this->n; 
  9904.         foreach ($this->FontFiles as $fontkey => $info) { 
  9905.             // TrueType embedded 
  9906.             if (isset($info['type']) && $info['type'] == 'TTF' && !$info['sip'] && !$info['smp']) { 
  9907.                 $used = true; 
  9908.                 $asSubset = false; 
  9909.                 foreach ($this->fonts AS $k => $f) { 
  9910.                     if (isset($f['fontkey']) && $f['fontkey'] == $fontkey && $f['type'] == 'TTF') { 
  9911.                         $used = $f['used']; 
  9912.                         if ($used) { 
  9913.                             $nChars = (ord($f['cw'][0]) << 8) + ord($f['cw'][1]); 
  9914.                             $usage = intval(count($f['subset']) * 100 / $nChars); 
  9915.                             $fsize = $info['length1']; 
  9916.                             // Always subset the very large TTF files 
  9917.                             if ($fsize > ($this->maxTTFFilesize * 1024)) { 
  9918.                                 $asSubset = true; 
  9919.                             } elseif ($usage < $this->percentSubset) { 
  9920.                                 $asSubset = true; 
  9921.                             } 
  9922.                         } 
  9923.                         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) 
  9924.                             $asSubset = false; 
  9925.                         $this->fonts[$k]['asSubset'] = $asSubset; 
  9926.                         break; 
  9927.                     } 
  9928.                 } 
  9929.                 if ($used && !$asSubset) { 
  9930.                     //Font file embedding 
  9931.                     $this->_newobj(); 
  9932.                     $this->FontFiles[$fontkey]['n'] = $this->n; 
  9933.                     $font = ''; 
  9934.                     $originalsize = $info['length1']; 
  9935.                     if ($this->repackageTTF || $this->fonts[$fontkey]['TTCfontID'] > 0 || $this->fonts[$fontkey]['useOTL'] > 0) { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  9936.                         // First see if there is a cached compressed file 
  9937.                         if (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.ps.z')) { 
  9938.                             $f = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.ps.z', 'rb'); 
  9939.                             if (!$f) { 
  9940.                                 throw new MpdfException('Font file .ps.z not found'); 
  9941.                             } 
  9942.                             while (!feof($f)) { 
  9943.                                 $font .= fread($f, 2048); 
  9944.                             } 
  9945.                             fclose($f); 
  9946.                             include(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.ps.php'); // sets $originalsize (of repackaged font) 
  9947.                         } else { 
  9948.                             if (!class_exists('TTFontFile', false)) { 
  9949.                                 include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/ttfontsuni.php'); 
  9950.                             } 
  9951.                             $ttf = new TTFontFile(); 
  9952.                             $font = $ttf->repackageTTF($this->FontFiles[$fontkey]['ttffile'], $this->fonts[$fontkey]['TTCfontID'], $this->debugfonts, $this->fonts[$fontkey]['useOTL']); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  9953.  
  9954.                             $originalsize = strlen($font); 
  9955.                             $font = gzcompress($font); 
  9956.                             unset($ttf); 
  9957.                             if (is_writable(dirname(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . 'x'))) { 
  9958.                                 $fh = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.ps.z', "wb"); 
  9959.                                 fwrite($fh, $font, strlen($font)); 
  9960.                                 fclose($fh); 
  9961.                                 $fh = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.ps.php', "wb"); 
  9962.                                 $len = "<?php \n"; 
  9963.                                 $len.='$originalsize=' . $originalsize . ";\n"; 
  9964.                                 $len.="?>"; 
  9965.                                 fwrite($fh, $len, strlen($len)); 
  9966.                                 fclose($fh); 
  9967.                             } 
  9968.                         } 
  9969.                     } else { 
  9970.                         // First see if there is a cached compressed file 
  9971.                         if (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.z')) { 
  9972.                             $f = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.z', 'rb'); 
  9973.                             if (!$f) { 
  9974.                                 throw new MpdfException('Font file not found'); 
  9975.                             } 
  9976.                             while (!feof($f)) { 
  9977.                                 $font .= fread($f, 2048); 
  9978.                             } 
  9979.                             fclose($f); 
  9980.                         } else { 
  9981.                             $f = fopen($this->FontFiles[$fontkey]['ttffile'], 'rb'); 
  9982.                             if (!$f) { 
  9983.                                 throw new MpdfException('Font file not found'); 
  9984.                             } 
  9985.                             while (!feof($f)) { 
  9986.                                 $font .= fread($f, 2048); 
  9987.                             } 
  9988.                             fclose($f); 
  9989.                             $font = gzcompress($font); 
  9990.                             if (is_writable(dirname(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . 'x'))) { 
  9991.                                 $fh = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $fontkey . '.z', "wb"); 
  9992.                                 fwrite($fh, $font, strlen($font)); 
  9993.                                 fclose($fh); 
  9994.                             } 
  9995.                         } 
  9996.                     } 
  9997.  
  9998.                     $this->_out('<</Length ' . strlen($font)); 
  9999.                     $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode'); 
  10000.                     $this->_out('/Length1 ' . $originalsize); 
  10001.                     $this->_out('>>'); 
  10002.                     $this->_putstream($font); 
  10003.                     $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10004.                 } 
  10005.             } 
  10006.         } 
  10007.  
  10008.         $nfonts = count($this->fonts); 
  10009.         $fctr = 1; 
  10010.         foreach ($this->fonts as $k => $font) { 
  10011.             //Font objects 
  10012.             $type = $font['type']; 
  10013.             $name = $font['name']; 
  10014.             if ((!isset($font['used']) || !$font['used']) && $type == 'TTF') { 
  10015.                 continue; 
  10016.             } 
  10017.             if (isset($font['asSubset'])) { 
  10018.                 $asSubset = $font['asSubset']; 
  10019.             } else { 
  10020.                 $asSubset = ''; 
  10021.             } 
  10022.             /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  10023.             if ($type == 'Type0') {  // = Adobe CJK Fonts 
  10024.                 $this->fonts[$k]['n'] = $this->n + 1; 
  10025.                 $this->_newobj(); 
  10026.                 $this->_out('<</Type /Font'); 
  10027.                 $this->_putType0($font); 
  10028.             } else 
  10029.             /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  10030.             if ($type == 'core') { 
  10031.                 //Standard font 
  10032.                 $this->fonts[$k]['n'] = $this->n + 1; 
  10033.                 if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  10034.                     throw new MpdfException('Core fonts are not allowed in PDF/A1-b or PDFX/1-a files (Times, Helvetica, Courier etc.)'); 
  10035.                 } 
  10036.                 $this->_newobj(); 
  10037.                 $this->_out('<</Type /Font'); 
  10038.                 $this->_out('/BaseFont /' . $name); 
  10039.                 $this->_out('/Subtype /Type1'); 
  10040.                 if ($name != 'Symbol' && $name != 'ZapfDingbats') { 
  10041.                     $this->_out('/Encoding /WinAnsiEncoding'); 
  10042.                 } 
  10043.                 $this->_out('>>'); 
  10044.                 $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10045.             } 
  10046.             // TrueType embedded SUBSETS for SIP (CJK extB containing Supplementary Ideographic Plane 2) 
  10047.             // Or Unicode Plane 1 - Supplementary Multilingual Plane 
  10048.             elseif ($type == 'TTF' && ($font['sip'] || $font['smp'])) { 
  10049.                 if (!$font['used']) { 
  10050.                     continue; 
  10051.                 } 
  10052.                 $ssfaid = "AA"; 
  10053.                 if (!class_exists('TTFontFile', false)) { 
  10054.                     include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/ttfontsuni.php'); 
  10055.                 } 
  10056.                 $ttf = new TTFontFile(); 
  10057.                 for ($sfid = 0; $sfid < count($font['subsetfontids']); $sfid++) { 
  10058.                     $this->fonts[$k]['n'][$sfid] = $this->n + 1;  // NB an array for subset 
  10059.                     $subsetname = 'MPDF' . $ssfaid . '+' . $font['name']; 
  10060.                     $ssfaid++; 
  10061.  
  10062.                     /** For some strange reason a subset ($sfid > 0) containing less than 97 characters causes an error 
  10063.                       so fill up the array */ 
  10064.                     for ($j = count($font['subsets'][$sfid]); $j < 98; $j++) { 
  10065.                         $font['subsets'][$sfid][$j] = 0; 
  10066.                     } 
  10067.  
  10068.                     $subset = $font['subsets'][$sfid]; 
  10069.                     unset($subset[0]); 
  10070.                     $ttfontstream = $ttf->makeSubsetSIP($font['ttffile'], $subset, $font['TTCfontID'], $this->debugfonts, $font['useOTL']); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  10071.                     $ttfontsize = strlen($ttfontstream); 
  10072.                     $fontstream = gzcompress($ttfontstream); 
  10073.                     $widthstring = ''; 
  10074.                     $toUnistring = ''; 
  10075.  
  10076.  
  10077.                     foreach ($font['subsets'][$sfid] AS $cp => $u) { 
  10078.                         $w = $this->_getCharWidth($font['cw'], $u); 
  10079.                         if ($w !== false) { 
  10080.                             $widthstring .= $w . ' '; 
  10081.                         } else { 
  10082.                             $widthstring .= round($ttf->defaultWidth) . ' '; 
  10083.                         } 
  10084.                         if ($u > 65535) { 
  10085.                             $utf8 = chr(($u >> 18) + 240) . chr((($u >> 12) & 63) + 128) . chr((($u >> 6) & 63) + 128) . chr(($u & 63) + 128); 
  10086.                             $utf16 = mb_convert_encoding($utf8, 'UTF-16BE', 'UTF-8'); 
  10087.                             $l1 = ord($utf16[0]); 
  10088.                             $h1 = ord($utf16[1]); 
  10089.                             $l2 = ord($utf16[2]); 
  10090.                             $h2 = ord($utf16[3]); 
  10091.                             $toUnistring .= sprintf("<%02s> <%02s%02s%02s%02s>\n", strtoupper(dechex($cp)), strtoupper(dechex($l1)), strtoupper(dechex($h1)), strtoupper(dechex($l2)), strtoupper(dechex($h2))); 
  10092.                         } else { 
  10093.                             $toUnistring .= sprintf("<%02s> <%04s>\n", strtoupper(dechex($cp)), strtoupper(dechex($u))); 
  10094.                         } 
  10095.                     } 
  10096.  
  10097.                     //Additional Type1 or TrueType font 
  10098.                     $this->_newobj(); 
  10099.                     $this->_out('<</Type /Font'); 
  10100.                     $this->_out('/BaseFont /' . $subsetname); 
  10101.                     $this->_out('/Subtype /TrueType'); 
  10102.                     $this->_out('/FirstChar 0 /LastChar ' . (count($font['subsets'][$sfid]) - 1)); 
  10103.                     $this->_out('/Widths ' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R'); 
  10104.                     $this->_out('/FontDescriptor ' . ($this->n + 2) . ' 0 R'); 
  10105.                     $this->_out('/ToUnicode ' . ($this->n + 3) . ' 0 R'); 
  10106.                     $this->_out('>>'); 
  10107.                     $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10108.  
  10109.                     //Widths 
  10110.                     $this->_newobj(); 
  10111.                     $this->_out('[' . $widthstring . ']'); 
  10112.                     $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10113.  
  10114.                     //Descriptor 
  10115.                     $this->_newobj(); 
  10116.                     $s = '<</Type /FontDescriptor /FontName /' . $subsetname . "\n"; 
  10117.                     foreach ($font['desc'] as $kd => $v) { 
  10118.                         if ($kd == 'Flags') { 
  10119.                             $v = $v | 4; 
  10120.                             $v = $v & ~32; 
  10121.                         } // SYMBOLIC font flag 
  10122.                         $s.=' /' . $kd . ' ' . $v . "\n"; 
  10123.                     } 
  10124.                     $s.='/FontFile2 ' . ($this->n + 2) . ' 0 R'; 
  10125.                     $this->_out($s . '>>'); 
  10126.                     $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10127.  
  10128.                     // ToUnicode 
  10129.                     $this->_newobj(); 
  10130.                     $toUni = "/CIDInit /ProcSet findresource begin\n"; 
  10131.                     $toUni .= "12 dict begin\n"; 
  10132.                     $toUni .= "begincmap\n"; 
  10133.                     $toUni .= "/CIDSystemInfo\n"; 
  10134.                     $toUni .= "<</Registry (Adobe)\n"; 
  10135.                     $toUni .= "/Ordering (UCS)\n"; 
  10136.                     $toUni .= "/Supplement 0\n"; 
  10137.                     $toUni .= ">> def\n"; 
  10138.                     $toUni .= "/CMapName /Adobe-Identity-UCS def\n"; 
  10139.                     $toUni .= "/CMapType 2 def\n"; 
  10140.                     $toUni .= "1 begincodespacerange\n"; 
  10141.                     $toUni .= "<00> <FF>\n"; 
  10142.                     //$toUni .= sprintf("<00> <%02s>\n", strtoupper(dechex(count($font['subsets'][$sfid])-1))); 
  10143.                     $toUni .= "endcodespacerange\n"; 
  10144.                     $toUni .= count($font['subsets'][$sfid]) . " beginbfchar\n"; 
  10145.                     $toUni .= $toUnistring; 
  10146.                     $toUni .= "endbfchar\n"; 
  10147.                     $toUni .= "endcmap\n"; 
  10148.                     $toUni .= "CMapName currentdict /CMap defineresource pop\n"; 
  10149.                     $toUni .= "end\n"; 
  10150.                     $toUni .= "end\n"; 
  10151.                     $this->_out('<</Length ' . (strlen($toUni)) . '>>'); 
  10152.                     $this->_putstream($toUni); 
  10153.                     $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10154.  
  10155.                     //Font file 
  10156.                     $this->_newobj(); 
  10157.                     $this->_out('<</Length ' . strlen($fontstream)); 
  10158.                     $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode'); 
  10159.                     $this->_out('/Length1 ' . $ttfontsize); 
  10160.                     $this->_out('>>'); 
  10161.                     $this->_putstream($fontstream); 
  10162.                     $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10163.                 } // foreach subset 
  10164.                 unset($ttf); 
  10165.             } 
  10166.             // TrueType embedded SUBSETS or FULL 
  10167.             elseif ($type == 'TTF') { 
  10168.                 $this->fonts[$k]['n'] = $this->n + 1; 
  10169.                 if ($asSubset) { 
  10170.                     $ssfaid = "A"; 
  10171.                     if (!class_exists('TTFontFile', false)) { 
  10172.                         include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/ttfontsuni.php'); 
  10173.                     } 
  10174.                     $ttf = new TTFontFile(); 
  10175.                     $fontname = 'MPDFA' . $ssfaid . '+' . $font['name']; 
  10176.                     $subset = $font['subset']; 
  10177.                     unset($subset[0]); 
  10178.                     $ttfontstream = $ttf->makeSubset($font['ttffile'], $subset, $font['TTCfontID'], $this->debugfonts, $font['useOTL']); 
  10179.                     $ttfontsize = strlen($ttfontstream); 
  10180.                     $fontstream = gzcompress($ttfontstream); 
  10181.                     $codeToGlyph = $ttf->codeToGlyph; 
  10182.                     unset($codeToGlyph[0]); 
  10183.                 } else { 
  10184.                     $fontname = $font['name']; 
  10185.                 } 
  10186.                 // Type0 Font 
  10187.                 // A composite font - a font composed of other fonts, organized hierarchically 
  10188.                 $this->_newobj(); 
  10189.                 $this->_out('<</Type /Font'); 
  10190.                 $this->_out('/Subtype /Type0'); 
  10191.                 $this->_out('/BaseFont /' . $fontname . ''); 
  10192.                 $this->_out('/Encoding /Identity-H'); 
  10193.                 $this->_out('/DescendantFonts [' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R]'); 
  10194.                 $this->_out('/ToUnicode ' . ($this->n + 2) . ' 0 R'); 
  10195.                 $this->_out('>>'); 
  10196.                 $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10197.  
  10198.                 // CIDFontType2 
  10199.                 // A CIDFont whose glyph descriptions are based on TrueType font technology 
  10200.                 $this->_newobj(); 
  10201.                 $this->_out('<</Type /Font'); 
  10202.                 $this->_out('/Subtype /CIDFontType2'); 
  10203.                 $this->_out('/BaseFont /' . $fontname . ''); 
  10204.                 $this->_out('/CIDSystemInfo ' . ($this->n + 2) . ' 0 R'); 
  10205.                 $this->_out('/FontDescriptor ' . ($this->n + 3) . ' 0 R'); 
  10206.                 if (isset($font['desc']['MissingWidth'])) { 
  10207.                     $this->_out('/DW ' . $font['desc']['MissingWidth'] . ''); 
  10208.                 } 
  10209.  
  10210.                 if (!$asSubset && file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font['fontkey'] . '.cw')) { 
  10211.                     $w = ''; 
  10212.                     $w = file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font['fontkey'] . '.cw'); 
  10213.                     $this->_out($w); 
  10214.                 } else { 
  10215.                     $this->_putTTfontwidths($font, $asSubset, ($asSubset ? $ttf->maxUni : 0)); 
  10216.                 } 
  10217.  
  10218.                 $this->_out('/CIDToGIDMap ' . ($this->n + 4) . ' 0 R'); 
  10219.                 $this->_out('>>'); 
  10220.                 $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10221.  
  10222.                 // ToUnicode 
  10223.                 $this->_newobj(); 
  10224.                 $toUni = "/CIDInit /ProcSet findresource begin\n"; 
  10225.                 $toUni .= "12 dict begin\n"; 
  10226.                 $toUni .= "begincmap\n"; 
  10227.                 $toUni .= "/CIDSystemInfo\n"; 
  10228.                 $toUni .= "<</Registry (Adobe)\n"; 
  10229.                 $toUni .= "/Ordering (UCS)\n"; 
  10230.                 $toUni .= "/Supplement 0\n"; 
  10231.                 $toUni .= ">> def\n"; 
  10232.                 $toUni .= "/CMapName /Adobe-Identity-UCS def\n"; 
  10233.                 $toUni .= "/CMapType 2 def\n"; 
  10234.                 $toUni .= "1 begincodespacerange\n"; 
  10235.                 $toUni .= "<0000> <FFFF>\n"; 
  10236.                 $toUni .= "endcodespacerange\n"; 
  10237.                 $toUni .= "1 beginbfrange\n"; 
  10238.                 $toUni .= "<0000> <FFFF> <0000>\n"; 
  10239.                 $toUni .= "endbfrange\n"; 
  10240.                 $toUni .= "endcmap\n"; 
  10241.                 $toUni .= "CMapName currentdict /CMap defineresource pop\n"; 
  10242.                 $toUni .= "end\n"; 
  10243.                 $toUni .= "end\n"; 
  10244.                 $this->_out('<</Length ' . (strlen($toUni)) . '>>'); 
  10245.                 $this->_putstream($toUni); 
  10246.                 $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10247.  
  10248.  
  10249.                 // CIDSystemInfo dictionary 
  10250.                 $this->_newobj(); 
  10251.                 $this->_out('<</Registry (Adobe)'); 
  10252.                 $this->_out('/Ordering (UCS)'); 
  10253.                 $this->_out('/Supplement 0'); 
  10254.                 $this->_out('>>'); 
  10255.                 $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10256.  
  10257.                 // Font descriptor 
  10258.                 $this->_newobj(); 
  10259.                 $this->_out('<</Type /FontDescriptor'); 
  10260.                 $this->_out('/FontName /' . $fontname); 
  10261.                 foreach ($font['desc'] as $kd => $v) { 
  10262.                     if ($asSubset && $kd == 'Flags') { 
  10263.                         $v = $v | 4; 
  10264.                         $v = $v & ~32; 
  10265.                     } // SYMBOLIC font flag 
  10266.                     $this->_out(' /' . $kd . ' ' . $v); 
  10267.                 } 
  10268.                 if ($font['panose']) { 
  10269.                     $this->_out(' /Style << /Panose <' . $font['panose'] . '> >>'); 
  10270.                 } 
  10271.                 if ($asSubset) { 
  10272.                     $this->_out('/FontFile2 ' . ($this->n + 2) . ' 0 R'); 
  10273.                 } elseif ($font['fontkey']) { 
  10274.                     // obj ID of a stream containing a TrueType font program 
  10275.                     $this->_out('/FontFile2 ' . $this->FontFiles[$font['fontkey']]['n'] . ' 0 R'); 
  10276.                 } 
  10277.                 $this->_out('>>'); 
  10278.                 $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10279.  
  10280.                 // Embed CIDToGIDMap 
  10281.                 // A specification of the mapping from CIDs to glyph indices 
  10282.                 if ($asSubset) { 
  10283.                     $cidtogidmap = ''; 
  10284.                     $cidtogidmap = str_pad('', 256 * 256 * 2, "\x00"); 
  10285.                     foreach ($codeToGlyph as $cc => $glyph) { 
  10286.                         $cidtogidmap[$cc * 2] = chr($glyph >> 8); 
  10287.                         $cidtogidmap[$cc * 2 + 1] = chr($glyph & 0xFF); 
  10288.                     } 
  10289.                     $cidtogidmap = gzcompress($cidtogidmap); 
  10290.                 } else { 
  10291.                     // First see if there is a cached CIDToGIDMapfile 
  10292.                     $cidtogidmap = ''; 
  10293.                     if (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font['fontkey'] . '.cgm')) { 
  10294.                         $f = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font['fontkey'] . '.cgm', 'rb'); 
  10295.                         while (!feof($f)) { 
  10296.                             $cidtogidmap .= fread($f, 2048); 
  10297.                         } 
  10298.                         fclose($f); 
  10299.                     } else { 
  10300.                         if (!class_exists('TTFontFile', false)) { 
  10301.                             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/ttfontsuni.php'); 
  10302.                         } 
  10303.                         $ttf = new TTFontFile(); 
  10304.                         $charToGlyph = $ttf->getCTG($font['ttffile'], $font['TTCfontID'], $this->debugfonts, $font['useOTL']); 
  10305.                         $cidtogidmap = str_pad('', 256 * 256 * 2, "\x00"); 
  10306.                         foreach ($charToGlyph as $cc => $glyph) { 
  10307.                             $cidtogidmap[$cc * 2] = chr($glyph >> 8); 
  10308.                             $cidtogidmap[$cc * 2 + 1] = chr($glyph & 0xFF); 
  10309.                         } 
  10310.                         unset($ttf); 
  10311.                         $cidtogidmap = gzcompress($cidtogidmap); 
  10312.                         if (is_writable(dirname(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . 'x'))) { 
  10313.                             $fh = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font['fontkey'] . '.cgm', "wb"); 
  10314.                             fwrite($fh, $cidtogidmap, strlen($cidtogidmap)); 
  10315.                             fclose($fh); 
  10316.                         } 
  10317.                     } 
  10318.                 } 
  10319.                 $this->_newobj(); 
  10320.                 $this->_out('<</Length ' . strlen($cidtogidmap) . ''); 
  10321.                 $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode'); 
  10322.                 $this->_out('>>'); 
  10323.                 $this->_putstream($cidtogidmap); 
  10324.                 $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10325.  
  10326.                 //Font file 
  10327.                 if ($asSubset) { 
  10328.                     $this->_newobj(); 
  10329.                     $this->_out('<</Length ' . strlen($fontstream)); 
  10330.                     $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode'); 
  10331.                     $this->_out('/Length1 ' . $ttfontsize); 
  10332.                     $this->_out('>>'); 
  10333.                     $this->_putstream($fontstream); 
  10334.                     $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10335.                     unset($ttf); 
  10336.                 } 
  10337.             } else { 
  10338.                 throw new MpdfException('Unsupported font type: ' . $type . ' (' . $name . ')'); 
  10339.             } 
  10340.         } 
  10341.     } 
  10342.  
  10343.     function _putTTfontwidths(&$font, $asSubset, $maxUni) 
  10344.     { 
  10345.         if ($asSubset && file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font['fontkey'] . '.cw127.php')) { 
  10346.             include(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font['fontkey'] . '.cw127.php'); 
  10347.             $startcid = 128; 
  10348.         } else { 
  10349.             $rangeid = 0; 
  10350.             $range = array(); 
  10351.             $prevcid = -2; 
  10352.             $prevwidth = -1; 
  10353.             $interval = false; 
  10354.             $startcid = 1; 
  10355.         } 
  10356.         if ($asSubset) { 
  10357.             $cwlen = $maxUni + 1; 
  10358.         } else { 
  10359.             $cwlen = (strlen($font['cw']) / 2); 
  10360.         } 
  10361.  
  10362.         // for each character 
  10363.         for ($cid = $startcid; $cid < $cwlen; $cid++) { 
  10364.             if ($cid == 128 && $asSubset && (!file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font['fontkey'] . '.cw127.php'))) { 
  10365.                 if (is_writable(dirname(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . 'x'))) { 
  10366.                     $fh = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font['fontkey'] . '.cw127.php', "wb"); 
  10367.                     $cw127 = '<?php' . "\n"; 
  10368.                     $cw127.='$rangeid=' . $rangeid . ";\n"; 
  10369.                     $cw127.='$prevcid=' . $prevcid . ";\n"; 
  10370.                     $cw127.='$prevwidth=' . $prevwidth . ";\n"; 
  10371.                     if ($interval) { 
  10372.                         $cw127.='$interval=true' . ";\n"; 
  10373.                     } else { 
  10374.                         $cw127.='$interval=false' . ";\n"; 
  10375.                     } 
  10376.                     $cw127.='$range=' . var_export($range, true) . ";\n"; 
  10377.                     $cw127.="?>"; 
  10378.                     fwrite($fh, $cw127, strlen($cw127)); 
  10379.                     fclose($fh); 
  10380.                 } 
  10381.             } 
  10382.             if ($font['cw'][$cid * 2] == "\00" && $font['cw'][$cid * 2 + 1] == "\00") { 
  10383.                 continue; 
  10384.             } 
  10385.             $width = (ord($font['cw'][$cid * 2]) << 8) + ord($font['cw'][$cid * 2 + 1]); 
  10386.             if ($width == 65535) { 
  10387.                 $width = 0; 
  10388.             } 
  10389.             if ($asSubset && $cid > 255 && (!isset($font['subset'][$cid]) || !$font['subset'][$cid])) { 
  10390.                 continue; 
  10391.             } 
  10392.             if ($asSubset && $cid > 0xFFFF) { 
  10393.                 continue; 
  10394.             } // mPDF 6 
  10395.             if (!isset($font['dw']) || (isset($font['dw']) && $width != $font['dw'])) { 
  10396.                 if ($cid == ($prevcid + 1)) { 
  10397.                     // consecutive CID 
  10398.                     if ($width == $prevwidth) { 
  10399.                         if ($width == $range[$rangeid][0]) { 
  10400.                             $range[$rangeid][] = $width; 
  10401.                         } else { 
  10402.                             array_pop($range[$rangeid]); 
  10403.                             // new range 
  10404.                             $rangeid = $prevcid; 
  10405.                             $range[$rangeid] = array(); 
  10406.                             $range[$rangeid][] = $prevwidth; 
  10407.                             $range[$rangeid][] = $width; 
  10408.                         } 
  10409.                         $interval = true; 
  10410.                         $range[$rangeid]['interval'] = true; 
  10411.                     } else { 
  10412.                         if ($interval) { 
  10413.                             // new range 
  10414.                             $rangeid = $cid; 
  10415.                             $range[$rangeid] = array(); 
  10416.                             $range[$rangeid][] = $width; 
  10417.                         } else { 
  10418.                             $range[$rangeid][] = $width; 
  10419.                         } 
  10420.                         $interval = false; 
  10421.                     } 
  10422.                 } else { 
  10423.                     // new range 
  10424.                     $rangeid = $cid; 
  10425.                     $range[$rangeid] = array(); 
  10426.                     $range[$rangeid][] = $width; 
  10427.                     $interval = false; 
  10428.                 } 
  10429.                 $prevcid = $cid; 
  10430.                 $prevwidth = $width; 
  10431.             } 
  10432.         } 
  10433.         $w = $this->_putfontranges($range); 
  10434.         $this->_out($w); 
  10435.         if (!$asSubset) { 
  10436.             if (is_writable(dirname(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . 'x'))) { 
  10437.                 $fh = fopen(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font['fontkey'] . '.cw', "wb"); 
  10438.                 fwrite($fh, $w, strlen($w)); 
  10439.                 fclose($fh); 
  10440.             } 
  10441.         } 
  10442.     } 
  10443.  
  10444.     function _putfontranges(&$range) 
  10445.     { 
  10446.         // optimize ranges 
  10447.         $prevk = -1; 
  10448.         $nextk = -1; 
  10449.         $prevint = false; 
  10450.         foreach ($range as $k => $ws) { 
  10451.             $cws = count($ws); 
  10452.             if (($k == $nextk) AND ( !$prevint) AND ( (!isset($ws['interval'])) OR ( $cws < 4))) { 
  10453.                 if (isset($range[$k]['interval'])) { 
  10454.                     unset($range[$k]['interval']); 
  10455.                 } 
  10456.                 $range[$prevk] = array_merge($range[$prevk], $range[$k]); 
  10457.                 unset($range[$k]); 
  10458.             } else { 
  10459.                 $prevk = $k; 
  10460.             } 
  10461.             $nextk = $k + $cws; 
  10462.             if (isset($ws['interval'])) { 
  10463.                 if ($cws > 3) { 
  10464.                     $prevint = true; 
  10465.                 } else { 
  10466.                     $prevint = false; 
  10467.                 } 
  10468.                 unset($range[$k]['interval']); 
  10469.                 --$nextk; 
  10470.             } else { 
  10471.                 $prevint = false; 
  10472.             } 
  10473.         } 
  10474.         // output data 
  10475.         $w = ''; 
  10476.         foreach ($range as $k => $ws) { 
  10477.             if (count(array_count_values($ws)) == 1) { 
  10478.                 // interval mode is more compact 
  10479.                 $w .= ' ' . $k . ' ' . ($k + count($ws) - 1) . ' ' . $ws[0]; 
  10480.             } else { 
  10481.                 // range mode 
  10482.                 $w .= ' ' . $k . ' [ ' . implode(' ', $ws) . ' ]' . "\n"; 
  10483.             } 
  10484.         } 
  10485.         return '/W [' . $w . ' ]'; 
  10486.     } 
  10487.  
  10488.     function _putfontwidths(&$font, $cidoffset = 0) 
  10489.     { 
  10490.         ksort($font['cw']); 
  10491.         unset($font['cw'][65535]); 
  10492.         $rangeid = 0; 
  10493.         $range = array(); 
  10494.         $prevcid = -2; 
  10495.         $prevwidth = -1; 
  10496.         $interval = false; 
  10497.         // for each character 
  10498.         foreach ($font['cw'] as $cid => $width) { 
  10499.             $cid -= $cidoffset; 
  10500.             if (!isset($font['dw']) || (isset($font['dw']) && $width != $font['dw'])) { 
  10501.                 if ($cid == ($prevcid + 1)) { 
  10502.                     // consecutive CID 
  10503.                     if ($width == $prevwidth) { 
  10504.                         if ($width == $range[$rangeid][0]) { 
  10505.                             $range[$rangeid][] = $width; 
  10506.                         } else { 
  10507.                             array_pop($range[$rangeid]); 
  10508.                             // new range 
  10509.                             $rangeid = $prevcid; 
  10510.                             $range[$rangeid] = array(); 
  10511.                             $range[$rangeid][] = $prevwidth; 
  10512.                             $range[$rangeid][] = $width; 
  10513.                         } 
  10514.                         $interval = true; 
  10515.                         $range[$rangeid]['interval'] = true; 
  10516.                     } else { 
  10517.                         if ($interval) { 
  10518.                             // new range 
  10519.                             $rangeid = $cid; 
  10520.                             $range[$rangeid] = array(); 
  10521.                             $range[$rangeid][] = $width; 
  10522.                         } else { 
  10523.                             $range[$rangeid][] = $width; 
  10524.                         } 
  10525.                         $interval = false; 
  10526.                     } 
  10527.                 } else { 
  10528.                     // new range 
  10529.                     $rangeid = $cid; 
  10530.                     $range[$rangeid] = array(); 
  10531.                     $range[$rangeid][] = $width; 
  10532.                     $interval = false; 
  10533.                 } 
  10534.                 $prevcid = $cid; 
  10535.                 $prevwidth = $width; 
  10536.             } 
  10537.         } 
  10538.         $this->_out($this->_putfontranges($range)); 
  10539.     } 
  10540.  
  10541.     /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  10542.  
  10543.     // from class PDF_Chinese CJK EXTENSIONS 
  10544.     function _putType0(&$font) 
  10545.     { 
  10546.         //Type0 
  10547.         $this->_out('/Subtype /Type0'); 
  10548.         $this->_out('/BaseFont /' . $font['name'] . '-' . $font['CMap']); 
  10549.         $this->_out('/Encoding /' . $font['CMap']); 
  10550.         $this->_out('/DescendantFonts [' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R]'); 
  10551.         $this->_out('>>'); 
  10552.         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10553.         //CIDFont 
  10554.         $this->_newobj(); 
  10555.         $this->_out('<</Type /Font'); 
  10556.         $this->_out('/Subtype /CIDFontType0'); 
  10557.         $this->_out('/BaseFont /' . $font['name']); 
  10558.  
  10559.         $cidinfo = '/Registry ' . $this->_textstring('Adobe'); 
  10560.         $cidinfo .= ' /Ordering ' . $this->_textstring($font['registry']['ordering']); 
  10561.         $cidinfo .= ' /Supplement ' . $font['registry']['supplement']; 
  10562.         $this->_out('/CIDSystemInfo <<' . $cidinfo . '>>'); 
  10563.  
  10564.         $this->_out('/FontDescriptor ' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R'); 
  10565.         if (isset($font['MissingWidth'])) { 
  10566.             $this->_out('/DW ' . $font['MissingWidth'] . ''); 
  10567.         } 
  10568.         $this->_putfontwidths($font, 31); 
  10569.         $this->_out('>>'); 
  10570.         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10571.  
  10572.         //Font descriptor 
  10573.         $this->_newobj(); 
  10574.         $s = '<</Type /FontDescriptor /FontName /' . $font['name']; 
  10575.         foreach ($font['desc'] as $k => $v) { 
  10576.             if ($k != 'Style') { 
  10577.                 $s .= ' /' . $k . ' ' . $v . ''; 
  10578.             } 
  10579.         } 
  10580.         $this->_out($s . '>>'); 
  10581.         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10582.     } 
  10583.  
  10584.     /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  10585.  
  10586.     function _putimages() 
  10587.     { 
  10588.         $filter = ($this->compress) ? '/Filter /FlateDecode ' : ''; 
  10589.         reset($this->images); 
  10590.         while (list($file, $info) = each($this->images)) { 
  10591.             $this->_newobj(); 
  10592.             $this->images[$file]['n'] = $this->n; 
  10593.             $this->_out('<</Type /XObject'); 
  10594.             $this->_out('/Subtype /Image'); 
  10595.             $this->_out('/Width ' . $info['w']); 
  10596.             $this->_out('/Height ' . $info['h']); 
  10597.             if (isset($info['interpolation']) && $info['interpolation']) { 
  10598.                 $this->_out('/Interpolate true'); // mPDF 6 - image interpolation shall be performed by a conforming reader 
  10599.             } 
  10600.             if (isset($info['masked'])) { 
  10601.                 $this->_out('/SMask ' . ($this->n - 1) . ' 0 R'); 
  10602.             } 
  10603.             // set color space 
  10604.             $icc = false; 
  10605.             if (isset($info['icc']) AND ( $info['icc'] !== false)) { 
  10606.                 // ICC Colour Space 
  10607.                 $icc = true; 
  10608.                 $this->_out('/ColorSpace [/ICCBased ' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R]'); 
  10609.             } elseif ($info['cs'] == 'Indexed') { 
  10610.                 if ($this->PDFX || ($this->PDFA && $this->restrictColorSpace == 3)) { 
  10611.                     throw new MpdfException("PDFA1-b and PDFX/1-a files do not permit using mixed colour space (" . $file . ")."); 
  10612.                 } 
  10613.                 $this->_out('/ColorSpace [/Indexed /DeviceRGB ' . (strlen($info['pal']) / 3 - 1) . ' ' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R]'); 
  10614.             } else { 
  10615.                 $this->_out('/ColorSpace /' . $info['cs']); 
  10616.                 if ($info['cs'] == 'DeviceCMYK') { 
  10617.                     if ($this->PDFA && $this->restrictColorSpace != 3) { 
  10618.                         throw new MpdfException("PDFA1-b does not permit Images using mixed colour space (" . $file . ")."); 
  10619.                     } 
  10620.                     if ($info['type'] == 'jpg') { 
  10621.                         $this->_out('/Decode [1 0 1 0 1 0 1 0]'); 
  10622.                     } 
  10623.                 } elseif ($info['cs'] == 'DeviceRGB' && ($this->PDFX || ($this->PDFA && $this->restrictColorSpace == 3))) { 
  10624.                     throw new MpdfException("PDFA1-b and PDFX/1-a files do not permit using mixed colour space (" . $file . ")."); 
  10625.                 } 
  10626.             } 
  10627.             $this->_out('/BitsPerComponent ' . $info['bpc']); 
  10628.             if (isset($info['f']) && $info['f']) { 
  10629.                 $this->_out('/Filter /' . $info['f']); 
  10630.             } 
  10631.             if (isset($info['parms'])) { 
  10632.                 $this->_out($info['parms']); 
  10633.             } 
  10634.             if (isset($info['trns']) and is_array($info['trns'])) { 
  10635.                 $trns = ''; 
  10636.                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($info['trns']); $i++) 
  10637.                     $trns.=$info['trns'][$i] . ' ' . $info['trns'][$i] . ' '; 
  10638.                 $this->_out('/Mask [' . $trns . ']'); 
  10639.             } 
  10640.             $this->_out('/Length ' . strlen($info['data']) . '>>'); 
  10641.             $this->_putstream($info['data']); 
  10642.             unset($this->images[$file]['data']); 
  10643.             $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10644.  
  10645.             // ICC colour profile 
  10646.             if ($icc) { 
  10647.                 $this->_newobj(); 
  10648.                 $icc = ($this->compress) ? gzcompress($info['icc']) : $info['icc']; 
  10649.                 $this->_out('<</N ' . $info['ch'] . ' ' . $filter . '/Length ' . strlen($icc) . '>>');
