  10650.                 $this->_putstream($icc); 
  10651.                 $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10652.             } 
  10653.             //Palette 
  10654.             elseif ($info['cs'] == 'Indexed') { 
  10655.                 $this->_newobj(); 
  10656.                 $pal = ($this->compress) ? gzcompress($info['pal']) : $info['pal']; 
  10657.                 $this->_out('<<' . $filter . '/Length ' . strlen($pal) . '>>'); 
  10658.                 $this->_putstream($pal); 
  10659.                 $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10660.             } 
  10661.         } 
  10662.     } 
  10663.  
  10664.     function _putinfo() 
  10665.     { 
  10666.         $this->_out('/Producer ' . $this->_UTF16BEtextstring('mPDF ' . mPDF_VERSION)); 
  10667.         if (!empty($this->title)) 
  10668.             $this->_out('/Title ' . $this->_UTF16BEtextstring($this->title)); 
  10669.         if (!empty($this->subject)) 
  10670.             $this->_out('/Subject ' . $this->_UTF16BEtextstring($this->subject)); 
  10671.         if (!empty($this->author)) 
  10672.             $this->_out('/Author ' . $this->_UTF16BEtextstring($this->author)); 
  10673.         if (!empty($this->keywords)) 
  10674.             $this->_out('/Keywords ' . $this->_UTF16BEtextstring($this->keywords)); 
  10675.         if (!empty($this->creator)) 
  10676.             $this->_out('/Creator ' . $this->_UTF16BEtextstring($this->creator)); 
  10677.  
  10678.         $z = date('O'); // +0200 
  10679.         $offset = substr($z, 0, 3) . "'" . substr($z, 3, 2) . "'"; 
  10680.         $this->_out('/CreationDate ' . $this->_textstring(date('YmdHis') . $offset)); 
  10681.         $this->_out('/ModDate ' . $this->_textstring(date('YmdHis') . $offset)); 
  10682.         if ($this->PDFX) { 
  10683.             $this->_out('/Trapped/False'); 
  10684.             $this->_out('/GTS_PDFXVersion(PDF/X-1a:2003)'); 
  10685.         } 
  10686.     } 
  10687.  
  10688.     function _putmetadata() 
  10689.     { 
  10690.         $this->_newobj(); 
  10691.         $this->MetadataRoot = $this->n; 
  10692.         $Producer = 'mPDF ' . mPDF_VERSION; 
  10693.         $z = date('O'); // +0200 
  10694.         $offset = substr($z, 0, 3) . ':' . substr($z, 3, 2); 
  10695.         $CreationDate = date('Y-m-d\TH:i:s') . $offset; // 2006-03-10T10:47:26-05:00 2006-06-19T09:05:17Z 
  10696.         $uuid = sprintf('%04x%04x-%04x-%04x-%04x-%04x%04x%04x', mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0x0fff) | 0x4000, mt_rand(0, 0x3fff) | 0x8000, mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff)); 
  10697.  
  10698.  
  10699.         $m = '<?xpacket begin="' . chr(239) . chr(187) . chr(191) . '" id="W5M0MpCehiHzreSzNTczkc9d"?>' . "\n"; // begin = FEFF BOM 
  10700.         $m .= ' <x:xmpmeta xmlns:x="adobe:ns:meta/" x:xmptk="3.1-701">' . "\n"; 
  10701.         $m .= '  <rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#">' . "\n"; 
  10702.         $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="uuid:' . $uuid . '" xmlns:pdf="http://ns.adobe.com/pdf/1.3/">' . "\n"; 
  10703.         $m .= '    <pdf:Producer>' . $Producer . '</pdf:Producer>' . "\n"; 
  10704.         if (!empty($this->keywords)) { 
  10705.             $m .= '    <pdf:Keywords>' . $this->keywords . '</pdf:Keywords>' . "\n"; 
  10706.         } 
  10707.         $m .= '   </rdf:Description>' . "\n"; 
  10708.  
  10709.         $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="uuid:' . $uuid . '" xmlns:xmp="http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/">' . "\n"; 
  10710.         $m .= '    <xmp:CreateDate>' . $CreationDate . '</xmp:CreateDate>' . "\n"; 
  10711.         $m .= '    <xmp:ModifyDate>' . $CreationDate . '</xmp:ModifyDate>' . "\n"; 
  10712.         $m .= '    <xmp:MetadataDate>' . $CreationDate . '</xmp:MetadataDate>' . "\n"; 
  10713.         if (!empty($this->creator)) { 
  10714.             $m .= '    <xmp:CreatorTool>' . $this->creator . '</xmp:CreatorTool>' . "\n"; 
  10715.         } 
  10716.         $m .= '   </rdf:Description>' . "\n"; 
  10717.  
  10718.         // DC elements 
  10719.         $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="uuid:' . $uuid . '" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">' . "\n"; 
  10720.         $m .= '    <dc:format>application/pdf</dc:format>' . "\n"; 
  10721.         if (!empty($this->title)) { 
  10722.             $m .= '    <dc:title> 
  10723.      <rdf:Alt> 
  10724.       <rdf:li xml:lang="x-default">' . $this->title . '</rdf:li> 
  10725.      </rdf:Alt> 
  10726.     </dc:title>' . "\n"; 
  10727.         } 
  10728.         if (!empty($this->keywords)) { 
  10729.             $m .= '    <dc:subject> 
  10730.      <rdf:Bag> 
  10731.       <rdf:li>' . $this->keywords . '</rdf:li> 
  10732.      </rdf:Bag> 
  10733.     </dc:subject>' . "\n"; 
  10734.         } 
  10735.         if (!empty($this->subject)) { 
  10736.             $m .= '    <dc:description> 
  10737.      <rdf:Alt> 
  10738.       <rdf:li xml:lang="x-default">' . $this->subject . '</rdf:li> 
  10739.      </rdf:Alt> 
  10740.     </dc:description>' . "\n"; 
  10741.         } 
  10742.         if (!empty($this->author)) { 
  10743.             $m .= '    <dc:creator> 
  10744.      <rdf:Seq> 
  10745.       <rdf:li>' . $this->author . '</rdf:li> 
  10746.      </rdf:Seq> 
  10747.     </dc:creator>' . "\n"; 
  10748.         } 
  10749.         $m .= '   </rdf:Description>' . "\n"; 
  10750.  
  10751.  
  10752.         // This bit is specific to PDFX-1a 
  10753.         if ($this->PDFX) { 
  10754.             $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="uuid:' . $uuid . '" xmlns:pdfx="http://ns.adobe.com/pdfx/1.3/" pdfx:Apag_PDFX_Checkup="1.3" pdfx:GTS_PDFXConformance="PDF/X-1a:2003" pdfx:GTS_PDFXVersion="PDF/X-1:2003"/>' . "\n"; 
  10755.         } 
  10756.  
  10757.         // This bit is specific to PDFA-1b 
  10758.         elseif ($this->PDFA) { 
  10759.             $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="uuid:' . $uuid . '" xmlns:pdfaid="http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/id/" >' . "\n"; 
  10760.             $m .= '    <pdfaid:part>1</pdfaid:part>' . "\n"; 
  10761.             $m .= '    <pdfaid:conformance>B</pdfaid:conformance>' . "\n"; 
  10762.             $m .= '    <pdfaid:amd>2005</pdfaid:amd>' . "\n"; 
  10763.             $m .= '   </rdf:Description>' . "\n"; 
  10764.         } 
  10765.  
  10766.         $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="uuid:' . $uuid . '" xmlns:xmpMM="http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/mm/">' . "\n"; 
  10767.         $m .= '    <xmpMM:DocumentID>uuid:' . $uuid . '</xmpMM:DocumentID>' . "\n"; 
  10768.         $m .= '   </rdf:Description>' . "\n"; 
  10769.         $m .= '  </rdf:RDF>' . "\n"; 
  10770.         $m .= ' </x:xmpmeta>' . "\n"; 
  10771.         $m .= str_repeat(str_repeat(' ', 100) . "\n", 20); // 2-4kB whitespace padding required 
  10772.         $m .= '<?xpacket end="w"?>'; // "r" read only 
  10773.         $this->_out('<</Type/Metadata/Subtype/XML/Length ' . strlen($m) . '>>'); 
  10774.         $this->_putstream($m); 
  10775.         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10776.     } 
  10777.  
  10778.     function _putoutputintent() 
  10779.     { 
  10780.         $this->_newobj(); 
  10781.         $this->OutputIntentRoot = $this->n; 
  10782.         $this->_out('<</Type /OutputIntent'); 
  10783.  
  10784.         if ($this->PDFA) { 
  10785.             $this->_out('/S /GTS_PDFA1'); 
  10786.             if ($this->ICCProfile) { 
  10787.                 $this->_out('/Info (' . preg_replace('/_/', ' ', $this->ICCProfile) . ')'); 
  10788.                 $this->_out('/OutputConditionIdentifier (Custom)'); 
  10789.                 $this->_out('/OutputCondition ()'); 
  10790.             } else { 
  10791.                 $this->_out('/Info (sRGB IEC61966-2.1)'); 
  10792.                 $this->_out('/OutputConditionIdentifier (sRGB IEC61966-2.1)'); 
  10793.                 $this->_out('/OutputCondition ()'); 
  10794.             } 
  10795.             $this->_out('/DestOutputProfile ' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R'); 
  10796.         } elseif ($this->PDFX) { // always a CMYK profile 
  10797.             $this->_out('/S /GTS_PDFX'); 
  10798.             if ($this->ICCProfile) { 
  10799.                 $this->_out('/Info (' . preg_replace('/_/', ' ', $this->ICCProfile) . ')'); 
  10800.                 $this->_out('/OutputConditionIdentifier (Custom)'); 
  10801.                 $this->_out('/OutputCondition ()'); 
  10802.                 $this->_out('/DestOutputProfile ' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R'); 
  10803.             } else { 
  10804.                 $this->_out('/Info (CGATS TR 001)'); 
  10805.                 $this->_out('/OutputConditionIdentifier (CGATS TR 001)'); 
  10806.                 $this->_out('/OutputCondition (CGATS TR 001 (SWOP))'); 
  10807.                 $this->_out('/RegistryName (http://www.color.org)'); 
  10808.             } 
  10809.         } 
  10810.         $this->_out('>>'); 
  10811.         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10812.  
  10813.         if ($this->PDFX && !$this->ICCProfile) { 
  10814.             return; 
  10815.         } // no ICCProfile embedded 
  10816.  
  10817.         $this->_newobj(); 
  10818.         if ($this->ICCProfile) 
  10819.             $s = file_get_contents(_MPDF_PATH . 'iccprofiles/' . $this->ICCProfile . '.icc'); 
  10820.         else 
  10821.             $s = file_get_contents(_MPDF_PATH . 'iccprofiles/sRGB_IEC61966-2-1.icc'); 
  10822.         if ($this->compress) { 
  10823.             $s = gzcompress($s); 
  10824.         } 
  10825.         $this->_out('<<'); 
  10826.         if ($this->PDFX || ($this->PDFA && $this->restrictColorSpace == 3)) { 
  10827.             $this->_out('/N 4'); 
  10828.         } else { 
  10829.             $this->_out('/N 3'); 
  10830.         } 
  10831.         if ($this->compress) 
  10832.             $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode '); 
  10833.         $this->_out('/Length ' . strlen($s) . '>>'); 
  10834.         $this->_putstream($s); 
  10835.         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  10836.     } 
  10837.  
  10838.     function _putcatalog() 
  10839.     { 
  10840.         $this->_out('/Type /Catalog'); 
  10841.         $this->_out('/Pages 1 0 R'); 
  10842.         if ($this->ZoomMode == 'fullpage') 
  10843.             $this->_out('/OpenAction [3 0 R /Fit]'); 
  10844.         elseif ($this->ZoomMode == 'fullwidth') 
  10845.             $this->_out('/OpenAction [3 0 R /FitH null]'); 
  10846.         elseif ($this->ZoomMode == 'real') 
  10847.             $this->_out('/OpenAction [3 0 R /XYZ null null 1]'); 
  10848.         elseif (!is_string($this->ZoomMode)) 
  10849.             $this->_out('/OpenAction [3 0 R /XYZ null null ' . ($this->ZoomMode / 100) . ']'); 
  10850.         else 
  10851.             $this->_out('/OpenAction [3 0 R /XYZ null null null]'); 
  10852.         if ($this->LayoutMode == 'single') 
  10853.             $this->_out('/PageLayout /SinglePage'); 
  10854.         elseif ($this->LayoutMode == 'continuous') 
  10855.             $this->_out('/PageLayout /OneColumn'); 
  10856.         elseif ($this->LayoutMode == 'twoleft') 
  10857.             $this->_out('/PageLayout /TwoColumnLeft'); 
  10858.         elseif ($this->LayoutMode == 'tworight') 
  10859.             $this->_out('/PageLayout /TwoColumnRight'); 
  10860.         elseif ($this->LayoutMode == 'two') { 
  10861.             if ($this->mirrorMargins) { 
  10862.                 $this->_out('/PageLayout /TwoColumnRight'); 
  10863.             } else { 
  10864.                 $this->_out('/PageLayout /TwoColumnLeft'); 
  10865.             } 
  10866.         } 
  10867.  
  10868.         /** -- BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  10869.         if (count($this->BMoutlines) > 0) { 
  10870.             $this->_out('/Outlines ' . $this->OutlineRoot . ' 0 R'); 
  10871.             $this->_out('/PageMode /UseOutlines'); 
  10872.         } 
  10873.         /** -- END BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  10874.         if (is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences, 'FullScreen'))) 
  10875.             $this->_out('/PageMode /FullScreen'); 
  10876.  
  10877.         // Metadata 
  10878.         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  10879.             $this->_out('/Metadata ' . $this->MetadataRoot . ' 0 R'); 
  10880.         } 
  10881.         // OutputIntents 
  10882.         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX || $this->ICCProfile) { 
  10883.             $this->_out('/OutputIntents [' . $this->OutputIntentRoot . ' 0 R]'); 
  10884.         } 
  10885.  
  10886.         /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  10887.         if (count($this->mpdfform->forms) > 0) { 
  10888.             $this->mpdfform->_putFormsCatalog(); 
  10889.         } 
  10890.         /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  10891.         if (isset($this->js)) { 
  10892.             $this->_out('/Names << /JavaScript ' . ($this->n_js) . ' 0 R >> '); 
  10893.         } 
  10894.  
  10895.         if ($this->DisplayPreferences || $this->directionality == 'rtl' || $this->mirrorMargins) { 
  10896.             $this->_out('/ViewerPreferences<<'); 
  10897.             if (is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences, 'HideMenubar'))) 
  10898.                 $this->_out('/HideMenubar true'); 
  10899.             if (is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences, 'HideToolbar'))) 
  10900.                 $this->_out('/HideToolbar true'); 
  10901.             if (is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences, 'HideWindowUI'))) 
  10902.                 $this->_out('/HideWindowUI true'); 
  10903.             if (is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences, 'DisplayDocTitle'))) 
  10904.                 $this->_out('/DisplayDocTitle true'); 
  10905.             if (is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences, 'CenterWindow'))) 
  10906.                 $this->_out('/CenterWindow true'); 
  10907.             if (is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences, 'FitWindow'))) 
  10908.                 $this->_out('/FitWindow true'); 
  10909.             // /PrintScaling is PDF 1.6 spec. 
  10910.             if (is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences, 'NoPrintScaling')) && !$this->PDFA && !$this->PDFX) 
  10911.                 $this->_out('/PrintScaling /None'); 
  10912.             if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') 
  10913.                 $this->_out('/Direction /R2L'); 
  10914.             // /Duplex is PDF 1.7 spec. 
  10915.             if ($this->mirrorMargins && !$this->PDFA && !$this->PDFX) { 
  10916.                 // if ($this->DefOrientation=='P') $this->_out('/Duplex /DuplexFlipShortEdge'); 
  10917.                 $this->_out('/Duplex /DuplexFlipLongEdge'); // PDF v1.7+ 
  10918.             } 
  10919.             $this->_out('>>'); 
  10920.         } 
  10921.         if ($this->open_layer_pane && ($this->hasOC || count($this->layers))) 
  10922.             $this->_out('/PageMode /UseOC'); 
  10923.  
  10924.         if ($this->hasOC || count($this->layers)) { 
  10925.             $p = $v = $h = $l = $loff = $lall = $as = ''; 
  10926.             if ($this->hasOC) { 
  10927.                 if (($this->hasOC & 1) == 1) 
  10928.                     $p = $this->n_ocg_print . ' 0 R'; 
  10929.                 if (($this->hasOC & 2) == 2) 
  10930.                     $v = $this->n_ocg_view . ' 0 R'; 
  10931.                 if (($this->hasOC & 4) == 4) 
  10932.                     $h = $this->n_ocg_hidden . ' 0 R'; 
  10933.                 $as = "<</Event /Print /OCGs [$p $v $h] /Category [/Print]>> <</Event /View /OCGs [$p $v $h] /Category [/View]>>"; 
  10934.             } 
  10935.  
  10936.             if (count($this->layers)) { 
  10937.                 foreach ($this->layers as $k => $layer) { 
  10938.                     if (strtolower($this->layerDetails[$k]['state']) == 'hidden') { 
  10939.                         $loff .= $layer['n'] . ' 0 R '; 
  10940.                     } else { 
  10941.                         $l .= $layer['n'] . ' 0 R '; 
  10942.                     } 
  10943.                     $lall .= $layer['n'] . ' 0 R '; 
  10944.                 } 
  10945.             } 
  10946.             $this->_out("/OCProperties <</OCGs [$p $v $h $lall] /D <</ON [$p $l] /OFF [$v $h $loff] "); 
  10947.             $this->_out("/Order [$v $p $h $lall] "); 
  10948.             if ($as) 
  10949.                 $this->_out("/AS [$as] "); 
  10950.             $this->_out(">>>>"); 
  10951.         } 
  10952.     } 
  10953.  
  10954.     // Inactive function left for backwards compatability 
  10955.     function SetUserRights($enable = true, $annots = "", $form = "", $signature = "") 
  10956.     { 
  10957.         // Does nothing 
  10958.     } 
  10959.  
  10960.     function _enddoc() 
  10961.     { 
  10962.         $this->_puthtmlheaders(); 
  10963.         // Remove references to unused fonts (usually default font) 
  10964.         foreach ($this->fonts as $fk => $font) { 
  10965.             if (isset($font['type']) && $font['type'] == 'TTF' && !$font['used']) { 
  10966.                 if ($font['sip'] || $font['smp']) { 
  10967.                     foreach ($font['subsetfontids'] AS $k => $fid) { 
  10968.                         foreach ($this->pages AS $pn => $page) { 
  10969.                             $this->pages[$pn] = preg_replace('/\s\/F' . $fid . ' \d[\d.]* Tf\s/is', ' ', $this->pages[$pn]); 
  10970.                         } 
  10971.                     } 
  10972.                 } else { 
  10973.                     foreach ($this->pages AS $pn => $page) { 
  10974.                         $this->pages[$pn] = preg_replace('/\s\/F' . $font['i'] . ' \d[\d.]* Tf\s/is', ' ', $this->pages[$pn]); 
  10975.                     } 
  10976.                 } 
  10977.             } 
  10978.         } 
  10979.  
  10980.         if (count($this->layers)) { 
  10981.             foreach ($this->pages AS $pn => $page) { 
  10982.                 preg_match_all('/\/OCZ-index \/ZI(\d+) BDC(.*?)(EMCZ)-index/is', $this->pages[$pn], $m1); 
  10983.                 preg_match_all('/\/OCBZ-index \/ZI(\d+) BDC(.*?)(EMCBZ)-index/is', $this->pages[$pn], $m2); 
  10984.                 preg_match_all('/\/OCGZ-index \/ZI(\d+) BDC(.*?)(EMCGZ)-index/is', $this->pages[$pn], $m3); 
  10985.                 $m = array(); 
  10986.                 for ($i = 0; $i < 4; $i++) { 
  10987.                     $m[$i] = array_merge($m1[$i], $m2[$i], $m3[$i]); 
  10988.                 } 
  10989.                 if (count($m[0])) { 
  10990.                     $sortarr = array(); 
  10991.                     for ($i = 0; $i < count($m[0]); $i++) { 
  10992.                         $key = $m[1][$i] * 2; 
  10993.                         if ($m[3][$i] == 'EMCZ') 
  10994.                             $key +=2; // background first then gradient then normal 
  10995.                         elseif ($m[3][$i] == 'EMCGZ') 
  10996.                             $key +=1; 
  10997.                         $sortarr[$i] = $key; 
  10998.                     } 
  10999.                     asort($sortarr); 
  11000.                     foreach ($sortarr AS $i => $k) { 
  11001.                         $this->pages[$pn] = str_replace($m[0][$i], '', $this->pages[$pn]); 
  11002.                         $this->pages[$pn] .= "\n" . $m[0][$i] . "\n"; 
  11003.                     } 
  11004.                     $this->pages[$pn] = preg_replace('/\/OC[BG]{0, 1}Z-index \/ZI(\d+) BDC/is', '/OC /ZI\\1 BDC ', $this->pages[$pn]); 
  11005.                     $this->pages[$pn] = preg_replace('/EMC[BG]{0, 1}Z-index/is', 'EMC', $this->pages[$pn]); 
  11006.                 } 
  11007.             } 
  11008.         } 
  11009.  
  11010.         $this->_putpages(); 
  11011.  
  11012.         $this->_putresources(); 
  11013.         //Info 
  11014.         $this->_newobj(); 
  11015.         $this->InfoRoot = $this->n; 
  11016.         $this->_out('<<'); 
  11017.         $this->_putinfo(); 
  11018.         $this->_out('>>'); 
  11019.         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  11020.  
  11021.         // METADATA 
  11022.         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  11023.             $this->_putmetadata(); 
  11024.         } 
  11025.         // OUTPUTINTENT 
  11026.         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX || $this->ICCProfile) { 
  11027.             $this->_putoutputintent(); 
  11028.         } 
  11029.  
  11030.         //Catalog 
  11031.         $this->_newobj(); 
  11032.         $this->_out('<<'); 
  11033.         $this->_putcatalog(); 
  11034.         $this->_out('>>'); 
  11035.         $this->_out('endobj'); 
  11036.         //Cross-ref 
  11037.         $o = strlen($this->buffer); 
  11038.         $this->_out('xref'); 
  11039.         $this->_out('0 ' . ($this->n + 1)); 
  11040.         $this->_out('0000000000 65535 f '); 
  11041.         for ($i = 1; $i <= $this->n; $i++) 
  11042.             $this->_out(sprintf('%010d 00000 n ', $this->offsets[$i])); 
  11043.         //Trailer 
  11044.         $this->_out('trailer'); 
  11045.         $this->_out('<<'); 
  11046.         $this->_puttrailer(); 
  11047.         $this->_out('>>'); 
  11048.         $this->_out('startxref'); 
  11049.         $this->_out($o); 
  11050.  
  11051.         $this->buffer .= '%%EOF'; 
  11052.         $this->state = 3; 
  11053.         /** -- IMPORTS -- */ 
  11054.  
  11055.         if ($this->enableImports && count($this->parsers) > 0) { 
  11056.             foreach ($this->parsers as $k => $_) { 
  11057.                 $this->parsers[$k]->closeFile(); 
  11058.                 $this->parsers[$k] = null; 
  11059.                 unset($this->parsers[$k]); 
  11060.             } 
  11061.         } 
  11062.         /** -- END IMPORTS -- */ 
  11063.     } 
  11064.  
  11065.     function _beginpage($orientation, $mgl = '', $mgr = '', $mgt = '', $mgb = '', $mgh = '', $mgf = '', $ohname = '', $ehname = '', $ofname = '', $efname = '', $ohvalue = 0, $ehvalue = 0, $ofvalue = 0, $efvalue = 0, $pagesel = '', $newformat = '') 
  11066.     { 
  11067.         if (!($pagesel && $this->page == 1 && (sprintf("%0.4f", $this->y) == sprintf("%0.4f", $this->tMargin)))) { 
  11068.             $this->page++; 
  11069.             $this->pages[$this->page] = ''; 
  11070.         } 
  11071.         $this->state = 2; 
  11072.         $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = false; 
  11073.  
  11074.         if ($newformat) { 
  11075.             $this->_setPageSize($newformat, $orientation); 
  11076.         } 
  11077.         /** -- CSS-PAGE -- */ 
  11078.         // Paged media (page-box) 
  11079.         if ($pagesel || (isset($this->page_box['using']) && $this->page_box['using'])) { 
  11080.             if ($pagesel || $this->page == 1) { 
  11081.                 $first = true; 
  11082.             } else { 
  11083.                 $first = false; 
  11084.             } 
  11085.             if ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page % 2 == 0)) { 
  11086.                 $oddEven = 'E'; 
  11087.             } else { 
  11088.                 $oddEven = 'O'; 
  11089.             } 
  11090.             if ($pagesel) { 
  11091.                 $psel = $pagesel; 
  11092.             } elseif ($this->page_box['current']) { 
  11093.                 $psel = $this->page_box['current']; 
  11094.             } else { 
  11095.                 $psel = ''; 
  11096.             } 
  11097.  
  11098.             /** 
  11099.              * The passed in format should override the @page format 
  11100.              * Until the SetPagedMediaCSS method is rewritten this is the easiest and most effective way 
  11101.              */ 
  11102.             if ( $newformat ) { 
  11103.                 $saved_orientation = $orientation; 
  11104.                 $saved_newformat = $newformat; 
  11105.             } 
  11106.  
  11107.             list($orientation, $mgl, $mgr, $mgt, $mgb, $mgh, $mgf, $hname, $fname, $bg, $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress, $marks, $newformat) = $this->SetPagedMediaCSS($psel, $first, $oddEven); 
  11108.  
  11109.             /** Reset the orientation and format, if needed */ 
  11110.             if ( isset( $saved_newformat ) ) { 
  11111.                 $orientation = $saved_orientation; 
  11112.                 $newformat = $saved_newformat; 
  11113.             } 
  11114.  
  11115.             if ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page % 2 == 0)) { 
  11116.                 if ($hname) { 
  11117.                     $ehvalue = 1; 
  11118.                     $ehname = $hname; 
  11119.                 } else { 
  11120.                     $ehvalue = -1; 
  11121.                 } 
  11122.                 if ($fname) { 
  11123.                     $efvalue = 1; 
  11124.                     $efname = $fname; 
  11125.                 } else { 
  11126.                     $efvalue = -1; 
  11127.                 } 
  11128.             } else { 
  11129.                 if ($hname) { 
  11130.                     $ohvalue = 1; 
  11131.                     $ohname = $hname; 
  11132.                 } else { 
  11133.                     $ohvalue = -1; 
  11134.                 } 
  11135.                 if ($fname) { 
  11136.                     $ofvalue = 1; 
  11137.                     $ofname = $fname; 
  11138.                 } else { 
  11139.                     $ofvalue = -1; 
  11140.                 } 
  11141.             } 
  11142.             if ($resetpagenum || $pagenumstyle || $suppress) { 
  11143.                 $this->PageNumSubstitutions[] = array('from' => ($this->page), 'reset' => $resetpagenum, 'type' => $pagenumstyle, 'suppress' => $suppress); 
  11144.             } 
  11145.             // PAGED MEDIA - CROP / CROSS MARKS from @PAGE 
  11146.             $this->show_marks = $marks; 
  11147.  
  11148.             // Background color 
  11149.             if (isset($bg['BACKGROUND-COLOR'])) { 
  11150.                 $cor = $this->ConvertColor($bg['BACKGROUND-COLOR']); 
  11151.                 if ($cor) { 
  11152.                     $this->bodyBackgroundColor = $cor; 
  11153.                 } 
  11154.             } else { 
  11155.                 $this->bodyBackgroundColor = false; 
  11156.             } 
  11157.  
  11158.             /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  11159.             if (isset($bg['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'])) { 
  11160.                 $this->bodyBackgroundGradient = $bg['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']; 
  11161.             } else { 
  11162.                 $this->bodyBackgroundGradient = false; 
  11163.             } 
  11164.  
  11165.             // Tiling Patterns 
  11166.             if (isset($bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) && $bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) { 
  11167.                 $ret = $this->SetBackground($bg, $this->pgwidth); 
  11168.                 if ($ret) { 
  11169.                     $this->bodyBackgroundImage = $ret; 
  11170.                 } 
  11171.             } else { 
  11172.                 $this->bodyBackgroundImage = false; 
  11173.             } 
  11174.             /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  11175.  
  11176.             $this->page_box['current'] = $psel; 
  11177.             $this->page_box['using'] = true; 
  11178.         } 
  11179.         /** -- END CSS-PAGE -- */ 
  11180.  
  11181.         //Page orientation 
  11182.         if (!$orientation) 
  11183.             $orientation = $this->DefOrientation; 
  11184.         else { 
  11185.             $orientation = strtoupper(substr($orientation, 0, 1)); 
  11186.             if ($orientation != $this->DefOrientation) 
  11187.                 $this->OrientationChanges[$this->page] = true; 
  11188.         } 
  11189.         if ($orientation != $this->CurOrientation || $newformat) { 
  11190.  
  11191.             //Change orientation 
  11192.             if ($orientation == 'P') { 
  11193.                 $this->wPt = $this->fwPt; 
  11194.                 $this->hPt = $this->fhPt; 
  11195.                 $this->w = $this->fw; 
  11196.                 $this->h = $this->fh; 
  11197.                 if (($this->forcePortraitHeaders || $this->forcePortraitMargins) && $this->DefOrientation == 'P') { 
  11198.                     $this->tMargin = $this->orig_tMargin; 
  11199.                     $this->bMargin = $this->orig_bMargin; 
  11200.                     $this->DeflMargin = $this->orig_lMargin; 
  11201.                     $this->DefrMargin = $this->orig_rMargin; 
  11202.                     $this->margin_header = $this->orig_hMargin; 
  11203.                     $this->margin_footer = $this->orig_fMargin; 
  11204.                 } else { 
  11205.                     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11206.                 } 
  11207.             } else { 
  11208.                 $this->wPt = $this->fhPt; 
  11209.                 $this->hPt = $this->fwPt; 
  11210.                 $this->w = $this->fh; 
  11211.                 $this->h = $this->fw; 
  11212.                 if (($this->forcePortraitHeaders || $this->forcePortraitMargins) && $this->DefOrientation == 'P') { 
  11213.                     $this->tMargin = $this->orig_lMargin; 
  11214.                     $this->bMargin = $this->orig_rMargin; 
  11215.                     $this->DeflMargin = $this->orig_bMargin; 
  11216.                     $this->DefrMargin = $this->orig_tMargin; 
  11217.                     $this->margin_header = $this->orig_hMargin; 
  11218.                     $this->margin_footer = $this->orig_fMargin; 
  11219.                 } else { 
  11220.                     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11221.                 } 
  11222.             } 
  11223.             $this->CurOrientation = $orientation; 
  11224.             $this->ResetMargins(); 
  11225.             $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  11226.             $this->PageBreakTrigger = $this->h - $this->bMargin; 
  11227.         } 
  11228.  
  11229.         $this->pageDim[$this->page]['w'] = $this->w; 
  11230.         $this->pageDim[$this->page]['h'] = $this->h; 
  11231.  
  11232.         $this->pageDim[$this->page]['outer_width_LR'] = isset($this->page_box['outer_width_LR']) ? $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] : 0; 
  11233.         $this->pageDim[$this->page]['outer_width_TB'] = isset($this->page_box['outer_width_TB']) ? $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] : 0; 
  11234.         if (!isset($this->page_box['outer_width_LR']) && !isset($this->page_box['outer_width_TB'])) { 
  11235.             $this->pageDim[$this->page]['bleedMargin'] = 0; 
  11236.         } elseif ($this->bleedMargin <= $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] && $this->bleedMargin <= $this->page_box['outer_width_TB']) { 
  11237.             $this->pageDim[$this->page]['bleedMargin'] = $this->bleedMargin; 
  11238.         } else { 
  11239.             $this->pageDim[$this->page]['bleedMargin'] = min($this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $this->page_box['outer_width_TB']) - 0.01; 
  11240.         } 
  11241.  
  11242.         // If Page Margins are re-defined 
  11243.         // strlen()>0 is used to pick up (integer) 0, (string) '0', or set value 
  11244.         if ((strlen($mgl) > 0 && $this->DeflMargin != $mgl) || (strlen($mgr) > 0 && $this->DefrMargin != $mgr) || (strlen($mgt) > 0 && $this->tMargin != $mgt) || (strlen($mgb) > 0 && $this->bMargin != $mgb) || (strlen($mgh) > 0 && $this->margin_header != $mgh) || (strlen($mgf) > 0 && $this->margin_footer != $mgf)) { 
  11245.             if (strlen($mgl) > 0) 
  11246.                 $this->DeflMargin = $mgl; 
  11247.             if (strlen($mgr) > 0) 
  11248.                 $this->DefrMargin = $mgr; 
  11249.             if (strlen($mgt) > 0) 
  11250.                 $this->tMargin = $mgt; 
  11251.             if (strlen($mgb) > 0) 
  11252.                 $this->bMargin = $mgb; 
  11253.             if (strlen($mgh) > 0) 
  11254.                 $this->margin_header = $mgh; 
  11255.             if (strlen($mgf) > 0) 
  11256.                 $this->margin_footer = $mgf; 
  11257.             $this->ResetMargins(); 
  11258.             $this->SetAutoPageBreak($this->autoPageBreak, $this->bMargin); 
  11259.             $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  11260.             $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11261.         } 
  11262.  
  11263.         $this->ResetMargins(); 
  11264.         $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  11265.         $this->SetAutoPageBreak($this->autoPageBreak, $this->bMargin); 
  11266.  
  11267.         // Reset column top margin 
  11268.         $this->y0 = $this->tMargin; 
  11269.  
  11270.         $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  11271.         $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  11272.         $this->FontFamily = ''; 
  11273.  
  11274.         // HEADERS AND FOOTERS    // mPDF 6 
  11275.         if ($ohvalue < 0 || strtoupper($ohvalue) == 'OFF') { 
  11276.             $this->HTMLHeader = ''; 
  11277.             $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11278.         } elseif ($ohname && $ohvalue > 0) { 
  11279.             if (preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i', $ohname, $n)) { 
  11280.                 $name = $n[1]; 
  11281.             } else { 
  11282.                 $name = $ohname; 
  11283.             } 
  11284.             if (isset($this->pageHTMLheaders[$name])) { 
  11285.                 $this->HTMLHeader = $this->pageHTMLheaders[$name]; 
  11286.             } else { 
  11287.                 $this->HTMLHeader = ''; 
  11288.             } 
  11289.             $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11290.         } 
  11291.  
  11292.         if ($ehvalue < 0 || strtoupper($ehvalue) == 'OFF') { 
  11293.             $this->HTMLHeaderE = ''; 
  11294.             $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11295.         } elseif ($ehname && $ehvalue > 0) { 
  11296.             if (preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i', $ehname, $n)) { 
  11297.                 $name = $n[1]; 
  11298.             } else { 
  11299.                 $name = $ehname; 
  11300.             } 
  11301.             if (isset($this->pageHTMLheaders[$name])) { 
  11302.                 $this->HTMLHeaderE = $this->pageHTMLheaders[$name]; 
  11303.             } else { 
  11304.                 $this->HTMLHeaderE = ''; 
  11305.             } 
  11306.             $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11307.         } 
  11308.  
  11309.         if ($ofvalue < 0 || strtoupper($ofvalue) == 'OFF') { 
  11310.             $this->HTMLFooter = ''; 
  11311.             $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11312.         } elseif ($ofname && $ofvalue > 0) { 
  11313.             if (preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i', $ofname, $n)) { 
  11314.                 $name = $n[1]; 
  11315.             } else { 
  11316.                 $name = $ofname; 
  11317.             } 
  11318.             if (isset($this->pageHTMLfooters[$name])) { 
  11319.                 $this->HTMLFooter = $this->pageHTMLfooters[$name]; 
  11320.             } else { 
  11321.                 $this->HTMLFooter = ''; 
  11322.             } 
  11323.             $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11324.         } 
  11325.  
  11326.         if ($efvalue < 0 || strtoupper($efvalue) == 'OFF') { 
  11327.             $this->HTMLFooterE = ''; 
  11328.             $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11329.         } elseif ($efname && $efvalue > 0) { 
  11330.             if (preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i', $efname, $n)) { 
  11331.                 $name = $n[1]; 
  11332.             } else { 
  11333.                 $name = $efname; 
  11334.             } 
  11335.             if (isset($this->pageHTMLfooters[$name])) { 
  11336.                 $this->HTMLFooterE = $this->pageHTMLfooters[$name]; 
  11337.             } else { 
  11338.                 $this->HTMLFooterE = ''; 
  11339.             } 
  11340.             $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; 
  11341.         } 
  11342.         if ($resetHTMLHeadersrequired) { 
  11343.             $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->HTMLHeader); 
  11344.             $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->HTMLHeaderE, 'E'); 
  11345.             $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->HTMLFooter); 
  11346.             $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->HTMLFooterE, 'E'); 
  11347.         } 
  11348.  
  11349.  
  11350.         if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page) % 2 == 0)) { // EVEN 
  11351.             $this->_setAutoHeaderHeight($this->HTMLHeaderE); 
  11352.             $this->_setAutoFooterHeight($this->HTMLFooterE); 
  11353.         } else { // ODD or DEFAULT 
  11354.             $this->_setAutoHeaderHeight($this->HTMLHeader); 
  11355.             $this->_setAutoFooterHeight($this->HTMLFooter); 
  11356.         } 
  11357.         // Reset column top margin 
  11358.         $this->y0 = $this->tMargin; 
  11359.  
  11360.         $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  11361.         $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  11362.     } 
  11363.  
  11364.     // mPDF 6 
  11365.     function _setAutoHeaderHeight(&$htmlh) 
  11366.     { 
  11367.         /** Don't apply auto header height if no header exists */ 
  11368.         if ((is_string($this->HTMLHeader) && strlen($this->HTMLHeader) == 0) && (is_string($this->HTMLHeaderE) && strlen($this->HTMLHeaderE) == 0)) { 
  11369.             return; 
  11370.         } 
  11371.  
  11372.         if ($this->setAutoTopMargin == 'pad') { 
  11373.             if (isset($htmlh['h']) && $htmlh['h']) { 
  11374.                 $h = $htmlh['h']; 
  11375.             } // 5.7.3 
  11376.             else { 
  11377.                 $h = 0; 
  11378.             } 
  11379.             $this->tMargin = $this->margin_header + $h + $this->orig_tMargin; 
  11380.         } elseif ($this->setAutoTopMargin == 'stretch') { 
  11381.             if (isset($htmlh['h']) && $htmlh['h']) { 
  11382.                 $h = $htmlh['h']; 
  11383.             } // 5.7.3 
  11384.             else { 
  11385.                 $h = 0; 
  11386.             } 
  11387.             $this->tMargin = max($this->orig_tMargin, $this->margin_header + $h + $this->autoMarginPadding); 
  11388.         } 
  11389.     } 
  11390.  
  11391.     // mPDF 6 
  11392.     function _setAutoFooterHeight(&$htmlf) 
  11393.     { 
  11394.         /** Don't apply auto footer height if no footer exists */ 
  11395.         if ((is_string($this->HTMLFooter) && strlen($this->HTMLFooter) == 0) && (is_string($this->HTMLFooterE) && strlen($this->HTMLFooterE) == 0)) { 
  11396.             return; 
  11397.         } 
  11398.  
  11399.         if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin == 'pad') { 
  11400.             if (isset($htmlf['h']) && $htmlf['h']) { 
  11401.                 $h = $htmlf['h']; 
  11402.             } // 5.7.3 
  11403.             else { 
  11404.                 $h = 0; 
  11405.             } 
  11406.             $this->bMargin = $this->margin_footer + $h + $this->orig_bMargin; 
  11407.             $this->PageBreakTrigger = $this->h - $this->bMargin; 
  11408.         } elseif ($this->setAutoBottomMargin == 'stretch') { 
  11409.             if (isset($htmlf['h']) && $htmlf['h']) { 
  11410.                 $h = $htmlf['h']; 
  11411.             } // 5.7.3 
  11412.             else { 
  11413.                 $h = 0; 
  11414.             } 
  11415.             $this->bMargin = max($this->orig_bMargin, $this->margin_footer + $h + $this->autoMarginPadding); 
  11416.             $this->PageBreakTrigger = $this->h - $this->bMargin; 
  11417.         } 
  11418.     } 
  11419.  
  11420.     function _endpage() 
  11421.     { 
  11422.         /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  11423.         $this->printfloatbuffer(); 
  11424.         /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  11425.  
  11426.         if ($this->visibility != 'visible') 
  11427.             $this->SetVisibility('visible'); 
  11428.         $this->EndLayer(); 
  11429.         //End of page contents 
  11430.         $this->state = 1; 
  11431.     } 
  11432.  
  11433.     function _newobj($obj_id = false, $onlynewobj = false) 
  11434.     { 
  11435.         if (!$obj_id) { 
  11436.             $obj_id = ++$this->n; 
  11437.         } 
  11438.         //Begin a new object 
  11439.         if (!$onlynewobj) { 
  11440.             $this->offsets[$obj_id] = strlen($this->buffer); 
  11441.             $this->_out($obj_id . ' 0 obj'); 
  11442.             $this->_current_obj_id = $obj_id; // for later use with encryption 
  11443.         } 
  11444.     } 
  11445.  
  11446.     function _dounderline($x, $y, $txt, $OTLdata = false, $textvar = 0) 
  11447.     { 
  11448.         // Now print line exactly where $y secifies - called from Text() and Cell() - adjust  position there 
  11449.         // WORD SPACING 
  11450.         $w = ($this->GetStringWidth($txt, false, $OTLdata, $textvar) * _MPDFK) + ($this->charspacing * mb_strlen($txt, $this->mb_enc)) + ( $this->ws * mb_substr_count($txt, ' ', $this->mb_enc)); 
  11451.         //Draw a line 
  11452.         return sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F l S', $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK, ($x * _MPDFK) + $w, ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK); 
  11453.     } 
  11454.  
  11455.     function _imageError($file, $firsttime, $msg) 
  11456.     { 
  11457.         // Save re-trying image URL's which have already failed 
  11458.         $this->failedimages[$file] = true; 
  11459.         if ($firsttime && $this->showImageErrors) { 
  11460.             throw new MpdfException("IMAGE Error (" . $file . "): " . $msg); 
  11461.         } 
  11462.         return false; 
  11463.     } 
  11464.  
  11465.     function _getImage(&$file, $firsttime = true, $allowvector = true, $orig_srcpath = false, $interpolation = false) 
  11466.     {  // mPDF 6 
  11467.         // firsttime i.e. whether to add to this->images - use false when calling iteratively 
  11468.         // Image Data passed directly as var:varname 
  11469.         if (preg_match('/var:\s*(.*)/', $file, $v)) { 
  11470.             $data = $this->{$v[1]}; 
  11471.             $file = md5($data); 
  11472.         } 
  11473.         if (preg_match('/data:image\/(gif|jpeg|png);base64, (.*)/', $file, $v)) { 
  11474.             $type = $v[1]; 
  11475.             $data = base64_decode($v[2]); 
  11476.             $file = md5($data); 
  11477.         } 
  11478.  
  11479.         // mPDF 5.7.4 URLs 
  11480.         if ($firsttime && $file && substr($file, 0, 5) != 'data:') { 
  11481.             $file = str_replace(" ", "%20", $file); 
  11482.         } 
  11483.         if ($firsttime && $orig_srcpath) { 
  11484.             // If orig_srcpath is a relative file path (and not a URL), then it needs to be URL decoded 
  11485.             if (substr($orig_srcpath, 0, 5) != 'data:') { 
  11486.                 $orig_srcpath = str_replace(" ", "%20", $orig_srcpath); 
  11487.             } 
  11488.             if (!preg_match('/^(http|ftp)/', $orig_srcpath)) { 
  11489.                 $orig_srcpath = urldecode_parts($orig_srcpath); 
  11490.             } 
  11491.         } 
  11492.  
  11493.         $ppUx = 0; 
  11494.         if ($orig_srcpath && isset($this->images[$orig_srcpath])) { 
  11495.             $file = $orig_srcpath; 
  11496.             return $this->images[$orig_srcpath]; 
  11497.         } 
  11498.         if (isset($this->images[$file])) { 
  11499.             return $this->images[$file]; 
  11500.         } elseif ($orig_srcpath && isset($this->formobjects[$orig_srcpath])) { 
  11501.             $file = $orig_srcpath; 
  11502.             return $this->formobjects[$file]; 
  11503.         } elseif (isset($this->formobjects[$file])) { 
  11504.             return $this->formobjects[$file]; 
  11505.         } 
  11506.         // Save re-trying image URL's which have already failed 
  11507.         elseif ($firsttime && isset($this->failedimages[$file])) { 
  11508.             return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, ''); 
  11509.         } 
  11510.         if (empty($data)) { 
  11511.             $type = ''; 
  11512.             $data = ''; 
  11513.  
  11514.             if ($orig_srcpath && $this->basepathIsLocal && $check = @fopen($orig_srcpath, "rb")) { 
  11515.                 fclose($check); 
  11516.                 $file = $orig_srcpath; 
  11517.                 $data = file_get_contents($file); 
  11518.                 $type = $this->_imageTypeFromString($data); 
  11519.             } 
  11520.             if (!$data && $check = @fopen($file, "rb")) { 
  11521.                 fclose($check); 
  11522.                 $data = file_get_contents($file); 
  11523.                 $type = $this->_imageTypeFromString($data); 
  11524.             } 
  11525.             if ((!$data || !$type) && !ini_get('allow_url_fopen')) { // only worth trying if remote file and !ini_get('allow_url_fopen') 
  11526.                 $this->file_get_contents_by_socket($file, $data); // needs full url?? even on local (never needed for local) 
  11527.                 if ($data) { 
  11528.                     $type = $this->_imageTypeFromString($data); 
  11529.                 } 
  11530.             } 
  11531.             if ((!$data || !$type) && function_exists("curl_init")) { // mPDF 5.7.4 
  11532.                 $this->file_get_contents_by_curl($file, $data);  // needs full url?? even on local (never needed for local) 
  11533.                 if ($data) { 
  11534.                     $type = $this->_imageTypeFromString($data); 
  11535.                 } 
  11536.             } 
  11537.         } 
  11538.         if (!$data) { 
  11539.             return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Could not find image file'); 
  11540.         } 
  11541.         if (empty($type)) { 
  11542.             $type = $this->_imageTypeFromString($data); 
  11543.         } 
  11544.         if (($type == 'wmf' || $type == 'svg') && !$allowvector) { 
  11545.             return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'WMF or SVG image file not supported in this context'); 
  11546.         } 
  11547.  
  11548.         // SVG 
  11549.         if ($type == 'svg') { 
  11550.             if (!class_exists('SVG', false)) { 
  11551.                 include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/svg.php'); 
  11552.             } 
  11553.             $svg = new SVG($this); 
  11554.             $family = $this->FontFamily; 
  11555.             $style = $this->FontStyle; 
  11556.             $size = $this->FontSizePt; 
  11557.             $info = $svg->ImageSVG($data); 
  11558.             //Restore font 
  11559.             if ($family) 
  11560.                 $this->SetFont($family, $style, $size, false); 
  11561.             if (!$info) { 
  11562.                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing SVG file'); 
  11563.             } 
  11564.             $info['type'] = 'svg'; 
  11565.             $info['i'] = count($this->formobjects) + 1; 
  11566.             $this->formobjects[$file] = $info; 
  11567.             return $info; 
  11568.         } 
  11569.  
  11570.         // JPEG 
  11571.         if ($type == 'jpeg' || $type == 'jpg') { 
  11572.             $hdr = $this->_jpgHeaderFromString($data); 
  11573.             if (!$hdr) { 
  11574.                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing JPG header'); 
  11575.             } 
  11576.             $a = $this->_jpgDataFromHeader($hdr); 
  11577.             $channels = intval($a[4]); 
  11578.             $j = strpos($data, 'JFIF'); 
  11579.             if ($j) { 
  11580.                 //Read resolution 
  11581.                 $unitSp = ord(substr($data, ($j + 7), 1)); 
  11582.                 if ($unitSp > 0) { 
  11583.                     $ppUx = $this->_twobytes2int(substr($data, ($j + 8), 2)); // horizontal pixels per meter, usually set to zero 
  11584.                     if ($unitSp == 2) { // = dots per cm (if == 1 set as dpi) 
  11585.                         $ppUx = round($ppUx / 10 * 25.4); 
  11586.                     } 
  11587.                 } 
  11588.             } 
  11589.             if ($a[2] == 'DeviceCMYK' && (($this->PDFA && $this->restrictColorSpace != 3) || $this->restrictColorSpace == 2)) { 
  11590.                 // convert to RGB image 
  11591.                 if (!function_exists("gd_info")) { 
  11592.                     throw new MpdfException("JPG image may not use CMYK color space (" . $file . ")."); 
  11593.                 } 
  11594.                 if ($this->PDFA && !$this->PDFAauto) { 
  11595.                     $this->PDFAXwarnings[] = "JPG image may not use CMYK color space - " . $file . " - (Image converted to RGB. NB This will alter the colour profile of the image.)"; 
  11596.                 } 
  11597.                 $im = @imagecreatefromstring($data); 
  11598.                 if ($im) { 
  11599.                     $tempfile = _MPDF_TEMP_PATH . '_tempImgPNG' . md5($file) . RAND(1, 10000) . '.png'; 
  11600.                     imageinterlace($im, false); 
  11601.                     $check = @imagepng($im, $tempfile); 
  11602.                     if (!$check) { 
  11603.                         return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating temporary file (' . $tempfile . ') whilst using GD library to parse JPG(CMYK) image'); 
  11604.                     } 
  11605.                     $info = $this->_getImage($tempfile, false); 
  11606.                     if (!$info) { 
  11607.                         return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file (' . $tempfile . ') created with GD library to parse JPG(CMYK) image'); 
  11608.                     } 
  11609.                     imagedestroy($im); 
  11610.                     unlink($tempfile); 
  11611.                     $info['type'] = 'jpg'; 
  11612.                     if ($firsttime) { 
  11613.                         $info['i'] = count($this->images) + 1; 
  11614.                         $info['interpolation'] = $interpolation; // mPDF 6 
  11615.                         $this->images[$file] = $info; 
  11616.                     } 
  11617.                     return $info; 
  11618.                 } else { 
  11619.                     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating GD image file from JPG(CMYK) image'); 
  11620.                 } 
  11621.             } elseif ($a[2] == 'DeviceRGB' && ($this->PDFX || $this->restrictColorSpace == 3)) { 
  11622.                 // Convert to CMYK image stream - nominally returned as type='png' 
  11623.                 $info = $this->_convImage($data, $a[2], 'DeviceCMYK', $a[0], $a[1], $ppUx, false); 
  11624.                 if (($this->PDFA && !$this->PDFAauto) || ($this->PDFX && !$this->PDFXauto)) { 
  11625.                     $this->PDFAXwarnings[] = "JPG image may not use RGB color space - " . $file . " - (Image converted to CMYK. NB This will alter the colour profile of the image.)"; 
  11626.                 } 
  11627.             } elseif (($a[2] == 'DeviceRGB' || $a[2] == 'DeviceCMYK') && $this->restrictColorSpace == 1) { 
  11628.                 // Convert to Grayscale image stream - nominally returned as type='png' 
  11629.                 $info = $this->_convImage($data, $a[2], 'DeviceGray', $a[0], $a[1], $ppUx, false); 
  11630.             } else { 
  11631.  
  11632.                 // mPDF 6 Detect Adobe APP14 Tag 
  11633.                 //$pos = strpos($data, "\xFF\xEE\x00\x0EAdobe\0"); 
  11634.                 //if ($pos !== false) { 
  11635.                 //} 
  11636.                 // mPDF 6 ICC profile 
  11637.                 $offset = 0; 
  11638.                 $icc = array(); 
  11639.                 while (($pos = strpos($data, "ICC_PROFILE\0", $offset)) !== false) { 
  11640.                     // get ICC sequence length 
  11641.                     $length = $this->_twobytes2int(substr($data, ($pos - 2), 2)) - 16; 
  11642.                     $sn = max(1, ord($data[($pos + 12)])); 
  11643.                     $nom = max(1, ord($data[($pos + 13)])); 
  11644.                     $icc[($sn - 1)] = substr($data, ($pos + 14), $length); 
  11645.                     $offset = ($pos + 14 + $length); 
  11646.                 } 
  11647.                 // order and compact ICC segments 
  11648.                 if (count($icc) > 0) { 
  11649.                     ksort($icc); 
  11650.                     $icc = implode('', $icc); 
  11651.                     if (substr($icc, 36, 4) != 'acsp') { 
  11652.                         // invalid ICC profile 
  11653.                         $icc = false; 
  11654.                     } 
  11655.                     $input = substr($icc, 16, 4); 
  11656.                     $output = substr($icc, 20, 4); 
  11657.                     // Ignore Color profiles for conversion to other colorspaces e.g. CMYK/Lab 
  11658.                     if ($input != 'RGB ' || $output != 'XYZ ') { 
  11659.                         $icc = false; 
  11660.                     } 
  11661.                 } else { 
  11662.                     $icc = false; 
  11663.                 } 
  11664.  
  11665.                 $info = array('w' => $a[0], 'h' => $a[1], 'cs' => $a[2], 'bpc' => $a[3], 'f' => 'DCTDecode', 'data' => $data, 'type' => 'jpg', 'ch' => $channels, 'icc' => $icc); 
  11666.                 if ($ppUx) { 
  11667.                     $info['set-dpi'] = $ppUx; 
  11668.                 } 
  11669.             } 
  11670.             if (!$info) { 
  11671.                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing or converting JPG image'); 
  11672.             } 
  11673.             if ($firsttime) { 
  11674.                 $info['i'] = count($this->images) + 1; 
  11675.                 $info['interpolation'] = $interpolation; // mPDF 6 
  11676.                 $this->images[$file] = $info; 
  11677.             } 
  11678.             return $info; 
  11679.         } 
  11680.  
  11681.         // PNG 
  11682.         elseif ($type == 'png') { 
  11683.             //Check signature 
  11684.             if (substr($data, 0, 8) != chr(137) . 'PNG' . chr(13) . chr(10) . chr(26) . chr(10)) { 
  11685.                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing PNG identifier'); 
  11686.             } 
  11687.             //Read header chunk 
  11688.             if (substr($data, 12, 4) != 'IHDR') { 
  11689.                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Incorrect PNG file (no IHDR block found)'); 
  11690.             } 
  11691.  
  11692.             $w = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, 16, 4)); 
  11693.             $h = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, 20, 4)); 
  11694.             $bpc = ord(substr($data, 24, 1)); 
  11695.             $errpng = false; 
  11696.             $pngalpha = false; 
  11697.             $channels = 0; 
  11698.  
  11699.             //    if($bpc>8) { $errpng = 'not 8-bit depth'; }    // mPDF 6 Allow through to be handled as native PNG 
  11700.  
  11701.             $ct = ord(substr($data, 25, 1)); 
  11702.             if ($ct == 0) { 
  11703.                 $colspace = 'DeviceGray'; 
  11704.                 $channels = 1; 
  11705.             } elseif ($ct == 2) { 
  11706.                 $colspace = 'DeviceRGB'; 
  11707.                 $channels = 3; 
  11708.             } elseif ($ct == 3) { 
  11709.                 $colspace = 'Indexed'; 
  11710.                 $channels = 1; 
  11711.             } elseif ($ct == 4) { 
  11712.                 $colspace = 'DeviceGray'; 
  11713.                 $channels = 1; 
  11714.                 $errpng = 'alpha channel'; 
  11715.                 $pngalpha = true; 
  11716.             } else { 
  11717.                 $colspace = 'DeviceRGB'; 
  11718.                 $channels = 3; 
  11719.                 $errpng = 'alpha channel'; 
  11720.                 $pngalpha = true; 
  11721.             } 
  11722.  
  11723.             if ($ct < 4 && strpos($data, 'tRNS') !== false) { 
  11724.                 $errpng = 'transparency'; 
  11725.                 $pngalpha = true; 
  11726.             } // mPDF 6 
  11727.  
  11728.             if ($ct == 3 && strpos($data, 'iCCP') !== false) { 
  11729.                 $errpng = 'indexed plus ICC'; 
  11730.             } // mPDF 6 
  11731.             // $pngalpha is used as a FLAG of any kind of transparency which COULD be tranferred to an alpha channel 
  11732.             // incl. single-color tarnsparency, depending which type of handling occurs later 
  11733.  
  11734.             if (ord(substr($data, 26, 1)) != 0) { 
  11735.                 $errpng = 'compression method'; 
  11736.             } // only 0 should be specified 
  11737.             if (ord(substr($data, 27, 1)) != 0) { 
  11738.                 $errpng = 'filter method'; 
  11739.             }  // only 0 should be specified 
  11740.             if (ord(substr($data, 28, 1)) != 0) { 
  11741.                 $errpng = 'interlaced file'; 
  11742.             } 
  11743.  
  11744.             $j = strpos($data, 'pHYs'); 
  11745.             if ($j) { 
  11746.                 //Read resolution 
  11747.                 $unitSp = ord(substr($data, ($j + 12), 1)); 
  11748.                 if ($unitSp == 1) { 
  11749.                     $ppUx = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, ($j + 4), 4)); // horizontal pixels per meter, usually set to zero 
  11750.                     $ppUx = round($ppUx / 1000 * 25.4); 
  11751.                 } 
  11752.             } 
  11753.  
  11754.             // mPDF 6 Gamma correction 
  11755.             $gamma_correction = 0; 
  11756.             $gAMA = 0; 
  11757.             $j = strpos($data, 'gAMA'); 
  11758.             if ($j && strpos($data, 'sRGB') === false) { // sRGB colorspace - overrides gAMA 
  11759.                 $gAMA = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, ($j + 4), 4)); // Gamma value times 100000 
  11760.                 $gAMA /= 100000; 
  11761.  
  11762.                 // http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/spec/1.2/PNG-Encoders.html 
  11763.                 // "If the source file's gamma value is greater than 1.0, it is probably a display system exponent, ..." 
  11764.                 // ("..and you should use its reciprocal for the PNG gamma.") 
  11765.                 //if ($gAMA > 1) { $gAMA = 1/$gAMA; } 
  11766.                 // (Some) Applications seem to ignore it... appearing how it was probably intended 
  11767.                 // Test Case - image(s) on http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS21/intro.html  - PNG has gAMA set as 1.45454 
  11768.                 // Probably unintentional as mentioned above and should be 0.45454 which is 1 / 2.2 
  11769.                 // Tested on Windows PC 
  11770.                 // Firefox and Opera display gray as 234 (correct, but looks wrong) 
  11771.                 // IE9 and Safari display gray as 193 (incorrect but looks right) 
  11772.                 // See test different gamma chunks at http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/pngsuite-all-good.html 
  11773.             } 
  11774.  
  11775.             if ($gAMA) { 
  11776.                 $gamma_correction = 1 / $gAMA; 
  11777.             } 
  11778.  
  11779.             // Don't need to apply gamma correction if == default i.e. 2.2 
  11780.             if ($gamma_correction > 2.15 && $gamma_correction < 2.25) { 
  11781.                 $gamma_correction = 0; 
  11782.             } 
  11783.  
  11784.             // NOT supported at present 
  11785.             //$j = strpos($data, 'sRGB');    // sRGB colorspace - overrides gAMA 
  11786.             //$j = strpos($data, 'cHRM');    // Chromaticity and Whitepoint 
  11787.             // $firsttime added mPDF 6 so when PNG Grayscale with alpha using resrtictcolorspace to CMYK 
  11788.             // the alpha channel is sent through as secondtime as Indexed and should not be converted to CMYK 
  11789.             if ($firsttime && ($colspace == 'DeviceRGB' || $colspace == 'Indexed') && ($this->PDFX || $this->restrictColorSpace == 3)) { 
  11790.                 // Convert to CMYK image stream - nominally returned as type='png' 
  11791.                 $info = $this->_convImage($data, $colspace, 'DeviceCMYK', $w, $h, $ppUx, $pngalpha, $gamma_correction, $ct); // mPDF 5.7.2 Gamma correction 
  11792.                 if (($this->PDFA && !$this->PDFAauto) || ($this->PDFX && !$this->PDFXauto)) { 
  11793.                     $this->PDFAXwarnings[] = "PNG image may not use RGB color space - " . $file . " - (Image converted to CMYK. NB This will alter the colour profile of the image.)"; 
  11794.                 } 
  11795.             } 
  11796.             // $firsttime added mPDF 6 so when PNG Grayscale with alpha using resrtictcolorspace to CMYK 
  11797.             // the alpha channel is sent through as secondtime as Indexed and should not be converted to CMYK 
  11798.             elseif ($firsttime && ($colspace == 'DeviceRGB' || $colspace == 'Indexed') && $this->restrictColorSpace == 1) { 
  11799.                 // Convert to Grayscale image stream - nominally returned as type='png' 
  11800.                 $info = $this->_convImage($data, $colspace, 'DeviceGray', $w, $h, $ppUx, $pngalpha, $gamma_correction, $ct); // mPDF 5.7.2 Gamma correction 
  11801.             } elseif (($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) && $pngalpha) { 
  11802.  
  11803.                 // Remove alpha channel 
  11804.                 if ($this->restrictColorSpace == 1) { // Grayscale 
  11805.                     $info = $this->_convImage($data, $colspace, 'DeviceGray', $w, $h, $ppUx, $pngalpha, $gamma_correction, $ct); // mPDF 5.7.2 Gamma correction 
  11806.                 } elseif ($this->restrictColorSpace == 3) { // CMYK 
  11807.                     $info = $this->_convImage($data, $colspace, 'DeviceCMYK', $w, $h, $ppUx, $pngalpha, $gamma_correction, $ct); // mPDF 5.7.2 Gamma correction 
  11808.                 } elseif ($this->PDFA) { // RGB 
  11809.                     $info = $this->_convImage($data, $colspace, 'DeviceRGB', $w, $h, $ppUx, $pngalpha, $gamma_correction, $ct); // mPDF 5.7.2 Gamma correction 
  11810.                 } 
  11811.                 if (($this->PDFA && !$this->PDFAauto) || ($this->PDFX && !$this->PDFXauto)) { 
  11812.                     $this->PDFAXwarnings[] = "Transparency (alpha channel) not permitted in PDFA or PDFX files - " . $file . " - (Image converted to one without transparency.)"; 
  11813.                 } 
  11814.             } elseif ($firsttime && ($errpng || $pngalpha || $gamma_correction)) { // mPDF 5.7.2 Gamma correction 
  11815.                 if (function_exists('gd_info')) { 
  11816.                     $gd = gd_info(); 
  11817.                 } else { 
  11818.                     $gd = array(); 
  11819.                 } 
  11820.                 if (!isset($gd['PNG Support'])) { 
  11821.                     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'GD library required for PNG image (' . $errpng . ')'); 
  11822.                 } 
  11823.                 $im = imagecreatefromstring($data); 
  11824.  
  11825.                 if (!$im) { 
  11826.                     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating GD image from PNG file (' . $errpng . ')'); 
  11827.                 } 
  11828.                 $w = imagesx($im); 
  11829.                 $h = imagesy($im); 
  11830.                 if ($im) { 
  11831.                     $tempfile = _MPDF_TEMP_PATH . '_tempImgPNG' . md5($file) . RAND(1, 10000) . '.png'; 
  11832.  
  11833.                     // Alpha channel set (including using tRNS for Paletted images) 
  11834.                     if ($pngalpha) { 
  11835.                         if ($this->PDFA) { 
  11836.                             throw new MpdfException("PDFA1-b does not permit images with alpha channel transparency (" . $file . ")."); 
  11837.                         } 
  11838.  
  11839.                         $imgalpha = imagecreate($w, $h); 
  11840.                         // generate gray scale pallete 
  11841.                         for ($c = 0; $c < 256; ++$c) { 
  11842.                             imagecolorallocate($imgalpha, $c, $c, $c); 
  11843.                         } 
  11844.  
  11845.                         // mPDF 6 
  11846.                         if ($colspace == 'Indexed') { // generate Alpha channel values from tRNS 
  11847.                             //Read transparency info 
  11848.                             $transparency = ''; 
  11849.                             $p = strpos($data, 'tRNS'); 
  11850.                             if ($p) { 
  11851.                                 $n = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, ($p - 4), 4)); 
  11852.                                 $transparency = substr($data, ($p + 4), $n); 
  11853.                                 // ord($transparency{$index}) = the alpha value for that index 
  11854.                                 // generate alpha channel 
  11855.                                 for ($ypx = 0; $ypx < $h; ++$ypx) { 
  11856.                                     for ($xpx = 0; $xpx < $w; ++$xpx) { 
  11857.                                         $colorindex = imagecolorat($im, $xpx, $ypx); 
  11858.                                         if ($colorindex >= $n) { 
  11859.                                             $alpha = 255; 
  11860.                                         } else { 
  11861.                                             $alpha = ord($transparency{$colorindex}); 
  11862.                                         } // 0-255 
  11863.                                         if ($alpha > 0) { 
  11864.                                             imagesetpixel($imgalpha, $xpx, $ypx, $alpha); 
  11865.                                         } 
  11866.                                     } 
  11867.                                 } 
  11868.                             } 
  11869.                         } elseif ($ct === 0 || $ct == 2) { // generate Alpha channel values from tRNS 
  11870.                             // Get transparency as array of RGB 
  11871.                             $p = strpos($data, 'tRNS'); 
  11872.                             if ($p) { 
  11873.                                 $trns = ''; 
  11874.                                 $n = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, ($p - 4), 4)); 
  11875.                                 $t = substr($data, ($p + 4), $n); 
  11876.                                 if ($colspace == 'DeviceGray') {  // ct===0 
  11877.                                     $trns = array($this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 0, 2), $bpc)); 
  11878.                                 } else /** $colspace=='DeviceRGB' */ {  // ct==2 
  11879.                                     $trns = array(); 
  11880.                                     $trns[0] = $this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 0, 2), $bpc); 
  11881.                                     $trns[1] = $this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 2, 2), $bpc); 
  11882.                                     $trns[2] = $this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 4, 2), $bpc); 
  11883.                                 } 
  11884.  
  11885.                                 // generate alpha channel 
  11886.                                 for ($ypx = 0; $ypx < $h; ++$ypx) { 
  11887.                                     for ($xpx = 0; $xpx < $w; ++$xpx) { 
  11888.                                         $rgb = imagecolorat($im, $xpx, $ypx); 
  11889.                                         $r = ($rgb >> 16) & 0xFF; 
  11890.                                         $g = ($rgb >> 8) & 0xFF; 
  11891.                                         $b = $rgb & 0xFF; 
  11892.                                         if ($colspace == 'DeviceGray' && $b == $trns[0]) { 
  11893.                                             $alpha = 0; 
  11894.                                         } elseif ($r == $trns[0] && $g == $trns[1] && $b == $trns[2]) { 
  11895.                                             $alpha = 0; 
  11896.                                         }  // ct==2 
  11897.                                         else { 
  11898.                                             $alpha = 255; 
  11899.                                         } 
  11900.                                         if ($alpha > 0) { 
  11901.                                             imagesetpixel($imgalpha, $xpx, $ypx, $alpha); 
  11902.                                         } 
  11903.                                     } 
  11904.                                 } 
  11905.                             } 
  11906.                         } else { 
  11907.                             // extract alpha channel 
  11908.                             for ($ypx = 0; $ypx < $h; ++$ypx) { 
  11909.                                 for ($xpx = 0; $xpx < $w; ++$xpx) { 
  11910.                                     $alpha = (imagecolorat($im, $xpx, $ypx) & 0x7F000000) >> 24; 
  11911.                                     if ($alpha < 127) { 
  11912.                                         imagesetpixel($imgalpha, $xpx, $ypx, (255 - ($alpha * 2))); 
  11913.                                     } 
  11914.                                 } 
  11915.                             } 
  11916.                         } 
  11917.  
  11918.  
  11919.                         // NB This must happen after the Alpha channel is extracted 
  11920.                         // imagegammacorrect() removes the alpha channel data in $im - (I think this is a bug in PHP) 
  11921.                         if ($gamma_correction) { 
  11922.                             imagegammacorrect($im, $gamma_correction, 2.2); 
  11923.                         } // mPDF 6 Gamma correction 
  11924.                         // create temp alpha file 
  11925.                         $tempfile_alpha = _MPDF_TEMP_PATH . '_tempMskPNG' . md5($file) . RAND(1, 10000) . '.png'; 
  11926.                         if (!is_writable(_MPDF_TEMP_PATH)) {  // mPDF 5.7.2 
  11927.                             ob_start(); 
  11928.                             $check = @imagepng($imgalpha); 
  11929.                             if (!$check) { 
  11930.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating temporary image object whilst using GD library to parse PNG image'); 
  11931.                             } 
  11932.                             imagedestroy($imgalpha); 
  11933.                             $this->_tempimg = ob_get_contents(); 
  11934.                             $this->_tempimglnk = 'var:_tempimg'; 
  11935.                             ob_end_clean(); 
  11936.                             // extract image without alpha channel 
  11937.                             $imgplain = imagecreatetruecolor($w, $h); 
  11938.                             imagealphablending($imgplain, false); // mPDF 5.7.2 
  11939.                             imagecopy($imgplain, $im, 0, 0, 0, 0, $w, $h); 
  11940.                             // create temp image file 
  11941.                             $minfo = $this->_getImage($this->_tempimglnk, false); 
  11942.                             if (!$minfo) { 
  11943.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file image object created with GD library to parse PNG image'); 
  11944.                             } 
  11945.                             ob_start(); 
  11946.                             $check = @imagepng($imgplain); 
  11947.                             if (!$check) { 
  11948.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating temporary image object whilst using GD library to parse PNG image'); 
  11949.                             } 
  11950.                             $this->_tempimg = ob_get_contents(); 
  11951.                             $this->_tempimglnk = 'var:_tempimg'; 
  11952.                             ob_end_clean(); 
  11953.                             $info = $this->_getImage($this->_tempimglnk, false); 
  11954.                             if (!$info) { 
  11955.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file image object created with GD library to parse PNG image'); 
  11956.                             } 
  11957.                             imagedestroy($imgplain); 
  11958.                             $imgmask = count($this->images) + 1; 
  11959.                             $minfo['cs'] = 'DeviceGray'; 
  11960.                             $minfo['i'] = $imgmask; 
  11961.                             $this->images[$tempfile_alpha] = $minfo; 
  11962.                         } else { 
  11963.                             $check = @imagepng($imgalpha, $tempfile_alpha); 
  11964.                             if (!$check) { 
  11965.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Failed to create temporary image file (' . $tempfile_alpha . ') parsing PNG image with alpha channel (' . $errpng . ')'); 
  11966.                             } 
  11967.                             imagedestroy($imgalpha); 
  11968.                             // extract image without alpha channel 
  11969.                             $imgplain = imagecreatetruecolor($w, $h); 
  11970.                             imagealphablending($imgplain, false); // mPDF 5.7.2 
  11971.                             imagecopy($imgplain, $im, 0, 0, 0, 0, $w, $h); 
  11972.  
  11973.                             // create temp image file 
  11974.                             $check = @imagepng($imgplain, $tempfile); 
  11975.                             if (!$check) { 
  11976.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Failed to create temporary image file (' . $tempfile . ') parsing PNG image with alpha channel (' . $errpng . ')'); 
  11977.                             } 
  11978.                             imagedestroy($imgplain); 
  11979.                             // embed mask image 
  11980.                             $minfo = $this->_getImage($tempfile_alpha, false); 
  11981.                             unlink($tempfile_alpha); 
  11982.                             if (!$minfo) { 
  11983.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file (' . $tempfile_alpha . ') created with GD library to parse PNG image'); 
  11984.                             } 
  11985.                             $imgmask = count($this->images) + 1; 
  11986.                             $minfo['cs'] = 'DeviceGray'; 
  11987.                             $minfo['i'] = $imgmask; 
  11988.                             $this->images[$tempfile_alpha] = $minfo; 
  11989.                             // embed image, masked with previously embedded mask 
  11990.                             $info = $this->_getImage($tempfile, false); 
  11991.                             unlink($tempfile); 
  11992.                             if (!$info) { 
  11993.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file (' . $tempfile . ') created with GD library to parse PNG image'); 
  11994.                             } 
  11995.                         } 
  11996.                         $info['masked'] = $imgmask; 
  11997.                         if ($ppUx) { 
  11998.                             $info['set-dpi'] = $ppUx; 
  11999.                         } 
  12000.                         $info['type'] = 'png'; 
  12001.                         if ($firsttime) { 
  12002.                             $info['i'] = count($this->images) + 1; 
  12003.                             $info['interpolation'] = $interpolation; // mPDF 6 
  12004.                             $this->images[$file] = $info; 
  12005.                         } 
  12006.  
  12007.                         return $info; 
  12008.                     } else {  // No alpha/transparency set (but cannot read directly because e.g. bit-depth != 8, interlaced etc) 
  12009.                         // ICC profile 
  12010.                         $icc = false; 
  12011.                         $p = strpos($data, 'iCCP'); 
  12012.                         if ($p && $colspace == "Indexed") { // Cannot have ICC profile and Indexed together 
  12013.                             $p += 4; 
  12014.                             $n = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, ($p - 8), 4)); 
  12015.                             $nullsep = strpos(substr($data, $p, 80), chr(0)); 
  12016.                             $icc = substr($data, ($p + $nullsep + 2), ($n - ($nullsep + 2))); 
  12017.                             $icc = @gzuncompress($icc); // Ignored if fails 
  12018.                             if ($icc) { 
  12019.                                 if (substr($icc, 36, 4) != 'acsp') { 
  12020.                                     $icc = false; 
  12021.                                 } // invalid ICC profile 
  12022.                                 else { 
  12023.                                     $input = substr($icc, 16, 4); 
  12024.                                     $output = substr($icc, 20, 4); 
  12025.                                     // Ignore Color profiles for conversion to other colorspaces e.g. CMYK/Lab 
  12026.                                     if ($input != 'RGB ' || $output != 'XYZ ') { 
  12027.                                         $icc = false; 
  12028.                                     } 
  12029.                                 } 
  12030.                             } 
  12031.                             // Convert to RGB colorspace so can use ICC Profile 
  12032.                             if ($icc) { 
  12033.                                 imagepalettetotruecolor($im); 
  12034.                                 $colspace = 'DeviceRGB'; 
  12035.                                 $channels = 3; 
  12036.                             } 
  12037.                         } 
  12038.  
  12039.                         if ($gamma_correction) { 
  12040.                             imagegammacorrect($im, $gamma_correction, 2.2); 
  12041.                         } // mPDF 6 Gamma correction 
  12042.                         imagealphablending($im, false); 
  12043.                         imagesavealpha($im, false); 
  12044.                         imageinterlace($im, false); 
  12045.                         if (!is_writable(_MPDF_TEMP_PATH)) {  // mPDF 5.7.2 
  12046.                             ob_start(); 
  12047.                             $check = @imagepng($im); 
  12048.                             if (!$check) { 
  12049.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating temporary image object whilst using GD library to parse PNG image'); 
  12050.                             } 
  12051.                             $this->_tempimg = ob_get_contents(); 
  12052.                             $this->_tempimglnk = 'var:_tempimg'; 
  12053.                             ob_end_clean(); 
  12054.                             $info = $this->_getImage($this->_tempimglnk, false); 
  12055.                             if (!$info) { 
  12056.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file image object created with GD library to parse PNG image');
