  12057.                             } 
  12058.                             imagedestroy($im); 
  12059.                         } else { 
  12060.                             $check = @imagepng($im, $tempfile); 
  12061.                             if (!$check) { 
  12062.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Failed to create temporary image file (' . $tempfile . ') parsing PNG image (' . $errpng . ')'); 
  12063.                             } 
  12064.                             imagedestroy($im); 
  12065.                             $info = $this->_getImage($tempfile, false); 
  12066.                             unlink($tempfile); 
  12067.                             if (!$info) { 
  12068.                                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file (' . $tempfile . ') created with GD library to parse PNG image'); 
  12069.                             } 
  12070.                         } 
  12071.                         if ($ppUx) { 
  12072.                             $info['set-dpi'] = $ppUx; 
  12073.                         } 
  12074.                         $info['type'] = 'png'; 
  12075.                         if ($firsttime) { 
  12076.                             $info['i'] = count($this->images) + 1; 
  12077.                             $info['interpolation'] = $interpolation; // mPDF 6 
  12078.                             if ($icc) { 
  12079.                                 $info['ch'] = $channels; 
  12080.                                 $info['icc'] = $icc; 
  12081.                             } 
  12082.                             $this->images[$file] = $info; 
  12083.                         } 
  12084.                         return $info; 
  12085.                     } 
  12086.                 } 
  12087.             } else { // PNG image with no need to convert alph channels, bpc <> 8 etc. 
  12088.                 $parms = '/DecodeParms <</Predictor 15 /Colors ' . $channels . ' /BitsPerComponent ' . $bpc . ' /Columns ' . $w . '>>'; 
  12089.                 //Scan chunks looking for palette, transparency and image data 
  12090.                 $pal = ''; 
  12091.                 $trns = ''; 
  12092.                 $pngdata = ''; 
  12093.                 $icc = false; 
  12094.                 $p = 33; 
  12095.                 do { 
  12096.                     $n = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, $p, 4)); 
  12097.                     $p += 4; 
  12098.                     $type = substr($data, $p, 4); 
  12099.                     $p += 4; 
  12100.                     if ($type == 'PLTE') { 
  12101.                         //Read palette 
  12102.                         $pal = substr($data, $p, $n); 
  12103.                         $p += $n; 
  12104.                         $p += 4; 
  12105.                     } elseif ($type == 'tRNS') { 
  12106.                         //Read transparency info 
  12107.                         $t = substr($data, $p, $n); 
  12108.                         $p += $n; 
  12109.                         if ($ct == 0) 
  12110.                             $trns = array(ord(substr($t, 1, 1))); 
  12111.                         elseif ($ct == 2) 
  12112.                             $trns = array(ord(substr($t, 1, 1)), ord(substr($t, 3, 1)), ord(substr($t, 5, 1))); 
  12113.                         else { 
  12114.                             $pos = strpos($t, chr(0)); 
  12115.                             if (is_int($pos)) 
  12116.                                 $trns = array($pos); 
  12117.                         } 
  12118.                         $p += 4; 
  12119.                     } 
  12120.                     elseif ($type == 'IDAT') { 
  12121.                         $pngdata.=substr($data, $p, $n); 
  12122.                         $p += $n; 
  12123.                         $p += 4; 
  12124.                     } elseif ($type == 'iCCP') { 
  12125.                         $nullsep = strpos(substr($data, $p, 80), chr(0)); 
  12126.                         $icc = substr($data, ($p + $nullsep + 2), ($n - ($nullsep + 2))); 
  12127.                         $icc = @gzuncompress($icc); // Ignored if fails 
  12128.                         if ($icc) { 
  12129.                             if (substr($icc, 36, 4) != 'acsp') { 
  12130.                                 $icc = false; 
  12131.                             } // invalid ICC profile 
  12132.                             else { 
  12133.                                 $input = substr($icc, 16, 4); 
  12134.                                 $output = substr($icc, 20, 4); 
  12135.                                 // Ignore Color profiles for conversion to other colorspaces e.g. CMYK/Lab 
  12136.                                 if ($input != 'RGB ' || $output != 'XYZ ') { 
  12137.                                     $icc = false; 
  12138.                                 } 
  12139.                             } 
  12140.                         } 
  12141.                         $p += $n; 
  12142.                         $p += 4; 
  12143.                     } elseif ($type == 'IEND') { 
  12144.                         break; 
  12145.                     } elseif (preg_match('/[a-zA-Z]{4}/', $type)) { 
  12146.                         $p += $n + 4; 
  12147.                     } else { 
  12148.                         return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing PNG image data'); 
  12149.                     } 
  12150.                 } while ($n); 
  12151.                 if (!$pngdata) { 
  12152.                     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing PNG image data - no IDAT data found'); 
  12153.                 } 
  12154.                 if ($colspace == 'Indexed' && empty($pal)) { 
  12155.                     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing PNG image data - missing colour palette'); 
  12156.                 } 
  12157.  
  12158.                 if ($colspace == 'Indexed' && $icc) { 
  12159.                     $icc = false; 
  12160.                 } // mPDF 6 cannot have ICC profile and Indexed in a PDF document as both use the colorspace tag. 
  12161.  
  12162.                 $info = array('w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'cs' => $colspace, 'bpc' => $bpc, 'f' => 'FlateDecode', 'parms' => $parms, 'pal' => $pal, 'trns' => $trns, 'data' => $pngdata, 'ch' => $channels, 'icc' => $icc); 
  12163.                 $info['type'] = 'png'; 
  12164.                 if ($ppUx) { 
  12165.                     $info['set-dpi'] = $ppUx; 
  12166.                 } 
  12167.             } 
  12168.  
  12169.             if (!$info) { 
  12170.                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing or converting PNG image'); 
  12171.             } 
  12172.  
  12173.             if ($firsttime) { 
  12174.                 $info['i'] = count($this->images) + 1; 
  12175.                 $info['interpolation'] = $interpolation; // mPDF 6 
  12176.                 $this->images[$file] = $info; 
  12177.             } 
  12178.             return $info; 
  12179.         } 
  12180.  
  12181.         // GIF 
  12182.         elseif ($type == 'gif') { 
  12183.             if (function_exists('gd_info')) { 
  12184.                 $gd = gd_info(); 
  12185.             } else { 
  12186.                 $gd = array(); 
  12187.             } 
  12188.             if (isset($gd['GIF Read Support']) && $gd['GIF Read Support']) { 
  12189.                 $im = @imagecreatefromstring($data); 
  12190.                 if ($im) { 
  12191.                     $tempfile = _MPDF_TEMP_PATH . '_tempImgPNG' . md5($file) . RAND(1, 10000) . '.png'; 
  12192.                     imagealphablending($im, false); 
  12193.                     imagesavealpha($im, false); 
  12194.                     imageinterlace($im, false); 
  12195.                     if (!is_writable($tempfile)) { 
  12196.                         ob_start(); 
  12197.                         $check = @imagepng($im); 
  12198.                         if (!$check) { 
  12199.                             return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating temporary image object whilst using GD library to parse GIF image'); 
  12200.                         } 
  12201.                         $this->_tempimg = ob_get_contents(); 
  12202.                         $this->_tempimglnk = 'var:_tempimg'; 
  12203.                         ob_end_clean(); 
  12204.                         $info = $this->_getImage($this->_tempimglnk, false); 
  12205.                         if (!$info) { 
  12206.                             return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file image object created with GD library to parse GIF image'); 
  12207.                         } 
  12208.                         imagedestroy($im); 
  12209.                     } else { 
  12210.                         $check = @imagepng($im, $tempfile); 
  12211.                         if (!$check) { 
  12212.                             return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating temporary file (' . $tempfile . ') whilst using GD library to parse GIF image'); 
  12213.                         } 
  12214.                         $info = $this->_getImage($tempfile, false); 
  12215.                         if (!$info) { 
  12216.                             return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file (' . $tempfile . ') created with GD library to parse GIF image'); 
  12217.                         } 
  12218.                         imagedestroy($im); 
  12219.                         unlink($tempfile); 
  12220.                     } 
  12221.                     $info['type'] = 'gif'; 
  12222.                     if ($firsttime) { 
  12223.                         $info['i'] = count($this->images) + 1; 
  12224.                         $info['interpolation'] = $interpolation; // mPDF 6 
  12225.                         $this->images[$file] = $info; 
  12226.                     } 
  12227.                     return $info; 
  12228.                 } else { 
  12229.                     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating GD image file from GIF image'); 
  12230.                 } 
  12231.             } 
  12232.  
  12233.             if (!class_exists('gif', false)) { 
  12234.                 include_once(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/gif.php'); 
  12235.             } 
  12236.             $gif = new CGIF(); 
  12237.  
  12238.             $h = 0; 
  12239.             $w = 0; 
  12240.             $gif->loadFile($data, 0); 
  12241.  
  12242.             if (isset($gif->m_img->m_gih->m_bLocalClr) && $gif->m_img->m_gih->m_bLocalClr) { 
  12243.                 $nColors = $gif->m_img->m_gih->m_nTableSize; 
  12244.                 $pal = $gif->m_img->m_gih->m_colorTable->toString(); 
  12245.                 if ((isset($bgColor)) and $bgColor != -1) { // mPDF 5.7.3 
  12246.                     $bgColor = $gif->m_img->m_gih->m_colorTable->colorIndex($bgColor); 
  12247.                 } 
  12248.                 $colspace = 'Indexed'; 
  12249.             } elseif (isset($gif->m_gfh->m_bGlobalClr) && $gif->m_gfh->m_bGlobalClr) { 
  12250.                 $nColors = $gif->m_gfh->m_nTableSize; 
  12251.                 $pal = $gif->m_gfh->m_colorTable->toString(); 
  12252.                 if ((isset($bgColor)) and $bgColor != -1) { 
  12253.                     $bgColor = $gif->m_gfh->m_colorTable->colorIndex($bgColor); 
  12254.                 } 
  12255.                 $colspace = 'Indexed'; 
  12256.             } else { 
  12257.                 $nColors = 0; 
  12258.                 $bgColor = -1; 
  12259.                 $colspace = 'DeviceGray'; 
  12260.                 $pal = ''; 
  12261.             } 
  12262.  
  12263.             $trns = ''; 
  12264.             if (isset($gif->m_img->m_bTrans) && $gif->m_img->m_bTrans && ($nColors > 0)) { 
  12265.                 $trns = array($gif->m_img->m_nTrans); 
  12266.             } 
  12267.             $gifdata = $gif->m_img->m_data; 
  12268.             $w = $gif->m_gfh->m_nWidth; 
  12269.             $h = $gif->m_gfh->m_nHeight; 
  12270.             $gif->ClearData(); 
  12271.  
  12272.             if ($colspace == 'Indexed' and empty($pal)) { 
  12273.                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing GIF image - missing colour palette'); 
  12274.             } 
  12275.             if ($this->compress) { 
  12276.                 $gifdata = gzcompress($gifdata); 
  12277.                 $info = array('w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'cs' => $colspace, 'bpc' => 8, 'f' => 'FlateDecode', 'pal' => $pal, 'trns' => $trns, 'data' => $gifdata); 
  12278.             } else { 
  12279.                 $info = array('w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'cs' => $colspace, 'bpc' => 8, 'pal' => $pal, 'trns' => $trns, 'data' => $gifdata); 
  12280.             } 
  12281.             $info['type'] = 'gif'; 
  12282.             if ($firsttime) { 
  12283.                 $info['i'] = count($this->images) + 1; 
  12284.                 $info['interpolation'] = $interpolation; // mPDF 6 
  12285.                 $this->images[$file] = $info; 
  12286.             } 
  12287.             return $info; 
  12288.         } 
  12289.  
  12290.         /** -- IMAGES-BMP -- */ 
  12291.         // BMP (Windows Bitmap) 
  12292.         elseif ($type == 'bmp') { 
  12293.             if (!class_exists('bmp', false)) { 
  12294.                 include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/bmp.php'); 
  12295.             } 
  12296.             if (empty($this->bmp)) { 
  12297.                 $this->bmp = new bmp($this); 
  12298.             } 
  12299.             $info = $this->bmp->_getBMPimage($data, $file); 
  12300.             if (isset($info['error'])) { 
  12301.                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, $info['error']); 
  12302.             } 
  12303.             if ($firsttime) { 
  12304.                 $info['i'] = count($this->images) + 1; 
  12305.                 $info['interpolation'] = $interpolation; // mPDF 6 
  12306.                 $this->images[$file] = $info; 
  12307.             } 
  12308.             return $info; 
  12309.         } 
  12310.         /** -- END IMAGES-BMP -- */ 
  12311.         /** -- IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  12312.         // WMF 
  12313.         elseif ($type == 'wmf') { 
  12314.             if (!class_exists('wmf', false)) { 
  12315.                 include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/wmf.php'); 
  12316.             } 
  12317.             if (empty($this->wmf)) { 
  12318.                 $this->wmf = new wmf($this); 
  12319.             } 
  12320.             $wmfres = $this->wmf->_getWMFimage($data); 
  12321.             if ($wmfres[0] == 0) { 
  12322.                 if ($wmfres[1]) { 
  12323.                     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, $wmfres[1]); 
  12324.                 } 
  12325.                 return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing WMF image'); 
  12326.             } 
  12327.             $info = array('x' => $wmfres[2][0], 'y' => $wmfres[2][1], 'w' => $wmfres[3][0], 'h' => $wmfres[3][1], 'data' => $wmfres[1]); 
  12328.             $info['i'] = count($this->formobjects) + 1; 
  12329.             $info['type'] = 'wmf'; 
  12330.             $this->formobjects[$file] = $info; 
  12331.             return $info; 
  12332.         } 
  12333.         /** -- END IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  12334.  
  12335.         // UNKNOWN TYPE - try GD imagecreatefromstring 
  12336.         else { 
  12337.             if (function_exists('gd_info')) { 
  12338.                 $gd = gd_info(); 
  12339.             } else { 
  12340.                 $gd = array(); 
  12341.             } 
  12342.             if (isset($gd['PNG Support']) && $gd['PNG Support']) { 
  12343.                 $im = @imagecreatefromstring($data); 
  12344.                 if (!$im) { 
  12345.                     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing image file - image type not recognised, and not supported by GD imagecreate'); 
  12346.                 } 
  12347.                 $tempfile = _MPDF_TEMP_PATH . '_tempImgPNG' . md5($file) . RAND(1, 10000) . '.png'; 
  12348.                 imagealphablending($im, false); 
  12349.                 imagesavealpha($im, false); 
  12350.                 imageinterlace($im, false); 
  12351.                 $check = @imagepng($im, $tempfile); 
  12352.                 if (!$check) { 
  12353.                     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating temporary file (' . $tempfile . ') whilst using GD library to parse unknown image type'); 
  12354.                 } 
  12355.                 $info = $this->_getImage($tempfile, false); 
  12356.                 imagedestroy($im); 
  12357.                 unlink($tempfile); 
  12358.                 if (!$info) { 
  12359.                     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file (' . $tempfile . ') created with GD library to parse unknown image type'); 
  12360.                 } 
  12361.                 $info['type'] = 'png'; 
  12362.                 if ($firsttime) { 
  12363.                     $info['i'] = count($this->images) + 1; 
  12364.                     $info['interpolation'] = $interpolation; // mPDF 6 
  12365.                     $this->images[$file] = $info; 
  12366.                 } 
  12367.                 return $info; 
  12368.             } 
  12369.         } 
  12370.  
  12371.         return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing image file - image type not recognised'); 
  12372.     } 
  12373.  
  12374.     //============================================================== 
  12375.     function _convImage(&$data, $colspace, $targetcs, $w, $h, $dpi, $mask, $gamma_correction = false, $pngcolortype = false) 
  12376.     { // mPDF 5.7.2 Gamma correction 
  12377.         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  12378.             $mask = false; 
  12379.         } 
  12380.         $im = @imagecreatefromstring($data); 
  12381.         $info = array(); 
  12382.         $bpc = ord(substr($data, 24, 1)); 
  12383.         if ($im) { 
  12384.  
  12385.             $imgdata = ''; 
  12386.             $mimgdata = ''; 
  12387.             $minfo = array(); 
  12388.  
  12389.             // mPDF 6 Gamma correction 
  12390.             // Need to extract alpha channel info before imagegammacorrect (which loses the data) 
  12391.             if ($mask) { // i.e. $pngalpha for PNG 
  12392.                 // mPDF 6 
  12393.                 if ($colspace == 'Indexed') { // generate Alpha channel values from tRNS - only from PNG 
  12394.                     //Read transparency info 
  12395.                     $transparency = ''; 
  12396.                     $p = strpos($data, 'tRNS'); 
  12397.                     if ($p) { 
  12398.                         $n = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, ($p - 4), 4)); 
  12399.                         $transparency = substr($data, ($p + 4), $n); 
  12400.                         // ord($transparency{$index}) = the alpha value for that index 
  12401.                         // generate alpha channel 
  12402.                         for ($ypx = 0; $ypx < $h; ++$ypx) { 
  12403.                             for ($xpx = 0; $xpx < $w; ++$xpx) { 
  12404.                                 $colorindex = imagecolorat($im, $xpx, $ypx); 
  12405.                                 if ($colorindex >= $n) { 
  12406.                                     $alpha = 255; 
  12407.                                 } else { 
  12408.                                     $alpha = ord($transparency{$colorindex}); 
  12409.                                 } // 0-255 
  12410.                                 $mimgdata .= chr($alpha); 
  12411.                             } 
  12412.                         } 
  12413.                     } 
  12414.                 } elseif ($pngcolortype === 0 || $pngcolortype == 2) { // generate Alpha channel values from tRNS 
  12415.                     // Get transparency as array of RGB 
  12416.                     $p = strpos($data, 'tRNS'); 
  12417.                     if ($p) { 
  12418.                         $trns = ''; 
  12419.                         $n = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, ($p - 4), 4)); 
  12420.                         $t = substr($data, ($p + 4), $n); 
  12421.                         if ($colspace == 'DeviceGray') {  // ct===0 
  12422.                             $trns = array($this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 0, 2), $bpc)); 
  12423.                         } else /** $colspace=='DeviceRGB' */ {  // ct==2 
  12424.                             $trns = array(); 
  12425.                             $trns[0] = $this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 0, 2), $bpc); 
  12426.                             $trns[1] = $this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 2, 2), $bpc); 
  12427.                             $trns[2] = $this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 4, 2), $bpc); 
  12428.                         } 
  12429.  
  12430.                         // generate alpha channel 
  12431.                         for ($ypx = 0; $ypx < $h; ++$ypx) { 
  12432.                             for ($xpx = 0; $xpx < $w; ++$xpx) { 
  12433.                                 $rgb = imagecolorat($im, $xpx, $ypx); 
  12434.                                 $r = ($rgb >> 16) & 0xFF; 
  12435.                                 $g = ($rgb >> 8) & 0xFF; 
  12436.                                 $b = $rgb & 0xFF; 
  12437.                                 if ($colspace == 'DeviceGray' && $b == $trns[0]) { 
  12438.                                     $alpha = 0; 
  12439.                                 } elseif ($r == $trns[0] && $g == $trns[1] && $b == $trns[2]) { 
  12440.                                     $alpha = 0; 
  12441.                                 }  // ct==2 
  12442.                                 else { 
  12443.                                     $alpha = 255; 
  12444.                                 } 
  12445.                                 $mimgdata .= chr($alpha); 
  12446.                             } 
  12447.                         } 
  12448.                     } 
  12449.                 } else { 
  12450.                     for ($i = 0; $i < $h; $i++) { 
  12451.                         for ($j = 0; $j < $w; $j++) { 
  12452.                             $rgb = imagecolorat($im, $j, $i); 
  12453.                             $alpha = ($rgb & 0x7F000000) >> 24; 
  12454.                             if ($alpha < 127) { 
  12455.                                 $mimgdata .= chr(255 - ($alpha * 2)); 
  12456.                             } else { 
  12457.                                 $mimgdata .= chr(0); 
  12458.                             } 
  12459.                         } 
  12460.                     } 
  12461.                 } 
  12462.             } 
  12463.  
  12464.             if ($gamma_correction) { 
  12465.                 imagegammacorrect($im, $gamma_correction, 2.2); 
  12466.             } // mPDF 6 Gamma correction 
  12467.             //Read transparency info 
  12468.             $trns = array(); 
  12469.             $trnsrgb = false; 
  12470.             if (!$this->PDFA && !$this->PDFX && !$mask) {  // mPDF 6 added NOT mask 
  12471.                 $p = strpos($data, 'tRNS'); 
  12472.                 if ($p) { 
  12473.                     $n = $this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data, ($p - 4), 4)); 
  12474.                     $t = substr($data, ($p + 4), $n); 
  12475.                     if ($colspace == 'DeviceGray') {  // ct===0 
  12476.                         $trns = array($this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 0, 2), $bpc)); 
  12477.                     } elseif ($colspace == 'DeviceRGB') {  // ct==2 
  12478.                         $trns[0] = $this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 0, 2), $bpc); 
  12479.                         $trns[1] = $this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 2, 2), $bpc); 
  12480.                         $trns[2] = $this->_trnsvalue(substr($t, 4, 2), $bpc); 
  12481.                         $trnsrgb = $trns; 
  12482.                         if ($targetcs == 'DeviceCMYK') { 
  12483.                             $col = $this->rgb2cmyk(array(3, $trns[0], $trns[1], $trns[2])); 
  12484.                             $c1 = intval($col[1] * 2.55); 
  12485.                             $c2 = intval($col[2] * 2.55); 
  12486.                             $c3 = intval($col[3] * 2.55); 
  12487.                             $c4 = intval($col[4] * 2.55); 
  12488.                             $trns = array($c1, $c2, $c3, $c4); 
  12489.                         } elseif ($targetcs == 'DeviceGray') { 
  12490.                             $c = intval(($trns[0] * .21) + ($trns[1] * .71) + ($trns[2] * .07)); 
  12491.                             $trns = array($c); 
  12492.                         } 
  12493.                     } else { // Indexed 
  12494.                         $pos = strpos($t, chr(0)); 
  12495.                         if (is_int($pos)) { 
  12496.                             $pal = imagecolorsforindex($im, $pos); 
  12497.                             $r = $pal['red']; 
  12498.                             $g = $pal['green']; 
  12499.                             $b = $pal['blue']; 
  12500.                             $trns = array($r, $g, $b); // **** 
  12501.                             $trnsrgb = $trns; 
  12502.                             if ($targetcs == 'DeviceCMYK') { 
  12503.                                 $col = $this->rgb2cmyk(array(3, $r, $g, $b)); 
  12504.                                 $c1 = intval($col[1] * 2.55); 
  12505.                                 $c2 = intval($col[2] * 2.55); 
  12506.                                 $c3 = intval($col[3] * 2.55); 
  12507.                                 $c4 = intval($col[4] * 2.55); 
  12508.                                 $trns = array($c1, $c2, $c3, $c4); 
  12509.                             } elseif ($targetcs == 'DeviceGray') { 
  12510.                                 $c = intval(($r * .21) + ($g * .71) + ($b * .07)); 
  12511.                                 $trns = array($c); 
  12512.                             } 
  12513.                         } 
  12514.                     } 
  12515.                 } 
  12516.             } 
  12517.             for ($i = 0; $i < $h; $i++) { 
  12518.                 for ($j = 0; $j < $w; $j++) { 
  12519.                     $rgb = imagecolorat($im, $j, $i); 
  12520.                     $r = ($rgb >> 16) & 0xFF; 
  12521.                     $g = ($rgb >> 8) & 0xFF; 
  12522.                     $b = $rgb & 0xFF; 
  12523.                     if ($colspace == 'Indexed') { 
  12524.                         $pal = imagecolorsforindex($im, $rgb); 
  12525.                         $r = $pal['red']; 
  12526.                         $g = $pal['green']; 
  12527.                         $b = $pal['blue']; 
  12528.                     } 
  12529.  
  12530.                     if ($targetcs == 'DeviceCMYK') { 
  12531.                         $col = $this->rgb2cmyk(array(3, $r, $g, $b)); 
  12532.                         $c1 = intval($col[1] * 2.55); 
  12533.                         $c2 = intval($col[2] * 2.55); 
  12534.                         $c3 = intval($col[3] * 2.55); 
  12535.                         $c4 = intval($col[4] * 2.55); 
  12536.                         if ($trnsrgb) { 
  12537.                             // original pixel was not set as transparent but processed color does match 
  12538.                             if ($trnsrgb != array($r, $g, $b) && $trns == array($c1, $c2, $c3, $c4)) { 
  12539.                                 if ($c4 == 0) { 
  12540.                                     $c4 = 1; 
  12541.                                 } else { 
  12542.                                     $c4--; 
  12543.                                 } 
  12544.                             } 
  12545.                         } 
  12546.                         $imgdata .= chr($c1) . chr($c2) . chr($c3) . chr($c4); 
  12547.                     } elseif ($targetcs == 'DeviceGray') { 
  12548.                         $c = intval(($r * .21) + ($g * .71) + ($b * .07)); 
  12549.                         if ($trnsrgb) { 
  12550.                             // original pixel was not set as transparent but processed color does match 
  12551.                             if ($trnsrgb != array($r, $g, $b) && $trns == array($c)) { 
  12552.                                 if ($c == 0) { 
  12553.                                     $c = 1; 
  12554.                                 } else { 
  12555.                                     $c--; 
  12556.                                 } 
  12557.                             } 
  12558.                         } 
  12559.                         $imgdata .= chr($c); 
  12560.                     } elseif ($targetcs == 'DeviceRGB') { 
  12561.                         $imgdata .= chr($r) . chr($g) . chr($b); 
  12562.                     } 
  12563.                 } 
  12564.             } 
  12565.  
  12566.             if ($targetcs == 'DeviceGray') { 
  12567.                 $ncols = 1; 
  12568.             } elseif ($targetcs == 'DeviceRGB') { 
  12569.                 $ncols = 3; 
  12570.             } elseif ($targetcs == 'DeviceCMYK') { 
  12571.                 $ncols = 4; 
  12572.             } 
  12573.  
  12574.             $imgdata = gzcompress($imgdata); 
  12575.             $info = array('w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'cs' => $targetcs, 'bpc' => 8, 'f' => 'FlateDecode', 'data' => $imgdata, 'type' => 'png',  
  12576.                 'parms' => '/DecodeParms <</Colors ' . $ncols . ' /BitsPerComponent 8 /Columns ' . $w . '>>'); 
  12577.             if ($dpi) { 
  12578.                 $info['set-dpi'] = $dpi; 
  12579.             } 
  12580.             if ($mask) { 
  12581.                 $mimgdata = gzcompress($mimgdata); 
  12582.                 $minfo = array('w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'cs' => 'DeviceGray', 'bpc' => 8, 'f' => 'FlateDecode', 'data' => $mimgdata, 'type' => 'png',  
  12583.                     'parms' => '/DecodeParms <</Colors ' . $ncols . ' /BitsPerComponent 8 /Columns ' . $w . '>>'); 
  12584.                 if ($dpi) { 
  12585.                     $minfo['set-dpi'] = $dpi; 
  12586.                 } 
  12587.                 $tempfile = '_tempImgPNG' . md5($data) . RAND(1, 10000) . '.png'; 
  12588.                 $imgmask = count($this->images) + 1; 
  12589.                 $minfo['i'] = $imgmask; 
  12590.                 $this->images[$tempfile] = $minfo; 
  12591.                 $info['masked'] = $imgmask; 
  12592.             } elseif ($trns) { 
  12593.                 $info['trns'] = $trns; 
  12594.             } 
  12595.             imagedestroy($im); 
  12596.         } 
  12597.         return $info; 
  12598.     } 
  12599.  
  12600.     function _trnsvalue($s, $bpc) 
  12601.     { 
  12602.         // Corrects 2-byte integer to 8-bit depth value 
  12603.         // If original image is bpc != 8, tRNS will be in this bpc 
  12604.         // $im from imagecreatefromstring will always be in bpc=8 
  12605.         // So why do we only need to correct 16-bit tRNS and NOT 2 or 4-bit??? 
  12606.         $n = $this->_twobytes2int($s); 
  12607.         if ($bpc == 16) { 
  12608.             $n = ($n >> 8); 
  12609.         } 
  12610.         //elseif ($bpc==4) { $n = ($n << 2); } 
  12611.         //elseif ($bpc==2) { $n = ($n << 4); } 
  12612.         return $n; 
  12613.     } 
  12614.  
  12615.     function _fourbytes2int($s) 
  12616.     { 
  12617.         //Read a 4-byte integer from string 
  12618.         return (ord($s[0]) << 24) + (ord($s[1]) << 16) + (ord($s[2]) << 8) + ord($s[3]); 
  12619.     } 
  12620.  
  12621.     function _twobytes2int($s) 
  12622.     { // equivalent to _get_ushort 
  12623.         //Read a 2-byte integer from string 
  12624.         return (ord(substr($s, 0, 1)) << 8) + ord(substr($s, 1, 1)); 
  12625.     } 
  12626.  
  12627.     function _jpgHeaderFromString(&$data) 
  12628.     { 
  12629.         $p = 4; 
  12630.         $p += $this->_twobytes2int(substr($data, $p, 2)); // Length of initial marker block 
  12631.         $marker = substr($data, $p, 2); 
  12632.         while ($marker != chr(255) . chr(192) && $marker != chr(255) . chr(194) && $p < strlen($data)) { 
  12633.             // Start of frame marker (FFC0) or (FFC2) mPDF 4.4.004 
  12634.             $p += ($this->_twobytes2int(substr($data, $p + 2, 2))) + 2; // Length of marker block 
  12635.             $marker = substr($data, $p, 2); 
  12636.         } 
  12637.         if ($marker != chr(255) . chr(192) && $marker != chr(255) . chr(194)) { 
  12638.             return false; 
  12639.         } 
  12640.         return substr($data, $p + 2, 10); 
  12641.     } 
  12642.  
  12643.     function _jpgDataFromHeader($hdr) 
  12644.     { 
  12645.         $bpc = ord(substr($hdr, 2, 1)); 
  12646.         if (!$bpc) { 
  12647.             $bpc = 8; 
  12648.         } 
  12649.         $h = $this->_twobytes2int(substr($hdr, 3, 2)); 
  12650.         $w = $this->_twobytes2int(substr($hdr, 5, 2)); 
  12651.         $channels = ord(substr($hdr, 7, 1)); 
  12652.         if ($channels == 3) { 
  12653.             $colspace = 'DeviceRGB'; 
  12654.         } elseif ($channels == 4) { 
  12655.             $colspace = 'DeviceCMYK'; 
  12656.         } else { 
  12657.             $colspace = 'DeviceGray'; 
  12658.         } 
  12659.         return array($w, $h, $colspace, $bpc, $channels); 
  12660.     } 
  12661.  
  12662.     function file_get_contents_by_curl($url, &$data) 
  12663.     { 
  12664.         $timeout = 5; 
  12665.         $ch = curl_init($url); 
  12666.         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:13.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/13.0.1'); // mPDF 5.7.4 
  12667.         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0); 
  12668.         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_NOBODY, 0); 
  12669.         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1); 
  12670.         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, $timeout); 
  12671.         $data = curl_exec($ch); 
  12672.         curl_close($ch); 
  12673.     } 
  12674.  
  12675.     function file_get_contents_by_socket($url, &$data) 
  12676.     { 
  12677.         // mPDF 5.7.3 
  12678.         $timeout = 1; 
  12679.         $p = parse_url($url); 
  12680.         $file = $p['path']; 
  12681.         if ($p['scheme'] == 'https') { 
  12682.             $prefix = 'ssl://'; 
  12683.             $port = ($p['port'] ? $p['port'] : 443); 
  12684.         } else { 
  12685.             $prefix = ''; 
  12686.             $port = ($p['port'] ? $p['port'] : 80); 
  12687.         } 
  12688.         if ($p['query']) { 
  12689.             $file .= '?' . $p['query']; 
  12690.         } 
  12691.         if (!($fh = @fsockopen($prefix . $p['host'], $port, $errno, $errstr, $timeout))) { 
  12692.             return false; 
  12693.         } 
  12694.  
  12695.         $getstring = "GET " . $file . " HTTP/1.0 \r\n" . 
  12696.             "Host: " . $p['host'] . " \r\n" . 
  12697.             "Connection: close\r\n\r\n"; 
  12698.         fwrite($fh, $getstring); 
  12699.         // Get rid of HTTP header 
  12700.         $s = fgets($fh, 1024); 
  12701.         if (!$s) { 
  12702.             return false; 
  12703.         } 
  12704.         $httpheader .= $s; 
  12705.         while (!feof($fh)) { 
  12706.             $s = fgets($fh, 1024); 
  12707.             if ($s == "\r\n") { 
  12708.                 break; 
  12709.             } 
  12710.         } 
  12711.         $data = ''; 
  12712.         while (!feof($fh)) { 
  12713.             $data .= fgets($fh, 1024); 
  12714.         } 
  12715.         fclose($fh); 
  12716.     } 
  12717.  
  12718.     //============================================================== 
  12719.  
  12720.     function _imageTypeFromString(&$data) 
  12721.     { 
  12722.         $type = ''; 
  12723.         if (substr($data, 6, 4) == 'JFIF' || substr($data, 6, 4) == 'Exif' || substr($data, 0, 2) == chr(255) . chr(216)) { // 0xFF 0xD8    // mpDF 5.7.2 
  12724.             $type = 'jpeg'; 
  12725.         } elseif (substr($data, 0, 6) == "GIF87a" || substr($data, 0, 6) == "GIF89a") { 
  12726.             $type = 'gif'; 
  12727.         } elseif (substr($data, 0, 8) == chr(137) . 'PNG' . chr(13) . chr(10) . chr(26) . chr(10)) { 
  12728.             $type = 'png'; 
  12729.         } 
  12730.         /** -- IMAGES-WMF -- */ elseif (substr($data, 0, 4) == chr(215) . chr(205) . chr(198) . chr(154)) { 
  12731.             $type = 'wmf'; 
  12732.         } 
  12733.         /** -- END IMAGES-WMF -- */ elseif (preg_match('/<svg.*<\/svg>/is', $data)) { 
  12734.             $type = 'svg'; 
  12735.         } 
  12736.         // BMP images 
  12737.         elseif (substr($data, 0, 2) == "BM") { 
  12738.             $type = 'bmp'; 
  12739.         } 
  12740.         return $type; 
  12741.     } 
  12742.  
  12743.     //============================================================== 
  12744.     // Moved outside WMF as also needed for SVG 
  12745.     function _putformobjects() 
  12746.     { 
  12747.         reset($this->formobjects); 
  12748.         while (list($file, $info) = each($this->formobjects)) { 
  12749.             $this->_newobj(); 
  12750.             $this->formobjects[$file]['n'] = $this->n; 
  12751.             $this->_out('<</Type /XObject'); 
  12752.             $this->_out('/Subtype /Form'); 
  12753.             $this->_out('/Group ' . ($this->n + 1) . ' 0 R'); 
  12754.             $this->_out('/BBox [' . $info['x'] . ' ' . $info['y'] . ' ' . ($info['w'] + $info['x']) . ' ' . ($info['h'] + $info['y']) . ']'); 
  12755.             if ($this->compress) 
  12756.                 $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode'); 
  12757.             $data = ($this->compress) ? gzcompress($info['data']) : $info['data']; 
  12758.             $this->_out('/Length ' . strlen($data) . '>>'); 
  12759.             $this->_putstream($data); 
  12760.             unset($this->formobjects[$file]['data']); 
  12761.             $this->_out('endobj'); 
  12762.             // Required for SVG transparency (opacity) to work 
  12763.             $this->_newobj(); 
  12764.             $this->_out('<</Type /Group'); 
  12765.             $this->_out('/S /Transparency'); 
  12766.             $this->_out('>>'); 
  12767.             $this->_out('endobj'); 
  12768.         } 
  12769.     } 
  12770.  
  12771.     function _freadint($f) 
  12772.     { 
  12773.         //Read a 4-byte integer from file 
  12774.         $i = ord(fread($f, 1)) << 24; 
  12775.         $i+=ord(fread($f, 1)) << 16; 
  12776.         $i+=ord(fread($f, 1)) << 8; 
  12777.         $i+=ord(fread($f, 1)); 
  12778.         return $i; 
  12779.     } 
  12780.  
  12781.     function _UTF16BEtextstring($s) 
  12782.     { 
  12783.         $s = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($s, true); 
  12784.         /** -- ENCRYPTION -- */ 
  12785.         if ($this->encrypted) { 
  12786.             $s = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($this->_current_obj_id), $s); 
  12787.         } 
  12788.         /** -- END ENCRYPTION -- */ 
  12789.         return '(' . $this->_escape($s) . ')'; 
  12790.     } 
  12791.  
  12792.     function _textstring($s) 
  12793.     { 
  12794.         /** -- ENCRYPTION -- */ 
  12795.         if ($this->encrypted) { 
  12796.             $s = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($this->_current_obj_id), $s); 
  12797.         } 
  12798.         /** -- END ENCRYPTION -- */ 
  12799.         return '(' . $this->_escape($s) . ')'; 
  12800.     } 
  12801.  
  12802.     function _escape($s) 
  12803.     { 
  12804.         // the chr(13) substitution fixes the Bugs item #1421290. 
  12805.         return strtr($s, array(')' => '\\)', '(' => '\\(', '\\' => '\\\\', chr(13) => '\r')); 
  12806.     } 
  12807.  
  12808.     function _putstream($s) 
  12809.     { 
  12810.         /** -- ENCRYPTION -- */ 
  12811.         if ($this->encrypted) { 
  12812.             $s = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($this->_current_obj_id), $s); 
  12813.         } 
  12814.         /** -- END ENCRYPTION -- */ 
  12815.         $this->_out('stream'); 
  12816.         $this->_out($s); 
  12817.         $this->_out('endstream'); 
  12818.     } 
  12819.  
  12820.     function _out($s, $ln = true) 
  12821.     { 
  12822.         if ($this->state == 2) { 
  12823.             if ($this->bufferoutput) { 
  12824.                 $this->headerbuffer.= $s . "\n"; 
  12825.             } 
  12826.             /** -- COLUMNS -- */ elseif (($this->ColActive) && !$this->processingHeader && !$this->processingFooter) { 
  12827.                 // Captures everything in buffer for columns; Almost everything is sent from fn. Cell() except: 
  12828.                 // Images sent from Image() or 
  12829.                 // later sent as _out($textto) in printbuffer 
  12830.                 // Line() 
  12831.                 if (preg_match('/q \d+\.\d\d+ 0 0 (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ cm \/(I|FO)\d+ Do Q/', $s, $m)) { // Image data 
  12832.                     $h = ($m[1] / _MPDFK); 
  12833.                     // Update/overwrite the lowest bottom of printing y value for a column 
  12834.                     $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y + $h; 
  12835.                 } 
  12836.                 /** -- TABLES -- */ elseif (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ ([\-]{0, 1}\d+\.\d\d+) re/', $s, $m) && $this->tableLevel > 0) { // Rect in table 
  12837.                     $h = ($m[1] / _MPDFK); 
  12838.                     // Update/overwrite the lowest bottom of printing y value for a column 
  12839.                     $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] = max($this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'], ($this->y + $h)); 
  12840.                 } 
  12841.                 /** -- END TABLES -- */ else {  // Td Text Set in Cell() 
  12842.                     if (isset($this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'])) { 
  12843.                         $h = $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] - $this->y; 
  12844.                     } else { 
  12845.                         $h = 0; 
  12846.                     } 
  12847.                 } 
  12848.                 if ($h < 0) { 
  12849.                     $h = -$h; 
  12850.                 } 
  12851.                 $this->columnbuffer[] = array( 
  12852.                     's' => $s, // Text string to output 
  12853.                     'col' => $this->CurrCol, // Column when printed 
  12854.                     'x' => $this->x, // x when printed 
  12855.                     'y' => $this->y, // this->y when printed (after column break) 
  12856.                     'h' => $h        // actual y at bottom when printed = y+h 
  12857.  ); 
  12858.             } 
  12859.             /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  12860.             /** -- TABLES -- */ elseif ($this->table_rotate && !$this->processingHeader && !$this->processingFooter) { 
  12861.                 // Captures eveything in buffer for rotated tables; 
  12862.                 $this->tablebuffer .= $s . "\n"; 
  12863.             } 
  12864.             /** -- END TABLES -- */ elseif ($this->kwt && !$this->processingHeader && !$this->processingFooter) { 
  12865.                 // Captures eveything in buffer for keep-with-table (h1-6); 
  12866.                 $this->kwt_buffer[] = array( 
  12867.                     's' => $s, // Text string to output 
  12868.                     'x' => $this->x, // x when printed 
  12869.                     'y' => $this->y, // y when printed 
  12870.  ); 
  12871.             } elseif (($this->keep_block_together) && !$this->processingHeader && !$this->processingFooter) { 
  12872.                 // do nothing 
  12873.             } else { 
  12874.                 $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s . ($ln == true ? "\n" : ''); 
  12875.             } 
  12876.         } else { 
  12877.             $this->buffer .= $s . ($ln == true ? "\n" : ''); 
  12878.         } 
  12879.     } 
  12880.  
  12881.     /** -- WATERMARK -- */ 
  12882.  
  12883.     // add a watermark 
  12884.     function watermark($texte, $angle = 45, $fontsize = 96, $alpha = 0.2) 
  12885.     { 
  12886.         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  12887.             throw new MpdfException('PDFA and PDFX do not permit transparency, so mPDF does not allow Watermarks!'); 
  12888.         } 
  12889.         if (!$this->watermark_font) { 
  12890.             $this->watermark_font = $this->default_font; 
  12891.         } 
  12892.         $this->SetFont($this->watermark_font, "B", $fontsize, false); // Don't output 
  12893.         $texte = $this->purify_utf8_text($texte); 
  12894.         if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) { 
  12895.             $texte = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($texte); 
  12896.         } 
  12897.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  12898.             $texte = mb_convert_encoding($texte, $this->mb_enc, 'UTF-8'); 
  12899.         } 
  12900.  
  12901.         // DIRECTIONALITY 
  12902.         if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregRTLchars . "])/u", $texte)) { 
  12903.             $this->biDirectional = true; 
  12904.         } // *OTL* 
  12905.  
  12906.         $textvar = 0; 
  12907.         $save_OTLtags = $this->OTLtags; 
  12908.         $this->OTLtags = array(); 
  12909.         if ($this->useKerning) { 
  12910.             if ($this->CurrentFont['haskernGPOS']) { 
  12911.                 $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' kern'; 
  12912.             } else { 
  12913.                 $textvar = ($textvar | FC_KERNING); 
  12914.             } 
  12915.         } 
  12916.  
  12917.         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  12918.         // Use OTL OpenType Table Layout - GSUB & GPOS 
  12919.         if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  12920.             $texte = $this->otl->applyOTL($texte, $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']); 
  12921.             $OTLdata = $this->otl->OTLdata; 
  12922.         } 
  12923.         /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  12924.         $this->OTLtags = $save_OTLtags; 
  12925.  
  12926.         $this->magic_reverse_dir($texte, $this->directionality, $OTLdata); 
  12927.  
  12928.         $this->SetAlpha($alpha); 
  12929.  
  12930.         $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  12931.         $szfont = $fontsize; 
  12932.         $loop = 0; 
  12933.         $maxlen = (min($this->w, $this->h) ); // sets max length of text as 7/8 width/height of page 
  12934.         while ($loop == 0) { 
  12935.             $this->SetFont($this->watermark_font, "B", $szfont, false); // Don't output 
  12936.             $offset = ((sin(deg2rad($angle))) * ($szfont / _MPDFK)); 
  12937.  
  12938.             $strlen = $this->GetStringWidth($texte, true, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  12939.             if ($strlen > $maxlen - $offset) 
  12940.                 $szfont --; 
  12941.             else 
  12942.                 $loop ++; 
  12943.         } 
  12944.  
  12945.         $this->SetFont($this->watermark_font, "B", $szfont - 0.1, true, true); // Output The -0.1 is because SetFont above is not written to PDF 
  12946.         // Repeating it will not output anything as mPDF thinks it is set 
  12947.         $adj = ((cos(deg2rad($angle))) * ($strlen / 2)); 
  12948.         $opp = ((sin(deg2rad($angle))) * ($strlen / 2)); 
  12949.         $wx = ($this->w / 2) - $adj + $offset / 3; 
  12950.         $wy = ($this->h / 2) + $opp; 
  12951.         $this->Rotate($angle, $wx, $wy); 
  12952.         $this->Text($wx, $wy, $texte, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  12953.         $this->Rotate(0); 
  12954.         $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  12955.  
  12956.         $this->SetAlpha(1); 
  12957.     } 
  12958.  
  12959.     function watermarkImg($src, $alpha = 0.2) 
  12960.     { 
  12961.         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  12962.             throw new MpdfException('PDFA and PDFX do not permit transparency, so mPDF does not allow Watermarks!'); 
  12963.         } 
  12964.         if ($this->watermarkImgBehind) { 
  12965.             $this->watermarkImgAlpha = $this->SetAlpha($alpha, 'Normal', true); 
  12966.         } else { 
  12967.             $this->SetAlpha($alpha, $this->watermarkImgAlphaBlend); 
  12968.         } 
  12969.         $this->Image($src, 0, 0, 0, 0, '', '', true, true, true); 
  12970.         if (!$this->watermarkImgBehind) { 
  12971.             $this->SetAlpha(1); 
  12972.         } 
  12973.     } 
  12974.  
  12975.     /** -- END WATERMARK -- */ 
  12976.  
  12977.     function Rotate($angle, $x = -1, $y = -1) 
  12978.     { 
  12979.         if ($x == -1) 
  12980.             $x = $this->x; 
  12981.         if ($y == -1) 
  12982.             $y = $this->y; 
  12983.         if ($this->angle != 0) 
  12984.             $this->_out('Q'); 
  12985.         $this->angle = $angle; 
  12986.         if ($angle != 0) { 
  12987.             $angle*=M_PI / 180; 
  12988.             $c = cos($angle); 
  12989.             $s = sin($angle); 
  12990.             $cx = $x * _MPDFK; 
  12991.             $cy = ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK; 
  12992.             $this->_out(sprintf('q %.5F %.5F %.5F %.5F %.3F %.3F cm 1 0 0 1 %.3F %.3F cm', $c, $s, -$s, $c, $cx, $cy, -$cx, -$cy)); 
  12993.         } 
  12994.     } 
  12995.  
  12996.     function CircularText($x, $y, $r, $text, $align = 'top', $fontfamily = '', $fontsize = 0, $fontstyle = '', $kerning = 120, $fontwidth = 100, $divider) 
  12997.     { 
  12998.         if (!class_exists('directw', false)) { 
  12999.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/directw.php'); 
  13000.         } 
  13001.         if (empty($this->directw)) { 
  13002.             $this->directw = new directw($this); 
  13003.         } 
  13004.         $this->directw->CircularText($x, $y, $r, $text, $align, $fontfamily, $fontsize, $fontstyle, $kerning, $fontwidth, $divider); 
  13005.     } 
  13006.  
  13007.     // From Invoice 
  13008.     function RoundedRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $r, $style = '') 
  13009.     { 
  13010.         $hp = $this->h; 
  13011.         if ($style == 'F') 
  13012.             $op = 'f'; 
  13013.         elseif ($style == 'FD' or $style == 'DF') 
  13014.             $op = 'B'; 
  13015.         else 
  13016.             $op = 'S'; 
  13017.         $MyArc = 4 / 3 * (sqrt(2) - 1); 
  13018.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F m', ($x + $r) * _MPDFK, ($hp - $y) * _MPDFK)); 
  13019.         $xc = $x + $w - $r; 
  13020.         $yc = $y + $r; 
  13021.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l', $xc * _MPDFK, ($hp - $y) * _MPDFK)); 
  13022.  
  13023.         $this->_Arc($xc + $r * $MyArc, $yc - $r, $xc + $r, $yc - $r * $MyArc, $xc + $r, $yc); 
  13024.         $xc = $x + $w - $r; 
  13025.         $yc = $y + $h - $r; 
  13026.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l', ($x + $w) * _MPDFK, ($hp - $yc) * _MPDFK)); 
  13027.         $this->_Arc($xc + $r, $yc + $r * $MyArc, $xc + $r * $MyArc, $yc + $r, $xc, $yc + $r); 
  13028.         $xc = $x + $r; 
  13029.         $yc = $y + $h - $r; 
  13030.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l', $xc * _MPDFK, ($hp - ($y + $h)) * _MPDFK)); 
  13031.         $this->_Arc($xc - $r * $MyArc, $yc + $r, $xc - $r, $yc + $r * $MyArc, $xc - $r, $yc); 
  13032.         $xc = $x + $r; 
  13033.         $yc = $y + $r; 
  13034.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l', ($x) * _MPDFK, ($hp - $yc) * _MPDFK)); 
  13035.         $this->_Arc($xc - $r, $yc - $r * $MyArc, $xc - $r * $MyArc, $yc - $r, $xc, $yc - $r); 
  13036.         $this->_out($op); 
  13037.     } 
  13038.  
  13039.     function _Arc($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x3, $y3) 
  13040.     { 
  13041.         $h = $this->h; 
  13042.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c ', $x1 * _MPDFK, ($h - $y1) * _MPDFK, $x2 * _MPDFK, ($h - $y2) * _MPDFK, $x3 * _MPDFK, ($h - $y3) * _MPDFK)); 
  13043.     } 
  13044.  
  13045.     //==================================================== 
  13046.  
  13047.  
  13048.  
  13049.     /** -- DIRECTW -- */ 
  13050.     function Shaded_box($text, $font = '', $fontstyle = 'B', $szfont = '', $width = '70%', $style = 'DF', $radius = 2.5, $fill = '#FFFFFF', $color = '#000000', $pad = 2) 
  13051.     { 
  13052.         // F (shading - no line), S (line, no shading), DF (both) 
  13053.         if (!class_exists('directw', false)) { 
  13054.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/directw.php'); 
  13055.         } 
  13056.         if (empty($this->directw)) { 
  13057.             $this->directw = new directw($this); 
  13058.         } 
  13059.         $this->directw->Shaded_box($text, $font, $fontstyle, $szfont, $width, $style, $radius, $fill, $color, $pad); 
  13060.     } 
  13061.  
  13062.     /** -- END DIRECTW -- */ 
  13063.  
  13064.     function UTF8StringToArray($str, $addSubset = true) 
  13065.     { 
  13066.         $out = array(); 
  13067.         $len = strlen($str); 
  13068.         for ($i = 0; $i < $len; $i++) { 
  13069.             $uni = -1; 
  13070.             $h = ord($str[$i]); 
  13071.             if ($h <= 0x7F) 
  13072.                 $uni = $h; 
  13073.             elseif ($h >= 0xC2) { 
  13074.                 if (($h <= 0xDF) && ($i < $len - 1)) 
  13075.                     $uni = ($h & 0x1F) << 6 | (ord($str[++$i]) & 0x3F); 
  13076.                 elseif (($h <= 0xEF) && ($i < $len - 2)) 
  13077.                     $uni = ($h & 0x0F) << 12 | (ord($str[++$i]) & 0x3F) << 6 | (ord($str[++$i]) & 0x3F); 
  13078.                 elseif (($h <= 0xF4) && ($i < $len - 3)) 
  13079.                     $uni = ($h & 0x0F) << 18 | (ord($str[++$i]) & 0x3F) << 12 | (ord($str[++$i]) & 0x3F) << 6 | (ord($str[++$i]) & 0x3F); 
  13080.             } 
  13081.             if ($uni >= 0) { 
  13082.                 $out[] = $uni; 
  13083.                 if ($addSubset && isset($this->CurrentFont['subset'])) { 
  13084.                     $this->CurrentFont['subset'][$uni] = $uni; 
  13085.                 } 
  13086.             } 
  13087.         } 
  13088.         return $out; 
  13089.     } 
  13090.  
  13091.     //Convert utf-8 string to <HHHHHH> for Font Subsets 
  13092.     function UTF8toSubset($str) 
  13093.     { 
  13094.         $ret = '<'; 
  13095.         //$str = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($this->aliasNbPg, '/').'/', chr(7), $str );    // mPDF 6 deleted 
  13096.         //$str = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($this->aliasNbPgGp, '/').'/', chr(8), $str );    // mPDF 6 deleted 
  13097.         $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($str); 
  13098.         $orig_fid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][0]; 
  13099.         $last_fid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][0]; 
  13100.         foreach ($unicode as $c) { 
  13101.             /**     // mPDF 6 deleted 
  13102.               if ($c == 7 || $c == 8) { 
  13103.               if ($orig_fid != $last_fid) { 
  13104.               $ret .= '> Tj /F'.$orig_fid.' '.$this->FontSizePt.' Tf <'; 
  13105.               $last_fid = $orig_fid; 
  13106.               } 
  13107.               if ($c == 7) { $ret .= $this->aliasNbPgHex; } 
  13108.               else { $ret .= $this->aliasNbPgGpHex; } 
  13109.               continue; 
  13110.               } 
  13111.              */ 
  13112.             if (!$this->_charDefined($this->CurrentFont['cw'], $c)) { 
  13113.                 $c = 0; 
  13114.             } // mPDF 6 
  13115.             for ($i = 0; $i < 99; $i++) { 
  13116.                 // return c as decimal char 
  13117.                 $init = array_search($c, $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$i]); 
  13118.                 if ($init !== false) { 
  13119.                     if ($this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i] != $last_fid) { 
  13120.                         $ret .= '> Tj /F' . $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i] . ' ' . $this->FontSizePt . ' Tf <'; 
  13121.                         $last_fid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i]; 
  13122.                     } 
  13123.                     $ret .= sprintf("%02s", strtoupper(dechex($init))); 
  13124.                     break; 
  13125.                 } 
  13126.                 // TrueType embedded SUBSETS 
  13127.                 elseif (count($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$i]) < 255) { 
  13128.                     $n = count($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$i]); 
  13129.                     $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$i][$n] = $c; 
  13130.                     if ($this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i] != $last_fid) { 
  13131.                         $ret .= '> Tj /F' . $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i] . ' ' . $this->FontSizePt . ' Tf <'; 
  13132.                         $last_fid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i]; 
  13133.                     } 
  13134.                     $ret .= sprintf("%02s", strtoupper(dechex($n))); 
  13135.                     break; 
  13136.                 } elseif (!isset($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][($i + 1)])) { 
  13137.                     // TrueType embedded SUBSETS 
  13138.                     $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][($i + 1)] = array(0 => 0); 
  13139.                     $new_fid = count($this->fonts) + $this->extraFontSubsets + 1; 
  13140.                     $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][($i + 1)] = $new_fid; 
  13141.                     $this->extraFontSubsets++; 
  13142.                 } 
  13143.             } 
  13144.         } 
  13145.         $ret .= '>'; 
  13146.         if ($last_fid != $orig_fid) { 
  13147.             $ret .= ' Tj /F' . $orig_fid . ' ' . $this->FontSizePt . ' Tf <> '; 
  13148.         } 
  13149.         return $ret; 
  13150.     } 
  13151.  
  13152.     // Converts UTF-8 strings to UTF16-BE. 
  13153.     function UTF8ToUTF16BE($str, $setbom = true) 
  13154.     { 
  13155.         if ($this->checkSIP && preg_match("/([\x{20000}-\x{2FFFF}])/u", $str)) { 
  13156.             if (!in_array($this->currentfontfamily, array('gb', 'big5', 'sjis', 'uhc', 'gbB', 'big5B', 'sjisB', 'uhcB', 'gbI', 'big5I', 'sjisI', 'uhcI',  
  13157.                     'gbBI', 'big5BI', 'sjisBI', 'uhcBI'))) { 
  13158.                 $str = preg_replace("/[\x{20000}-\x{2FFFF}]/u", chr(0), $str); 
  13159.             } 
  13160.         } 
  13161.         if ($this->checkSMP && preg_match("/([\x{10000}-\x{1FFFF}])/u", $str)) { 
  13162.             $str = preg_replace("/[\x{10000}-\x{1FFFF}]/u", chr(0), $str); 
  13163.         } 
  13164.         $outstr = ""; // string to be returned 
  13165.         if ($setbom) { 
  13166.             $outstr .= "\xFE\xFF"; // Byte Order Mark (BOM) 
  13167.         } 
  13168.         $outstr .= mb_convert_encoding($str, 'UTF-16BE', 'UTF-8'); 
  13169.         return $outstr; 
  13170.     } 
  13171.  
  13172.     // ==================================================== 
  13173.     // ==================================================== 
  13174.         /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  13175.  
  13176.     // from class PDF_Chinese CJK EXTENSIONS 
  13177.     function AddCIDFont($family, $style, $name, &$cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc) 
  13178.     { 
  13179.         $fontkey = strtolower($family) . strtoupper($style); 
  13180.         if (isset($this->fonts[$fontkey])) 
  13181.             throw new MpdfException("Font already added: $family $style"); 
  13182.         $i = count($this->fonts) + $this->extraFontSubsets + 1; 
  13183.         $name = str_replace(' ', '', $name); 
  13184.         if ($family == 'sjis') { 
  13185.             $up = -120; 
  13186.         } else { 
  13187.             $up = -130; 
  13188.         } 
  13189.         // ? 'up' and 'ut' do not seem to be referenced anywhere 
  13190.         $this->fonts[$fontkey] = array('i' => $i, 'type' => 'Type0', 'name' => $name, 'up' => $up, 'ut' => 40, 'cw' => $cw, 'CMap' => $CMap, 'registry' => $registry, 'MissingWidth' => 1000, 'desc' => $desc); 
  13191.     } 
  13192.  
  13193.     function AddCJKFont($family) 
  13194.     { 
  13195.  
  13196.         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  13197.             throw new MpdfException("Adobe CJK fonts cannot be embedded in mPDF (required for PDFA1-b and PDFX/1-a)."); 
  13198.         } 
  13199.         if ($family == 'big5') { 
  13200.             $this->AddBig5Font(); 
  13201.         } elseif ($family == 'gb') { 
  13202.             $this->AddGBFont(); 
  13203.         } elseif ($family == 'sjis') { 
  13204.             $this->AddSJISFont(); 
  13205.         } elseif ($family == 'uhc') { 
  13206.             $this->AddUHCFont(); 
  13207.         } 
  13208.     } 
  13209.  
  13210.     function AddBig5Font() 
  13211.     { 
  13212.         //Add Big5 font with proportional Latin 
  13213.         $family = 'big5'; 
  13214.         $name = 'MSungStd-Light-Acro'; 
  13215.         $cw = $this->Big5_widths; 
  13216.         $CMap = 'UniCNS-UTF16-H'; 
  13217.         $registry = array('ordering' => 'CNS1', 'supplement' => 4); 
  13218.         $desc = array( 
  13219.             'Ascent' => 880,  
  13220.             'Descent' => -120,  
  13221.             'CapHeight' => 880,  
  13222.             'Flags' => 6,  
  13223.             'FontBBox' => '[-160 -249 1015 1071]',  
  13224.             'ItalicAngle' => 0,  
  13225.             'StemV' => 93,  
  13226.  ); 
  13227.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, '', $name, $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13228.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'B', $name . ', Bold', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13229.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'I', $name . ', Italic', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13230.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'BI', $name . ', BoldItalic', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13231.     } 
  13232.  
  13233.     function AddGBFont() 
  13234.     { 
  13235.         //Add GB font with proportional Latin 
  13236.         $family = 'gb'; 
  13237.         $name = 'STSongStd-Light-Acro'; 
  13238.         $cw = $this->GB_widths; 
  13239.         $CMap = 'UniGB-UTF16-H'; 
  13240.         $registry = array('ordering' => 'GB1', 'supplement' => 4); 
  13241.         $desc = array( 
  13242.             'Ascent' => 880,  
  13243.             'Descent' => -120,  
  13244.             'CapHeight' => 737,  
  13245.             'Flags' => 6,  
  13246.             'FontBBox' => '[-25 -254 1000 880]',  
  13247.             'ItalicAngle' => 0,  
  13248.             'StemV' => 58,  
  13249.             'Style' => '<< /Panose <000000000400000000000000> >>',  
  13250.  ); 
  13251.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, '', $name, $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13252.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'B', $name . ', Bold', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13253.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'I', $name . ', Italic', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13254.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'BI', $name . ', BoldItalic', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13255.     } 
  13256.  
  13257.     function AddSJISFont() 
  13258.     { 
  13259.         //Add SJIS font with proportional Latin 
  13260.         $family = 'sjis'; 
  13261.         $name = 'KozMinPro-Regular-Acro'; 
  13262.         $cw = $this->SJIS_widths; 
  13263.         $CMap = 'UniJIS-UTF16-H'; 
  13264.         $registry = array('ordering' => 'Japan1', 'supplement' => 5); 
  13265.         $desc = array( 
  13266.             'Ascent' => 880,  
  13267.             'Descent' => -120,  
  13268.             'CapHeight' => 740,  
  13269.             'Flags' => 6,  
  13270.             'FontBBox' => '[-195 -272 1110 1075]',  
  13271.             'ItalicAngle' => 0,  
  13272.             'StemV' => 86,  
  13273.             'XHeight' => 502,  
  13274.  ); 
  13275.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, '', $name, $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13276.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'B', $name . ', Bold', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13277.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'I', $name . ', Italic', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13278.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'BI', $name . ', BoldItalic', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13279.     } 
  13280.  
  13281.     function AddUHCFont() 
  13282.     { 
  13283.         //Add UHC font with proportional Latin 
  13284.         $family = 'uhc'; 
  13285.         $name = 'HYSMyeongJoStd-Medium-Acro'; 
  13286.         $cw = $this->UHC_widths; 
  13287.         $CMap = 'UniKS-UTF16-H'; 
  13288.         $registry = array('ordering' => 'Korea1', 'supplement' => 2); 
  13289.         $desc = array( 
  13290.             'Ascent' => 880,  
  13291.             'Descent' => -120,  
  13292.             'CapHeight' => 720,  
  13293.             'Flags' => 6,  
  13294.             'FontBBox' => '[-28 -148 1001 880]',  
  13295.             'ItalicAngle' => 0,  
  13296.             'StemV' => 60,  
  13297.             'Style' => '<< /Panose <000000000600000000000000> >>',  
  13298.  ); 
  13299.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, '', $name, $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13300.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'B', $name . ', Bold', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13301.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'I', $name . ', Italic', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13302.         $this->AddCIDFont($family, 'BI', $name . ', BoldItalic', $cw, $CMap, $registry, $desc); 
  13303.     } 
  13304.  
  13305.     /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  13306.  
  13307.     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
  13308.     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
  13309.     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
  13310.     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
  13311.     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
  13312.     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
  13313.     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
  13314.  
  13315.     function SetDefaultFont($font) 
  13316.     { 
  13317.         // Disallow embedded fonts to be used as defaults in PDFA 
  13318.         if ($this->PDFA || $this->PDFX) { 
  13319.             if (strtolower($font) == 'ctimes') { 
  13320.                 $font = 'serif'; 
  13321.             } 
  13322.             if (strtolower($font) == 'ccourier') { 
  13323.                 $font = 'monospace'; 
  13324.             } 
  13325.             if (strtolower($font) == 'chelvetica') { 
  13326.                 $font = 'sans-serif'; 
  13327.             } 
  13328.         } 
  13329.         $font = $this->SetFont($font); // returns substituted font if necessary 
  13330.         $this->default_font = $font; 
  13331.         $this->original_default_font = $font; 
  13332.         if (!$this->watermark_font) { 
  13333.             $this->watermark_font = $font; 
  13334.         } // *WATERMARK* 
  13335.         $this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-FAMILY'] = $font; 
  13336.         $this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['FONT-FAMILY'] = $font; 
  13337.     } 
  13338.  
  13339.     function SetDefaultFontSize($fontsize) 
  13340.     { 
  13341.         $this->default_font_size = $fontsize; 
  13342.         $this->original_default_font_size = $fontsize; 
  13343.         $this->SetFontSize($fontsize); 
  13344.         $this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-SIZE'] = $fontsize . 'pt'; 
  13345.         $this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['FONT-SIZE'] = $fontsize . 'pt'; 
  13346.     } 
  13347.  
  13348.     function SetDefaultBodyCSS($prop, $val) 
  13349.     { 
  13350.         if ($prop) { 
  13351.             $this->defaultCSS['BODY'][strtoupper($prop)] = $val; 
  13352.             $this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY'][strtoupper($prop)] = $val; 
  13353.         } 
  13354.     } 
  13355.  
  13356.     function SetDirectionality($dir = 'ltr') 
  13357.     { 
  13358.         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  13359.         if (strtolower($dir) == 'rtl') { 
  13360.             if ($this->directionality != 'rtl') { 
  13361.                 // Swop L/R Margins so page 1 RTL is an 'even' page 
  13362.                 $tmp = $this->DeflMargin; 
  13363.                 $this->DeflMargin = $this->DefrMargin; 
  13364.                 $this->DefrMargin = $tmp; 
  13365.                 $this->orig_lMargin = $this->DeflMargin; 
  13366.                 $this->orig_rMargin = $this->DefrMargin; 
  13367.  
  13368.                 $this->SetMargins($this->DeflMargin, $this->DefrMargin, $this->tMargin); 
  13369.             } 
  13370.             $this->directionality = 'rtl'; 
  13371.             $this->defaultAlign = 'R'; 
  13372.             $this->defaultTableAlign = 'R'; 
  13373.         } else { 
  13374.             /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  13375.             $this->directionality = 'ltr'; 
  13376.             $this->defaultAlign = 'L'; 
  13377.             $this->defaultTableAlign = 'L'; 
  13378.         } // *OTL* 
  13379.         $this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['DIRECTION'] = $this->directionality; 
  13380.     } 
  13381.  
  13382.     // Return either a number (factor) - based on current set fontsize (if % or em) - or exact lineheight (with 'mm' after it) 
  13383.     function fixLineheight($v) 
  13384.     { 
  13385.         $lh = false; 
  13386.         if (preg_match('/^[0-9\., ]*$/', $v) && $v >= 0) { 
  13387.             return ($v + 0); 
  13388.         } elseif (strtoupper($v) == 'NORMAL' || $v == 'N') { 
  13389.             return 'N';  // mPDF 6 
  13390.         } else { 
  13391.             $tlh = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->FontSize, $this->FontSize, true); 
  13392.             if ($tlh) { 
  13393.                 return ($tlh . 'mm'); 
  13394.             } 
  13395.         } 
  13396.         return $this->normalLineheight; 
  13397.     } 
  13398.  
  13399.     function _getNormalLineheight($desc = false) 
  13400.     { 
  13401.         if (!$desc) { 
  13402.             $desc = $this->CurrentFont['desc']; 
  13403.         } 
  13404.         if (!isset($desc['Leading'])) { 
  13405.             $desc['Leading'] = 0; 
  13406.         } 
  13407.         if ($this->useFixedNormalLineHeight) { 
  13408.             $lh = $this->normalLineheight; 
  13409.         } elseif (isset($desc['Ascent']) && $desc['Ascent']) { 
  13410.             $lh = ($this->adjustFontDescLineheight * ($desc['Ascent'] - $desc['Descent'] + $desc['Leading']) / 1000); 
  13411.         } else { 
  13412.             $lh = $this->normalLineheight; 
  13413.         } 
  13414.         return $lh; 
  13415.     } 
  13416.  
  13417.     // Set a (fixed) lineheight to an actual value - either to named fontsize(pts) or default 
  13418.     function SetLineHeight($FontPt = '', $lh = '') 
  13419.     { 
  13420.         if (!$FontPt) { 
  13421.             $FontPt = $this->FontSizePt; 
  13422.         } 
  13423.         $fs = $FontPt / _MPDFK; 
  13424.         $this->lineheight = $this->_computeLineheight($lh, $fs); 
  13425.     } 
  13426.  
  13427.     function _computeLineheight($lh, $fs = '') 
  13428.     { 
  13429.         if ($this->shrin_k > 1) { 
  13430.             $k = $this->shrin_k; 
  13431.         } else { 
  13432.             $k = 1; 
  13433.         } 
  13434.         if (!$fs) { 
  13435.             $fs = $this->FontSize; 
  13436.         } 
  13437.         if ($lh == 'N') { 
  13438.             $lh = $this->_getNormalLineheight(); 
  13439.         } 
  13440.         if (preg_match('/mm/', $lh)) { 
  13441.             return (($lh + 0.0) / $k); // convert to number 
  13442.         } elseif ($lh > 0) { 
  13443.             return ($fs * $lh); 
  13444.         } 
  13445.         return ($fs * $this->normalLineheight); 
  13446.     } 
  13447.  
  13448.     function _setLineYpos(&$fontsize, &$fontdesc, &$CSSlineheight, $blockYpos = false) 
  13449.     { 
  13450.         $ypos['glyphYorigin'] = 0; 
  13451.         $ypos['baseline-shift'] = 0; 
  13452.         $linegap = 0; 
  13453.         $leading = 0; 
  13454.  
  13455.         if (isset($fontdesc['Ascent']) && $fontdesc['Ascent'] && !$this->useFixedTextBaseline) { 
  13456.             // Fontsize uses font metrics - this method seems to produce results compatible with browsers (except IE9) 
  13457.             $ypos['boxtop'] = $fontdesc['Ascent'] / 1000 * $fontsize; 
  13458.             $ypos['boxbottom'] = $fontdesc['Descent'] / 1000 * $fontsize; 
  13459.             if (isset($fontdesc['Leading'])) { 
  13460.                 $linegap = $fontdesc['Leading'] / 1000 * $fontsize; 
  13461.             } 
  13462.         } 
  13463.         // Default if not set - uses baselineC 
  13464.         else { 
  13465.             $ypos['boxtop'] = (0.5 + $this->baselineC) * $fontsize; 
  13466.             $ypos['boxbottom'] = -(0.5 - $this->baselineC) * $fontsize; 
  13467.         } 
  13468.         $fontheight = $ypos['boxtop'] - $ypos['boxbottom']; 
  13469.  
  13470.         if ($this->shrin_k > 1) { 
  13471.             $shrin_k = $this->shrin_k; 
  13472.         } else { 
  13473.             $shrin_k = 1; 
  13474.         } 
  13475.  
  13476.         $leading = 0; 
  13477.         if ($CSSlineheight == 'N') { 
  13478.             $lh = $this->_getNormalLineheight($fontdesc); 
  13479.             $lineheight = ($fontsize * $lh); 
  13480.             $leading += $linegap; // specified in hhea or sTypo in OpenType tables    **************************************** 
  13481.         } elseif (preg_match('/mm/', $CSSlineheight)) { 
  13482.             $lineheight = (($CSSlineheight + 0.0) / $shrin_k); 
  13483.         } // convert to number 
  13484.         // ??? If lineheight is a factor e.g. 1.3  ?? use factor x 1em or ? use 'normal' lineheight * factor ****************************** 
  13485.         // Could depend on value for $text_height - a draft CSS value as set above for now 
  13486.         elseif ($CSSlineheight > 0) { 
  13487.             $lineheight = ($fontsize * $CSSlineheight); 
  13488.         } else { 
  13489.             $lineheight = ($fontsize * $this->normalLineheight); 
  13490.         } 
  13491.  
  13492.         // In general, calculate the "leading" - the difference between the fontheight and the lineheight 
  13493.         // and add half to the top and half to the bottom. BUT 
  13494.         // If an inline element has a font-size less than the block element, and the line-height is set as an em or % value 
  13495.         // it will add too much leading below the font and expand the height of the line - so just use the block element exttop/extbottom: 
  13496.         if (preg_match('/mm/', $CSSlineheight) && $ypos['boxtop'] < $blockYpos['boxtop'] && $ypos['boxbottom'] > $blockYpos['boxbottom']) { 
  13497.             $ypos['exttop'] = $blockYpos['exttop']; 
  13498.             $ypos['extbottom'] = $blockYpos['extbottom']; 
  13499.         } else { 
  13500.             $leading += ($lineheight - $fontheight); 
  13501.  
  13502.             $ypos['exttop'] = $ypos['boxtop'] + $leading / 2; 
  13503.             $ypos['extbottom'] = $ypos['boxbottom'] - $leading / 2; 
  13504.         } 
  13505.  
  13506.  
  13507.         // TEMP ONLY FOR DEBUGGING ********************************* 
  13508.         //$ypos['lineheight'] = $lineheight; 
  13509.         //$ypos['fontheight'] = $fontheight; 
  13510.         //$ypos['leading'] = $leading; 
  13511.  
  13512.         return $ypos; 
  13513.     } 
  13514.  
  13515.     /** Called from WriteFlowingBlock() and finishFlowingBlock() 
  13516.       Determines the line hieght and glyph/writing position 
  13517.       for each element in the line to be written */ 
  13518.  
  13519.     function _setInlineBlockHeights(&$lineBox, &$stackHeight, &$content, &$font, $is_table) 
  13520.     { 
  13521.         if ($this->shrin_k > 1) { 
  13522.             $shrin_k = $this->shrin_k; 
  13523.         } else { 
  13524.             $shrin_k = 1; 
  13525.         } 
  13526.  
  13527.         $ypos = array(); 
  13528.         $bordypos = array(); 
  13529.         $bgypos = array(); 
  13530.  
  13531.         if ($is_table) { 
  13532.             // FOR TABLE 
  13533.             $fontsize = $this->FontSize; 
  13534.             $fontkey = $this->FontFamily . $this->FontStyle; 
  13535.             $fontdesc = $this->fonts[$fontkey]['desc']; 
  13536.             $CSSlineheight = $this->cellLineHeight; 
  13537.             $line_stacking_strategy = $this->cellLineStackingStrategy; // inline-line-height [default] | block-line-height | max-height | grid-height 
  13538.             $line_stacking_shift = $this->cellLineStackingShift;  // consider-shifts [default] | disregard-shifts 
  13539.         } else { 
  13540.             // FOR BLOCK FONT 
  13541.             $fontsize = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']['size']; 
  13542.             $fontkey = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']['family'] . $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']['style']; 
  13543.             $fontdesc = $this->fonts[$fontkey]['desc']; 
  13544.             $CSSlineheight = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']; 
  13545.             // inline-line-height | block-line-height | max-height | grid-height 
  13546.             $line_stacking_strategy = (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_stacking_strategy']) ? $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_stacking_strategy'] : 'inline-line-height'); 
  13547.             // consider-shifts | disregard-shifts 
  13548.             $line_stacking_shift = (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_stacking_shift']) ? $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_stacking_shift'] : 'consider-shifts'); 
  13549.         } 
  13550.         $boxLineHeight = $this->_computeLineheight($CSSlineheight, $fontsize); 
  13551.  
  13552.  
  13553.         // First, set a "strut" using block font at index $lineBox[-1] 
  13554.         $ypos[-1] = $this->_setLineYpos($fontsize, $fontdesc, $CSSlineheight); 
  13555.  
  13556.         // for the block element - always taking the block EXTENDED progression including leading - which may be negative 
  13557.         if ($line_stacking_strategy == 'block-line-height') { 
  13558.             $topy = $ypos[-1]['exttop']; 
  13559.             $bottomy = $ypos[-1]['extbottom']; 
  13560.         } else { 
  13561.             $topy = 0; 
  13562.             $bottomy = 0; 
  13563.         } 
  13564.  
  13565.         // Get text-middle for aligning images/objects 
  13566.         $midpoint = $ypos[-1]['boxtop'] - (($ypos[-1]['boxtop'] - $ypos[-1]['boxbottom']) / 2); 
  13567.  
  13568.         // for images / inline objects / replaced elements 
  13569.         $mta = 0; // Maximum top-aligned 
  13570.         $mba = 0; // Maximum bottom-aligned 
  13571.         foreach ($content as $k => $chunk) { 
  13572.             if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'listmarker') {
