  13573.                 $ypos[$k] = $ypos[-1]; 
  13574.                 // UPDATE Maximums 
  13575.                 if ($line_stacking_strategy == 'block-line-height' || $line_stacking_strategy == 'grid-height' || $line_stacking_strategy == 'max-height') { // don't include extended block progression of all inline elements 
  13576.                     if ($ypos[$k]['boxtop'] > $topy) 
  13577.                         $topy = $ypos[$k]['boxtop']; 
  13578.                     if ($ypos[$k]['boxbottom'] < $bottomy) 
  13579.                         $bottomy = $ypos[$k]['boxbottom']; 
  13580.                 } 
  13581.                 else { 
  13582.                     if ($ypos[$k]['exttop'] > $topy) 
  13583.                         $topy = $ypos[$k]['exttop']; 
  13584.                     if ($ypos[$k]['extbottom'] < $bottomy) 
  13585.                         $bottomy = $ypos[$k]['extbottom']; 
  13586.                 } 
  13587.             } 
  13588.             elseif (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'dottab') { // mPDF 6 DOTTAB 
  13589.                 $fontsize = $font[$k]['size']; 
  13590.                 $fontdesc = $font[$k]['curr']['desc']; 
  13591.                 $lh = 1; 
  13592.                 $ypos[$k] = $this->_setLineYpos($fontsize, $fontdesc, $lh, $ypos[-1]); // Lineheight=1 fixed 
  13593.             } elseif (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
  13594.                 $oh = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-HEIGHT']; 
  13595.                 $va = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['vertical-align']; 
  13596.  
  13597.                 if ($va == 'BS') { //  (BASELINE default) 
  13598.                     if ($oh > $topy) 
  13599.                         $topy = $oh; 
  13600.                 } 
  13601.                 elseif ($va == 'M') { 
  13602.                     if (($midpoint + $oh / 2) > $topy) 
  13603.                         $topy = $midpoint + $oh / 2; 
  13604.                     if (($midpoint - $oh / 2) < $bottomy) 
  13605.                         $bottomy = $midpoint - $oh / 2; 
  13606.                 } 
  13607.                 elseif ($va == 'TT') { 
  13608.                     if (($ypos[-1]['boxtop'] - $oh) < $bottomy) { 
  13609.                         $bottomy = $ypos[-1]['boxtop'] - $oh; 
  13610.                         $topy = max($topy, $ypos[-1]['boxtop']); 
  13611.                     } 
  13612.                 } elseif ($va == 'TB') { 
  13613.                     if (($ypos[-1]['boxbottom'] + $oh) > $topy) { 
  13614.                         $topy = $ypos[-1]['boxbottom'] + $oh; 
  13615.                         $bottomy = min($bottomy, $ypos[-1]['boxbottom']); 
  13616.                     } 
  13617.                 } elseif ($va == 'T') { 
  13618.                     if ($oh > $mta) 
  13619.                         $mta = $oh; 
  13620.                 } 
  13621.                 elseif ($va == 'B') { 
  13622.                     if ($oh > $mba) 
  13623.                         $mba = $oh; 
  13624.                 } 
  13625.             } 
  13626.             elseif ($content[$k] || $content[$k] === '0') { 
  13627.                 // FOR FLOWING BLOCK 
  13628.                 $fontsize = $font[$k]['size']; 
  13629.                 $fontdesc = $font[$k]['curr']['desc']; 
  13630.                 // In future could set CSS line-height from inline elements; for now, use block level: 
  13631.                 $ypos[$k] = $this->_setLineYpos($fontsize, $fontdesc, $CSSlineheight, $ypos[-1]); 
  13632.  
  13633.                 if (isset($font[$k]['textparam']['text-baseline']) && $font[$k]['textparam']['text-baseline'] != 0) { 
  13634.                     $ypos[$k]['baseline-shift'] = $font[$k]['textparam']['text-baseline']; 
  13635.                 } 
  13636.  
  13637.                 // DO ALIGNMENT FOR BASELINES ******************* 
  13638.                 // Until most fonts have OpenType BASE tables, this won't work 
  13639.                 // $ypos[$k] compared to $ypos[-1] or $ypos[$k-1] using $dominant_baseline and $baseline_table 
  13640.                 // UPDATE Maximums 
  13641.                 if ($line_stacking_strategy == 'block-line-height' || $line_stacking_strategy == 'grid-height' || $line_stacking_strategy == 'max-height') { // don't include extended block progression of all inline elements 
  13642.                     if ($line_stacking_shift == 'disregard-shifts') { 
  13643.                         if ($ypos[$k]['boxtop'] > $topy) 
  13644.                             $topy = $ypos[$k]['boxtop']; 
  13645.                         if ($ypos[$k]['boxbottom'] < $bottomy) 
  13646.                             $bottomy = $ypos[$k]['boxbottom']; 
  13647.                     } 
  13648.                     else { 
  13649.                         if (($ypos[$k]['boxtop'] + $ypos[$k]['baseline-shift']) > $topy) 
  13650.                             $topy = $ypos[$k]['boxtop'] + $ypos[$k]['baseline-shift']; 
  13651.                         if (($ypos[$k]['boxbottom'] + $ypos[$k]['baseline-shift']) < $bottomy) 
  13652.                             $bottomy = $ypos[$k]['boxbottom'] + $ypos[$k]['baseline-shift']; 
  13653.                     } 
  13654.                 } 
  13655.                 else { 
  13656.                     if ($line_stacking_shift == 'disregard-shifts') { 
  13657.                         if ($ypos[$k]['exttop'] > $topy) 
  13658.                             $topy = $ypos[$k]['exttop']; 
  13659.                         if ($ypos[$k]['extbottom'] < $bottomy) 
  13660.                             $bottomy = $ypos[$k]['extbottom']; 
  13661.                     } 
  13662.                     else { 
  13663.                         if (($ypos[$k]['exttop'] + $ypos[$k]['baseline-shift']) > $topy) 
  13664.                             $topy = $ypos[$k]['exttop'] + $ypos[$k]['baseline-shift']; 
  13665.                         if (($ypos[$k]['extbottom'] + $ypos[$k]['baseline-shift']) < $bottomy) 
  13666.                             $bottomy = $ypos[$k]['extbottom'] + $ypos[$k]['baseline-shift']; 
  13667.                     } 
  13668.                 } 
  13669.  
  13670.                 // If BORDER set on inline element 
  13671.                 if (isset($font[$k]['bord']) && $font[$k]['bord']) { 
  13672.                     $bordfontsize = $font[$k]['textparam']['bord-decoration']['fontsize'] / $shrin_k; 
  13673.                     $bordfontkey = $font[$k]['textparam']['bord-decoration']['fontkey']; 
  13674.                     if ($bordfontkey != $fontkey || $bordfontsize != $fontsize || isset($font[$k]['textparam']['bord-decoration']['baseline'])) { 
  13675.                         $bordfontdesc = $this->fonts[$bordfontkey]['desc']; 
  13676.                         $bordypos[$k] = $this->_setLineYpos($bordfontsize, $bordfontdesc, $CSSlineheight, $ypos[-1]); 
  13677.                         if (isset($font[$k]['textparam']['bord-decoration']['baseline']) && $font[$k]['textparam']['bord-decoration']['baseline'] != 0) { 
  13678.                             $bordypos[$k]['baseline-shift'] = $font[$k]['textparam']['bord-decoration']['baseline'] / $shrin_k; 
  13679.                         } 
  13680.                     } 
  13681.                 } 
  13682.                 // If BACKGROUND set on inline element 
  13683.                 if (isset($font[$k]['spanbgcolor']) && $font[$k]['spanbgcolor']) { 
  13684.                     $bgfontsize = $font[$k]['textparam']['bg-decoration']['fontsize'] / $shrin_k; 
  13685.                     $bgfontkey = $font[$k]['textparam']['bg-decoration']['fontkey']; 
  13686.                     if ($bgfontkey != $fontkey || $bgfontsize != $fontsize || isset($font[$k]['textparam']['bg-decoration']['baseline'])) { 
  13687.                         $bgfontdesc = $this->fonts[$bgfontkey]['desc']; 
  13688.                         $bgypos[$k] = $this->_setLineYpos($bgfontsize, $bgfontdesc, $CSSlineheight, $ypos[-1]); 
  13689.                         if (isset($font[$k]['textparam']['bg-decoration']['baseline']) && $font[$k]['textparam']['bg-decoration']['baseline'] != 0) { 
  13690.                             $bgypos[$k]['baseline-shift'] = $font[$k]['textparam']['bg-decoration']['baseline'] / $shrin_k; 
  13691.                         } 
  13692.                     } 
  13693.                 } 
  13694.             } 
  13695.         } 
  13696.  
  13697.  
  13698.         // TOP or BOTTOM aligned images 
  13699.         if ($mta > ($topy - $bottomy)) { 
  13700.             if (($topy - $mta) < $bottomy) 
  13701.                 $bottomy = $topy - $mta; 
  13702.         } 
  13703.         if ($mba > ($topy - $bottomy)) { 
  13704.             if (($bottomy + $mba) > $topy) 
  13705.                 $topy = $bottomy + $mba; 
  13706.         } 
  13707.  
  13708.         if ($line_stacking_strategy == 'block-line-height') { // fixed height set by block element (whether present or not) 
  13709.             $topy = $ypos[-1]['exttop']; 
  13710.             $bottomy = $ypos[-1]['extbottom']; 
  13711.         } 
  13712.  
  13713.         $inclusiveHeight = $topy - $bottomy; 
  13714.  
  13715.         // SET $stackHeight taking note of line_stacking_strategy 
  13716.         // NB inclusive height already takes account of need to consider block progression height (excludes leading set by lineheight) 
  13717.         // or extended block progression height (includes leading set by lineheight) 
  13718.         if ($line_stacking_strategy == 'block-line-height') { // fixed = extended block progression height of block element 
  13719.             $stackHeight = $boxLineHeight; 
  13720.         } elseif ($line_stacking_strategy == 'max-height') { // smallest height which includes extended block progression height of block element 
  13721.             // and block progression heights of inline elements (NOT extended) 
  13722.             $stackHeight = $inclusiveHeight; 
  13723.         } elseif ($line_stacking_strategy == 'grid-height') { // smallest multiple of block element lineheight to include 
  13724.             // block progression heights of inline elements (NOT extended) 
  13725.             $stackHeight = $boxLineHeight; 
  13726.             while ($stackHeight < $inclusiveHeight) { 
  13727.                 $stackHeight += $boxLineHeight; 
  13728.             } 
  13729.         } else { // 'inline-line-height' = default        // smallest height which includes extended block progression height of block element 
  13730.             // AND extended block progression heights of inline elements 
  13731.             $stackHeight = $inclusiveHeight; 
  13732.         } 
  13733.  
  13734.         $diff = $stackHeight - $inclusiveHeight; 
  13735.         $topy += $diff / 2; 
  13736.         $bottomy -= $diff / 2; 
  13737.  
  13738.         // ADJUST $ypos => lineBox using $stackHeight; lineBox are all offsets from the top of stackHeight in mm 
  13739.         // and SET IMAGE OFFSETS 
  13740.         $lineBox[-1]['boxtop'] = $topy - $ypos[-1]['boxtop']; 
  13741.         $lineBox[-1]['boxbottom'] = $topy - $ypos[-1]['boxbottom']; 
  13742.         //    $lineBox[-1]['exttop'] = $topy - $ypos[-1]['exttop']; 
  13743.         //    $lineBox[-1]['extbottom'] = $topy - $ypos[-1]['extbottom']; 
  13744.         $lineBox[-1]['glyphYorigin'] = $topy - $ypos[-1]['glyphYorigin']; 
  13745.         $lineBox[-1]['baseline-shift'] = $ypos[-1]['baseline-shift']; 
  13746.  
  13747.         $midpoint = $lineBox[-1]['boxbottom'] - (($lineBox[-1]['boxbottom'] - $lineBox[-1]['boxtop']) / 2); 
  13748.  
  13749.         foreach ($content as $k => $chunk) { 
  13750.             if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
  13751.                 $oh = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-HEIGHT']; 
  13752.                 // LIST MARKERS 
  13753.                 if ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'listmarker') { 
  13754.                     $oh = $fontsize; 
  13755.                 } elseif ($this->objectbuffer[$k]['type'] == 'dottab') { // mPDF 6 DOTTAB 
  13756.                     $oh = $font[$k]['size']; // == $this->objectbuffer[$k]['fontsize']/_MPDFK; 
  13757.                     $lineBox[$k]['boxtop'] = $topy - $ypos[$k]['boxtop']; 
  13758.                     $lineBox[$k]['boxbottom'] = $topy - $ypos[$k]['boxbottom']; 
  13759.                     $lineBox[$k]['glyphYorigin'] = $topy - $ypos[$k]['glyphYorigin']; 
  13760.                     $lineBox[$k]['baseline-shift'] = 0; 
  13761.                     // continue; 
  13762.                 } 
  13763.                 $va = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['vertical-align']; // = $objattr['vertical-align'] = set as M, T, B, S 
  13764.  
  13765.                 if ($va == 'BS') { //  (BASELINE default) 
  13766.                     $lineBox[$k]['top'] = $lineBox[-1]['glyphYorigin'] - $oh; 
  13767.                 } elseif ($va == 'M') { 
  13768.                     $lineBox[$k]['top'] = $midpoint - $oh / 2; 
  13769.                 } elseif ($va == 'TT') { 
  13770.                     $lineBox[$k]['top'] = $lineBox[-1]['boxtop']; 
  13771.                 } elseif ($va == 'TB') { 
  13772.                     $lineBox[$k]['top'] = $lineBox[-1]['boxbottom'] - $oh; 
  13773.                 } elseif ($va == 'T') { 
  13774.                     $lineBox[$k]['top'] = 0; 
  13775.                 } elseif ($va == 'B') { 
  13776.                     $lineBox[$k]['top'] = $stackHeight - $oh; 
  13777.                 } 
  13778.             } elseif ($content[$k] || $content[$k] === '0') { 
  13779.                 $lineBox[$k]['boxtop'] = $topy - $ypos[$k]['boxtop']; 
  13780.                 $lineBox[$k]['boxbottom'] = $topy - $ypos[$k]['boxbottom']; 
  13781.                 // $lineBox[$k]['exttop'] = $topy - $ypos[$k]['exttop']; 
  13782.                 // $lineBox[$k]['extbottom'] = $topy - $ypos[$k]['extbottom']; 
  13783.                 $lineBox[$k]['glyphYorigin'] = $topy - $ypos[$k]['glyphYorigin']; 
  13784.                 $lineBox[$k]['baseline-shift'] = $ypos[$k]['baseline-shift']; 
  13785.                 if (isset($bordypos[$k]['boxtop'])) { 
  13786.                     $lineBox[$k]['border-boxtop'] = $topy - $bordypos[$k]['boxtop']; 
  13787.                     $lineBox[$k]['border-boxbottom'] = $topy - $bordypos[$k]['boxbottom']; 
  13788.                     $lineBox[$k]['border-baseline-shift'] = $bordypos[$k]['baseline-shift']; 
  13789.                 } 
  13790.                 if (isset($bgypos[$k]['boxtop'])) { 
  13791.                     $lineBox[$k]['background-boxtop'] = $topy - $bgypos[$k]['boxtop']; 
  13792.                     $lineBox[$k]['background-boxbottom'] = $topy - $bgypos[$k]['boxbottom']; 
  13793.                     $lineBox[$k]['background-baseline-shift'] = $bgypos[$k]['baseline-shift']; 
  13794.                 } 
  13795.             } 
  13796.         } 
  13797.     } 
  13798.  
  13799.     function SetBasePath($str = '') 
  13800.     { 
  13801.         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'])) { 
  13802.             $host = $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']; 
  13803.         } elseif (isset($_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'])) { 
  13804.             $host = $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME']; 
  13805.         } else { 
  13806.             $host = ''; 
  13807.         } 
  13808.         if (!$str) { 
  13809.             if ($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME']) { 
  13810.                 $currentPath = dirname($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME']); 
  13811.             } else { 
  13812.                 $currentPath = dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']); 
  13813.             } 
  13814.             $currentPath = str_replace("\\", "/", $currentPath); 
  13815.             if ($currentPath == '/') { 
  13816.                 $currentPath = ''; 
  13817.             } 
  13818.             if ($host) {  // mPDF 6 
  13819.                 if (isset($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && $_SERVER['HTTPS']) { 
  13820.                     $currpath = 'https://' . $host . $currentPath . '/'; 
  13821.                 } else { 
  13822.                     $currpath = 'http://' . $host . $currentPath . '/'; 
  13823.                 } 
  13824.             } else { 
  13825.                 $currpath = ''; 
  13826.             } 
  13827.             $this->basepath = $currpath; 
  13828.             $this->basepathIsLocal = true; 
  13829.             return; 
  13830.         } 
  13831.         $str = preg_replace('/\?.*/', '', $str); 
  13832.         if (!preg_match('/(http|https|ftp):\/\/.*\//i', $str)) { 
  13833.             $str .= '/'; 
  13834.         } 
  13835.         $str .= 'xxx'; // in case $str ends in / e.g. http://www.bbc.co.uk/ 
  13836.         $this->basepath = dirname($str) . "/"; // returns e.g. e.g. http://www.google.com/dir1/dir2/dir3/ 
  13837.         $this->basepath = str_replace("\\", "/", $this->basepath); //If on Windows 
  13838.         $tr = parse_url($this->basepath); 
  13839.         if (isset($tr['host']) && ($tr['host'] == $host)) { 
  13840.             $this->basepathIsLocal = true; 
  13841.         } else { 
  13842.             $this->basepathIsLocal = false; 
  13843.         } 
  13844.     } 
  13845.  
  13846.     function GetFullPath(&$path, $basepath = '') 
  13847.     { 
  13848.         // When parsing CSS need to pass temporary basepath - so links are relative to current stylesheet 
  13849.         if (!$basepath) { 
  13850.             $basepath = $this->basepath; 
  13851.         } 
  13852.         //Fix path value 
  13853.         $path = str_replace("\\", "/", $path); //If on Windows 
  13854.         // mPDF 5.7.2 
  13855.         if (substr($path, 0, 2) == "//") { 
  13856.             $tr = parse_url($basepath); 
  13857.             $path = $tr['scheme'] . ':' . $path; // mPDF 6 
  13858.         } 
  13859.  
  13860.         $regexp = '|^./|'; // Inadvertently corrects "./path/etc" and "//www.domain.com/etc" 
  13861.         $path = preg_replace($regexp, '', $path); 
  13862.  
  13863.         if (substr($path, 0, 1) == '#') { 
  13864.             return; 
  13865.         } 
  13866.         if (preg_match('@^(mailto|tel|fax):.*@i', $path)) { 
  13867.             return; 
  13868.         } 
  13869.         if (substr($path, 0, 3) == "../") { //It is a Relative Link 
  13870.             $backtrackamount = substr_count($path, "../"); 
  13871.             $maxbacktrack = substr_count($basepath, "/") - 3; 
  13872.             $filepath = str_replace("../", '', $path); 
  13873.             $path = $basepath; 
  13874.             //If it is an invalid relative link, then make it go to directory root 
  13875.             if ($backtrackamount > $maxbacktrack) 
  13876.                 $backtrackamount = $maxbacktrack; 
  13877.             //Backtrack some directories 
  13878.             for ($i = 0; $i < $backtrackamount + 1; $i++) 
  13879.                 $path = substr($path, 0, strrpos($path, "/")); 
  13880.             $path = $path . "/" . $filepath; //Make it an absolute path 
  13881.         } 
  13882.         elseif ((strpos($path, ":/") === false || strpos($path, ":/") > 10) && !is_file($path)) { //It is a Local Link 
  13883.             if (substr($path, 0, 1) == "/") { 
  13884.                 $tr = parse_url($basepath); 
  13885.                 // mPDF 5.7.2 
  13886.                 $root = ''; 
  13887.                 if (!empty($tr['scheme'])) { 
  13888.                     $root .= $tr['scheme'] . '://'; 
  13889.                 } 
  13890.                 $root .= isset($tr['host']) ? $tr['host'] : ''; 
  13891.                 $root .= ((isset($tr['port']) && $tr['port']) ? (':' . $tr['port']) : ''); // mPDF 5.7.3 
  13892.                 $path = $root . $path; 
  13893.             } else { 
  13894.                 $path = $basepath . $path; 
  13895.             } 
  13896.         } 
  13897.         //Do nothing if it is an Absolute Link 
  13898.     } 
  13899.  
  13900.     // Used for external CSS files 
  13901.     function _get_file($path) 
  13902.     { 
  13903.         // If local file try using local path (? quicker, but also allowed even if allow_url_fopen false) 
  13904.         $contents = ''; 
  13905.         // mPDF 5.7.3 
  13906.         if (strpos($path, "//") === false) { 
  13907.             $path = preg_replace('/\.css\?.*$/', '.css', $path); 
  13908.         } 
  13909.         $contents = @file_get_contents($path); 
  13910.         if ($contents) { 
  13911.             return $contents; 
  13912.         } 
  13913.         if ($this->basepathIsLocal) { 
  13914.             $tr = parse_url($path); 
  13915.             $lp = getenv("SCRIPT_NAME"); 
  13916.             $ap = realpath($lp); 
  13917.             $ap = str_replace("\\", "/", $ap); 
  13918.             $docroot = substr($ap, 0, strpos($ap, $lp)); 
  13919.             // WriteHTML parses all paths to full URLs; may be local file name 
  13920.             if ($tr['scheme'] && $tr['host'] && $_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"]) { 
  13921.                 $localpath = $_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"] . $tr['path']; 
  13922.             } 
  13923.             // DOCUMENT_ROOT is not returned on IIS 
  13924.             elseif ($docroot) { 
  13925.                 $localpath = $docroot . $tr['path']; 
  13926.             } else { 
  13927.                 $localpath = $path; 
  13928.             } 
  13929.             $contents = @file_get_contents($localpath); 
  13930.         } 
  13931.         // if not use full URL 
  13932.         elseif (!$contents && !ini_get('allow_url_fopen') && function_exists("curl_init")) { 
  13933.             $ch = curl_init($path); 
  13934.             curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0); 
  13935.             curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1); 
  13936.             $contents = curl_exec($ch); 
  13937.             curl_close($ch); 
  13938.         } 
  13939.         return $contents; 
  13940.     } 
  13941.  
  13942.     function docPageNum($num = 0, $extras = false) 
  13943.     { 
  13944.         if ($num < 1) { 
  13945.             $num = $this->page; 
  13946.         } 
  13947.         $type = $this->defaultPageNumStyle; // set default Page Number Style 
  13948.         $ppgno = $num; 
  13949.         $suppress = 0; 
  13950.         $offset = 0; 
  13951.         $lastreset = 0; 
  13952.         foreach ($this->PageNumSubstitutions AS $psarr) { 
  13953.             if ($num >= $psarr['from']) { 
  13954.                 if ($psarr['reset']) { 
  13955.                     if ($psarr['reset'] > 1) { 
  13956.                         $offset = $psarr['reset'] - 1; 
  13957.                     } 
  13958.                     $ppgno = $num - $psarr['from'] + 1 + $offset; 
  13959.                     $lastreset = $psarr['from']; 
  13960.                 } 
  13961.                 if ($psarr['type']) { 
  13962.                     $type = $psarr['type']; 
  13963.                 } 
  13964.                 if (strtoupper($psarr['suppress']) == 'ON' || $psarr['suppress'] == 1) { 
  13965.                     $suppress = 1; 
  13966.                 } elseif (strtoupper($psarr['suppress']) == 'OFF') { 
  13967.                     $suppress = 0; 
  13968.                 } 
  13969.             } 
  13970.         } 
  13971.         if ($suppress) { 
  13972.             return ''; 
  13973.         } 
  13974.  
  13975.         $ppgno = $this->_getStyledNumber($ppgno, $type); 
  13976.         if ($extras) { 
  13977.             $ppgno = $this->pagenumPrefix . $ppgno . $this->pagenumSuffix; 
  13978.         } 
  13979.         return $ppgno; 
  13980.     } 
  13981.  
  13982.     function docPageNumTotal($num = 0, $extras = false) 
  13983.     { 
  13984.         if ($num < 1) { 
  13985.             $num = $this->page; 
  13986.         } 
  13987.         $type = $this->defaultPageNumStyle; // set default Page Number Style 
  13988.         $ppgstart = 1; 
  13989.         $ppgend = count($this->pages) + 1; 
  13990.         $suppress = 0; 
  13991.         $offset = 0; 
  13992.         foreach ($this->PageNumSubstitutions AS $psarr) { 
  13993.             if ($num >= $psarr['from']) { 
  13994.                 if ($psarr['reset']) { 
  13995.                     if ($psarr['reset'] > 1) { 
  13996.                         $offset = $psarr['reset'] - 1; 
  13997.                     } 
  13998.                     $ppgstart = $psarr['from'] + $offset; 
  13999.                     $ppgend = count($this->pages) + 1 + $offset; 
  14000.                 } 
  14001.                 if ($psarr['type']) { 
  14002.                     $type = $psarr['type']; 
  14003.                 } 
  14004.                 if (strtoupper($psarr['suppress']) == 'ON' || $psarr['suppress'] == 1) { 
  14005.                     $suppress = 1; 
  14006.                 } elseif (strtoupper($psarr['suppress']) == 'OFF') { 
  14007.                     $suppress = 0; 
  14008.                 } 
  14009.             } 
  14010.             if ($num < $psarr['from']) { 
  14011.                 if ($psarr['reset']) { 
  14012.                     $ppgend = $psarr['from'] + $offset; 
  14013.                     break; 
  14014.                 } 
  14015.             } 
  14016.         } 
  14017.         if ($suppress) { 
  14018.             return ''; 
  14019.         } 
  14020.         $ppgno = $ppgend - $ppgstart + $offset; 
  14021.  
  14022.         $ppgno = $this->_getStyledNumber($ppgno, $type); 
  14023.         if ($extras) { 
  14024.             $ppgno = $this->pagenumPrefix . $ppgno . $this->pagenumSuffix; 
  14025.         } 
  14026.         return $ppgno; 
  14027.     } 
  14028.  
  14029.     // mPDF 6 
  14030.     function _getStyledNumber($ppgno, $type, $listmarker = false) 
  14031.     { 
  14032.         if ($listmarker) { 
  14033.             $reverse = true;   // Reverse RTL numerals (Hebrew) when using for list 
  14034.             $checkfont = true; // Using list - font is set, so check if character is available 
  14035.         } else { 
  14036.             $reverse = false;  // For pagenumbers, RTL numerals (Hebrew) will get reversed later by bidi 
  14037.             $checkfont = false; // For pagenumbers - font is not set, so no check 
  14038.         } 
  14039.         $lowertype = strtolower($type); 
  14040.         if ($lowertype == 'upper-latin' || $lowertype == 'upper-alpha' || $type == 'A') { 
  14041.             $ppgno = $this->dec2alpha($ppgno, true); 
  14042.         } elseif ($lowertype == 'lower-latin' || $lowertype == 'lower-alpha' || $type == 'a') { 
  14043.             $ppgno = $this->dec2alpha($ppgno, false); 
  14044.         } elseif ($lowertype == 'upper-roman' || $type == 'I') { 
  14045.             $ppgno = $this->dec2roman($ppgno, true); 
  14046.         } elseif ($lowertype == 'lower-roman' || $type == 'i') { 
  14047.             $ppgno = $this->dec2roman($ppgno, false); 
  14048.         } elseif ($lowertype == 'hebrew') { 
  14049.             $ppgno = $this->dec2hebrew($ppgno, $reverse); 
  14050.         } elseif (preg_match('/(arabic-indic|bengali|devanagari|gujarati|gurmukhi|kannada|malayalam|oriya|persian|tamil|telugu|thai|urdu|cambodian|khmer|lao)/i', $lowertype, $m)) { 
  14051.             switch ($m[1]) { //Format type 
  14052.                 case 'arabic-indic': $cp = 0x0660; 
  14053.                     break; 
  14054.                 case 'persian': 
  14055.                 case 'urdu': $cp = 0x06F0; 
  14056.                     break; 
  14057.                 case 'bengali': $cp = 0x09E6; 
  14058.                     break; 
  14059.                 case 'devanagari': $cp = 0x0966; 
  14060.                     break; 
  14061.                 case 'gujarati': $cp = 0x0AE6; 
  14062.                     break; 
  14063.                 case 'gurmukhi': $cp = 0x0A66; 
  14064.                     break; 
  14065.                 case 'kannada': $cp = 0x0CE6; 
  14066.                     break; 
  14067.                 case 'malayalam': $cp = 0x0D66; 
  14068.                     break; 
  14069.                 case 'oriya': $cp = 0x0B66; 
  14070.                     break; 
  14071.                 case 'telugu': $cp = 0x0C66; 
  14072.                     break; 
  14073.                 case 'tamil': $cp = 0x0BE6; 
  14074.                     break; 
  14075.                 case 'thai': $cp = 0x0E50; 
  14076.                     break; 
  14077.                 case 'khmer': 
  14078.                 case 'cambodian': $cp = 0x17E0; 
  14079.                     break; 
  14080.                 case 'lao': $cp = 0x0ED0; 
  14081.                     break; 
  14082.             } 
  14083.             $ppgno = $this->dec2other($ppgno, $cp, $checkfont); 
  14084.         } elseif ($lowertype == 'cjk-decimal') { 
  14085.             $ppgno = $this->dec2cjk($ppgno); 
  14086.         } 
  14087.         return $ppgno; 
  14088.     } 
  14089.  
  14090.     function docPageSettings($num = 0) 
  14091.     { 
  14092.         // Returns current type (numberstyle), suppression state for this page number; 
  14093.         // reset is only returned if set for this page number 
  14094.         if ($num < 1) { 
  14095.             $num = $this->page; 
  14096.         } 
  14097.         $type = $this->defaultPageNumStyle; // set default Page Number Style 
  14098.         $ppgno = $num; 
  14099.         $suppress = 0; 
  14100.         $offset = 0; 
  14101.         $reset = ''; 
  14102.         foreach ($this->PageNumSubstitutions AS $psarr) { 
  14103.             if ($num >= $psarr['from']) { 
  14104.                 if ($psarr['reset']) { 
  14105.                     if ($psarr['reset'] > 1) { 
  14106.                         $offset = $psarr['reset'] - 1; 
  14107.                     } 
  14108.                     $ppgno = $num - $psarr['from'] + 1 + $offset; 
  14109.                 } 
  14110.                 if ($psarr['type']) { 
  14111.                     $type = $psarr['type']; 
  14112.                 } 
  14113.                 if (strtoupper($psarr['suppress']) == 'ON' || $psarr['suppress'] == 1) { 
  14114.                     $suppress = 1; 
  14115.                 } elseif (strtoupper($psarr['suppress']) == 'OFF') { 
  14116.                     $suppress = 0; 
  14117.                 } 
  14118.             } 
  14119.             if ($num == $psarr['from']) { 
  14120.                 $reset = $psarr['reset']; 
  14121.             } 
  14122.         } 
  14123.         if ($suppress) { 
  14124.             $suppress = 'on'; 
  14125.         } else { 
  14126.             $suppress = 'off'; 
  14127.         } 
  14128.         return array($type, $suppress, $reset); 
  14129.     } 
  14130.  
  14131.     function RestartDocTemplate() 
  14132.     { 
  14133.         $this->docTemplateStart = $this->page; 
  14134.     } 
  14135.  
  14136.     //Page header 
  14137.     function Header($content = '') 
  14138.     { 
  14139.  
  14140.         $this->cMarginL = 0; 
  14141.         $this->cMarginR = 0; 
  14142.  
  14143.  
  14144.         if (($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page % 2 == 0) && $this->HTMLHeaderE) || ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page % 2 == 1) && $this->HTMLHeader) || (!$this->mirrorMargins && $this->HTMLHeader)) { 
  14145.             $this->writeHTMLHeaders(); 
  14146.             return; 
  14147.         } 
  14148.     } 
  14149.  
  14150.     /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  14151.  
  14152.     function TableHeaderFooter($content = '', $tablestartpage = '', $tablestartcolumn = '', $horf = 'H', $level, $firstSpread = true, $finalSpread = true) 
  14153.     { 
  14154.         if (($horf == 'H' || $horf == 'F') && !empty($content)) { // mPDF 5.7.2 
  14155.             $table = &$this->table[1][1]; 
  14156.  
  14157.             // mPDF 5.7.2 
  14158.             if ($horf == 'F') { // Table Footer 
  14159.                 $firstrow = count($table['cells']) - $table['footernrows']; 
  14160.                 $lastrow = count($table['cells']) - 1; 
  14161.             } else {  // Table Header 
  14162.                 $firstrow = 0; 
  14163.                 $lastrow = $table['headernrows'] - 1; 
  14164.             } 
  14165.             if (empty($content[$firstrow])) { 
  14166.                 if ($this->debug) { 
  14167.                     throw new MpdfException("<tfoot> must precede <tbody> in a table"); 
  14168.                 } else { 
  14169.                     return; 
  14170.                 } 
  14171.             } 
  14172.  
  14173.  
  14174.             // Advance down page by half width of top border 
  14175.             if ($horf == 'H') { // Only if header 
  14176.                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  14177.                     $adv = $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2 + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['padding']['T']; 
  14178.                 } else { 
  14179.                     $adv = $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] / 2; 
  14180.                 } 
  14181.                 if ($adv) { 
  14182.                     if ($this->table_rotate) { 
  14183.                         $this->y += ($adv); 
  14184.                     } else { 
  14185.                         $this->DivLn($adv, $this->blklvl, true); 
  14186.                     } 
  14187.                 } 
  14188.             } 
  14189.  
  14190.             $topy = $content[$firstrow][0]['y'] - $this->y; 
  14191.  
  14192.             for ($i = $firstrow; $i <= $lastrow; $i++) { 
  14193.  
  14194.                 $y = $this->y; 
  14195.  
  14196.                 /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  14197.                 // If outside columns, this is done in PaintDivBB 
  14198.                 if ($this->ColActive) { 
  14199.                     //OUTER FILL BGCOLOR of DIVS 
  14200.                     if ($this->blklvl > 0) { 
  14201.                         $firstblockfill = $this->GetFirstBlockFill(); 
  14202.                         if ($firstblockfill && $this->blklvl >= $firstblockfill) { 
  14203.                             $divh = $content[$i][0]['h']; 
  14204.                             $bak_x = $this->x; 
  14205.                             $this->DivLn($divh, -3, false); 
  14206.                             // Reset current block fill 
  14207.                             $bcor = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray']; 
  14208.                             $this->SetFColor($bcor); 
  14209.                             $this->x = $bak_x; 
  14210.                         } 
  14211.                     } 
  14212.                 } 
  14213.                 /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  14214.  
  14215.                 $colctr = 0; 
  14216.                 foreach ($content[$i] as $tablehf) { 
  14217.                     $colctr++; 
  14218.                     $y = $tablehf['y'] - $topy; 
  14219.                     $this->y = $y; 
  14220.                     //Set some cell values 
  14221.                     $x = $tablehf['x']; 
  14222.                     if (($this->mirrorMargins) && ($tablestartpage == 'ODD') && (($this->page) % 2 == 0)) { // EVEN 
  14223.                         $x = $x + $this->MarginCorrection; 
  14224.                     } elseif (($this->mirrorMargins) && ($tablestartpage == 'EVEN') && (($this->page) % 2 == 1)) { // ODD 
  14225.                         $x = $x + $this->MarginCorrection; 
  14226.                     } 
  14227.                     /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  14228.                     // Added to correct for Columns 
  14229.                     if ($this->ColActive) { 
  14230.                         if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *OTL* 
  14231.                             $x -= ($this->CurrCol - $tablestartcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); // *OTL* 
  14232.                         } // *OTL* 
  14233.                         else { // *OTL* 
  14234.                             $x += ($this->CurrCol - $tablestartcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  14235.                         } // *OTL* 
  14236.                     } 
  14237.                     /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  14238.  
  14239.                     if ($colctr == 1) { 
  14240.                         $x0 = $x; 
  14241.                     } 
  14242.  
  14243.                     // mPDF ITERATION 
  14244.                     if ($this->iterationCounter) { 
  14245.                         foreach ($tablehf['textbuffer'] AS $k => $t) { 
  14246.                             if (!is_array($t[0]) && preg_match('/{iteration ([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)}/', $t[0], $m)) { 
  14247.                                 $vname = '__' . $m[1] . '_'; 
  14248.                                 if (!isset($this->$vname)) { 
  14249.                                     $this->$vname = 1; 
  14250.                                 } else { 
  14251.                                     $this->$vname++; 
  14252.                                 } 
  14253.                                 $tablehf['textbuffer'][$k][0] = preg_replace('/{iteration ' . $m[1] . '}/', $this->$vname, $tablehf['textbuffer'][$k][0]); 
  14254.                             } 
  14255.                         } 
  14256.                     } 
  14257.  
  14258.                     $w = $tablehf['w']; 
  14259.                     $h = $tablehf['h']; 
  14260.                     $va = $tablehf['va']; 
  14261.                     $R = $tablehf['R']; 
  14262.                     $direction = $tablehf['direction']; 
  14263.                     $mih = $tablehf['mih']; 
  14264.                     $border = $tablehf['border']; 
  14265.                     $border_details = $tablehf['border_details']; 
  14266.                     $padding = $tablehf['padding']; 
  14267.                     $this->tabletheadjustfinished = true; 
  14268.  
  14269.                     $textbuffer = $tablehf['textbuffer']; 
  14270.  
  14271.                     //Align 
  14272.                     $align = $tablehf['a']; 
  14273.                     $this->cellTextAlign = $align; 
  14274.  
  14275.                     $this->cellLineHeight = $tablehf['cellLineHeight']; 
  14276.                     $this->cellLineStackingStrategy = $tablehf['cellLineStackingStrategy']; 
  14277.                     $this->cellLineStackingShift = $tablehf['cellLineStackingShift']; 
  14278.  
  14279.                     $this->x = $x; 
  14280.  
  14281.                     if ($this->ColActive) { 
  14282.                         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  14283.                             $tablefill = isset($table['bgcolor'][-1]) ? $table['bgcolor'][-1] : 0; 
  14284.                             if ($tablefill) { 
  14285.                                 $color = $this->ConvertColor($tablefill); 
  14286.                                 if ($color) { 
  14287.                                     $xadj = ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14288.                                     $yadj = ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  14289.                                     $wadj = $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  14290.                                     $hadj = $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  14291.                                     if ($i == $firstrow && $horf == 'H') {  // Top 
  14292.                                         $yadj += $table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w']; 
  14293.                                         $hadj += $table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w']; 
  14294.                                     } 
  14295.                                     if (($i == ($lastrow) || (isset($tablehf['rowspan']) && ($i + $tablehf['rowspan']) == ($lastrow + 1)) || (!isset($tablehf['rowspan']) && ($i + 1) == ($lastrow + 1))) && $horf == 'F') { // Bottom 
  14296.                                         $hadj += $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w']; 
  14297.                                     } 
  14298.                                     if ($colctr == 1) {  // Left 
  14299.                                         $xadj += $table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w']; 
  14300.                                         $wadj += $table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w']; 
  14301.                                     } 
  14302.                                     if ($colctr == count($content[$i])) { // Right 
  14303.                                         $wadj += $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w']; 
  14304.                                     } 
  14305.                                     $this->SetFColor($color); 
  14306.                                     $this->Rect($x - $xadj, $y - $yadj, $w + $wadj, $h + $hadj, 'F'); 
  14307.                                 } 
  14308.                             } 
  14309.                         } 
  14310.                     } 
  14311.  
  14312.                     if ($table['empty_cells'] != 'hide' || !empty($textbuffer) || !$table['borders_separate']) { 
  14313.                         $paintcell = true; 
  14314.                     } else { 
  14315.                         $paintcell = false; 
  14316.                     } 
  14317.  
  14318.                     //Vertical align 
  14319.                     if ($R && INTVAL($R) > 0 && isset($va) && $va != 'B') { 
  14320.                         $va = 'B'; 
  14321.                     } 
  14322.  
  14323.                     if (!isset($va) || empty($va) || $va == 'M') 
  14324.                         $this->y += ($h - $mih) / 2; 
  14325.                     elseif (isset($va) && $va == 'B') 
  14326.                         $this->y += $h - $mih; 
  14327.  
  14328.  
  14329.                     //TABLE ROW OR CELL FILL BGCOLOR 
  14330.                     $fill = 0; 
  14331.                     if (isset($tablehf['bgcolor']) && $tablehf['bgcolor'] && $tablehf['bgcolor'] != 'transparent') { 
  14332.                         $fill = $tablehf['bgcolor']; 
  14333.                         $leveladj = 6; 
  14334.                     } elseif (isset($content[$i][0]['trbgcolor']) && $content[$i][0]['trbgcolor'] && $content[$i][0]['trbgcolor'] != 'transparent') { // Row color 
  14335.                         $fill = $content[$i][0]['trbgcolor']; 
  14336.                         $leveladj = 3; 
  14337.                     } 
  14338.                     if ($fill && $paintcell) { 
  14339.                         $color = $this->ConvertColor($fill); 
  14340.                         if ($color) { 
  14341.                             if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  14342.                                 if ($this->ColActive) { 
  14343.                                     $this->SetFColor($color); 
  14344.                                     $this->Rect($x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2), $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2), $w - $table['border_spacing_H'], $h - $table['border_spacing_V'], 'F'); 
  14345.                                 } else { 
  14346.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + $leveladj][] = array('gradient' => false, 'x' => ($x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2)), 'y' => ($y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2)), 'w' => ($w - $table['border_spacing_H']), 'h' => ($h - $table['border_spacing_V']), 'col' => $color); 
  14347.                                 } 
  14348.                             } else { 
  14349.                                 if ($this->ColActive) { 
  14350.                                     $this->SetFColor($color); 
  14351.                                     $this->Rect($x, $y, $w, $h, 'F'); 
  14352.                                 } else { 
  14353.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + $leveladj][] = array('gradient' => false, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'col' => $color); 
  14354.                                 } 
  14355.                             } 
  14356.                         } 
  14357.                     } 
  14358.  
  14359.  
  14360.                     /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  14361.                     if (isset($tablehf['gradient']) && $tablehf['gradient'] && $paintcell) { 
  14362.                         $g = $this->grad->parseBackgroundGradient($tablehf['gradient']); 
  14363.                         if ($g) { 
  14364.                             if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  14365.                                 $px = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14366.                                 $py = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  14367.                                 $pw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  14368.                                 $ph = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  14369.                             } else { 
  14370.                                 $px = $x; 
  14371.                                 $py = $y; 
  14372.                                 $pw = $w; 
  14373.                                 $ph = $h; 
  14374.                             } 
  14375.                             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  14376.                                 $this->grad->Gradient($px, $py, $pw, $ph, $g['type'], $g['stops'], $g['colorspace'], $g['coords'], $g['extend']); 
  14377.                             } else { 
  14378.                                 $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 7][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $px, 'y' => $py, 'w' => $pw, 'h' => $ph, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => ''); 
  14379.                             } 
  14380.                         } 
  14381.                     } 
  14382.  
  14383.                     if (isset($tablehf['background-image']) && $paintcell) { 
  14384.                         if ($tablehf['background-image']['gradient'] && preg_match('/(-moz-)*(repeating-)*(linear|radial)-gradient/', $tablehf['background-image']['gradient'])) { 
  14385.                             $g = $this->grad->parseMozGradient($tablehf['background-image']['gradient']); 
  14386.                             if ($g) { 
  14387.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  14388.                                     $px = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14389.                                     $py = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  14390.                                     $pw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  14391.                                     $ph = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  14392.                                 } else { 
  14393.                                     $px = $x; 
  14394.                                     $py = $y; 
  14395.                                     $pw = $w; 
  14396.                                     $ph = $h; 
  14397.                                 } 
  14398.                                 if ($this->ColActive) { 
  14399.                                     $this->grad->Gradient($px, $py, $pw, $ph, $g['type'], $g['stops'], $g['colorspace'], $g['coords'], $g['extend']); 
  14400.                                 } else { 
  14401.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 7][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $px, 'y' => $py, 'w' => $pw, 'h' => $ph, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => ''); 
  14402.                                 } 
  14403.                             } 
  14404.                         } elseif ($tablehf['background-image']['image_id']) { // Background pattern 
  14405.                             $n = count($this->patterns) + 1; 
  14406.                             if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  14407.                                 $px = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14408.                                 $py = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  14409.                                 $pw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  14410.                                 $ph = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  14411.                             } else { 
  14412.                                 $px = $x; 
  14413.                                 $py = $y; 
  14414.                                 $pw = $w; 
  14415.                                 $ph = $h; 
  14416.                             } 
  14417.                             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  14418.                                 list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($tablehf['background-image']['orig_w'], $tablehf['background-image']['orig_h'], $pw, $ph, $tablehf['background-image']['resize'], $tablehf['background-image']['x_repeat'], $tablehf['background-image']['y_repeat']); 
  14419.                                 $this->patterns[$n] = array('x' => $px, 'y' => $py, 'w' => $pw, 'h' => $ph, 'pgh' => $this->h, 'image_id' => $tablehf['background-image']['image_id'], 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $tablehf['background-image']['x_pos'], 'y_pos' => $tablehf['background-image']['y_pos'], 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'itype' => $tablehf['background-image']['itype']); 
  14420.                                 if ($tablehf['background-image']['opacity'] > 0 && $tablehf['background-image']['opacity'] < 1) { 
  14421.                                     $opac = $this->SetAlpha($tablehf['background-image']['opacity'], 'Normal', true); 
  14422.                                 } else { 
  14423.                                     $opac = ''; 
  14424.                                 } 
  14425.                                 $this->_out(sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re f Q', $n, $opac, $px * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $py) * _MPDFK, $pw * _MPDFK, -$ph * _MPDFK)); 
  14426.                             } else { 
  14427.                                 $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 8][] = array('x' => $px, 'y' => $py, 'w' => $pw, 'h' => $ph, 'image_id' => $tablehf['background-image']['image_id'], 'orig_w' => $tablehf['background-image']['orig_w'], 'orig_h' => $tablehf['background-image']['orig_h'], 'x_pos' => $tablehf['background-image']['x_pos'], 'y_pos' => $tablehf['background-image']['y_pos'], 'x_repeat' => $tablehf['background-image']['x_repeat'], 'y_repeat' => $tablehf['background-image']['y_repeat'], 'clippath' => '', 'resize' => $tablehf['background-image']['resize'], 'opacity' => $tablehf['background-image']['opacity'], 'itype' => $tablehf['background-image']['itype']); 
  14428.                             } 
  14429.                         } 
  14430.                     } 
  14431.                     /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  14432.  
  14433.                     //Cell Border 
  14434.                     if ($table['borders_separate'] && $paintcell && $border) { 
  14435.                         $this->_tableRect($x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2) + ($border_details['L']['w'] / 2), $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2) + ($border_details['T']['w'] / 2), $w - $table['border_spacing_H'] - ($border_details['L']['w'] / 2) - ($border_details['R']['w'] / 2), $h - $table['border_spacing_V'] - ($border_details['T']['w'] / 2) - ($border_details['B']['w'] / 2), $border, $border_details, false, $table['borders_separate']); 
  14436.                     } elseif ($paintcell && $border) { 
  14437.                         $this->_tableRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $border, $border_details, true, $table['borders_separate']);   // true causes buffer 
  14438.                     } 
  14439.  
  14440.                     //Print cell content 
  14441.                     if (!empty($textbuffer)) { 
  14442.                         if ($horf == 'F' && preg_match('/{colsum([0-9]*)[_]*}/', $textbuffer[0][0], $m)) { 
  14443.                             $rep = sprintf("%01." . intval($m[1]) . "f", $this->colsums[$colctr - 1]); 
  14444.                             $textbuffer[0][0] = preg_replace('/{colsum[0-9_]*}/', $rep, $textbuffer[0][0]); 
  14445.                         } 
  14446.  
  14447.                         if ($R) { 
  14448.                             $cellPtSize = $textbuffer[0][11] / $this->shrin_k; 
  14449.                             if (!$cellPtSize) { 
  14450.                                 $cellPtSize = $this->default_font_size; 
  14451.                             } 
  14452.                             $cellFontHeight = ($cellPtSize / _MPDFK); 
  14453.                             $opx = $this->x; 
  14454.                             $opy = $this->y; 
  14455.                             $angle = INTVAL($R); 
  14456.                             // Only allow 45 - 90 degrees (when bottom-aligned) or -90 
  14457.                             if ($angle > 90) { 
  14458.                                 $angle = 90; 
  14459.                             } elseif ($angle > 0 && (isset($va) && $va != 'B')) { 
  14460.                                 $angle = 90; 
  14461.                             } elseif ($angle > 0 && $angle < 45) { 
  14462.                                 $angle = 45; 
  14463.                             } elseif ($angle < 0) { 
  14464.                                 $angle = -90; 
  14465.                             } 
  14466.                             $offset = ((sin(deg2rad($angle))) * 0.37 * $cellFontHeight); 
  14467.                             if (isset($align) && $align == 'R') { 
  14468.                                 $this->x += ($w) + ($offset) - ($cellFontHeight / 3) - ($padding['R'] + $border_details['R']['w']); 
  14469.                             } elseif (!isset($align) || $align == 'C') { 
  14470.                                 $this->x += ($w / 2) + ($offset); 
  14471.                             } else { 
  14472.                                 $this->x += ($offset) + ($cellFontHeight / 3) + ($padding['L'] + $border_details['L']['w']); 
  14473.                             } 
  14474.                             $str = ''; 
  14475.                             foreach ($tablehf['textbuffer'] AS $t) { 
  14476.                                 $str .= $t[0] . ' '; 
  14477.                             } 
  14478.                             $str = rtrim($str); 
  14479.  
  14480.                             if (!isset($va) || $va == 'M') { 
  14481.                                 $this->y -= ($h - $mih) / 2; //Undo what was added earlier VERTICAL ALIGN 
  14482.                                 if ($angle > 0) { 
  14483.                                     $this->y += (($h - $mih) / 2) + ($padding['T'] + $border_details['T']['w']) + ($mih - ($padding['T'] + $border_details['T']['w'] + $border_details['B']['w'] + $padding['B'])); 
  14484.                                 } elseif ($angle < 0) { 
  14485.                                     $this->y += (($h - $mih) / 2) + ($padding['T'] + $border_details['T']['w']); 
  14486.                                 } 
  14487.                             } elseif (isset($va) && $va == 'B') { 
  14488.                                 $this->y -= $h - $mih; //Undo what was added earlier VERTICAL ALIGN 
  14489.                                 if ($angle > 0) { 
  14490.                                     $this->y += $h - ($border_details['B']['w'] + $padding['B']); 
  14491.                                 } elseif ($angle < 0) { 
  14492.                                     $this->y += $h - $mih + ($padding['T'] + $border_details['T']['w']); 
  14493.                                 } 
  14494.                             } elseif (isset($va) && $va == 'T') { 
  14495.                                 if ($angle > 0) { 
  14496.                                     $this->y += $mih - ($border_details['B']['w'] + $padding['B']); 
  14497.                                 } elseif ($angle < 0) { 
  14498.                                     $this->y += ($padding['T'] + $border_details['T']['w']); 
  14499.                                 } 
  14500.                             } 
  14501.  
  14502.                             $this->Rotate($angle, $this->x, $this->y); 
  14503.                             $s_fs = $this->FontSizePt; 
  14504.                             $s_f = $this->FontFamily; 
  14505.                             $s_st = $this->FontStyle; 
  14506.                             if (!empty($textbuffer[0][3])) { //Font Color 
  14507.                                 $cor = $textbuffer[0][3]; 
  14508.                                 $this->SetTColor($cor); 
  14509.                             } 
  14510.                             $this->SetFont($textbuffer[0][4], $textbuffer[0][2], $cellPtSize, true, true); 
  14511.  
  14512.                             $this->magic_reverse_dir($str, $this->directionality, $textbuffer[0][18]); 
  14513.                             $this->Text($this->x, $this->y, $str, $textbuffer[0][18], $textbuffer[0][8]); // textvar 
  14514.                             $this->Rotate(0); 
  14515.                             $this->SetFont($s_f, $s_st, $s_fs, true, true); 
  14516.                             $this->SetTColor(0); 
  14517.                             $this->x = $opx; 
  14518.                             $this->y = $opy; 
  14519.                         } else { 
  14520.                             if ($table['borders_separate']) { // NB twice border width 
  14521.                                 $xadj = $border_details['L']['w'] + $padding['L'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14522.                                 $wadj = $border_details['L']['w'] + $border_details['R']['w'] + $padding['L'] + $padding['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  14523.                                 $yadj = $border_details['T']['w'] + $padding['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14524.                             } else { 
  14525.                                 $xadj = $border_details['L']['w'] / 2 + $padding['L']; 
  14526.                                 $wadj = ($border_details['L']['w'] + $border_details['R']['w']) / 2 + $padding['L'] + $padding['R']; 
  14527.                                 $yadj = $border_details['T']['w'] / 2 + $padding['T']; 
  14528.                             } 
  14529.  
  14530.                             $this->divwidth = $w - ($wadj); 
  14531.                             $this->x += $xadj; 
  14532.                             $this->y += $yadj; 
  14533.                             $this->printbuffer($textbuffer, '', true, false, $direction); 
  14534.                         } 
  14535.                     } 
  14536.                     $textbuffer = array(); 
  14537.  
  14538.                     /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  14539.                     if (!$this->ColActive) { 
  14540.                         if (isset($content[$i][0]['trgradients']) && ($colctr == 1 || $table['borders_separate'])) { 
  14541.                             $g = $this->grad->parseBackgroundGradient($content[$i][0]['trgradients']); 
  14542.                             if ($g) { 
  14543.                                 $gx = $x0; 
  14544.                                 $gy = $y; 
  14545.                                 $gh = $h; 
  14546.                                 $gw = $table['w'] - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2) - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] / 2) - $table['margin']['L'] - $table['margin']['R']; 
  14547.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  14548.                                     $gw -= ($table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_H']); 
  14549.                                     $clx = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14550.                                     $cly = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  14551.                                     $clw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  14552.                                     $clh = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  14553.                                     // Set clipping path 
  14554.                                     $s = $this->_setClippingPath($clx, $cly, $clw, $clh); // mPDF 6 
  14555.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 4][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $gx + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2), 'y' => $gy + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2), 'w' => $gw - $table['border_spacing_V'], 'h' => $gh - $table['border_spacing_H'], 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => $s); 
  14556.                                 } else { 
  14557.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 4][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $gx, 'y' => $gy, 'w' => $gw, 'h' => $gh, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => ''); 
  14558.                                 } 
  14559.                             } 
  14560.                         } 
  14561.  
  14562.                         if (isset($content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']) && ($colctr == 1 || $table['borders_separate'])) { 
  14563.                             if ($content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['gradient'] && preg_match('/(-moz-)*(repeating-)*(linear|radial)-gradient/', $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['gradient'])) { 
  14564.                                 $g = $this->grad->parseMozGradient($content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['gradient']); 
  14565.                                 if ($g) { 
  14566.                                     $gx = $x0; 
  14567.                                     $gy = $y; 
  14568.                                     $gh = $h; 
  14569.                                     $gw = $table['w'] - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2) - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] / 2) - $table['margin']['L'] - $table['margin']['R']; 
  14570.                                     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  14571.                                         $gw -= ($table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_H']); 
  14572.                                         $clx = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14573.                                         $cly = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  14574.                                         $clw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  14575.                                         $clh = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  14576.                                         // Set clipping path 
  14577.                                         $s = $this->_setClippingPath($clx, $cly, $clw, $clh); // mPDF 6 
  14578.                                         $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 4][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $gx + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2), 'y' => $gy + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2), 'w' => $gw - $table['border_spacing_V'], 'h' => $gh - $table['border_spacing_H'], 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => $s); 
  14579.                                     } else { 
  14580.                                         $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 4][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $gx, 'y' => $gy, 'w' => $gw, 'h' => $gh, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => ''); 
  14581.                                     } 
  14582.                                 } 
  14583.                             } else { 
  14584.                                 $image_id = $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['image_id']; 
  14585.                                 $orig_w = $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['orig_w']; 
  14586.                                 $orig_h = $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['orig_h']; 
  14587.                                 $x_pos = $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['x_pos']; 
  14588.                                 $y_pos = $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['y_pos']; 
  14589.                                 $x_repeat = $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['x_repeat']; 
  14590.                                 $y_repeat = $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['y_repeat']; 
  14591.                                 $resize = $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['resize']; 
  14592.                                 $opacity = $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['opacity']; 
  14593.                                 $itype = $content[$i][0]['trbackground-images']['itype']; 
  14594.  
  14595.                                 $clippath = ''; 
  14596.                                 $gx = $x0; 
  14597.                                 $gy = $y; 
  14598.                                 $gh = $h; 
  14599.                                 $gw = $table['w'] - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2) - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] / 2) - $table['margin']['L'] - $table['margin']['R']; 
  14600.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  14601.                                     $gw -= ($table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_H']); 
  14602.                                     $clx = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14603.                                     $cly = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  14604.                                     $clw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  14605.                                     $clh = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  14606.                                     // Set clipping path 
  14607.                                     $s = $this->_setClippingPath($clx, $cly, $clw, $clh); // mPDF 6 
  14608.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 5][] = array('x' => $gx + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2), 'y' => $gy + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2), 'w' => $gw - $table['border_spacing_V'], 'h' => $gh - $table['border_spacing_H'], 'image_id' => $image_id, 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $x_pos, 'y_pos' => $y_pos, 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'clippath' => $s, 'resize' => $resize, 'opacity' => $opacity, 'itype' => $itype); 
  14609.                                 } else { 
  14610.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 5][] = array('x' => $gx, 'y' => $gy, 'w' => $gw, 'h' => $gh, 'image_id' => $image_id, 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $x_pos, 'y_pos' => $y_pos, 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'clippath' => '', 'resize' => $resize, 'opacity' => $opacity, 'itype' => $itype); 
  14611.                                 } 
  14612.                             } 
  14613.                         } 
  14614.                     } 
  14615.                     /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  14616.  
  14617.                     // TABLE BORDER - if separate OR collapsed and only table border 
  14618.                     if (($table['borders_separate'] || ($this->simpleTables && !$table['simple']['border'])) && $table['border']) { 
  14619.                         $halfspaceL = $table['padding']['L'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14620.                         $halfspaceR = $table['padding']['R'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  14621.                         $halfspaceT = $table['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  14622.                         $halfspaceB = $table['padding']['B'] + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  14623.                         $tbx = $x; 
  14624.                         $tby = $y; 
  14625.                         $tbw = $w; 
  14626.                         $tbh = $h; 
  14627.                         $tab_bord = 0; 
  14628.                         $corner = ''; 
  14629.                         if ($i == $firstrow && $horf == 'H') {  // Top 
  14630.                             $tby -= $halfspaceT + ($table['border_details']['T']['w'] / 2); 
  14631.                             $tbh += $halfspaceT + ($table['border_details']['T']['w'] / 2); 
  14632.                             $this->setBorder($tab_bord, _BORDER_TOP); 
  14633.                             $corner .= 'T'; 
  14634.                         } 
  14635.                         if (($i == ($lastrow) || (isset($tablehf['rowspan']) && ($i + $tablehf['rowspan']) == ($lastrow + 1))) && $horf == 'F') { // Bottom 
  14636.                             $tbh += $halfspaceB + ($table['border_details']['B']['w'] / 2); 
  14637.                             $this->setBorder($tab_bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
  14638.                             $corner .= 'B'; 
  14639.                         } 
  14640.                         if ($colctr == 1 && $firstSpread) { // Left 
  14641.                             $tbx -= $halfspaceL + ($table['border_details']['L']['w'] / 2); 
  14642.                             $tbw += $halfspaceL + ($table['border_details']['L']['w'] / 2); 
  14643.                             $this->setBorder($tab_bord, _BORDER_LEFT); 
  14644.                             $corner .= 'L'; 
  14645.                         } 
  14646.                         if ($colctr == count($content[$i]) && $finalSpread) { // Right 
  14647.                             $tbw += $halfspaceR + ($table['border_details']['R']['w'] / 2); 
  14648.                             $this->setBorder($tab_bord, _BORDER_RIGHT); 
  14649.                             $corner .= 'R'; 
  14650.                         } 
  14651.                         $this->_tableRect($tbx, $tby, $tbw, $tbh, $tab_bord, $table['border_details'], false, $table['borders_separate'], 'table', $corner, $table['border_spacing_V'], $table['border_spacing_H']); 
  14652.                     } 
  14653.                 }// end column $content 
  14654.                 $this->y = $y + $h; //Update y coordinate 
  14655.             }// end row $i 
  14656.             unset($table); 
  14657.             $this->colsums = array(); 
  14658.         } 
  14659.     } 
  14660.  
  14661.     /** -- END TABLES -- */ 
  14662.  
  14663.     function SetHTMLHeader($header = '', $OE = '', $write = false) 
  14664.     { 
  14665.  
  14666.         $height = 0; 
  14667.         if (is_array($header) && isset($header['html']) && $header['html']) { 
  14668.             $Hhtml = $header['html']; 
  14669.             if ($this->setAutoTopMargin) { 
  14670.                 if (isset($header['h'])) { 
  14671.                     $height = $header['h']; 
  14672.                 } else { 
  14673.                     $height = $this->_gethtmlheight($Hhtml); 
  14674.                 } 
  14675.             } 
  14676.         } elseif (!is_array($header) && $header) { 
  14677.             $Hhtml = $header; 
  14678.             if ($this->setAutoTopMargin) { 
  14679.                 $height = $this->_gethtmlheight($Hhtml); 
  14680.             } 
  14681.         } else { 
  14682.             $Hhtml = ''; 
  14683.         } 
  14684.  
  14685.         if ($OE != 'E') { 
  14686.             $OE = 'O'; 
  14687.         } 
  14688.         if ($OE == 'E') { 
  14689.  
  14690.             if ($Hhtml) { 
  14691.                 $this->HTMLHeaderE['html'] = $Hhtml; 
  14692.                 $this->HTMLHeaderE['h'] = $height; 
  14693.             } else { 
  14694.                 $this->HTMLHeaderE = ''; 
  14695.             } 
  14696.         } else { 
  14697.  
  14698.             if ($Hhtml) { 
  14699.                 $this->HTMLHeader['html'] = $Hhtml; 
  14700.                 $this->HTMLHeader['h'] = $height; 
  14701.             } else { 
  14702.                 $this->HTMLHeader = ''; 
  14703.             } 
  14704.         } 
  14705.         if (!$this->mirrorMargins && $OE == 'E') { 
  14706.             return; 
  14707.         } 
  14708.         if ($Hhtml == '') { 
  14709.             return; 
  14710.         } 
  14711.  
  14712.         if ($this->setAutoTopMargin == 'pad') { 
  14713.             $this->tMargin = $this->margin_header + $height + $this->orig_tMargin; 
  14714.             if (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mt'])) { 
  14715.                 $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mt'] = $this->tMargin; 
  14716.             } 
  14717.         } elseif ($this->setAutoTopMargin == 'stretch') { 
  14718.             $this->tMargin = max($this->orig_tMargin, $this->margin_header + $height + $this->autoMarginPadding); 
  14719.             if (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mt'])) { 
  14720.                 $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mt'] = $this->tMargin; 
  14721.             } 
  14722.         } 
  14723.         if ($write && $this->state != 0 && (($this->mirrorMargins && $OE == 'E' && ($this->page) % 2 == 0) || ($this->mirrorMargins && $OE != 'E' && ($this->page) % 2 == 1) || !$this->mirrorMargins)) { 
  14724.             $this->writeHTMLHeaders(); 
  14725.         } 
  14726.     } 
  14727.  
  14728.     function SetHTMLFooter($footer = '', $OE = '') 
  14729.     { 
  14730.         $height = 0; 
  14731.         if (is_array($footer) && isset($footer['html']) && $footer['html']) { 
  14732.             $Fhtml = $footer['html']; 
  14733.             if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin) { 
  14734.                 if (isset($footer['h'])) { 
  14735.                     $height = $footer['h']; 
  14736.                 } else { 
  14737.                     $height = $this->_gethtmlheight($Fhtml); 
  14738.                 } 
  14739.             } 
  14740.         } elseif (!is_array($footer) && $footer) { 
  14741.             $Fhtml = $footer; 
  14742.             if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin) { 
  14743.                 $height = $this->_gethtmlheight($Fhtml); 
  14744.             } 
  14745.         } else { 
  14746.             $Fhtml = ''; 
  14747.         } 
  14748.  
  14749.         if ($OE != 'E') { 
  14750.             $OE = 'O'; 
  14751.         } 
  14752.         if ($OE == 'E') { 
  14753.  
  14754.             if ($Fhtml) { 
  14755.                 $this->HTMLFooterE['html'] = $Fhtml; 
  14756.                 $this->HTMLFooterE['h'] = $height; 
  14757.             } else { 
  14758.                 $this->HTMLFooterE = ''; 
  14759.             } 
  14760.         } else { 
  14761.  
  14762.             if ($Fhtml) { 
  14763.                 $this->HTMLFooter['html'] = $Fhtml; 
  14764.                 $this->HTMLFooter['h'] = $height; 
  14765.             } else { 
  14766.                 $this->HTMLFooter = ''; 
  14767.             } 
  14768.         } 
  14769.         if (!$this->mirrorMargins && $OE == 'E') { 
  14770.             return; 
  14771.         } 
  14772.         if ($Fhtml == '') { 
  14773.             return false; 
  14774.         } 
  14775.  
  14776.         if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin == 'pad') { 
  14777.             $this->bMargin = $this->margin_footer + $height + $this->orig_bMargin; 
  14778.             $this->PageBreakTrigger = $this->h - $this->bMargin; 
  14779.             if (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mb'])) { 
  14780.                 $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mb'] = $this->bMargin; 
  14781.             } 
  14782.         } elseif ($this->setAutoBottomMargin == 'stretch') { 
  14783.             $this->bMargin = max($this->orig_bMargin, $this->margin_footer + $height + $this->autoMarginPadding); 
  14784.             $this->PageBreakTrigger = $this->h - $this->bMargin; 
  14785.             if (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mb'])) { 
  14786.                 $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mb'] = $this->bMargin; 
  14787.             } 
  14788.         } 
  14789.     } 
  14790.  
  14791.     function _getHtmlHeight($html) 
  14792.     { 
  14793.         $save_state = $this->state; 
  14794.         if ($this->state == 0) { 
  14795.             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  14796.         } 
  14797.         $this->state = 2; 
  14798.         $this->Reset(); 
  14799.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  14800.         $save_x = $this->x; 
  14801.         $save_y = $this->y; 
  14802.         $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  14803.         $this->y = $this->margin_header; 
  14804.         $html = str_replace('{PAGENO}', $this->pagenumPrefix . $this->docPageNum($this->page) . $this->pagenumSuffix, $html); 
  14805.         $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPgGp, $this->nbpgPrefix . $this->docPageNumTotal($this->page) . $this->nbpgSuffix, $html); 
  14806.         $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPg, $this->page, $html); 
  14807.         $html = preg_replace_callback('/\{DATE\s+(.*?)\}/', array($this, 'date_callback'), $html); // mPDF 5.7 
  14808.         $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array(); 
  14809.         $this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots = array(); 
  14810.         $this->HTMLheaderPageForms = array(); 
  14811.         $savepb = $this->pageBackgrounds; 
  14812.         $this->writingHTMLheader = true; 
  14813.         $this->WriteHTML($html, 4); // parameter 4 saves output to $this->headerbuffer 
  14814.         $this->writingHTMLheader = false; 
  14815.         $h = ($this->y - $this->margin_header); 
  14816.         $this->Reset(); 
  14817.         // mPDF 5.7.2 - Clear in case Float used in Header/Footer 
  14818.         $this->blk[0]['blockContext'] = 0; 
  14819.         $this->blk[0]['float_endpos'] = 0; 
  14820.  
  14821.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  14822.         $this->headerbuffer = ''; 
  14823.         $this->pageBackgrounds = $savepb; 
  14824.         $this->x = $save_x; 
  14825.         $this->y = $save_y; 
  14826.         $this->state = $save_state; 
  14827.         if ($save_state == 0) { 
  14828.             unset($this->pages[1]); 
  14829.             $this->page = 0; 
  14830.         } 
  14831.         return $h; 
  14832.     } 
  14833.  
  14834.     // Called internally from Header 
  14835.     function writeHTMLHeaders() 
  14836.     { 
  14837.  
  14838.         if ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page) % 2 == 0) { 
  14839.             $OE = 'E'; 
  14840.         } // EVEN 
  14841.         else { 
  14842.             $OE = 'O'; 
  14843.         } 
  14844.         if ($OE == 'E') { 
  14845.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['html'] = $this->HTMLHeaderE['html']; 
  14846.         } else { 
  14847.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['html'] = $this->HTMLHeader['html']; 
  14848.         } 
  14849.         if ($this->forcePortraitHeaders && $this->CurOrientation == 'L' && $this->CurOrientation != $this->DefOrientation) { 
  14850.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['rotate'] = true;
