  14851.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['ml'] = $this->tMargin; 
  14852.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mr'] = $this->bMargin; 
  14853.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mh'] = $this->margin_header; 
  14854.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mf'] = $this->margin_footer; 
  14855.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['pw'] = $this->h; 
  14856.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['ph'] = $this->w; 
  14857.         } else { 
  14858.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['ml'] = $this->lMargin; 
  14859.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mr'] = $this->rMargin; 
  14860.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mh'] = $this->margin_header; 
  14861.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mf'] = $this->margin_footer; 
  14862.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['pw'] = $this->w; 
  14863.             $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['ph'] = $this->h; 
  14864.         } 
  14865.     } 
  14866.  
  14867.     function writeHTMLFooters() 
  14868.     { 
  14869.  
  14870.         if ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page) % 2 == 0) { 
  14871.             $OE = 'E'; 
  14872.         } // EVEN 
  14873.         else { 
  14874.             $OE = 'O'; 
  14875.         } 
  14876.         if ($OE == 'E') { 
  14877.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['html'] = $this->HTMLFooterE['html']; 
  14878.         } else { 
  14879.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['html'] = $this->HTMLFooter['html']; 
  14880.         } 
  14881.         if ($this->forcePortraitHeaders && $this->CurOrientation == 'L' && $this->CurOrientation != $this->DefOrientation) { 
  14882.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['rotate'] = true; 
  14883.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['ml'] = $this->tMargin; 
  14884.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mr'] = $this->bMargin; 
  14885.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mt'] = $this->rMargin; 
  14886.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mb'] = $this->lMargin; 
  14887.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mh'] = $this->margin_header; 
  14888.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mf'] = $this->margin_footer; 
  14889.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['pw'] = $this->h; 
  14890.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['ph'] = $this->w; 
  14891.         } else { 
  14892.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['ml'] = $this->lMargin; 
  14893.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mr'] = $this->rMargin; 
  14894.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mt'] = $this->tMargin; 
  14895.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mb'] = $this->bMargin; 
  14896.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mh'] = $this->margin_header; 
  14897.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mf'] = $this->margin_footer; 
  14898.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['pw'] = $this->w; 
  14899.             $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['ph'] = $this->h; 
  14900.         } 
  14901.     } 
  14902.  
  14903.     // mPDF 6 
  14904.     function _shareHeaderFooterWidth($cl, $cc, $cr) 
  14905.     { // mPDF 6 
  14906.         $l = mb_strlen($cl, 'UTF-8'); 
  14907.         $c = mb_strlen($cc, 'UTF-8'); 
  14908.         $r = mb_strlen($cr, 'UTF-8'); 
  14909.         $s = max($l, $r); 
  14910.         $tw = $c + 2 * $s; 
  14911.         if ($tw > 0) { 
  14912.             return array(intval($s * 100 / $tw), intval($c * 100 / $tw), intval($s * 100 / $tw)); 
  14913.         } else { 
  14914.             return array(33, 33, 33); 
  14915.         } 
  14916.     } 
  14917.  
  14918.     // mPDF 6 
  14919.     // Create an HTML header/footer from array (non-HTML header/footer) 
  14920.     function _createHTMLheaderFooter($arr, $hf) 
  14921.     { 
  14922.         $lContent = (isset($arr['L']['content']) ? $arr['L']['content'] : ''); 
  14923.         $cContent = (isset($arr['C']['content']) ? $arr['C']['content'] : ''); 
  14924.         $rContent = (isset($arr['R']['content']) ? $arr['R']['content'] : ''); 
  14925.         list($lw, $cw, $rw) = $this->_shareHeaderFooterWidth($lContent, $cContent, $rContent); 
  14926.         if ($hf == 'H') { 
  14927.             $valign = 'bottom'; 
  14928.             $vpadding = '0 0 ' . $this->header_line_spacing . 'em 0'; 
  14929.         } else { 
  14930.             $valign = 'top'; 
  14931.             $vpadding = '' . $this->footer_line_spacing . 'em 0 0 0'; 
  14932.         } 
  14933.         if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // table columns get reversed so need different text-alignment 
  14934.             $talignL = 'right'; 
  14935.             $talignR = 'left'; 
  14936.         } else { 
  14937.             $talignL = 'left'; 
  14938.             $talignR = 'right'; 
  14939.         } 
  14940.         $html = '<table width="100%" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin: 0; vertical-align: ' . $valign . '; color: #000000; '; 
  14941.         if (isset($arr['line']) && $arr['line']) { 
  14942.             $html .= ' border-' . $valign . ': 0.1mm solid #000000;'; 
  14943.         } 
  14944.         $html .= '">'; 
  14945.         $html .= '<tr>'; 
  14946.         $html .= '<td width="' . $lw . '%" style="padding: ' . $vpadding . '; text-align: ' . $talignL . '; '; 
  14947.         if (isset($arr['L']['font-family'])) { 
  14948.             $html .= ' font-family: ' . $arr['L']['font-family'] . ';'; 
  14949.         } 
  14950.         if (isset($arr['L']['color'])) { 
  14951.             $html .= ' color: ' . $arr['L']['color'] . ';'; 
  14952.         } 
  14953.         if (isset($arr['L']['font-size'])) { 
  14954.             $html .= ' font-size: ' . $arr['L']['font-size'] . 'pt;'; 
  14955.         } 
  14956.         if (isset($arr['L']['font-style'])) { 
  14957.             if ($arr['L']['font-style'] == 'B' || $arr['L']['font-style'] == 'BI') { 
  14958.                 $html .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  14959.             } 
  14960.             if ($arr['L']['font-style'] == 'I' || $arr['L']['font-style'] == 'BI') { 
  14961.                 $html .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  14962.             } 
  14963.         } 
  14964.         $html .= '">' . $lContent . '</td>'; 
  14965.         $html .= '<td width="' . $cw . '%" style="padding: ' . $vpadding . '; text-align: center; '; 
  14966.         if (isset($arr['C']['font-family'])) { 
  14967.             $html .= ' font-family: ' . $arr['C']['font-family'] . ';'; 
  14968.         } 
  14969.         if (isset($arr['C']['color'])) { 
  14970.             $html .= ' color: ' . $arr['C']['color'] . ';'; 
  14971.         } 
  14972.         if (isset($arr['C']['font-size'])) { 
  14973.             $html .= ' font-size: ' . $arr['L']['font-size'] . 'pt;'; 
  14974.         } 
  14975.         if (isset($arr['C']['font-style'])) { 
  14976.             if ($arr['C']['font-style'] == 'B' || $arr['C']['font-style'] == 'BI') { 
  14977.                 $html .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  14978.             } 
  14979.             if ($arr['C']['font-style'] == 'I' || $arr['C']['font-style'] == 'BI') { 
  14980.                 $html .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  14981.             } 
  14982.         } 
  14983.         $html .= '">' . $cContent . '</td>'; 
  14984.         $html .= '<td width="' . $rw . '%" style="padding: ' . $vpadding . '; text-align: ' . $talignR . '; '; 
  14985.         if (isset($arr['R']['font-family'])) { 
  14986.             $html .= ' font-family: ' . $arr['R']['font-family'] . ';'; 
  14987.         } 
  14988.         if (isset($arr['R']['color'])) { 
  14989.             $html .= ' color: ' . $arr['R']['color'] . ';'; 
  14990.         } 
  14991.         if (isset($arr['R']['font-size'])) { 
  14992.             $html .= ' font-size: ' . $arr['R']['font-size'] . 'pt;'; 
  14993.         } 
  14994.         if (isset($arr['R']['font-style'])) { 
  14995.             if ($arr['R']['font-style'] == 'B' || $arr['R']['font-style'] == 'BI') { 
  14996.                 $html .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  14997.             } 
  14998.             if ($arr['R']['font-style'] == 'I' || $arr['R']['font-style'] == 'BI') { 
  14999.                 $html .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  15000.             } 
  15001.         } 
  15002.         $html .= '">' . $rContent . '</td>'; 
  15003.         $html .= '</tr></table>'; 
  15004.         return $html; 
  15005.     } 
  15006.  
  15007.     function DefHeaderByName($name, $arr) 
  15008.     { 
  15009.         if (!$name) { 
  15010.             $name = '_nonhtmldefault'; 
  15011.         } 
  15012.         $html = $this->_createHTMLheaderFooter($arr, 'H'); 
  15013.  
  15014.         $this->pageHTMLheaders[$name]['html'] = $html; 
  15015.         $this->pageHTMLheaders[$name]['h'] = $this->_gethtmlheight($html); 
  15016.     } 
  15017.  
  15018.     function DefFooterByName($name, $arr) 
  15019.     { 
  15020.         if (!$name) { 
  15021.             $name = '_nonhtmldefault'; 
  15022.         } 
  15023.         $html = $this->_createHTMLheaderFooter($arr, 'F'); 
  15024.  
  15025.         $this->pageHTMLfooters[$name]['html'] = $html; 
  15026.         $this->pageHTMLfooters[$name]['h'] = $this->_gethtmlheight($html); 
  15027.     } 
  15028.  
  15029.     function SetHeaderByName($name, $side = 'O', $write = false) 
  15030.     { 
  15031.         if (!$name) { 
  15032.             $name = '_nonhtmldefault'; 
  15033.         } 
  15034.         $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->pageHTMLheaders[$name], $side, $write); 
  15035.     } 
  15036.  
  15037.     function SetFooterByName($name, $side = 'O') 
  15038.     { 
  15039.         if (!$name) { 
  15040.             $name = '_nonhtmldefault'; 
  15041.         } 
  15042.         $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->pageHTMLfooters[$name], $side); 
  15043.     } 
  15044.  
  15045.     function DefHTMLHeaderByName($name, $html) 
  15046.     { 
  15047.         if (!$name) { 
  15048.             $name = '_default'; 
  15049.         } 
  15050.  
  15051.         $this->pageHTMLheaders[$name]['html'] = $html; 
  15052.         $this->pageHTMLheaders[$name]['h'] = $this->_gethtmlheight($html); 
  15053.     } 
  15054.  
  15055.     function DefHTMLFooterByName($name, $html) 
  15056.     { 
  15057.         if (!$name) { 
  15058.             $name = '_default'; 
  15059.         } 
  15060.  
  15061.         $this->pageHTMLfooters[$name]['html'] = $html; 
  15062.         $this->pageHTMLfooters[$name]['h'] = $this->_gethtmlheight($html); 
  15063.     } 
  15064.  
  15065.     function SetHTMLHeaderByName($name, $side = 'O', $write = false) 
  15066.     { 
  15067.         if (!$name) { 
  15068.             $name = '_default'; 
  15069.         } 
  15070.         $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->pageHTMLheaders[$name], $side, $write); 
  15071.     } 
  15072.  
  15073.     function SetHTMLFooterByName($name, $side = 'O') 
  15074.     { 
  15075.         if (!$name) { 
  15076.             $name = '_default'; 
  15077.         } 
  15078.         $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->pageHTMLfooters[$name], $side); 
  15079.     } 
  15080.  
  15081.     function SetHeader($Harray = array(), $side = '', $write = false) 
  15082.     { 
  15083.         $oddhtml = ''; 
  15084.         $evenhtml = ''; 
  15085.         if (is_string($Harray)) { 
  15086.             if (strlen($Harray) == 0) { 
  15087.                 $oddhtml = ''; 
  15088.                 $evenhtml = ''; 
  15089.             } elseif (strpos($Harray, '|') !== false) { 
  15090.                 $hdet = explode('|', $Harray); 
  15091.                 list($lw, $cw, $rw) = $this->_shareHeaderFooterWidth($hdet[0], $hdet[1], $hdet[2]); 
  15092.                 $oddhtml = '<table width="100%" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin: 0; vertical-align: bottom; color: #000000; '; 
  15093.                 if ($this->defaultheaderfontsize) { 
  15094.                     $oddhtml .= ' font-size: ' . $this->defaultheaderfontsize . 'pt;'; 
  15095.                 } 
  15096.                 if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle) { 
  15097.                     if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'B' || $this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15098.                         $oddhtml .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  15099.                     } 
  15100.                     if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'I' || $this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15101.                         $oddhtml .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  15102.                     } 
  15103.                 } 
  15104.                 if ($this->defaultheaderline) { 
  15105.                     $oddhtml .= ' border-bottom: 0.1mm solid #000000;'; 
  15106.                 } 
  15107.                 $oddhtml .= '">'; 
  15108.                 $oddhtml .= '<tr>'; 
  15109.                 $oddhtml .= '<td width="' . $lw . '%" style="padding: 0 0 ' . $this->header_line_spacing . 'em 0; text-align: left; ">' . $hdet[0] . '</td>'; 
  15110.                 $oddhtml .= '<td width="' . $cw . '%" style="padding: 0 0 ' . $this->header_line_spacing . 'em 0; text-align: center; ">' . $hdet[1] . '</td>'; 
  15111.                 $oddhtml .= '<td width="' . $rw . '%" style="padding: 0 0 ' . $this->header_line_spacing . 'em 0; text-align: right; ">' . $hdet[2] . '</td>'; 
  15112.                 $oddhtml .= '</tr></table>'; 
  15113.  
  15114.                 $evenhtml = '<table width="100%" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin: 0; vertical-align: bottom; color: #000000; '; 
  15115.                 if ($this->defaultheaderfontsize) { 
  15116.                     $evenhtml .= ' font-size: ' . $this->defaultheaderfontsize . 'pt;'; 
  15117.                 } 
  15118.                 if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle) { 
  15119.                     if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'B' || $this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15120.                         $evenhtml .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  15121.                     } 
  15122.                     if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'I' || $this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15123.                         $evenhtml .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  15124.                     } 
  15125.                 } 
  15126.                 if ($this->defaultheaderline) { 
  15127.                     $evenhtml .= ' border-bottom: 0.1mm solid #000000;'; 
  15128.                 } 
  15129.                 $evenhtml .= '">'; 
  15130.                 $evenhtml .= '<tr>'; 
  15131.                 $evenhtml .= '<td width="' . $rw . '%" style="padding: 0 0 ' . $this->header_line_spacing . 'em 0; text-align: left; ">' . $hdet[2] . '</td>'; 
  15132.                 $evenhtml .= '<td width="' . $cw . '%" style="padding: 0 0 ' . $this->header_line_spacing . 'em 0; text-align: center; ">' . $hdet[1] . '</td>'; 
  15133.                 $evenhtml .= '<td width="' . $lw . '%" style="padding: 0 0 ' . $this->header_line_spacing . 'em 0; text-align: right; ">' . $hdet[0] . '</td>'; 
  15134.                 $evenhtml .= '</tr></table>'; 
  15135.             } else { 
  15136.                 $oddhtml = '<div style="margin: 0; color: #000000; '; 
  15137.                 if ($this->defaultheaderfontsize) { 
  15138.                     $oddhtml .= ' font-size: ' . $this->defaultheaderfontsize . 'pt;'; 
  15139.                 } 
  15140.                 if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle) { 
  15141.                     if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'B' || $this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15142.                         $oddhtml .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  15143.                     } 
  15144.                     if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'I' || $this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15145.                         $oddhtml .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  15146.                     } 
  15147.                 } 
  15148.                 if ($this->defaultheaderline) { 
  15149.                     $oddhtml .= ' border-bottom: 0.1mm solid #000000;'; 
  15150.                 } 
  15151.                 $oddhtml .= 'text-align: right; ">' . $Harray . '</div>'; 
  15152.  
  15153.                 $evenhtml = '<div style="margin: 0; color: #000000; '; 
  15154.                 if ($this->defaultheaderfontsize) { 
  15155.                     $evenhtml .= ' font-size: ' . $this->defaultheaderfontsize . 'pt;'; 
  15156.                 } 
  15157.                 if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle) { 
  15158.                     if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'B' || $this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15159.                         $evenhtml .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  15160.                     } 
  15161.                     if ($this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'I' || $this->defaultheaderfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15162.                         $evenhtml .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  15163.                     } 
  15164.                 } 
  15165.                 if ($this->defaultheaderline) { 
  15166.                     $evenhtml .= ' border-bottom: 0.1mm solid #000000;'; 
  15167.                 } 
  15168.                 $evenhtml .= 'text-align: left; ">' . $Harray . '</div>'; 
  15169.             } 
  15170.         } elseif (is_array($Harray) && !empty($Harray)) { 
  15171.             if ($side == 'O') { 
  15172.                 $odd = $Harray; 
  15173.             } elseif ($side == 'E') { 
  15174.                 $even = $Harray; 
  15175.             } else { 
  15176.                 $odd = $Harray['odd']; 
  15177.                 $even = $Harray['even']; 
  15178.             } 
  15179.             $oddhtml = $this->_createHTMLheaderFooter($odd, 'H'); 
  15180.  
  15181.             $evenhtml = $this->_createHTMLheaderFooter($even, 'H'); 
  15182.         } 
  15183.  
  15184.         if ($side == 'E') { 
  15185.             $this->SetHTMLHeader($evenhtml, 'E', $write); 
  15186.         } elseif ($side == 'O') { 
  15187.             $this->SetHTMLHeader($oddhtml, 'O', $write); 
  15188.         } else { 
  15189.             $this->SetHTMLHeader($oddhtml, 'O', $write); 
  15190.             $this->SetHTMLHeader($evenhtml, 'E', $write); 
  15191.         } 
  15192.     } 
  15193.  
  15194.     function SetFooter($Farray = array(), $side = '') 
  15195.     { 
  15196.         $oddhtml = ''; 
  15197.         $evenhtml = ''; 
  15198.         if (is_string($Farray)) { 
  15199.             if (strlen($Farray) == 0) { 
  15200.                 $oddhtml = ''; 
  15201.                 $evenhtml = ''; 
  15202.             } elseif (strpos($Farray, '|') !== false) { 
  15203.                 $hdet = explode('|', $Farray); 
  15204.                 $oddhtml = '<table width="100%" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin: 0; vertical-align: top; color: #000000; '; 
  15205.                 if ($this->defaultfooterfontsize) { 
  15206.                     $oddhtml .= ' font-size: ' . $this->defaultfooterfontsize . 'pt;'; 
  15207.                 } 
  15208.                 if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle) { 
  15209.                     if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'B' || $this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15210.                         $oddhtml .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  15211.                     } 
  15212.                     if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'I' || $this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15213.                         $oddhtml .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  15214.                     } 
  15215.                 } 
  15216.                 if ($this->defaultfooterline) { 
  15217.                     $oddhtml .= ' border-top: 0.1mm solid #000000;'; 
  15218.                 } 
  15219.                 $oddhtml .= '">'; 
  15220.                 $oddhtml .= '<tr>'; 
  15221.                 $oddhtml .= '<td width="33%" style="padding: ' . $this->footer_line_spacing . 'em 0 0 0; text-align: left; ">' . $hdet[0] . '</td>'; 
  15222.                 $oddhtml .= '<td width="33%" style="padding: ' . $this->footer_line_spacing . 'em 0 0 0; text-align: center; ">' . $hdet[1] . '</td>'; 
  15223.                 $oddhtml .= '<td width="33%" style="padding: ' . $this->footer_line_spacing . 'em 0 0 0; text-align: right; ">' . $hdet[2] . '</td>'; 
  15224.                 $oddhtml .= '</tr></table>'; 
  15225.  
  15226.                 $evenhtml = '<table width="100%" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin: 0; vertical-align: top; color: #000000; '; 
  15227.                 if ($this->defaultfooterfontsize) { 
  15228.                     $evenhtml .= ' font-size: ' . $this->defaultfooterfontsize . 'pt;'; 
  15229.                 } 
  15230.                 if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle) { 
  15231.                     if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'B' || $this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15232.                         $evenhtml .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  15233.                     } 
  15234.                     if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'I' || $this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15235.                         $evenhtml .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  15236.                     } 
  15237.                 } 
  15238.                 if ($this->defaultfooterline) { 
  15239.                     $evenhtml .= ' border-top: 0.1mm solid #000000;'; 
  15240.                 } 
  15241.                 $evenhtml .= '">'; 
  15242.                 $evenhtml .= '<tr>'; 
  15243.                 $evenhtml .= '<td width="33%" style="padding: ' . $this->footer_line_spacing . 'em 0 0 0; text-align: left; ">' . $hdet[2] . '</td>'; 
  15244.                 $evenhtml .= '<td width="33%" style="padding: ' . $this->footer_line_spacing . 'em 0 0 0; text-align: center; ">' . $hdet[1] . '</td>'; 
  15245.                 $evenhtml .= '<td width="33%" style="padding: ' . $this->footer_line_spacing . 'em 0 0 0; text-align: right; ">' . $hdet[0] . '</td>'; 
  15246.                 $evenhtml .= '</tr></table>'; 
  15247.             } else { 
  15248.                 $oddhtml = '<div style="margin: 0; color: #000000; '; 
  15249.                 if ($this->defaultfooterfontsize) { 
  15250.                     $oddhtml .= ' font-size: ' . $this->defaultfooterfontsize . 'pt;'; 
  15251.                 } 
  15252.                 if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle) { 
  15253.                     if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'B' || $this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15254.                         $oddhtml .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  15255.                     } 
  15256.                     if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'I' || $this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15257.                         $oddhtml .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  15258.                     } 
  15259.                 } 
  15260.                 if ($this->defaultfooterline) { 
  15261.                     $oddhtml .= ' border-top: 0.1mm solid #000000;'; 
  15262.                 } 
  15263.                 $oddhtml .= 'text-align: right; ">' . $Farray . '</div>'; 
  15264.  
  15265.                 $evenhtml = '<div style="margin: 0; color: #000000; '; 
  15266.                 if ($this->defaultfooterfontsize) { 
  15267.                     $evenhtml .= ' font-size: ' . $this->defaultfooterfontsize . 'pt;'; 
  15268.                 } 
  15269.                 if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle) { 
  15270.                     if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'B' || $this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15271.                         $evenhtml .= ' font-weight: bold;'; 
  15272.                     } 
  15273.                     if ($this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'I' || $this->defaultfooterfontstyle == 'BI') { 
  15274.                         $evenhtml .= ' font-style: italic;'; 
  15275.                     } 
  15276.                 } 
  15277.                 if ($this->defaultfooterline) { 
  15278.                     $evenhtml .= ' border-top: 0.1mm solid #000000;'; 
  15279.                 } 
  15280.                 $evenhtml .= 'text-align: left; ">' . $Farray . '</div>'; 
  15281.             } 
  15282.         } elseif (is_array($Farray)) { 
  15283.             if ($side == 'O') { 
  15284.                 $odd = $Farray; 
  15285.             } elseif ($side == 'E') { 
  15286.                 $even = $Farray; 
  15287.             } else { 
  15288.                 if (isset($Farray['odd'])) 
  15289.                     $odd = $Farray['odd']; 
  15290.                 if (isset($Farray['even'])) 
  15291.                     $even = $Farray['even']; 
  15292.             } 
  15293.  
  15294.             if (isset($odd)) 
  15295.                 $oddhtml = $this->_createHTMLheaderFooter($odd, 'F'); 
  15296.  
  15297.             if (isset($even)) 
  15298.                 $evenhtml = $this->_createHTMLheaderFooter($even, 'F'); 
  15299.         } 
  15300.         /** -- HTMLfooterS-FOOTERS -- */ 
  15301.         if ($side == 'E') { 
  15302.             $this->SetHTMLfooter($evenhtml, 'E'); 
  15303.         } elseif ($side == 'O') { 
  15304.             $this->SetHTMLfooter($oddhtml, 'O'); 
  15305.         } else { 
  15306.             $this->SetHTMLfooter($oddhtml, 'O'); 
  15307.             $this->SetHTMLfooter($evenhtml, 'E'); 
  15308.         } 
  15309.         /** -- END HTMLfooterS-FOOTERS -- */ 
  15310.     } 
  15311.  
  15312.     /** -- WATERMARK -- */ 
  15313.  
  15314.     function SetWatermarkText($txt = '', $alpha = -1) 
  15315.     { 
  15316.         if ($alpha >= 0) 
  15317.             $this->watermarkTextAlpha = $alpha; 
  15318.         $this->watermarkText = $txt; 
  15319.     } 
  15320.  
  15321.     function SetWatermarkImage($src, $alpha = -1, $size = 'D', $pos = 'F') 
  15322.     { 
  15323.         if ($alpha >= 0) 
  15324.             $this->watermarkImageAlpha = $alpha; 
  15325.         $this->watermarkImage = $src; 
  15326.         $this->watermark_size = $size; 
  15327.         $this->watermark_pos = $pos; 
  15328.     } 
  15329.  
  15330.     /** -- END WATERMARK -- */ 
  15331.  
  15332.     //Page footer 
  15333.     function Footer() 
  15334.     { 
  15335.         /** -- CSS-PAGE -- */ 
  15336.         // PAGED MEDIA - CROP / CROSS MARKS from @PAGE 
  15337.         if ($this->show_marks == 'CROP' || $this->show_marks == 'CROPCROSS') { 
  15338.             // Show TICK MARKS 
  15339.             $this->SetLineWidth(0.1); // = 0.1 mm 
  15340.             $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  15341.             $l = $this->cropMarkLength; 
  15342.             $m = $this->cropMarkMargin; // Distance of crop mark from margin 
  15343.             $b = $this->nonPrintMargin; // Non-printable border at edge of paper sheet 
  15344.             $ax1 = $b; 
  15345.             $bx = $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] - $m; 
  15346.             $ax = max($ax1, $bx - $l); 
  15347.             $cx1 = $this->w - $b; 
  15348.             $dx = $this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] + $m; 
  15349.             $cx = min($cx1, $dx + $l); 
  15350.             $ay1 = $b; 
  15351.             $by = $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] - $m; 
  15352.             $ay = max($ay1, $by - $l); 
  15353.             $cy1 = $this->h - $b; 
  15354.             $dy = $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] + $m; 
  15355.             $cy = min($cy1, $dy + $l); 
  15356.  
  15357.             $this->Line($ax, $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'], $bx, $this->page_box['outer_width_TB']); 
  15358.             $this->Line($cx, $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'], $dx, $this->page_box['outer_width_TB']); 
  15359.             $this->Line($ax, $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'], $bx, $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB']); 
  15360.             $this->Line($cx, $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'], $dx, $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB']); 
  15361.             $this->Line($this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $ay, $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $by); 
  15362.             $this->Line($this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $cy, $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $dy); 
  15363.             $this->Line($this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $ay, $this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $by); 
  15364.             $this->Line($this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $cy, $this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $dy); 
  15365.  
  15366.             if ($this->printers_info) { 
  15367.                 $hd = date('Y-m-d H:i') . '  Page ' . $this->page . ' of {nb}'; 
  15368.                 $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  15369.                 $this->SetFont('arial', '', 7.5, true, true); 
  15370.                 $this->x = $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] + 1.5; 
  15371.                 $this->y = 1; 
  15372.                 $this->Cell($headerpgwidth, $this->FontSize, $hd, 0, 0, 'L', 0, '', 0, 0, 0, 'M'); 
  15373.                 $this->SetFont($this->default_font, '', $this->original_default_font_size); 
  15374.             } 
  15375.         } 
  15376.         if ($this->show_marks == 'CROSS' || $this->show_marks == 'CROPCROSS') { 
  15377.             $this->SetLineWidth(0.1); // = 0.1 mm 
  15378.             $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  15379.             $l = 14 / 2; // longer length of the cross line (half) 
  15380.             $w = 6 / 2; // shorter width of the cross line (half) 
  15381.             $r = 1.2; // radius of circle 
  15382.             $m = $this->crossMarkMargin; // Distance of cross mark from margin 
  15383.             $x1 = $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] - $m; 
  15384.             $x2 = $this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] + $m; 
  15385.             $y1 = $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] - $m; 
  15386.             $y2 = $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] + $m; 
  15387.             // Left 
  15388.             $this->Circle($x1, $this->h / 2, $r, 'S'); 
  15389.             $this->Line($x1 - $w, $this->h / 2, $x1 + $w, $this->h / 2); 
  15390.             $this->Line($x1, $this->h / 2 - $l, $x1, $this->h / 2 + $l); 
  15391.             // Right 
  15392.             $this->Circle($x2, $this->h / 2, $r, 'S'); 
  15393.             $this->Line($x2 - $w, $this->h / 2, $x2 + $w, $this->h / 2); 
  15394.             $this->Line($x2, $this->h / 2 - $l, $x2, $this->h / 2 + $l); 
  15395.             // Top 
  15396.             $this->Circle($this->w / 2, $y1, $r, 'S'); 
  15397.             $this->Line($this->w / 2, $y1 - $w, $this->w / 2, $y1 + $w); 
  15398.             $this->Line($this->w / 2 - $l, $y1, $this->w / 2 + $l, $y1); 
  15399.             // Bottom 
  15400.             $this->Circle($this->w / 2, $y2, $r, 'S'); 
  15401.             $this->Line($this->w / 2, $y2 - $w, $this->w / 2, $y2 + $w); 
  15402.             $this->Line($this->w / 2 - $l, $y2, $this->w / 2 + $l, $y2); 
  15403.         } 
  15404.  
  15405.         /** -- END CSS-PAGE -- */ 
  15406.  
  15407.         // mPDF 6 
  15408.         // If @page set non-HTML headers/footers named, they were not read until later in the HTML code - so now set them 
  15409.         if ($this->page == 1) { 
  15410.             if ($this->firstPageBoxHeader) { 
  15411.                 if (isset($this->pageHTMLheaders[$this->firstPageBoxHeader])) { 
  15412.                     $this->HTMLHeader = $this->pageHTMLheaders[$this->firstPageBoxHeader]; 
  15413.                 } 
  15414.                 $this->Header(); 
  15415.             } 
  15416.             if ($this->firstPageBoxFooter) { 
  15417.                 if (isset($this->pageHTMLfooters[$this->firstPageBoxFooter])) { 
  15418.                     $this->HTMLFooter = $this->pageHTMLfooters[$this->firstPageBoxFooter]; 
  15419.                 } 
  15420.             } 
  15421.             $this->firstPageBoxHeader = ''; 
  15422.             $this->firstPageBoxFooter = ''; 
  15423.         } 
  15424.  
  15425.  
  15426.         if (($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page % 2 == 0) && $this->HTMLFooterE) || ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page % 2 == 1) && $this->HTMLFooter) || (!$this->mirrorMargins && $this->HTMLFooter)) { 
  15427.             $this->writeHTMLFooters(); 
  15428.         } 
  15429.  
  15430.         /** -- WATERMARK -- */ 
  15431.         if (($this->watermarkText) && ($this->showWatermarkText)) { 
  15432.             $this->watermark($this->watermarkText, 45, 120, $this->watermarkTextAlpha); // Watermark text 
  15433.         } 
  15434.         if (($this->watermarkImage) && ($this->showWatermarkImage)) { 
  15435.             $this->watermarkImg($this->watermarkImage, $this->watermarkImageAlpha); // Watermark image 
  15436.         } 
  15437.         /** -- END WATERMARK -- */ 
  15438.     } 
  15439.  
  15440.     /** -- HYPHENATION -- */ 
  15441.  
  15442.     /////////////////// 
  15443.     /////////////////// 
  15444.     // HYPHENATION 
  15445.     /////////////////// 
  15446.     /////////////////// 
  15447.     // Word hyphenation 
  15448.     // mPDF 6 
  15449.     function hyphenateWord($word, $currptr) 
  15450.     { 
  15451.         // Do everything inside this function in utf-8 
  15452.         // Don't hyphenate web addresses 
  15453.         if (preg_match('/^(http:|www\.)/', $word)) { 
  15454.             return -1; 
  15455.         } 
  15456.  
  15457.         $ptr = -1; 
  15458.  
  15459.         // Get dictionary 
  15460.         if (!$this->loadedSHYdictionary) { 
  15461.             if (file_exists(_MPDF_PATH . 'patterns/dictionary.txt')) { 
  15462.                 $this->SHYdictionary = file(_MPDF_PATH . 'patterns/dictionary.txt', FILE_SKIP_EMPTY_LINES); 
  15463.                 foreach ($this->SHYdictionary as $entry) { 
  15464.                     $entry = trim($entry); 
  15465.                     $poss = array(); 
  15466.                     $offset = 0; 
  15467.                     $p = true; 
  15468.                     $wl = mb_strlen($entry, 'UTF-8'); 
  15469.                     while ($offset < $wl) { 
  15470.                         $p = mb_strpos($entry, '/', $offset, 'UTF-8'); 
  15471.                         if ($p !== false) { 
  15472.                             $poss[] = $p - count($poss); 
  15473.                         } else { 
  15474.                             break; 
  15475.                         } 
  15476.                         $offset = $p + 1; 
  15477.                     } 
  15478.                     if (count($poss)) { 
  15479.                         $this->SHYdictionaryWords[str_replace('/', '', mb_strtolower($entry))] = $poss; 
  15480.                     } 
  15481.                 } 
  15482.             } 
  15483.             $this->loadedSHYdictionary = true; 
  15484.         } 
  15485.  
  15486.         if (!in_array($this->SHYlang, $this->SHYlanguages)) { 
  15487.             return -1; 
  15488.         } 
  15489.         // If no pattern loaded or not the best one 
  15490.         if (count($this->SHYpatterns) < 1 || ($this->loadedSHYpatterns && $this->loadedSHYpatterns != $this->SHYlang)) { 
  15491.             include(_MPDF_PATH . "patterns/" . $this->SHYlang . ".php"); 
  15492.             $patterns = explode(' ', $patterns); 
  15493.             $new_patterns = array(); 
  15494.             for ($i = 0; $i < count($patterns); $i++) { 
  15495.                 $value = $patterns[$i]; 
  15496.                 $new_patterns[preg_replace('/[0-9]/', '', $value)] = $value; 
  15497.             } 
  15498.             $this->SHYpatterns = $new_patterns; 
  15499.             $this->loadedSHYpatterns = $this->SHYlang; 
  15500.         } 
  15501.  
  15502.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  15503.             $word = mb_convert_encoding($word, 'UTF-8', $this->mb_enc); 
  15504.         } 
  15505.  
  15506.         $prepre = ''; 
  15507.         $postpost = ''; 
  15508.         $startpunctuation = "\xc2\xab\xc2\xbf\xe2\x80\x98\xe2\x80\x9b\xe2\x80\x9c\xe2\x80\x9f"; 
  15509.         $endpunctuation = "\xe2\x80\x9e\xe2\x80\x9d\xe2\x80\x9a\xe2\x80\x99\xc2\xbb"; 
  15510.  
  15511.  
  15512.         if (preg_match('/^(["\'' . $startpunctuation . '])+(.{' . $this->SHYcharmin . ', })$/u', $word, $m)) { 
  15513.             $prepre = $m[1]; 
  15514.             $word = $m[2]; 
  15515.         } 
  15516.         if (preg_match('/^(.{' . $this->SHYcharmin . ', })([\'\., ;:!?"' . $endpunctuation . ']+)$/u', $word, $m)) { 
  15517.             $word = $m[1]; 
  15518.             $postpost = $m[2]; 
  15519.         } 
  15520.         if (mb_strlen($word, 'UTF-8') < $this->SHYcharmin) { 
  15521.             return -1; 
  15522.         } 
  15523.         $success = false; 
  15524.  
  15525.         $preprelen = mb_strlen($prepre); 
  15526.  
  15527.         if (isset($this->SHYdictionaryWords[mb_strtolower($word)])) { 
  15528.             foreach ($this->SHYdictionaryWords[mb_strtolower($word)] AS $i) { 
  15529.                 if (($i + $preprelen) >= $currptr) { 
  15530.                     break; 
  15531.                 } 
  15532.                 $ptr = $i + $preprelen; 
  15533.                 $success = true; 
  15534.             } 
  15535.         } 
  15536.  
  15537.         if (!$success) { 
  15538.             $text_word = '_' . $word . '_'; 
  15539.             $word_length = mb_strlen($text_word, 'UTF-8'); 
  15540.             $text_word = mb_strtolower($text_word, 'UTF-8'); 
  15541.             $hyphenated_word = array(); 
  15542.             $numb3rs = array('0' => true, '1' => true, '2' => true, '3' => true, '4' => true, '5' => true, '6' => true, '7' => true, '8' => true, '9' => true); 
  15543.             for ($position = 0; $position <= ($word_length - $this->SHYcharmin); $position++) { 
  15544.                 $maxwins = min(($word_length - $position), $this->SHYcharmax); 
  15545.                 for ($win = $this->SHYcharmin; $win <= $maxwins; $win++) { 
  15546.                     if (isset($this->SHYpatterns[mb_substr($text_word, $position, $win, 'UTF-8')])) { 
  15547.                         $pattern = $this->SHYpatterns[mb_substr($text_word, $position, $win, 'UTF-8')]; 
  15548.                         $digits = 1; 
  15549.                         $pattern_length = mb_strlen($pattern, 'UTF-8'); 
  15550.                         for ($i = 0; $i < $pattern_length; $i++) { 
  15551.                             $char = $pattern[$i]; 
  15552.                             if (isset($numb3rs[$char])) { 
  15553.                                 $zero = ($i == 0) ? $position - 1 : $position + $i - $digits; 
  15554.                                 if (!isset($hyphenated_word[$zero]) || $hyphenated_word[$zero] != $char) 
  15555.                                     $hyphenated_word[$zero] = $char; 
  15556.                                 $digits++; 
  15557.                             } 
  15558.                         } 
  15559.                     } 
  15560.                 } 
  15561.             } 
  15562.             for ($i = $this->SHYleftmin; $i <= (mb_strlen($word, 'UTF-8') - $this->SHYrightmin); $i++) { 
  15563.                 if (isset($hyphenated_word[$i]) && $hyphenated_word[$i] % 2 != 0) { 
  15564.                     if (($i + $preprelen) > $currptr) { 
  15565.                         break; 
  15566.                     } 
  15567.                     $ptr = $i + $preprelen; 
  15568.                 } 
  15569.             } 
  15570.         } 
  15571.         return $ptr; 
  15572.     } 
  15573.  
  15574.     /** -- END HYPHENATION -- */ 
  15575.  
  15576.  
  15577.     /** -- HTML-CSS -- */ 
  15578.  
  15579.     /////////////////// 
  15580.     /// HTML parser /// 
  15581.     /////////////////// 
  15582.     function WriteHTML($html, $sub = 0, $init = true, $close = true) 
  15583.     { 
  15584.         // $sub - 0 = default; 1=headerCSS only; 2=HTML body (parts) only; 3 - HTML parses only 
  15585.         // 4 - writes HTML headers/Fixed pos DIVs - stores in buffer - for single page only 
  15586.         // $close - if false Leaves buffers etc. in current state, so that it can continue a block etc. 
  15587.         // $init - Clears and sets buffers to Top level block etc. 
  15588.  
  15589.         /** Check if $html is null and set to blank string */ 
  15590.         if( $html === null ) { 
  15591.             $html = ''; 
  15592.         } 
  15593.  
  15594.         /** Check $html is an integer, float, string, boolean or class with __toString(), otherwise throw exception */ 
  15595.         if (is_scalar($html) === false) { 
  15596.             if(!is_object($html) || ! method_exists($html, '__toString')) { 
  15597.                 throw new MpdfException('WriteHTML() requires $html be an integer, float, string, boolean or an object with the __toString() magic method.'); 
  15598.             } 
  15599.         } 
  15600.  
  15601.         /** Cast $html as a string */ 
  15602.         $html = (string) $html; 
  15603.  
  15604.  
  15605.         if ($init) { 
  15606.             $this->headerbuffer = ''; 
  15607.             $this->textbuffer = array(); 
  15608.             $this->fixedPosBlockSave = array(); 
  15609.         } 
  15610.         if ($sub == 1) { 
  15611.             $html = '<style> ' . $html . ' </style>'; 
  15612.         } // stylesheet only 
  15613.  
  15614.         if ($this->allow_charset_conversion) { 
  15615.             if ($sub < 1) { 
  15616.                 $this->ReadCharset($html); 
  15617.             } 
  15618.             if ($this->charset_in && $sub != 4) { 
  15619.                 $success = iconv($this->charset_in, 'UTF-8//TRANSLIT', $html); 
  15620.                 if ($success) { 
  15621.                     $html = $success; 
  15622.                 } 
  15623.             } 
  15624.         } 
  15625.         $html = $this->purify_utf8($html, false); 
  15626.         if ($init) { 
  15627.             $this->blklvl = 0; 
  15628.             $this->lastblocklevelchange = 0; 
  15629.             $this->blk = array(); 
  15630.             $this->initialiseBlock($this->blk[0]); 
  15631.             $this->blk[0]['width'] = & $this->pgwidth; 
  15632.             $this->blk[0]['inner_width'] = & $this->pgwidth; 
  15633.             $this->blk[0]['blockContext'] = $this->blockContext; 
  15634.         } 
  15635.  
  15636.         $zproperties = array(); 
  15637.         if ($sub < 2) { 
  15638.             $this->ReadMetaTags($html); 
  15639.  
  15640.             if (preg_match('/<base[^>]*href=["\']([^"\'>]*)["\']/i', $html, $m)) { 
  15641.                 $this->SetBasePath($m[1]); 
  15642.             } 
  15643.             $html = $this->cssmgr->ReadCSS($html); 
  15644.  
  15645.             if ($this->autoLangToFont && !$this->usingCoreFont && preg_match('/<html [^>]*lang=[\'\"](.*?)[\'\"]/ism', $html, $m)) { 
  15646.                 $html_lang = $m[1]; 
  15647.             } 
  15648.  
  15649.             if (preg_match('/<html [^>]*dir=[\'\"]\s*rtl\s*[\'\"]/ism', $html)) { 
  15650.                 $zproperties['DIRECTION'] = 'rtl'; 
  15651.             } 
  15652.  
  15653.             // allow in-line CSS for body tag to be parsed // Get <body> tag inline CSS 
  15654.             if (preg_match('/<body([^>]*)>(.*?)<\/body>/ism', $html, $m) || preg_match('/<body([^>]*)>(.*)$/ism', $html, $m)) { 
  15655.                 $html = $m[2]; 
  15656.                 // Changed to allow style="background: url('bg.jpg')" 
  15657.                 if (preg_match('/style=[\"](.*?)[\"]/ism', $m[1], $mm) || preg_match('/style=[\'](.*?)[\']/ism', $m[1], $mm)) { 
  15658.                     $zproperties = $this->cssmgr->readInlineCSS($mm[1]); 
  15659.                 } 
  15660.                 if (preg_match('/dir=[\'\"]\s*rtl\s*[\'\"]/ism', $m[1])) { 
  15661.                     $zproperties['DIRECTION'] = 'rtl'; 
  15662.                 } 
  15663.                 if (isset($html_lang) && $html_lang) { 
  15664.                     $zproperties['LANG'] = $html_lang; 
  15665.                 } 
  15666.                 if ($this->autoLangToFont && !$this->onlyCoreFonts && preg_match('/lang=[\'\"](.*?)[\'\"]/ism', $m[1], $mm)) { 
  15667.                     $zproperties['LANG'] = $mm[1]; 
  15668.                 } 
  15669.             } 
  15670.         } 
  15671.         $properties = $this->cssmgr->MergeCSS('BLOCK', 'BODY', ''); 
  15672.         if ($zproperties) { 
  15673.             $properties = $this->cssmgr->array_merge_recursive_unique($properties, $zproperties); 
  15674.         } 
  15675.  
  15676.         if (isset($properties['DIRECTION']) && $properties['DIRECTION']) { 
  15677.             $this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['DIRECTION'] = $properties['DIRECTION']; 
  15678.         } 
  15679.         if (!isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['DIRECTION'])) { 
  15680.             $this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['DIRECTION'] = $this->directionality; 
  15681.         } else { 
  15682.             $this->SetDirectionality($this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['DIRECTION']); 
  15683.         } 
  15684.  
  15685.         $this->setCSS($properties, '', 'BODY'); 
  15686.  
  15687.         $this->blk[0]['InlineProperties'] = $this->saveInlineProperties(); 
  15688.  
  15689.         if ($sub == 1) { 
  15690.             return ''; 
  15691.         } 
  15692.         if (!isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY'])) { 
  15693.             $this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY'] = array(); 
  15694.         } 
  15695.  
  15696.         /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  15697.         if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'])) { 
  15698.             $this->bodyBackgroundGradient = $properties['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']; 
  15699.         } 
  15700.  
  15701.         if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) && $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) { 
  15702.             $ret = $this->SetBackground($properties, $this->pgwidth); 
  15703.             if ($ret) { 
  15704.                 $this->bodyBackgroundImage = $ret; 
  15705.             } 
  15706.         } 
  15707.         /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  15708.  
  15709.         /** -- CSS-PAGE -- */ 
  15710.         // If page-box is set 
  15711.         if ($this->state == 0 && ((isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE']) && $this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE']) || (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>FIRST']) && $this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>FIRST']))) { // mPDF 5.7.3 
  15712.             $this->page_box['current'] = ''; 
  15713.             $this->page_box['using'] = true; 
  15714.             list($pborientation, $pbmgl, $pbmgr, $pbmgt, $pbmgb, $pbmgh, $pbmgf, $hname, $fname, $bg, $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress, $marks, $newformat) = $this->SetPagedMediaCSS('', false, 'O'); 
  15715.             $this->DefOrientation = $this->CurOrientation = $pborientation; 
  15716.             $this->orig_lMargin = $this->DeflMargin = $pbmgl; 
  15717.             $this->orig_rMargin = $this->DefrMargin = $pbmgr; 
  15718.             $this->orig_tMargin = $this->tMargin = $pbmgt; 
  15719.             $this->orig_bMargin = $this->bMargin = $pbmgb; 
  15720.             $this->orig_hMargin = $this->margin_header = $pbmgh; 
  15721.             $this->orig_fMargin = $this->margin_footer = $pbmgf; 
  15722.             list($pborientation, $pbmgl, $pbmgr, $pbmgt, $pbmgb, $pbmgh, $pbmgf, $hname, $fname, $bg, $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress, $marks, $newformat) = $this->SetPagedMediaCSS('', true, 'O'); // first page 
  15723.             $this->show_marks = $marks; 
  15724.             if ($hname) 
  15725.                 $this->firstPageBoxHeader = $hname; 
  15726.             if ($fname) 
  15727.                 $this->firstPageBoxFooter = $fname; 
  15728.         } 
  15729.         /** -- END CSS-PAGE -- */ 
  15730.  
  15731.         $parseonly = false; 
  15732.         $this->bufferoutput = false; 
  15733.         if ($sub == 3) { 
  15734.             $parseonly = true; 
  15735.             // Close any open block tags 
  15736.             $arr = array(); 
  15737.             $ai = 0; 
  15738.             for ($b = $this->blklvl; $b > 0; $b--) { 
  15739.                 $this->tag->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag'], $arr, $ai); 
  15740.             } 
  15741.             // Output any text left in buffer 
  15742.             if (count($this->textbuffer)) { 
  15743.                 $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer); 
  15744.             } 
  15745.             $this->textbuffer = array(); 
  15746.         } elseif ($sub == 4) { 
  15747.             // Close any open block tags 
  15748.             $arr = array(); 
  15749.             $ai = 0; 
  15750.             for ($b = $this->blklvl; $b > 0; $b--) { 
  15751.                 $this->tag->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag'], $arr, $ai); 
  15752.             } 
  15753.             // Output any text left in buffer 
  15754.             if (count($this->textbuffer)) { 
  15755.                 $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer); 
  15756.             } 
  15757.             $this->bufferoutput = true; 
  15758.             $this->textbuffer = array(); 
  15759.             $this->headerbuffer = ''; 
  15760.             $properties = $this->cssmgr->MergeCSS('BLOCK', 'BODY', ''); 
  15761.             $this->setCSS($properties, '', 'BODY'); 
  15762.         } 
  15763.  
  15764.         mb_internal_encoding('UTF-8'); 
  15765.  
  15766.         $html = $this->AdjustHTML($html, $this->tabSpaces); //Try to make HTML look more like XHTML 
  15767.  
  15768.         if ($this->autoScriptToLang) { 
  15769.             $html = $this->markScriptToLang($html); 
  15770.         } 
  15771.  
  15772.         preg_match_all('/<htmlpageheader([^>]*)>(.*?)<\/htmlpageheader>/si', $html, $h); 
  15773.         for ($i = 0; $i < count($h[1]); $i++) { 
  15774.             if (preg_match('/name=[\'|\"](.*?)[\'|\"]/', $h[1][$i], $n)) { 
  15775.                 $this->pageHTMLheaders[$n[1]]['html'] = $h[2][$i]; 
  15776.                 $this->pageHTMLheaders[$n[1]]['h'] = $this->_gethtmlheight($h[2][$i]); 
  15777.             } 
  15778.         } 
  15779.         preg_match_all('/<htmlpagefooter([^>]*)>(.*?)<\/htmlpagefooter>/si', $html, $f); 
  15780.         for ($i = 0; $i < count($f[1]); $i++) { 
  15781.             if (preg_match('/name=[\'|\"](.*?)[\'|\"]/', $f[1][$i], $n)) { 
  15782.                 $this->pageHTMLfooters[$n[1]]['html'] = $f[2][$i]; 
  15783.                 $this->pageHTMLfooters[$n[1]]['h'] = $this->_gethtmlheight($f[2][$i]); 
  15784.             } 
  15785.         } 
  15786.  
  15787.         $html = preg_replace('/<htmlpageheader.*?<\/htmlpageheader>/si', '', $html); 
  15788.         $html = preg_replace('/<htmlpagefooter.*?<\/htmlpagefooter>/si', '', $html); 
  15789.  
  15790.         if ($this->state == 0 && $sub != 1 && $sub != 3 && $sub != 4) { 
  15791.             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  15792.         } 
  15793.  
  15794.  
  15795.         if (isset($hname) && preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i', $hname, $n)) 
  15796.             $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->pageHTMLheaders[$n[1]], 'O', true); 
  15797.         if (isset($fname) && preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i', $fname, $n)) 
  15798.             $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->pageHTMLfooters[$n[1]], 'O'); 
  15799.  
  15800.  
  15801.  
  15802.         $html = str_replace('<?', '< ', $html); //Fix '<?XML' bug from HTML code generated by MS Word 
  15803.  
  15804.         $this->checkSIP = false; 
  15805.         $this->checkSMP = false; 
  15806.         $this->checkCJK = false; 
  15807.         if ($this->onlyCoreFonts) { 
  15808.             $html = $this->SubstituteChars($html); 
  15809.         } else { 
  15810.             if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregRTLchars . "])/u", $html)) { 
  15811.                 $this->biDirectional = true; 
  15812.             } // *OTL* 
  15813.             if (preg_match("/([\x{20000}-\x{2FFFF}])/u", $html)) { 
  15814.                 $this->checkSIP = true; 
  15815.             } 
  15816.             if (preg_match("/([\x{10000}-\x{1FFFF}])/u", $html)) { 
  15817.                 $this->checkSMP = true; 
  15818.             } 
  15819.             /** -- CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  15820.             if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregCJKchars . "])/u", $html)) { 
  15821.                 $this->checkCJK = true; 
  15822.             } 
  15823.             /** -- END CJK-FONTS -- */ 
  15824.         } 
  15825.  
  15826.         // Don't allow non-breaking spaces that are converted to substituted chars or will break anyway and mess up table width calc. 
  15827.         $html = str_replace('<tta>160</tta>', chr(32), $html); 
  15828.         $html = str_replace('</tta><tta>', '|', $html); 
  15829.         $html = str_replace('</tts><tts>', '|', $html); 
  15830.         $html = str_replace('</ttz><ttz>', '|', $html); 
  15831.  
  15832.         //Add new supported tags in the DisableTags function 
  15833.         $html = strip_tags($html, $this->enabledtags); //remove all unsupported tags, but the ones inside the 'enabledtags' string 
  15834.         //Explode the string in order to parse the HTML code 
  15835.         $a = preg_split('/<(.*?)>/ms', $html, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE); 
  15836.         // ? more accurate regexp that allows e.g. <a name="Silly <name>"> 
  15837.         // if changing - also change in fn.SubstituteChars() 
  15838.         // $a = preg_split ('/<((?:[^<>]+(?:"[^"]*"|\'[^\']*\')?)+)>/ms', $html, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE); 
  15839.  
  15840.         if ($this->mb_enc) { 
  15841.             mb_internal_encoding($this->mb_enc); 
  15842.         } 
  15843.         $pbc = 0; 
  15844.         $this->subPos = -1; 
  15845.         $cnt = count($a); 
  15846.         for ($i = 0; $i < $cnt; $i++) { 
  15847.             $e = $a[$i]; 
  15848.             if ($i % 2 == 0) { 
  15849.                 //TEXT 
  15850.                 if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['hide']) { 
  15851.                     continue; 
  15852.                 } 
  15853.                 if ($this->inlineDisplayOff) { 
  15854.                     continue; 
  15855.                 } 
  15856.                 if ($this->inMeter) { 
  15857.                     continue; 
  15858.                 } 
  15859.  
  15860.                 if ($this->inFixedPosBlock) { 
  15861.                     $this->fixedPosBlock .= $e; 
  15862.                     continue; 
  15863.                 } // *CSS-POSITION* 
  15864.                 if (strlen($e) == 0) { 
  15865.                     continue; 
  15866.                 } 
  15867.  
  15868.                 if ($this->ignorefollowingspaces && !$this->ispre) { 
  15869.                     if (strlen(ltrim($e)) == 0) { 
  15870.                         continue; 
  15871.                     } 
  15872.                     if ($this->FontFamily != 'csymbol' && $this->FontFamily != 'czapfdingbats' && substr($e, 0, 1) == ' ') { 
  15873.                         $this->ignorefollowingspaces = false; 
  15874.                         $e = ltrim($e); 
  15875.                     } 
  15876.                 } 
  15877.  
  15878.                 $this->OTLdata = NULL;  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  15879.  
  15880.                 $e = strcode2utf($e); 
  15881.                 $e = $this->lesser_entity_decode($e); 
  15882.  
  15883.                 if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  15884.                     // If core font is selected in document which is not onlyCoreFonts - substitute with non-core font 
  15885.                     if ($this->useSubstitutions && !$this->onlyCoreFonts && $this->subPos < $i && !$this->specialcontent) { 
  15886.                         $cnt += $this->SubstituteCharsNonCore($a, $i, $e); 
  15887.                     } 
  15888.                     // CONVERT ENCODING 
  15889.                     $e = mb_convert_encoding($e, $this->mb_enc, 'UTF-8'); 
  15890.                     if ($this->textvar & FT_UPPERCASE) { 
  15891.                         $e = mb_strtoupper($e, $this->mb_enc); 
  15892.                     } // mPDF 5.7.1 
  15893.                     elseif ($this->textvar & FT_LOWERCASE) { 
  15894.                         $e = mb_strtolower($e, $this->mb_enc); 
  15895.                     } // mPDF 5.7.1 
  15896.                     elseif ($this->textvar & FT_CAPITALIZE) { 
  15897.                         $e = mb_convert_case($e, MB_CASE_TITLE, "UTF-8"); 
  15898.                     } // mPDF 5.7.1 
  15899.                 } else { 
  15900.                     if ($this->checkSIP && $this->CurrentFont['sipext'] && $this->subPos < $i && (!$this->specialcontent || !$this->useActiveForms)) { 
  15901.                         $cnt += $this->SubstituteCharsSIP($a, $i, $e); 
  15902.                     } 
  15903.  
  15904.                     if ($this->useSubstitutions && !$this->onlyCoreFonts && $this->CurrentFont['type'] != 'Type0' && $this->subPos < $i && (!$this->specialcontent || !$this->useActiveForms)) { 
  15905.                         $cnt += $this->SubstituteCharsMB($a, $i, $e); 
  15906.                     } 
  15907.  
  15908.                     if ($this->textvar & FT_UPPERCASE) { 
  15909.                         $e = mb_strtoupper($e, $this->mb_enc); 
  15910.                     } elseif ($this->textvar & FT_LOWERCASE) { 
  15911.                         $e = mb_strtolower($e, $this->mb_enc); 
  15912.                     } elseif ($this->textvar & FT_CAPITALIZE) { 
  15913.                         $e = mb_convert_case($e, MB_CASE_TITLE, "UTF-8"); 
  15914.                     } 
  15915.  
  15916.                     /** -- OTL -- */ 
  15917.                     // Use OTL OpenType Table Layout - GSUB & GPOS 
  15918.                     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL'] && (!$this->specialcontent || !$this->useActiveForms)) { 
  15919.                         $e = $this->otl->applyOTL($e, $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']); 
  15920.                         $this->OTLdata = $this->otl->OTLdata; 
  15921.                         $this->otl->removeChar($e, $this->OTLdata, "\xef\xbb\xbf"); // Remove ZWNBSP (also Byte order mark FEFF) 
  15922.                     } 
  15923.                     /** -- END OTL -- */ else { // *OTL* 
  15924.                         // removes U+200E/U+200F LTR and RTL mark and U+200C/U+200D Zero-width Joiner and Non-joiner 
  15925.                         $e = preg_replace("/[\xe2\x80\x8c\xe2\x80\x8d\xe2\x80\x8e\xe2\x80\x8f]/u", '', $e); 
  15926.                         $e = preg_replace("/[\xef\xbb\xbf]/u", '', $e); // Remove ZWNBSP (also Byte order mark FEFF) 
  15927.                     } // *OTL* 
  15928.                 } 
  15929.                 if (($this->tts) || ($this->ttz) || ($this->tta)) { 
  15930.                     $es = explode('|', $e); 
  15931.                     $e = ''; 
  15932.                     foreach ($es AS $val) { 
  15933.                         $e .= chr($val); 
  15934.                     } 
  15935.                 } 
  15936.  
  15937.                 //  FORM ELEMENTS 
  15938.                 if ($this->specialcontent) { 
  15939.                     /** -- FORMS -- */ 
  15940.                     //SELECT tag (form element) 
  15941.                     if ($this->specialcontent == "type=select") { 
  15942.                         $e = ltrim($e); 
  15943.                         if (!empty($this->OTLdata)) { 
  15944.                             $this->otl->trimOTLdata($this->OTLdata, true, false); 
  15945.                         } // *OTL* 
  15946.                         $stringwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($e); 
  15947.                         if (!isset($this->selectoption['MAXWIDTH']) || $stringwidth > $this->selectoption['MAXWIDTH']) { 
  15948.                             $this->selectoption['MAXWIDTH'] = $stringwidth; 
  15949.                         } 
  15950.                         if (!isset($this->selectoption['SELECTED']) || $this->selectoption['SELECTED'] == '') { 
  15951.                             $this->selectoption['SELECTED'] = $e; 
  15952.                             if (!empty($this->OTLdata)) { 
  15953.                                 $this->selectoption['SELECTED-OTLDATA'] = $this->OTLdata; 
  15954.                             } // *OTL* 
  15955.                         } 
  15956.                         // Active Forms 
  15957.                         if (isset($this->selectoption['ACTIVE']) && $this->selectoption['ACTIVE']) { 
  15958.                             $this->selectoption['ITEMS'][] = array('exportValue' => $this->selectoption['currentVAL'], 'content' => $e, 'selected' => $this->selectoption['currentSEL']); 
  15959.                         } 
  15960.                         $this->OTLdata = array(); 
  15961.                     } 
  15962.                     // TEXTAREA 
  15963.                     else { 
  15964.                         $objattr = unserialize($this->specialcontent); 
  15965.                         $objattr['text'] = $e; 
  15966.                         $objattr['OTLdata'] = $this->OTLdata; 
  15967.                         $this->OTLdata = array(); 
  15968.                         $te = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=textarea, objattr=" . serialize($objattr) . "\xbb\xa4\xac"; 
  15969.                         if ($this->tdbegin) { 
  15970.                             $this->_saveCellTextBuffer($te, $this->HREF); 
  15971.                         } else { 
  15972.                             $this->_saveTextBuffer($te, $this->HREF); 
  15973.                         } 
  15974.                     } 
  15975.                     /** -- END FORMS -- */ 
  15976.                 } 
  15977.  
  15978.                 // TABLE 
  15979.                 elseif ($this->tableLevel) { 
  15980.                     /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  15981.                     if ($this->tdbegin) { 
  15982.                         if (($this->ignorefollowingspaces) && !$this->ispre) { 
  15983.                             $e = ltrim($e); 
  15984.                             if (!empty($this->OTLdata)) { 
  15985.                                 $this->otl->trimOTLdata($this->OTLdata, true, false); 
  15986.                             } // *OTL* 
  15987.                         } 
  15988.                         if ($e || $e === '0') { 
  15989.                             if ($this->blockjustfinished && $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] > 0) { 
  15990.                                 $this->_saveCellTextBuffer("\n"); 
  15991.                                 if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'])) { 
  15992.                                     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
  15993.                                 } elseif ($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] < $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']) { 
  15994.                                     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
  15995.                                 } 
  15996.                                 $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = 0; // reset 
  15997.                             } 
  15998.                             $this->blockjustfinished = false; 
  15999.  
  16000.                             if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['R']) || !$this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['R']) { 
  16001.                                 if (isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'])) { 
  16002.                                     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] += $this->GetStringWidth($e, false, $this->OTLdata, $this->textvar); 
  16003.                                 } else { 
  16004.                                     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = $this->GetStringWidth($e, false, $this->OTLdata, $this->textvar); 
  16005.                                 } 
  16006.                                 if (!empty($this->spanborddet)) { 
  16007.                                     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] += (isset($this->spanborddet['L']['w']) ? $this->spanborddet['L']['w'] : 0) + (isset($this->spanborddet['R']['w']) ? $this->spanborddet['R']['w'] : 0); 
  16008.                                 } 
  16009.                             } 
  16010.                             $this->_saveCellTextBuffer($e, $this->HREF); 
  16011.                             if (substr($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['a'], 0, 1) == 'D') { 
  16012.                                 $dp = $this->decimal_align[substr($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['a'], 0, 2)]; 
  16013.                                 $s = preg_split('/' . preg_quote($dp, '/') . '/', $e, 2);  // ? needs to be /u if not core 
  16014.                                 $s0 = $this->GetStringWidth($s[0], false); 
  16015.                                 if (isset($s[1]) && $s[1]) { 
  16016.                                     $s1 = $this->GetStringWidth(($s[1] . $dp), false); 
  16017.                                 } else 
  16018.                                     $s1 = 0; 
  16019.                                 if (!isset($this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['decimal_align'][$this->col]['maxs0'])) { 
  16020.                                     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['decimal_align'][$this->col]['maxs0'] = $s0; 
  16021.                                 } else { 
  16022.                                     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['decimal_align'][$this->col]['maxs0'] = max($s0, $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['decimal_align'][$this->col]['maxs0']); 
  16023.                                 } 
  16024.                                 if (!isset($this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['decimal_align'][$this->col]['maxs1'])) { 
  16025.                                     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['decimal_align'][$this->col]['maxs1'] = $s1; 
  16026.                                 } else { 
  16027.                                     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['decimal_align'][$this->col]['maxs1'] = max($s1, $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['decimal_align'][$this->col]['maxs1']); 
  16028.                                 } 
  16029.                             } 
  16030.  
  16031.                             if ($this->tableLevel == 1 && $this->useGraphs) { 
  16032.                                 $this->graphs[$this->currentGraphId]['data'][$this->row][$this->col] = $e; 
  16033.                             } 
  16034.                             $this->nestedtablejustfinished = false; 
  16035.                             $this->linebreakjustfinished = false; 
  16036.                         } 
  16037.                     } 
  16038.                     /** -- END TABLES -- */ 
  16039.                 } 
  16040.                 // ALL ELSE 
  16041.                 else { 
  16042.                     if ($this->ignorefollowingspaces && !$this->ispre) { 
  16043.                         $e = ltrim($e); 
  16044.                         if (!empty($this->OTLdata)) { 
  16045.                             $this->otl->trimOTLdata($this->OTLdata, true, false); 
  16046.                         } // *OTL* 
  16047.                     } 
  16048.                     if ($e || $e === '0') 
  16049.                         $this->_saveTextBuffer($e, $this->HREF); 
  16050.                 } 
  16051.                 if ($e || $e === '0') 
  16052.                     $this->ignorefollowingspaces = false; // mPDF 6 
  16053.                 if (substr($e, -1, 1) == ' ' && !$this->ispre && $this->FontFamily != 'csymbol' && $this->FontFamily != 'czapfdingbats') { 
  16054.                     $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; 
  16055.                 } 
  16056.             } else { // TAG ** 
  16057.                 if (isset($e[0]) && $e[0] == '/') { 
  16058.  
  16059.                     $endtag = trim(strtoupper(substr($e, 1))); 
  16060.  
  16061.  
  16062.                     /** -- CSS-POSITION -- */ 
  16063.                     // mPDF 6 
  16064.                     if ($this->inFixedPosBlock) { 
  16065.                         if (in_array($endtag, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($endtag, $this->innerblocktags)) { 
  16066.                             $this->fixedPosBlockDepth--; 
  16067.                         } 
  16068.                         if ($this->fixedPosBlockDepth == 0) { 
  16069.                             $this->fixedPosBlockSave[] = array($this->fixedPosBlock, $this->fixedPosBlockBBox, $this->page); 
  16070.                             $this->fixedPosBlock = ''; 
  16071.                             $this->inFixedPosBlock = false; 
  16072.                             continue; 
  16073.                         } 
  16074.                         $this->fixedPosBlock .= '<' . $e . '>'; 
  16075.                         continue; 
  16076.                     } 
  16077.                     /** -- END CSS-POSITION -- */ 
  16078.  
  16079.                     // mPDF 6 
  16080.                     // Correct for tags where HTML5 specifies optional end tags (see also OpenTag() ) 
  16081.                     if ($this->allow_html_optional_endtags && !$parseonly) { 
  16082.                         if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['tag'])) { 
  16083.                             $closed = false; 
  16084.                             // li end tag may be omitted if there is no more content in the parent element 
  16085.                             if (!$closed && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['tag'] == 'LI' && $endtag != 'LI' && (in_array($endtag, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($endtag, $this->innerblocktags))) { 
  16086.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag('LI', $a, $i); 
  16087.                                 $closed = true; 
  16088.                             } 
  16089.                             // dd end tag may be omitted if there is no more content in the parent element 
  16090.                             if (!$closed && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['tag'] == 'DD' && $endtag != 'DD' && (in_array($endtag, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($endtag, $this->innerblocktags))) { 
  16091.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag('DD', $a, $i); 
  16092.                                 $closed = true; 
  16093.                             } 
  16094.                             // p end tag may be omitted if there is no more content in the parent element and the parent element is not an A element [??????] 
  16095.                             if (!$closed && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['tag'] == 'P' && $endtag != 'P' && (in_array($endtag, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($endtag, $this->innerblocktags))) { 
  16096.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag('P', $a, $i); 
  16097.                                 $closed = true; 
  16098.                             } 
  16099.                             // option end tag may be omitted if there is no more content in the parent element 
  16100.                             if (!$closed && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['tag'] == 'OPTION' && $endtag != 'OPTION' && (in_array($endtag, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($endtag, $this->innerblocktags))) { 
  16101.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag('OPTION', $a, $i); 
  16102.                                 $closed = true; 
  16103.                             } 
  16104.                         } 
  16105.                         /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  16106.                         // Check for Table tags where HTML specifies optional end tags,  
  16107.                         if ($endtag == 'TABLE') { 
  16108.                             if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'THEAD' || $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TBODY' || $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TFOOT') { 
  16109.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag, $a, $i); 
  16110.                             } 
  16111.                             if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'TR') { 
  16112.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag('TR', $a, $i); 
  16113.                             } 
  16114.                             if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'TD' || $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TH') { 
  16115.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag, $a, $i); 
  16116.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag('TR', $a, $i); 
  16117.                             } 
  16118.                         } 
  16119.                         if ($endtag == 'THEAD' || $endtag == 'TBODY' || $endtag == 'TFOOT') { 
  16120.                             if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'TR') { 
  16121.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag('TR', $a, $i); 
  16122.                             } 
  16123.                             if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'TD' || $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TH') { 
  16124.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag, $a, $i); 
  16125.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag('TR', $a, $i); 
  16126.                             } 
  16127.                         } 
  16128.                         if ($endtag == 'TR') { 
  16129.                             if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'TD' || $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TH') { 
  16130.                                 $this->tag->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag, $a, $i); 
  16131.                             } 
  16132.                         } 
  16133.                         /** -- END TABLES -- */ 
  16134.                     } 
  16135.  
  16136.  
  16137.                     // mPDF 6 
  16138.                     if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['hide']) { 
  16139.                         if (in_array($endtag, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($endtag, $this->innerblocktags)) { 
  16140.                             unset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]); 
  16141.                             $this->blklvl--; 
  16142.                         } 
  16143.                         continue; 
  16144.                     } 
  16145.  
  16146.                     // mPDF 6 
  16147.                     $this->tag->CloseTag($endtag, $a, $i); // mPDF 6 
  16148.                 } else { // OPENING TAG 
  16149.                     if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['hide']) { 
  16150.                         if (strpos($e, ' ')) { 
  16151.                             $te = strtoupper(substr($e, 0, strpos($e, ' '))); 
  16152.                         } else { 
  16153.                             $te = strtoupper($e); 
  16154.                         } 
  16155.                         // mPDF 6 
  16156.                         if ($te == 'THEAD' || $te == 'TBODY' || $te == 'TFOOT' || $te == 'TR' || $te == 'TD' || $te == 'TH') { 
  16157.                             $this->lastoptionaltag = $te; 
  16158.                         } 
  16159.                         if (in_array($te, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($te, $this->innerblocktags)) { 
  16160.                             $this->blklvl++; 
  16161.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['hide'] = true; 
  16162.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['tag'] = $te; // mPDF 6 
  16163.                         } 
  16164.                         continue; 
  16165.                     } 
  16166.  
  16167.                     /** -- CSS-POSITION -- */ 
  16168.                     if ($this->inFixedPosBlock) { 
  16169.                         if (strpos($e, ' ')) { 
  16170.                             $te = strtoupper(substr($e, 0, strpos($e, ' '))); 
  16171.                         } else { 
  16172.                             $te = strtoupper($e); 
  16173.                         } 
  16174.                         $this->fixedPosBlock .= '<' . $e . '>'; 
  16175.                         if (in_array($te, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($te, $this->innerblocktags)) { 
  16176.                             $this->fixedPosBlockDepth++; 
  16177.                         } 
  16178.                         continue; 
  16179.                     } 
  16180.                     /** -- END CSS-POSITION -- */ 
  16181.                     $regexp = '|=\'(.*?)\'|s'; // eliminate single quotes, if any 
  16182.                     $e = preg_replace($regexp, "=\"\$1\"", $e); 
  16183.                     // changes anykey=anyvalue to anykey="anyvalue" (only do this inside [some] tags) 
  16184.                     if (substr($e, 0, 10) != 'pageheader' && substr($e, 0, 10) != 'pagefooter' && substr($e, 0, 12) != 'tocpagebreak' && substr($e, 0, 10) != 'indexentry' && substr($e, 0, 8) != 'tocentry') { // mPDF 6  (ZZZ99H) 
  16185.                         $regexp = '| (\\w+?)=([^\\s>"]+)|si'; 
  16186.                         $e = preg_replace($regexp, " \$1=\"\$2\"", $e); 
  16187.                     } 
  16188.  
  16189.                     $e = preg_replace('/ (\\S+?)\s*=\s*"/i', " \\1=\"", $e); 
  16190.  
  16191.                     //Fix path values, if needed 
  16192.                     $orig_srcpath = ''; 
  16193.                     if ((stristr($e, "href=") !== false) or ( stristr($e, "src=") !== false)) { 
  16194.                         $regexp = '/ (href|src)\s*=\s*"(.*?)"/i'; 
  16195.                         preg_match($regexp, $e, $auxiliararray); 
  16196.                         if (isset($auxiliararray[2])) { 
  16197.                             $path = $auxiliararray[2]; 
  16198.                         } else { 
  16199.                             $path = ''; 
  16200.                         } 
  16201.                         if (trim($path) != '' && !(stristr($e, "src=") !== false && substr($path, 0, 4) == 'var:') && substr($path, 0, 1) != '@') { 
  16202.                             $path = htmlspecialchars_decode($path); // mPDF 5.7.4 URLs 
  16203.                             $orig_srcpath = $path; 
  16204.                             $this->GetFullPath($path); 
  16205.                             $regexp = '/ (href|src)="(.*?)"/i'; 
  16206.                             $e = preg_replace($regexp, ' \\1="' . $path . '"', $e); 
  16207.                         } 
  16208.                     }//END of Fix path values 
  16209.                     //Extract attributes 
  16210.                     $contents = array(); 
  16211.                     $contents1 = array(); 
  16212.                     $contents2 = array(); 
  16213.                     // Changed to allow style="background: url('bg.jpg')" 
  16214.                     // Changed to improve performance; maximum length of \S (attribute) = 16 
  16215.                     // Increase allowed attribute name to 32 - cutting off "toc-even-header-name" etc.
