  16216.                     preg_match_all('/\\S{1, 32}=["][^"]*["]/', $e, $contents1); 
  16217.                     preg_match_all('/\\S{1, 32}=[\'][^\']*[\']/i', $e, $contents2); 
  16218.  
  16219.                     $contents = array_merge($contents1, $contents2); 
  16220.                     preg_match('/\\S+/', $e, $a2); 
  16221.                     $tag = (isset($a2[0]) ? strtoupper($a2[0]) : ''); 
  16222.                     $attr = array(); 
  16223.                     if ($orig_srcpath) { 
  16224.                         $attr['ORIG_SRC'] = $orig_srcpath; 
  16225.                     } 
  16226.                     if (!empty($contents)) { 
  16227.                         foreach ($contents[0] as $v) { 
  16228.                             // Changed to allow style="background: url('bg.jpg')" 
  16229.                             if (preg_match('/^([^=]*)=["]?([^"]*)["]?$/', $v, $a3) || preg_match('/^([^=]*)=[\']?([^\']*)[\']?$/', $v, $a3)) { 
  16230.                                 if (strtoupper($a3[1]) == 'ID' || strtoupper($a3[1]) == 'CLASS') { // 4.2.013 Omits STYLE 
  16231.                                     $attr[strtoupper($a3[1])] = trim(strtoupper($a3[2])); 
  16232.                                 } 
  16233.                                 // includes header-style-right etc. used for <pageheader> 
  16234.                                 elseif (preg_match('/^(HEADER|FOOTER)-STYLE/i', $a3[1])) { 
  16235.                                     $attr[strtoupper($a3[1])] = trim(strtoupper($a3[2])); 
  16236.                                 } else { 
  16237.                                     $attr[strtoupper($a3[1])] = trim($a3[2]); 
  16238.                                 } 
  16239.                             } 
  16240.                         } 
  16241.                     } 
  16242.                     $this->tag->OpenTag($tag, $attr, $a, $i); // mPDF 6 
  16243.                     /** -- CSS-POSITION -- */ 
  16244.                     if ($this->inFixedPosBlock) { 
  16245.                         $this->fixedPosBlockBBox = array($tag, $attr, $this->x, $this->y); 
  16246.                         $this->fixedPosBlock = ''; 
  16247.                         $this->fixedPosBlockDepth = 1; 
  16248.                     } 
  16249.                     /** -- END CSS-POSITION -- */ 
  16250.                     if (preg_match('/\/$/', $e)) { 
  16251.                         $this->tag->CloseTag($tag, $a, $i); 
  16252.                     } 
  16253.                 } 
  16254.             } // end TAG 
  16255.         } //end of    foreach($a as $i=>$e) 
  16256.  
  16257.         if ($close) { 
  16258.  
  16259.             // Close any open block tags 
  16260.             for ($b = $this->blklvl; $b > 0; $b--) { 
  16261.                 $this->tag->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag'], $a, $i); 
  16262.             } 
  16263.  
  16264.             // Output any text left in buffer 
  16265.             if (count($this->textbuffer) && !$parseonly) { 
  16266.                 $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer); 
  16267.             } 
  16268.             if (!$parseonly) 
  16269.                 $this->textbuffer = array(); 
  16270.  
  16271.             /** -- CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  16272.             // If ended with a float, need to move to end page 
  16273.             $currpos = $this->page * 1000 + $this->y; 
  16274.             if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos'] > $currpos) { 
  16275.                 $old_page = $this->page; 
  16276.                 $new_page = intval($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos'] / 1000); 
  16277.                 if ($old_page != $new_page) { 
  16278.                     $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(); 
  16279.                     // Writes after the marker so not overwritten later by page background etc. 
  16280.                     $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', '\\1' . "\n" . $s . "\n", $this->pages[$this->page]); 
  16281.                     $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  16282.                     $this->page = $new_page; 
  16283.                     $this->ResetMargins(); 
  16284.                     $this->Reset(); 
  16285.                     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  16286.                 } 
  16287.                 $this->y = (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos'] * 1000) % 1000000) / 1000; // mod changes operands to integers before processing 
  16288.             } 
  16289.             /** -- END CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  16290.  
  16291.             /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  16292.             $this->printfloatbuffer(); 
  16293.             /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  16294.  
  16295.             //Create Internal Links, if needed 
  16296.             if (!empty($this->internallink)) { 
  16297.                 foreach ($this->internallink as $k => $v) { 
  16298.                     if (strpos($k, "#") !== false) { 
  16299.                         continue; 
  16300.                     } //ignore 
  16301.                     $ypos = $v['Y']; 
  16302.                     $pagenum = $v['PAGE']; 
  16303.                     $sharp = "#"; 
  16304.                     while (array_key_exists($sharp . $k, $this->internallink)) { 
  16305.                         $internallink = $this->internallink[$sharp . $k]; 
  16306.                         $this->SetLink($internallink, $ypos, $pagenum); 
  16307.                         $sharp .= "#"; 
  16308.                     } 
  16309.                 } 
  16310.             } 
  16311.  
  16312.             $this->bufferoutput = false; 
  16313.  
  16314.             /** -- CSS-POSITION -- */ 
  16315.             if (count($this->fixedPosBlockSave) && $sub != 4) { 
  16316.                 foreach ($this->fixedPosBlockSave AS $fpbs) { 
  16317.                     $old_page = $this->page; 
  16318.                     $this->page = $fpbs[2]; 
  16319.                     $this->WriteFixedPosHTML($fpbs[0], 0, 0, 100, 100, 'auto', $fpbs[1]);  // 0, 0, 10, 10 are overwritten by bbox 
  16320.                     $this->page = $old_page; 
  16321.                 } 
  16322.                 $this->fixedPosBlockSave = array(); 
  16323.             } 
  16324.             /** -- END CSS-POSITION -- */ 
  16325.         } 
  16326.     } 
  16327.  
  16328.     /** -- CSS-POSITION -- */ 
  16329.  
  16330.     function WriteFixedPosHTML($html = '', $x, $y, $w, $h, $overflow = 'visible', $bounding = array()) 
  16331.     { 
  16332.         // $overflow can be 'hidden', 'visible' or 'auto' - 'auto' causes autofit to size 
  16333.         // Annotations disabled - enabled in mPDF 5.0 
  16334.         // Links do work 
  16335.         // Will always go on current page (or start Page 1 if required) 
  16336.         // Probably INCOMPATIBLE WITH keep with table, columns etc. 
  16337.         // Called externally or interally via <div style="position: [fixed|absolute]"> 
  16338.         // When used internally, $x $y $w $h and $overflow are all overridden by $bounding 
  16339.  
  16340.         $overflow = strtolower($overflow); 
  16341.         if ($this->state == 0) { 
  16342.             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  16343.         } 
  16344.         $save_y = $this->y; 
  16345.         $save_x = $this->x; 
  16346.         $this->fullImageHeight = $this->h; 
  16347.         $save_cols = false; 
  16348.         /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  16349.         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  16350.             $save_cols = true; 
  16351.             $save_nbcol = $this->NbCol; // other values of gap and vAlign will not change by setting Columns off 
  16352.             $this->SetColumns(0); 
  16353.         } 
  16354.         /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  16355.         $save_annots = $this->title2annots; // *ANNOTATIONS* 
  16356.         $this->writingHTMLheader = true; // a FIX to stop pagebreaks etc. 
  16357.         $this->writingHTMLfooter = true; 
  16358.         $this->InFooter = true; // suppresses autopagebreaks 
  16359.         $save_bgs = $this->pageBackgrounds; 
  16360.         $checkinnerhtml = preg_replace('/\s/', '', $html); 
  16361.  
  16362.         if ($w > $this->w) { 
  16363.             $x = 0; 
  16364.             $w = $this->w; 
  16365.         } 
  16366.         if ($h > $this->h) { 
  16367.             $y = 0; 
  16368.             $h = $this->h; 
  16369.         } 
  16370.         if ($x > $this->w) { 
  16371.             $x = $this->w - $w; 
  16372.         } 
  16373.         if ($y > $this->h) { 
  16374.             $y = $this->h - $h; 
  16375.         } 
  16376.  
  16377.         if (!empty($bounding)) { 
  16378.             // $cont_ containing block = full physical page (position: absolute) or page inside margins (position: fixed) 
  16379.             // $bbox_ Bounding box is the <div> which is positioned absolutely/fixed 
  16380.             // top/left/right/bottom/width/height/background*/border*/padding*/margin* are taken from bounding 
  16381.             // font*[family/size/style/weight]/line-height/text*[align/decoration/transform/indent]/color are transferred to $inner 
  16382.             // as an enclosing <div> (after having checked ID/CLASS) 
  16383.             // $x, $y, $w, $h are inside of $bbox_ = containing box for $inner_ 
  16384.             // $inner_ InnerHTML is the contents of that block to be output 
  16385.             $tag = $bounding[0]; 
  16386.             $attr = $bounding[1]; 
  16387.             $orig_x0 = $bounding[2]; 
  16388.             $orig_y0 = $bounding[3]; 
  16389.  
  16390.             // As in WriteHTML() initialising 
  16391.             $this->blklvl = 0; 
  16392.             $this->lastblocklevelchange = 0; 
  16393.             $this->blk = array(); 
  16394.             $this->initialiseBlock($this->blk[0]); 
  16395.  
  16396.             $this->blk[0]['width'] = & $this->pgwidth; 
  16397.             $this->blk[0]['inner_width'] = & $this->pgwidth; 
  16398.  
  16399.             $this->blk[0]['blockContext'] = $this->blockContext; 
  16400.  
  16401.             $properties = $this->cssmgr->MergeCSS('BLOCK', 'BODY', ''); 
  16402.             $this->setCSS($properties, '', 'BODY'); 
  16403.             $this->blklvl = 1; 
  16404.             $this->initialiseBlock($this->blk[1]); 
  16405.             $this->blk[1]['tag'] = $tag; 
  16406.             $this->blk[1]['attr'] = $attr; 
  16407.             $this->Reset(); 
  16408.             $p = $this->cssmgr->MergeCSS('BLOCK', $tag, $attr); 
  16409.             if (isset($p['ROTATE']) && ($p['ROTATE'] == 90 || $p['ROTATE'] == -90 || $p['ROTATE'] == 180)) { 
  16410.                 $rotate = $p['ROTATE']; 
  16411.             } // mPDF 6 
  16412.             else { 
  16413.                 $rotate = 0; 
  16414.             } 
  16415.             if (isset($p['OVERFLOW'])) { 
  16416.                 $overflow = strtolower($p['OVERFLOW']); 
  16417.             } 
  16418.             if (strtolower($p['POSITION']) == 'fixed') { 
  16419.                 $cont_w = $this->pgwidth; // $this->blk[0]['inner_width']; 
  16420.                 $cont_h = $this->h - $this->tMargin - $this->bMargin; 
  16421.                 $cont_x = $this->lMargin; 
  16422.                 $cont_y = $this->tMargin; 
  16423.             } else { 
  16424.                 $cont_w = $this->w; // ABSOLUTE; 
  16425.                 $cont_h = $this->h; 
  16426.                 $cont_x = 0; 
  16427.                 $cont_y = 0; 
  16428.             } 
  16429.  
  16430.             // Pass on in-line properties to the innerhtml 
  16431.             $css = ''; 
  16432.             if (isset($p['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { 
  16433.                 $css .= 'text-align: ' . strtolower($p['TEXT-ALIGN']) . '; '; 
  16434.             } 
  16435.             if (isset($p['TEXT-TRANSFORM'])) { 
  16436.                 $css .= 'text-transform: ' . strtolower($p['TEXT-TRANSFORM']) . '; '; 
  16437.             } 
  16438.             if (isset($p['TEXT-INDENT'])) { 
  16439.                 $css .= 'text-indent: ' . strtolower($p['TEXT-INDENT']) . '; '; 
  16440.             } 
  16441.             if (isset($p['TEXT-DECORATION'])) { 
  16442.                 $css .= 'text-decoration: ' . strtolower($p['TEXT-DECORATION']) . '; '; 
  16443.             } 
  16444.             if (isset($p['FONT-FAMILY'])) { 
  16445.                 $css .= 'font-family: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-FAMILY']) . '; '; 
  16446.             } 
  16447.             if (isset($p['FONT-STYLE'])) { 
  16448.                 $css .= 'font-style: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-STYLE']) . '; '; 
  16449.             } 
  16450.             if (isset($p['FONT-WEIGHT'])) { 
  16451.                 $css .= 'font-weight: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-WEIGHT']) . '; '; 
  16452.             } 
  16453.             if (isset($p['FONT-SIZE'])) { 
  16454.                 $css .= 'font-size: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-SIZE']) . '; '; 
  16455.             } 
  16456.             if (isset($p['LINE-HEIGHT'])) { 
  16457.                 $css .= 'line-height: ' . strtolower($p['LINE-HEIGHT']) . '; '; 
  16458.             } 
  16459.             if (isset($p['TEXT-SHADOW'])) { 
  16460.                 $css .= 'text-shadow: ' . strtolower($p['TEXT-SHADOW']) . '; '; 
  16461.             } 
  16462.             if (isset($p['LETTER-SPACING'])) { 
  16463.                 $css .= 'letter-spacing: ' . strtolower($p['LETTER-SPACING']) . '; '; 
  16464.             } 
  16465.             // mPDF 6 
  16466.             if (isset($p['FONT-VARIANT-POSITION'])) { 
  16467.                 $css .= 'font-variant-position: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-VARIANT-POSITION']) . '; '; 
  16468.             } 
  16469.             if (isset($p['FONT-VARIANT-CAPS'])) { 
  16470.                 $css .= 'font-variant-caps: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-VARIANT-CAPS']) . '; '; 
  16471.             } 
  16472.             if (isset($p['FONT-VARIANT-LIGATURES'])) { 
  16473.                 $css .= 'font-variant-ligatures: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-VARIANT-LIGATURES']) . '; '; 
  16474.             } 
  16475.             if (isset($p['FONT-VARIANT-NUMERIC'])) { 
  16476.                 $css .= 'font-variant-numeric: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-VARIANT-NUMERIC']) . '; '; 
  16477.             } 
  16478.             if (isset($p['FONT-VARIANT-ALTERNATES'])) { 
  16479.                 $css .= 'font-variant-alternates: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-VARIANT-ALTERNATES']) . '; '; 
  16480.             } 
  16481.             if (isset($p['FONT-FEATURE-SETTINGS'])) { 
  16482.                 $css .= 'font-feature-settings: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-FEATURE-SETTINGS']) . '; '; 
  16483.             } 
  16484.             if (isset($p['FONT-LANGUAGE-OVERRIDE'])) { 
  16485.                 $css .= 'font-language-override: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-LANGUAGE-OVERRIDE']) . '; '; 
  16486.             } 
  16487.             if (isset($p['FONT-KERNING'])) { 
  16488.                 $css .= 'font-kerning: ' . strtolower($p['FONT-KERNING']) . '; '; 
  16489.             } 
  16490.  
  16491.             if (isset($p['COLOR'])) { 
  16492.                 $css .= 'color: ' . strtolower($p['COLOR']) . '; '; 
  16493.             } 
  16494.             if (isset($p['Z-INDEX'])) { 
  16495.                 $css .= 'z-index: ' . $p['Z-INDEX'] . '; '; 
  16496.             } 
  16497.             if ($css) { 
  16498.                 $html = '<div style="' . $css . '">' . $html . '</div>'; 
  16499.             } 
  16500.             // Copy over (only) the properties to set for border and background 
  16501.             $pb = array(); 
  16502.             $pb['MARGIN-TOP'] = (isset($p['MARGIN-TOP']) ? $p['MARGIN-TOP'] : ''); 
  16503.             $pb['MARGIN-RIGHT'] = (isset($p['MARGIN-RIGHT']) ? $p['MARGIN-RIGHT'] : ''); 
  16504.             $pb['MARGIN-BOTTOM'] = (isset($p['MARGIN-BOTTOM']) ? $p['MARGIN-BOTTOM'] : ''); 
  16505.             $pb['MARGIN-LEFT'] = (isset($p['MARGIN-LEFT']) ? $p['MARGIN-LEFT'] : ''); 
  16506.             $pb['PADDING-TOP'] = (isset($p['PADDING-TOP']) ? $p['PADDING-TOP'] : ''); 
  16507.             $pb['PADDING-RIGHT'] = (isset($p['PADDING-RIGHT']) ? $p['PADDING-RIGHT'] : ''); 
  16508.             $pb['PADDING-BOTTOM'] = (isset($p['PADDING-BOTTOM']) ? $p['PADDING-BOTTOM'] : ''); 
  16509.             $pb['PADDING-LEFT'] = (isset($p['PADDING-LEFT']) ? $p['PADDING-LEFT'] : ''); 
  16510.             $pb['BORDER-TOP'] = (isset($p['BORDER-TOP']) ? $p['BORDER-TOP'] : ''); 
  16511.             $pb['BORDER-RIGHT'] = (isset($p['BORDER-RIGHT']) ? $p['BORDER-RIGHT'] : ''); 
  16512.             $pb['BORDER-BOTTOM'] = (isset($p['BORDER-BOTTOM']) ? $p['BORDER-BOTTOM'] : ''); 
  16513.             $pb['BORDER-LEFT'] = (isset($p['BORDER-LEFT']) ? $p['BORDER-LEFT'] : ''); 
  16514.             if (isset($p['BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-H'])) { 
  16515.                 $pb['BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-H'] = $p['BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-H']; 
  16516.             } 
  16517.             if (isset($p['BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-V'])) { 
  16518.                 $pb['BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-V'] = $p['BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-V']; 
  16519.             } 
  16520.             if (isset($p['BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-H'])) { 
  16521.                 $pb['BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-H'] = $p['BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-H']; 
  16522.             } 
  16523.             if (isset($p['BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-V'])) { 
  16524.                 $pb['BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-V'] = $p['BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-V']; 
  16525.             } 
  16526.             if (isset($p['BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-H'])) { 
  16527.                 $pb['BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-H'] = $p['BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-H']; 
  16528.             } 
  16529.             if (isset($p['BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-V'])) { 
  16530.                 $pb['BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-V'] = $p['BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-V']; 
  16531.             } 
  16532.             if (isset($p['BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-H'])) { 
  16533.                 $pb['BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-H'] = $p['BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-H']; 
  16534.             } 
  16535.             if (isset($p['BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-V'])) { 
  16536.                 $pb['BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-V'] = $p['BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-V']; 
  16537.             } 
  16538.             if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-COLOR'])) { 
  16539.                 $pb['BACKGROUND-COLOR'] = $p['BACKGROUND-COLOR']; 
  16540.             } 
  16541.             if (isset($p['BOX-SHADOW'])) { 
  16542.                 $pb['BOX-SHADOW'] = $p['BOX-SHADOW']; 
  16543.             } 
  16544.             /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  16545.             if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'])) { 
  16546.                 $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'] = $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']; 
  16547.             } 
  16548.             if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'])) { 
  16549.                 $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'] = $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']; 
  16550.             } 
  16551.             if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'])) { 
  16552.                 $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'] = $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY']; 
  16553.             } 
  16554.             if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'])) { 
  16555.                 $pb['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'] = $p['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']; 
  16556.             } 
  16557.             if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-POSITION'])) { 
  16558.                 $pb['BACKGROUND-POSITION'] = $p['BACKGROUND-POSITION']; 
  16559.             } 
  16560.             if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'])) { 
  16561.                 $pb['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'] = $p['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']; 
  16562.             } 
  16563.             if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-SIZE'])) { 
  16564.                 $pb['BACKGROUND-SIZE'] = $p['BACKGROUND-SIZE']; 
  16565.             } 
  16566.             if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-ORIGIN'])) { 
  16567.                 $pb['BACKGROUND-ORIGIN'] = $p['BACKGROUND-ORIGIN']; 
  16568.             } 
  16569.             if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-CLIP'])) { 
  16570.                 $pb['BACKGROUND-CLIP'] = $p['BACKGROUND-CLIP']; 
  16571.             } 
  16572.  
  16573.             /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  16574.  
  16575.             $this->setCSS($pb, 'BLOCK', $tag); 
  16576.  
  16577.             //================================================================ 
  16578.             $bbox_br = $this->blk[1]['border_right']['w']; 
  16579.             $bbox_bl = $this->blk[1]['border_left']['w']; 
  16580.             $bbox_bt = $this->blk[1]['border_top']['w']; 
  16581.             $bbox_bb = $this->blk[1]['border_bottom']['w']; 
  16582.             $bbox_pr = $this->blk[1]['padding_right']; 
  16583.             $bbox_pl = $this->blk[1]['padding_left']; 
  16584.             $bbox_pt = $this->blk[1]['padding_top']; 
  16585.             $bbox_pb = $this->blk[1]['padding_bottom']; 
  16586.             $bbox_mr = $this->blk[1]['margin_right']; 
  16587.             if (isset($p['MARGIN-RIGHT']) && strtolower($p['MARGIN-RIGHT']) == 'auto') { 
  16588.                 $bbox_mr = 'auto'; 
  16589.             } 
  16590.             $bbox_ml = $this->blk[1]['margin_left']; 
  16591.             if (isset($p['MARGIN-LEFT']) && strtolower($p['MARGIN-LEFT']) == 'auto') { 
  16592.                 $bbox_ml = 'auto'; 
  16593.             } 
  16594.             $bbox_mt = $this->blk[1]['margin_top']; 
  16595.             if (isset($p['MARGIN-TOP']) && strtolower($p['MARGIN-TOP']) == 'auto') { 
  16596.                 $bbox_mt = 'auto'; 
  16597.             } 
  16598.             $bbox_mb = $this->blk[1]['margin_bottom']; 
  16599.             if (isset($p['MARGIN-BOTTOM']) && strtolower($p['MARGIN-BOTTOM']) == 'auto') { 
  16600.                 $bbox_mb = 'auto'; 
  16601.             } 
  16602.             if (isset($p['LEFT']) && strtolower($p['LEFT']) != 'auto') { 
  16603.                 $bbox_left = $this->ConvertSize($p['LEFT'], $cont_w, $this->FontSize, false); 
  16604.             } else { 
  16605.                 $bbox_left = 'auto'; 
  16606.             } 
  16607.             if (isset($p['TOP']) && strtolower($p['TOP']) != 'auto') { 
  16608.                 $bbox_top = $this->ConvertSize($p['TOP'], $cont_h, $this->FontSize, false); 
  16609.             } else { 
  16610.                 $bbox_top = 'auto'; 
  16611.             } 
  16612.             if (isset($p['RIGHT']) && strtolower($p['RIGHT']) != 'auto') { 
  16613.                 $bbox_right = $this->ConvertSize($p['RIGHT'], $cont_w, $this->FontSize, false); 
  16614.             } else { 
  16615.                 $bbox_right = 'auto'; 
  16616.             } 
  16617.             if (isset($p['BOTTOM']) && strtolower($p['BOTTOM']) != 'auto') { 
  16618.                 $bbox_bottom = $this->ConvertSize($p['BOTTOM'], $cont_h, $this->FontSize, false); 
  16619.             } else { 
  16620.                 $bbox_bottom = 'auto'; 
  16621.             } 
  16622.             if (isset($p['WIDTH']) && strtolower($p['WIDTH']) != 'auto') { 
  16623.                 $inner_w = $this->ConvertSize($p['WIDTH'], $cont_w, $this->FontSize, false); 
  16624.             } else { 
  16625.                 $inner_w = 'auto'; 
  16626.             } 
  16627.             if (isset($p['HEIGHT']) && strtolower($p['HEIGHT']) != 'auto') { 
  16628.                 $inner_h = $this->ConvertSize($p['HEIGHT'], $cont_h, $this->FontSize, false); 
  16629.             } else { 
  16630.                 $inner_h = 'auto'; 
  16631.             } 
  16632.  
  16633.             // If bottom or right pos are set and not left / top - save this to adjust rotated block later 
  16634.             if ($rotate == 90 || $rotate == -90) { // mPDF 6 
  16635.                 if ($bbox_left === 'auto' && $bbox_right !== 'auto') { 
  16636.                     $rot_rpos = $bbox_right; 
  16637.                 } else { 
  16638.                     $rot_rpos = false; 
  16639.                 } 
  16640.                 if ($bbox_top === 'auto' && $bbox_bottom !== 'auto') { 
  16641.                     $rot_bpos = $bbox_bottom; 
  16642.                 } else { 
  16643.                     $rot_bpos = false; 
  16644.                 } 
  16645.             } 
  16646.  
  16647.             //================================================================ 
  16648.             if ($checkinnerhtml == '' && $inner_h === 'auto') { 
  16649.                 $inner_h = 0.0001; 
  16650.             } 
  16651.             if ($checkinnerhtml == '' && $inner_w === 'auto') { 
  16652.                 $inner_w = 2 * $this->GetCharWidth('W', false); 
  16653.             } 
  16654.             //================================================================ 
  16655.             // Algorithm from CSS2.1  See http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS21/visudet.html#abs-non-replaced-height 
  16656.             // mPD 5.3.14 
  16657.             // Special case (not CSS) if all not specified, centre vertically on page 
  16658.             $bbox_top_orig = ''; 
  16659.             if ($bbox_top === 'auto' && $inner_h === 'auto' && $bbox_bottom === 'auto' && $bbox_mt === 'auto' && $bbox_mb === 'auto') { 
  16660.                 $bbox_top_orig = $bbox_top; 
  16661.                 if ($bbox_mt === 'auto') { 
  16662.                     $bbox_mt = 0; 
  16663.                 } 
  16664.                 if ($bbox_mb === 'auto') { 
  16665.                     $bbox_mb = 0; 
  16666.                 } 
  16667.                 $bbox_top = $orig_y0 - $bbox_mt - $cont_y; 
  16668.                 // solve for $bbox_bottom when content_h known - $inner_h=='auto' && $bbox_bottom=='auto' 
  16669.             } 
  16670.             // mPD 5.3.14 
  16671.             elseif ($bbox_top === 'auto' && $inner_h === 'auto' && $bbox_bottom === 'auto') { 
  16672.                 $bbox_top_orig = $bbox_top = $orig_y0 - $cont_y; 
  16673.                 if ($bbox_mt === 'auto') { 
  16674.                     $bbox_mt = 0; 
  16675.                 } 
  16676.                 if ($bbox_mb === 'auto') { 
  16677.                     $bbox_mb = 0; 
  16678.                 } 
  16679.                 // solve for $bbox_bottom when content_h known - $inner_h=='auto' && $bbox_bottom=='auto' 
  16680.             } elseif ($bbox_top !== 'auto' && $inner_h !== 'auto' && $bbox_bottom !== 'auto') { 
  16681.                 if ($bbox_mt === 'auto' && $bbox_mb === 'auto') { 
  16682.                     $x = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_bottom; 
  16683.                     $bbox_mt = $bbox_mb = ($x / 2); 
  16684.                 } elseif ($bbox_mt === 'auto') { 
  16685.                     $bbox_mt = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb - $bbox_bottom; 
  16686.                 } elseif ($bbox_mb === 'auto') { 
  16687.                     $bbox_mb = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_bottom; 
  16688.                 } else { 
  16689.                     $bbox_bottom = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mt; 
  16690.                 } 
  16691.             } else { 
  16692.                 if ($bbox_mt === 'auto') { 
  16693.                     $bbox_mt = 0; 
  16694.                 } 
  16695.                 if ($bbox_mb === 'auto') { 
  16696.                     $bbox_mb = 0; 
  16697.                 } 
  16698.                 if ($bbox_top === 'auto' && $inner_h === 'auto' && $bbox_bottom !== 'auto') { 
  16699.                     // solve for $bbox_top when content_h known - $inner_h=='auto' && $bbox_top =='auto' 
  16700.                 } elseif ($bbox_top === 'auto' && $bbox_bottom === 'auto' && $inner_h !== 'auto') { 
  16701.                     $bbox_top = $orig_y0 - $bbox_mt - $cont_y; 
  16702.                     $bbox_bottom = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mt; 
  16703.                 } elseif ($inner_h === 'auto' && $bbox_bottom === 'auto' && $bbox_top !== 'auto') { 
  16704.                     // solve for $bbox_bottom when content_h known - $inner_h=='auto' && $bbox_bottom=='auto' 
  16705.                 } elseif ($bbox_top === 'auto' && $inner_h !== 'auto' && $bbox_bottom !== 'auto') { 
  16706.                     $bbox_top = $cont_h - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bottom; 
  16707.                 } elseif ($inner_h === 'auto' && $bbox_top !== 'auto' && $bbox_bottom !== 'auto') { 
  16708.                     $inner_h = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bottom; 
  16709.                 } elseif ($bbox_bottom === 'auto' && $bbox_top !== 'auto' && $inner_h !== 'auto') { 
  16710.                     $bbox_bottom = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mt; 
  16711.                 } 
  16712.             } 
  16713.  
  16714.             // THEN DO SAME FOR WIDTH 
  16715.             // http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS21/visudet.html#abs-non-replaced-width 
  16716.             if ($bbox_left === 'auto' && $inner_w === 'auto' && $bbox_right === 'auto') { 
  16717.                 if ($bbox_ml === 'auto') { 
  16718.                     $bbox_ml = 0; 
  16719.                 } 
  16720.                 if ($bbox_mr === 'auto') { 
  16721.                     $bbox_mr = 0; 
  16722.                 } 
  16723.                 // IF containing element RTL, should set $bbox_right 
  16724.                 $bbox_left = $orig_x0 - $bbox_ml - $cont_x; 
  16725.                 // solve for $bbox_right when content_w known - $inner_w=='auto' && $bbox_right=='auto' 
  16726.             } elseif ($bbox_left !== 'auto' && $inner_w !== 'auto' && $bbox_right !== 'auto') { 
  16727.                 if ($bbox_ml === 'auto' && $bbox_mr === 'auto') { 
  16728.                     $x = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_right; 
  16729.                     $bbox_ml = $bbox_mr = ($x / 2); 
  16730.                 } elseif ($bbox_ml === 'auto') { 
  16731.                     $bbox_ml = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_mr - $bbox_right; 
  16732.                 } elseif ($bbox_mr === 'auto') { 
  16733.                     $bbox_mr = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_right; 
  16734.                 } else { 
  16735.                     $bbox_right = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml; 
  16736.                 } 
  16737.             } else { 
  16738.                 if ($bbox_ml === 'auto') { 
  16739.                     $bbox_ml = 0; 
  16740.                 } 
  16741.                 if ($bbox_mr === 'auto') { 
  16742.                     $bbox_mr = 0; 
  16743.                 } 
  16744.                 if ($bbox_left === 'auto' && $inner_w === 'auto' && $bbox_right !== 'auto') { 
  16745.                     // solve for $bbox_left when content_w known - $inner_w=='auto' && $bbox_left =='auto' 
  16746.                 } elseif ($bbox_left === 'auto' && $bbox_right === 'auto' && $inner_w !== 'auto') { 
  16747.                     // IF containing element RTL, should set $bbox_right 
  16748.                     $bbox_left = $orig_x0 - $bbox_ml - $cont_x; 
  16749.                     $bbox_right = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml; 
  16750.                 } elseif ($inner_w === 'auto' && $bbox_right === 'auto' && $bbox_left !== 'auto') { 
  16751.                     // solve for $bbox_right when content_w known - $inner_w=='auto' && $bbox_right=='auto' 
  16752.                 } elseif ($bbox_left === 'auto' && $inner_w !== 'auto' && $bbox_right !== 'auto') { 
  16753.                     $bbox_left = $cont_w - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml - $bbox_right; 
  16754.                 } elseif ($inner_w === 'auto' && $bbox_left !== 'auto' && $bbox_right !== 'auto') { 
  16755.                     $inner_w = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml - $bbox_right; 
  16756.                 } elseif ($bbox_right === 'auto' && $bbox_left !== 'auto' && $inner_w !== 'auto') { 
  16757.                     $bbox_right = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml; 
  16758.                 } 
  16759.             } 
  16760.  
  16761.             //================================================================ 
  16762.             //================================================================ 
  16763.             /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  16764.             if (isset($pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) && $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) { 
  16765.                 $ret = $this->SetBackground($pb, $this->blk[1]['inner_width']); 
  16766.                 if ($ret) { 
  16767.                     $this->blk[1]['background-image'] = $ret; 
  16768.                 } 
  16769.             } 
  16770.             /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  16771.  
  16772.             //================================================================ 
  16773.             $y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt; 
  16774.             $h = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb - $bbox_bottom; 
  16775.             $x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml + $bbox_bl + $bbox_pl; 
  16776.             $w = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_mr - $bbox_right; 
  16777.             // Set (temporary) values for x y w h to do first paint, if values are auto 
  16778.             if ($inner_h === 'auto' && $bbox_top === 'auto') { 
  16779.                 $y = $cont_y + $bbox_mt + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt; 
  16780.                 $h = $cont_h - ($bbox_bottom + $bbox_mt + $bbox_mb + $bbox_bt + $bbox_bb + $bbox_pt + $bbox_pb); 
  16781.             } elseif ($inner_h === 'auto' && $bbox_bottom === 'auto') { 
  16782.                 $y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt; 
  16783.                 $h = $cont_h - ($bbox_top + $bbox_mt + $bbox_mb + $bbox_bt + $bbox_bb + $bbox_pt + $bbox_pb); 
  16784.             } 
  16785.             if ($inner_w === 'auto' && $bbox_left === 'auto') { 
  16786.                 $x = $cont_x + $bbox_ml + $bbox_bl + $bbox_pl; 
  16787.                 $w = $cont_w - ($bbox_right + $bbox_ml + $bbox_mr + $bbox_bl + $bbox_br + $bbox_pl + $bbox_pr); 
  16788.             } elseif ($inner_w === 'auto' && $bbox_right === 'auto') { 
  16789.                 $x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml + $bbox_bl + $bbox_pl; 
  16790.                 $w = $cont_w - ($bbox_left + $bbox_ml + $bbox_mr + $bbox_bl + $bbox_br + $bbox_pl + $bbox_pr); 
  16791.             } 
  16792.             $bbox_y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt; 
  16793.             $bbox_x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml; 
  16794.             $saved_block1 = $this->blk[1]; 
  16795.             unset($p); 
  16796.             unset($pb); 
  16797.             //================================================================ 
  16798.             if ($inner_w === 'auto') { // do a first write 
  16799.                 $this->lMargin = $x; 
  16800.                 $this->rMargin = $this->w - $w - $x; 
  16801.                 // SET POSITION & FONT VALUES 
  16802.                 $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  16803.                 $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  16804.                 $this->x = $x; 
  16805.                 $this->y = $y; 
  16806.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array(); 
  16807.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots = array(); 
  16808.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageForms = array(); 
  16809.                 $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  16810.                 $this->maxPosR = 0; 
  16811.                 $this->maxPosL = $this->w; // For RTL 
  16812.                 $this->WriteHTML($html, 4); 
  16813.                 $inner_w = $this->maxPosR - $this->lMargin; 
  16814.                 if ($bbox_right === 'auto') { 
  16815.                     $bbox_right = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml; 
  16816.                 } elseif ($bbox_left === 'auto') { 
  16817.                     $bbox_left = $cont_w - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml - $bbox_right; 
  16818.                     $bbox_x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml; 
  16819.                     $inner_x = $bbox_x + $bbox_bl + $bbox_pl; 
  16820.                     $x = $inner_x; 
  16821.                 } 
  16822.                 $w = $inner_w; 
  16823.                 $bbox_y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt; 
  16824.                 $bbox_x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml; 
  16825.             } 
  16826.  
  16827.             if ($inner_h === 'auto') { // do a first write 
  16828.                 $this->lMargin = $x; 
  16829.                 $this->rMargin = $this->w - $w - $x; 
  16830.                 // SET POSITION & FONT VALUES 
  16831.                 $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  16832.                 $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  16833.                 $this->x = $x; 
  16834.                 $this->y = $y; 
  16835.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array(); 
  16836.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots = array(); 
  16837.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageForms = array(); 
  16838.                 $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  16839.                 $this->WriteHTML($html, 4); 
  16840.                 $inner_h = $this->y - $y; 
  16841.                 if ($overflow != 'hidden' && $overflow != 'visible') { // constrained 
  16842.                     if (($this->y + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb) > ($cont_y + $cont_h)) { 
  16843.                         $adj = ($this->y + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb) - ($cont_y + $cont_h); 
  16844.                         $inner_h -= $adj; 
  16845.                     } 
  16846.                 } 
  16847.                 if ($bbox_bottom === 'auto' && $bbox_top_orig === 'auto') { 
  16848.                     $bbox_bottom = $bbox_top = ($cont_h - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb) / 2; 
  16849.                     if ($overflow != 'hidden' && $overflow != 'visible') { // constrained 
  16850.                         if ($bbox_top < 0) { 
  16851.                             $bbox_top = 0; 
  16852.                             $inner_h = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb - $bbox_bottom; 
  16853.                         } 
  16854.                     } 
  16855.                     $bbox_y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt; 
  16856.                     $inner_y = $bbox_y + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt; 
  16857.                     $y = $inner_y; 
  16858.                 } elseif ($bbox_bottom === 'auto') { 
  16859.                     $bbox_bottom = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb; 
  16860.                 } elseif ($bbox_top === 'auto') { 
  16861.                     $bbox_top = $cont_h - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb - $bbox_bottom; 
  16862.                     if ($overflow != 'hidden' && $overflow != 'visible') { // constrained 
  16863.                         if ($bbox_top < 0) { 
  16864.                             $bbox_top = 0; 
  16865.                             $inner_h = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb - $bbox_bottom; 
  16866.                         } 
  16867.                     } 
  16868.                     $bbox_y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt; 
  16869.                     $inner_y = $bbox_y + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt; 
  16870.                     $y = $inner_y; 
  16871.                 } 
  16872.                 $h = $inner_h; 
  16873.                 $bbox_y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt; 
  16874.                 $bbox_x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml; 
  16875.             } 
  16876.             $inner_w = $w; 
  16877.             $inner_h = $h; 
  16878.         } 
  16879.         $this->lMargin = $x; 
  16880.         $this->rMargin = $this->w - $w - $x; 
  16881.         // SET POSITION & FONT VALUES 
  16882.         $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  16883.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  16884.         $this->x = $x; 
  16885.         $this->y = $y; 
  16886.         $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array(); 
  16887.         $this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots = array(); 
  16888.         $this->HTMLheaderPageForms = array(); 
  16889.         $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  16890.         $this->WriteHTML($html, 4); // parameter 4 saves output to $this->headerbuffer 
  16891.         $actual_h = $this->y - $y; 
  16892.         $use_w = $w; 
  16893.         $use_h = $h; 
  16894.         $ratio = $actual_h / $use_w; 
  16895.  
  16896.         if ($overflow != 'hidden' && $overflow != 'visible') { 
  16897.             $target = $h / $w; 
  16898.             if (($ratio / $target ) > 1) { 
  16899.                 $nl = CEIL($actual_h / $this->lineheight); 
  16900.                 $l = $use_w * $nl; 
  16901.                 $est_w = sqrt(($l * $this->lineheight) / $target) * 0.8; 
  16902.                 $use_w += ($est_w - $use_w) - ($w / 100); 
  16903.             } 
  16904.             $bpcstart = ($ratio / $target); 
  16905.             $bpcctr = 1; 
  16906.             while (($ratio / $target ) > 1) { 
  16907.  
  16908.                 $this->x = $x; 
  16909.                 $this->y = $y; 
  16910.  
  16911.                 if (($ratio / $target) > 1.5 || ($ratio / $target) < 0.6) { 
  16912.                     $use_w += ($w / $this->incrementFPR1); 
  16913.                 } elseif (($ratio / $target) > 1.2 || ($ratio / $target) < 0.85) { 
  16914.                     $use_w += ($w / $this->incrementFPR2); 
  16915.                 } elseif (($ratio / $target) > 1.1 || ($ratio / $target) < 0.91) { 
  16916.                     $use_w += ($w / $this->incrementFPR3); 
  16917.                 } else { 
  16918.                     $use_w += ($w / $this->incrementFPR4); 
  16919.                 } 
  16920.  
  16921.                 $use_h = $use_w * $target; 
  16922.                 $this->rMargin = $this->w - $use_w - $x; 
  16923.                 $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  16924.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array(); 
  16925.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots = array(); 
  16926.                 $this->HTMLheaderPageForms = array(); 
  16927.                 $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  16928.                 $this->WriteHTML($html, 4); // parameter 4 saves output to $this->headerbuffer 
  16929.                 $actual_h = $this->y - $y; 
  16930.                 $ratio = $actual_h / $use_w; 
  16931.             } 
  16932.         } 
  16933.         $shrink_f = $w / $use_w; 
  16934.  
  16935.         //================================================================ 
  16936.  
  16937.         $this->pages[$this->page] .= '___BEFORE_BORDERS___'; 
  16938.         $block_s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(); // Save to print later inside clipping path 
  16939.         $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  16940.  
  16941.         //================================================================ 
  16942.  
  16943.         if ($rotate == 90 || $rotate == -90) { // mPDF 6 
  16944.             $prerotw = $bbox_bl + $bbox_pl + $inner_w + $bbox_pr + $bbox_br; 
  16945.             $preroth = $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt + $inner_h + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb; 
  16946.             $rot_start = " q\n"; 
  16947.             if ($rotate == 90) { 
  16948.                 if ($rot_rpos !== false) { 
  16949.                     $adjw = $prerotw; 
  16950.                 } // width before rotation 
  16951.                 else { 
  16952.                     $adjw = $preroth; 
  16953.                 } // height before rotation 
  16954.                 if ($rot_bpos !== false) { 
  16955.                     $adjh = -$prerotw + $preroth; 
  16956.                 } else { 
  16957.                     $adjh = 0; 
  16958.                 } 
  16959.             } else { 
  16960.                 if ($rot_rpos !== false) { 
  16961.                     $adjw = $prerotw - $preroth; 
  16962.                 } else { 
  16963.                     $adjw = 0; 
  16964.                 } 
  16965.                 if ($rot_bpos !== false) { 
  16966.                     $adjh = $preroth; 
  16967.                 } // height before rotation 
  16968.                 else { 
  16969.                     $adjh = $prerotw; 
  16970.                 } // width before rotation 
  16971.             } 
  16972.             $rot_start .= $this->transformTranslate($adjw, $adjh, true) . "\n"; 
  16973.             $rot_start .= $this->transformRotate($rotate, $bbox_x, $bbox_y, true) . "\n"; 
  16974.             $rot_end = " Q\n"; 
  16975.         } elseif ($rotate == 180) { // mPDF 6 
  16976.             $rot_start = " q\n"; 
  16977.             $rot_start .= $this->transformTranslate($bbox_bl + $bbox_pl + $inner_w + $bbox_pr + $bbox_br, $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt + $inner_h + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb, true) . "\n"; 
  16978.             $rot_start .= $this->transformRotate(180, $bbox_x, $bbox_y, true) . "\n"; 
  16979.             $rot_end = " Q\n"; 
  16980.         } else { 
  16981.             $rot_start = ''; 
  16982.             $rot_end = ''; 
  16983.         } 
  16984.  
  16985.         //================================================================ 
  16986.         if (!empty($bounding)) { 
  16987.             // WHEN HEIGHT // BOTTOM EDGE IS KNOWN and $this->y is set to the bottom 
  16988.             // Re-instate saved $this->blk[1] 
  16989.             $this->blk[1] = $saved_block1; 
  16990.  
  16991.             // These are only needed when painting border/background 
  16992.             $this->blk[1]['width'] = $bbox_w = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_mr - $bbox_right; 
  16993.             $this->blk[1]['x0'] = $bbox_x; 
  16994.             $this->blk[1]['y0'] = $bbox_y; 
  16995.             $this->blk[1]['startpage'] = $this->page; 
  16996.             $this->blk[1]['y1'] = $bbox_y + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt + $inner_h + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb; 
  16997.             $this->_out($rot_start); 
  16998.             $this->PaintDivBB('', 0, 1); // Prints borders and sets backgrounds in $this->pageBackgrounds 
  16999.             $this->_out($rot_end); 
  17000.         } 
  17001.  
  17002.         $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(); 
  17003.         $s = $rot_start . $s . $rot_end; 
  17004.         $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/___BEFORE_BORDERS___/', "\n" . $s . "\n", $this->pages[$this->page]); 
  17005.         $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  17006.  
  17007.         $this->_out($rot_start); 
  17008.  
  17009.         // Clipping Output 
  17010.         if ($overflow == 'hidden') { 
  17011.             //Bounding rectangle to clip 
  17012.             $clip_y1 = $this->y; 
  17013.             if (!empty($bounding) && ($this->y + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb) > ($bbox_y + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt + $inner_h + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb )) { 
  17014.                 $clip_y1 = ($bbox_y + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt + $inner_h + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb ) - ($bbox_pb + $bbox_bb); 
  17015.             } 
  17016.             //$op = 'W* n';    // Clipping 
  17017.             $op = 'W n'; // Clipping alternative mode 
  17018.             $this->_out("q"); 
  17019.             $ch = $clip_y1 - $y; 
  17020.             $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re %s', $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK, $w * _MPDFK, -$ch * _MPDFK, $op)); 
  17021.             if (!empty($block_s)) { 
  17022.                 $tmp = "q\n" . sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re %s', $x * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK, $w * _MPDFK, -$ch * _MPDFK, $op); 
  17023.                 $tmp .= "\n" . $block_s . "\nQ"; 
  17024.                 $block_s = $tmp; 
  17025.             } 
  17026.         } 
  17027.  
  17028.  
  17029.         if (!empty($block_s)) { 
  17030.             if ($shrink_f != 1) { // i.e. autofit has resized the box 
  17031.                 $tmp = "q\n" . $this->transformScale(($shrink_f * 100), ($shrink_f * 100), $x, $y, true); 
  17032.                 $tmp .= "\n" . $block_s . "\nQ"; 
  17033.                 $block_s = $tmp; 
  17034.             } 
  17035.             $this->_out($block_s); 
  17036.         } 
  17037.  
  17038.  
  17039.  
  17040.         if ($shrink_f != 1) { // i.e. autofit has resized the box 
  17041.             $this->StartTransform(); 
  17042.             $this->transformScale(($shrink_f * 100), ($shrink_f * 100), $x, $y); 
  17043.         } 
  17044.  
  17045.         $this->_out($this->headerbuffer); 
  17046.  
  17047.         if ($shrink_f != 1) { // i.e. autofit has resized the box 
  17048.             $this->StopTransform(); 
  17049.         } 
  17050.  
  17051.         if ($overflow == 'hidden') { 
  17052.             //End clipping 
  17053.             $this->_out("Q"); 
  17054.         } 
  17055.  
  17056.         $this->_out($rot_end); 
  17057.  
  17058.  
  17059.         // Page Links 
  17060.         foreach ($this->HTMLheaderPageLinks AS $lk) { 
  17061.             if ($rotate) { 
  17062.                 $tmp = $lk[2]; // Switch h - w 
  17063.                 $lk[2] = $lk[3]; 
  17064.                 $lk[3] = $tmp; 
  17065.  
  17066.                 $lx1 = (($lk[0] / _MPDFK)); 
  17067.                 $ly1 = (($this->h - ($lk[1] / _MPDFK))); 
  17068.                 if ($rotate == 90) { 
  17069.                     $adjx = -($lx1 - $bbox_x) + ($preroth - ($ly1 - $bbox_y)); 
  17070.                     $adjy = -($ly1 - $bbox_y) + ($lx1 - $bbox_x); 
  17071.                     $lk[2] = -$lk[2]; 
  17072.                 } elseif ($rotate == -90) { 
  17073.                     $adjx = -($lx1 - $bbox_x) + ($ly1 - $bbox_y); 
  17074.                     $adjy = -($ly1 - $bbox_y) - ($lx1 - $bbox_x) + $prerotw; 
  17075.                     $lk[3] = -$lk[3]; 
  17076.                 } 
  17077.                 if ($rot_rpos !== false) { 
  17078.                     $adjx += $prerotw - $preroth; 
  17079.                 } 
  17080.                 if ($rot_bpos !== false) { 
  17081.                     $adjy += $preroth - $prerotw; 
  17082.                 } 
  17083.                 $lx1 += $adjx; 
  17084.                 $ly1 += $adjy; 
  17085.  
  17086.                 $lk[0] = $lx1 * _MPDFK; 
  17087.                 $lk[1] = ($this->h - $ly1) * _MPDFK; 
  17088.             } 
  17089.             if ($shrink_f != 1) {  // i.e. autofit has resized the box 
  17090.                 $lx1 = (($lk[0] / _MPDFK) - $x); 
  17091.                 $lx2 = $x + ($lx1 * $shrink_f); 
  17092.                 $lk[0] = $lx2 * _MPDFK; 
  17093.                 $ly1 = (($this->h - ($lk[1] / _MPDFK)) - $y); 
  17094.                 $ly2 = $y + ($ly1 * $shrink_f); 
  17095.                 $lk[1] = ($this->h - $ly2) * _MPDFK; 
  17096.                 $lk[2] *= $shrink_f; // width 
  17097.                 $lk[3] *= $shrink_f; // height 
  17098.             } 
  17099.             $this->PageLinks[$this->page][] = $lk; 
  17100.         } 
  17101.  
  17102.         foreach ($this->HTMLheaderPageForms AS $n => $f) { 
  17103.             if ($shrink_f != 1) {  // i.e. autofit has resized the box 
  17104.                 $f['x'] = $x + (($f['x'] - $x) * $shrink_f); 
  17105.                 $f['y'] = $y + (($f['y'] - $y) * $shrink_f); 
  17106.                 $f['w'] *= $shrink_f; 
  17107.                 $f['h'] *= $shrink_f; 
  17108.                 $f['style']['fontsize'] *= $shrink_f; 
  17109.             } 
  17110.             $this->mpdfform->forms[$f['n']] = $f; 
  17111.         } 
  17112.         // Page Annotations 
  17113.         foreach ($this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots AS $lk) { 
  17114.             if ($rotate) { 
  17115.                 if ($rotate == 90) { 
  17116.                     $adjx = -($lk['x'] - $bbox_x) + ($preroth - ($lk['y'] - $bbox_y)); 
  17117.                     $adjy = -($lk['y'] - $bbox_y) + ($lk['x'] - $bbox_x); 
  17118.                 } elseif ($rotate == -90) { 
  17119.                     $adjx = -($lk['x'] - $bbox_x) + ($lk['y'] - $bbox_y); 
  17120.                     $adjy = -($lk['y'] - $bbox_y) - ($lk['x'] - $bbox_x) + $prerotw; 
  17121.                 } 
  17122.                 if ($rot_rpos !== false) { 
  17123.                     $adjx += $prerotw - $preroth; 
  17124.                 } 
  17125.                 if ($rot_bpos !== false) { 
  17126.                     $adjy += $preroth - $prerotw; 
  17127.                 } 
  17128.                 $lk['x'] += $adjx; 
  17129.                 $lk['y'] += $adjy; 
  17130.             } 
  17131.             if ($shrink_f != 1) {  // i.e. autofit has resized the box 
  17132.                 $lk['x'] = $x + (($lk['x'] - $x) * $shrink_f); 
  17133.                 $lk['y'] = $y + (($lk['y'] - $y) * $shrink_f); 
  17134.             } 
  17135.             $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][] = $lk; 
  17136.         } 
  17137.  
  17138.         // Restore 
  17139.         $this->headerbuffer = ''; 
  17140.         $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array(); 
  17141.         $this->HTMLheaderPageAnnots = array(); 
  17142.         $this->HTMLheaderPageForms = array(); 
  17143.         $this->pageBackgrounds = $save_bgs; 
  17144.         $this->writingHTMLheader = false; 
  17145.  
  17146.         $this->writingHTMLfooter = false; 
  17147.         $this->fullImageHeight = false; 
  17148.         $this->ResetMargins(); 
  17149.         $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  17150.         $this->SetXY($save_x, $save_y); 
  17151.         $this->title2annots = $save_annots; // *ANNOTATIONS* 
  17152.         $this->InFooter = false; // turns back on autopagebreaks 
  17153.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  17154.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] = ''; 
  17155.         /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  17156.         if ($save_cols) { 
  17157.             $this->SetColumns($save_nbcol, $this->colvAlign, $this->ColGap); 
  17158.         } 
  17159.         /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  17160.     } 
  17161.  
  17162.     /** -- END CSS-POSITION -- */ 
  17163.  
  17164.     function initialiseBlock(&$blk) 
  17165.     { 
  17166.         $blk['margin_top'] = 0; 
  17167.         $blk['margin_left'] = 0; 
  17168.         $blk['margin_bottom'] = 0; 
  17169.         $blk['margin_right'] = 0; 
  17170.         $blk['padding_top'] = 0; 
  17171.         $blk['padding_left'] = 0; 
  17172.         $blk['padding_bottom'] = 0; 
  17173.         $blk['padding_right'] = 0; 
  17174.         $blk['border_top']['w'] = 0; 
  17175.         $blk['border_left']['w'] = 0; 
  17176.         $blk['border_bottom']['w'] = 0; 
  17177.         $blk['border_right']['w'] = 0; 
  17178.         $blk['direction'] = 'ltr'; 
  17179.         $blk['hide'] = false; 
  17180.         $blk['outer_left_margin'] = 0; 
  17181.         $blk['outer_right_margin'] = 0; 
  17182.         $blk['cascadeCSS'] = array(); 
  17183.         $blk['block-align'] = false; 
  17184.         $blk['bgcolor'] = false; 
  17185.         $blk['page_break_after_avoid'] = false; 
  17186.         $blk['keep_block_together'] = false; 
  17187.         $blk['float'] = false; 
  17188.         $blk['line_height'] = ''; 
  17189.         $blk['margin_collapse'] = false; 
  17190.     } 
  17191.  
  17192.     function border_details($bd) 
  17193.     { 
  17194.         $prop = preg_split('/\s+/', trim($bd)); 
  17195.  
  17196.         if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'])) { 
  17197.             $refw = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; 
  17198.         } elseif (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl - 1]['inner_width'])) { 
  17199.             $refw = $this->blk[$this->blklvl - 1]['inner_width']; 
  17200.         } else { 
  17201.             $refw = $this->w; 
  17202.         } 
  17203.         if (count($prop) == 1) { 
  17204.             $bsize = $this->ConvertSize($prop[0], $refw, $this->FontSize, false); 
  17205.             if ($bsize > 0) { 
  17206.                 return array('s' => 1, 'w' => $bsize, 'c' => $this->ConvertColor(0), 'style' => 'solid'); 
  17207.             } else { 
  17208.                 return array('w' => 0, 's' => 0); 
  17209.             } 
  17210.         } elseif (count($prop) == 2) { 
  17211.             // 1px solid 
  17212.             if (in_array($prop[1], $this->borderstyles) || $prop[1] == 'none' || $prop[1] == 'hidden') { 
  17213.                 $prop[2] = ''; 
  17214.             } 
  17215.             // solid #000000 
  17216.             elseif (in_array($prop[0], $this->borderstyles) || $prop[0] == 'none' || $prop[0] == 'hidden') { 
  17217.                 $prop[0] = ''; 
  17218.                 $prop[1] = $prop[0]; 
  17219.                 $prop[2] = $prop[1]; 
  17220.             } 
  17221.             // 1px #000000 
  17222.             else { 
  17223.                 $prop[1] = ''; 
  17224.                 $prop[2] = $prop[1]; 
  17225.             } 
  17226.         } elseif (count($prop) == 3) { 
  17227.             // Change #000000 1px solid to 1px solid #000000 (proper) 
  17228.             if (substr($prop[0], 0, 1) == '#') { 
  17229.                 $tmp = $prop[0]; 
  17230.                 $prop[0] = $prop[1]; 
  17231.                 $prop[1] = $prop[2]; 
  17232.                 $prop[2] = $tmp; 
  17233.             } 
  17234.             // Change solid #000000 1px to 1px solid #000000 (proper) 
  17235.             elseif (substr($prop[0], 1, 1) == '#') { 
  17236.                 $tmp = $prop[1]; 
  17237.                 $prop[0] = $prop[2]; 
  17238.                 $prop[1] = $prop[0]; 
  17239.                 $prop[2] = $tmp; 
  17240.             } 
  17241.             // Change solid 1px #000000 to 1px solid #000000 (proper) 
  17242.             elseif (in_array($prop[0], $this->borderstyles) || $prop[0] == 'none' || $prop[0] == 'hidden') { 
  17243.                 $tmp = $prop[0]; 
  17244.                 $prop[0] = $prop[1]; 
  17245.                 $prop[1] = $tmp; 
  17246.             } 
  17247.         } else { 
  17248.             return array(); 
  17249.         } 
  17250.         // Size 
  17251.         $bsize = $this->ConvertSize($prop[0], $refw, $this->FontSize, false); 
  17252.         //color 
  17253.         $coul = $this->ConvertColor($prop[2]); // returns array 
  17254.         // Style 
  17255.         $prop[1] = strtolower($prop[1]); 
  17256.         if (in_array($prop[1], $this->borderstyles) && $bsize > 0) { 
  17257.             $on = 1; 
  17258.         } elseif ($prop[1] == 'hidden') { 
  17259.             $on = 1; 
  17260.             $bsize = 0; 
  17261.             $coul = ''; 
  17262.         } elseif ($prop[1] == 'none') { 
  17263.             $on = 0; 
  17264.             $bsize = 0; 
  17265.             $coul = ''; 
  17266.         } else { 
  17267.             $on = 0; 
  17268.             $bsize = 0; 
  17269.             $coul = ''; 
  17270.             $prop[1] = ''; 
  17271.         } 
  17272.         return array('s' => $on, 'w' => $bsize, 'c' => $coul, 'style' => $prop[1]); 
  17273.     } 
  17274.  
  17275.     /** -- END HTML-CSS -- */ 
  17276.  
  17277.  
  17278.     /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  17279.  
  17280.     function _borderPadding($a, $b, &$px, &$py) 
  17281.     { 
  17282.         // $px and py are padding long axis (x) and short axis (y) 
  17283.         $added = 0; // extra padding 
  17284.  
  17285.         $x = $a - $px; 
  17286.         $y = $b - $py; 
  17287.         // Check if Falls within ellipse of border radius 
  17288.         if (( (($x + $added) * ($x + $added)) / ($a * $a) + (($y + $added) * ($y + $added)) / ($b * $b) ) <= 1) { 
  17289.             return false; 
  17290.         } 
  17291.  
  17292.         $t = atan2($y, $x); 
  17293.  
  17294.         $newx = $b / sqrt((($b * $b) / ($a * $a)) + ( tan($t) * tan($t) )); 
  17295.         $newy = $a / sqrt((($a * $a) / ($b * $b)) + ( (1 / tan($t)) * (1 / tan($t)) )); 
  17296.         $px = max($px, $a - $newx + $added); 
  17297.         $py = max($py, $b - $newy + $added); 
  17298.     } 
  17299.  
  17300.     /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  17301.  
  17302.  
  17303.  
  17304.     /** -- HTML-CSS -- */ 
  17305.  
  17306.  
  17307.     /** -- CSS-PAGE -- */ 
  17308.  
  17309.     function SetPagedMediaCSS($name = '', $first, $oddEven) 
  17310.     { 
  17311.         if ($oddEven == 'E') { 
  17312.             if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
  17313.                 $side = 'R'; 
  17314.             } else { 
  17315.                 $side = 'L'; 
  17316.             } 
  17317.         } else { 
  17318.             if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
  17319.                 $side = 'L'; 
  17320.             } else { 
  17321.                 $side = 'R'; 
  17322.             } 
  17323.         } 
  17324.         $name = strtoupper($name); 
  17325.         $p = array(); 
  17326.         $p['SIZE'] = 'AUTO'; 
  17327.  
  17328.         // Uses mPDF original margins as default 
  17329.         $p['MARGIN-RIGHT'] = strval($this->orig_rMargin) . 'mm'; 
  17330.         $p['MARGIN-LEFT'] = strval($this->orig_lMargin) . 'mm'; 
  17331.         $p['MARGIN-TOP'] = strval($this->orig_tMargin) . 'mm'; 
  17332.         $p['MARGIN-BOTTOM'] = strval($this->orig_bMargin) . 'mm'; 
  17333.         $p['MARGIN-HEADER'] = strval($this->orig_hMargin) . 'mm'; 
  17334.         $p['MARGIN-FOOTER'] = strval($this->orig_fMargin) . 'mm'; 
  17335.  
  17336.         // Basic page + selector 
  17337.         if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE'])) { 
  17338.             $zp = $this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE']; 
  17339.         } else { 
  17340.             $zp = array(); 
  17341.         } 
  17342.         if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { 
  17343.             $p = array_merge($p, $zp); 
  17344.         } 
  17345.  
  17346.         if (isset($p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']) && $oddEven == 'E') { 
  17347.             $p['HEADER'] = $p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']; 
  17348.             unset($p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']); 
  17349.         } 
  17350.         if (isset($p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']) && $oddEven != 'E') { 
  17351.             $p['HEADER'] = $p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']; 
  17352.             unset($p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']); 
  17353.         } 
  17354.         if (isset($p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']) && $oddEven == 'E') { 
  17355.             $p['FOOTER'] = $p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']; 
  17356.             unset($p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']); 
  17357.         } 
  17358.         if (isset($p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']) && $oddEven != 'E') { 
  17359.             $p['FOOTER'] = $p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']; 
  17360.             unset($p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']); 
  17361.         } 
  17362.  
  17363.         // If right/Odd page 
  17364.         if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>RIGHT']) && $side == 'R') { 
  17365.             $zp = $this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>RIGHT']; 
  17366.         } else { 
  17367.             $zp = array(); 
  17368.         } 
  17369.         if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { 
  17370.             unset($zp['SIZE']); 
  17371.         } 
  17372.         if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { 
  17373.             unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); 
  17374.         } 
  17375.         // Disallow margin-left or -right on :LEFT or :RIGHT 
  17376.         if (isset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { 
  17377.             unset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT']); 
  17378.         } 
  17379.         if (isset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { 
  17380.             unset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT']); 
  17381.         } 
  17382.         if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { 
  17383.             $p = array_merge($p, $zp); 
  17384.         } 
  17385.  
  17386.         // If left/Even page 
  17387.         if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>LEFT']) && $side == 'L') { 
  17388.             $zp = $this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>LEFT']; 
  17389.         } else { 
  17390.             $zp = array(); 
  17391.         } 
  17392.         if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { 
  17393.             unset($zp['SIZE']); 
  17394.         } 
  17395.         if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { 
  17396.             unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); 
  17397.         } 
  17398.         // Disallow margin-left or -right on :LEFT or :RIGHT 
  17399.         if (isset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { 
  17400.             unset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT']); 
  17401.         } 
  17402.         if (isset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { 
  17403.             unset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT']); 
  17404.         } 
  17405.         if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { 
  17406.             $p = array_merge($p, $zp); 
  17407.         } 
  17408.  
  17409.         // If first page 
  17410.         if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>FIRST']) && $first) { 
  17411.             $zp = $this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>FIRST']; 
  17412.         } else { 
  17413.             $zp = array(); 
  17414.         } 
  17415.         if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { 
  17416.             unset($zp['SIZE']); 
  17417.         } 
  17418.         if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { 
  17419.             unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); 
  17420.         } 
  17421.         // Disallow margin-left or -right on :FIRST    // mPDF 5.7.3 
  17422.         if (isset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { 
  17423.             unset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT']); 
  17424.         } 
  17425.         if (isset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { 
  17426.             unset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT']); 
  17427.         } 
  17428.         if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { 
  17429.             $p = array_merge($p, $zp); 
  17430.         } 
  17431.  
  17432.         // If named page 
  17433.         if ($name) { 
  17434.             if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>' . $name])) { 
  17435.                 $zp = $this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>' . $name]; 
  17436.             } else { 
  17437.                 $zp = array(); 
  17438.             } 
  17439.             if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { 
  17440.                 $p = array_merge($p, $zp); 
  17441.             } 
  17442.  
  17443.             if (isset($p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']) && $oddEven == 'E') { 
  17444.                 $p['HEADER'] = $p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']; 
  17445.                 unset($p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']); 
  17446.             } 
  17447.             if (isset($p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']) && $oddEven != 'E') { 
  17448.                 $p['HEADER'] = $p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']; 
  17449.                 unset($p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']); 
  17450.             } 
  17451.             if (isset($p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']) && $oddEven == 'E') { 
  17452.                 $p['FOOTER'] = $p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']; 
  17453.                 unset($p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']); 
  17454.             } 
  17455.             if (isset($p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']) && $oddEven != 'E') { 
  17456.                 $p['FOOTER'] = $p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']; 
  17457.                 unset($p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']); 
  17458.             } 
  17459.  
  17460.             // If named right/Odd page 
  17461.             if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>' . $name . '>>PSEUDO>>RIGHT']) && $side == 'R') { 
  17462.                 $zp = $this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>' . $name . '>>PSEUDO>>RIGHT']; 
  17463.             } else { 
  17464.                 $zp = array(); 
  17465.             } 
  17466.             if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { 
  17467.                 unset($zp['SIZE']); 
  17468.             } 
  17469.             if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { 
  17470.                 unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); 
  17471.             } 
  17472.             // Disallow margin-left or -right on :LEFT or :RIGHT 
  17473.             if (isset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { 
  17474.                 unset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT']); 
  17475.             } 
  17476.             if (isset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { 
  17477.                 unset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT']); 
  17478.             } 
  17479.             if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { 
  17480.                 $p = array_merge($p, $zp); 
  17481.             } 
  17482.  
  17483.             // If named left/Even page 
  17484.             if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>' . $name . '>>PSEUDO>>LEFT']) && $side == 'L') { 
  17485.                 $zp = $this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>' . $name . '>>PSEUDO>>LEFT']; 
  17486.             } else { 
  17487.                 $zp = array(); 
  17488.             } 
  17489.             if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { 
  17490.                 unset($zp['SIZE']); 
  17491.             } 
  17492.             if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { 
  17493.                 unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); 
  17494.             } 
  17495.             // Disallow margin-left or -right on :LEFT or :RIGHT 
  17496.             if (isset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { 
  17497.                 unset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT']); 
  17498.             } 
  17499.             if (isset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { 
  17500.                 unset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT']); 
  17501.             } 
  17502.             if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { 
  17503.                 $p = array_merge($p, $zp); 
  17504.             } 
  17505.  
  17506.             // If named first page 
  17507.             if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>' . $name . '>>PSEUDO>>FIRST']) && $first) { 
  17508.                 $zp = $this->cssmgr->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>' . $name . '>>PSEUDO>>FIRST']; 
  17509.             } else { 
  17510.                 $zp = array(); 
  17511.             } 
  17512.             if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { 
  17513.                 unset($zp['SIZE']); 
  17514.             } 
  17515.             if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { 
  17516.                 unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); 
  17517.             } 
  17518.             // Disallow margin-left or -right on :FIRST    // mPDF 5.7.3 
  17519.             if (isset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { 
  17520.                 unset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT']); 
  17521.             } 
  17522.             if (isset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { 
  17523.                 unset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT']); 
  17524.             } 
  17525.             if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { 
  17526.                 $p = array_merge($p, $zp); 
  17527.             } 
  17528.         } 
  17529.  
  17530.         $orientation = $mgl = $mgr = $mgt = $mgb = $mgh = $mgf = ''; 
  17531.         $header = $footer = ''; 
  17532.         $resetpagenum = $pagenumstyle = $suppress = ''; 
  17533.         $marks = ''; 
  17534.         $bg = array(); 
  17535.  
  17536.         $newformat = ''; 
  17537.  
  17538.  
  17539.         if (isset($p['SHEET-SIZE']) && is_array($p['SHEET-SIZE'])) { 
  17540.             $newformat = $p['SHEET-SIZE']; 
  17541.             if ($newformat[0] > $newformat[1]) { // landscape 
  17542.                 $newformat = array_reverse($newformat); 
  17543.                 $p['ORIENTATION'] = 'L'; 
  17544.             } else { 
  17545.                 $p['ORIENTATION'] = 'P'; 
  17546.             } 
  17547.             $this->_setPageSize($newformat, $p['ORIENTATION']); 
  17548.         } 
  17549.  
  17550.         if (isset($p['SIZE']) && is_array($p['SIZE']) && !$newformat) { 
  17551.             if ($p['SIZE']['W'] > $p['SIZE']['H']) { 
  17552.                 $p['ORIENTATION'] = 'L'; 
  17553.             } else { 
  17554.                 $p['ORIENTATION'] = 'P'; 
  17555.             } 
  17556.         } 
  17557.         if (is_array($p['SIZE'])) { 
  17558.             if ($p['SIZE']['W'] > $this->fw) { 
  17559.                 $p['SIZE']['W'] = $this->fw; 
  17560.             } // mPD 4.2 use fw not fPt 
  17561.             if ($p['SIZE']['H'] > $this->fh) { 
  17562.                 $p['SIZE']['H'] = $this->fh; 
  17563.             } 
  17564.             if (($p['ORIENTATION'] == $this->DefOrientation && !$newformat) || ($newformat && $p['ORIENTATION'] == 'P')) { 
  17565.                 $outer_width_LR = ($this->fw - $p['SIZE']['W']) / 2; 
  17566.                 $outer_width_TB = ($this->fh - $p['SIZE']['H']) / 2; 
  17567.             } else { 
  17568.                 $outer_width_LR = ($this->fh - $p['SIZE']['W']) / 2; 
  17569.                 $outer_width_TB = ($this->fw - $p['SIZE']['H']) / 2; 
  17570.             } 
  17571.             $pgw = $p['SIZE']['W']; 
  17572.             $pgh = $p['SIZE']['H']; 
  17573.         } else { // AUTO LANDSCAPE PORTRAIT 
  17574.             $outer_width_LR = 0; 
  17575.             $outer_width_TB = 0; 
  17576.             if (!$newformat) { 
  17577.                 if (strtoupper($p['SIZE']) == 'AUTO') { 
  17578.                     $p['ORIENTATION'] = $this->DefOrientation; 
  17579.                 } elseif (strtoupper($p['SIZE']) == 'LANDSCAPE') { 
  17580.                     $p['ORIENTATION'] = 'L'; 
  17581.                 } else { 
  17582.                     $p['ORIENTATION'] = 'P'; 
  17583.                 } 
  17584.             } 
  17585.             if (($p['ORIENTATION'] == $this->DefOrientation && !$newformat) || ($newformat && $p['ORIENTATION'] == 'P')) { 
  17586.                 $pgw = $this->fw; 
  17587.                 $pgh = $this->fh; 
  17588.             } else { 
  17589.                 $pgw = $this->fh; 
  17590.                 $pgh = $this->fw; 
  17591.             } 
  17592.         } 
  17593.  
  17594.         if (isset($p['HEADER']) && $p['HEADER']) { 
  17595.             $header = $p['HEADER']; 
  17596.         } 
  17597.         if (isset($p['FOOTER']) && $p['FOOTER']) { 
  17598.             $footer = $p['FOOTER']; 
  17599.         } 
  17600.         if (isset($p['RESETPAGENUM']) && $p['RESETPAGENUM']) { 
  17601.             $resetpagenum = $p['RESETPAGENUM']; 
  17602.         } 
  17603.         if (isset($p['PAGENUMSTYLE']) && $p['PAGENUMSTYLE']) { 
  17604.             $pagenumstyle = $p['PAGENUMSTYLE']; 
  17605.         } 
  17606.         if (isset($p['SUPPRESS']) && $p['SUPPRESS']) { 
  17607.             $suppress = $p['SUPPRESS']; 
  17608.         } 
  17609.  
  17610.         if (isset($p['MARKS'])) { 
  17611.             if (preg_match('/cross/i', $p['MARKS']) && preg_match('/crop/i', $p['MARKS'])) { 
  17612.                 $marks = 'CROPCROSS'; 
  17613.             } elseif (strtoupper($p['MARKS']) == 'CROP') { 
  17614.                 $marks = 'CROP'; 
  17615.             } elseif (strtoupper($p['MARKS']) == 'CROSS') { 
  17616.                 $marks = 'CROSS'; 
  17617.             } 
  17618.         } 
  17619.  
  17620.         if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-COLOR']) && $p['BACKGROUND-COLOR']) { 
  17621.             $bg['BACKGROUND-COLOR'] = $p['BACKGROUND-COLOR']; 
  17622.         } 
  17623.         /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  17624.         if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']) && $p['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']) { 
  17625.             $bg['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'] = $p['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']; 
  17626.         } 
  17627.         if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) && $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) { 
  17628.             $bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'] = $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']; 
  17629.         } 
  17630.         if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']) && $p['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']) { 
  17631.             $bg['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'] = $p['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']; 
  17632.         } 
  17633.         if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-POSITION']) && $p['BACKGROUND-POSITION']) { 
  17634.             $bg['BACKGROUND-POSITION'] = $p['BACKGROUND-POSITION']; 
  17635.         } 
  17636.         if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']) && $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']) { 
  17637.             $bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'] = $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']; 
  17638.         } 
  17639.         if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'])) { 
  17640.             $bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'] = $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY']; 
  17641.         } 
  17642.         /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  17643.  
  17644.         if (isset($p['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { 
  17645.             $mgl = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-LEFT'], $pgw) + $outer_width_LR; 
  17646.         } 
  17647.         if (isset($p['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { 
  17648.             $mgr = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-RIGHT'], $pgw) + $outer_width_LR; 
  17649.         } 
  17650.         if (isset($p['MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { 
  17651.             $mgb = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-BOTTOM'], $pgh) + $outer_width_TB; 
  17652.         } 
  17653.         if (isset($p['MARGIN-TOP'])) { 
  17654.             $mgt = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-TOP'], $pgh) + $outer_width_TB; 
  17655.         } 
  17656.         if (isset($p['MARGIN-HEADER'])) { 
  17657.             $mgh = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-HEADER'], $pgh) + $outer_width_TB; 
  17658.         } 
  17659.         if (isset($p['MARGIN-FOOTER'])) { 
  17660.             $mgf = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-FOOTER'], $pgh) + $outer_width_TB; 
  17661.         } 
  17662.  
  17663.         if (isset($p['ORIENTATION']) && $p['ORIENTATION']) { 
  17664.             $orientation = $p['ORIENTATION']; 
  17665.         } 
  17666.         $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] = $outer_width_LR; // Used in MARKS:crop etc. 
  17667.         $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] = $outer_width_TB; 
  17668.  
  17669.         return array($orientation, $mgl, $mgr, $mgt, $mgb, $mgh, $mgf, $header, $footer, $bg, $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress, $marks, $newformat); 
  17670.     } 
  17671.  
  17672.     /** -- END CSS-PAGE -- */ 
  17673.  
  17674.  
  17675.  
  17676.     /** -- CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  17677.  
  17678.     // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV - CLEAR 
  17679.     function ClearFloats($clear, $blklvl = 0) 
  17680.     { 
  17681.         list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($blklvl, true); 
  17682.         $end = $currpos = ($this->page * 1000 + $this->y); 
  17683.         if ($clear == 'BOTH' && ($l_exists || $r_exists)) { 
  17684.             $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  17685.             $end = max($l_max, $r_max, $currpos); 
  17686.         } elseif ($clear == 'RIGHT' && $r_exists) { 
  17687.             $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  17688.             $end = max($r_max, $currpos); 
  17689.         } elseif ($clear == 'LEFT' && $l_exists) {
