  17690.             $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  17691.             $end = max($l_max, $currpos); 
  17692.         } else { 
  17693.             return; 
  17694.         } 
  17695.         $old_page = $this->page; 
  17696.         $new_page = intval($end / 1000); 
  17697.         if ($old_page != $new_page) { 
  17698.             $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(); 
  17699.             // Writes after the marker so not overwritten later by page background etc. 
  17700.             $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', '\\1' . "\n" . $s . "\n", $this->pages[$this->page]); 
  17701.             $this->pageBackgrounds = array(); 
  17702.             $this->page = $new_page; 
  17703.         } 
  17704.         $this->ResetMargins(); 
  17705.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); 
  17706.         $this->y = (($end * 1000) % 1000000) / 1000; // mod changes operands to integers before processing 
  17707.     } 
  17708.  
  17709.     // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV 
  17710.     function GetFloatDivInfo($blklvl = 0, $clear = false) 
  17711.     { 
  17712.         // If blklvl specified, only returns floats at that level - for ClearFloats 
  17713.         $l_exists = false; 
  17714.         $r_exists = false; 
  17715.         $l_max = 0; 
  17716.         $r_max = 0; 
  17717.         $l_width = 0; 
  17718.         $r_width = 0; 
  17719.         if (count($this->floatDivs)) { 
  17720.             $currpos = ($this->page * 1000 + $this->y); 
  17721.             foreach ($this->floatDivs AS $f) { 
  17722.                 if (($clear && $f['blockContext'] == $this->blk[$blklvl]['blockContext']) || (!$clear && $currpos >= $f['startpos'] && $currpos < ($f['endpos'] - 0.001) && $f['blklvl'] > $blklvl && $f['blockContext'] == $this->blk[$blklvl]['blockContext'])) { 
  17723.                     if ($f['side'] == 'L') { 
  17724.                         $l_exists = true; 
  17725.                         $l_max = max($l_max, $f['endpos']); 
  17726.                         $l_width = max($l_width, $f['w']); 
  17727.                     } 
  17728.                     if ($f['side'] == 'R') { 
  17729.                         $r_exists = true; 
  17730.                         $r_max = max($r_max, $f['endpos']); 
  17731.                         $r_width = max($r_width, $f['w']); 
  17732.                     } 
  17733.                 } 
  17734.             } 
  17735.         } 
  17736.         return array($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width); 
  17737.     } 
  17738.  
  17739.     /** -- END CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  17740.  
  17741.     // LIST MARKERS    // mPDF 6  Lists 
  17742.     function _setListMarker($listitemtype, $listitemimage, $listitemposition) 
  17743.     { 
  17744.         // if position:inside (and NOT table) - output now as a textbuffer; (so if next is block, will move to new line) 
  17745.         // elseif position:outside (and NOT table) - output in front of first textbuffer output by setting listitem (cf. _saveTextBuffer) 
  17746.         $e = ''; 
  17747.         $this->listitem = ''; 
  17748.         $spacer = ' '; 
  17749.         // IMAGE 
  17750.         if ($listitemimage && $listitemimage != 'none') { 
  17751.             $listitemimage = trim(preg_replace('/url\(["\']*(.*?)["\']*\)/', '\\1', $listitemimage)); 
  17752.  
  17753.             // ? Restrict maximum height/width of list marker?? 
  17754.             $maxWidth = 100; 
  17755.             $maxHeight = 100; 
  17756.  
  17757.             $objattr = array(); 
  17758.             $objattr['margin_top'] = 0; 
  17759.             $objattr['margin_bottom'] = 0; 
  17760.             $objattr['margin_left'] = 0; 
  17761.             $objattr['margin_right'] = 0; 
  17762.             $objattr['padding_top'] = 0; 
  17763.             $objattr['padding_bottom'] = 0; 
  17764.             $objattr['padding_left'] = 0; 
  17765.             $objattr['padding_right'] = 0; 
  17766.             $objattr['width'] = 0; 
  17767.             $objattr['height'] = 0; 
  17768.             $objattr['border_top']['w'] = 0; 
  17769.             $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] = 0; 
  17770.             $objattr['border_left']['w'] = 0; 
  17771.             $objattr['border_right']['w'] = 0; 
  17772.             $objattr['visibility'] = 'visible'; 
  17773.             $srcpath = $listitemimage; 
  17774.             $orig_srcpath = $listitemimage; 
  17775.  
  17776.             $objattr['vertical-align'] = 'BS'; // vertical alignment of marker (baseline) 
  17777.             $w = 0; 
  17778.             $h = 0; 
  17779.  
  17780.             // Image file 
  17781.             $info = $this->_getImage($srcpath, true, true, $orig_srcpath); 
  17782.             if (!$info) 
  17783.                 return; 
  17784.             if ($info['w'] == 0 && $info['h'] == 0) { 
  17785.                 $info['h'] = $this->ConvertSize('1em', $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  17786.             } 
  17787.             $objattr['file'] = $srcpath; 
  17788.             //Default width and height calculation if needed 
  17789.             if ($w == 0 and $h == 0) { 
  17790.                 /** -- IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  17791.                 if ($info['type'] == 'wmf') { 
  17792.                     // WMF units are twips (1/20pt) 
  17793.                     // divide by 20 to get points 
  17794.                     // divide by k to get user units 
  17795.                     $w = abs($info['w']) / (20 * _MPDFK); 
  17796.                     $h = abs($info['h']) / (20 * _MPDFK); 
  17797.                 } else 
  17798.                 /** -- END IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  17799.                 if ($info['type'] == 'svg') { 
  17800.                     // SVG units are pixels 
  17801.                     $w = abs($info['w']) / _MPDFK; 
  17802.                     $h = abs($info['h']) / _MPDFK; 
  17803.                 } else { 
  17804.                     //Put image at default image dpi 
  17805.                     $w = ($info['w'] / _MPDFK) * (72 / $this->img_dpi); 
  17806.                     $h = ($info['h'] / _MPDFK) * (72 / $this->img_dpi); 
  17807.                 } 
  17808.             } 
  17809.             // IF WIDTH OR HEIGHT SPECIFIED 
  17810.             if ($w == 0) 
  17811.                 $w = abs($h * $info['w'] / $info['h']); 
  17812.             if ($h == 0) 
  17813.                 $h = abs($w * $info['h'] / $info['w']); 
  17814.  
  17815.             if ($w > $maxWidth) { 
  17816.                 $w = $maxWidth; 
  17817.                 $h = abs($w * $info['h'] / $info['w']); 
  17818.             } 
  17819.  
  17820.             if ($h > $maxHeight) { 
  17821.                 $h = $maxHeight; 
  17822.                 $w = abs($h * $info['w'] / $info['h']); 
  17823.             } 
  17824.             $objattr['type'] = 'image'; 
  17825.             $objattr['itype'] = $info['type']; 
  17826.  
  17827.             $objattr['orig_h'] = $info['h']; 
  17828.             $objattr['orig_w'] = $info['w']; 
  17829.             /** -- IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  17830.             if ($info['type'] == 'wmf') { 
  17831.                 $objattr['wmf_x'] = $info['x']; 
  17832.                 $objattr['wmf_y'] = $info['y']; 
  17833.             } else 
  17834.             /** -- END IMAGES-WMF -- */ 
  17835.             if ($info['type'] == 'svg') { 
  17836.                 $objattr['wmf_x'] = $info['x']; 
  17837.                 $objattr['wmf_y'] = $info['y']; 
  17838.             } 
  17839.             $objattr['height'] = $h; 
  17840.             $objattr['width'] = $w; 
  17841.             $objattr['image_height'] = $h; 
  17842.             $objattr['image_width'] = $w; 
  17843.  
  17844.             $objattr['dir'] = (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction']) ? $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction'] : 'ltr'); 
  17845.             $objattr['listmarker'] = true; 
  17846.  
  17847.             $objattr['listmarkerposition'] = $listitemposition; 
  17848.  
  17849.             $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=image, objattr=" . serialize($objattr) . "\xbb\xa4\xac"; 
  17850.             $this->_saveTextBuffer($e); 
  17851.  
  17852.             if ($listitemposition == 'inside') { 
  17853.                 $e = $spacer; 
  17854.                 $this->_saveTextBuffer($e); 
  17855.             } 
  17856.         } 
  17857.         // SYMBOL (needs new font) 
  17858.         elseif ($listitemtype == 'disc' || $listitemtype == 'circle' || $listitemtype == 'square') { 
  17859.             $objattr = array(); 
  17860.             $objattr['type'] = 'listmarker'; 
  17861.             $objattr['listmarkerposition'] = $listitemposition; 
  17862.             $objattr['width'] = 0; 
  17863.             $size = $this->ConvertSize($this->list_symbol_size, $this->FontSize); 
  17864.             $objattr['size'] = $size; 
  17865.             $objattr['offset'] = $this->ConvertSize($this->list_marker_offset, $this->FontSize); 
  17866.  
  17867.             if ($listitemposition == 'inside') { 
  17868.                 $objattr['width'] = $size + $objattr['offset']; 
  17869.             } 
  17870.  
  17871.             $objattr['height'] = $this->FontSize; 
  17872.             $objattr['vertical-align'] = 'T'; 
  17873.             $objattr['text'] = ''; 
  17874.             $objattr['dir'] = (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction']) ? $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction'] : 'ltr'); 
  17875.             $objattr['bullet'] = $listitemtype; 
  17876.             $objattr['colorarray'] = $this->colorarray; 
  17877.             $objattr['fontfamily'] = $this->FontFamily; 
  17878.             $objattr['fontsize'] = $this->FontSize; 
  17879.             $objattr['fontsizept'] = $this->FontSizePt; 
  17880.             $objattr['fontstyle'] = $this->FontStyle; 
  17881.  
  17882.             $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=listmarker, objattr=" . serialize($objattr) . "\xbb\xa4\xac"; 
  17883.             $this->listitem = $this->_saveTextBuffer($e, '', '', true); // true returns array 
  17884.             //    if ($listitemposition == 'inside') { 
  17885.             //        $e = $spacer; 
  17886.             //        $this->_saveTextBuffer($e); 
  17887.             //    } 
  17888.         } 
  17889.         // SYMBOL 2 (needs new font) 
  17890.         elseif (preg_match('/U\+([a-fA-F0-9]+)/i', $listitemtype, $m)) { 
  17891.             if ($this->_charDefined($this->CurrentFont['cw'], hexdec($m[1]))) { 
  17892.                 $list_item_marker = codeHex2utf($m[1]); 
  17893.             } else { 
  17894.                 $list_item_marker = '-'; 
  17895.             } 
  17896.             if (preg_match('/rgb\(.*?\)/', $listitemtype, $m)) { 
  17897.                 $list_item_color = $this->ConvertColor($m[0]); 
  17898.             } else { 
  17899.                 $list_item_color = ''; 
  17900.             } 
  17901.  
  17902.             // SAVE then SET COLR 
  17903.             $save_colorarray = $this->colorarray; 
  17904.             if ($list_item_color) { 
  17905.                 $this->colorarray = $list_item_color; 
  17906.             } 
  17907.  
  17908.             if ($listitemposition == 'inside') { 
  17909.                 $e = $list_item_marker . $spacer; 
  17910.                 $this->_saveTextBuffer($e); 
  17911.             } else { 
  17912.                 $objattr = array(); 
  17913.                 $objattr['type'] = 'listmarker'; 
  17914.                 $objattr['width'] = 0; 
  17915.                 $objattr['height'] = $this->FontSize; 
  17916.                 $objattr['vertical-align'] = 'T'; 
  17917.                 $objattr['text'] = $list_item_marker; 
  17918.                 $objattr['dir'] = (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction']) ? $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction'] : 'ltr'); 
  17919.                 $objattr['colorarray'] = $this->colorarray; 
  17920.                 $objattr['fontfamily'] = $this->FontFamily; 
  17921.                 $objattr['fontsize'] = $this->FontSize; 
  17922.                 $objattr['fontsizept'] = $this->FontSizePt; 
  17923.                 $objattr['fontstyle'] = $this->FontStyle; 
  17924.                 $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=listmarker, objattr=" . serialize($objattr) . "\xbb\xa4\xac"; 
  17925.                 $this->listitem = $this->_saveTextBuffer($e, '', '', true); // true returns array 
  17926.             } 
  17927.             // RESET COLOR 
  17928.             $this->colorarray = $save_colorarray; 
  17929.         } 
  17930.         // TEXT 
  17931.         else { 
  17932.             $counter = $this->listcounter[$this->listlvl]; 
  17933.             if ($listitemtype == 'none') { 
  17934.                 return; 
  17935.             } 
  17936.             $num = $this->_getStyledNumber($counter, $listitemtype, true); 
  17937.  
  17938.             if ($listitemposition == 'inside') { 
  17939.                 $e = $num . $this->list_number_suffix . $spacer; 
  17940.                 $this->_saveTextBuffer($e); 
  17941.             } else { 
  17942.                 if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction'] == 'rtl') { 
  17943.                     // REPLACE MIRRORED RTL $this->list_number_suffix  e.g. ) -> (  (NB could use UCDN::$mirror_pairs) 
  17944.                     $m = strtr($this->list_number_suffix, ")]}", "([{") . $num; 
  17945.                 } else { 
  17946.                     $m = $num . $this->list_number_suffix; 
  17947.                 } 
  17948.  
  17949.                 $objattr = array(); 
  17950.                 $objattr['type'] = 'listmarker'; 
  17951.                 $objattr['width'] = 0; 
  17952.                 $objattr['height'] = $this->FontSize; 
  17953.                 $objattr['vertical-align'] = 'T'; 
  17954.                 $objattr['text'] = $m; 
  17955.                 $objattr['dir'] = (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction']) ? $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction'] : 'ltr'); 
  17956.                 $objattr['colorarray'] = $this->colorarray; 
  17957.                 $objattr['fontfamily'] = $this->FontFamily; 
  17958.                 $objattr['fontsize'] = $this->FontSize; 
  17959.                 $objattr['fontsizept'] = $this->FontSizePt; 
  17960.                 $objattr['fontstyle'] = $this->FontStyle; 
  17961.                 $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=listmarker, objattr=" . serialize($objattr) . "\xbb\xa4\xac"; 
  17962.  
  17963.                 $this->listitem = $this->_saveTextBuffer($e, '', '', true); // true returns array 
  17964.             } 
  17965.         } 
  17966.     } 
  17967.  
  17968.     // mPDF Lists 
  17969.     function _getListMarkerWidth(&$currblk, &$a, &$i) 
  17970.     { 
  17971.         $blt_width = 0; 
  17972.  
  17973.         $markeroffset = $this->ConvertSize($this->list_marker_offset, $this->FontSize); 
  17974.  
  17975.         // Get Maximum number in the list 
  17976.         $maxnum = $this->listcounter[$this->listlvl]; 
  17977.         if ($currblk['list_style_type'] != 'disc' && $currblk['list_style_type'] != 'circle' && $currblk['list_style_type'] != 'square') { 
  17978.             $lvl = 1; 
  17979.             for ($j = $i + 2; $j < count($a); $j+=2) { 
  17980.                 $e = $a[$j]; 
  17981.                 if (!$e) { 
  17982.                     continue; 
  17983.                 } 
  17984.                 if ($e[0] == '/') { // end tag 
  17985.                     $e = strtoupper(substr($e, 1)); 
  17986.                     if ($e == 'OL' || $e == 'UL') { 
  17987.                         if ($lvl == 1) { 
  17988.                             break; 
  17989.                         } 
  17990.                         $lvl--; 
  17991.                     } 
  17992.                 } else { // opening tag 
  17993.                     if (strpos($e, ' ')) { 
  17994.                         $e = substr($e, 0, strpos($e, ' ')); 
  17995.                     } 
  17996.                     $e = strtoupper($e); 
  17997.                     if ($e == 'LI') { 
  17998.                         if ($lvl == 1) { 
  17999.                             $maxnum++; 
  18000.                         } 
  18001.                     } elseif ($e == 'OL' || $e == 'UL') { 
  18002.                         $lvl++; 
  18003.                     } 
  18004.                 } 
  18005.             } 
  18006.         } 
  18007.  
  18008.         switch ($currblk['list_style_type']) { 
  18009.             case 'decimal': 
  18010.             case '1': 
  18011.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat('5', strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18012.                 break; 
  18013.             case 'none': 
  18014.                 $blt_width = 0; 
  18015.                 break; 
  18016.             case 'upper-alpha': 
  18017.             case 'upper-latin': 
  18018.             case 'A': 
  18019.                 $maxnumA = $this->dec2alpha($maxnum, true); 
  18020.                 if ($maxnum < 13) { 
  18021.                     $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth('D' . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18022.                 } else { 
  18023.                     $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat('W', strlen($maxnumA)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18024.                 } 
  18025.                 break; 
  18026.             case 'lower-alpha': 
  18027.             case 'lower-latin': 
  18028.             case 'a': 
  18029.                 $maxnuma = $this->dec2alpha($maxnum, false); 
  18030.                 if ($maxnum < 13) { 
  18031.                     $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth('b' . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18032.                 } else { 
  18033.                     $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat('m', strlen($maxnuma)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18034.                 } 
  18035.                 break; 
  18036.             case 'upper-roman': 
  18037.             case 'I': 
  18038.                 if ($maxnum > 87) { 
  18039.                     $bbit = 87; 
  18040.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 86) { 
  18041.                     $bbit = 86; 
  18042.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 37) { 
  18043.                     $bbit = 38; 
  18044.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 36) { 
  18045.                     $bbit = 37; 
  18046.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 27) { 
  18047.                     $bbit = 28; 
  18048.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 26) { 
  18049.                     $bbit = 27; 
  18050.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 17) { 
  18051.                     $bbit = 18; 
  18052.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 16) { 
  18053.                     $bbit = 17; 
  18054.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 7) { 
  18055.                     $bbit = 8; 
  18056.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 6) { 
  18057.                     $bbit = 7; 
  18058.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 3) { 
  18059.                     $bbit = 4; 
  18060.                 } else { 
  18061.                     $bbit = $maxnum; 
  18062.                 } 
  18063.                 $maxlnum = $this->dec2roman($bbit, true); 
  18064.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth($maxlnum . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18065.                 break; 
  18066.             case 'lower-roman': 
  18067.             case 'i': 
  18068.                 if ($maxnum > 87) { 
  18069.                     $bbit = 87; 
  18070.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 86) { 
  18071.                     $bbit = 86; 
  18072.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 37) { 
  18073.                     $bbit = 38; 
  18074.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 36) { 
  18075.                     $bbit = 37; 
  18076.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 27) { 
  18077.                     $bbit = 28; 
  18078.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 26) { 
  18079.                     $bbit = 27; 
  18080.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 17) { 
  18081.                     $bbit = 18; 
  18082.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 16) { 
  18083.                     $bbit = 17; 
  18084.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 7) { 
  18085.                     $bbit = 8; 
  18086.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 6) { 
  18087.                     $bbit = 7; 
  18088.                 } elseif ($maxnum > 3) { 
  18089.                     $bbit = 4; 
  18090.                 } else { 
  18091.                     $bbit = $maxnum; 
  18092.                 } 
  18093.                 $maxlnum = $this->dec2roman($bbit, false); 
  18094.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth($maxlnum . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18095.                 break; 
  18096.  
  18097.             case 'disc': 
  18098.             case 'circle': 
  18099.             case 'square': 
  18100.                 $size = $this->ConvertSize($this->list_symbol_size, $this->FontSize); 
  18101.                 $offset = $this->ConvertSize($this->list_marker_offset, $this->FontSize); 
  18102.                 $blt_width = $size + $offset; 
  18103.                 break; 
  18104.  
  18105.             case 'arabic-indic': 
  18106.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(3, 0x0660), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18107.                 break; 
  18108.             case 'persian': 
  18109.             case 'urdu': 
  18110.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(3, 0x06F0), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18111.                 break; 
  18112.             case 'bengali': 
  18113.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(3, 0x09E6), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18114.                 break; 
  18115.             case 'devanagari': 
  18116.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(3, 0x0966), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18117.                 break; 
  18118.             case 'gujarati': 
  18119.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(3, 0x0AE6), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18120.                 break; 
  18121.             case 'gurmukhi': 
  18122.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(3, 0x0A66), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18123.                 break; 
  18124.             case 'kannada': 
  18125.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(3, 0x0CE6), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18126.                 break; 
  18127.             case 'malayalam': 
  18128.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(6, 0x0D66), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18129.                 break; 
  18130.             case 'oriya': 
  18131.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(3, 0x0B66), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18132.                 break; 
  18133.             case 'telugu': 
  18134.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(3, 0x0C66), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18135.                 break; 
  18136.             case 'tamil': 
  18137.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(9, 0x0BE6), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18138.                 break; 
  18139.             case 'thai': 
  18140.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat($this->dec2other(5, 0x0E50), strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18141.                 break; 
  18142.             default: 
  18143.                 $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat('5', strlen($maxnum)) . $this->list_number_suffix); 
  18144.                 break; 
  18145.         } 
  18146.  
  18147.         return ($blt_width + $markeroffset); 
  18148.     } 
  18149.  
  18150.     /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  18151.  
  18152.     // This function determines the shrink factor when resizing tables 
  18153.     // val is the table_height / page_height_available 
  18154.     // returns a scaling factor used as $shrin_k to resize the table 
  18155.     // Overcompensating will be quicker but may unnecessarily shrink table too much 
  18156.     // Undercompensating means it will reiterate more times (taking more processing time) 
  18157.     function tbsqrt($val, $iteration = 3) 
  18158.     { 
  18159.         $k = 4; // Alters number of iterations until it returns $val itself - Must be > 2 
  18160.         // Probably best guess and most accurate 
  18161.         if ($iteration == 1) 
  18162.             return sqrt($val); 
  18163.         // Faster than using sqrt (because it won't undercompensate), and gives reasonable results 
  18164.         //return 1+(($val-1)/2); 
  18165.         $x = 2 - (($iteration - 2) / ($k - 2)); 
  18166.         if ($x == 0) { 
  18167.             $ret = $val + 0.00001; 
  18168.         } elseif ($x < 0) { 
  18169.             $ret = 1 + ( pow(2, ($iteration - 2 - $k)) / 1000 ); 
  18170.         } else { 
  18171.             $ret = 1 + (($val - 1) / $x); 
  18172.         } 
  18173.         return $ret; 
  18174.     } 
  18175.  
  18176.     /** -- END TABLES -- */ 
  18177.  
  18178.     function _saveTextBuffer($t, $link = '', $intlink = '', $return = false) 
  18179.     { // mPDF 6  Lists 
  18180.         $arr = array(); 
  18181.         $arr[0] = $t; 
  18182.         if (isset($link) && $link) 
  18183.             $arr[1] = $link; 
  18184.         $arr[2] = $this->currentfontstyle; 
  18185.         if (isset($this->colorarray) && $this->colorarray) 
  18186.             $arr[3] = $this->colorarray; 
  18187.         $arr[4] = $this->currentfontfamily; 
  18188.         $arr[5] = $this->currentLang; // mPDF 6 
  18189.         if (isset($intlink) && $intlink) 
  18190.             $arr[7] = $intlink; 
  18191.         // mPDF 6 
  18192.         // If Kerning set for OTL, and useOTL has positive value, but has not set for this particular script,  
  18193.         // set for kerning via kern table 
  18194.         // e.g. Latin script when useOTL set as 0x80 
  18195.         if (isset($this->OTLtags['Plus']) && strpos($this->OTLtags['Plus'], 'kern') !== false && empty($this->OTLdata['GPOSinfo'])) { 
  18196.             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FC_KERNING); 
  18197.         } 
  18198.         $arr[8] = $this->textvar; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18199.         if (isset($this->textparam) && $this->textparam) 
  18200.             $arr[9] = $this->textparam; 
  18201.         if (isset($this->spanbgcolorarray) && $this->spanbgcolorarray) 
  18202.             $arr[10] = $this->spanbgcolorarray; 
  18203.         $arr[11] = $this->currentfontsize; 
  18204.         if (isset($this->ReqFontStyle) && $this->ReqFontStyle) 
  18205.             $arr[12] = $this->ReqFontStyle; 
  18206.         if (isset($this->lSpacingCSS) && $this->lSpacingCSS) 
  18207.             $arr[14] = $this->lSpacingCSS; 
  18208.         if (isset($this->wSpacingCSS) && $this->wSpacingCSS) 
  18209.             $arr[15] = $this->wSpacingCSS; 
  18210.         if (isset($this->spanborddet) && $this->spanborddet) 
  18211.             $arr[16] = $this->spanborddet; 
  18212.         if (isset($this->textshadow) && $this->textshadow) 
  18213.             $arr[17] = $this->textshadow; 
  18214.         if (isset($this->OTLdata) && $this->OTLdata) { 
  18215.             $arr[18] = $this->OTLdata; 
  18216.             $this->OTLdata = array(); 
  18217.         } // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18218.         else { 
  18219.             $arr[18] = NULL; 
  18220.         } 
  18221.         // mPDF 6  Lists 
  18222.         if ($return) { 
  18223.             return ($arr); 
  18224.         } 
  18225.         if ($this->listitem) { 
  18226.             $this->textbuffer[] = $this->listitem; 
  18227.             $this->listitem = array(); 
  18228.         } 
  18229.         $this->textbuffer[] = $arr; 
  18230.     } 
  18231.  
  18232.     function _saveCellTextBuffer($t, $link = '', $intlink = '') 
  18233.     { 
  18234.         $arr = array(); 
  18235.         $arr[0] = $t; 
  18236.         if (isset($link) && $link) 
  18237.             $arr[1] = $link; 
  18238.         $arr[2] = $this->currentfontstyle; 
  18239.         if (isset($this->colorarray) && $this->colorarray) 
  18240.             $arr[3] = $this->colorarray; 
  18241.         $arr[4] = $this->currentfontfamily; 
  18242.         if (isset($intlink) && $intlink) 
  18243.             $arr[7] = $intlink; 
  18244.         // mPDF 6 
  18245.         // If Kerning set for OTL, and useOTL has positive value, but has not set for this particular script,  
  18246.         // set for kerning via kern table 
  18247.         // e.g. Latin script when useOTL set as 0x80 
  18248.         if (isset($this->OTLtags['Plus']) && strpos($this->OTLtags['Plus'], 'kern') !== false && empty($this->OTLdata['GPOSinfo'])) { 
  18249.             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FC_KERNING); 
  18250.         } 
  18251.         $arr[8] = $this->textvar; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18252.         if (isset($this->textparam) && $this->textparam) 
  18253.             $arr[9] = $this->textparam; 
  18254.         if (isset($this->spanbgcolorarray) && $this->spanbgcolorarray) 
  18255.             $arr[10] = $this->spanbgcolorarray; 
  18256.         $arr[11] = $this->currentfontsize; 
  18257.         if (isset($this->ReqFontStyle) && $this->ReqFontStyle) 
  18258.             $arr[12] = $this->ReqFontStyle; 
  18259.         if (isset($this->lSpacingCSS) && $this->lSpacingCSS) 
  18260.             $arr[14] = $this->lSpacingCSS; 
  18261.         if (isset($this->wSpacingCSS) && $this->wSpacingCSS) 
  18262.             $arr[15] = $this->wSpacingCSS; 
  18263.         if (isset($this->spanborddet) && $this->spanborddet) 
  18264.             $arr[16] = $this->spanborddet; 
  18265.         if (isset($this->textshadow) && $this->textshadow) 
  18266.             $arr[17] = $this->textshadow; 
  18267.         if (isset($this->OTLdata) && $this->OTLdata) { 
  18268.             $arr[18] = $this->OTLdata; 
  18269.             $this->OTLdata = array(); 
  18270.         } // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18271.         else { 
  18272.             $arr[18] = NULL; 
  18273.         } 
  18274.         $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = $arr; 
  18275.     } 
  18276.  
  18277.     function printbuffer($arrayaux, $blockstate = 0, $is_table = false, $table_draft = false, $cell_dir = '') 
  18278.     { 
  18279.         // $blockstate = 0;    // NO margins/padding 
  18280.         // $blockstate = 1;    // Top margins/padding only 
  18281.         // $blockstate = 2;    // Bottom margins/padding only 
  18282.         // $blockstate = 3;    // Top & bottom margins/padding 
  18283.         $this->spanbgcolorarray = ''; 
  18284.         $this->spanbgcolor = false; 
  18285.         $this->spanborder = false; 
  18286.         $this->spanborddet = array(); 
  18287.         $paint_ht_corr = 0; 
  18288.         /** -- CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  18289.         if (count($this->floatDivs)) { 
  18290.             list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl); 
  18291.             if (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] - $l_width - $r_width) < (2 * $this->GetCharWidth('W', false))) { 
  18292.                 // Too narrow to fit - try to move down past L or R float 
  18293.                 if ($l_max < $r_max && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] - $r_width) > (2 * $this->GetCharWidth('W', false))) { 
  18294.                     $this->ClearFloats('LEFT', $this->blklvl); 
  18295.                 } elseif ($r_max < $l_max && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] - $l_width) > (2 * $this->GetCharWidth('W', false))) { 
  18296.                     $this->ClearFloats('RIGHT', $this->blklvl); 
  18297.                 } else { 
  18298.                     $this->ClearFloats('BOTH', $this->blklvl); 
  18299.                 } 
  18300.             } 
  18301.         } 
  18302.         /** -- END CSS-FLOAT -- */ 
  18303.         $bak_y = $this->y; 
  18304.         $bak_x = $this->x; 
  18305.         $align = ''; 
  18306.         if (!$is_table) { 
  18307.             if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']) { 
  18308.                 $align = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']; 
  18309.             } 
  18310.             // Block-align is set by e.g. <.. align="center"> Takes priority for this block but not inherited 
  18311.             if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['block-align']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['block-align']) { 
  18312.                 $align = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['block-align']; 
  18313.             } 
  18314.             if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction'])) 
  18315.                 $blockdir = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction']; 
  18316.             else 
  18317.                 $blockdir = ""; 
  18318.             $this->divwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['width']; 
  18319.         } 
  18320.         else { 
  18321.             $align = $this->cellTextAlign; 
  18322.             $blockdir = $cell_dir; 
  18323.         } 
  18324.         $oldpage = $this->page; 
  18325.  
  18326.         // ADDED for Out of Block now done as Flowing Block 
  18327.         if ($this->divwidth == 0) { 
  18328.             $this->divwidth = $this->pgwidth; 
  18329.         } 
  18330.  
  18331.         if (!$is_table) { 
  18332.             $this->SetLineHeight($this->FontSizePt, $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']); 
  18333.         } 
  18334.         $this->divheight = $this->lineheight; 
  18335.         $old_height = $this->divheight; 
  18336.  
  18337.         // As a failsafe - if font has been set but not output to page 
  18338.         if (!$table_draft) 
  18339.             $this->SetFont($this->default_font, '', $this->default_font_size, true, true); // force output to page 
  18340.  
  18341.         $this->newFlowingBlock($this->divwidth, $this->divheight, $align, $is_table, $blockstate, true, $blockdir, $table_draft); 
  18342.  
  18343.         $array_size = count($arrayaux); 
  18344.  
  18345.         // Added - Otherwise <div><div><p> did not output top margins/padding for 1st/2nd div 
  18346.         if ($array_size == 0) { 
  18347.             $this->finishFlowingBlock(true); 
  18348.         } // true = END of flowing block 
  18349.         // mPDF 6 
  18350.         // ALL the chunks of textbuffer need to have at least basic OTLdata set 
  18351.         // First make sure each element/chunk has the OTLdata for Bidi set. 
  18352.         for ($i = 0; $i < $array_size; $i++) { 
  18353.             if (empty($arrayaux[$i][18])) { 
  18354.                 if (substr($arrayaux[$i][0], 0, 3) == "\xbb\xa4\xac") { // object identifier has been identified! 
  18355.                     $unicode = array(0xFFFC); // Object replacement character 
  18356.                 } else { 
  18357.                     $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($arrayaux[$i][0], false); 
  18358.                 } 
  18359.                 $is_strong = false; 
  18360.                 $this->getBasicOTLdata($arrayaux[$i][18], $unicode, $is_strong); 
  18361.             } 
  18362.             // Gets messed up if try and use core fonts inside a paragraph of text which needs to be BiDi re-ordered or OTLdata set 
  18363.             if (($blockdir == 'rtl' || $this->biDirectional) && isset($arrayaux[$i][4]) && in_array($arrayaux[$i][4], array('ccourier', 'ctimes', 'chelvetica', 'csymbol', 'czapfdingbats'))) { 
  18364.                 /** Fallback to appropriate font type when RTL is detected */ 
  18365.                 switch ($arrayaux[$i][4]) { 
  18366.                     case 'ccourier': 
  18367.                         $arrayaux[$i][4] = $this->mono_fonts[0]; 
  18368.                     break; 
  18369.  
  18370.                     case 'ctimes': 
  18371.                         $arrayaux[$i][4] = $this->serif_fonts[0]; 
  18372.                     break; 
  18373.  
  18374.                     case 'chelvetica': 
  18375.                     default: 
  18376.                         $arrayaux[$i][4] = $this->sans_fonts[0]; 
  18377.                     break; 
  18378.                 } 
  18379.             } 
  18380.         } 
  18381.         // mPDF 6 
  18382.         // Process bidirectional text ready for bidi-re-ordering (which is done after line-breaks are established in WriteFlowingBlock etc.) 
  18383.         if (($blockdir == 'rtl' || $this->biDirectional) && !$table_draft) { 
  18384.             if (!class_exists('otl', false)) { 
  18385.                 include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/otl.php'); 
  18386.             } 
  18387.             if (empty($this->otl)) { 
  18388.                 $this->otl = new otl($this); 
  18389.             } 
  18390.             $this->otl->_bidiPrepare($arrayaux, $blockdir); 
  18391.             $array_size = count($arrayaux); 
  18392.         } 
  18393.  
  18394.  
  18395.         // Remove empty items // mPDF 6 
  18396.         for ($i = $array_size - 1; $i > 0; $i--) { 
  18397.             if (empty($arrayaux[$i][0]) && (isset($arrayaux[$i][16]) && $arrayaux[$i][16] !== '0') && empty($arrayaux[$i][7])) { 
  18398.                 unset($arrayaux[$i]); 
  18399.             } 
  18400.         } 
  18401.  
  18402.         // Correct adjoining borders for inline elements 
  18403.         if (isset($arrayaux[0][16])) { 
  18404.             $lastspanborder = $arrayaux[0][16]; 
  18405.         } else { 
  18406.             $lastspanborder = false; 
  18407.         } 
  18408.         for ($i = 1; $i < $array_size; $i++) { 
  18409.             if (isset($arrayaux[$i][16]) && $arrayaux[$i][16] == $lastspanborder && 
  18410.                 ((!isset($arrayaux[$i][9]['bord-decoration']) && !isset($arrayaux[$i - 1][9]['bord-decoration'])) || 
  18411.                 (isset($arrayaux[$i][9]['bord-decoration']) && isset($arrayaux[$i - 1][9]['bord-decoration']) && $arrayaux[$i][9]['bord-decoration'] == $arrayaux[$i - 1][9]['bord-decoration']) 
  18412.  ) 
  18413.  ) { 
  18414.                 if (isset($arrayaux[$i][16]['R'])) { 
  18415.                     $lastspanborder = $arrayaux[$i][16]; 
  18416.                 } else { 
  18417.                     $lastspanborder = false; 
  18418.                 } 
  18419.                 $arrayaux[$i][16]['L']['s'] = 0; 
  18420.                 $arrayaux[$i][16]['L']['w'] = 0; 
  18421.                 $arrayaux[$i - 1][16]['R']['s'] = 0; 
  18422.                 $arrayaux[$i - 1][16]['R']['w'] = 0; 
  18423.             } else { 
  18424.                 if (isset($arrayaux[$i][16]['R'])) { 
  18425.                     $lastspanborder = $arrayaux[$i][16]; 
  18426.                 } else { 
  18427.                     $lastspanborder = false; 
  18428.                 } 
  18429.             } 
  18430.         } 
  18431.  
  18432.         for ($i = 0; $i < $array_size; $i++) { 
  18433.             // COLS 
  18434.             $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  18435.             $vetor = isset($arrayaux[$i]) ? $arrayaux[$i] : NULL; 
  18436.             if ($i == 0 && $vetor[0] != "\n" && ! $this->ispre) { 
  18437.                 $vetor[0] = ltrim($vetor[0]); 
  18438.                 if (!empty($vetor[18])) { 
  18439.                     $this->otl->trimOTLdata($vetor[18], true, false); 
  18440.                 } // *OTL* 
  18441.             } 
  18442.  
  18443.             // FIXED TO ALLOW IT TO SHOW '0' 
  18444.             if (empty($vetor[0]) && !($vetor[0] === '0') && empty($vetor[7])) { //Ignore empty text and not carrying an internal link 
  18445.                 //Check if it is the last element. If so then finish printing the block 
  18446.                 if ($i == ($array_size - 1)) { 
  18447.                     $this->finishFlowingBlock(true); 
  18448.                 } // true = END of flowing block 
  18449.                 continue; 
  18450.             } 
  18451.  
  18452.  
  18453.             //Activating buffer properties 
  18454.             if (isset($vetor[11]) && $vetor[11] != '') {   // Font Size 
  18455.                 if ($is_table && $this->shrin_k) { 
  18456.                     $this->SetFontSize($vetor[11] / $this->shrin_k, false); 
  18457.                 } else { 
  18458.                     $this->SetFontSize($vetor[11], false); 
  18459.                 } 
  18460.             } 
  18461.  
  18462.             if (isset($vetor[17]) && !empty($vetor[17])) { //TextShadow 
  18463.                 $this->textshadow = $vetor[17]; 
  18464.             } 
  18465.             if (isset($vetor[16]) && !empty($vetor[16])) { //Border 
  18466.                 $this->spanborddet = $vetor[16]; 
  18467.                 $this->spanborder = true; 
  18468.             } 
  18469.  
  18470.             if (isset($vetor[15])) {   // Word spacing 
  18471.                 $this->wSpacingCSS = $vetor[15]; 
  18472.                 if ($this->wSpacingCSS && strtoupper($this->wSpacingCSS) != 'NORMAL') { 
  18473.                     $this->minwSpacing = $this->ConvertSize($this->wSpacingCSS, $this->FontSize) / $this->shrin_k; // mPDF 5.7.3 
  18474.                 } 
  18475.             } 
  18476.             if (isset($vetor[14])) {   // Letter spacing 
  18477.                 $this->lSpacingCSS = $vetor[14]; 
  18478.                 if (($this->lSpacingCSS || $this->lSpacingCSS === '0') && strtoupper($this->lSpacingCSS) != 'NORMAL') { 
  18479.                     $this->fixedlSpacing = $this->ConvertSize($this->lSpacingCSS, $this->FontSize) / $this->shrin_k; // mPDF 5.7.3 
  18480.                 } 
  18481.             } 
  18482.  
  18483.  
  18484.             if (isset($vetor[10]) and ! empty($vetor[10])) { //Background color 
  18485.                 $this->spanbgcolorarray = $vetor[10]; 
  18486.                 $this->spanbgcolor = true; 
  18487.             } 
  18488.             if (isset($vetor[9]) and ! empty($vetor[9])) { // Text parameters - Outline + hyphens 
  18489.                 $this->textparam = $vetor[9]; 
  18490.                 $this->SetTextOutline($this->textparam); 
  18491.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  18492.                 if ($is_table && $this->shrin_k) { 
  18493.                     if (isset($this->textparam['text-baseline'])) { 
  18494.                         $this->textparam['text-baseline'] /= $this->shrin_k; 
  18495.                     } 
  18496.                     if (isset($this->textparam['decoration-baseline'])) { 
  18497.                         $this->textparam['decoration-baseline'] /= $this->shrin_k; 
  18498.                     } 
  18499.                     if (isset($this->textparam['decoration-fontsize'])) { 
  18500.                         $this->textparam['decoration-fontsize'] /= $this->shrin_k; 
  18501.                     } 
  18502.                 } 
  18503.             } 
  18504.             if (isset($vetor[8])) {  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18505.                 $this->textvar = $vetor[8]; 
  18506.             } 
  18507.             if (isset($vetor[7]) and $vetor[7] != '') { // internal target: <a name="anyvalue"> 
  18508.                 $ily = $this->y; 
  18509.                 if ($this->table_rotate) { 
  18510.                     $this->internallink[$vetor[7]] = array("Y" => $ily, "PAGE" => $this->page, "tbrot" => true); 
  18511.                 } elseif ($this->kwt) { 
  18512.                     $this->internallink[$vetor[7]] = array("Y" => $ily, "PAGE" => $this->page, "kwt" => true); 
  18513.                 } elseif ($this->ColActive) { 
  18514.                     $this->internallink[$vetor[7]] = array("Y" => $ily, "PAGE" => $this->page, "col" => $this->CurrCol); 
  18515.                 } elseif (!$this->keep_block_together) { 
  18516.                     $this->internallink[$vetor[7]] = array("Y" => $ily, "PAGE" => $this->page); 
  18517.                 } 
  18518.                 if (empty($vetor[0])) { //Ignore empty text 
  18519.                     //Check if it is the last element. If so then finish printing the block 
  18520.                     if ($i == ($array_size - 1)) { 
  18521.                         $this->finishFlowingBlock(true); 
  18522.                     } // true = END of flowing block 
  18523.                     continue; 
  18524.                 } 
  18525.             } 
  18526.             if (isset($vetor[5]) and $vetor[5] != '') {  // Language    // mPDF 6 
  18527.                 $this->currentLang = $vetor[5]; 
  18528.             } 
  18529.             if (isset($vetor[4]) and $vetor[4] != '') {  // Font Family 
  18530.                 $font = $this->SetFont($vetor[4], $this->FontStyle, 0, false); 
  18531.             } 
  18532.             if (!empty($vetor[3])) { //Font Color 
  18533.                 $cor = $vetor[3]; 
  18534.                 $this->SetTColor($cor); 
  18535.             } 
  18536.             if (isset($vetor[2]) and $vetor[2] != '') { //Bold, Italic styles 
  18537.                 $this->SetStyles($vetor[2]); 
  18538.             } 
  18539.  
  18540.             if (isset($vetor[12]) and $vetor[12] != '') { //Requested Bold, Italic 
  18541.                 $this->ReqFontStyle = $vetor[12]; 
  18542.             } 
  18543.             if (isset($vetor[1]) and $vetor[1] != '') { //LINK 
  18544.                 if (strpos($vetor[1], ".") === false && strpos($vetor[1], "@") !== 0) { //assuming every external link has a dot indicating extension (e.g: .html .txt .zip www.somewhere.com etc.) 
  18545.                     //Repeated reference to same anchor? 
  18546.                     while (array_key_exists($vetor[1], $this->internallink)) 
  18547.                         $vetor[1] = "#" . $vetor[1]; 
  18548.                     $this->internallink[$vetor[1]] = $this->AddLink(); 
  18549.                     $vetor[1] = $this->internallink[$vetor[1]]; 
  18550.                 } 
  18551.                 $this->HREF = $vetor[1];     // HREF link style set here ****** 
  18552.             } 
  18553.  
  18554.             // SPECIAL CONTENT - IMAGES & FORM OBJECTS 
  18555.             //Print-out special content 
  18556.  
  18557.             if (substr($vetor[0], 0, 3) == "\xbb\xa4\xac") { //identifier has been identified! 
  18558.                 $objattr = $this->_getObjAttr($vetor[0]); 
  18559.  
  18560.                 /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  18561.                 if ($objattr['type'] == 'nestedtable') { 
  18562.                     if ($objattr['nestedcontent']) { 
  18563.                         $level = $objattr['level']; 
  18564.                         $table = &$this->table[$level][$objattr['table']]; 
  18565.  
  18566.                         if ($table_draft) { 
  18567.                             $this->y += $this->table[($level + 1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]['h']; // nested table height 
  18568.                             $this->finishFlowingBlock(false, 'nestedtable'); 
  18569.                         } else { 
  18570.  
  18571.                             $cell = &$table['cells'][$objattr['row']][$objattr['col']]; 
  18572.                             $this->finishFlowingBlock(false, 'nestedtable'); 
  18573.                             $save_dw = $this->divwidth; 
  18574.                             $save_buffer = $this->cellBorderBuffer; 
  18575.                             $this->cellBorderBuffer = array(); 
  18576.                             $ncx = $this->x; 
  18577.                             list($dummyx, $w) = $this->_tableGetWidth($table, $objattr['row'], $objattr['col']); 
  18578.                             $ntw = $this->table[($level + 1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]['w']; // nested table width 
  18579.                             if (!$this->simpleTables) { 
  18580.                                 if ($this->packTableData) { 
  18581.                                     list($bt, $br, $bb, $bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($cell['borderbin']); 
  18582.                                 } else { 
  18583.                                     $br = $cell['border_details']['R']['w']; 
  18584.                                     $bl = $cell['border_details']['L']['w']; 
  18585.                                 } 
  18586.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  18587.                                     $innerw = $w - $bl - $br - $cell['padding']['L'] - $cell['padding']['R'] - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  18588.                                 } else { 
  18589.                                     $innerw = $w - $bl / 2 - $br / 2 - $cell['padding']['L'] - $cell['padding']['R']; 
  18590.                                 } 
  18591.                             } elseif ($this->simpleTables) { 
  18592.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  18593.                                     $innerw = $w - $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] - $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] - $cell['padding']['L'] - $cell['padding']['R'] - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  18594.                                 } else { 
  18595.                                     $innerw = $w - $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] / 2 - $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] / 2 - $cell['padding']['L'] - $cell['padding']['R']; 
  18596.                                 } 
  18597.                             } 
  18598.                             if ($cell['a'] == 'C' || $this->table[($level + 1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]['a'] == 'C') { 
  18599.                                 $ncx += ($innerw - $ntw) / 2; 
  18600.                             } elseif ($cell['a'] == 'R' || $this->table[($level + 1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]['a'] == 'R') { 
  18601.                                 $ncx += $innerw - $ntw; 
  18602.                             } 
  18603.                             $this->x = $ncx; 
  18604.  
  18605.                             $this->_tableWrite($this->table[($level + 1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]); 
  18606.                             $this->cellBorderBuffer = $save_buffer; 
  18607.                             $this->x = $bak_x; 
  18608.                             $this->divwidth = $save_dw; 
  18609.                         } 
  18610.  
  18611.                         $this->newFlowingBlock($this->divwidth, $this->divheight, $align, $is_table, $blockstate, false, $blockdir, $table_draft); 
  18612.                     } 
  18613.                 } else { 
  18614.                     /** -- END TABLES -- */ 
  18615.                     if ($is_table) { // *TABLES* 
  18616.                         $maxWidth = $this->divwidth;  // *TABLES* 
  18617.                     } // *TABLES* 
  18618.                     else { // *TABLES* 
  18619.                         $maxWidth = $this->divwidth - ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['w']); 
  18620.                     } // *TABLES* 
  18621.  
  18622.                     /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  18623.                     // If float (already) exists at this level 
  18624.                     if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $this->y <= $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] && $this->y >= $this->floatmargins['R']['y0']) { 
  18625.                         $maxWidth -= $this->floatmargins['R']['w']; 
  18626.                     } 
  18627.                     if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $this->y <= $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] && $this->y >= $this->floatmargins['L']['y0']) { 
  18628.                         $maxWidth -= $this->floatmargins['L']['w']; 
  18629.                     } 
  18630.                     /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  18631.  
  18632.                     list($skipln) = $this->inlineObject($objattr['type'], '', $this->y, $objattr, $this->lMargin, ($this->flowingBlockAttr['contentWidth'] / _MPDFK), $maxWidth, $this->flowingBlockAttr['height'], false, $is_table); 
  18633.                     //  1 -> New line needed because of width 
  18634.                     // -1 -> Will fit width on line but NEW PAGE REQUIRED because of height 
  18635.                     // -2 -> Will not fit on line therefore needs new line but thus NEW PAGE REQUIRED 
  18636.                     $iby = $this->y; 
  18637.                     $oldpage = $this->page; 
  18638.                     $oldcol = $this->CurrCol; 
  18639.                     if (($skipln == 1 || $skipln == -2) && !isset($objattr['float'])) { 
  18640.                         $this->finishFlowingBlock(false, $objattr['type']); 
  18641.                         $this->newFlowingBlock($this->divwidth, $this->divheight, $align, $is_table, $blockstate, false, $blockdir, $table_draft); 
  18642.                     } 
  18643.  
  18644.                     if (!$table_draft) { 
  18645.                         $thispage = $this->page; 
  18646.                         if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcol) { 
  18647.                             $changedcol = true; 
  18648.                         } else { 
  18649.                             $changedcol = false; 
  18650.                         } 
  18651.  
  18652.                         // the previous lines can already have triggered page break or column change 
  18653.                         if (!$changedcol && $skipln < 0 && $this->AcceptPageBreak() && $thispage == $oldpage) { 
  18654.  
  18655.                             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  18656.  
  18657.                             // Added to correct Images already set on line before page advanced 
  18658.                             // i.e. if second inline image on line is higher than first and forces new page 
  18659.                             if (count($this->objectbuffer)) { 
  18660.                                 $yadj = $iby - $this->y; 
  18661.                                 foreach ($this->objectbuffer AS $ib => $val) { 
  18662.                                     if ($this->objectbuffer[$ib]['OUTER-Y']) 
  18663.                                         $this->objectbuffer[$ib]['OUTER-Y'] -= $yadj; 
  18664.                                     if ($this->objectbuffer[$ib]['BORDER-Y']) 
  18665.                                         $this->objectbuffer[$ib]['BORDER-Y'] -= $yadj; 
  18666.                                     if ($this->objectbuffer[$ib]['INNER-Y']) 
  18667.                                         $this->objectbuffer[$ib]['INNER-Y'] -= $yadj; 
  18668.                                 } 
  18669.                             } 
  18670.                         } 
  18671.  
  18672.                         // Added to correct for OddEven Margins 
  18673.                         if ($this->page != $oldpage) { 
  18674.                             if (($this->page - $oldpage) % 2 == 1) { 
  18675.                                 $bak_x += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  18676.                             } 
  18677.                             $oldpage = $this->page; 
  18678.                             $y = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18679.                             $this->oldy = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18680.                             $old_height = 0; 
  18681.                         } 
  18682.                         $this->x = $bak_x; 
  18683.                         /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  18684.                         // COLS 
  18685.                         // OR COLUMN CHANGE 
  18686.                         if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) { 
  18687.                             if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *OTL* 
  18688.                                 $bak_x -= ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); // *OTL* 
  18689.                             } // *OTL* 
  18690.                             else { // *OTL* 
  18691.                                 $bak_x += ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  18692.                             } // *OTL* 
  18693.                             $this->x = $bak_x; 
  18694.                             $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  18695.                             $y = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18696.                             $this->oldy = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18697.                             $old_height = 0; 
  18698.                         } 
  18699.                         /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  18700.                     } 
  18701.  
  18702.                     /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  18703.                     if ($objattr['type'] == 'image' && isset($objattr['float'])) { 
  18704.                         $fy = $this->y; 
  18705.  
  18706.                         // DIV TOP MARGIN/BORDER/PADDING 
  18707.                         if ($this->flowingBlockAttr['newblock'] && ($this->flowingBlockAttr['blockstate'] == 1 || $this->flowingBlockAttr['blockstate'] == 3) && $this->flowingBlockAttr['lineCount'] == 0) { 
  18708.                             $fy += $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  18709.                         } 
  18710.  
  18711.                         if ($objattr['float'] == 'R') { 
  18712.                             $fx = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $objattr['width'] - ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_right_margin'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right']); 
  18713.                         } elseif ($objattr['float'] == 'L') { 
  18714.                             $fx = $this->lMargin + ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left']); 
  18715.                         } 
  18716.                         $w = $objattr['width']; 
  18717.                         $h = abs($objattr['height']); 
  18718.  
  18719.                         $widthLeft = $maxWidth - ($this->flowingBlockAttr['contentWidth'] / _MPDFK); 
  18720.                         $maxHeight = $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->margin_header + $this->bMargin + 10); 
  18721.                         // For Images 
  18722.                         $extraWidth = ($objattr['border_left']['w'] + $objattr['border_right']['w'] + $objattr['margin_left'] + $objattr['margin_right']); 
  18723.                         $extraHeight = ($objattr['border_top']['w'] + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] + $objattr['margin_top'] + $objattr['margin_bottom']); 
  18724.  
  18725.                         if ($objattr['itype'] == 'wmf' || $objattr['itype'] == 'svg') { 
  18726.                             $file = $objattr['file']; 
  18727.                             $info = $this->formobjects[$file]; 
  18728.                         } else { 
  18729.                             $file = $objattr['file']; 
  18730.                             $info = $this->images[$file]; 
  18731.                         } 
  18732.                         $img_w = $w - $extraWidth; 
  18733.                         $img_h = $h - $extraHeight; 
  18734.                         if ($objattr['border_left']['w']) { 
  18735.                             $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] = $img_w + (($objattr['border_left']['w'] + $objattr['border_right']['w']) / 2); 
  18736.                             $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h + (($objattr['border_top']['w'] + $objattr['border_bottom']['w']) / 2); 
  18737.                             $objattr['BORDER-X'] = $fx + $objattr['margin_left'] + (($objattr['border_left']['w']) / 2); 
  18738.                             $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = $fy + $objattr['margin_top'] + (($objattr['border_top']['w']) / 2); 
  18739.                         } 
  18740.                         $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $img_w; 
  18741.                         $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h; 
  18742.                         $objattr['INNER-X'] = $fx + $objattr['margin_left'] + ($objattr['border_left']['w']); 
  18743.                         $objattr['INNER-Y'] = $fy + $objattr['margin_top'] + ($objattr['border_top']['w']); 
  18744.                         $objattr['ID'] = $info['i']; 
  18745.                         $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'] = $w; 
  18746.                         $objattr['OUTER-HEIGHT'] = $h; 
  18747.                         $objattr['OUTER-X'] = $fx; 
  18748.                         $objattr['OUTER-Y'] = $fy; 
  18749.                         if ($objattr['float'] == 'R') { 
  18750.                             // If R float already exists at this level 
  18751.                             $this->floatmargins['R']['skipline'] = false; 
  18752.                             if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']['y1']) && $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] > 0 && $fy < $this->floatmargins['R']['y1']) { 
  18753.                                 $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0], $vetor[18]);  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18754.                             } 
  18755.                             // If L float already exists at this level 
  18756.                             elseif (isset($this->floatmargins['L']['y1']) && $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] > 0 && $fy < $this->floatmargins['L']['y1']) { 
  18757.                                 // Final check distance between floats is not now too narrow to fit text 
  18758.                                 $mw = 2 * $this->GetCharWidth('W', false); 
  18759.                                 if (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] - $w - $this->floatmargins['L']['w']) < $mw) { 
  18760.                                     $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0], $vetor[18]);  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18761.                                 } else { 
  18762.                                     $this->floatmargins['R']['x'] = $fx; 
  18763.                                     $this->floatmargins['R']['w'] = $w; 
  18764.                                     $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] = $fy; 
  18765.                                     $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] = $fy + $h; 
  18766.                                     if ($skipln == 1) { 
  18767.                                         $this->floatmargins['R']['skipline'] = true; 
  18768.                                         $this->floatmargins['R']['id'] = count($this->floatbuffer) + 0; 
  18769.                                         $objattr['skipline'] = true; 
  18770.                                     } 
  18771.                                     $this->floatbuffer[] = $objattr; 
  18772.                                 } 
  18773.                             } else { 
  18774.                                 $this->floatmargins['R']['x'] = $fx; 
  18775.                                 $this->floatmargins['R']['w'] = $w; 
  18776.                                 $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] = $fy; 
  18777.                                 $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] = $fy + $h; 
  18778.                                 if ($skipln == 1) { 
  18779.                                     $this->floatmargins['R']['skipline'] = true; 
  18780.                                     $this->floatmargins['R']['id'] = count($this->floatbuffer) + 0; 
  18781.                                     $objattr['skipline'] = true; 
  18782.                                 } 
  18783.                                 $this->floatbuffer[] = $objattr; 
  18784.                             } 
  18785.                         } elseif ($objattr['float'] == 'L') { 
  18786.                             // If L float already exists at this level 
  18787.                             $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] = false; 
  18788.                             if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']['y1']) && $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] > 0 && $fy < $this->floatmargins['L']['y1']) { 
  18789.                                 $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] = false; 
  18790.                                 $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0], $vetor[18]);  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18791.                             } 
  18792.                             // If R float already exists at this level 
  18793.                             elseif (isset($this->floatmargins['R']['y1']) && $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] > 0 && $fy < $this->floatmargins['R']['y1']) { 
  18794.                                 // Final check distance between floats is not now too narrow to fit text 
  18795.                                 $mw = 2 * $this->GetCharWidth('W', false); 
  18796.                                 if (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] - $w - $this->floatmargins['R']['w']) < $mw) { 
  18797.                                     $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0], $vetor[18]);  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18798.                                 } else { 
  18799.                                     $this->floatmargins['L']['x'] = $fx + $w; 
  18800.                                     $this->floatmargins['L']['w'] = $w; 
  18801.                                     $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] = $fy; 
  18802.                                     $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] = $fy + $h; 
  18803.                                     if ($skipln == 1) { 
  18804.                                         $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] = true; 
  18805.                                         $this->floatmargins['L']['id'] = count($this->floatbuffer) + 0; 
  18806.                                         $objattr['skipline'] = true; 
  18807.                                     } 
  18808.                                     $this->floatbuffer[] = $objattr; 
  18809.                                 } 
  18810.                             } else { 
  18811.                                 $this->floatmargins['L']['x'] = $fx + $w; 
  18812.                                 $this->floatmargins['L']['w'] = $w; 
  18813.                                 $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] = $fy; 
  18814.                                 $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] = $fy + $h; 
  18815.                                 if ($skipln == 1) { 
  18816.                                     $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] = true; 
  18817.                                     $this->floatmargins['L']['id'] = count($this->floatbuffer) + 0; 
  18818.                                     $objattr['skipline'] = true; 
  18819.                                 } 
  18820.                                 $this->floatbuffer[] = $objattr; 
  18821.                             } 
  18822.                         } 
  18823.                     } else { 
  18824.                         /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  18825.                         $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0], (isset($vetor[18]) ? $vetor[18] : NULL));  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18826.                         /** -- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  18827.                     } 
  18828.                     /** -- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT -- */ 
  18829.                 } // *TABLES* 
  18830.             } // END If special content 
  18831.             else { //THE text 
  18832.                 if ($this->tableLevel) { 
  18833.                     $paint_ht_corr = 0; 
  18834.                 } // To move the y up when new column/page started if div border needed 
  18835.                 else { 
  18836.                     $paint_ht_corr = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  18837.                 } 
  18838.  
  18839.                 if ($vetor[0] == "\n") { //We are reading a <BR> now turned into newline ("\n") 
  18840.                     if ($this->flowingBlockAttr['content']) { 
  18841.                         $this->finishFlowingBlock(false, 'br'); 
  18842.                     } elseif ($is_table) { 
  18843.                         $this->y+= $this->_computeLineheight($this->cellLineHeight); 
  18844.                     } elseif (!$is_table) { 
  18845.                         $this->DivLn($this->lineheight); 
  18846.                         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  18847.                             $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  18848.                         } // *COLUMNS* 
  18849.                     } 
  18850.                     // Added to correct for OddEven Margins 
  18851.                     if ($this->page != $oldpage) { 
  18852.                         if (($this->page - $oldpage) % 2 == 1) { 
  18853.                             $bak_x += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  18854.                         } 
  18855.                         $oldpage = $this->page; 
  18856.                         $y = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18857.                         $this->oldy = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18858.                         $old_height = 0; 
  18859.                     } 
  18860.                     $this->x = $bak_x; 
  18861.                     /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  18862.                     // COLS 
  18863.                     // OR COLUMN CHANGE 
  18864.                     if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) { 
  18865.                         if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *OTL* 
  18866.                             $bak_x -= ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); // *OTL* 
  18867.                         } // *OTL* 
  18868.                         else { // *OTL* 
  18869.                             $bak_x += ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  18870.                         } // *OTL* 
  18871.                         $this->x = $bak_x; 
  18872.                         $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  18873.                         $y = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18874.                         $this->oldy = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18875.                         $old_height = 0; 
  18876.                     } 
  18877.                     /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  18878.                     $this->newFlowingBlock($this->divwidth, $this->divheight, $align, $is_table, $blockstate, false, $blockdir, $table_draft); 
  18879.                 } else { 
  18880.                     $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0], $vetor[18]);  // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18881.                     // Added to correct for OddEven Margins 
  18882.                     if ($this->page != $oldpage) { 
  18883.                         if (($this->page - $oldpage) % 2 == 1) { 
  18884.                             $bak_x += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  18885.                             $this->x = $bak_x; 
  18886.                         } 
  18887.                         $oldpage = $this->page; 
  18888.                         $y = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18889.                         $this->oldy = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18890.                         $old_height = 0; 
  18891.                     } 
  18892.                     /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  18893.                     // COLS 
  18894.                     // OR COLUMN CHANGE 
  18895.                     if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) { 
  18896.                         if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *OTL* 
  18897.                             $bak_x -= ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); // *OTL* 
  18898.                         } // *OTL* 
  18899.                         else { // *OTL* 
  18900.                             $bak_x += ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  18901.                         } // *OTL* 
  18902.                         $this->x = $bak_x; 
  18903.                         $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  18904.                         $y = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18905.                         $this->oldy = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18906.                         $old_height = 0; 
  18907.                     } 
  18908.                     /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  18909.                 } 
  18910.             } 
  18911.  
  18912.             //Check if it is the last element. If so then finish printing the block 
  18913.             if ($i == ($array_size - 1)) { 
  18914.                 $this->finishFlowingBlock(true); // true = END of flowing block 
  18915.                 // Added to correct for OddEven Margins 
  18916.                 if ($this->page != $oldpage) { 
  18917.                     if (($this->page - $oldpage) % 2 == 1) { 
  18918.                         $bak_x += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  18919.                         $this->x = $bak_x; 
  18920.                     } 
  18921.                     $oldpage = $this->page; 
  18922.                     $y = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18923.                     $this->oldy = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18924.                     $old_height = 0; 
  18925.                 } 
  18926.  
  18927.                 /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  18928.                 // COLS 
  18929.                 // OR COLUMN CHANGE 
  18930.                 if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) { 
  18931.                     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *OTL* 
  18932.                         $bak_x -= ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); // *OTL* 
  18933.                     } // *OTL* 
  18934.                     else { // *OTL* 
  18935.                         $bak_x += ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  18936.                     } // *OTL* 
  18937.                     $this->x = $bak_x; 
  18938.                     $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  18939.                     $y = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18940.                     $this->oldy = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr; 
  18941.                     $old_height = 0; 
  18942.                 } 
  18943.                 /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  18944.             } 
  18945.  
  18946.             // RESETTING VALUES 
  18947.             $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  18948.             $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  18949.             $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  18950.             $this->colorarray = ''; 
  18951.             $this->spanbgcolorarray = ''; 
  18952.             $this->spanbgcolor = false; 
  18953.             $this->spanborder = false; 
  18954.             $this->spanborddet = array(); 
  18955.             $this->HREF = ''; 
  18956.             $this->textparam = array(); 
  18957.             $this->SetTextOutline(); 
  18958.  
  18959.             $this->textvar = 0x00; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  18960.             $this->OTLtags = array(); 
  18961.             $this->textshadow = ''; 
  18962.  
  18963.             $this->currentfontfamily = ''; 
  18964.             $this->currentfontsize = ''; 
  18965.             $this->currentfontstyle = ''; 
  18966.             $this->currentLang = $this->default_lang;  // mPDF 6 
  18967.             $this->RestrictUnicodeFonts($this->default_available_fonts); // mPDF 6 
  18968.             /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  18969.             if ($this->tableLevel) { 
  18970.                 $this->SetLineHeight('', $this->table[1][1]['cellLineHeight']); // *TABLES* 
  18971.             } else 
  18972.             /** -- END TABLES -- */ 
  18973.             if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) { 
  18974.                 $this->SetLineHeight('', $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']); // sets default line height 
  18975.             } 
  18976.             $this->ResetStyles(); 
  18977.             $this->lSpacingCSS = ''; 
  18978.             $this->wSpacingCSS = ''; 
  18979.             $this->fixedlSpacing = false; 
  18980.             $this->minwSpacing = 0; 
  18981.             $this->SetDash(); 
  18982.             $this->dash_on = false; 
  18983.             $this->dotted_on = false; 
  18984.         }//end of for(i=0;i<arraysize;i++) 
  18985.  
  18986.         $this->Reset(); // mPDF 6 
  18987.         // PAINT DIV BORDER    // DISABLED IN COLUMNS AS DOESN'T WORK WHEN BROKEN ACROSS COLS?? 
  18988.         if ((isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border']) || isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolor']) || isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['box_shadow'])) && $blockstate && ($this->y != $this->oldy)) { 
  18989.             $bottom_y = $this->y; // Does not include Bottom Margin 
  18990.             if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] != $this->page && $blockstate != 1) { 
  18991.                 $this->PaintDivBB('pagetop', $blockstate); 
  18992.             } elseif ($blockstate != 1) { 
  18993.                 $this->PaintDivBB('', $blockstate); 
  18994.             } 
  18995.             $this->y = $bottom_y; 
  18996.             $this->x = $bak_x; 
  18997.         } 
  18998.  
  18999.         // Reset Font 
  19000.         $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size, false); 
  19001.         if ($table_draft) { 
  19002.             $ch = $this->y - $bak_y; 
  19003.             $this->y = $bak_y; 
  19004.             $this->x = $bak_x; 
  19005.             return $ch; 
  19006.         } 
  19007.     } 
  19008.  
  19009.     function _setDashBorder($style, $div, $cp, $side) 
  19010.     { 
  19011.         if ($style == 'dashed' && (($side == 'L' || $side == 'R') || ($side == 'T' && $div != 'pagetop' && !$cp) || ($side == 'B' && $div != 'pagebottom') )) { 
  19012.             $dashsize = 2; // final dash will be this + 1*linewidth 
  19013.             $dashsizek = 1.5; // ratio of Dash/Blank 
  19014.             $this->SetDash($dashsize, ($dashsize / $dashsizek) + ($this->LineWidth * 2)); 
  19015.         } elseif ($style == 'dotted' || ($side == 'T' && ($div == 'pagetop' || $cp)) || ($side == 'B' && $div == 'pagebottom')) { 
  19016.             //Round join and cap 
  19017.             $this->SetLineJoin(1); 
  19018.             $this->SetLineCap(1); 
  19019.             $this->SetDash(0.001, ($this->LineWidth * 3)); 
  19020.         } 
  19021.     } 
  19022.  
  19023.     function _setBorderLine($b, $k = 1) 
  19024.     { 
  19025.         $this->SetLineWidth($b['w'] / $k); 
  19026.         $this->SetDColor($b['c']); 
  19027.         if ($b['c'][0] == 5) { // RGBa 
  19028.             $this->SetAlpha(ord($b['c'][4]) / 100, 'Normal', false, 'S') . "\n"; // mPDF 5.7.2 
  19029.         } elseif ($b['c'][0] == 6) { // CMYKa 
  19030.             $this->SetAlpha(ord($b['c'][5]) / 100, 'Normal', false, 'S') . "\n"; // mPDF 5.7.2 
  19031.         } 
  19032.     } 
  19033.  
  19034.     function PaintDivBB($divider = '', $blockstate = 0, $blvl = 0)
