  19035.     { 
  19036.         // Borders & backgrounds are done elsewhere for columns - messes up the repositioning in printcolumnbuffer 
  19037.         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  19038.             return; 
  19039.         } // *COLUMNS* 
  19040.         if ($this->keep_block_together) { 
  19041.             return; 
  19042.         } // mPDF 6 
  19043.         $save_y = $this->y; 
  19044.         if (!$blvl) { 
  19045.             $blvl = $this->blklvl; 
  19046.         } 
  19047.         $x0 = $x1 = $y0 = $y1 = 0; 
  19048.  
  19049.         // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV 
  19050.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['bb_painted'][$this->page]) && $this->blk[$blvl]['bb_painted'][$this->page]) { 
  19051.             return; 
  19052.         } // *CSS-FLOAT* 
  19053.  
  19054.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['x0'])) { 
  19055.             $x0 = $this->blk[$blvl]['x0']; 
  19056.         } // left 
  19057.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['y1'])) { 
  19058.             $y1 = $this->blk[$blvl]['y1']; 
  19059.         } // bottom 
  19060.         // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV - ensures backgrounds/borders are drawn to bottom of page 
  19061.         if ($y1 == 0) { 
  19062.             if ($divider == 'pagebottom') { 
  19063.                 $y1 = $this->h - $this->bMargin; 
  19064.             } else { 
  19065.                 $y1 = $this->y; 
  19066.             } 
  19067.         } 
  19068.  
  19069.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['startpage']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['startpage'] != $this->page) { 
  19070.             $continuingpage = true; 
  19071.         } else { 
  19072.             $continuingpage = false; 
  19073.         } 
  19074.  
  19075.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['y0'])) { 
  19076.             $y0 = $this->blk[$blvl]['y0']; 
  19077.         } 
  19078.         $h = $y1 - $y0; 
  19079.         $w = $this->blk[$blvl]['width']; 
  19080.         $x1 = $x0 + $w; 
  19081.  
  19082.         // Set border-widths as used here 
  19083.         $border_top = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  19084.         $border_bottom = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w']; 
  19085.         $border_left = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w']; 
  19086.         $border_right = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w']; 
  19087.         if (!$this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] || $divider == 'pagetop' || $continuingpage) { 
  19088.             $border_top = 0; 
  19089.         } 
  19090.         if (!$this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] || $blockstate == 1 || $divider == 'pagebottom') { 
  19091.             $border_bottom = 0; 
  19092.         } 
  19093.  
  19094.         $brTL_H = 0; 
  19095.         $brTL_V = 0; 
  19096.         $brTR_H = 0; 
  19097.         $brTR_V = 0; 
  19098.         $brBL_H = 0; 
  19099.         $brBL_V = 0; 
  19100.         $brBR_H = 0; 
  19101.         $brBR_V = 0; 
  19102.  
  19103.         $brset = false; 
  19104.         /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19105.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TL_H'])) { 
  19106.             $brTL_H = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TL_H']; 
  19107.             $brset = true; 
  19108.         } 
  19109.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TL_V'])) { 
  19110.             $brTL_V = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TL_V']; 
  19111.             $brset = true; 
  19112.         } 
  19113.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TR_H'])) { 
  19114.             $brTR_H = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TR_H']; 
  19115.             $brset = true; 
  19116.         } 
  19117.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TR_V'])) { 
  19118.             $brTR_V = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TR_V']; 
  19119.             $brset = true; 
  19120.         } 
  19121.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BR_H'])) { 
  19122.             $brBR_H = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BR_H']; 
  19123.             $brset = true; 
  19124.         } 
  19125.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BR_V'])) { 
  19126.             $brBR_V = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BR_V']; 
  19127.             $brset = true; 
  19128.         } 
  19129.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BL_H'])) { 
  19130.             $brBL_H = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BL_H']; 
  19131.             $brset = true; 
  19132.         } 
  19133.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BL_V'])) { 
  19134.             $brBL_V = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BL_V']; 
  19135.             $brset = true; 
  19136.         } 
  19137.  
  19138.         if (!$this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] || $divider == 'pagetop' || $continuingpage) { 
  19139.             $brTL_H = 0; 
  19140.             $brTL_V = 0; 
  19141.             $brTR_H = 0; 
  19142.             $brTR_V = 0; 
  19143.         } 
  19144.         if (!$this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] || $blockstate == 1 || $divider == 'pagebottom') { 
  19145.             $brBL_H = 0; 
  19146.             $brBL_V = 0; 
  19147.             $brBR_H = 0; 
  19148.             $brBR_V = 0; 
  19149.         } 
  19150.  
  19151.         // Disallow border-radius if it is smaller than the border width. 
  19152.         if ($brTL_H < min($border_left, $border_top)) { 
  19153.             $brTL_H = $brTL_V = 0; 
  19154.         } 
  19155.         if ($brTL_V < min($border_left, $border_top)) { 
  19156.             $brTL_V = $brTL_H = 0; 
  19157.         } 
  19158.         if ($brTR_H < min($border_right, $border_top)) { 
  19159.             $brTR_H = $brTR_V = 0; 
  19160.         } 
  19161.         if ($brTR_V < min($border_right, $border_top)) { 
  19162.             $brTR_V = $brTR_H = 0; 
  19163.         } 
  19164.         if ($brBL_H < min($border_left, $border_bottom)) { 
  19165.             $brBL_H = $brBL_V = 0; 
  19166.         } 
  19167.         if ($brBL_V < min($border_left, $border_bottom)) { 
  19168.             $brBL_V = $brBL_H = 0; 
  19169.         } 
  19170.         if ($brBR_H < min($border_right, $border_bottom)) { 
  19171.             $brBR_H = $brBR_V = 0; 
  19172.         } 
  19173.         if ($brBR_V < min($border_right, $border_bottom)) { 
  19174.             $brBR_V = $brBR_H = 0; 
  19175.         } 
  19176.  
  19177.         // CHECK FOR radii that sum to > width or height of div ******** 
  19178.         $f = min($h / ($brTL_V + $brBL_V + 0.001), $h / ($brTR_V + $brBR_V + 0.001), $w / ($brTL_H + $brTR_H + 0.001), $w / ($brBL_H + $brBR_H + 0.001)); 
  19179.         if ($f < 1) { 
  19180.             $brTL_H *= $f; 
  19181.             $brTL_V *= $f; 
  19182.             $brTR_H *= $f; 
  19183.             $brTR_V *= $f; 
  19184.             $brBL_H *= $f; 
  19185.             $brBL_V *= $f; 
  19186.             $brBR_H *= $f; 
  19187.             $brBR_V *= $f; 
  19188.         } 
  19189.         /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19190.  
  19191.         $tbcol = $this->ConvertColor(255); 
  19192.         for ($l = 0; $l <= $blvl; $l++) { 
  19193.             if ($this->blk[$l]['bgcolor']) { 
  19194.                 $tbcol = $this->blk[$l]['bgcolorarray']; 
  19195.             } 
  19196.         } 
  19197.  
  19198.         // BORDERS 
  19199.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['y0']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['y0']) { 
  19200.             $y0 = $this->blk[$blvl]['y0']; 
  19201.         } 
  19202.         $h = $y1 - $y0; 
  19203.         $w = $this->blk[$blvl]['width']; 
  19204.  
  19205.         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && $divider != 'pagetop' && !$continuingpage) { 
  19206.             $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']; 
  19207.  
  19208.             $legend = ''; 
  19209.             $legbreakL = 0; 
  19210.             $legbreakR = 0; 
  19211.             // BORDER LEGEND 
  19212.             if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_legend']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['border_legend']) { 
  19213.                 $legend = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_legend']; // Same structure array as textbuffer 
  19214.                 $txt = $legend[0] = ltrim($legend[0]); 
  19215.                 if (!empty($legend[18])) { 
  19216.                     $this->otl->trimOTLdata($legend[18], true, false); 
  19217.                 } // *OTL* 
  19218.                 //Set font, size, style, color 
  19219.                 $this->SetFont($legend[4], $legend[2], $legend[11]); 
  19220.                 if (isset($legend[3]) && $legend[3]) { 
  19221.                     $cor = $legend[3]; 
  19222.                     $this->SetTColor($cor); 
  19223.                 } 
  19224.                 $stringWidth = $this->GetStringWidth($txt, true, $legend[18], $legend[8]); 
  19225.                 $save_x = $this->x; 
  19226.                 $save_y = $this->y; 
  19227.                 $save_currentfontfamily = $this->FontFamily; 
  19228.                 $save_currentfontsize = $this->FontSizePt; 
  19229.                 $save_currentfontstyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  19230.                 $this->y = $y0 - $this->FontSize / 2 + $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w'] / 2; 
  19231.                 $this->x = $x0 + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w']; 
  19232.  
  19233.                 // Set the distance from the border line to the text ? make configurable variable 
  19234.                 $gap = 0.2 * $this->FontSize; 
  19235.                 $legbreakL = $this->x - $gap; 
  19236.                 $legbreakR = $this->x + $stringWidth + $gap; 
  19237.                 $this->magic_reverse_dir($txt, $this->blk[$blvl]['direction'], $legend[18]); 
  19238.                 $fill = ''; 
  19239.                 $this->Cell($stringWidth, $this->FontSize, $txt, '', 0, 'C', $fill, '', 0, 0, 0, 'M', $fill, false, $legend[18], $legend[8]); 
  19240.                 // Reset 
  19241.                 $this->x = $save_x; 
  19242.                 $this->y = $save_y; 
  19243.                 $this->SetFont($save_currentfontfamily, $save_currentfontstyle, $save_currentfontsize); 
  19244.                 $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  19245.             } 
  19246.  
  19247.             if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) { 
  19248.                 if (!$brset && $tbd['style'] != 'dotted' && $tbd['style'] != 'dashed') { 
  19249.                     $this->_out('q'); 
  19250.                     $this->SetLineWidth(0); 
  19251.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19252.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $border_left) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $border_top)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19253.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w - $border_right) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $border_top)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19254.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19255.                     $this->_out(' h W n '); // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  19256.                 } 
  19257.  
  19258.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd); 
  19259.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  19260.                     $legbreakL -= $border_top / 2; // because line cap different 
  19261.                     $legbreakR += $border_top / 2; 
  19262.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], $divider, $continuingpage, 'T'); 
  19263.                 } 
  19264.                 /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ elseif (($brTL_V && $brTL_H) || ($brTR_V && $brTR_H) || $tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19265.                     $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  19266.                     $this->SetLineCap(0); 
  19267.                 } 
  19268.                 $s = ''; 
  19269.                 if ($brTR_H && $brTR_V) { 
  19270.                     $s .= ($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $w - $brTR_H, $y0 + $brTR_V, $brTR_H - $border_top / 2, $brTR_V - $border_top / 2, 1, 2, true)) . "\n"; 
  19271.                 } else 
  19272.                 /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19273.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19274.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0 + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19275.                 } else { 
  19276.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0 + $w - ($border_top / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19277.                 } 
  19278.                 /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19279.                 if ($brTL_H && $brTL_V) { 
  19280.                     if ($legend) { 
  19281.                         if ($legbreakR < ($x0 + $w - $brTR_H)) { 
  19282.                             $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', $legbreakR * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19283.                         } 
  19284.                         if ($legbreakL > ($x0 + $brTL_H )) { 
  19285.                             $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', $legbreakL * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19286.                             $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $brTL_H ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK) . "\n"); 
  19287.                         } else { 
  19288.                             $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0 + $brTL_H ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19289.                         } 
  19290.                     } else { 
  19291.                         $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $brTL_H ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19292.                     } 
  19293.                     $s .= ($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $brTL_H, $y0 + $brTL_V, $brTL_H - $border_top / 2, $brTL_V - $border_top / 2, 2, 1)) . "\n"; 
  19294.                 } else { 
  19295.                     /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19296.                     if ($legend) { 
  19297.                         if ($legbreakR < ($x0 + $w)) { 
  19298.                             $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', $legbreakR * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19299.                         } 
  19300.                         if ($legbreakL > ($x0)) { 
  19301.                             $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', $legbreakL * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19302.                             if ($tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19303.                                 $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19304.                             } else { 
  19305.                                 $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + ($border_top / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19306.                             } 
  19307.                         } elseif ($tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19308.                             $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19309.                         } else { 
  19310.                             $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0 + $border_top / 2) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19311.                         } 
  19312.                     } elseif ($tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19313.                         $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19314.                     } else { 
  19315.                         $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + ($border_top / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_top / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19316.                     } 
  19317.                     /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19318.                 } 
  19319.                 /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19320.                 $s .= 'S' . "\n"; 
  19321.                 $this->_out($s); 
  19322.  
  19323.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19324.                     $this->SetLineWidth($tbd['w'] / 3); 
  19325.                     $this->SetDColor($tbcol); 
  19326.                     $this->_out($s); 
  19327.                 } 
  19328.                 if (!$brset && $tbd['style'] != 'dotted' && $tbd['style'] != 'dashed') { 
  19329.                     $this->_out('Q'); 
  19330.                 } 
  19331.  
  19332.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  19333.                 $this->SetLineWidth(0.1); 
  19334.                 $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  19335.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  19336.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  19337.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  19338.             } 
  19339.         } 
  19340.         // Reinstate line above for dotted line divider when block border crosses a page 
  19341.         //elseif ($divider == 'pagetop' || $continuingpage) { 
  19342.  
  19343.         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $blockstate != 1 && $divider != 'pagebottom') { 
  19344.             $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']; 
  19345.             if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) { 
  19346.                 if (!$brset && $tbd['style'] != 'dotted' && $tbd['style'] != 'dashed') { 
  19347.                     $this->_out('q'); 
  19348.                     $this->SetLineWidth(0); 
  19349.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19350.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $border_left) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - $border_bottom)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19351.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w - $border_right) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - $border_bottom)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19352.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19353.                     $this->_out(' h W n '); // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  19354.                 } 
  19355.  
  19356.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd); 
  19357.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  19358.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], $divider, $continuingpage, 'B'); 
  19359.                 } 
  19360.                 /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ elseif (($brBL_V && $brBL_H) || ($brBR_V && $brBR_H) || $tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19361.                     $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  19362.                     $this->SetLineCap(0); 
  19363.                 } 
  19364.                 $s = ''; 
  19365.                 if ($brBL_H && $brBL_V) { 
  19366.                     $s .= ($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $brBL_H, $y0 + $h - $brBL_V, $brBL_H - $border_bottom / 2, $brBL_V - $border_bottom / 2, 3, 2, true)) . "\n"; 
  19367.                 } else 
  19368.                 /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19369.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19370.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - ($border_bottom / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19371.                 } else { 
  19372.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0 + ($border_bottom / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - ($border_bottom / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19373.                 } 
  19374.                 /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19375.                 if ($brBR_H && $brBR_V) { 
  19376.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w - ($border_bottom / 2) - $brBR_H ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - ($border_bottom / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19377.                     $s .= ($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $w - $brBR_H, $y0 + $h - $brBR_V, $brBR_H - $border_bottom / 2, $brBR_V - $border_bottom / 2, 4, 1)) . "\n"; 
  19378.                 } else 
  19379.                 /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19380.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19381.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - ($border_bottom / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19382.                 } else { 
  19383.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w - ($border_bottom / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - ($border_bottom / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19384.                 } 
  19385.                 $s .= 'S' . "\n"; 
  19386.                 $this->_out($s); 
  19387.  
  19388.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19389.                     $this->SetLineWidth($tbd['w'] / 3); 
  19390.                     $this->SetDColor($tbcol); 
  19391.                     $this->_out($s); 
  19392.                 } 
  19393.                 if (!$brset && $tbd['style'] != 'dotted' && $tbd['style'] != 'dashed') { 
  19394.                     $this->_out('Q'); 
  19395.                 } 
  19396.  
  19397.  
  19398.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  19399.                 $this->SetLineWidth(0.1); 
  19400.                 $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  19401.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  19402.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  19403.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  19404.             } 
  19405.         } 
  19406.         // Reinstate line below for dotted line divider when block border crosses a page 
  19407.         //elseif ($blockstate == 1 || $divider == 'pagebottom') { 
  19408.  
  19409.         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']) { 
  19410.             $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']; 
  19411.             if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) { 
  19412.                 if (!$brset && $tbd['style'] != 'dotted' && $tbd['style'] != 'dashed') { 
  19413.                     $this->_out('q'); 
  19414.                     $this->SetLineWidth(0); 
  19415.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19416.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $border_left) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $border_top)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19417.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $border_left) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - $border_bottom)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19418.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19419.                     $this->_out(' h W n '); // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  19420.                 } 
  19421.  
  19422.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd); 
  19423.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  19424.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], $divider, $continuingpage, 'L'); 
  19425.                 } 
  19426.                 /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ elseif (($brTL_V && $brTL_H) || ($brBL_V && $brBL_H) || $tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19427.                     $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  19428.                     $this->SetLineCap(0); 
  19429.                 } 
  19430.                 $s = ''; 
  19431.                 if ($brTL_V && $brTL_H) { 
  19432.                     $s .= ($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $brTL_H, $y0 + $brTL_V, $brTL_H - $border_left / 2, $brTL_V - $border_left / 2, 2, 2, true)) . "\n"; 
  19433.                 } else 
  19434.                 /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19435.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19436.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0 + ($border_left / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0)) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19437.                 } else { 
  19438.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0 + ($border_left / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_left / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19439.                 } 
  19440.                 /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19441.                 if ($brBL_V && $brBL_H) { 
  19442.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + ($border_left / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - ($border_left / 2) - $brBL_V) ) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19443.                     $s .= ($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $brBL_H, $y0 + $h - $brBL_V, $brBL_H - $border_left / 2, $brBL_V - $border_left / 2, 3, 1)) . "\n"; 
  19444.                 } else 
  19445.                 /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19446.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19447.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + ($border_left / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h) ) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19448.                 } else { 
  19449.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + ($border_left / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - ($border_left / 2)) ) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19450.                 } 
  19451.                 $s .= 'S' . "\n"; 
  19452.                 $this->_out($s); 
  19453.  
  19454.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19455.                     $this->SetLineWidth($tbd['w'] / 3); 
  19456.                     $this->SetDColor($tbcol); 
  19457.                     $this->_out($s); 
  19458.                 } 
  19459.                 if (!$brset && $tbd['style'] != 'dotted' && $tbd['style'] != 'dashed') { 
  19460.                     $this->_out('Q'); 
  19461.                 } 
  19462.  
  19463.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  19464.                 $this->SetLineWidth(0.1); 
  19465.                 $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  19466.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  19467.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  19468.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  19469.             } 
  19470.         } 
  19471.         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']) { 
  19472.             $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']; 
  19473.             if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) { 
  19474.                 if (!$brset && $tbd['style'] != 'dotted' && $tbd['style'] != 'dashed') { 
  19475.                     $this->_out('q'); 
  19476.                     $this->SetLineWidth(0); 
  19477.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0 + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19478.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w - $border_right) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $border_top)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19479.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w - $border_right) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - $border_bottom)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19480.                     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h)) * _MPDFK)); 
  19481.                     $this->_out(' h W n '); // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  19482.                 } 
  19483.  
  19484.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd); 
  19485.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  19486.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], $divider, $continuingpage, 'R'); 
  19487.                 } 
  19488.                 /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ elseif (($brTR_V && $brTR_H) || ($brBR_V && $brBR_H) || $tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19489.                     $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  19490.                     $this->SetLineCap(0); 
  19491.                 } 
  19492.                 $s = ''; 
  19493.                 if ($brBR_V && $brBR_H) { 
  19494.                     $s .= ($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $w - $brBR_H, $y0 + $h - $brBR_V, $brBR_H - $border_right / 2, $brBR_V - $border_right / 2, 4, 2, true)) . "\n"; 
  19495.                 } else 
  19496.                 /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19497.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19498.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0 + $w - ($border_right / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h)) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19499.                 } else { 
  19500.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($x0 + $w - ($border_right / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + $h - ($border_right / 2))) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19501.                 } 
  19502.                 /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19503.                 if ($brTR_V && $brTR_H) { 
  19504.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w - ($border_right / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_right / 2) + $brTR_V) ) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19505.                     $s .= ($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $w - $brTR_H, $y0 + $brTR_V, $brTR_H - $border_right / 2, $brTR_V - $border_right / 2, 1, 1)) . "\n"; 
  19506.                 } else 
  19507.                 /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19508.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'solid' || $tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19509.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w - ($border_right / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0) ) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19510.                 } else { 
  19511.                     $s .= (sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($x0 + $w - ($border_right / 2)) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($y0 + ($border_right / 2)) ) * _MPDFK)) . "\n"; 
  19512.                 } 
  19513.                 $s .= 'S' . "\n"; 
  19514.                 $this->_out($s); 
  19515.  
  19516.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'double') { 
  19517.                     $this->SetLineWidth($tbd['w'] / 3); 
  19518.                     $this->SetDColor($tbcol); 
  19519.                     $this->_out($s); 
  19520.                 } 
  19521.                 if (!$brset && $tbd['style'] != 'dotted' && $tbd['style'] != 'dashed') { 
  19522.                     $this->_out('Q'); 
  19523.                 } 
  19524.  
  19525.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  19526.                 $this->SetLineWidth(0.1); 
  19527.                 $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  19528.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  19529.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  19530.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  19531.             } 
  19532.         } 
  19533.  
  19534.  
  19535.         $this->SetDash(); 
  19536.         $this->y = $save_y; 
  19537.  
  19538.  
  19539.         // BACKGROUNDS are disabled in columns/kbt/headers - messes up the repositioning in printcolumnbuffer 
  19540.         if ($this->ColActive || $this->kwt || $this->keep_block_together) { 
  19541.             return; 
  19542.         } 
  19543.  
  19544.  
  19545.         $bgx0 = $x0; 
  19546.         $bgx1 = $x1; 
  19547.         $bgy0 = $y0; 
  19548.         $bgy1 = $y1; 
  19549.  
  19550.         // Defined br values represent the radius of the outer curve - need to take border-width/2 from each radius for drawing the borders 
  19551.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['background_clip']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['background_clip'] == 'padding-box') { 
  19552.             $brbgTL_H = max(0, $brTL_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w']); 
  19553.             $brbgTL_V = max(0, $brTL_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w']); 
  19554.             $brbgTR_H = max(0, $brTR_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w']); 
  19555.             $brbgTR_V = max(0, $brTR_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w']); 
  19556.             $brbgBL_H = max(0, $brBL_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w']); 
  19557.             $brbgBL_V = max(0, $brBL_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w']); 
  19558.             $brbgBR_H = max(0, $brBR_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w']); 
  19559.             $brbgBR_V = max(0, $brBR_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w']); 
  19560.             $bgx0 += $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w']; 
  19561.             $bgx1 -= $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w']; 
  19562.             if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && $divider != 'pagetop' && !$continuingpage) { 
  19563.                 $bgy0 += $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  19564.             } 
  19565.             if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $blockstate != 1 && $divider != 'pagebottom') { 
  19566.                 $bgy1 -= $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w']; 
  19567.             } 
  19568.         } elseif (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['background_clip']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['background_clip'] == 'content-box') { 
  19569.             $brbgTL_H = max(0, $brTL_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'] - $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_left']); 
  19570.             $brbgTL_V = max(0, $brTL_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w'] - $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_top']); 
  19571.             $brbgTR_H = max(0, $brTR_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w'] - $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_right']); 
  19572.             $brbgTR_V = max(0, $brTR_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w'] - $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_top']); 
  19573.             $brbgBL_H = max(0, $brBL_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'] - $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_left']); 
  19574.             $brbgBL_V = max(0, $brBL_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w'] - $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_bottom']); 
  19575.             $brbgBR_H = max(0, $brBR_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w'] - $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_right']); 
  19576.             $brbgBR_V = max(0, $brBR_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w'] - $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_bottom']); 
  19577.             $bgx0 += $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_left']; 
  19578.             $bgx1 -= $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_right']; 
  19579.             if (($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w'] || $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_top']) && $divider != 'pagetop' && !$continuingpage) { 
  19580.                 $bgy0 += $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_top']; 
  19581.             } 
  19582.             if (($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w'] || $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_bottom']) && $blockstate != 1 && $divider != 'pagebottom') { 
  19583.                 $bgy1 -= $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_bottom']; 
  19584.             } 
  19585.         } else { 
  19586.             $brbgTL_H = $brTL_H; 
  19587.             $brbgTL_V = $brTL_V; 
  19588.             $brbgTR_H = $brTR_H; 
  19589.             $brbgTR_V = $brTR_V; 
  19590.             $brbgBL_H = $brBL_H; 
  19591.             $brbgBL_V = $brBL_V; 
  19592.             $brbgBR_H = $brBR_H; 
  19593.             $brbgBR_V = $brBR_V; 
  19594.         } 
  19595.  
  19596.         // Set clipping path 
  19597.         $s = ' q 0 w '; // Line width=0 
  19598.         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($bgx0 + $brbgTL_H ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bgy0) * _MPDFK); // start point TL before the arc 
  19599.         /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19600.         if ($brbgTL_H || $brbgTL_V) { 
  19601.             $s .= $this->_EllipseArc($bgx0 + $brbgTL_H, $bgy0 + $brbgTL_V, $brbgTL_H, $brbgTL_V, 2); // segment 2 TL 
  19602.         } 
  19603.         /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19604.         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($bgx0) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($bgy1 - $brbgBL_V )) * _MPDFK); // line to BL 
  19605.         /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19606.         if ($brbgBL_H || $brbgBL_V) { 
  19607.             $s .= $this->_EllipseArc($bgx0 + $brbgBL_H, $bgy1 - $brbgBL_V, $brbgBL_H, $brbgBL_V, 3); // segment 3 BL 
  19608.         } 
  19609.         /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19610.         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($bgx1 - $brbgBR_H ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($bgy1)) * _MPDFK); // line to BR 
  19611.         /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19612.         if ($brbgBR_H || $brbgBR_V) { 
  19613.             $s .= $this->_EllipseArc($bgx1 - $brbgBR_H, $bgy1 - $brbgBR_V, $brbgBR_H, $brbgBR_V, 4); // segment 4 BR 
  19614.         } 
  19615.         /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19616.         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($bgx1) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($bgy0 + $brbgTR_V)) * _MPDFK); // line to TR 
  19617.         /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19618.         if ($brbgTR_H || $brbgTR_V) { 
  19619.             $s .= $this->_EllipseArc($bgx1 - $brbgTR_H, $bgy0 + $brbgTR_V, $brbgTR_H, $brbgTR_V, 1); // segment 1 TR 
  19620.         } 
  19621.         /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  19622.         $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($bgx0 + $brbgTL_H ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $bgy0) * _MPDFK); // line to TL 
  19623.         // Box Shadow 
  19624.         $shadow = ''; 
  19625.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['box_shadow']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['box_shadow'] && $h > 0) { 
  19626.             foreach ($this->blk[$blvl]['box_shadow'] AS $sh) { 
  19627.                 // Colors 
  19628.                 if ($sh['col']{0} == 1) { 
  19629.                     $colspace = 'Gray'; 
  19630.                     if ($sh['col']{2} == 1) { 
  19631.                         $col1 = '1' . $sh['col'][1] . '1' . $sh['col'][3]; 
  19632.                     } else { 
  19633.                         $col1 = '1' . $sh['col'][1] . '1' . chr(100); 
  19634.                     } 
  19635.                     $col2 = '1' . $sh['col'][1] . '1' . chr(0); 
  19636.                 } elseif ($sh['col']{0} == 4) { // CMYK 
  19637.                     $colspace = 'CMYK'; 
  19638.                     $col1 = '6' . $sh['col'][1] . $sh['col'][2] . $sh['col'][3] . $sh['col'][4] . chr(100); 
  19639.                     $col2 = '6' . $sh['col'][1] . $sh['col'][2] . $sh['col'][3] . $sh['col'][4] . chr(0); 
  19640.                 } elseif ($sh['col']{0} == 5) { // RGBa 
  19641.                     $colspace = 'RGB'; 
  19642.                     $col1 = '5' . $sh['col'][1] . $sh['col'][2] . $sh['col'][3] . $sh['col'][4]; 
  19643.                     $col2 = '5' . $sh['col'][1] . $sh['col'][2] . $sh['col'][3] . chr(0); 
  19644.                 } elseif ($sh['col']{0} == 6) { // CMYKa 
  19645.                     $colspace = 'CMYK'; 
  19646.                     $col1 = '6' . $sh['col'][1] . $sh['col'][2] . $sh['col'][3] . $sh['col'][4] . $sh['col'][5]; 
  19647.                     $col2 = '6' . $sh['col'][1] . $sh['col'][2] . $sh['col'][3] . $sh['col'][4] . chr(0); 
  19648.                 } else { 
  19649.                     $colspace = 'RGB'; 
  19650.                     $col1 = '5' . $sh['col'][1] . $sh['col'][2] . $sh['col'][3] . chr(100); 
  19651.                     $col2 = '5' . $sh['col'][1] . $sh['col'][2] . $sh['col'][3] . chr(0); 
  19652.                 } 
  19653.  
  19654.                 // Use clipping path as set above (and rectangle around page) to clip area outside box 
  19655.                 $shadow .= $s; // Use the clipping path with W* 
  19656.                 $shadow .= sprintf('0 %.3F m %.3F %.3F l ', $this->h * _MPDFK, $this->w * _MPDFK, $this->h * _MPDFK); 
  19657.                 $shadow .= sprintf('%.3F 0 l 0 0 l 0 %.3F l ', $this->w * _MPDFK, $this->h * _MPDFK); 
  19658.                 $shadow .= 'W n' . "\n"; 
  19659.  
  19660.                 $sh['blur'] = abs($sh['blur']); // cannot have negative blur value 
  19661.                 // Ensure spread/blur do not make effective shadow width/height < 0 
  19662.                 // Could do more complex things but this just adjusts spread value 
  19663.                 if (-$sh['spread'] + $sh['blur'] / 2 > min($w / 2, $h / 2)) { 
  19664.                     $sh['spread'] = $sh['blur'] / 2 - min($w / 2, $h / 2) + 0.01; 
  19665.                 } 
  19666.                 // Shadow Offset 
  19667.                 if ($sh['x'] || $sh['y']) 
  19668.                     $shadow .= sprintf(' q 1 0 0 1 %.4F %.4F cm', $sh['x'] * _MPDFK, -$sh['y'] * _MPDFK) . "\n"; 
  19669.  
  19670.                 // Set path for INNER shadow 
  19671.                 $shadow .= ' q 0 w '; 
  19672.                 $shadow .= $this->SetFColor($col1, true) . "\n"; 
  19673.                 if ($col1{0} == 5 && ord($col1{4}) < 100) { // RGBa 
  19674.                     $shadow .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($col1{4}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  19675.                 } elseif ($col1{0} == 6 && ord($col1{5}) < 100) { // CMYKa 
  19676.                     $shadow .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($col1{5}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  19677.                 } elseif ($col1{0} == 1 && $col1{2} == 1 && ord($col1{3}) < 100) { // Gray 
  19678.                     $shadow .= $this->SetAlpha(ord($col1{3}) / 100, 'Normal', true, 'F') . "\n"; 
  19679.                 } 
  19680.  
  19681.                 // Blur edges 
  19682.                 $mag = 0.551784; // Bezier Control magic number for 4-part spline for circle/ellipse 
  19683.                 $mag2 = 0.551784; // Bezier Control magic number to fill in edge of blurred rectangle 
  19684.                 $d1 = $sh['spread'] + $sh['blur'] / 2; 
  19685.                 $d2 = $sh['spread'] - $sh['blur'] / 2; 
  19686.                 $bl = $sh['blur']; 
  19687.                 $x00 = $x0 - $d1; 
  19688.                 $y00 = $y0 - $d1; 
  19689.                 $w00 = $w + $d1 * 2; 
  19690.                 $h00 = $h + $d1 * 2; 
  19691.  
  19692.                 // If any border-radius is greater width-negative spread(inner edge), ignore radii for shadow or screws up 
  19693.                 $flatten = false; 
  19694.                 if (max($brbgTR_H, $brbgTL_H, $brbgBR_H, $brbgBL_H) >= $w + $d2) { 
  19695.                     $flatten = true; 
  19696.                 } 
  19697.                 if (max($brbgTR_V, $brbgTL_V, $brbgBR_V, $brbgBL_V) >= $h + $d2) { 
  19698.                     $flatten = true; 
  19699.                 } 
  19700.  
  19701.  
  19702.                 // TOP RIGHT corner 
  19703.                 $p1x = $x00 + $w00 - $d1 - $brbgTR_H; 
  19704.                 $p1c2x = $p1x + ($d2 + $brbgTR_H) * $mag; 
  19705.                 $p1y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19706.                 $p2x = $x00 + $w00 - $d1 - $brbgTR_H; 
  19707.                 $p2c2x = $p2x + ($d1 + $brbgTR_H) * $mag; 
  19708.                 $p2y = $y00; 
  19709.                 $p2c1y = $p2y + $bl / 2; 
  19710.                 $p3x = $x00 + $w00; 
  19711.                 $p3c2x = $p3x - $bl / 2; 
  19712.                 $p3y = $y00 + $d1 + $brbgTR_V; 
  19713.                 $p3c1y = $p3y - ($d1 + $brbgTR_V) * $mag; 
  19714.                 $p4x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; 
  19715.                 $p4y = $y00 + $d1 + $brbgTR_V; 
  19716.                 $p4c2y = $p4y - ($d2 + $brbgTR_V) * $mag; 
  19717.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgTR_H, $brbgTR_V) || $flatten) { 
  19718.                     $p1x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; 
  19719.                     $p1c2x = $p1x; 
  19720.                     $p2x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; 
  19721.                     $p2c2x = $p2x + $bl * $mag2; 
  19722.                     $p3y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19723.                     $p3c1y = $p3y - $bl * $mag2; 
  19724.                     $p4y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19725.                     $p4c2y = $p4y; 
  19726.                 } 
  19727.  
  19728.                 $shadow .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', ($p1x ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p1y )) * _MPDFK); 
  19729.                 $shadow .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c ', ($p1c2x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p1y)) * _MPDFK, ($p4x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p4c2y)) * _MPDFK, ($p4x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p4y)) * _MPDFK); 
  19730.                 $patch_array[0]['f'] = 0; 
  19731.                 $patch_array[0]['points'] = array($p1x, $p1y, $p1x, $p1y,  
  19732.                     $p2x, $p2c1y, $p2x, $p2y, $p2c2x, $p2y,  
  19733.                     $p3x, $p3c1y, $p3x, $p3y, $p3c2x, $p3y,  
  19734.                     $p4x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4c2y,  
  19735.                     $p1c2x, $p1y); 
  19736.                 $patch_array[0]['colors'] = array($col1, $col2, $col2, $col1); 
  19737.  
  19738.  
  19739.                 // RIGHT 
  19740.                 $p1x = $x00 + $w00; // control point only matches p3 preceding 
  19741.                 $p1y = $y00 + $d1 + $brbgTR_V; 
  19742.                 $p2x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; // control point only matches p4 preceding 
  19743.                 $p2y = $y00 + $d1 + $brbgTR_V; 
  19744.                 $p3x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; 
  19745.                 $p3y = $y00 + $h00 - $d1 - $brbgBR_V; 
  19746.                 $p4x = $x00 + $w00; 
  19747.                 $p4c1x = $p4x - $bl / 2; 
  19748.                 $p4y = $y00 + $h00 - $d1 - $brbgBR_V; 
  19749.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgTR_H, $brbgTR_V) || $flatten) { 
  19750.                     $p1y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19751.                     $p2y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19752.                 } 
  19753.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgBR_H, $brbgBR_V) || $flatten) { 
  19754.                     $p3y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19755.                     $p4y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19756.                 } 
  19757.  
  19758.                 $shadow .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($p3x ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p3y )) * _MPDFK); 
  19759.                 $patch_array[1]['f'] = 2; 
  19760.                 $patch_array[1]['points'] = array($p2x, $p2y,  
  19761.                     $p3x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3y,  
  19762.                     $p4c1x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4y,  
  19763.                     $p1x, $p1y); 
  19764.                 $patch_array[1]['colors'] = array($col1, $col2); 
  19765.  
  19766.  
  19767.                 // BOTTOM RIGHT corner 
  19768.                 $p1x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl;  // control points only matches p3 preceding 
  19769.                 $p1y = $y00 + $h00 - $d1 - $brbgBR_V; 
  19770.                 $p1c2y = $p1y + ($d2 + $brbgBR_V) * $mag; 
  19771.                 $p2x = $x00 + $w00;     // control point only matches p4 preceding 
  19772.                 $p2y = $y00 + $h00 - $d1 - $brbgBR_V; 
  19773.                 $p2c2y = $p2y + ($d1 + $brbgBR_V) * $mag; 
  19774.                 $p3x = $x00 + $w00 - $d1 - $brbgBR_H; 
  19775.                 $p3c1x = $p3x + ($d1 + $brbgBR_H) * $mag; 
  19776.                 $p3y = $y00 + $h00; 
  19777.                 $p3c2y = $p3y - $bl / 2; 
  19778.                 $p4x = $x00 + $w00 - $d1 - $brbgBR_H; 
  19779.                 $p4c2x = $p4x + ($d2 + $brbgBR_H) * $mag; 
  19780.                 $p4y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19781.  
  19782.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgBR_H, $brbgBR_V) || $flatten) { 
  19783.                     $p1y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19784.                     $p1c2y = $p1y; 
  19785.                     $p2y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19786.                     $p2c2y = $p2y + $bl * $mag2; 
  19787.                     $p3x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; 
  19788.                     $p3c1x = $p3x + $bl * $mag2; 
  19789.                     $p4x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; 
  19790.                     $p4c2x = $p4x; 
  19791.                 } 
  19792.  
  19793.                 $shadow .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c ', ($p1x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p1c2y)) * _MPDFK, ($p4c2x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p4y)) * _MPDFK, ($p4x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p4y)) * _MPDFK); 
  19794.                 $patch_array[2]['f'] = 2; 
  19795.                 $patch_array[2]['points'] = array($p2x, $p2c2y,  
  19796.                     $p3c1x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3c2y,  
  19797.                     $p4x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4y, $p4c2x, $p4y,  
  19798.                     $p1x, $p1c2y); 
  19799.                 $patch_array[2]['colors'] = array($col2, $col1); 
  19800.  
  19801.  
  19802.  
  19803.                 // BOTTOM 
  19804.                 $p1x = $x00 + $w00 - $d1 - $brbgBR_H; // control point only matches p3 preceding 
  19805.                 $p1y = $y00 + $h00; 
  19806.                 $p2x = $x00 + $w00 - $d1 - $brbgBR_H; // control point only matches p4 preceding 
  19807.                 $p2y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19808.                 $p3x = $x00 + $d1 + $brbgBL_H; 
  19809.                 $p3y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19810.                 $p4x = $x00 + $d1 + $brbgBL_H; 
  19811.                 $p4y = $y00 + $h00; 
  19812.                 $p4c1y = $p4y - $bl / 2; 
  19813.  
  19814.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgBR_H, $brbgBR_V) || $flatten) { 
  19815.                     $p1x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; 
  19816.                     $p2x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; 
  19817.                 } 
  19818.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgBL_H, $brbgBL_V) || $flatten) { 
  19819.                     $p3x = $x00 + $bl; 
  19820.                     $p4x = $x00 + $bl; 
  19821.                 } 
  19822.  
  19823.                 $shadow .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($p3x ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p3y )) * _MPDFK); 
  19824.                 $patch_array[3]['f'] = 2; 
  19825.                 $patch_array[3]['points'] = array($p2x, $p2y,  
  19826.                     $p3x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3y,  
  19827.                     $p4x, $p4c1y, $p4x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4y,  
  19828.                     $p1x, $p1y); 
  19829.                 $patch_array[3]['colors'] = array($col1, $col2); 
  19830.  
  19831.                 // BOTTOM LEFT corner 
  19832.                 $p1x = $x00 + $d1 + $brbgBL_H; 
  19833.                 $p1c2x = $p1x - ($d2 + $brbgBL_H) * $mag; // control points only matches p3 preceding 
  19834.                 $p1y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19835.                 $p2x = $x00 + $d1 + $brbgBL_H; 
  19836.                 $p2c2x = $p2x - ($d1 + $brbgBL_H) * $mag; // control point only matches p4 preceding 
  19837.                 $p2y = $y00 + $h00; 
  19838.                 $p3x = $x00; 
  19839.                 $p3c2x = $p3x + $bl / 2; 
  19840.                 $p3y = $y00 + $h00 - $d1 - $brbgBL_V; 
  19841.                 $p3c1y = $p3y + ($d1 + $brbgBL_V) * $mag; 
  19842.                 $p4x = $x00 + $bl; 
  19843.                 $p4y = $y00 + $h00 - $d1 - $brbgBL_V; 
  19844.                 $p4c2y = $p4y + ($d2 + $brbgBL_V) * $mag; 
  19845.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgBL_H, $brbgBL_V) || $flatten) { 
  19846.                     $p1x = $x00 + $bl; 
  19847.                     $p1c2x = $p1x; 
  19848.                     $p2x = $x00 + $bl; 
  19849.                     $p2c2x = $p2x - $bl * $mag2; 
  19850.                     $p3y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19851.                     $p3c1y = $p3y + $bl * $mag2; 
  19852.                     $p4y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19853.                     $p4c2y = $p4y; 
  19854.                 } 
  19855.  
  19856.                 $shadow .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c ', ($p1c2x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p1y)) * _MPDFK, ($p4x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p4c2y)) * _MPDFK, ($p4x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p4y)) * _MPDFK); 
  19857.                 $patch_array[4]['f'] = 2; 
  19858.                 $patch_array[4]['points'] = array($p2c2x, $p2y,  
  19859.                     $p3x, $p3c1y, $p3x, $p3y, $p3c2x, $p3y,  
  19860.                     $p4x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4c2y,  
  19861.                     $p1c2x, $p1y); 
  19862.                 $patch_array[4]['colors'] = array($col2, $col1); 
  19863.  
  19864.  
  19865.                 // LEFT - joins on the right (C3-C4 of previous): f = 2 
  19866.                 $p1x = $x00; // control point only matches p3 preceding 
  19867.                 $p1y = $y00 + $h00 - $d1 - $brbgBL_V; 
  19868.                 $p2x = $x00 + $bl; // control point only matches p4 preceding 
  19869.                 $p2y = $y00 + $h00 - $d1 - $brbgBL_V; 
  19870.                 $p3x = $x00 + $bl; 
  19871.                 $p3y = $y00 + $d1 + $brbgTL_V; 
  19872.                 $p4x = $x00; 
  19873.                 $p4c1x = $p4x + $bl / 2; 
  19874.                 $p4y = $y00 + $d1 + $brbgTL_V; 
  19875.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgBL_H, $brbgBL_V) || $flatten) { 
  19876.                     $p1y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19877.                     $p2y = $y00 + $h00 - $bl; 
  19878.                 } 
  19879.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgTL_H, $brbgTL_V) || $flatten) { 
  19880.                     $p3y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19881.                     $p4y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19882.                 } 
  19883.  
  19884.                 $shadow .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($p3x ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p3y )) * _MPDFK); 
  19885.                 $patch_array[5]['f'] = 2; 
  19886.                 $patch_array[5]['points'] = array($p2x, $p2y,  
  19887.                     $p3x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3y,  
  19888.                     $p4c1x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4y,  
  19889.                     $p1x, $p1y); 
  19890.                 $patch_array[5]['colors'] = array($col1, $col2); 
  19891.  
  19892.                 // TOP LEFT corner 
  19893.                 $p1x = $x00 + $bl;  // control points only matches p3 preceding 
  19894.                 $p1y = $y00 + $d1 + $brbgTL_V; 
  19895.                 $p1c2y = $p1y - ($d2 + $brbgTL_V) * $mag; 
  19896.                 $p2x = $x00;   // control point only matches p4 preceding 
  19897.                 $p2y = $y00 + $d1 + $brbgTL_V; 
  19898.                 $p2c2y = $p2y - ($d1 + $brbgTL_V) * $mag; 
  19899.                 $p3x = $x00 + $d1 + $brbgTL_H; 
  19900.                 $p3c1x = $p3x - ($d1 + $brbgTL_H) * $mag; 
  19901.                 $p3y = $y00; 
  19902.                 $p3c2y = $p3y + $bl / 2; 
  19903.                 $p4x = $x00 + $d1 + $brbgTL_H; 
  19904.                 $p4c2x = $p4x - ($d2 + $brbgTL_H) * $mag; 
  19905.                 $p4y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19906.  
  19907.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgTL_H, $brbgTL_V) || $flatten) { 
  19908.                     $p1y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19909.                     $p1c2y = $p1y; 
  19910.                     $p2y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19911.                     $p2c2y = $p2y - $bl * $mag2; 
  19912.                     $p3x = $x00 + $bl; 
  19913.                     $p3c1x = $p3x - $bl * $mag2; 
  19914.                     $p4x = $x00 + $bl; 
  19915.                     $p4c2x = $p4x; 
  19916.                 } 
  19917.  
  19918.                 $shadow .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c ', ($p1x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p1c2y)) * _MPDFK, ($p4c2x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p4y)) * _MPDFK, ($p4x) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p4y)) * _MPDFK); 
  19919.                 $patch_array[6]['f'] = 2; 
  19920.                 $patch_array[6]['points'] = array($p2x, $p2c2y,  
  19921.                     $p3c1x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3c2y,  
  19922.                     $p4x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4y, $p4c2x, $p4y,  
  19923.                     $p1x, $p1c2y); 
  19924.                 $patch_array[6]['colors'] = array($col2, $col1); 
  19925.  
  19926.  
  19927.                 // TOP - joins on the right (C3-C4 of previous): f = 2 
  19928.                 $p1x = $x00 + $d1 + $brbgTL_H; // control point only matches p3 preceding 
  19929.                 $p1y = $y00; 
  19930.                 $p2x = $x00 + $d1 + $brbgTL_H; // control point only matches p4 preceding 
  19931.                 $p2y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19932.                 $p3x = $x00 + $w00 - $d1 - $brbgTR_H; 
  19933.                 $p3y = $y00 + $bl; 
  19934.                 $p4x = $x00 + $w00 - $d1 - $brbgTR_H; 
  19935.                 $p4y = $y00; 
  19936.                 $p4c1y = $p4y + $bl / 2; 
  19937.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgTL_H, $brbgTL_V) || $flatten) { 
  19938.                     $p1x = $x00 + $bl; 
  19939.                     $p2x = $x00 + $bl; 
  19940.                 } 
  19941.                 if (-$d2 > min($brbgTR_H, $brbgTR_V) || $flatten) { 
  19942.                     $p3x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; 
  19943.                     $p4x = $x00 + $w00 - $bl; 
  19944.                 } 
  19945.  
  19946.                 $shadow .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F l ', ($p3x ) * _MPDFK, ($this->h - ($p3y )) * _MPDFK); 
  19947.                 $patch_array[7]['f'] = 2; 
  19948.                 $patch_array[7]['points'] = array($p2x, $p2y,  
  19949.                     $p3x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3y, $p3x, $p3y,  
  19950.                     $p4x, $p4c1y, $p4x, $p4y, $p4x, $p4y,  
  19951.                     $p1x, $p1y); 
  19952.                 $patch_array[7]['colors'] = array($col1, $col2); 
  19953.  
  19954.                 $shadow .= ' h f Q ' . "\n"; // Close path and Fill the inner solid shadow 
  19955.  
  19956.                 if ($bl) 
  19957.                     $shadow .= $this->grad->CoonsPatchMesh($x00, $y00, $w00, $h00, $patch_array, $x00, $x00 + $w00, $y00, $y00 + $h00, $colspace, true); 
  19958.  
  19959.                 if ($sh['x'] || $sh['y']) 
  19960.                     $shadow .= ' Q' . "\n";  // Shadow Offset 
  19961.                 $shadow .= ' Q' . "\n"; // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  19962.             } 
  19963.         } 
  19964.  
  19965.         $s .= ' W n '; // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path 
  19966.  
  19967.         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['bgcolor']) { 
  19968.             $this->pageBackgrounds[$blvl][] = array('x' => $x0, 'y' => $y0, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'col' => $this->blk[$blvl]['bgcolorarray'], 'clippath' => $s, 'visibility' => $this->visibility, 'shadow' => $shadow, 'z-index' => $this->current_layer); 
  19969.         } elseif ($shadow) { 
  19970.             $this->pageBackgrounds[$blvl][] = array('shadowonly' => true, 'col' => '', 'clippath' => '', 'visibility' => $this->visibility, 'shadow' => $shadow, 'z-index' => $this->current_layer); 
  19971.         } 
  19972.  
  19973.         /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  19974.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['gradient'])) { 
  19975.             $g = $this->grad->parseBackgroundGradient($this->blk[$blvl]['gradient']); 
  19976.             if ($g) { 
  19977.                 $gx = $x0; 
  19978.                 $gy = $y0; 
  19979.                 $this->pageBackgrounds[$blvl][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $gx, 'y' => $gy, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => $s, 'visibility' => $this->visibility, 'z-index' => $this->current_layer); 
  19980.             } 
  19981.         } 
  19982.         if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['background-image'])) { 
  19983.             if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['gradient']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['gradient'] && preg_match('/(-moz-)*(repeating-)*(linear|radial)-gradient/', $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['gradient'])) { 
  19984.                 $g = $this->grad->parseMozGradient($this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['gradient']); 
  19985.                 if ($g) { 
  19986.                     $gx = $x0; 
  19987.                     $gy = $y0; 
  19988.                     // origin specifies the background-positioning-area (bpa) 
  19989.                     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['origin'] == 'padding-box') { 
  19990.                         $gx += $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w']; 
  19991.                         $w -= ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w']); 
  19992.                         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && $divider != 'pagetop' && !$continuingpage) { 
  19993.                             $gy += $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  19994.                         } 
  19995.                         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $blockstate != 1 && $divider != 'pagebottom') { 
  19996.                             $gy1 = $y1 - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w']; 
  19997.                         } else { 
  19998.                             $gy1 = $y1; 
  19999.                         } 
  20000.                         $h = $gy1 - $gy; 
  20001.                     } elseif ($this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['origin'] == 'content-box') { 
  20002.                         $gx += $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_left']; 
  20003.                         $w -= ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_right']); 
  20004.                         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && $divider != 'pagetop' && !$continuingpage) { 
  20005.                             $gy += $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_top']; 
  20006.                         } 
  20007.                         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $blockstate != 1 && $divider != 'pagebottom') { 
  20008.                             $gy1 = $y1 - ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_bottom']); 
  20009.                         } else { 
  20010.                             $gy1 = $y1 - $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_bottom']; 
  20011.                         } 
  20012.                         $h = $gy1 - $gy; 
  20013.                     } 
  20014.  
  20015.                     if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['size']['w']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['size']['w']) { 
  20016.                         $size = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['size']; 
  20017.                         if ($size['w'] != 'contain' && $size['w'] != 'cover') { 
  20018.                             if (stristr($size['w'], '%')) { 
  20019.                                 $size['w'] += 0; 
  20020.                                 $size['w'] /= 100; 
  20021.                                 $w *= $size['w']; 
  20022.                             } elseif ($size['w'] != 'auto') { 
  20023.                                 $w = $size['w']; 
  20024.                             } 
  20025.                             if (stristr($size['h'], '%')) { 
  20026.                                 $size['h'] += 0; 
  20027.                                 $size['h'] /= 100; 
  20028.                                 $h *= $size['h']; 
  20029.                             } elseif ($size['h'] != 'auto') { 
  20030.                                 $h = $size['h']; 
  20031.                             } 
  20032.                         } 
  20033.                     } 
  20034.                     $this->pageBackgrounds[$blvl][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $gx, 'y' => $gy, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => $s, 'visibility' => $this->visibility, 'z-index' => $this->current_layer); 
  20035.                 } 
  20036.             } else { 
  20037.                 $image_id = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['image_id']; 
  20038.                 $orig_w = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['orig_w']; 
  20039.                 $orig_h = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['orig_h']; 
  20040.                 $x_pos = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['x_pos']; 
  20041.                 $y_pos = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['y_pos']; 
  20042.                 $x_repeat = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['x_repeat']; 
  20043.                 $y_repeat = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['y_repeat']; 
  20044.                 $resize = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['resize']; 
  20045.                 $opacity = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['opacity']; 
  20046.                 $itype = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['itype']; 
  20047.                 $size = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['size']; 
  20048.                 // origin specifies the background-positioning-area (bpa) 
  20049.                 $bpa = array('x' => $x0, 'y' => $y0, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h); 
  20050.                 if ($this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['origin'] == 'padding-box') { 
  20051.                     $bpa['x'] = $x0 + $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w']; 
  20052.                     $bpa['w'] = $w - ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w']); 
  20053.                     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && $divider != 'pagetop' && !$continuingpage) { 
  20054.                         $bpa['y'] = $y0 + $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w']; 
  20055.                     } else { 
  20056.                         $bpa['y'] = $y0; 
  20057.                     } 
  20058.                     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $blockstate != 1 && $divider != 'pagebottom') { 
  20059.                         $bpay = $y1 - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w']; 
  20060.                     } else { 
  20061.                         $bpay = $y1; 
  20062.                     } 
  20063.                     $bpa['h'] = $bpay - $bpa['y']; 
  20064.                 } elseif ($this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['origin'] == 'content-box') { 
  20065.                     $bpa['x'] = $x0 + $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_left']; 
  20066.                     $bpa['w'] = $w - ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_right']); 
  20067.                     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && $divider != 'pagetop' && !$continuingpage) { 
  20068.                         $bpa['y'] = $y0 + $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_top']; 
  20069.                     } else { 
  20070.                         $bpa['y'] = $y0 + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_top']; 
  20071.                     } 
  20072.                     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $blockstate != 1 && $divider != 'pagebottom') { 
  20073.                         $bpay = $y1 - ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w'] + $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_bottom']); 
  20074.                     } else { 
  20075.                         $bpay = $y1 - $this->blk[$blvl]['padding_bottom']; 
  20076.                     } 
  20077.                     $bpa['h'] = $bpay - $bpa['y']; 
  20078.                 } 
  20079.                 $this->pageBackgrounds[$blvl][] = array('x' => $x0, 'y' => $y0, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'image_id' => $image_id, 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $x_pos, 'y_pos' => $y_pos, 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'clippath' => $s, 'resize' => $resize, 'opacity' => $opacity, 'itype' => $itype, 'visibility' => $this->visibility, 'z-index' => $this->current_layer, 'size' => $size, 'bpa' => $bpa); 
  20080.             } 
  20081.         } 
  20082.         /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  20083.  
  20084.         // Float DIV 
  20085.         $this->blk[$blvl]['bb_painted'][$this->page] = true; 
  20086.     } 
  20087.  
  20088.     /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  20089.  
  20090.     function _EllipseArc($x0, $y0, $rx, $ry, $seg = 1, $part = false, $start = false) 
  20091.     { // Anticlockwise segment 1-4 TR-TL-BL-BR (part=1 or 2) 
  20092.         $s = ''; 
  20093.         if ($rx < 0) { 
  20094.             $rx = 0; 
  20095.         } 
  20096.         if ($ry < 0) { 
  20097.             $ry = 0; 
  20098.         } 
  20099.         $rx *= _MPDFK; 
  20100.         $ry *= _MPDFK; 
  20101.         $astart = 0; 
  20102.         if ($seg == 1) { // Top Right 
  20103.             $afinish = 90; 
  20104.             $nSeg = 4; 
  20105.         } elseif ($seg == 2) { // Top Left 
  20106.             $afinish = 180; 
  20107.             $nSeg = 8; 
  20108.         } elseif ($seg == 3) { // Bottom Left 
  20109.             $afinish = 270; 
  20110.             $nSeg = 12; 
  20111.         } else {   // Bottom Right 
  20112.             $afinish = 360; 
  20113.             $nSeg = 16; 
  20114.         } 
  20115.         $astart = deg2rad((float) $astart); 
  20116.         $afinish = deg2rad((float) $afinish); 
  20117.         $totalAngle = $afinish - $astart; 
  20118.         $dt = $totalAngle / $nSeg; // segment angle 
  20119.         $dtm = $dt / 3; 
  20120.         $x0 *= _MPDFK; 
  20121.         $y0 = ($this->h - $y0) * _MPDFK; 
  20122.         $t1 = $astart; 
  20123.         $a0 = $x0 + ($rx * cos($t1)); 
  20124.         $b0 = $y0 + ($ry * sin($t1)); 
  20125.         $c0 = -$rx * sin($t1); 
  20126.         $d0 = $ry * cos($t1); 
  20127.         $op = false; 
  20128.         for ($i = 1; $i <= $nSeg; $i++) { 
  20129.             // Draw this bit of the total curve 
  20130.             $t1 = ($i * $dt) + $astart; 
  20131.             $a1 = $x0 + ($rx * cos($t1)); 
  20132.             $b1 = $y0 + ($ry * sin($t1)); 
  20133.             $c1 = -$rx * sin($t1); 
  20134.             $d1 = $ry * cos($t1); 
  20135.             if ($i > ($nSeg - 4) && (!$part || ($part == 1 && $i <= $nSeg - 2) || ($part == 2 && $i > $nSeg - 2))) { 
  20136.                 if ($start && !$op) { 
  20137.                     $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F m ', $a0, $b0); 
  20138.                 } 
  20139.                 $s .= sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c ', ($a0 + ($c0 * $dtm)), ($b0 + ($d0 * $dtm)), ($a1 - ($c1 * $dtm)), ($b1 - ($d1 * $dtm)), $a1, $b1); 
  20140.                 $op = true; 
  20141.             } 
  20142.             $a0 = $a1; 
  20143.             $b0 = $b1; 
  20144.             $c0 = $c1; 
  20145.             $d0 = $d1; 
  20146.         } 
  20147.         return $s; 
  20148.     } 
  20149.  
  20150.     /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  20151.  
  20152.     function PaintDivLnBorder($state = 0, $blvl = 0, $h) 
  20153.     { 
  20154.         // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom 
  20155.         $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y + $h; 
  20156.  
  20157.         $save_y = $this->y; 
  20158.  
  20159.         $w = $this->blk[$blvl]['width']; 
  20160.         $x0 = $this->x;    // left 
  20161.         $y0 = $this->y;    // top 
  20162.         $x1 = $this->x + $w;   // bottom 
  20163.         $y1 = $this->y + $h;   // bottom 
  20164.  
  20165.         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && ($state == 1 || $state == 3)) { 
  20166.             $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']; 
  20167.             if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) { 
  20168.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd); 
  20169.                 $this->y = $y0 + ($tbd['w'] / 2); 
  20170.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  20171.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], '', $continuingpage, 'T'); 
  20172.                     $this->Line($x0 + ($tbd['w'] / 2), $this->y, $x0 + $w - ($tbd['w'] / 2), $this->y); 
  20173.                 } else { 
  20174.                     $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  20175.                     $this->SetLineCap(0); 
  20176.                     $this->Line($x0, $this->y, $x0 + $w, $this->y); 
  20177.                 } 
  20178.                 $this->y += $tbd['w']; 
  20179.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  20180.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  20181.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  20182.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  20183.             } 
  20184.         } 
  20185.         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']) { 
  20186.             $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']; 
  20187.             if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) { 
  20188.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd); 
  20189.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  20190.                     $this->y = $y0 + ($tbd['w'] / 2); 
  20191.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], '', $continuingpage, 'L'); 
  20192.                     $this->Line($x0 + ($tbd['w'] / 2), $this->y, $x0 + ($tbd['w'] / 2), $y0 + $h - ($tbd['w'] / 2)); 
  20193.                 } else { 
  20194.                     $this->y = $y0; 
  20195.                     $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  20196.                     $this->SetLineCap(0); 
  20197.                     $this->Line($x0 + ($tbd['w'] / 2), $this->y, $x0 + ($tbd['w'] / 2), $y0 + $h); 
  20198.                 } 
  20199.                 $this->y += $tbd['w']; 
  20200.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  20201.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  20202.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  20203.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  20204.             } 
  20205.         } 
  20206.         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']) { 
  20207.             $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']; 
  20208.             if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) { 
  20209.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd); 
  20210.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  20211.                     $this->y = $y0 + ($tbd['w'] / 2); 
  20212.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], '', $continuingpage, 'R'); 
  20213.                     $this->Line($x0 + $w - ($tbd['w'] / 2), $this->y, $x0 + $w - ($tbd['w'] / 2), $y0 + $h - ($tbd['w'] / 2)); 
  20214.                 } else { 
  20215.                     $this->y = $y0; 
  20216.                     $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  20217.                     $this->SetLineCap(0); 
  20218.                     $this->Line($x0 + $w - ($tbd['w'] / 2), $this->y, $x0 + $w - ($tbd['w'] / 2), $y0 + $h); 
  20219.                 } 
  20220.                 $this->y += $tbd['w']; 
  20221.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  20222.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  20223.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  20224.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  20225.             } 
  20226.         } 
  20227.         if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $state > 1) { 
  20228.             $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']; 
  20229.             if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) { 
  20230.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd); 
  20231.                 $this->y = $y0 + $h - ($tbd['w'] / 2); 
  20232.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  20233.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], '', $continuingpage, 'B'); 
  20234.                     $this->Line($x0 + ($tbd['w'] / 2), $this->y, $x0 + $w - ($tbd['w'] / 2), $this->y); 
  20235.                 } else { 
  20236.                     $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  20237.                     $this->SetLineCap(0); 
  20238.                     $this->Line($x0, $this->y, $x0 + $w, $this->y); 
  20239.                 } 
  20240.                 $this->y += $tbd['w']; 
  20241.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  20242.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  20243.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  20244.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  20245.             } 
  20246.         } 
  20247.         $this->SetDash(); 
  20248.         $this->y = $save_y; 
  20249.     } 
  20250.  
  20251.     function PaintImgBorder($objattr, $is_table) 
  20252.     { 
  20253.         // Borders are disabled in columns - messes up the repositioning in printcolumnbuffer 
  20254.         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  20255.             return; 
  20256.         } // *COLUMNS* 
  20257.         if ($is_table) { 
  20258.             $k = $this->shrin_k; 
  20259.         } else { 
  20260.             $k = 1; 
  20261.         } 
  20262.         $h = (isset($objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT']) ? $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] : 0); 
  20263.         $w = (isset($objattr['BORDER-WIDTH']) ? $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] : 0); 
  20264.         $x0 = (isset($objattr['BORDER-X']) ? $objattr['BORDER-X'] : 0); 
  20265.         $y0 = (isset($objattr['BORDER-Y']) ? $objattr['BORDER-Y'] : 0); 
  20266.  
  20267.         // BORDERS 
  20268.         if ($objattr['border_top']) { 
  20269.             $tbd = $objattr['border_top']; 
  20270.             if (!empty($tbd['s'])) { 
  20271.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd, $k); 
  20272.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  20273.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], '', '', 'T'); 
  20274.                 } 
  20275.                 $this->Line($x0, $y0, $x0 + $w, $y0); 
  20276.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  20277.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  20278.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  20279.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  20280.             } 
  20281.         } 
  20282.         if ($objattr['border_left']) { 
  20283.             $tbd = $objattr['border_left']; 
  20284.             if (!empty($tbd['s'])) { 
  20285.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd, $k); 
  20286.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  20287.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], '', '', 'L'); 
  20288.                 } 
  20289.                 $this->Line($x0, $y0, $x0, $y0 + $h); 
  20290.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  20291.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  20292.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  20293.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  20294.             } 
  20295.         } 
  20296.         if ($objattr['border_right']) { 
  20297.             $tbd = $objattr['border_right']; 
  20298.             if (!empty($tbd['s'])) { 
  20299.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd, $k); 
  20300.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  20301.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], '', '', 'R'); 
  20302.                 } 
  20303.                 $this->Line($x0 + $w, $y0, $x0 + $w, $y0 + $h); 
  20304.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  20305.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  20306.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  20307.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  20308.             } 
  20309.         } 
  20310.         if ($objattr['border_bottom']) { 
  20311.             $tbd = $objattr['border_bottom']; 
  20312.             if (!empty($tbd['s'])) { 
  20313.                 $this->_setBorderLine($tbd, $k); 
  20314.                 if ($tbd['style'] == 'dotted' || $tbd['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  20315.                     $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'], '', '', 'B'); 
  20316.                 } 
  20317.                 $this->Line($x0, $y0 + $h, $x0 + $w, $y0 + $h); 
  20318.                 // Reset Corners and Dash off 
  20319.                 $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  20320.                 $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  20321.                 $this->SetDash(); 
  20322.             } 
  20323.         } 
  20324.         $this->SetDash(); 
  20325.         $this->SetAlpha(1); 
  20326.     } 
  20327.  
  20328.     /** -- END HTML-CSS -- */ 
  20329.  
  20330.     function Reset() 
  20331.     { 
  20332.         $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  20333.         $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  20334.         $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  20335.         $this->SetAlpha(1); 
  20336.         $this->colorarray = ''; 
  20337.  
  20338.         $this->spanbgcolorarray = ''; 
  20339.         $this->spanbgcolor = false; 
  20340.         $this->spanborder = false; 
  20341.         $this->spanborddet = array(); 
  20342.  
  20343.         $this->ResetStyles(); 
  20344.  
  20345.         $this->HREF = '';
