  20346.         $this->textparam = array(); 
  20347.         $this->SetTextOutline(); 
  20348.  
  20349.         $this->textvar = 0x00; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  20350.         $this->OTLtags = array(); 
  20351.         $this->textshadow = ''; 
  20352.  
  20353.         $this->currentLang = $this->default_lang;  // mPDF 6 
  20354.         $this->RestrictUnicodeFonts($this->default_available_fonts); // mPDF 6 
  20355.         $this->SetFont($this->default_font, '', 0, false); 
  20356.         $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size, false); 
  20357.  
  20358.         $this->currentfontfamily = ''; 
  20359.         $this->currentfontsize = ''; 
  20360.         $this->currentfontstyle = ''; 
  20361.  
  20362.         /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  20363.         if ($this->tableLevel && isset($this->table[1][1]['cellLineHeight'])) { 
  20364.             $this->SetLineHeight('', $this->table[1][1]['cellLineHeight']); // *TABLES* 
  20365.         } else 
  20366.         /** -- END TABLES -- */ 
  20367.         if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) { 
  20368.             $this->SetLineHeight('', $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']); // sets default line height 
  20369.         } 
  20370.  
  20371.         $this->lSpacingCSS = ''; 
  20372.         $this->wSpacingCSS = ''; 
  20373.         $this->fixedlSpacing = false; 
  20374.         $this->minwSpacing = 0; 
  20375.         $this->SetDash(); //restore to no dash 
  20376.         $this->dash_on = false; 
  20377.         $this->dotted_on = false; 
  20378.         $this->divwidth = 0; 
  20379.         $this->divheight = 0; 
  20380.         $this->cellTextAlign = ''; 
  20381.         $this->cellLineHeight = ''; 
  20382.         $this->cellLineStackingStrategy = ''; 
  20383.         $this->cellLineStackingShift = ''; 
  20384.         $this->oldy = -1; 
  20385.  
  20386.         $bodystyle = array(); 
  20387.         if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['FONT-STYLE'])) { 
  20388.             $bodystyle['FONT-STYLE'] = $this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['FONT-STYLE']; 
  20389.         } 
  20390.         if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['FONT-WEIGHT'])) { 
  20391.             $bodystyle['FONT-WEIGHT'] = $this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['FONT-WEIGHT']; 
  20392.         } 
  20393.         if (isset($this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['COLOR'])) { 
  20394.             $bodystyle['COLOR'] = $this->cssmgr->CSS['BODY']['COLOR']; 
  20395.         } 
  20396.         if (isset($bodystyle)) { 
  20397.             $this->setCSS($bodystyle, 'BLOCK', 'BODY'); 
  20398.         } 
  20399.     } 
  20400.  
  20401.     /** -- HTML-CSS -- */ 
  20402.  
  20403.     function ReadMetaTags($html) 
  20404.     { 
  20405.         // changes anykey=anyvalue to anykey="anyvalue" (only do this when this happens inside tags) 
  20406.         $regexp = '/ (\\w+?)=([^\\s>"]+)/si'; 
  20407.         $html = preg_replace($regexp, " \$1=\"\$2\"", $html); 
  20408.         if (preg_match('/<title>(.*?)<\/title>/si', $html, $m)) { 
  20409.             $this->SetTitle($m[1]); 
  20410.         } 
  20411.         preg_match_all('/<meta [^>]*?(name|content)="([^>]*?)" [^>]*?(name|content)="([^>]*?)".*?>/si', $html, $aux); 
  20412.         $firstattr = $aux[1]; 
  20413.         $secondattr = $aux[3]; 
  20414.         for ($i = 0; $i < count($aux[0]); $i++) { 
  20415.  
  20416.             $name = ( strtoupper($firstattr[$i]) == "NAME" ) ? strtoupper($aux[2][$i]) : strtoupper($aux[4][$i]); 
  20417.             $content = ( strtoupper($firstattr[$i]) == "CONTENT" ) ? $aux[2][$i] : $aux[4][$i]; 
  20418.             switch ($name) { 
  20419.                 case "KEYWORDS": $this->SetKeywords($content); 
  20420.                     break; 
  20421.                 case "AUTHOR": $this->SetAuthor($content); 
  20422.                     break; 
  20423.                 case "DESCRIPTION": $this->SetSubject($content); 
  20424.                     break; 
  20425.             } 
  20426.         } 
  20427.     } 
  20428.  
  20429.     function ReadCharset($html) 
  20430.     { 
  20431.         // Charset conversion 
  20432.         if ($this->allow_charset_conversion) { 
  20433.             if (preg_match('/<head.*charset=([^\'\"\s]*).*<\/head>/si', $html, $m)) { 
  20434.                 if (strtoupper($m[1]) != 'UTF-8') { 
  20435.                     $this->charset_in = strtoupper($m[1]); 
  20436.                 } 
  20437.             } 
  20438.         } 
  20439.     } 
  20440.  
  20441.     function setCSS($arrayaux, $type = '', $tag = '') 
  20442.     { // type= INLINE | BLOCK | TABLECELL // tag= BODY 
  20443.         if (!is_array($arrayaux)) 
  20444.             return; //Removes PHP Warning 
  20445.  
  20446.         // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  20447.         $preceeding_fontkey = $this->FontFamily . $this->FontStyle; 
  20448.         $preceeding_fontsize = $this->FontSize; 
  20449.         $spanbordset = false; 
  20450.         $spanbgset = false; 
  20451.         // mPDF 6 
  20452.         $prevlevel = (($this->blklvl == 0) ? 0 : $this->blklvl - 1); 
  20453.  
  20454.         // Set font size first so that e.g. MARGIN 0.83em works on font size for this element 
  20455.         if (isset($arrayaux['FONT-SIZE'])) { 
  20456.             $v = $arrayaux['FONT-SIZE']; 
  20457.             if (is_numeric($v[0])) { 
  20458.                 if ($type == 'BLOCK' && $this->blklvl > 0 && isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl - 1]['InlineProperties']) && isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl - 1]['InlineProperties']['size'])) { 
  20459.                     $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$this->blklvl - 1]['InlineProperties']['size']); 
  20460.                 } elseif ($type == 'TABLECELL') { 
  20461.                     $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->default_font_size / _MPDFK); 
  20462.                 } else { 
  20463.                     $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->FontSize); 
  20464.                 } 
  20465.                 $this->SetFontSize($mmsize * (_MPDFK), false); //Get size in points (pt) 
  20466.             } else { 
  20467.                 $v = strtoupper($v); 
  20468.                 if (isset($this->fontsizes[$v])) { 
  20469.                     $this->SetFontSize($this->fontsizes[$v] * $this->default_font_size, false); 
  20470.                 } 
  20471.             } 
  20472.             if ($tag == 'BODY') { 
  20473.                 $this->SetDefaultFontSize($this->FontSizePt); 
  20474.             } 
  20475.         } 
  20476.  
  20477.         // mPDF 6 
  20478.         if (isset($arrayaux['LANG']) && $arrayaux['LANG']) { 
  20479.             if ($this->autoLangToFont && !$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  20480.                 if ($arrayaux['LANG'] != $this->default_lang && $arrayaux['LANG'] != 'UTF-8') { 
  20481.                     list ($coreSuitable, $mpdf_pdf_unifont) = GetLangOpts($arrayaux['LANG'], $this->useAdobeCJK, $this->fontdata); 
  20482.                     if ($mpdf_pdf_unifont) { 
  20483.                         $arrayaux['FONT-FAMILY'] = $mpdf_pdf_unifont; 
  20484.                     } 
  20485.                     if ($tag == 'BODY') { 
  20486.                         $this->default_lang = $arrayaux['LANG']; 
  20487.                     } 
  20488.                 } 
  20489.             } 
  20490.             $this->currentLang = $arrayaux['LANG']; 
  20491.         } 
  20492.  
  20493.         // FOR INLINE and BLOCK OR 'BODY' 
  20494.         if (isset($arrayaux['FONT-FAMILY'])) { 
  20495.             $v = $arrayaux['FONT-FAMILY']; 
  20496.             //If it is a font list, get all font types 
  20497.             $aux_fontlist = explode(", ", $v); 
  20498.             $found = 0; 
  20499.             foreach ($aux_fontlist AS $f) { 
  20500.                 $fonttype = trim($f); 
  20501.                 $fonttype = preg_replace('/["\']*(.*?)["\']*/', '\\1', $fonttype); 
  20502.                 $fonttype = preg_replace('/ /', '', $fonttype); 
  20503.                 $v = strtolower(trim($fonttype)); 
  20504.                 if (isset($this->fonttrans[$v]) && $this->fonttrans[$v]) { 
  20505.                     $v = $this->fonttrans[$v]; 
  20506.                 } 
  20507.                 if ((!$this->onlyCoreFonts && in_array($v, $this->available_unifonts)) || 
  20508.                     in_array($v, array('ccourier', 'ctimes', 'chelvetica')) || 
  20509.                     ($this->onlyCoreFonts && in_array($v, array('courier', 'times', 'helvetica', 'arial'))) || 
  20510.                     in_array($v, array('sjis', 'uhc', 'big5', 'gb'))) { 
  20511.                     $fonttype = $v; 
  20512.                     $found = 1; 
  20513.                     break; 
  20514.                 } 
  20515.             } 
  20516.             if (!$found) { 
  20517.                 foreach ($aux_fontlist AS $f) { 
  20518.                     $fonttype = trim($f); 
  20519.                     $fonttype = preg_replace('/["\']*(.*?)["\']*/', '\\1', $fonttype); 
  20520.                     $fonttype = preg_replace('/ /', '', $fonttype); 
  20521.                     $v = strtolower(trim($fonttype)); 
  20522.                     if (isset($this->fonttrans[$v]) && $this->fonttrans[$v]) { 
  20523.                         $v = $this->fonttrans[$v]; 
  20524.                     } 
  20525.                     if (in_array($v, $this->sans_fonts) || in_array($v, $this->serif_fonts) || in_array($v, $this->mono_fonts)) { 
  20526.                         $fonttype = $v; 
  20527.                         break; 
  20528.                     } 
  20529.                 } 
  20530.             } 
  20531.  
  20532.             if ($tag == 'BODY') { 
  20533.                 $this->SetDefaultFont($fonttype); 
  20534.             } 
  20535.             $this->SetFont($fonttype, $this->currentfontstyle, 0, false); 
  20536.         } else { 
  20537.             $this->SetFont($this->currentfontfamily, $this->currentfontstyle, 0, false); 
  20538.         } 
  20539.  
  20540.         foreach ($arrayaux as $k => $v) { 
  20541.             if ($type != 'INLINE' && $tag != 'BODY' && $type != 'TABLECELL') { 
  20542.                 switch ($k) { 
  20543.                     // BORDERS 
  20544.                     case 'BORDER-TOP': 
  20545.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top'] = $this->border_details($v); 
  20546.                         if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['s']) { 
  20547.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border'] = 1; 
  20548.                         } 
  20549.                         break; 
  20550.                     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM': 
  20551.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom'] = $this->border_details($v); 
  20552.                         if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['s']) { 
  20553.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border'] = 1; 
  20554.                         } 
  20555.                         break; 
  20556.                     case 'BORDER-LEFT': 
  20557.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left'] = $this->border_details($v); 
  20558.                         if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['s']) { 
  20559.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border'] = 1; 
  20560.                         } 
  20561.                         break; 
  20562.                     case 'BORDER-RIGHT': 
  20563.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right'] = $this->border_details($v); 
  20564.                         if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['s']) { 
  20565.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border'] = 1; 
  20566.                         } 
  20567.                         break; 
  20568.  
  20569.                     // PADDING 
  20570.                     case 'PADDING-TOP': 
  20571.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20572.                         break; 
  20573.                     case 'PADDING-BOTTOM': 
  20574.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20575.                         break; 
  20576.                     case 'PADDING-LEFT': 
  20577.                         if (($tag == 'UL' || $tag == 'OL') && $v == 'auto') { 
  20578.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] = 'auto'; 
  20579.                             break; 
  20580.                         } 
  20581.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20582.                         break; 
  20583.                     case 'PADDING-RIGHT': 
  20584.                         if (($tag == 'UL' || $tag == 'OL') && $v == 'auto') { 
  20585.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right'] = 'auto'; 
  20586.                             break; 
  20587.                         } 
  20588.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20589.                         break; 
  20590.  
  20591.                     // MARGINS 
  20592.                     case 'MARGIN-TOP': 
  20593.                         $tmp = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20594.                         if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['lastbottommargin'])) { 
  20595.                             if ($tmp > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['lastbottommargin']) { 
  20596.                                 $tmp -= $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['lastbottommargin']; 
  20597.                             } else { 
  20598.                                 $tmp = 0; 
  20599.                             } 
  20600.                         } 
  20601.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] = $tmp; 
  20602.                         break; 
  20603.                     case 'MARGIN-BOTTOM': 
  20604.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20605.                         break; 
  20606.                     case 'MARGIN-LEFT': 
  20607.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_left'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20608.                         break; 
  20609.                     case 'MARGIN-RIGHT': 
  20610.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_right'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20611.                         break; 
  20612.  
  20613.                     /** -- BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  20614.                     case 'BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-H': 
  20615.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_TL_H'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20616.                         break; 
  20617.                     case 'BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-V': 
  20618.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_TL_V'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20619.                         break; 
  20620.                     case 'BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-H': 
  20621.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_TR_H'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20622.                         break; 
  20623.                     case 'BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-V': 
  20624.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_TR_V'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20625.                         break; 
  20626.                     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-H': 
  20627.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_BL_H'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20628.                         break; 
  20629.                     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-V': 
  20630.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_BL_V'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20631.                         break; 
  20632.                     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-H': 
  20633.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_BR_H'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20634.                         break; 
  20635.                     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-V': 
  20636.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_BR_V'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20637.                         break; 
  20638.                     /** -- END BORDER-RADIUS -- */ 
  20639.  
  20640.                     case 'BOX-SHADOW': 
  20641.                         $bs = $this->cssmgr->setCSSboxshadow($v); 
  20642.                         if ($bs) { 
  20643.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['box_shadow'] = $bs; 
  20644.                         } 
  20645.                         break; 
  20646.  
  20647.                     case 'BACKGROUND-CLIP': 
  20648.                         if (strtoupper($v) == 'PADDING-BOX') { 
  20649.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['background_clip'] = 'padding-box'; 
  20650.                         } elseif (strtoupper($v) == 'CONTENT-BOX') { 
  20651.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['background_clip'] = 'content-box'; 
  20652.                         } 
  20653.                         break; 
  20654.  
  20655.                     case 'PAGE-BREAK-AFTER': 
  20656.                         if (strtoupper($v) == 'AVOID') { 
  20657.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['page_break_after_avoid'] = true; 
  20658.                         } elseif (strtoupper($v) == 'ALWAYS' || strtoupper($v) == 'LEFT' || strtoupper($v) == 'RIGHT') { 
  20659.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['page_break_after'] = strtoupper($v); 
  20660.                         } 
  20661.                         break; 
  20662.  
  20663.                     // mPDF 6 pagebreaktype 
  20664.                     case 'BOX-DECORATION-BREAK': 
  20665.                         if (strtoupper($v) == 'CLONE') { 
  20666.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['box_decoration_break'] = 'clone'; 
  20667.                         } elseif (strtoupper($v) == 'SLICE') { 
  20668.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['box_decoration_break'] = 'slice'; 
  20669.                         } 
  20670.                         break; 
  20671.  
  20672.                     case 'WIDTH': 
  20673.                         if (strtoupper($v) != 'AUTO') { 
  20674.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_width'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false); 
  20675.                         } 
  20676.                         break; 
  20677.  
  20678.                     // mPDF 6  Lists 
  20679.                     // LISTS 
  20680.                     case 'LIST-STYLE-TYPE': 
  20681.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['list_style_type'] = strtolower($v); 
  20682.                         break; 
  20683.                     case 'LIST-STYLE-IMAGE': 
  20684.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['list_style_image'] = strtolower($v); 
  20685.                         break; 
  20686.                     case 'LIST-STYLE-POSITION': 
  20687.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['list_style_position'] = strtolower($v); 
  20688.                         break; 
  20689.                 }//end of switch($k) 
  20690.             } 
  20691.  
  20692.  
  20693.             if ($type != 'INLINE' && $type != 'TABLECELL') { // All block-level, including BODY tag 
  20694.                 switch ($k) { 
  20695.  
  20696.                     case 'TEXT-INDENT': 
  20697.                         // Computed value - to inherit 
  20698.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent'] = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->blk[$prevlevel]['inner_width'], $this->FontSize, false) . 'mm'; 
  20699.                         break; 
  20700.  
  20701.                     case 'MARGIN-COLLAPSE': // Custom tag to collapse margins at top and bottom of page 
  20702.                         if (strtoupper($v) == 'COLLAPSE') { 
  20703.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_collapse'] = true; 
  20704.                         } 
  20705.                         break; 
  20706.  
  20707.                     case 'LINE-HEIGHT': 
  20708.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height'] = $this->fixLineheight($v); 
  20709.                         if (!$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) { 
  20710.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height'] = 'N'; 
  20711.                         } // mPDF 6 
  20712.                         break; 
  20713.  
  20714.                     // mPDF 6 
  20715.                     case 'LINE-STACKING-STRATEGY': 
  20716.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_stacking_strategy'] = strtolower($v); 
  20717.                         break; 
  20718.  
  20719.                     case 'LINE-STACKING-SHIFT': 
  20720.                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_stacking_shift'] = strtolower($v); 
  20721.                         break; 
  20722.  
  20723.                     case 'TEXT-ALIGN': //left right center justify 
  20724.                         switch (strtoupper($v)) { 
  20725.                             case 'LEFT': 
  20726.                                 $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align'] = "L"; 
  20727.                                 break; 
  20728.                             case 'CENTER': 
  20729.                                 $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align'] = "C"; 
  20730.                                 break; 
  20731.                             case 'RIGHT': 
  20732.                                 $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align'] = "R"; 
  20733.                                 break; 
  20734.                             case 'JUSTIFY': 
  20735.                                 $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align'] = "J"; 
  20736.                                 break; 
  20737.                         } 
  20738.                         break; 
  20739.  
  20740.                     /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  20741.                     case 'BACKGROUND-GRADIENT': 
  20742.                         if ($type == 'BLOCK') { 
  20743.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['gradient'] = $v; 
  20744.                         } 
  20745.                         break; 
  20746.                     /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  20747.  
  20748.                     case 'DIRECTION': 
  20749.                         if ($v) { 
  20750.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['direction'] = strtolower($v); 
  20751.                         } 
  20752.                         break; 
  20753.                 }//end of switch($k) 
  20754.             } 
  20755.  
  20756.             // FOR INLINE ONLY 
  20757.             if ($type == 'INLINE') { 
  20758.                 switch ($k) { 
  20759.                     case 'DISPLAY': 
  20760.                         if (strtoupper($v) == 'NONE') { 
  20761.                             $this->inlineDisplayOff = true; 
  20762.                         } 
  20763.                         break; 
  20764.                     case 'DIRECTION': 
  20765.                         break; 
  20766.                 }//end of switch($k) 
  20767.             } 
  20768.             // FOR INLINE ONLY 
  20769.             if ($type == 'INLINE') { 
  20770.                 switch ($k) { 
  20771.                     // BORDERS 
  20772.                     case 'BORDER-TOP': 
  20773.                         $this->spanborddet['T'] = $this->border_details($v); 
  20774.                         $this->spanborder = true; 
  20775.                         $spanbordset = true; 
  20776.                         break; 
  20777.                     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM': 
  20778.                         $this->spanborddet['B'] = $this->border_details($v); 
  20779.                         $this->spanborder = true; 
  20780.                         $spanbordset = true; 
  20781.                         break; 
  20782.                     case 'BORDER-LEFT': 
  20783.                         $this->spanborddet['L'] = $this->border_details($v); 
  20784.                         $this->spanborder = true; 
  20785.                         $spanbordset = true; 
  20786.                         break; 
  20787.                     case 'BORDER-RIGHT': 
  20788.                         $this->spanborddet['R'] = $this->border_details($v); 
  20789.                         $this->spanborder = true; 
  20790.                         $spanbordset = true; 
  20791.                         break; 
  20792.                     case 'VISIBILITY': // block is set in OpenTag 
  20793.                         $v = strtolower($v); 
  20794.                         if ($v == 'visible' || $v == 'hidden' || $v == 'printonly' || $v == 'screenonly') { 
  20795.                             $this->textparam['visibility'] = $v; 
  20796.                         } 
  20797.                         break; 
  20798.                 }//end of switch($k) 
  20799.             } 
  20800.  
  20801.             if ($type != 'TABLECELL') { 
  20802.                 // FOR INLINE and BLOCK 
  20803.                 switch ($k) { 
  20804.                     case 'TEXT-ALIGN': //left right center justify 
  20805.                         if (strtoupper($v) == 'NOJUSTIFY' && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align'] == "J") { 
  20806.                             $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align'] = ""; 
  20807.                         } 
  20808.                         break; 
  20809.                     // bgcolor only - to stay consistent with original html2fpdf 
  20810.                     case 'BACKGROUND': 
  20811.                     case 'BACKGROUND-COLOR': 
  20812.                         $cor = $this->ConvertColor($v); 
  20813.                         if ($cor) { 
  20814.                             if ($tag == 'BODY') { 
  20815.                                 $this->bodyBackgroundColor = $cor; 
  20816.                             } elseif ($type == 'INLINE') { 
  20817.                                 $this->spanbgcolorarray = $cor; 
  20818.                                 $this->spanbgcolor = true; 
  20819.                                 $spanbgset = true; 
  20820.                             } else { 
  20821.                                 $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'] = $cor; 
  20822.                                 $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolor'] = true; 
  20823.                             } 
  20824.                         } elseif ($type != 'INLINE') { 
  20825.                             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  20826.                                 $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'] = $this->blk[$prevlevel]['bgcolorarray']; 
  20827.                                 $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolor'] = $this->blk[$prevlevel]['bgcolor']; 
  20828.                             } 
  20829.                         } 
  20830.                         break; 
  20831.  
  20832.                     case 'VERTICAL-ALIGN': //super and sub only dealt with here e.g. <SUB> and <SUP> 
  20833.                         switch (strtoupper($v)) { 
  20834.                             case 'SUPER': 
  20835.                                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FA_SUPERSCRIPT); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  20836.                                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FA_SUBSCRIPT); 
  20837.                                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  20838.                                 if (isset($this->textparam['text-baseline'])) { 
  20839.                                     $this->textparam['text-baseline'] += ($this->baselineSup) * $preceeding_fontsize; 
  20840.                                 } else { 
  20841.                                     $this->textparam['text-baseline'] = ($this->baselineSup) * $preceeding_fontsize; 
  20842.                                 } 
  20843.                                 break; 
  20844.                             case 'SUB': 
  20845.                                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FA_SUBSCRIPT); 
  20846.                                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FA_SUPERSCRIPT); 
  20847.                                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  20848.                                 if (isset($this->textparam['text-baseline'])) { 
  20849.                                     $this->textparam['text-baseline'] += ($this->baselineSub) * $preceeding_fontsize; 
  20850.                                 } else { 
  20851.                                     $this->textparam['text-baseline'] = ($this->baselineSub) * $preceeding_fontsize; 
  20852.                                 } 
  20853.                                 break; 
  20854.                             case 'BASELINE': 
  20855.                                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FA_SUBSCRIPT); 
  20856.                                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FA_SUPERSCRIPT); 
  20857.                                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  20858.                                 if (isset($this->textparam['text-baseline'])) { 
  20859.                                     unset($this->textparam['text-baseline']); 
  20860.                                 } 
  20861.                                 break; 
  20862.                             // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  20863.                             default: 
  20864.                                 $lh = $this->_computeLineheight($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']); 
  20865.                                 $sz = $this->ConvertSize($v, $lh, $this->FontSize, false); 
  20866.                                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FA_SUBSCRIPT); 
  20867.                                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FA_SUPERSCRIPT); 
  20868.                                 if ($sz) { 
  20869.                                     if ($sz > 0) { 
  20870.                                         $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FA_SUPERSCRIPT); 
  20871.                                     } else { 
  20872.                                         $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FA_SUBSCRIPT); 
  20873.                                     } 
  20874.                                     if (isset($this->textparam['text-baseline'])) { 
  20875.                                         $this->textparam['text-baseline'] += $sz; 
  20876.                                     } else { 
  20877.                                         $this->textparam['text-baseline'] = $sz; 
  20878.                                     } 
  20879.                                 } 
  20880.                         } 
  20881.                         break; 
  20882.                 }//end of switch($k) 
  20883.             } 
  20884.  
  20885.  
  20886.             // FOR ALL 
  20887.             switch ($k) { 
  20888.                 case 'LETTER-SPACING': 
  20889.                     $this->lSpacingCSS = $v; 
  20890.                     if (($this->lSpacingCSS || $this->lSpacingCSS === '0') && strtoupper($this->lSpacingCSS) != 'NORMAL') { 
  20891.                         $this->fixedlSpacing = $this->ConvertSize($this->lSpacingCSS, $this->FontSize); 
  20892.                     } 
  20893.                     break; 
  20894.  
  20895.                 case 'WORD-SPACING': 
  20896.                     $this->wSpacingCSS = $v; 
  20897.                     if ($this->wSpacingCSS && strtoupper($this->wSpacingCSS) != 'NORMAL') { 
  20898.                         $this->minwSpacing = $this->ConvertSize($this->wSpacingCSS, $this->FontSize); 
  20899.                     } 
  20900.                     break; 
  20901.  
  20902.                 case 'FONT-STYLE': // italic normal oblique 
  20903.                     switch (strtoupper($v)) { 
  20904.                         case 'ITALIC': 
  20905.                         case 'OBLIQUE': 
  20906.                             $this->SetStyle('I', true); 
  20907.                             break; 
  20908.                         case 'NORMAL': 
  20909.                             $this->SetStyle('I', false); 
  20910.                             break; 
  20911.                     } 
  20912.                     break; 
  20913.  
  20914.                 case 'FONT-WEIGHT': // normal bold //Does not support: bolder, lighter, 100..900(step value=100) 
  20915.                     switch (strtoupper($v)) { 
  20916.                         case 'BOLD': 
  20917.                             $this->SetStyle('B', true); 
  20918.                             break; 
  20919.                         case 'NORMAL': 
  20920.                             $this->SetStyle('B', false); 
  20921.                             break; 
  20922.                     } 
  20923.                     break; 
  20924.  
  20925.                 case 'FONT-KERNING': 
  20926.                     if (strtoupper($v) == 'NORMAL' || (strtoupper($v) == 'AUTO' && $this->useKerning)) { 
  20927.                         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  20928.                         if ($this->CurrentFont['haskernGPOS']) { 
  20929.                             if (isset($this->OTLtags['Plus'])) { 
  20930.                                 $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' kern'; 
  20931.                             } else { 
  20932.                                 $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = ' kern'; 
  20933.                             } 
  20934.                         } 
  20935.                         /** -- END OTL -- */ else {  // *OTL* 
  20936.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FC_KERNING); 
  20937.                         } // *OTL* 
  20938.                     } elseif (strtoupper($v) == 'NONE' || (strtoupper($v) == 'AUTO' && !$this->useKerning)) { 
  20939.                         if (isset($this->OTLtags['Plus'])) 
  20940.                             $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace('kern', '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); // *OTL* 
  20941.                         if (isset($this->OTLtags['FFPlus'])) 
  20942.                             $this->OTLtags['FFPlus'] = preg_replace('/kern[\d]*/', '', $this->OTLtags['FFPlus']); 
  20943.                         $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FC_KERNING); 
  20944.                     } 
  20945.                     break; 
  20946.  
  20947.                 /** -- OTL -- */ 
  20948.                 case 'FONT-LANGUAGE-OVERRIDE': 
  20949.                     $v = strtoupper($v); 
  20950.                     if (strpos($v, 'NORMAL') !== false) { 
  20951.                         $this->fontLanguageOverride = ''; 
  20952.                     } else { 
  20953.                         $this->fontLanguageOverride = trim($v); 
  20954.                     } 
  20955.                     break; 
  20956.  
  20957.  
  20958.                 case 'FONT-VARIANT-POSITION': 
  20959.                     if (isset($this->OTLtags['Plus'])) 
  20960.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace(array('sups', 'subs'), '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  20961.                     switch (strtoupper($v)) { 
  20962.                         case 'SUPER': 
  20963.                             $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' sups'; 
  20964.                             break; 
  20965.                         case 'SUB': 
  20966.                             $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' subs'; 
  20967.                             break; 
  20968.                         case 'NORMAL': 
  20969.                             break; 
  20970.                     } 
  20971.                     break; 
  20972.  
  20973.                 case 'FONT-VARIANT-CAPS': 
  20974.                     $v = strtoupper($v); 
  20975.                     if (!isset($this->OTLtags['Plus'])) { 
  20976.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = ''; 
  20977.                     } 
  20978.                     $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace(array('c2sc', 'smcp', 'c2pc', 'pcap', 'unic', 'titl'), '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  20979.                     $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FC_SMALLCAPS);   // ?????????????? <small-caps> 
  20980.                     if (strpos($v, 'ALL-SMALL-CAPS') !== false) { 
  20981.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' c2sc smcp'; 
  20982.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'SMALL-CAPS') !== false) { 
  20983.                         if (isset($this->CurrentFont['hassmallcapsGSUB']) && $this->CurrentFont['hassmallcapsGSUB']) { 
  20984.                             $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' smcp'; 
  20985.                         } else { 
  20986.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FC_SMALLCAPS); 
  20987.                         } 
  20988.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'ALL-PETITE-CAPS') !== false) { 
  20989.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' c2pc pcap'; 
  20990.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'PETITE-CAPS') !== false) { 
  20991.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' pcap'; 
  20992.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'UNICASE') !== false) { 
  20993.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' unic'; 
  20994.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'TITLING-CAPS') !== false) { 
  20995.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' titl'; 
  20996.                     } 
  20997.                     break; 
  20998.  
  20999.                 case 'FONT-VARIANT-LIGATURES': 
  21000.                     $v = strtoupper($v); 
  21001.                     if (!isset($this->OTLtags['Plus'])) { 
  21002.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = ''; 
  21003.                     } 
  21004.                     if (!isset($this->OTLtags['Minus'])) { 
  21005.                         $this->OTLtags['Minus'] = ''; 
  21006.                     } 
  21007.                     if (strpos($v, 'NORMAL') !== false) { 
  21008.                         $this->OTLtags['Minus'] = str_replace(array('liga', 'clig', 'calt'), '', $this->OTLtags['Minus']); 
  21009.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace(array('dlig', 'hlig'), '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21010.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'NONE') !== false) { 
  21011.                         $this->OTLtags['Minus'] .= ' liga clig calt'; 
  21012.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace(array('dlig', 'hlig'), '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21013.                     } 
  21014.                     if (strpos($v, 'NO-COMMON-LIGATURES') !== false) { 
  21015.                         $this->OTLtags['Minus'] .= ' liga clig'; 
  21016.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'COMMON-LIGATURES') !== false) { 
  21017.                         $this->OTLtags['Minus'] = str_replace(array('liga', 'clig'), '', $this->OTLtags['Minus']); 
  21018.                     } 
  21019.                     if (strpos($v, 'NO-CONTEXTUAL') !== false) { 
  21020.                         $this->OTLtags['Minus'] .= ' calt'; 
  21021.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'CONTEXTUAL') !== false) { 
  21022.                         $this->OTLtags['Minus'] = str_replace('calt', '', $this->OTLtags['Minus']); 
  21023.                     } 
  21024.                     if (strpos($v, 'NO-DISCRETIONARY-LIGATURES') !== false) { 
  21025.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace('dlig', '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21026.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'DISCRETIONARY-LIGATURES') !== false) { 
  21027.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' dlig'; 
  21028.                     } 
  21029.                     if (strpos($v, 'NO-HISTORICAL-LIGATURES') !== false) { 
  21030.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace('hlig', '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21031.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'HISTORICAL-LIGATURES') !== false) { 
  21032.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' hlig'; 
  21033.                     } 
  21034.  
  21035.                     break; 
  21036.  
  21037.                 case 'FONT-VARIANT-NUMERIC': 
  21038.                     $v = strtoupper($v); 
  21039.                     if (!isset($this->OTLtags['Plus'])) { 
  21040.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = ''; 
  21041.                     } 
  21042.                     if (strpos($v, 'NORMAL') !== false) { 
  21043.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace(array('ordn', 'zero', 'lnum', 'onum', 'pnum', 'tnum', 'frac', 'afrc'), '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21044.                     } 
  21045.                     if (strpos($v, 'ORDINAL') !== false) { 
  21046.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' ordn'; 
  21047.                     } 
  21048.                     if (strpos($v, 'SLASHED-ZERO') !== false) { 
  21049.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' zero'; 
  21050.                     } 
  21051.                     if (strpos($v, 'LINING-NUMS') !== false) { 
  21052.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' lnum'; 
  21053.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace('onum', '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21054.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'OLDSTYLE-NUMS') !== false) { 
  21055.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' onum'; 
  21056.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace('lnum', '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21057.                     } 
  21058.                     if (strpos($v, 'PROPORTIONAL-NUMS') !== false) { 
  21059.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' pnum'; 
  21060.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace('tnum', '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21061.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'TABULAR-NUMS') !== false) { 
  21062.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' tnum'; 
  21063.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace('pnum', '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21064.                     } 
  21065.                     if (strpos($v, 'DIAGONAL-FRACTIONS') !== false) { 
  21066.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' frac'; 
  21067.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace('afrc', '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21068.                     } elseif (strpos($v, 'STACKED-FRACTIONS') !== false) { 
  21069.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' afrc'; 
  21070.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace('frac', '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21071.                     } 
  21072.                     break; 
  21073.  
  21074.                 case 'FONT-VARIANT-ALTERNATES':  // Only supports historical-forms 
  21075.                     $v = strtoupper($v); 
  21076.                     if (!isset($this->OTLtags['Plus'])) { 
  21077.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = ''; 
  21078.                     } 
  21079.                     if (strpos($v, 'NORMAL') !== false) { 
  21080.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] = str_replace('hist', '', $this->OTLtags['Plus']); 
  21081.                     } 
  21082.                     if (strpos($v, 'HISTORICAL-FORMS') !== false) { 
  21083.                         $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' hist'; 
  21084.                     } 
  21085.                     break; 
  21086.  
  21087.  
  21088.                 case 'FONT-FEATURE-SETTINGS': 
  21089.                     $v = strtolower($v); 
  21090.                     if (strpos($v, 'normal') !== false) { 
  21091.                         $this->OTLtags['FFMinus'] = ''; 
  21092.                         $this->OTLtags['FFPlus'] = ''; 
  21093.                     } else { 
  21094.                         if (!isset($this->OTLtags['FFPlus'])) { 
  21095.                             $this->OTLtags['FFPlus'] = ''; 
  21096.                         } 
  21097.                         if (!isset($this->OTLtags['FFMinus'])) { 
  21098.                             $this->OTLtags['FFMinus'] = ''; 
  21099.                         } 
  21100.                         $tags = preg_split('/[, ]/', $v); 
  21101.                         foreach ($tags AS $t) { 
  21102.                             if (preg_match('/[\"\']([a-zA-Z0-9]{4})[\"\']\s*(on|off|\d*) {0, 1}/', $t, $m)) { 
  21103.                                 if ($m[2] == 'off' || $m[2] === '0') { 
  21104.                                     if (strpos($this->OTLtags['FFMinus'], $m[1]) === false) { 
  21105.                                         $this->OTLtags['FFMinus'] .= ' ' . $m[1]; 
  21106.                                     } 
  21107.                                     $this->OTLtags['FFPlus'] = preg_replace('/' . $m[1] . '[\d]*/', '', $this->OTLtags['FFPlus']); 
  21108.                                 } else { 
  21109.                                     if ($m[2] == 'on') { 
  21110.                                         $m[2] = '1'; 
  21111.                                     } 
  21112.                                     if (strpos($this->OTLtags['FFPlus'], $m[1]) === false) { 
  21113.                                         $this->OTLtags['FFPlus'] .= ' ' . $m[1] . $m[2]; 
  21114.                                     } 
  21115.                                     $this->OTLtags['FFMinus'] = str_replace($m[1], '', $this->OTLtags['FFMinus']); 
  21116.                                 } 
  21117.                             } 
  21118.                         } 
  21119.                     } 
  21120.                     break; 
  21121.                 /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  21122.  
  21123.  
  21124.                 case 'TEXT-TRANSFORM': // none uppercase lowercase //Does support: capitalize 
  21125.                     switch (strtoupper($v)) { //Not working 100% 
  21126.                         case 'CAPITALIZE': 
  21127.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FT_CAPITALIZE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21128.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FT_UPPERCASE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21129.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FT_LOWERCASE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21130.                             break; 
  21131.                         case 'UPPERCASE': 
  21132.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FT_UPPERCASE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21133.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FT_LOWERCASE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21134.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FT_CAPITALIZE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21135.                             break; 
  21136.                         case 'LOWERCASE': 
  21137.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FT_LOWERCASE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21138.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FT_UPPERCASE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21139.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FT_CAPITALIZE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21140.                             break; 
  21141.                         case 'NONE': break; 
  21142.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FT_UPPERCASE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21143.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FT_LOWERCASE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21144.                             $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FT_CAPITALIZE); // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21145.                     } 
  21146.                     break; 
  21147.  
  21148.                 case 'TEXT-SHADOW': 
  21149.                     $ts = $this->cssmgr->setCSStextshadow($v); 
  21150.                     if ($ts) { 
  21151.                         $this->textshadow = $ts; 
  21152.                     } 
  21153.                     break; 
  21154.  
  21155.                 case 'HYPHENS': 
  21156.                     if (strtoupper($v) == 'NONE') { 
  21157.                         $this->textparam['hyphens'] = 2; 
  21158.                     } elseif (strtoupper($v) == 'AUTO') { 
  21159.                         $this->textparam['hyphens'] = 1; 
  21160.                     } elseif (strtoupper($v) == 'MANUAL') { 
  21161.                         $this->textparam['hyphens'] = 0; 
  21162.                     } 
  21163.                     break; 
  21164.  
  21165.                 case 'TEXT-OUTLINE': 
  21166.                     if (strtoupper($v) == 'NONE') { 
  21167.                         $this->textparam['outline-s'] = false; 
  21168.                     } 
  21169.                     break; 
  21170.  
  21171.                 case 'TEXT-OUTLINE-WIDTH': 
  21172.                 case 'OUTLINE-WIDTH': 
  21173.                     switch (strtoupper($v)) { 
  21174.                         case 'THIN': $v = '0.03em'; 
  21175.                             break; 
  21176.                         case 'MEDIUM': $v = '0.05em'; 
  21177.                             break; 
  21178.                         case 'THICK': $v = '0.07em'; 
  21179.                             break; 
  21180.                     } 
  21181.                     $w = $this->ConvertSize($v, $this->FontSize, $this->FontSize); 
  21182.                     if ($w) { 
  21183.                         $this->textparam['outline-WIDTH'] = $w; 
  21184.                         $this->textparam['outline-s'] = true; 
  21185.                     } else { 
  21186.                         $this->textparam['outline-s'] = false; 
  21187.                     } 
  21188.                     break; 
  21189.  
  21190.                 case 'TEXT-OUTLINE-COLOR': 
  21191.                 case 'OUTLINE-COLOR': 
  21192.                     if (strtoupper($v) == 'INVERT') { 
  21193.                         if ($this->colorarray) { 
  21194.                             $cor = $this->colorarray; 
  21195.                             $this->textparam['outline-COLOR'] = $this->_invertColor($cor); 
  21196.                         } else { 
  21197.                             $this->textparam['outline-COLOR'] = $this->ConvertColor(255); 
  21198.                         } 
  21199.                     } else { 
  21200.                         $cor = $this->ConvertColor($v); 
  21201.                         if ($cor) { 
  21202.                             $this->textparam['outline-COLOR'] = $cor; 
  21203.                         } 
  21204.                     } 
  21205.                     break; 
  21206.  
  21207.                 case 'COLOR': // font color 
  21208.                     $cor = $this->ConvertColor($v); 
  21209.                     if ($cor) { 
  21210.                         $this->colorarray = $cor; 
  21211.                         $this->SetTColor($cor); 
  21212.                     } 
  21213.                     break; 
  21214.             }//end of switch($k) 
  21215.         }//end of foreach 
  21216.         // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  21217.         // Needs to be set at the end - after vertical-align = super/sub, so that textparam['text-baseline'] is set 
  21218.         if (isset($arrayaux['TEXT-DECORATION'])) { 
  21219.             $v = $arrayaux['TEXT-DECORATION']; // none underline line-through (strikeout) //Does not support: blink 
  21220.             if (stristr($v, 'LINE-THROUGH')) { 
  21221.                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FD_LINETHROUGH); 
  21222.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  21223.                 if (isset($this->textparam['text-baseline'])) { 
  21224.                     $this->textparam['s-decoration']['baseline'] = $this->textparam['text-baseline']; 
  21225.                 } else { 
  21226.                     $this->textparam['s-decoration']['baseline'] = 0; 
  21227.                 } 
  21228.                 $this->textparam['s-decoration']['fontkey'] = $this->FontFamily . $this->FontStyle; 
  21229.                 $this->textparam['s-decoration']['fontsize'] = $this->FontSize; 
  21230.                 $this->textparam['s-decoration']['color'] = strtoupper($this->TextColor); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG 
  21231.             } 
  21232.             if (stristr($v, 'UNDERLINE')) { 
  21233.                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FD_UNDERLINE); 
  21234.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  21235.                 if (isset($this->textparam['text-baseline'])) { 
  21236.                     $this->textparam['u-decoration']['baseline'] = $this->textparam['text-baseline']; 
  21237.                 } else { 
  21238.                     $this->textparam['u-decoration']['baseline'] = 0; 
  21239.                 } 
  21240.                 $this->textparam['u-decoration']['fontkey'] = $this->FontFamily . $this->FontStyle; 
  21241.                 $this->textparam['u-decoration']['fontsize'] = $this->FontSize; 
  21242.                 $this->textparam['u-decoration']['color'] = strtoupper($this->TextColor); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG 
  21243.             } 
  21244.             if (stristr($v, 'OVERLINE')) { 
  21245.                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar | FD_OVERLINE); 
  21246.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  21247.                 if (isset($this->textparam['text-baseline'])) { 
  21248.                     $this->textparam['o-decoration']['baseline'] = $this->textparam['text-baseline']; 
  21249.                 } else { 
  21250.                     $this->textparam['o-decoration']['baseline'] = 0; 
  21251.                 } 
  21252.                 $this->textparam['o-decoration']['fontkey'] = $this->FontFamily . $this->FontStyle; 
  21253.                 $this->textparam['o-decoration']['fontsize'] = $this->FontSize; 
  21254.                 $this->textparam['o-decoration']['color'] = strtoupper($this->TextColor); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG 
  21255.             } 
  21256.             if (stristr($v, 'NONE')) { 
  21257.                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FD_UNDERLINE); 
  21258.                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FD_LINETHROUGH); 
  21259.                 $this->textvar = ($this->textvar & ~FD_OVERLINE); 
  21260.                 // mPDF 5.7.3  inline text-decoration parameters 
  21261.                 if (isset($this->textparam['u-decoration'])) { 
  21262.                     unset($this->textparam['u-decoration']); 
  21263.                 } 
  21264.                 if (isset($this->textparam['s-decoration'])) { 
  21265.                     unset($this->textparam['s-decoration']); 
  21266.                 } 
  21267.                 if (isset($this->textparam['o-decoration'])) { 
  21268.                     unset($this->textparam['o-decoration']); 
  21269.                 } 
  21270.             } 
  21271.         } 
  21272.         // mPDF 6 
  21273.         if ($spanbordset) { // BORDER has been set on this INLINE element 
  21274.             if (isset($this->textparam['text-baseline'])) { 
  21275.                 $this->textparam['bord-decoration']['baseline'] = $this->textparam['text-baseline']; 
  21276.             } else { 
  21277.                 $this->textparam['bord-decoration']['baseline'] = 0; 
  21278.             } 
  21279.             $this->textparam['bord-decoration']['fontkey'] = $this->FontFamily . $this->FontStyle; 
  21280.             $this->textparam['bord-decoration']['fontsize'] = $this->FontSize; 
  21281.         } 
  21282.         if ($spanbgset) { // BACKGROUND[-COLOR] has been set on this INLINE element 
  21283.             if (isset($this->textparam['text-baseline'])) { 
  21284.                 $this->textparam['bg-decoration']['baseline'] = $this->textparam['text-baseline']; 
  21285.             } else { 
  21286.                 $this->textparam['bg-decoration']['baseline'] = 0; 
  21287.             } 
  21288.             $this->textparam['bg-decoration']['fontkey'] = $this->FontFamily . $this->FontStyle; 
  21289.             $this->textparam['bg-decoration']['fontsize'] = $this->FontSize; 
  21290.         } 
  21291.     } 
  21292.  
  21293.     /** -- END HTML-CSS -- */ 
  21294.  
  21295.     function SetStyle($tag, $enable) 
  21296.     { 
  21297.         $this->$tag = $enable; 
  21298.         $style = ''; 
  21299.         foreach (array('B', 'I') as $s) { 
  21300.             if ($this->$s) { 
  21301.                 $style.=$s; 
  21302.             } 
  21303.         } 
  21304.         $this->currentfontstyle = $style; 
  21305.         $this->SetFont('', $style, 0, false); 
  21306.     } 
  21307.  
  21308.     // Set multiple styles at one time 
  21309.     function SetStylesArray($arr) 
  21310.     { 
  21311.         $style = ''; 
  21312.         foreach (array('B', 'I') as $s) { 
  21313.             if (isset($arr[$s])) { 
  21314.                 if ($arr[$s]) { 
  21315.                     $this->$s = true; 
  21316.                     $style.=$s; 
  21317.                 } else { 
  21318.                     $this->$s = false; 
  21319.                 } 
  21320.             } elseif ($this->$s) { 
  21321.                 $style.=$s; 
  21322.             } 
  21323.         } 
  21324.         $this->currentfontstyle = $style; 
  21325.         $this->SetFont('', $style, 0, false); 
  21326.     } 
  21327.  
  21328.     // Set multiple styles at one $str e.g. "BI" 
  21329.     function SetStyles($str) 
  21330.     { 
  21331.         $style = ''; 
  21332.         foreach (array('B', 'I') as $s) { 
  21333.             if (strpos($str, $s) !== false) { 
  21334.                 $this->$s = true; 
  21335.                 $style.=$s; 
  21336.             } else { 
  21337.                 $this->$s = false; 
  21338.             } 
  21339.         } 
  21340.         $this->currentfontstyle = $style; 
  21341.         $this->SetFont('', $style, 0, false); 
  21342.     } 
  21343.  
  21344.     function ResetStyles() 
  21345.     { 
  21346.         foreach (array('B', 'I') as $s) { 
  21347.             $this->$s = false; 
  21348.         } 
  21349.         $this->currentfontstyle = ''; 
  21350.         $this->SetFont('', '', 0, false); 
  21351.     } 
  21352.  
  21353.     function DisableTags($str = '') 
  21354.     { 
  21355.         if ($str == '') { //enable all tags 
  21356.             //Insert new supported tags in the long string below. 
  21357.             $this->enabledtags = "<a><acronym><address><article><aside><b><bdi><bdo><big><blockquote><br><caption><center><cite><code><del><details><dd><div><dl><dt><em><fieldset><figcaption><figure><font><form><h1><h2><h3><h4><h5><h6><hgroup><hr><i><img><input><ins><kbd><legend><li><main><mark><meter><nav><ol><option><p><pre><progress><q><s><samp><section><select><small><span><strike><strong><sub><summary><sup><table><tbody><td><template><textarea><tfoot><th><thead><time><tr><tt><u><ul><var><footer><header><annotation><bookmark><jpgraph><textcircle><barcode><dottab><indexentry><indexinsert><watermarktext><watermarkimage><tts><ttz><tta><column_break><columnbreak><newcolumn><newpage><page_break><pagebreak><formfeed><columns><toc><tocentry><tocpagebreak><pageheader><pagefooter><setpageheader><setpagefooter><sethtmlpageheader><sethtmlpagefooter>"; 
  21358.         } else { 
  21359.             $str = explode(", ", $str); 
  21360.             foreach ($str as $v) 
  21361.                 $this->enabledtags = str_replace(trim($v), '', $this->enabledtags); 
  21362.         } 
  21363.     } 
  21364.  
  21365.     /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  21366.  
  21367.     function TableCheckMinWidth($maxwidth, $forcewrap = 0, $textbuffer, $checkletter = false) 
  21368.     { // mPDF 6 
  21369.         $acclength = 0; // mPDF 6 (accumulated length across > 1 chunk) 
  21370.         $acclongest = 0; // mPDF 6 (accumulated length max across > 1 chunk) 
  21371.         $biggestword = 0; 
  21372.         $toonarrow = false; 
  21373.         if ((count($textbuffer) == 0) or ( (count($textbuffer) == 1) && ($textbuffer[0][0] == ''))) { 
  21374.             return 0; 
  21375.         } 
  21376.  
  21377.         foreach ($textbuffer as $chunk) { 
  21378.  
  21379.             $line = $chunk[0]; 
  21380.             $OTLdata = (isset($chunk[18]) ? $chunk[18] : NULL); 
  21381.  
  21382.             // mPDF ITERATION 
  21383.             if ($this->iterationCounter) 
  21384.                 $line = preg_replace('/{iteration ([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)}/', '\\1', $line); 
  21385.  
  21386.             // IMAGES & FORM ELEMENTS 
  21387.             if (substr($line, 0, 3) == "\xbb\xa4\xac") { //inline object - FORM element or IMAGE! 
  21388.                 $objattr = $this->_getObjAttr($line); 
  21389.                 if ($objattr['type'] != 'hr' && isset($objattr['width']) && ($objattr['width'] / $this->shrin_k) > ($maxwidth + 0.0001)) { 
  21390.                     if (($objattr['width'] / $this->shrin_k) > $biggestword) { 
  21391.                         $biggestword = ($objattr['width'] / $this->shrin_k); 
  21392.                     } 
  21393.                     $toonarrow = true; 
  21394.                 } 
  21395.                 continue; 
  21396.             } 
  21397.  
  21398.             if ($line == "\n") { 
  21399.                 $acclength = 0; // mPDF 6 (accumulated length across > 1 chunk) 
  21400.                 continue; 
  21401.             } 
  21402.             $line = trim($line); 
  21403.             if (!empty($OTLdata)) { 
  21404.                 $this->otl->trimOTLdata($OTLdata, true, true); 
  21405.             } // *OTL* 
  21406.             // SET FONT SIZE/STYLE from $chunk[n] 
  21407.             // FONTSIZE 
  21408.             if (isset($chunk[11]) and $chunk[11] != '') { 
  21409.                 if ($this->shrin_k) { 
  21410.                     $this->SetFontSize($chunk[11] / $this->shrin_k, false); 
  21411.                 } else { 
  21412.                     $this->SetFontSize($chunk[11], false); 
  21413.                 } 
  21414.             } 
  21415.             // FONTFAMILY 
  21416.             if (isset($chunk[4]) and $chunk[4] != '') { 
  21417.                 $font = $this->SetFont($chunk[4], $this->FontStyle, 0, false); 
  21418.             } 
  21419.             // B I 
  21420.             if (isset($chunk[2]) and $chunk[2] != '') { 
  21421.                 $this->SetStyles($chunk[2]); 
  21422.             } 
  21423.  
  21424.             $lbw = $rbw = 0; // Border widths 
  21425.             if (isset($chunk[16]) && !empty($chunk[16])) { //Border 
  21426.                 $this->spanborddet = $chunk[16]; 
  21427.                 $lbw = (isset($this->spanborddet['L']['w']) ? $this->spanborddet['L']['w'] : 0); 
  21428.                 $rbw = (isset($this->spanborddet['R']['w']) ? $this->spanborddet['R']['w'] : 0); 
  21429.             } 
  21430.             if (isset($chunk[15])) {   // Word spacing 
  21431.                 $this->wSpacingCSS = $chunk[15]; 
  21432.                 if ($this->wSpacingCSS && strtoupper($this->wSpacingCSS) != 'NORMAL') { 
  21433.                     $this->minwSpacing = $this->ConvertSize($this->wSpacingCSS, $this->FontSize) / $this->shrin_k; // mPDF 5.7.3 
  21434.                 } 
  21435.             } 
  21436.             if (isset($chunk[14])) {   // Letter spacing 
  21437.                 $this->lSpacingCSS = $chunk[14]; 
  21438.                 if (($this->lSpacingCSS || $this->lSpacingCSS === '0') && strtoupper($this->lSpacingCSS) != 'NORMAL') { 
  21439.                     $this->fixedlSpacing = $this->ConvertSize($this->lSpacingCSS, $this->FontSize) / $this->shrin_k; // mPDF 5.7.3 
  21440.                 } 
  21441.             } 
  21442.             if (isset($chunk[8])) { // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21443.                 $this->textvar = $chunk[8]; 
  21444.             } 
  21445.  
  21446.             // mPDF 6 
  21447.             // If overflow==wrap ($checkletter) OR (No word breaks and contains CJK) 
  21448.             if ($checkletter || (!preg_match('/(\xe2\x80\x8b| )/', trim($line)) && preg_match("/([" . $this->pregCJKchars . "])/u", $line) )) { 
  21449.                 if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregCJKchars . "])/u", $line)) { 
  21450.                     $checkCJK = true; 
  21451.                 } else { 
  21452.                     $checkCJK = false; 
  21453.                 } 
  21454.  
  21455.                 $letters = preg_split('//u', $line); 
  21456.                 foreach ($letters as $k => $letter) { 
  21457.  
  21458.                     // mPDF 6 
  21459.                     if ($checkCJK) { 
  21460.                         if (preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKleading . "]/u", $letter) && $k > 0) { 
  21461.                             $letter = $letters[$k - 1] . $letter; 
  21462.                         } 
  21463.                         if (preg_match("/[" . $this->CJKfollowing . "]/u", $letter) && $k < (count($letters) - 1)) { 
  21464.                             $letter = $letter . $letters[$k + 1]; 
  21465.                         } 
  21466.                     } 
  21467.  
  21468.                     $letterwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($letter, false, false, $chunk[8]); // Pass $textvar ($chunk[8]), but do OTLdata here 
  21469.                     // so don't have to split OTLdata for each word 
  21470.                     if ($k == 0) { 
  21471.                         $letterwidth += $lbw; 
  21472.                     } 
  21473.                     if ($k == (count($letters) - 1)) { 
  21474.                         $letterwidth += $rbw; 
  21475.                     } 
  21476.  
  21477.                     //Warn user that maxwidth is insufficient 
  21478.                     if ($letterwidth > $maxwidth + 0.0001) { 
  21479.                         if ($letterwidth > $biggestword) { 
  21480.                             $biggestword = $letterwidth; 
  21481.                         } 
  21482.                         $toonarrow = true; 
  21483.                     } 
  21484.                 } 
  21485.             } else { 
  21486.                 // mPDF 6 
  21487.                 // Need to account for any XAdvance in GPOSinfo (OTLdata = $chunk[18]) 
  21488.                 $wordXAdvance = array(); 
  21489.                 if (isset($chunk[18]) && $chunk[18]) { 
  21490.                     preg_match_all('/(\xe2\x80\x8b| )/', $line, $spaces, PREG_OFFSET_CAPTURE); // U+200B Zero Width word boundary, or space 
  21491.                     $lastoffset = 0; 
  21492.                     $k = -1; // Added so that if no spaces found, "last word" later is calculated for the one and only word 
  21493.                     foreach ($spaces[0] as $k => $m) { 
  21494.                         $offset = $m[1]; 
  21495.                         // ...TableCheckMinWidth... 
  21496.                         // At this point, BIDI not applied, Writing direction is not set, and XAdvanceL balances XAdvanceR 
  21497.                         for ($n = $lastoffset; $n < $offset; $n++) { 
  21498.                             if (isset($chunk[18]['GPOSinfo'][$n]['XAdvanceL'])) { 
  21499.                                 if (isset($wordXAdvance[$k])) { 
  21500.                                     $wordXAdvance[$k] += $chunk[18]['GPOSinfo'][$n]['XAdvanceL']; 
  21501.                                 } else { 
  21502.                                     $wordXAdvance[$k] = $chunk[18]['GPOSinfo'][$n]['XAdvanceL']; 
  21503.                                 } 
  21504.                             } 
  21505.                         } 
  21506.                         $lastoffset = $offset + 1; 
  21507.                     } 
  21508.  
  21509.                     $k++;  // last word 
  21510.                     foreach ($chunk[18]['GPOSinfo'] AS $n => $gpos) { 
  21511.                         if ($n >= $lastoffset && isset($chunk[18]['GPOSinfo'][$n]['XAdvanceL'])) { 
  21512.                             if (isset($wordXAdvance[$k])) { 
  21513.                                 $wordXAdvance[$k] += $chunk[18]['GPOSinfo'][$n]['XAdvanceL']; 
  21514.                             } else { 
  21515.                                 $wordXAdvance[$k] = $chunk[18]['GPOSinfo'][$n]['XAdvanceL']; 
  21516.                             } 
  21517.                         } 
  21518.                     } 
  21519.                 } 
  21520.  
  21521.                 $words = preg_split('/(\xe2\x80\x8b| )/', $line); // U+200B Zero Width word boundary, or space 
  21522.                 foreach ($words as $k => $word) { 
  21523.                     $word = trim($word); 
  21524.                     $wordwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($word, false, false, $chunk[8]); // Pass $textvar ($chunk[8]), but do OTLdata here 
  21525.                     // so don't have to split OTLdata for each word 
  21526.                     if (isset($wordXAdvance[$k])) { 
  21527.                         $wordwidth += ($wordXAdvance[$k] * 1000 / $this->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm']) * ($this->FontSize / 1000); 
  21528.                     } 
  21529.                     if ($k == 0) { 
  21530.                         $wordwidth += $lbw; 
  21531.                     } 
  21532.                     if ($k == (count($words) - 1)) { 
  21533.                         $wordwidth += $rbw; 
  21534.                     } 
  21535.  
  21536.                     // mPDF 6 
  21537.                     if (count($words) == 1 && substr($chunk[0], 0, 1) != ' ') { 
  21538.                         $acclength += $wordwidth; 
  21539.                     } elseif (count($words) > 1 && $k == 0 && substr($chunk[0], 0, 1) != ' ') { 
  21540.                         $acclength += $wordwidth; 
  21541.                     } else { 
  21542.                         $acclength = $wordwidth; 
  21543.                     } 
  21544.                     $acclongest = max($acclongest, $acclength); 
  21545.                     if (count($words) == 1 && substr($chunk[0], -1, 1) == ' ') { 
  21546.                         $acclength = 0; 
  21547.                     } elseif (count($words) > 1 && ($k != (count($words) - 1) || substr($chunk[0], -1, 1) == ' ')) { 
  21548.                         $acclength = 0; 
  21549.                     } 
  21550.  
  21551.                     //Warn user that maxwidth is insufficient 
  21552.                     if ($wordwidth > $maxwidth + 0.0001) { 
  21553.                         if ($wordwidth > $biggestword) { 
  21554.                             $biggestword = $wordwidth; 
  21555.                         } 
  21556.                         $toonarrow = true; 
  21557.                     } 
  21558.                 } 
  21559.             } 
  21560.  
  21561.             // mPDF 6  Accumulated length of biggest word - across multiple chunks 
  21562.             if ($acclongest > $maxwidth + 0.0001) { 
  21563.                 if ($acclongest > $biggestword) { 
  21564.                     $biggestword = $acclongest; 
  21565.                 } 
  21566.                 $toonarrow = true; 
  21567.             } 
  21568.  
  21569.             // RESET FONT SIZE/STYLE 
  21570.             // RESETTING VALUES 
  21571.             //Now we must deactivate what we have used 
  21572.             if (isset($chunk[2]) and $chunk[2] != '') { 
  21573.                 $this->ResetStyles(); 
  21574.             } 
  21575.             if (isset($chunk[4]) and $chunk[4] != '') { 
  21576.                 $this->SetFont($this->default_font, $this->FontStyle, 0, false); 
  21577.             } 
  21578.             if (isset($chunk[11]) and $chunk[11] != '') { 
  21579.                 $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size, false); 
  21580.             } 
  21581.             $this->spanborddet = array(); 
  21582.             $this->textvar = 0x00; // mPDF 5.7.1 
  21583.             $this->OTLtags = array(); 
  21584.             $this->lSpacingCSS = ''; 
  21585.             $this->wSpacingCSS = ''; 
  21586.             $this->fixedlSpacing = false; 
  21587.             $this->minwSpacing = 0; 
  21588.         } 
  21589.  
  21590.         //Return -(wordsize) if word is bigger than maxwidth 
  21591.         // ADDED 
  21592.         if (($toonarrow) && ($this->table_error_report)) { 
  21593.             throw new MpdfException("Word is too long to fit in table - " . $this->table_error_report_param); 
  21594.         } 
  21595.         if ($toonarrow) 
  21596.             return -$biggestword; 
  21597.         else 
  21598.             return 1; 
  21599.     } 
  21600.  
  21601.     function shrinkTable(&$table, $k) 
  21602.     { 
  21603.         $table['border_spacing_H'] /= $k; 
  21604.         $table['border_spacing_V'] /= $k; 
  21605.  
  21606.         $table['padding']['T'] /= $k; 
  21607.         $table['padding']['R'] /= $k; 
  21608.         $table['padding']['B'] /= $k; 
  21609.         $table['padding']['L'] /= $k; 
  21610.  
  21611.         $table['margin']['T'] /= $k; 
  21612.         $table['margin']['R'] /= $k; 
  21613.         $table['margin']['B'] /= $k; 
  21614.         $table['margin']['L'] /= $k; 
  21615.  
  21616.         $table['border_details']['T']['w'] /= $k; 
  21617.         $table['border_details']['R']['w'] /= $k; 
  21618.         $table['border_details']['B']['w'] /= $k; 
  21619.         $table['border_details']['L']['w'] /= $k; 
  21620.  
  21621.         if (isset($table['max_cell_border_width']['T'])) 
  21622.             $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] /= $k; 
  21623.         if (isset($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'])) 
  21624.             $table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] /= $k; 
  21625.         if (isset($table['max_cell_border_width']['B'])) 
  21626.             $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] /= $k; 
  21627.         if (isset($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'])) 
  21628.             $table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] /= $k; 
  21629.  
  21630.         if ($this->simpleTables) { 
  21631.             $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w'] /= $k; 
  21632.             $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] /= $k; 
  21633.             $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w'] /= $k; 
  21634.             $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] /= $k; 
  21635.         } 
  21636.  
  21637.         $table['miw'] /= $k; 
  21638.         $table['maw'] /= $k; 
  21639.  
  21640.         for ($j = 0; $j < $table['nc']; $j++) { //columns 
  21641.             $table['wc'][$j]['miw'] /= $k; 
  21642.             $table['wc'][$j]['maw'] /= $k; 
  21643.  
  21644.             if (isset($table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs0']) && $table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs0']) { 
  21645.                 $table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs0'] /= $k; 
  21646.             } 
  21647.             if (isset($table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs1']) && $table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs1']) { 
  21648.                 $table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs1'] /= $k; 
  21649.             } 
  21650.  
  21651.             if (isset($table['wc'][$j]['absmiw']) && $table['wc'][$j]['absmiw']) 
  21652.                 $table['wc'][$j]['absmiw'] /= $k; 
  21653.  
  21654.             for ($i = 0; $i < $table['nr']; $i++) { //rows 
  21655.                 $c = &$table['cells'][$i][$j]; 
  21656.                 if (isset($c) && $c) { 
  21657.                     if (!$this->simpleTables) { 
  21658.                         if ($this->packTableData) { 
  21659.                             $cell = $this->_unpackCellBorder($c['borderbin']); 
  21660.                             $cell['border_details']['T']['w'] /= $k; 
  21661.                             $cell['border_details']['R']['w'] /= $k; 
  21662.                             $cell['border_details']['B']['w'] /= $k; 
  21663.                             $cell['border_details']['L']['w'] /= $k; 
  21664.                             $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] /= $k; 
  21665.                             $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] /= $k; 
  21666.                             $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] /= $k; 
  21667.                             $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] /= $k; 
  21668.                             $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] /= $k; 
  21669.                             $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] /= $k; 
  21670.                             $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] /= $k; 
  21671.                             $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] /= $k; 
  21672.                             $c['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($cell); 
  21673.                         } else { 
  21674.                             $c['border_details']['T']['w'] /= $k; 
  21675.                             $c['border_details']['R']['w'] /= $k; 
  21676.                             $c['border_details']['B']['w'] /= $k; 
  21677.                             $c['border_details']['L']['w'] /= $k; 
  21678.                             $c['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] /= $k; 
  21679.                             $c['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] /= $k; 
  21680.                             $c['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] /= $k; 
  21681.                             $c['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] /= $k; 
  21682.                             $c['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] /= $k; 
  21683.                             $c['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] /= $k; 
  21684.                             $c['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] /= $k; 
  21685.                             $c['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] /= $k; 
  21686.                         } 
  21687.                     } 
  21688.                     $c['padding']['T'] /= $k; 
  21689.                     $c['padding']['R'] /= $k; 
  21690.                     $c['padding']['B'] /= $k; 
  21691.                     $c['padding']['L'] /= $k; 
  21692.                     if (isset($c['maxs'])) { 
  21693.                         $c['maxs'] /= $k; 
  21694.                     } 
  21695.                     if (isset($c['w'])) {
