  21696.                         $c['w'] /= $k; 
  21697.                     } 
  21698.                     $c['s'] /= $k; 
  21699.                     $c['maw'] /= $k; 
  21700.                     $c['miw'] /= $k; 
  21701.                     if (isset($c['h'])) { 
  21702.                         $c['h'] /= $k; 
  21703.                     } // mPDF 5.7.4 
  21704.                     if (isset($c['absmiw'])) 
  21705.                         $c['absmiw'] /= $k; 
  21706.                     if (isset($c['nestedmaw'])) 
  21707.                         $c['nestedmaw'] /= $k; 
  21708.                     if (isset($c['nestedmiw'])) 
  21709.                         $c['nestedmiw'] /= $k; 
  21710.                     if (isset($c['textbuffer'])) { 
  21711.                         foreach ($c['textbuffer'] AS $n => $tb) { 
  21712.                             if (!empty($tb[16])) { 
  21713.                                 $c['textbuffer'][$n][16]['T']['w'] /= $k; 
  21714.                                 $c['textbuffer'][$n][16]['B']['w'] /= $k; 
  21715.                                 $c['textbuffer'][$n][16]['L']['w'] /= $k; 
  21716.                                 $c['textbuffer'][$n][16]['R']['w'] /= $k; 
  21717.                             } 
  21718.                         } 
  21719.                     } 
  21720.                     unset($c); 
  21721.                 } 
  21722.             }//rows 
  21723.         }//columns 
  21724.     } 
  21725.  
  21726.     function read_short(&$fh) 
  21727.     { 
  21728.         $s = fread($fh, 2); 
  21729.         $a = (ord($s[0]) << 8) + ord($s[1]); 
  21730.         if ($a & (1 << 15)) { 
  21731.             $a = ($a - (1 << 16)); 
  21732.         } 
  21733.         return $a; 
  21734.     } 
  21735.  
  21736.     function _packCellBorder($cell) 
  21737.     { 
  21738.         if (!is_array($cell) || !isset($cell)) { 
  21739.             return ''; 
  21740.         } 
  21741.  
  21742.         if (!$this->packTableData) { 
  21743.             return $cell; 
  21744.         } 
  21745.         // = 186 bytes 
  21746.         $bindata = pack("nnda6A10nnda6A10nnda6A10nnda6A10nd9", $cell['border'], $cell['border_details']['R']['s'], $cell['border_details']['R']['w'], $cell['border_details']['R']['c'], $cell['border_details']['R']['style'], $cell['border_details']['R']['dom'], $cell['border_details']['L']['s'], $cell['border_details']['L']['w'], $cell['border_details']['L']['c'], $cell['border_details']['L']['style'], $cell['border_details']['L']['dom'], $cell['border_details']['T']['s'], $cell['border_details']['T']['w'], $cell['border_details']['T']['c'], $cell['border_details']['T']['style'], $cell['border_details']['T']['dom'], $cell['border_details']['B']['s'], $cell['border_details']['B']['w'], $cell['border_details']['B']['c'], $cell['border_details']['B']['style'], $cell['border_details']['B']['dom'], $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BL'], $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BR'], $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RT'], $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RB'], $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TL'], $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TR'], $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LT'], $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LB'], (isset($cell['border_details']['cellposdom']) ? $cell['border_details']['cellposdom'] : 0) 
  21747.  ); 
  21748.         return $bindata; 
  21749.     } 
  21750.  
  21751.     function _getBorderWidths($bindata) 
  21752.     { 
  21753.         if (!$bindata) { 
  21754.             return array(0, 0, 0, 0); 
  21755.         } 
  21756.         if (!$this->packTableData) { 
  21757.             return array($bindata['border_details']['T']['w'], $bindata['border_details']['R']['w'], $bindata['border_details']['B']['w'], $bindata['border_details']['L']['w']); 
  21758.         } 
  21759.  
  21760.         $bd = unpack("nbord/nrs/drw/a6rca/A10rst/nrd/nls/dlw/a6lca/A10lst/nld/nts/dtw/a6tca/A10tst/ntd/nbs/dbw/a6bca/A10bst/nbd/dmbl/dmbr/dmrt/dmrb/dmtl/dmtr/dmlt/dmlb/dcpd", $bindata); 
  21761.         $cell['border_details']['R']['w'] = $bd['rw']; 
  21762.         $cell['border_details']['L']['w'] = $bd['lw']; 
  21763.         $cell['border_details']['T']['w'] = $bd['tw']; 
  21764.         $cell['border_details']['B']['w'] = $bd['bw']; 
  21765.         return array($bd['tw'], $bd['rw'], $bd['bw'], $bd['lw']); 
  21766.     } 
  21767.  
  21768.     function _unpackCellBorder($bindata) 
  21769.     { 
  21770.         if (!$bindata) { 
  21771.             return array(); 
  21772.         } 
  21773.         if (!$this->packTableData) { 
  21774.             return $bindata; 
  21775.         } 
  21776.  
  21777.         $bd = unpack("nbord/nrs/drw/a6rca/A10rst/nrd/nls/dlw/a6lca/A10lst/nld/nts/dtw/a6tca/A10tst/ntd/nbs/dbw/a6bca/A10bst/nbd/dmbl/dmbr/dmrt/dmrb/dmtl/dmtr/dmlt/dmlb/dcpd", $bindata); 
  21778.  
  21779.         $cell['border'] = $bd['bord']; 
  21780.         $cell['border_details']['R']['s'] = $bd['rs']; 
  21781.         $cell['border_details']['R']['w'] = $bd['rw']; 
  21782.         $cell['border_details']['R']['c'] = str_pad($bd['rca'], 6, "\x00"); 
  21783.         $cell['border_details']['R']['style'] = trim($bd['rst']); 
  21784.         $cell['border_details']['R']['dom'] = $bd['rd']; 
  21785.  
  21786.         $cell['border_details']['L']['s'] = $bd['ls']; 
  21787.         $cell['border_details']['L']['w'] = $bd['lw']; 
  21788.         $cell['border_details']['L']['c'] = str_pad($bd['lca'], 6, "\x00"); 
  21789.         $cell['border_details']['L']['style'] = trim($bd['lst']); 
  21790.         $cell['border_details']['L']['dom'] = $bd['ld']; 
  21791.  
  21792.         $cell['border_details']['T']['s'] = $bd['ts']; 
  21793.         $cell['border_details']['T']['w'] = $bd['tw']; 
  21794.         $cell['border_details']['T']['c'] = str_pad($bd['tca'], 6, "\x00"); 
  21795.         $cell['border_details']['T']['style'] = trim($bd['tst']); 
  21796.         $cell['border_details']['T']['dom'] = $bd['td']; 
  21797.  
  21798.         $cell['border_details']['B']['s'] = $bd['bs']; 
  21799.         $cell['border_details']['B']['w'] = $bd['bw']; 
  21800.         $cell['border_details']['B']['c'] = str_pad($bd['bca'], 6, "\x00"); 
  21801.         $cell['border_details']['B']['style'] = trim($bd['bst']); 
  21802.         $cell['border_details']['B']['dom'] = $bd['bd']; 
  21803.  
  21804.         $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = $bd['mbl']; 
  21805.         $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = $bd['mbr']; 
  21806.         $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = $bd['mrt']; 
  21807.         $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = $bd['mrb']; 
  21808.         $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] = $bd['mtl']; 
  21809.         $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] = $bd['mtr']; 
  21810.         $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = $bd['mlt']; 
  21811.         $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] = $bd['mlb']; 
  21812.         $cell['border_details']['cellposdom'] = $bd['cpd']; 
  21813.  
  21814.  
  21815.         return($cell); 
  21816.     } 
  21817.  
  21818.     ////////////////////////TABLE CODE (from PDFTable)///////////////////////////////////// 
  21819.     ////////////////////////TABLE CODE (from PDFTable)///////////////////////////////////// 
  21820.     ////////////////////////TABLE CODE (from PDFTable)///////////////////////////////////// 
  21821.     //table        Array of (w, h, bc, nr, wc, hr, cells) 
  21822.     //w            Width of table 
  21823.     //h            Height of table 
  21824.     //nc            Number column 
  21825.     //nr            Number row 
  21826.     //hr            List of height of each row 
  21827.     //wc            List of width of each column 
  21828.     //cells        List of cells of each rows, cells[i][j] is a cell in the table 
  21829.     function _tableColumnWidth(&$table, $firstpass = false) 
  21830.     { 
  21831.         $cs = &$table['cells']; 
  21832.  
  21833.         $nc = $table['nc']; 
  21834.         $nr = $table['nr']; 
  21835.         $listspan = array(); 
  21836.  
  21837.         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  21838.             $tblbw = $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] + $table['margin']['L'] + $table['margin']['R'] + $table['padding']['L'] + $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  21839.         } else { 
  21840.             $tblbw = $table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2 + $table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] / 2 + $table['margin']['L'] + $table['margin']['R']; 
  21841.         } 
  21842.  
  21843.         // ADDED table['l'][colno] 
  21844.         // = total length of text approx (using $c['s']) in that column - used to approximately distribute col widths in _tableWidth 
  21845.         // 
  21846.     for ($j = 0; $j < $nc; $j++) { //columns 
  21847.             $wc = &$table['wc'][$j]; 
  21848.             for ($i = 0; $i < $nr; $i++) { //rows 
  21849.                 if (isset($cs[$i][$j]) && $cs[$i][$j]) { 
  21850.                     $c = &$cs[$i][$j]; 
  21851.  
  21852.                     if ($this->simpleTables) { 
  21853.                         if ($table['borders_separate']) { // NB twice border width 
  21854.                             $extrcw = $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  21855.                         } else { 
  21856.                             $extrcw = $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] / 2 + $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] / 2 + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R']; 
  21857.                         } 
  21858.                     } else { 
  21859.                         if ($this->packTableData) { 
  21860.                             list($bt, $br, $bb, $bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($c['borderbin']); 
  21861.                         } else { 
  21862.                             $br = $c['border_details']['R']['w']; 
  21863.                             $bl = $c['border_details']['L']['w']; 
  21864.                         } 
  21865.                         if ($table['borders_separate']) { // NB twice border width 
  21866.                             $extrcw = $bl + $br + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  21867.                         } else { 
  21868.                             $extrcw = $bl / 2 + $br / 2 + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R']; 
  21869.                         } 
  21870.                     } 
  21871.  
  21872.                     //$mw = $this->GetStringWidth('W') + $extrcw ; 
  21873.                     $mw = $extrcw; // mPDF 6 
  21874.                     if (substr($c['a'], 0, 1) == 'D') { 
  21875.                         $mw = $table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs0'] + $table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs1'] + $extrcw; 
  21876.                     } 
  21877.  
  21878.                     $c['absmiw'] = $mw; 
  21879.  
  21880.                     if (isset($c['R']) && $c['R']) { 
  21881.                         $c['maw'] = $c['miw'] = $this->FontSize + $extrcw; 
  21882.                         if (isset($c['w'])) { // If cell width is specified 
  21883.                             if ($c['miw'] < $c['w']) { 
  21884.                                 $c['miw'] = $c['w']; 
  21885.                             } 
  21886.                         } 
  21887.                         if (!isset($c['colspan'])) { 
  21888.                             if ($wc['miw'] < $c['miw']) { 
  21889.                                 $wc['miw'] = $c['miw']; 
  21890.                             } 
  21891.                             if ($wc['maw'] < $c['maw']) { 
  21892.                                 $wc['maw'] = $c['maw']; 
  21893.                             } 
  21894.  
  21895.                             if ($firstpass) { 
  21896.                                 if (isset($table['l'][$j])) { 
  21897.                                     $table['l'][$j] += $c['miw']; 
  21898.                                 } else { 
  21899.                                     $table['l'][$j] = $c['miw']; 
  21900.                                 } 
  21901.                             } 
  21902.                         } 
  21903.                         if ($c['miw'] > $wc['miw']) { 
  21904.                             $wc['miw'] = $c['miw']; 
  21905.                         } 
  21906.                         if ($wc['miw'] > $wc['maw']) { 
  21907.                             $wc['maw'] = $wc['miw']; 
  21908.                         } 
  21909.                         continue; 
  21910.                     } 
  21911.  
  21912.                     if ($firstpass) { 
  21913.                         if (isset($c['s'])) { 
  21914.                             $c['s'] += $extrcw; 
  21915.                         } 
  21916.                         if (isset($c['maxs'])) { 
  21917.                             $c['maxs'] += $extrcw; 
  21918.                         } 
  21919.                         if (isset($c['nestedmiw'])) { 
  21920.                             $c['nestedmiw'] += $extrcw; 
  21921.                         } 
  21922.                         if (isset($c['nestedmaw'])) { 
  21923.                             $c['nestedmaw'] += $extrcw; 
  21924.                         } 
  21925.                     } 
  21926.  
  21927.  
  21928.                     // If minimum width has already been set by a nested table or inline object (image/form), use it 
  21929.                     if (isset($c['nestedmiw']) && (!isset($this->table[1][1]['overflow']) || $this->table[1][1]['overflow'] != 'visible')) { 
  21930.                         $miw = $c['nestedmiw']; 
  21931.                     } else { 
  21932.                         $miw = $mw; 
  21933.                     } 
  21934.  
  21935.                     if (isset($c['maxs']) && $c['maxs'] != '') { 
  21936.                         $c['s'] = $c['maxs']; 
  21937.                     } 
  21938.  
  21939.                     // If maximum width has already been set by a nested table, use it 
  21940.                     if (isset($c['nestedmaw'])) { 
  21941.                         $c['maw'] = $c['nestedmaw']; 
  21942.                     } else 
  21943.                         $c['maw'] = $c['s']; 
  21944.  
  21945.                     if (isset($table['overflow']) && $table['overflow'] == 'visible' && $table['level'] == 1) { 
  21946.                         if (($c['maw'] + $tblbw) > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) { 
  21947.                             $c['maw'] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] - $tblbw; 
  21948.                         } 
  21949.                     } 
  21950.  
  21951.                     if (isset($c['nowrap']) && $c['nowrap']) { 
  21952.                         $miw = $c['maw']; 
  21953.                     } 
  21954.  
  21955.                     if (isset($c['wpercent']) && $firstpass) { 
  21956.                         if (isset($c['colspan'])) { // Not perfect - but % set on colspan is shared equally on cols. 
  21957.                             for ($k = 0; $k < $c['colspan']; $k++) { 
  21958.                                 $table['wc'][($j + $k)]['wpercent'] = $c['wpercent'] / $c['colspan']; 
  21959.                             } 
  21960.                         } else { 
  21961.                             if (isset($table['w']) && $table['w']) { 
  21962.                                 $c['w'] = $c['wpercent'] / 100 * ($table['w'] - $tblbw ); 
  21963.                             } 
  21964.                             $wc['wpercent'] = $c['wpercent']; 
  21965.                         } 
  21966.                     } 
  21967.  
  21968.                     if (isset($table['overflow']) && $table['overflow'] == 'visible' && $table['level'] == 1) { 
  21969.                         if (isset($c['w']) && ($c['w'] + $tblbw) > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) { 
  21970.                             $c['w'] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] - $tblbw; 
  21971.                         } 
  21972.                     } 
  21973.  
  21974.  
  21975.                     if (isset($c['w'])) { // If cell width is specified 
  21976.                         if ($miw < $c['w']) { 
  21977.                             $c['miw'] = $c['w']; 
  21978.                         } // Cell min width = that specified 
  21979.                         if ($miw > $c['w']) { 
  21980.                             $c['miw'] = $c['w'] = $miw; 
  21981.                         } // If width specified is less than minimum allowed (W) increase it 
  21982.                         // mPDF 5.7.4  Do not set column width in colspan 
  21983.                         // cf. http://www.mpdf1.com/forum/discussion/2221/colspan-bug 
  21984.                         if (!isset($c['colspan'])) { 
  21985.                             if (!isset($wc['w'])) { 
  21986.                                 $wc['w'] = 1; 
  21987.                             }  // If the Col width is not specified = set it to 1 
  21988.                         } 
  21989.                         // mPDF 5.7.3  cf. http://www.mpdf1.com/forum/discussion/1648/nested-table-bug- 
  21990.                         $c['maw'] = $c['w']; 
  21991.                     } else { 
  21992.                         $c['miw'] = $miw; 
  21993.                     } // If cell width not specified -> set Cell min width it to minimum allowed (W) 
  21994.  
  21995.                     if (isset($c['miw']) && $c['maw'] < $c['miw']) { 
  21996.                         $c['maw'] = $c['miw']; 
  21997.                     } // If Cell max width < Minwidth - increase it to = 
  21998.                     if (!isset($c['colspan'])) { 
  21999.                         if (isset($c['miw']) && $wc['miw'] < $c['miw']) { 
  22000.                             $wc['miw'] = $c['miw']; 
  22001.                         } // Update Col Minimum and maximum widths 
  22002.                         if ($wc['maw'] < $c['maw']) { 
  22003.                             $wc['maw'] = $c['maw']; 
  22004.                         } 
  22005.                         if ((isset($wc['absmiw']) && $wc['absmiw'] < $c['absmiw']) || !isset($wc['absmiw'])) { 
  22006.                             $wc['absmiw'] = $c['absmiw']; 
  22007.                         } // Update Col Minimum and maximum widths 
  22008.  
  22009.                         if (isset($table['l'][$j])) { 
  22010.                             $table['l'][$j] += $c['s']; 
  22011.                         } else { 
  22012.                             $table['l'][$j] = $c['s']; 
  22013.                         } 
  22014.                     } else { 
  22015.                         $listspan[] = array($i, $j); 
  22016.                     } 
  22017.  
  22018.                     //Check if minimum width of the whole column is big enough for largest word to fit 
  22019.                     // mPDF 6 
  22020.                     if (isset($c['textbuffer'])) { 
  22021.                         if (isset($table['overflow']) && $table['overflow'] == 'wrap') { 
  22022.                             $letter = true; 
  22023.                         } // check for maximum width of letters 
  22024.                         else { 
  22025.                             $letter = false; 
  22026.                         } 
  22027.                         $minwidth = $this->TableCheckMinWidth($wc['miw'] - $extrcw, 0, $c['textbuffer'], $letter); 
  22028.                     } else { 
  22029.                         $minwidth = 0; 
  22030.                     } 
  22031.                     if ($minwidth < 0) { 
  22032.                         //increase minimum width 
  22033.                         if (!isset($c['colspan'])) { 
  22034.                             $wc['miw'] = max($wc['miw'], ((-$minwidth) + $extrcw)); 
  22035.                         } else { 
  22036.                             $c['miw'] = max($c['miw'], ((-$minwidth) + $extrcw)); 
  22037.                         } 
  22038.                     } 
  22039.                     if (!isset($c['colspan'])) { 
  22040.                         if ($wc['miw'] > $wc['maw']) { 
  22041.                             $wc['maw'] = $wc['miw']; 
  22042.                         } //update maximum width, if needed 
  22043.                     } 
  22044.                 } 
  22045.                 unset($c); 
  22046.             }//rows 
  22047.         }//columns 
  22048.         // COLUMN SPANS 
  22049.         $wc = &$table['wc']; 
  22050.         foreach ($listspan as $span) { 
  22051.             list($i, $j) = $span; 
  22052.             $c = &$cs[$i][$j]; 
  22053.             $lc = $j + $c['colspan']; 
  22054.             if ($lc > $nc) { 
  22055.                 $lc = $nc; 
  22056.             } 
  22057.             $wis = $wisa = 0; 
  22058.             $was = $wasa = 0; 
  22059.             $list = array(); 
  22060.             for ($k = $j; $k < $lc; $k++) { 
  22061.                 if (isset($table['l'][$k])) { 
  22062.                     if ($c['R']) { 
  22063.                         $table['l'][$k] += $c['miw'] / $c['colspan']; 
  22064.                     } else { 
  22065.                         $table['l'][$k] += $c['s'] / $c['colspan']; 
  22066.                     } 
  22067.                 } else { 
  22068.                     if ($c['R']) { 
  22069.                         $table['l'][$k] = $c['miw'] / $c['colspan']; 
  22070.                     } else { 
  22071.                         $table['l'][$k] = $c['s'] / $c['colspan']; 
  22072.                     } 
  22073.                 } 
  22074.                 $wis += $wc[$k]['miw'];   // $wis is the sum of the column miw in the colspan 
  22075.                 $was += $wc[$k]['maw'];   // $was is the sum of the column maw in the colspan 
  22076.                 if (!isset($c['w'])) { 
  22077.                     $list[] = $k; 
  22078.                     $wisa += $wc[$k]['miw']; // $wisa is the sum of the column miw in cells with no width specified in the colspan 
  22079.                     $wasa += $wc[$k]['maw']; // $wasa is the sum of the column maw in cells with no width specified in the colspan 
  22080.                 } 
  22081.             } 
  22082.             if ($c['miw'] > $wis) { 
  22083.                 if (!$wis) { 
  22084.                     for ($k = $j; $k < $lc; $k++) { 
  22085.                         $wc[$k]['miw'] = $c['miw'] / $c['colspan']; 
  22086.                     } 
  22087.                 } elseif (!count($list)) { 
  22088.                     $wi = $c['miw'] - $wis; 
  22089.                     for ($k = $j; $k < $lc; $k++) { 
  22090.                         $wc[$k]['miw'] += ($wc[$k]['miw'] / $wis) * $wi; 
  22091.                     } 
  22092.                 } else { 
  22093.                     $wi = $c['miw'] - $wis; 
  22094.                     // mPDF 5.7.2   Extra min width distributed proportionately to all cells in colspan without a specified width 
  22095.                     // cf. http://www.mpdf1.com/forum/discussion/1607#Item_4 
  22096.                     foreach ($list as $k) { 
  22097.                         if (!isset($wc[$k]['w']) || !$wc[$k]['w']) 
  22098.                             $wc[$k]['miw'] += ($wc[$k]['miw'] / $wisa) * $wi; 
  22099.                     } // mPDF 5.7.2 
  22100.                 } 
  22101.             } 
  22102.             if ($c['maw'] > $was) { 
  22103.                 if (!$wis) { 
  22104.                     for ($k = $j; $k < $lc; $k++) { 
  22105.                         $wc[$k]['maw'] = $c['maw'] / $c['colspan']; 
  22106.                     } 
  22107.                 } elseif (!count($list)) { 
  22108.                     $wi = $c['maw'] - $was; 
  22109.                     for ($k = $j; $k < $lc; $k++) { 
  22110.                         $wc[$k]['maw'] += ($wc[$k]['maw'] / $was) * $wi; 
  22111.                     } 
  22112.                 } else { 
  22113.                     $wi = $c['maw'] - $was; 
  22114.                     // mPDF 5.7.4  Extra max width distributed evenly to all cells in colspan without a specified width 
  22115.                     // cf. http://www.mpdf1.com/forum/discussion/2221/colspan-bug 
  22116.                     foreach ($list as $k) { 
  22117.                         $wc[$k]['maw'] += $wi / count($list); 
  22118.                     } 
  22119.                 } 
  22120.             } 
  22121.             unset($c); 
  22122.         } 
  22123.  
  22124.         $checkminwidth = 0; 
  22125.         $checkmaxwidth = 0; 
  22126.         $totallength = 0; 
  22127.  
  22128.         for ($i = 0; $i < $nc; $i++) { 
  22129.             $checkminwidth += $table['wc'][$i]['miw']; 
  22130.             $checkmaxwidth += $table['wc'][$i]['maw']; 
  22131.             $totallength += $table['l'][$i]; 
  22132.         } 
  22133.  
  22134.         if (!isset($table['w']) && $firstpass) { 
  22135.             $sumpc = 0; 
  22136.             $notset = 0; 
  22137.             for ($i = 0; $i < $nc; $i++) { 
  22138.                 if (isset($table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']) && $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']) { 
  22139.                     $sumpc += $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']; 
  22140.                 } else { 
  22141.                     $notset++; 
  22142.                 } 
  22143.             } 
  22144.  
  22145.             // If sum of widths as %  >= 100% and not all columns are set 
  22146.             // Set a nominal width of 1% for unset columns 
  22147.             if ($sumpc >= 100 && $notset) { 
  22148.                 for ($i = 0; $i < $nc; $i++) { 
  22149.                     if ((!isset($table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']) || !$table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']) && 
  22150.                         (!isset($table['wc'][$i]['w']) || !$table['wc'][$i]['w'])) { 
  22151.                         $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'] = 1; 
  22152.                     } 
  22153.                 } 
  22154.             } 
  22155.  
  22156.  
  22157.             if ($sumpc) { // if any percents are set 
  22158.                 $sumnonpc = (100 - $sumpc); 
  22159.                 $sumpc = max($sumpc, 100); 
  22160.                 $miwleft = 0; 
  22161.                 $miwleftcount = 0; 
  22162.                 $miwsurplusnonpc = 0; 
  22163.                 $maxcalcmiw = 0; 
  22164.                 $mawleft = 0; 
  22165.                 $mawleftcount = 0; 
  22166.                 $mawsurplusnonpc = 0; 
  22167.                 $maxcalcmaw = 0; 
  22168.                 $mawnon = 0; 
  22169.                 $miwnon = 0; 
  22170.                 for ($i = 0; $i < $nc; $i++) { 
  22171.                     if (isset($table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'])) { 
  22172.                         $maxcalcmiw = max($maxcalcmiw, ($table['wc'][$i]['miw'] * $sumpc / $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'])); 
  22173.                         $maxcalcmaw = max($maxcalcmaw, ($table['wc'][$i]['maw'] * $sumpc / $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'])); 
  22174.                     } else { 
  22175.                         $miwleft += $table['wc'][$i]['miw']; 
  22176.                         $mawleft += $table['wc'][$i]['maw']; 
  22177.                         if (!isset($table['wc'][$i]['w'])) { 
  22178.                             $miwleftcount++; 
  22179.                             $mawleftcount++; 
  22180.                         } 
  22181.                     } 
  22182.                 } 
  22183.                 if ($miwleft && $sumnonpc > 0) { 
  22184.                     $miwnon = $miwleft * 100 / $sumnonpc; 
  22185.                 } 
  22186.                 if ($mawleft && $sumnonpc > 0) { 
  22187.                     $mawnon = $mawleft * 100 / $sumnonpc; 
  22188.                 } 
  22189.                 if (($miwnon > $checkminwidth || $maxcalcmiw > $checkminwidth) && $this->keep_table_proportions) { 
  22190.                     if ($miwnon > $maxcalcmiw) { 
  22191.                         $miwsurplusnonpc = round((($miwnon * $sumnonpc / 100) - $miwleft), 3); 
  22192.                         $checkminwidth = $miwnon; 
  22193.                     } else { 
  22194.                         $checkminwidth = $maxcalcmiw; 
  22195.                     } 
  22196.                     for ($i = 0; $i < $nc; $i++) { 
  22197.                         if (isset($table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'])) { 
  22198.                             $newmiw = $checkminwidth * $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'] / 100; 
  22199.                             if ($table['wc'][$i]['miw'] < $newmiw) { 
  22200.                                 $table['wc'][$i]['miw'] = $newmiw; 
  22201.                             } 
  22202.                             $table['wc'][$i]['w'] = 1; 
  22203.                         } elseif ($miwsurplusnonpc && !$table['wc'][$i]['w']) { 
  22204.                             $table['wc'][$i]['miw'] += $miwsurplusnonpc / $miwleftcount; 
  22205.                         } 
  22206.                     } 
  22207.                 } 
  22208.                 if (($mawnon > $checkmaxwidth || $maxcalcmaw > $checkmaxwidth)) { 
  22209.                     if ($mawnon > $maxcalcmaw) { 
  22210.                         $mawsurplusnonpc = round((($mawnon * $sumnonpc / 100) - $mawleft), 3); 
  22211.                         $checkmaxwidth = $mawnon; 
  22212.                     } else { 
  22213.                         $checkmaxwidth = $maxcalcmaw; 
  22214.                     } 
  22215.                     for ($i = 0; $i < $nc; $i++) { 
  22216.                         if (isset($table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'])) { 
  22217.                             $newmaw = $checkmaxwidth * $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'] / 100; 
  22218.                             if ($table['wc'][$i]['maw'] < $newmaw) { 
  22219.                                 $table['wc'][$i]['maw'] = $newmaw; 
  22220.                             } 
  22221.                             $table['wc'][$i]['w'] = 1; 
  22222.                         } elseif ($mawsurplusnonpc && !$table['wc'][$i]['w']) { 
  22223.                             $table['wc'][$i]['maw'] += $mawsurplusnonpc / $mawleftcount; 
  22224.                         } 
  22225.                         if ($table['wc'][$i]['maw'] < $table['wc'][$i]['miw']) { 
  22226.                             $table['wc'][$i]['maw'] = $table['wc'][$i]['miw']; 
  22227.                         } 
  22228.                     } 
  22229.                 } 
  22230.                 if ($checkminwidth > $checkmaxwidth) { 
  22231.                     $checkmaxwidth = $checkminwidth; 
  22232.                 } 
  22233.             } 
  22234.         } 
  22235.  
  22236.         if (isset($table['wpercent']) && $table['wpercent']) { 
  22237.             $checkminwidth *= (100 / $table['wpercent']); 
  22238.             $checkmaxwidth *= (100 / $table['wpercent']); 
  22239.         } 
  22240.  
  22241.  
  22242.         $checkminwidth += $tblbw; 
  22243.         $checkmaxwidth += $tblbw; 
  22244.  
  22245.         // Table['miw'] set by percent in first pass may be larger than sum of column miw 
  22246.         if ((isset($table['miw']) && $checkminwidth > $table['miw']) || !isset($table['miw'])) { 
  22247.             $table['miw'] = $checkminwidth; 
  22248.         } 
  22249.         if ((isset($table['maw']) && $checkmaxwidth > $table['maw']) || !isset($table['maw'])) { 
  22250.             $table['maw'] = $checkmaxwidth; 
  22251.         } 
  22252.         $table['tl'] = $totallength; 
  22253.  
  22254.  
  22255.         // mPDF 6 
  22256.         if ($this->table_rotate) { 
  22257.             $mxw = $this->tbrot_maxw; 
  22258.         } else { 
  22259.             $mxw = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; 
  22260.         } 
  22261.         if (!isset($table['overflow'])) { 
  22262.             $table['overflow'] = null; 
  22263.         } 
  22264.         if ($table['overflow'] == 'visible') { 
  22265.             return array(0, 0); 
  22266.         } elseif ($table['overflow'] == 'hidden' && !$this->table_rotate && !$this->ColActive && $checkminwidth > $mxw) { 
  22267.             $table['w'] = $table['miw']; 
  22268.             return array(0, 0); 
  22269.         } 
  22270.         //elseif ($table['overflow']=='wrap') { return array(0, 0); }    // mPDF 6 
  22271.  
  22272.         if (isset($table['w']) && $table['w']) { 
  22273.             if ($table['w'] >= $checkminwidth && $table['w'] <= $mxw) { 
  22274.                 $table['maw'] = $mxw = $table['w']; 
  22275.             } elseif ($table['w'] >= $checkminwidth && $table['w'] > $mxw && $this->keep_table_proportions) { 
  22276.                 $checkminwidth = $table['w']; 
  22277.             } elseif ($table['w'] < $checkminwidth && $checkminwidth < $mxw && $this->keep_table_proportions) { 
  22278.                 $table['maw'] = $table['w'] = $checkminwidth; 
  22279.             } // mPDF 5.7.4 
  22280.             else { 
  22281.                 unset($table['w']); 
  22282.             } 
  22283.         } 
  22284.         $ratio = $checkminwidth / $mxw; 
  22285.         if ($checkminwidth > $mxw) { 
  22286.             return array(($ratio + 0.001), $checkminwidth); 
  22287.         } // 0.001 to allow for rounded numbers when resizing 
  22288.         unset($cs); 
  22289.         return array(0, 0); 
  22290.     } 
  22291.  
  22292.     function _tableWidth(&$table) 
  22293.     { 
  22294.         $widthcols = &$table['wc']; 
  22295.         $numcols = $table['nc']; 
  22296.         $tablewidth = 0; 
  22297.         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  22298.             $tblbw = $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] + $table['margin']['L'] + $table['margin']['R'] + $table['padding']['L'] + $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  22299.         } else { 
  22300.             $tblbw = $table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2 + $table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] / 2 + $table['margin']['L'] + $table['margin']['R']; 
  22301.         } 
  22302.  
  22303.         if ($table['level'] > 1 && isset($table['w'])) { 
  22304.             if (isset($table['wpercent']) && $table['wpercent']) { 
  22305.                 $table['w'] = $temppgwidth = (($table['w'] - $tblbw) * $table['wpercent'] / 100) + $tblbw; 
  22306.             } else { 
  22307.                 $temppgwidth = $table['w']; 
  22308.             } 
  22309.         } elseif ($this->table_rotate) { 
  22310.             $temppgwidth = $this->tbrot_maxw; 
  22311.             // If it is less than 1/20th of the remaining page height to finish the DIV (i.e. DIV padding + table bottom margin) 
  22312.             // then allow for this 
  22313.             $enddiv = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w']; 
  22314.             if ($enddiv / $temppgwidth < 0.05) { 
  22315.                 $temppgwidth -= $enddiv; 
  22316.             } 
  22317.         } else { 
  22318.             if (isset($table['w']) && $table['w'] < $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) { 
  22319.                 $notfullwidth = 1; 
  22320.                 $temppgwidth = $table['w']; 
  22321.             } elseif ($table['overflow'] == 'visible' && $table['level'] == 1) { 
  22322.                 $temppgwidth = null; 
  22323.             } elseif ($table['overflow'] == 'hidden' && !$this->ColActive && isset($table['w']) && $table['w'] > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] && $table['w'] == $table['miw']) { 
  22324.                 //$temppgwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; 
  22325.                 $temppgwidth = $table['w']; 
  22326.             } else { 
  22327.                 $temppgwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; 
  22328.             } 
  22329.         } 
  22330.  
  22331.  
  22332.         $totaltextlength = 0; // Added - to sum $table['l'][colno] 
  22333.         $totalatextlength = 0; // Added - to sum $table['l'][colno] for those columns where width not set 
  22334.         $percentages_set = 0; 
  22335.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; $i++) { 
  22336.             if (isset($widthcols[$i]['wpercent'])) { 
  22337.                 $tablewidth += $widthcols[$i]['maw']; 
  22338.                 $percentages_set = 1; 
  22339.             } elseif (isset($widthcols[$i]['w'])) { 
  22340.                 $tablewidth += $widthcols[$i]['miw']; 
  22341.             } else { 
  22342.                 $tablewidth += $widthcols[$i]['maw']; 
  22343.             } 
  22344.             $totaltextlength += $table['l'][$i]; 
  22345.         } 
  22346.         if (!$totaltextlength) { 
  22347.             $totaltextlength = 1; 
  22348.         } 
  22349.         $tablewidth += $tblbw; // Outer half of table borders 
  22350.  
  22351.         if ($tablewidth > $temppgwidth) { 
  22352.             $table['w'] = $temppgwidth; 
  22353.         } 
  22354.         // if any widths set as percentages and max width fits < page width 
  22355.         elseif ($tablewidth < $temppgwidth && !isset($table['w']) && $percentages_set) { 
  22356.             $table['w'] = $table['maw']; 
  22357.         } 
  22358.         // if table width is set and is > allowed width 
  22359.         if (isset($table['w']) && $table['w'] > $temppgwidth) { 
  22360.             $table['w'] = $temppgwidth; 
  22361.         } 
  22362.  
  22363.         // IF the table width is now set - Need to distribute columns widths 
  22364.         // mPDF 5.7.3 
  22365.         // If the table width is already set to the maximum width (e.g. nested table), then use maximum column widths exactly 
  22366.         if (isset($table['w']) && ($table['w'] == $tablewidth) && !$percentages_set) { 
  22367.             // This sets the columns all to maximum width 
  22368.             for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; $i++) { 
  22369.                 $widthcols[$i] = $widthcols[$i]['maw']; 
  22370.             } 
  22371.         } 
  22372.         // elseif the table width is set distribute width using algorithm 
  22373.         elseif (isset($table['w'])) { 
  22374.             $wis = $wisa = 0; 
  22375.             $list = array(); 
  22376.             $notsetlist = array(); 
  22377.             for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; $i++) { 
  22378.                 $wis += $widthcols[$i]['miw']; 
  22379.                 if (!isset($widthcols[$i]['w']) || ($widthcols[$i]['w'] && $table['w'] > $temppgwidth && !$this->keep_table_proportions && !$notfullwidth )) { 
  22380.                     $list[] = $i; 
  22381.                     $wisa += $widthcols[$i]['miw']; 
  22382.                     $totalatextlength += $table['l'][$i]; 
  22383.                 } 
  22384.             } 
  22385.             if (!$totalatextlength) { 
  22386.                 $totalatextlength = 1; 
  22387.             } 
  22388.  
  22389.             // Allocate spare (more than col's minimum width) across the cols according to their approx total text length 
  22390.             // Do it by setting minimum width here 
  22391.             if ($table['w'] > $wis + $tblbw) { 
  22392.                 // First set any cell widths set as percentages 
  22393.                 if ($table['w'] < $temppgwidth || $this->keep_table_proportions) { 
  22394.                     for ($k = 0; $k < $numcols; $k++) { 
  22395.                         if (isset($widthcols[$k]['wpercent'])) { 
  22396.                             $curr = $widthcols[$k]['miw']; 
  22397.                             $widthcols[$k]['miw'] = ($table['w'] - $tblbw) * $widthcols[$k]['wpercent'] / 100; 
  22398.                             $wis += $widthcols[$k]['miw'] - $curr; 
  22399.                             $wisa += $widthcols[$k]['miw'] - $curr; 
  22400.                         } 
  22401.                     } 
  22402.                 } 
  22403.                 // Now allocate surplus up to maximum width of each column 
  22404.                 $surplus = 0; 
  22405.                 $ttl = 0; // number of surplus columns 
  22406.                 if (!count($list)) { 
  22407.                     $wi = ($table['w'] - ($wis + $tblbw)); //    i.e. extra space to distribute 
  22408.                     for ($k = 0; $k < $numcols; $k++) { 
  22409.                         $spareratio = ($table['l'][$k] / $totaltextlength); //  gives ratio to divide up free space 
  22410.                         // Don't allocate more than Maximum required width - save rest in surplus 
  22411.                         if ($widthcols[$k]['miw'] + ($wi * $spareratio) >= $widthcols[$k]['maw']) { // mPDF 5.7.3 
  22412.                             $surplus += ($wi * $spareratio) - ($widthcols[$k]['maw'] - $widthcols[$k]['miw']); 
  22413.                             $widthcols[$k]['miw'] = $widthcols[$k]['maw']; 
  22414.                         } else { 
  22415.                             $notsetlist[] = $k; 
  22416.                             $ttl += $table['l'][$k]; 
  22417.                             $widthcols[$k]['miw'] += ($wi * $spareratio); 
  22418.                         } 
  22419.                     } 
  22420.                 } else { 
  22421.                     $wi = ($table['w'] - ($wis + $tblbw)); //    i.e. extra space to distribute 
  22422.                     foreach ($list as $k) { 
  22423.                         $spareratio = ($table['l'][$k] / $totalatextlength); //  gives ratio to divide up free space 
  22424.                         // Don't allocate more than Maximum required width - save rest in surplus 
  22425.                         if ($widthcols[$k]['miw'] + ($wi * $spareratio) >= $widthcols[$k]['maw']) { // mPDF 5.7.3 
  22426.                             $surplus += ($wi * $spareratio) - ($widthcols[$k]['maw'] - $widthcols[$k]['miw']); 
  22427.                             $widthcols[$k]['miw'] = $widthcols[$k]['maw']; 
  22428.                         } else { 
  22429.                             $notsetlist[] = $k; 
  22430.                             $ttl += $table['l'][$k]; 
  22431.                             $widthcols[$k]['miw'] += ($wi * $spareratio); 
  22432.                         } 
  22433.                     } 
  22434.                 } 
  22435.                 // If surplus still left over apportion it across columns 
  22436.                 if ($surplus) { 
  22437.                     // if some are set only add to remaining - otherwise add to all of them 
  22438.                     if (count($notsetlist) && count($notsetlist) < $numcols) { 
  22439.                         foreach ($notsetlist AS $i) { 
  22440.                             if ($ttl) 
  22441.                                 $widthcols[$i]['miw'] += $surplus * $table['l'][$i] / $ttl; 
  22442.                         } 
  22443.                     } 
  22444.                     // If some widths are defined, and others have been added up to their maxmum 
  22445.                     elseif (count($list) && count($list) < $numcols) { 
  22446.                         foreach ($list AS $i) { 
  22447.                             $widthcols[$i]['miw'] += $surplus / count($list); 
  22448.                         } 
  22449.                     } elseif ($numcols) { // If all columns 
  22450.                         $ttl = array_sum($table['l']); 
  22451.                         for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; $i++) { 
  22452.                             $widthcols[$i]['miw'] += $surplus * $table['l'][$i] / $ttl; 
  22453.                         } 
  22454.                     } 
  22455.                 } 
  22456.             } 
  22457.  
  22458.             // This sets the columns all to minimum width (which has been increased above if appropriate) 
  22459.             for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; $i++) { 
  22460.                 $widthcols[$i] = $widthcols[$i]['miw']; 
  22461.             } 
  22462.  
  22463.             // TABLE NOT WIDE ENOUGH EVEN FOR MINIMUM CONTENT WIDTH 
  22464.             // If sum of column widths set are too wide for table 
  22465.             $checktablewidth = 0; 
  22466.             for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; $i++) { 
  22467.                 $checktablewidth += $widthcols[$i]; 
  22468.             } 
  22469.             if ($checktablewidth > ($temppgwidth + 0.001 - $tblbw)) { 
  22470.                 $usedup = 0; 
  22471.                 $numleft = 0; 
  22472.                 for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; $i++) { 
  22473.                     if ((isset($widthcols[$i]) && $widthcols[$i] > (($temppgwidth - $tblbw) / $numcols)) && (!isset($widthcols[$i]['w']))) { 
  22474.                         $numleft++; 
  22475.                         unset($widthcols[$i]); 
  22476.                     } else { 
  22477.                         $usedup += $widthcols[$i]; 
  22478.                     } 
  22479.                 } 
  22480.                 for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; $i++) { 
  22481.                     if (!isset($widthcols[$i]) || !$widthcols[$i]) { 
  22482.                         $widthcols[$i] = ((($temppgwidth - $tblbw) - $usedup) / ($numleft)); 
  22483.                     } 
  22484.                 } 
  22485.             } 
  22486.         } else { //table has no width defined 
  22487.             $table['w'] = $tablewidth; 
  22488.             for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; $i++) { 
  22489.                 if (isset($widthcols[$i]['wpercent']) && $this->keep_table_proportions) { 
  22490.                     $colwidth = $widthcols[$i]['maw']; 
  22491.                 } elseif (isset($widthcols[$i]['w'])) { 
  22492.                     $colwidth = $widthcols[$i]['miw']; 
  22493.                 } else { 
  22494.                     $colwidth = $widthcols[$i]['maw']; 
  22495.                 } 
  22496.                 unset($widthcols[$i]); 
  22497.                 $widthcols[$i] = $colwidth; 
  22498.             } 
  22499.         } 
  22500.  
  22501.         if ($table['overflow'] == 'visible' && $table['level'] == 1) { 
  22502.             if ($tablewidth > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) { 
  22503.                 for ($j = 0; $j < $numcols; $j++) { //columns 
  22504.                     for ($i = 0; $i < $table['nr']; $i++) { //rows 
  22505.                         if (isset($table['cells'][$i][$j]) && $table['cells'][$i][$j]) { 
  22506.                             $colspan = (isset($table['cells'][$i][$j]['colspan']) ? $table['cells'][$i][$j]['colspan'] : 1); 
  22507.                             if ($colspan > 1) { 
  22508.                                 $w = 0; 
  22509.                                 for ($c = $j; $c < ($j + $colspan); $c++) { 
  22510.                                     $w += $widthcols[$c]; 
  22511.                                 } 
  22512.                                 if ($w > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) { 
  22513.                                     $diff = $w - ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] - $tblbw); 
  22514.                                     for ($c = $j; $c < ($j + $colspan); $c++) { 
  22515.                                         $widthcols[$c] -= $diff * ($widthcols[$c] / $w); 
  22516.                                     } 
  22517.                                     $table['w'] -= $diff; 
  22518.                                     $table['csp'][$j] = $w - $diff; 
  22519.                                 } 
  22520.                             } 
  22521.                         } 
  22522.                     } 
  22523.                 } 
  22524.             } 
  22525.             $pgNo = 0; 
  22526.             $currWc = 0; 
  22527.             for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; $i++) { //columns 
  22528.                 if (isset($table['csp'][$i])) { 
  22529.                     $w = $table['csp'][$i]; 
  22530.                     unset($table['csp'][$i]); 
  22531.                 } else { 
  22532.                     $w = $widthcols[$i]; 
  22533.                 } 
  22534.                 if (($currWc + $w + $tblbw) > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) { 
  22535.                     $pgNo++; 
  22536.                     $currWc = $widthcols[$i]; 
  22537.                 } else { 
  22538.                     $currWc += $widthcols[$i]; 
  22539.                 } 
  22540.                 $table['colPg'][$i] = $pgNo; 
  22541.             } 
  22542.         } 
  22543.     } 
  22544.  
  22545.     function _tableHeight(&$table) 
  22546.     { 
  22547.         $level = $table['level']; 
  22548.         $levelid = $table['levelid']; 
  22549.         $cells = &$table['cells']; 
  22550.         $numcols = $table['nc']; 
  22551.         $numrows = $table['nr']; 
  22552.         $listspan = array(); 
  22553.         $checkmaxheight = 0; 
  22554.         $headerrowheight = 0; 
  22555.         $checkmaxheightplus = 0; 
  22556.         $headerrowheightplus = 0; 
  22557.         $firstrowheight = 0; 
  22558.  
  22559.         $footerrowheight = 0; 
  22560.         $footerrowheightplus = 0; 
  22561.         if ($this->table_rotate) { 
  22562.             $temppgheight = $this->tbrot_maxh; 
  22563.             $remainingpage = $this->tbrot_maxh; 
  22564.         } else { 
  22565.             $temppgheight = ($this->h - $this->bMargin - $this->tMargin) - $this->kwt_height; 
  22566.             $remainingpage = ($this->h - $this->bMargin - $this->y) - $this->kwt_height; 
  22567.  
  22568.             // If it is less than 1/20th of the remaining page height to finish the DIV (i.e. DIV padding + table bottom margin) 
  22569.             // then allow for this 
  22570.             $enddiv = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w'] + $table['margin']['B']; 
  22571.             if ($remainingpage > $enddiv && $enddiv / $remainingpage < 0.05) { 
  22572.                 $remainingpage -= $enddiv; 
  22573.             } elseif ($remainingpage == 0) { 
  22574.                 $remainingpage = 0.001; 
  22575.             } 
  22576.             if ($temppgheight > $enddiv && $enddiv / $temppgheight < 0.05) { 
  22577.                 $temppgheight -= $enddiv; 
  22578.             } elseif ($temppgheight == 0) { 
  22579.                 $temppgheight = 0.001; 
  22580.             } 
  22581.         } 
  22582.         if ($remainingpage < 0) { 
  22583.             $remainingpage = 0.001; 
  22584.         } 
  22585.         if ($temppgheight < 0) { 
  22586.             $temppgheight = 0.001; 
  22587.         } 
  22588.  
  22589.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numrows; $i++) { //rows 
  22590.             $heightrow = &$table['hr'][$i]; 
  22591.             for ($j = 0; $j < $numcols; $j++) { //columns 
  22592.                 if (isset($cells[$i][$j]) && $cells[$i][$j]) { 
  22593.                     $c = &$cells[$i][$j]; 
  22594.  
  22595.                     if ($this->simpleTables) { 
  22596.                         if ($table['borders_separate']) { // NB twice border width 
  22597.                             $extraWLR = ($table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w']) + ($c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R']) + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  22598.                             $extrh = ($table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w']) + ($c['padding']['T'] + $c['padding']['B']) + $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  22599.                         } else { 
  22600.                             $extraWLR = ($table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w']) / 2 + ($c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R']); 
  22601.                             $extrh = ($table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w']) / 2 + ($c['padding']['T'] + $c['padding']['B']); 
  22602.                         } 
  22603.                     } else { 
  22604.                         if ($this->packTableData) { 
  22605.                             list($bt, $br, $bb, $bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($c['borderbin']); 
  22606.                         } else { 
  22607.                             $bt = $c['border_details']['T']['w']; 
  22608.                             $bb = $c['border_details']['B']['w']; 
  22609.                             $br = $c['border_details']['R']['w']; 
  22610.                             $bl = $c['border_details']['L']['w']; 
  22611.                         } 
  22612.                         if ($table['borders_separate']) { // NB twice border width 
  22613.                             $extraWLR = $bl + $br + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  22614.                             $extrh = $bt + $bb + $c['padding']['T'] + $c['padding']['B'] + $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  22615.                         } else { 
  22616.                             $extraWLR = $bl / 2 + $br / 2 + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R']; 
  22617.                             $extrh = $bt / 2 + $bb / 2 + $c['padding']['T'] + $c['padding']['B']; 
  22618.                         } 
  22619.                     } 
  22620.  
  22621.                     if ($table['overflow'] == 'visible' && $level == 1) 
  22622.                         list($x, $cw) = $this->_splitTableGetWidth($table, $i, $j); 
  22623.                     else 
  22624.                         list($x, $cw) = $this->_tableGetWidth($table, $i, $j); 
  22625.  
  22626.  
  22627.                     // Get CELL HEIGHT 
  22628.                     // ++ extra parameter forces wrap to break word 
  22629.                     if ($c['R'] && isset($c['textbuffer'])) { 
  22630.                         $str = ''; 
  22631.                         foreach ($c['textbuffer'] AS $t) { 
  22632.                             $str .= $t[0] . ' '; 
  22633.                         } 
  22634.                         $str = rtrim($str); 
  22635.                         $s_fs = $this->FontSizePt; 
  22636.                         $s_f = $this->FontFamily; 
  22637.                         $s_st = $this->FontStyle; 
  22638.                         $this->SetFont($c['textbuffer'][0][4], $c['textbuffer'][0][2], $c['textbuffer'][0][11] / $this->shrin_k, true, true); 
  22639.                         $tempch = $this->GetStringWidth($str, true, $c['textbuffer'][0][18], $c['textbuffer'][0][8]); 
  22640.                         if ($c['R'] >= 45 && $c['R'] < 90) { 
  22641.                             $tempch = ((sin(deg2rad($c['R']))) * $tempch ) + ((sin(deg2rad($c['R']))) * (($c['textbuffer'][0][11] / _MPDFK) / $this->shrin_k)); 
  22642.                         } 
  22643.                         $this->SetFont($s_f, $s_st, $s_fs, true, true); 
  22644.                         $ch = ($tempch ) + $extrh; 
  22645.                     } else { 
  22646.                         if (isset($c['textbuffer']) && !empty($c['textbuffer'])) { 
  22647.                             $this->cellLineHeight = $c['cellLineHeight']; 
  22648.                             $this->cellLineStackingStrategy = $c['cellLineStackingStrategy']; 
  22649.                             $this->cellLineStackingShift = $c['cellLineStackingShift']; 
  22650.                             $this->divwidth = $cw - $extraWLR; 
  22651.                             $tempch = $this->printbuffer($c['textbuffer'], '', true, true); 
  22652.                         } else { 
  22653.                             $tempch = 0; 
  22654.                         } 
  22655.  
  22656.                         // Added cellpadding top and bottom. (Lineheight already adjusted) 
  22657.                         $ch = $tempch + $extrh; 
  22658.                     } 
  22659.                     //If height is defined and it is bigger than calculated $ch then update values 
  22660.                     if (isset($c['h']) && $c['h'] > $ch) { 
  22661.                         $c['mih'] = $ch; //in order to keep valign working 
  22662.                         $ch = $c['h']; 
  22663.                     } else 
  22664.                         $c['mih'] = $ch; 
  22665.                     if (isset($c['rowspan'])) 
  22666.                         $listspan[] = array($i, $j); 
  22667.                     elseif ($heightrow < $ch) 
  22668.                         $heightrow = $ch; 
  22669.  
  22670.                     // this is the extra used in _tableWrite to determine whether to trigger a page change 
  22671.                     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  22672.                         if ($i == ($numrows - 1) || (isset($c['rowspan']) && ($i + $c['rowspan']) == ($numrows))) { 
  22673.                             $extra = $table['margin']['B'] + $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  22674.                         } else { 
  22675.                             $extra = $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  22676.                         } 
  22677.                     } else { 
  22678.                         if (!$this->simpleTables) { 
  22679.                             $extra = $bb / 2; 
  22680.                         } elseif ($this->simpleTables) { 
  22681.                             $extra = $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w'] / 2; 
  22682.                         } 
  22683.                     } 
  22684.                     if (isset($table['is_thead'][$i]) && $table['is_thead'][$i]) { 
  22685.                         if ($j == 0) { 
  22686.                             $headerrowheight += $ch; 
  22687.                             $headerrowheightplus += $ch + $extra; 
  22688.                         } 
  22689.                     } elseif (isset($table['is_tfoot'][$i]) && $table['is_tfoot'][$i]) { 
  22690.                         if ($j == 0) { 
  22691.                             $footerrowheight += $ch; 
  22692.                             $footerrowheightplus += $ch + $extra; 
  22693.                         } 
  22694.                     } else { 
  22695.                         $checkmaxheight = max($checkmaxheight, $ch); 
  22696.                         $checkmaxheightplus = max($checkmaxheightplus, $ch + $extra); 
  22697.                     } 
  22698.                     if ($this->tableLevel == 1 && $i == (isset($table['headernrows']) ? $table['headernrows'] : 0)) { 
  22699.                         $firstrowheight = max($ch, $firstrowheight); 
  22700.                     } 
  22701.                     unset($c); 
  22702.                 } 
  22703.             }//end of columns 
  22704.         }//end of rows 
  22705.  
  22706.         $heightrow = &$table['hr']; 
  22707.         foreach ($listspan as $span) { 
  22708.             list($i, $j) = $span; 
  22709.             $c = &$cells[$i][$j]; 
  22710.             $lr = $i + $c['rowspan']; 
  22711.             if ($lr > $numrows) 
  22712.                 $lr = $numrows; 
  22713.             $hs = $hsa = 0; 
  22714.             $list = array(); 
  22715.             for ($k = $i; $k < $lr; $k++) { 
  22716.                 $hs += $heightrow[$k]; 
  22717.                 // mPDF 6 
  22718.                 $sh = false; // specified height 
  22719.                 for ($m = 0; $m < $numcols; $m++) { //columns 
  22720.                     $tc = &$cells[$k][$m]; 
  22721.                     if (isset($tc['rowspan'])) { 
  22722.                         continue; 
  22723.                     } 
  22724.                     if (isset($tc['h'])) { 
  22725.                         $sh = true; 
  22726.                         break; 
  22727.                     } 
  22728.                 } 
  22729.                 if (!$sh) { 
  22730.                     $list[] = $k; 
  22731.                 } 
  22732.             } 
  22733.  
  22734.             if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  22735.                 if ($i == ($numrows - 1) || ($i + $c['rowspan']) == ($numrows)) { 
  22736.                     $extra = $table['margin']['B'] + $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  22737.                 } else { 
  22738.                     $extra = $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  22739.                 } 
  22740.             } else { 
  22741.                 if (!$this->simpleTables) { 
  22742.                     if ($this->packTableData) { 
  22743.                         list($bt, $br, $bb, $bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($c['borderbin']); 
  22744.                     } else { 
  22745.                         $bb = $c['border_details']['B']['w']; 
  22746.                     } 
  22747.                     $extra = $bb / 2; 
  22748.                 } elseif ($this->simpleTables) { 
  22749.                     $extra = $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w'] / 2; 
  22750.                 } 
  22751.             } 
  22752.             if (!empty($table['is_thead'][$i])) { 
  22753.                 $headerrowheight = max($headerrowheight, $hs); 
  22754.                 $headerrowheightplus = max($headerrowheightplus, $hs + $extra); 
  22755.             } elseif (!empty($table['is_tfoot'][$i])) { 
  22756.                 $footerrowheight = max($footerrowheight, $hs); 
  22757.                 $footerrowheightplus = max($footerrowheightplus, $hs + $extra); 
  22758.             } else { 
  22759.                 $checkmaxheight = max($checkmaxheight, $hs); 
  22760.                 $checkmaxheightplus = max($checkmaxheightplus, $hs + $extra); 
  22761.             } 
  22762.             if ($this->tableLevel == 1 && $i == (isset($table['headernrows']) ? $table['headernrows'] : 0)) { 
  22763.                 $firstrowheight = max($hs, $firstrowheight); 
  22764.             } 
  22765.  
  22766.             if ($c['mih'] > $hs) { 
  22767.                 if (!$hs) { 
  22768.                     for ($k = $i; $k < $lr; $k++) 
  22769.                         $heightrow[$k] = $c['mih'] / $c['rowspan']; 
  22770.                 } elseif (!count($list)) { // no rows in the rowspan have a height specified, so share amongst all rows equally 
  22771.                     $hi = $c['mih'] - $hs; 
  22772.                     for ($k = $i; $k < $lr; $k++) 
  22773.                         $heightrow[$k] += ($heightrow[$k] / $hs) * $hi; 
  22774.                 } else { 
  22775.                     $hi = $c['mih'] - $hs; // mPDF 6 
  22776.                     foreach ($list as $k) 
  22777.                         $heightrow[$k] += $hi / (count($list)); // mPDF 6 
  22778.                 } 
  22779.             } 
  22780.             unset($c); 
  22781.  
  22782.             // If rowspans overlap so that one or more rows do not have a height set... 
  22783.             // i.e. for one or more rows, the only cells (explicit) in that row have rowspan>1 
  22784.             // so heightrow is still == 0 
  22785.             if ($heightrow[$i] == 0) { 
  22786.                 // Get row extent to analyse above and below 
  22787.                 $top = $i; 
  22788.                 foreach ($listspan as $checkspan) { 
  22789.                     list($cki, $ckj) = $checkspan; 
  22790.                     $c = &$cells[$cki][$ckj]; 
  22791.                     if (isset($c['rowspan']) && $c['rowspan'] > 1) { 
  22792.                         if (($cki + $c['rowspan'] - 1) >= $i) { 
  22793.                             $top = min($top, $cki); 
  22794.                         } 
  22795.                     } 
  22796.                 } 
  22797.                 $bottom = $i + $c['rowspan'] - 1; 
  22798.                 // Check for overconstrained conditions 
  22799.                 for ($k = $top; $k <= $bottom; $k++) { 
  22800.                     // if ['hr'] for any of the others is also 0, then abort (too complicated) 
  22801.                     if ($k != $i && $heightrow[$k] == 0) { 
  22802.                         break(1); 
  22803.                     } 
  22804.                     // check again that top and bottom are not crossed by rowspans - or abort (too complicated) 
  22805.                     if ($k == $top) { 
  22806.                         // ???? take account of colspan as well??? 
  22807.                         for ($m = 0; $m < $numcols; $m++) { //columns 
  22808.                             if (!isset($cells[$k][$m]) || $cells[$k][$m] == 0) { 
  22809.                                 break(2); 
  22810.                             } 
  22811.                         } 
  22812.                     } elseif ($k == $bottom) { 
  22813.                         // ???? take account of colspan as well??? 
  22814.                         for ($m = 0; $m < $numcols; $m++) { //columns 
  22815.                             $c = &$cells[$k][$m]; 
  22816.                             if (isset($c['rowspan']) && $c['rowspan'] > 1) { 
  22817.                                 break(2); 
  22818.                             } 
  22819.                         } 
  22820.                     } 
  22821.                 } 
  22822.                 // By columns add up col height using ['h'] if set or ['mih'] if not 
  22823.                 // Intentionally do not substract border-spacing 
  22824.                 $colH = array(); 
  22825.                 $extH = 0; 
  22826.                 $newhr = array(); 
  22827.                 for ($m = 0; $m < $numcols; $m++) { //columns 
  22828.                     for ($k = $top; $k <= $bottom; $k++) { 
  22829.                         if (isset($cells[$k][$m]) && $cells[$k][$m] != 0) { 
  22830.                             $c = &$cells[$k][$m]; 
  22831.                             if (isset($c['h']) && $c['h']) { 
  22832.                                 $useh = $c['h']; 
  22833.                             } 
  22834.                             // ???? take account of colspan as well??? 
  22835.                             else { 
  22836.                                 $useh = $c['mih']; 
  22837.                             } 
  22838.                             if (isset($colH[$m])) { 
  22839.                                 $colH[$m] += $useh; 
  22840.                             } else { 
  22841.                                 $colH[$m] = $useh; 
  22842.                             } 
  22843.                             if (!isset($c['rowspan']) || $c['rowspan'] < 2) { 
  22844.                                 $newhr[$k] = max((isset($newhr[$k]) ? $newhr[$k] : 0), $useh); 
  22845.                             } 
  22846.                         } 
  22847.                     } 
  22848.                     $extH = max($extH, $colH[$m]); // mPDF 6 
  22849.                 } 
  22850.                 $newhr[$i] = $extH - array_sum($newhr); 
  22851.                 for ($k = $top; $k <= $bottom; $k++) { 
  22852.                     $heightrow[$k] = $newhr[$k]; 
  22853.                 } 
  22854.             } 
  22855.  
  22856.  
  22857.             unset($c); 
  22858.         } 
  22859.  
  22860.         $table['h'] = array_sum($heightrow); 
  22861.         unset($heightrow); 
  22862.  
  22863.         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  22864.             $table['h'] += $table['margin']['T'] + $table['margin']['B'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V'] + $table['padding']['T'] + $table['padding']['B']; 
  22865.         } else { 
  22866.             $table['h'] += $table['margin']['T'] + $table['margin']['B'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] / 2 + $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] / 2; 
  22867.         } 
  22868.  
  22869.         $maxrowheight = $checkmaxheightplus + $headerrowheightplus + $footerrowheightplus; 
  22870.         $maxfirstrowheight = $firstrowheight + $headerrowheightplus + $footerrowheightplus; // includes thead, 1st row and tfoot 
  22871.         return array($table['h'], $maxrowheight, $temppgheight, $remainingpage, $maxfirstrowheight); 
  22872.     } 
  22873.  
  22874.     function _tableGetWidth(&$table, $i, $j) 
  22875.     { 
  22876.         $cell = &$table['cells'][$i][$j]; 
  22877.         if ($cell) { 
  22878.             if (isset($cell['x0'])) { 
  22879.                 return array($cell['x0'], $cell['w0']); 
  22880.             } 
  22881.             $x = 0; 
  22882.             $widthcols = &$table['wc']; 
  22883.             for ($k = 0; $k < $j; $k++) 
  22884.                 $x += $widthcols[$k]; 
  22885.             $w = $widthcols[$j]; 
  22886.             if (isset($cell['colspan'])) { 
  22887.                 for ($k = $j + $cell['colspan'] - 1; $k > $j; $k--) 
  22888.                     $w += $widthcols[$k]; 
  22889.             } 
  22890.             $cell['x0'] = $x; 
  22891.             $cell['w0'] = $w; 
  22892.             return array($x, $w); 
  22893.         } 
  22894.         return array(0, 0); 
  22895.     } 
  22896.  
  22897.     function _splitTableGetWidth(&$table, $i, $j) 
  22898.     { 
  22899.         $cell = &$table['cells'][$i][$j]; 
  22900.         if ($cell) { 
  22901.             if (isset($cell['x0'])) 
  22902.                 return array($cell['x0'], $cell['w0']); 
  22903.             $x = 0; 
  22904.             $widthcols = &$table['wc']; 
  22905.             $pg = $table['colPg'][$j]; 
  22906.             for ($k = 0; $k < $j; $k++) { 
  22907.                 if ($table['colPg'][$k] == $pg) 
  22908.                     $x += $widthcols[$k]; 
  22909.             } 
  22910.             $w = $widthcols[$j]; 
  22911.             if (isset($cell['colspan'])) { 
  22912.                 for ($k = $j + $cell['colspan'] - 1; $k > $j; $k--) 
  22913.                     if ($table['colPg'][$k] == $pg) 
  22914.                         $w += $widthcols[$k]; 
  22915.             } 
  22916.             $cell['x0'] = $x; 
  22917.             $cell['w0'] = $w; 
  22918.             return array($x, $w); 
  22919.         } 
  22920.         return array(0, 0); 
  22921.     } 
  22922.  
  22923.     function _tableGetHeight(&$table, $i, $j) 
  22924.     { 
  22925.         $cell = &$table['cells'][$i][$j]; 
  22926.         if ($cell) { 
  22927.             if (isset($cell['y0'])) 
  22928.                 return array($cell['y0'], $cell['h0']); 
  22929.             $y = 0; 
  22930.             $heightrow = &$table['hr']; 
  22931.             for ($k = 0; $k < $i; $k++) 
  22932.                 $y += $heightrow[$k]; 
  22933.             $h = $heightrow[$i]; 
  22934.             if (isset($cell['rowspan'])) { 
  22935.                 for ($k = $i + $cell['rowspan'] - 1; $k > $i; $k--) 
  22936.                     $h += $heightrow[$k]; 
  22937.             } 
  22938.             $cell['y0'] = $y; 
  22939.             $cell['h0'] = $h; 
  22940.             return array($y, $h); 
  22941.         } 
  22942.         return array(0, 0); 
  22943.     } 
  22944.  
  22945.     function _tableGetMaxRowHeight($table, $row) 
  22946.     { 
  22947.         if ($row == $table['nc'] - 1) { 
  22948.             return $table['hr'][$row]; 
  22949.         } 
  22950.         $maxrowheight = $table['hr'][$row]; 
  22951.         for ($i = $row + 1; $i < $table['nr']; $i++) { 
  22952.             $cellsset = 0; 
  22953.             for ($j = 0; $j < $table['nc']; $j++) { 
  22954.                 if ($table['cells'][$i][$j]) { 
  22955.                     if (isset($table['cells'][$i][$j]['colspan'])) { 
  22956.                         $cellsset += $table['cells'][$i][$j]['colspan']; 
  22957.                     } else 
  22958.                         $cellsset += 1; 
  22959.                 } 
  22960.             } 
  22961.             if ($cellsset == $table['nc']) { 
  22962.                 return $maxrowheight; 
  22963.             } else { 
  22964.                 $maxrowheight += $table['hr'][$i]; 
  22965.             } 
  22966.         } 
  22967.         return $maxrowheight; 
  22968.     } 
  22969.  
  22970.     // CHANGED TO ALLOW TABLE BORDER TO BE SPECIFIED CORRECTLY - added border_details 
  22971.     function _tableRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $bord = -1, $details = array(), $buffer = false, $bSeparate = false, $cort = 'cell', $tablecorner = '', $bsv = 0, $bsh = 0) 
  22972.     { 
  22973.         $cellBorderOverlay = array(); 
  22974.  
  22975.         if ($bord == -1) { 
  22976.             $this->Rect($x, $y, $w, $h); 
  22977.         } elseif ($this->simpleTables && ($cort == 'cell')) { 
  22978.             $this->SetLineWidth($details['L']['w']); 
  22979.             if ($details['L']['c']) { 
  22980.                 $this->SetDColor($details['L']['c']); 
  22981.             } else { 
  22982.                 $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  22983.             } 
  22984.             $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  22985.             $this->Rect($x, $y, $w, $h); 
  22986.         } elseif ($bord) { 
  22987.             if (!$bSeparate && $buffer) { 
  22988.                 $priority = 'LRTB'; 
  22989.                 for ($p = 0; $p < strlen($priority); $p++) { 
  22990.                     $side = $priority[$p]; 
  22991.                     $details['p'] = $side; 
  22992.  
  22993.                     $dom = 0; 
  22994.                     if (isset($details[$side]['w'])) { 
  22995.                         $dom += ($details[$side]['w'] * 100000); 
  22996.                     } 
  22997.                     if (isset($details[$side]['style'])) { 
  22998.                         $dom += (array_search($details[$side]['style'], $this->borderstyles) * 100); 
  22999.                     } 
  23000.                     if (isset($details[$side]['dom'])) { 
  23001.                         $dom += ($details[$side]['dom'] * 10); 
  23002.                     } 
  23003.  
  23004.                     // Precedence to darker colours at joins 
  23005.                     $coldom = 0; 
  23006.                     if (isset($details[$side]['c']) && is_array($details[$side]['c'])) { 
  23007.                         if ($details[$side]['c']{0} == 3) {  // RGB 
  23008.                             $coldom = 10 - (((ord($details[$side]['c']{1}) * 1.00) + (ord($details[$side]['c']{2}) * 1.00) + (ord($details[$side]['c']{3}) * 1.00)) / 76.5); 
  23009.                         } 
  23010.                     } // 10 black - 0 white 
  23011.                     if ($coldom) { 
  23012.                         $dom += $coldom; 
  23013.                     } 
  23014.                     // Lastly precedence to RIGHT and BOTTOM cells at joins 
  23015.                     if (isset($details['cellposdom'])) { 
  23016.                         $dom += $details['cellposdom']; 
  23017.                     } 
  23018.  
  23019.                     $save = false; 
  23020.                     if ($side == 'T' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) { 
  23021.                         $cbord = _BORDER_TOP; 
  23022.                         $save = true; 
  23023.                     } elseif ($side == 'L' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) { 
  23024.                         $cbord = _BORDER_LEFT; 
  23025.                         $save = true; 
  23026.                     } elseif ($side == 'R' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_RIGHT)) { 
  23027.                         $cbord = _BORDER_RIGHT; 
  23028.                         $save = true; 
  23029.                     } elseif ($side == 'B' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM)) { 
  23030.                         $cbord = _BORDER_BOTTOM; 
  23031.                         $save = true; 
  23032.                     } 
  23033.  
  23034.                     if ($save) { 
  23035.                         $this->cellBorderBuffer[] = pack("A16nCnda6A10d14", str_pad(sprintf("%08.7f", $dom), 16, "0", STR_PAD_LEFT), $cbord, ord($side), $details[$side]['s'], $details[$side]['w'], $details[$side]['c'], $details[$side]['style'], $x, $y, $w, $h, $details['mbw']['BL'], $details['mbw']['BR'], $details['mbw']['RT'], $details['mbw']['RB'], $details['mbw']['TL'], $details['mbw']['TR'], $details['mbw']['LT'], $details['mbw']['LB'], $details['cellposdom'], 0 
  23036.  ); 
  23037.                         if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'ridge' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'groove' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'inset' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'outset' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'double') { 
  23038.                             $details[$side]['overlay'] = true; 
  23039.                             $this->cellBorderBuffer[] = pack("A16nCnda6A10d14", str_pad(sprintf("%08.7f", ($dom + 4)), 16, "0", STR_PAD_LEFT), $cbord, ord($side), $details[$side]['s'], $details[$side]['w'], $details[$side]['c'], $details[$side]['style'], $x, $y, $w, $h, $details['mbw']['BL'], $details['mbw']['BR'], $details['mbw']['RT'], $details['mbw']['RB'], $details['mbw']['TL'], $details['mbw']['TR'], $details['mbw']['LT'], $details['mbw']['LB'], $details['cellposdom'], 1 
  23040.  ); 
  23041.                         } 
  23042.                     } 
  23043.                 } 
  23044.                 return; 
  23045.             } 
  23046.  
  23047.             if (isset($details['p']) && strlen($details['p']) > 1) { 
  23048.                 $priority = $details['p']; 
  23049.             } else { 
  23050.                 $priority = 'LTRB'; 
  23051.             } 
  23052.             $Tw = 0; 
  23053.             $Rw = 0; 
  23054.             $Bw = 0; 
  23055.             $Lw = 0; 
  23056.             if (isset($details['T']['w'])) { 
  23057.                 $Tw = $details['T']['w']; 
  23058.             } 
  23059.             if (isset($details['R']['w'])) { 
  23060.                 $Rw = $details['R']['w']; 
  23061.             } 
  23062.             if (isset($details['B']['w'])) { 
  23063.                 $Bw = $details['B']['w']; 
  23064.             } 
  23065.             if (isset($details['L']['w'])) { 
  23066.                 $Lw = $details['L']['w']; 
  23067.             } 
  23068.  
  23069.             $x2 = $x + $w; 
  23070.             $y2 = $y + $h; 
  23071.             $oldlinewidth = $this->LineWidth; 
  23072.  
  23073.             for ($p = 0; $p < strlen($priority); $p++) { 
  23074.                 $side = $priority[$p]; 
  23075.                 $xadj = 0; 
  23076.                 $xadj2 = 0; 
  23077.                 $yadj = 0; 
  23078.                 $yadj2 = 0; 
  23079.                 $print = false; 
  23080.                 if ($Tw && $side == 'T' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) { // TOP 
  23081.                     $ly1 = $y; 
  23082.                     $ly2 = $y; 
  23083.                     $lx1 = $x; 
  23084.                     $lx2 = $x2; 
  23085.                     $this->SetLineWidth($Tw); 
  23086.                     if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner, 'L') !== false) { 
  23087.                         if ($Tw > $Lw) 
  23088.                             $xadj = ($Tw - $Lw) / 2;
