  23089.                         if ($Tw < $Lw) 
  23090.                             $xadj = ($Tw + $Lw) / 2; 
  23091.                     } 
  23092.                     else { 
  23093.                         $xadj = $Tw / 2 - $bsh / 2; 
  23094.                     } 
  23095.                     if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner, 'R') !== false) { 
  23096.                         if ($Tw > $Rw) 
  23097.                             $xadj2 = ($Tw - $Rw) / 2; 
  23098.                         if ($Tw < $Rw) 
  23099.                             $xadj2 = ($Tw + $Rw) / 2; 
  23100.                     } 
  23101.                     else { 
  23102.                         $xadj2 = $Tw / 2 - $bsh / 2; 
  23103.                     } 
  23104.                     if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['TL']) { 
  23105.                         $xadj = ($Tw - $details['mbw']['TL']) / 2; 
  23106.                     } 
  23107.                     if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['TR']) { 
  23108.                         $xadj2 = ($Tw - $details['mbw']['TR']) / 2; 
  23109.                     } 
  23110.                     $print = true; 
  23111.                 } 
  23112.                 if ($Lw && $side == 'L' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) { // LEFT 
  23113.                     $ly1 = $y; 
  23114.                     $ly2 = $y2; 
  23115.                     $lx1 = $x; 
  23116.                     $lx2 = $x; 
  23117.                     $this->SetLineWidth($Lw); 
  23118.                     if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner, 'T') !== false) { 
  23119.                         if ($Lw > $Tw) 
  23120.                             $yadj = ($Lw - $Tw) / 2; 
  23121.                         if ($Lw < $Tw) 
  23122.                             $yadj = ($Lw + $Tw) / 2; 
  23123.                     } 
  23124.                     else { 
  23125.                         $yadj = $Lw / 2 - $bsv / 2; 
  23126.                     } 
  23127.                     if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner, 'B') !== false) { 
  23128.                         if ($Lw > $Bw) 
  23129.                             $yadj2 = ($Lw - $Bw) / 2; 
  23130.                         if ($Lw < $Bw) 
  23131.                             $yadj2 = ($Lw + $Bw) / 2; 
  23132.                     } 
  23133.                     else { 
  23134.                         $yadj2 = $Lw / 2 - $bsv / 2; 
  23135.                     } 
  23136.                     if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['LT']) { 
  23137.                         $yadj = ($Lw - $details['mbw']['LT']) / 2; 
  23138.                     } 
  23139.                     if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['LB']) { 
  23140.                         $yadj2 = ($Lw - $details['mbw']['LB']) / 2; 
  23141.                     } 
  23142.                     $print = true; 
  23143.                 } 
  23144.                 if ($Rw && $side == 'R' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_RIGHT)) { // RIGHT 
  23145.                     $ly1 = $y; 
  23146.                     $ly2 = $y2; 
  23147.                     $lx1 = $x2; 
  23148.                     $lx2 = $x2; 
  23149.                     $this->SetLineWidth($Rw); 
  23150.                     if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner, 'T') !== false) { 
  23151.                         if ($Rw < $Tw) 
  23152.                             $yadj = ($Rw + $Tw) / 2; 
  23153.                         if ($Rw > $Tw) 
  23154.                             $yadj = ($Rw - $Tw) / 2; 
  23155.                     } 
  23156.                     else { 
  23157.                         $yadj = $Rw / 2 - $bsv / 2; 
  23158.                     } 
  23159.  
  23160.                     if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner, 'B') !== false) { 
  23161.                         if ($Rw > $Bw) 
  23162.                             $yadj2 = ($Rw - $Bw) / 2; 
  23163.                         if ($Rw < $Bw) 
  23164.                             $yadj2 = ($Rw + $Bw) / 2; 
  23165.                     } 
  23166.                     else { 
  23167.                         $yadj2 = $Rw / 2 - $bsv / 2; 
  23168.                     } 
  23169.  
  23170.                     if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['RT']) { 
  23171.                         $yadj = ($Rw - $details['mbw']['RT']) / 2; 
  23172.                     } 
  23173.                     if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['RB']) { 
  23174.                         $yadj2 = ($Rw - $details['mbw']['RB']) / 2; 
  23175.                     } 
  23176.                     $print = true; 
  23177.                 } 
  23178.                 if ($Bw && $side == 'B' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM)) { // BOTTOM 
  23179.                     $ly1 = $y2; 
  23180.                     $ly2 = $y2; 
  23181.                     $lx1 = $x; 
  23182.                     $lx2 = $x2; 
  23183.                     $this->SetLineWidth($Bw); 
  23184.                     if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner, 'L') !== false) { 
  23185.                         if ($Bw > $Lw) 
  23186.                             $xadj = ($Bw - $Lw) / 2; 
  23187.                         if ($Bw < $Lw) 
  23188.                             $xadj = ($Bw + $Lw) / 2; 
  23189.                     } 
  23190.                     else { 
  23191.                         $xadj = $Bw / 2 - $bsh / 2; 
  23192.                     } 
  23193.                     if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner, 'R') !== false) { 
  23194.                         if ($Bw > $Rw) 
  23195.                             $xadj2 = ($Bw - $Rw) / 2; 
  23196.                         if ($Bw < $Rw) 
  23197.                             $xadj2 = ($Bw + $Rw) / 2; 
  23198.                     } 
  23199.                     else { 
  23200.                         $xadj2 = $Bw / 2 - $bsh / 2; 
  23201.                     } 
  23202.                     if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['BL']) { 
  23203.                         $xadj = ($Bw - $details['mbw']['BL']) / 2; 
  23204.                     } 
  23205.                     if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['BR']) { 
  23206.                         $xadj2 = ($Bw - $details['mbw']['BR']) / 2; 
  23207.                     } 
  23208.                     $print = true; 
  23209.                 } 
  23210.  
  23211.                 // Now draw line 
  23212.                 if ($print) { 
  23213.                     /** -- TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS -- */ 
  23214.                     if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'double') { 
  23215.                         if (!isset($details[$side]['overlay']) || !$details[$side]['overlay'] || $bSeparate) { 
  23216.                             if ($details[$side]['c']) { 
  23217.                                 $this->SetDColor($details[$side]['c']); 
  23218.                             } else { 
  23219.                                 $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  23220.                             } 
  23221.                             $this->Line($lx1 + $xadj, $ly1 + $yadj, $lx2 - $xadj2, $ly2 - $yadj2); 
  23222.                         } 
  23223.                         if ((isset($details[$side]['overlay']) && $details[$side]['overlay']) || $bSeparate) { 
  23224.                             if ($bSeparate && $cort == 'table') { 
  23225.                                 if ($side == 'T') { 
  23226.                                     $xadj -= $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23227.                                     $xadj2 -= $this->LineWidth; 
  23228.                                     if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) { 
  23229.                                         $xadj += $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23230.                                     } 
  23231.                                     if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_RIGHT)) { 
  23232.                                         $xadj2 += $this->LineWidth; 
  23233.                                     } 
  23234.                                 } 
  23235.                                 if ($side == 'L') { 
  23236.                                     $yadj -= $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23237.                                     $yadj2 -= $this->LineWidth; 
  23238.                                     if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) { 
  23239.                                         $yadj += $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23240.                                     } 
  23241.                                     if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM)) { 
  23242.                                         $yadj2 += $this->LineWidth; 
  23243.                                     } 
  23244.                                 } 
  23245.                                 if ($side == 'B') { 
  23246.                                     $xadj -= $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23247.                                     $xadj2 -= $this->LineWidth; 
  23248.                                     if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) { 
  23249.                                         $xadj += $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23250.                                     } 
  23251.                                     if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_RIGHT)) { 
  23252.                                         $xadj2 += $this->LineWidth; 
  23253.                                     } 
  23254.                                 } 
  23255.                                 if ($side == 'R') { 
  23256.                                     $yadj -= $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23257.                                     $yadj2 -= $this->LineWidth; 
  23258.                                     if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) { 
  23259.                                         $yadj += $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23260.                                     } 
  23261.                                     if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM)) { 
  23262.                                         $yadj2 += $this->LineWidth; 
  23263.                                     } 
  23264.                                 } 
  23265.                             } 
  23266.  
  23267.                             $this->SetLineWidth($this->LineWidth / 3); 
  23268.  
  23269.                             $tbcol = $this->ConvertColor(255); 
  23270.                             for ($l = 0; $l <= $this->blklvl; $l++) { 
  23271.                                 if ($this->blk[$l]['bgcolor']) { 
  23272.                                     $tbcol = ($this->blk[$l]['bgcolorarray']); 
  23273.                                 } 
  23274.                             } 
  23275.  
  23276.                             if ($bSeparate) { 
  23277.                                 $cellBorderOverlay[] = array( 
  23278.                                     'x' => $lx1 + $xadj,  
  23279.                                     'y' => $ly1 + $yadj,  
  23280.                                     'x2' => $lx2 - $xadj2,  
  23281.                                     'y2' => $ly2 - $yadj2,  
  23282.                                     'col' => $tbcol,  
  23283.                                     'lw' => $this->LineWidth,  
  23284.  ); 
  23285.                             } else { 
  23286.                                 $this->SetDColor($tbcol); 
  23287.                                 $this->Line($lx1 + $xadj, $ly1 + $yadj, $lx2 - $xadj2, $ly2 - $yadj2); 
  23288.                             } 
  23289.                         } 
  23290.                     } elseif (isset($details[$side]['style']) && ($details[$side]['style'] == 'ridge' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'groove' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'inset' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'outset')) { 
  23291.                         if (!isset($details[$side]['overlay']) || !$details[$side]['overlay'] || $bSeparate) { 
  23292.                             if ($details[$side]['c']) { 
  23293.                                 $this->SetDColor($details[$side]['c']); 
  23294.                             } else { 
  23295.                                 $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  23296.                             } 
  23297.                             if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'outset' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'groove') { 
  23298.                                 $nc = $this->_darkenColor($details[$side]['c']); 
  23299.                                 $this->SetDColor($nc); 
  23300.                             } elseif ($details[$side]['style'] == 'ridge' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'inset') { 
  23301.                                 $nc = $this->_lightenColor($details[$side]['c']); 
  23302.                                 $this->SetDColor($nc); 
  23303.                             } 
  23304.                             $this->Line($lx1 + $xadj, $ly1 + $yadj, $lx2 - $xadj2, $ly2 - $yadj2); 
  23305.                         } 
  23306.                         if ((isset($details[$side]['overlay']) && $details[$side]['overlay']) || $bSeparate) { 
  23307.                             if ($details[$side]['c']) { 
  23308.                                 $this->SetDColor($details[$side]['c']); 
  23309.                             } else { 
  23310.                                 $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  23311.                             } 
  23312.                             $doubleadj = ($this->LineWidth) / 3; 
  23313.                             $this->SetLineWidth($this->LineWidth / 2); 
  23314.                             $xadj3 = $yadj3 = $wadj3 = $hadj3 = 0; 
  23315.  
  23316.                             if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'ridge' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'inset') { 
  23317.                                 $nc = $this->_darkenColor($details[$side]['c']); 
  23318.  
  23319.                                 if ($bSeparate && $cort == 'table') { 
  23320.                                     if ($side == 'T') { 
  23321.                                         $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23322.                                         $xadj3 = -$this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23323.                                         $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth; 
  23324.                                         if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) { 
  23325.                                             $xadj3 += $this->LineWidth; 
  23326.                                             $wadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
  23327.                                         } 
  23328.                                         if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_RIGHT)) { 
  23329.                                             $wadj3 -= $this->LineWidth * 2; 
  23330.                                         } 
  23331.                                     } 
  23332.                                     if ($side == 'L') { 
  23333.                                         $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23334.                                         $yadj3 = -$this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23335.                                         $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth; 
  23336.                                         if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) { 
  23337.                                             $yadj3 += $this->LineWidth; 
  23338.                                             $hadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
  23339.                                         } 
  23340.                                         if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM)) { 
  23341.                                             $hadj3 -= $this->LineWidth * 2; 
  23342.                                         } 
  23343.                                     } 
  23344.                                     if ($side == 'B') { 
  23345.                                         $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23346.                                         $xadj3 = -$this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23347.                                         $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth; 
  23348.                                     } 
  23349.                                     if ($side == 'R') { 
  23350.                                         $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23351.                                         $yadj3 = -$this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23352.                                         $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth; 
  23353.                                     } 
  23354.                                 } elseif ($side == 'T') { 
  23355.                                     $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23356.                                     $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23357.                                     $wadj3 = -$this->LineWidth * 2; 
  23358.                                 } elseif ($side == 'L') { 
  23359.                                     $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23360.                                     $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23361.                                     $hadj3 = -$this->LineWidth * 2; 
  23362.                                 } elseif ($side == 'B' && $bSeparate) { 
  23363.                                     $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23364.                                     $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23365.                                 } elseif ($side == 'R' && $bSeparate) { 
  23366.                                     $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23367.                                     $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23368.                                 } elseif ($side == 'B') { 
  23369.                                     $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23370.                                     $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23371.                                 } elseif ($side == 'R') { 
  23372.                                     $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23373.                                     $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23374.                                 } 
  23375.                             } else { 
  23376.                                 $nc = $this->_lightenColor($details[$side]['c']); 
  23377.  
  23378.                                 if ($bSeparate && $cort == 'table') { 
  23379.                                     if ($side == 'T') { 
  23380.                                         $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23381.                                         $xadj3 = -$this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23382.                                         $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth; 
  23383.                                         if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) { 
  23384.                                             $xadj3 += $this->LineWidth; 
  23385.                                             $wadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
  23386.                                         } 
  23387.                                     } 
  23388.                                     if ($side == 'L') { 
  23389.                                         $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23390.                                         $yadj3 = -$this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23391.                                         $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth; 
  23392.                                         if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) { 
  23393.                                             $yadj3 += $this->LineWidth; 
  23394.                                             $hadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
  23395.                                         } 
  23396.                                     } 
  23397.                                     if ($side == 'B') { 
  23398.                                         $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23399.                                         $xadj3 = -$this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23400.                                         $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth; 
  23401.                                         if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) { 
  23402.                                             $xadj3 += $this->LineWidth; 
  23403.                                             $wadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
  23404.                                         } 
  23405.                                     } 
  23406.                                     if ($side == 'R') { 
  23407.                                         $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23408.                                         $yadj3 = -$this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23409.                                         $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth; 
  23410.                                         if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) { 
  23411.                                             $yadj3 += $this->LineWidth; 
  23412.                                             $hadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
  23413.                                         } 
  23414.                                     } 
  23415.                                 } elseif ($side == 'T') { 
  23416.                                     $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23417.                                     $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23418.                                 } elseif ($side == 'L') { 
  23419.                                     $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23420.                                     $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23421.                                 } elseif ($side == 'B' && $bSeparate) { 
  23422.                                     $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23423.                                     $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23424.                                 } elseif ($side == 'R' && $bSeparate) { 
  23425.                                     $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23426.                                     $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23427.                                 } elseif ($side == 'B') { 
  23428.                                     $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23429.                                     $xadj3 = -$this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23430.                                     $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth; 
  23431.                                 } elseif ($side == 'R') { 
  23432.                                     $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23433.                                     $yadj3 = -$this->LineWidth / 2; 
  23434.                                     $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth; 
  23435.                                 } 
  23436.                             } 
  23437.  
  23438.                             if ($bSeparate) { 
  23439.                                 $cellBorderOverlay[] = array( 
  23440.                                     'x' => $lx1 + $xadj + $xadj3,  
  23441.                                     'y' => $ly1 + $yadj + $yadj3,  
  23442.                                     'x2' => $lx2 - $xadj2 + $xadj3 + $wadj3,  
  23443.                                     'y2' => $ly2 - $yadj2 + $yadj3 + $hadj3,  
  23444.                                     'col' => $nc,  
  23445.                                     'lw' => $this->LineWidth,  
  23446.  ); 
  23447.                             } else { 
  23448.                                 $this->SetDColor($nc); 
  23449.                                 $this->Line($lx1 + $xadj + $xadj3, $ly1 + $yadj + $yadj3, $lx2 - $xadj2 + $xadj3 + $wadj3, $ly2 - $yadj2 + $yadj3 + $hadj3); 
  23450.                             } 
  23451.                         } 
  23452.                     } else { 
  23453.                         /** -- END TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS -- */ 
  23454.                         if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'dashed') { 
  23455.                             $dashsize = 2; // final dash will be this + 1*linewidth 
  23456.                             $dashsizek = 1.5; // ratio of Dash/Blank 
  23457.                             $this->SetDash($dashsize, ($dashsize / $dashsizek) + ($this->LineWidth * 2)); 
  23458.                         } elseif ($details[$side]['style'] == 'dotted') { 
  23459.                             $this->SetLineJoin(1); 
  23460.                             $this->SetLineCap(1); 
  23461.                             $this->SetDash(0.001, ($this->LineWidth * 2)); 
  23462.                         } 
  23463.                         if ($details[$side]['c']) { 
  23464.                             $this->SetDColor($details[$side]['c']); 
  23465.                         } else { 
  23466.                             $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  23467.                         } 
  23468.                         $this->Line($lx1 + $xadj, $ly1 + $yadj, $lx2 - $xadj2, $ly2 - $yadj2); 
  23469.                         /** -- TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS -- */ 
  23470.                     } 
  23471.                     /** -- END TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS -- */ 
  23472.  
  23473.                     // Reset Corners 
  23474.                     $this->SetDash(); 
  23475.                     //BUTT style line cap 
  23476.                     $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  23477.                 } 
  23478.             } 
  23479.  
  23480.             if ($bSeparate && count($cellBorderOverlay)) { 
  23481.                 foreach ($cellBorderOverlay AS $cbo) { 
  23482.                     $this->SetLineWidth($cbo['lw']); 
  23483.                     $this->SetDColor($cbo['col']); 
  23484.                     $this->Line($cbo['x'], $cbo['y'], $cbo['x2'], $cbo['y2']); 
  23485.                 } 
  23486.             } 
  23487.  
  23488.             // $this->SetLineWidth($oldlinewidth); 
  23489.             // $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  23490.         } 
  23491.     } 
  23492.  
  23493.     /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  23494.     /** -- TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS -- */ 
  23495.  
  23496.     function _lightenColor($c) 
  23497.     { 
  23498.         if (is_array($c)) { 
  23499.             throw new MpdfException('Color error in _lightencolor'); 
  23500.         } 
  23501.         if ($c{0} == 3 || $c{0} == 5) {  // RGB 
  23502.             list($h, $s, $l) = $this->rgb2hsl(ord($c{1}) / 255, ord($c{2}) / 255, ord($c{3}) / 255); 
  23503.             $l += ((1 - $l) * 0.8); 
  23504.             list($r, $g, $b) = $this->hsl2rgb($h, $s, $l); 
  23505.             $ret = array(3, $r, $g, $b); 
  23506.         } elseif ($c{0} == 4 || $c{0} == 6) {  // CMYK 
  23507.             $ret = array(4, max(0, (ord($c{1}) - 20)), max(0, (ord($c{2}) - 20)), max(0, (ord($c{3}) - 20)), max(0, (ord($c{4}) - 20))); 
  23508.         } elseif ($c{0} == 1) { // Grayscale 
  23509.             $ret = array(1, min(255, (ord($c{1}) + 32))); 
  23510.         } 
  23511.         $c = array_pad($ret, 6, 0); 
  23512.         $cstr = pack("a1ccccc", $c[0], ($c[1] & 0xFF), ($c[2] & 0xFF), ($c[3] & 0xFF), ($c[4] & 0xFF), ($c[5] & 0xFF)); 
  23513.         return $cstr; 
  23514.     } 
  23515.  
  23516.     function _darkenColor($c) 
  23517.     { 
  23518.         if (is_array($c)) { 
  23519.             throw new MpdfException('Color error in _darkenColor'); 
  23520.         } 
  23521.         if ($c{0} == 3 || $c{0} == 5) {  // RGB 
  23522.             list($h, $s, $l) = $this->rgb2hsl(ord($c{1}) / 255, ord($c{2}) / 255, ord($c{3}) / 255); 
  23523.             $s *= 0.25; 
  23524.             $l *= 0.75; 
  23525.             list($r, $g, $b) = $this->hsl2rgb($h, $s, $l); 
  23526.             $ret = array(3, $r, $g, $b); 
  23527.         } elseif ($c{0} == 4 || $c{0} == 6) {  // CMYK 
  23528.             $ret = array(4, min(100, (ord($c{1}) + 20)), min(100, (ord($c{2}) + 20)), min(100, (ord($c{3}) + 20)), min(100, (ord($c{4}) + 20))); 
  23529.         } elseif ($c{0} == 1) { // Grayscale 
  23530.             $ret = array(1, max(0, (ord($c{1}) - 32))); 
  23531.         } 
  23532.         $c = array_pad($ret, 6, 0); 
  23533.         $cstr = pack("a1ccccc", $c[0], ($c[1] & 0xFF), ($c[2] & 0xFF), ($c[3] & 0xFF), ($c[4] & 0xFF), ($c[5] & 0xFF)); 
  23534.         return $cstr; 
  23535.     } 
  23536.  
  23537.     /** -- END TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS -- */ 
  23538.  
  23539.     function setBorder(&$var, $flag, $set = true) 
  23540.     { 
  23541.         $flag = intval($flag); 
  23542.         if ($set) { 
  23543.             $set = true; 
  23544.         } 
  23545.         $var = intval($var); 
  23546.         $var = $set ? ($var | $flag) : ($var & ~$flag); 
  23547.     } 
  23548.  
  23549.     function issetBorder($var, $flag) 
  23550.     { 
  23551.         $flag = intval($flag); 
  23552.         $var = intval($var); 
  23553.         return (($var & $flag) == $flag); 
  23554.     } 
  23555.  
  23556.     function _table2cellBorder(&$tableb, &$cbdb, &$cellb, $bval) 
  23557.     { 
  23558.         if ($tableb && $tableb['w'] > $cbdb['w']) { 
  23559.             $cbdb = $tableb; 
  23560.             $this->setBorder($cellb, $bval); 
  23561.         } elseif ($tableb && $tableb['w'] == $cbdb['w'] && array_search($tableb['style'], $this->borderstyles) > array_search($cbdb['style'], $this->borderstyles)) { 
  23562.             $cbdb = $tableb; 
  23563.             $this->setBorder($cellb, $bval); 
  23564.         } 
  23565.     } 
  23566.  
  23567.     // FIX BORDERS ******************************************** 
  23568.     function _fixTableBorders(&$table) 
  23569.     { 
  23570.         if (!$table['borders_separate'] && $table['border_details']['L']['w']) { 
  23571.             $table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] = $table['border_details']['L']['w']; 
  23572.         } 
  23573.         if (!$table['borders_separate'] && $table['border_details']['R']['w']) { 
  23574.             $table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] = $table['border_details']['R']['w']; 
  23575.         } 
  23576.         if (!$table['borders_separate'] && $table['border_details']['T']['w']) { 
  23577.             $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] = $table['border_details']['T']['w']; 
  23578.         } 
  23579.         if (!$table['borders_separate'] && $table['border_details']['B']['w']) { 
  23580.             $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] = $table['border_details']['B']['w']; 
  23581.         } 
  23582.         if ($this->simpleTables) { 
  23583.             return; 
  23584.         } 
  23585.         $cells = &$table['cells']; 
  23586.         $numcols = $table['nc']; 
  23587.         $numrows = $table['nr']; 
  23588.         /** -- TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS -- */ 
  23589.         if (isset($table['topntail']) && $table['topntail']) { 
  23590.             $tntborddet = $this->border_details($table['topntail']); 
  23591.         } 
  23592.         if (isset($table['thead-underline']) && $table['thead-underline']) { 
  23593.             $thuborddet = $this->border_details($table['thead-underline']); 
  23594.         } 
  23595.         /** -- END TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS -- */ 
  23596.  
  23597.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numrows; $i++) { //Rows 
  23598.             for ($j = 0; $j < $numcols; $j++) { //Columns 
  23599.                 if (isset($cells[$i][$j]) && $cells[$i][$j]) { 
  23600.                     $cell = &$cells[$i][$j]; 
  23601.                     if ($this->packTableData) { 
  23602.                         $cbord = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cell['borderbin']); 
  23603.                     } else { 
  23604.                         $cbord = &$cells[$i][$j]; 
  23605.                     } 
  23606.  
  23607.                     // mPDF 5.7.3 
  23608.                     if (!$cbord['border'] && $cbord['border'] !== 0 && isset($table['border']) && $table['border'] && $this->table_border_attr_set) { 
  23609.                         $cbord['border'] = $table['border']; 
  23610.                         $cbord['border_details'] = $table['border_details']; 
  23611.                     } 
  23612.  
  23613.                     if (isset($cell['colspan']) && $cell['colspan'] > 1) { 
  23614.                         $ccolsp = $cell['colspan']; 
  23615.                     } else { 
  23616.                         $ccolsp = 1; 
  23617.                     } 
  23618.                     if (isset($cell['rowspan']) && $cell['rowspan'] > 1) { 
  23619.                         $crowsp = $cell['rowspan']; 
  23620.                     } else { 
  23621.                         $crowsp = 1; 
  23622.                     } 
  23623.  
  23624.                     $cbord['border_details']['cellposdom'] = ((($i + 1) / $numrows) / 10000 ) + ((($j + 1) / $numcols) / 10 ); 
  23625.                     // Inherit Cell border from Table border 
  23626.                     if ($this->table_border_css_set && !$table['borders_separate']) { 
  23627.                         if ($i == 0) { 
  23628.                             $this->_table2cellBorder($table['border_details']['T'], $cbord['border_details']['T'], $cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
  23629.                         } 
  23630.                         if ($i == ($numrows - 1) || ($i + $crowsp) == ($numrows)) { 
  23631.                             $this->_table2cellBorder($table['border_details']['B'], $cbord['border_details']['B'], $cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
  23632.                         } 
  23633.                         if ($j == 0) { 
  23634.                             $this->_table2cellBorder($table['border_details']['L'], $cbord['border_details']['L'], $cbord['border'], _BORDER_LEFT); 
  23635.                         } 
  23636.                         if ($j == ($numcols - 1) || ($j + $ccolsp) == ($numcols)) { 
  23637.                             $this->_table2cellBorder($table['border_details']['R'], $cbord['border_details']['R'], $cbord['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT); 
  23638.                         } 
  23639.                     } 
  23640.  
  23641.                     /** -- TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS -- */ 
  23642.                     $fixbottom = true; 
  23643.                     if (isset($table['topntail']) && $table['topntail']) { 
  23644.                         if ($i == 0) { 
  23645.                             $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $tntborddet; 
  23646.                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
  23647.                         } 
  23648.                         if ($this->tableLevel == 1 && $table['headernrows'] > 0 && $i == $table['headernrows'] - 1) { 
  23649.                             $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $tntborddet; 
  23650.                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
  23651.                             $fixbottom = false; 
  23652.                         } elseif ($this->tableLevel == 1 && $table['headernrows'] > 0 && $i == $table['headernrows']) { 
  23653.                             if (!$table['borders_separate']) { 
  23654.                                 $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $tntborddet; 
  23655.                                 $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
  23656.                             } 
  23657.                         } 
  23658.                         if ($this->tableLevel == 1 && $table['footernrows'] > 0 && $i == ($numrows - $table['footernrows'] - 1)) { 
  23659.                             if (!$table['borders_separate']) { 
  23660.                                 $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $tntborddet; 
  23661.                                 $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
  23662.                                 $fixbottom = false; 
  23663.                             } 
  23664.                         } elseif ($this->tableLevel == 1 && $table['footernrows'] > 0 && $i == ($numrows - $table['footernrows'])) { 
  23665.                             $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $tntborddet; 
  23666.                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
  23667.                         } 
  23668.                         if ($this->tabletheadjustfinished) { // $this->tabletheadjustfinished called from tableheader 
  23669.                             if (!$table['borders_separate']) { 
  23670.                                 $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $tntborddet; 
  23671.                                 $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
  23672.                             } 
  23673.                         } 
  23674.                         if ($i == ($numrows - 1) || ($i + $crowsp) == ($numrows)) { 
  23675.                             $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $tntborddet; 
  23676.                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
  23677.                         } 
  23678.                     } 
  23679.                     if (isset($table['thead-underline']) && $table['thead-underline']) { 
  23680.                         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  23681.                             if ($i == 0) { 
  23682.                                 $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $thuborddet; 
  23683.                                 $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
  23684.                                 $fixbottom = false; 
  23685.                             } 
  23686.                         } else { 
  23687.                             if ($this->tableLevel == 1 && $table['headernrows'] > 0 && $i == $table['headernrows'] - 1) { 
  23688.                                 $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $thuborddet; 
  23689.                                 $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
  23690.                             } elseif ($this->tabletheadjustfinished) { // $this->tabletheadjustfinished called from tableheader 
  23691.                                 $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $thuborddet; 
  23692.                                 $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
  23693.                             } 
  23694.                         } 
  23695.                     } 
  23696.  
  23697.                     // Collapse Border - Algorithm for conflicting borders 
  23698.                     // Hidden >> Width >> double>solid>dashed>dotted... >> style set on cell>table >> top/left>bottom/right 
  23699.                     // Do not turn off border which is overridden 
  23700.                     // Needed for page break for TOP/BOTTOM both to be defined in Collapsed borders 
  23701.                     // Means it is painted twice. (Left/Right can still disable overridden border) 
  23702.                     if (!$table['borders_separate']) { 
  23703.                         if (($i < ($numrows - 1) || ($i + $crowsp) < $numrows ) && $fixbottom) { // Bottom 
  23704.                             for ($cspi = 0; $cspi < $ccolsp; $cspi++) { 
  23705.                                 // already defined Top for adjacent cell below 
  23706.                                 if (isset($cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi])) { 
  23707.                                     if ($this->packTableData) { 
  23708.                                         $adjc = $cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]; 
  23709.                                         $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($adjc['borderbin']); 
  23710.                                     } else { 
  23711.                                         $celladj = & $cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]; 
  23712.                                     } 
  23713.                                 } else { 
  23714.                                     $celladj = false; 
  23715.                                 } 
  23716.                                 if ($celladj && $celladj['border_details']['T']['s'] == 1) { 
  23717.                                     $csadj = $celladj['border_details']['T']['w']; 
  23718.                                     $csthis = $cbord['border_details']['B']['w']; 
  23719.                                     // Hidden 
  23720.                                     if ($cbord['border_details']['B']['style'] == 'hidden') { 
  23721.                                         $celladj['border_details']['T'] = $cbord['border_details']['B']; 
  23722.                                         $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_TOP, false); 
  23723.                                         $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM, false); 
  23724.                                     } elseif ($celladj['border_details']['T']['style'] == 'hidden') { 
  23725.                                         $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $celladj['border_details']['T']; 
  23726.                                         $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM, false); 
  23727.                                         $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_TOP, false); 
  23728.                                     } 
  23729.                                     // Width 
  23730.                                     elseif ($csthis > $csadj) { 
  23731.                                         if (!isset($cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan']) || (isset($cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan']) && $cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan'] < 2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span 
  23732.                                             $celladj['border_details']['T'] = $cbord['border_details']['B']; 
  23733.                                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
  23734.                                         } 
  23735.                                     } elseif ($csadj > $csthis) { 
  23736.                                         if ($ccolsp < 2) { // don't overwrite this cell if it spans 
  23737.                                             $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $celladj['border_details']['T']; 
  23738.                                             $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
  23739.                                         } 
  23740.                                     } 
  23741.  
  23742.                                     // double>solid>dashed>dotted... 
  23743.                                     elseif (array_search($cbord['border_details']['B']['style'], $this->borderstyles) > array_search($celladj['border_details']['T']['style'], $this->borderstyles)) { 
  23744.                                         if (!isset($cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan']) || (isset($cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan']) && $cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan'] < 2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span 
  23745.                                             $celladj['border_details']['T'] = $cbord['border_details']['B']; 
  23746.                                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
  23747.                                         } 
  23748.                                     } elseif (array_search($celladj['border_details']['T']['style'], $this->borderstyles) > array_search($cbord['border_details']['B']['style'], $this->borderstyles)) { 
  23749.                                         if ($ccolsp < 2) { // don't overwrite this cell if it spans 
  23750.                                             $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $celladj['border_details']['T']; 
  23751.                                             $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
  23752.                                         } 
  23753.                                     } 
  23754.  
  23755.  
  23756.  
  23757.                                     // Style set on cell vs. table 
  23758.                                     elseif ($celladj['border_details']['T']['dom'] > $cbord['border_details']['B']['dom']) { 
  23759.                                         if ($ccolsp < 2) { // don't overwrite this cell if it spans 
  23760.                                             $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $celladj['border_details']['T']; 
  23761.                                             $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
  23762.                                         } 
  23763.                                     } 
  23764.                                     // Style set on cell vs. table  - OR - LEFT/TOP (cell) in preference to BOTTOM/RIGHT 
  23765.                                     else { 
  23766.                                         if (!isset($cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan']) || (isset($cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan']) && $cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan'] < 2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span 
  23767.                                             $celladj['border_details']['T'] = $cbord['border_details']['B']; 
  23768.                                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
  23769.                                         } 
  23770.                                     } 
  23771.                                 } elseif ($celladj) { 
  23772.                                     if (!isset($cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan']) || (isset($cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan']) && $cells[($i + $crowsp)][$j + $cspi]['colspan'] < 2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span 
  23773.                                         $celladj['border_details']['T'] = $cbord['border_details']['B']; 
  23774.                                     } 
  23775.                                 } 
  23776.                                 // mPDF 5.7.4 
  23777.                                 if ($celladj && $this->packTableData) { 
  23778.                                     $cells[$i + $crowsp][$j + $cspi]['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($celladj); 
  23779.                                 } 
  23780.                                 unset($celladj); 
  23781.                             } 
  23782.                         } 
  23783.  
  23784.                         if ($j < ($numcols - 1) || ($j + $ccolsp) < $numcols) { // Right-Left 
  23785.                             for ($cspi = 0; $cspi < $crowsp; $cspi++) { 
  23786.                                 // already defined Left for adjacent cell to R 
  23787.                                 if (isset($cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp])) { 
  23788.                                     if ($this->packTableData) { 
  23789.                                         $adjc = $cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]; 
  23790.                                         $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($adjc['borderbin']); 
  23791.                                     } else { 
  23792.                                         $celladj = & $cells[$i + $cspi][$j + $ccolsp]; 
  23793.                                     } 
  23794.                                 } else { 
  23795.                                     $celladj = false; 
  23796.                                 } 
  23797.                                 if ($celladj && $celladj['border_details']['L']['s'] == 1) { 
  23798.                                     $csadj = $celladj['border_details']['L']['w']; 
  23799.                                     $csthis = $cbord['border_details']['R']['w']; 
  23800.                                     // Hidden 
  23801.                                     if ($cbord['border_details']['R']['style'] == 'hidden') { 
  23802.                                         $celladj['border_details']['L'] = $cbord['border_details']['R']; 
  23803.                                         $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_LEFT, false); 
  23804.                                         $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT, false); 
  23805.                                     } elseif ($celladj['border_details']['L']['style'] == 'hidden') { 
  23806.                                         $cbord['border_details']['R'] = $celladj['border_details']['L']; 
  23807.                                         $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT, false); 
  23808.                                         $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_LEFT, false); 
  23809.                                     } 
  23810.                                     // Width 
  23811.                                     elseif ($csthis > $csadj) { 
  23812.                                         if (!isset($cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan']) || (isset($cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan']) && $cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan'] < 2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span 
  23813.                                             $celladj['border_details']['L'] = $cbord['border_details']['R']; 
  23814.                                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT); 
  23815.                                             $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_LEFT, false); 
  23816.                                         } 
  23817.                                     } elseif ($csadj > $csthis) { 
  23818.                                         if ($crowsp < 2) { // don't overwrite this cell if it spans 
  23819.                                             $cbord['border_details']['R'] = $celladj['border_details']['L']; 
  23820.                                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT, false); 
  23821.                                             $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_LEFT); 
  23822.                                         } 
  23823.                                     } 
  23824.  
  23825.                                     // double>solid>dashed>dotted... 
  23826.                                     elseif (array_search($cbord['border_details']['R']['style'], $this->borderstyles) > array_search($celladj['border_details']['L']['style'], $this->borderstyles)) { 
  23827.                                         if (!isset($cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan']) || (isset($cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan']) && $cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan'] < 2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span 
  23828.                                             $celladj['border_details']['L'] = $cbord['border_details']['R']; 
  23829.                                             $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_LEFT, false); 
  23830.                                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT); 
  23831.                                         } 
  23832.                                     } elseif (array_search($celladj['border_details']['L']['style'], $this->borderstyles) > array_search($cbord['border_details']['R']['style'], $this->borderstyles)) { 
  23833.                                         if ($crowsp < 2) { // don't overwrite this cell if it spans 
  23834.                                             $cbord['border_details']['R'] = $celladj['border_details']['L']; 
  23835.                                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT, false); 
  23836.                                             $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_LEFT); 
  23837.                                         } 
  23838.                                     } 
  23839.  
  23840.  
  23841.                                     // Style set on cell vs. table 
  23842.                                     elseif ($celladj['border_details']['L']['dom'] > $cbord['border_details']['R']['dom']) { 
  23843.                                         if ($crowsp < 2) { // don't overwrite this cell if it spans 
  23844.                                             $cbord['border_details']['R'] = $celladj['border_details']['L']; 
  23845.                                             $this->setBorder($celladj['border'], _BORDER_LEFT); 
  23846.                                         } 
  23847.                                     } 
  23848.                                     // Style set on cell vs. table  - OR - LEFT/TOP (cell) in preference to BOTTOM/RIGHT 
  23849.                                     else { 
  23850.                                         if (!isset($cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan']) || (isset($cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan']) && $cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan'] < 2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span 
  23851.                                             $celladj['border_details']['L'] = $cbord['border_details']['R']; 
  23852.                                             $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT); 
  23853.                                         } 
  23854.                                     } 
  23855.                                 } elseif ($celladj) { 
  23856.                                     // if right-cell border is not set 
  23857.                                     if (!isset($cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan']) || (isset($cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan']) && $cells[($i + $cspi)][$j + $ccolsp]['rowspan'] < 2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span 
  23858.                                         $celladj['border_details']['L'] = $cbord['border_details']['R']; 
  23859.                                     } 
  23860.                                 } 
  23861.                                 // mPDF 5.7.4 
  23862.                                 if ($celladj && $this->packTableData) { 
  23863.                                     $cells[$i + $cspi][$j + $ccolsp]['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($celladj); 
  23864.                                 } 
  23865.                                 unset($celladj); 
  23866.                             } 
  23867.                         } 
  23868.                     } 
  23869.  
  23870.  
  23871.                     // Set maximum cell border width meeting at LRTB edges of cell - used for extended cell border 
  23872.                     // ['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = meeting border width - Left border - Top end 
  23873.                     if (!$table['borders_separate']) { 
  23874.                         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'], $cbord['border_details']['L']['w']); 
  23875.                         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'], $cbord['border_details']['R']['w']); 
  23876.                         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'], $cbord['border_details']['T']['w']); 
  23877.                         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'], $cbord['border_details']['B']['w']); 
  23878.                         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'], $cbord['border_details']['L']['w']); 
  23879.                         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'], $cbord['border_details']['R']['w']); 
  23880.                         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'], $cbord['border_details']['T']['w']); 
  23881.                         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'], $cbord['border_details']['B']['w']); 
  23882.                         if (($i + $crowsp) < $numrows && isset($cells[$i + $crowsp][$j])) { // Has Bottom adjoining cell 
  23883.                             if ($this->packTableData) { 
  23884.                                 $adjc = $cells[$i + $crowsp][$j]; 
  23885.                                 $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($adjc['borderbin']); 
  23886.                             } else { 
  23887.                                 $celladj = & $cells[$i + $crowsp][$j]; 
  23888.                             } 
  23889.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'], $celladj['border_details']['L']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['TL']); 
  23890.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'], $celladj['border_details']['R']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['TR']); 
  23891.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['LT']); 
  23892.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RT']); 
  23893.                             unset($celladj); 
  23894.                         } 
  23895.                         if (($j + $ccolsp) < $numcols && isset($cells[$i][$j + $ccolsp])) { // Has Right adjoining cell 
  23896.                             if ($this->packTableData) { 
  23897.                                 $adjc = $cells[$i][$j + $ccolsp]; 
  23898.                                 $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($adjc['borderbin']); 
  23899.                             } else { 
  23900.                                 $celladj = & $cells[$i][$j + $ccolsp]; 
  23901.                             } 
  23902.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'], $celladj['border_details']['T']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['LT']); 
  23903.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'], $celladj['border_details']['B']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['LB']); 
  23904.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['TL']); 
  23905.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BL']); 
  23906.                             unset($celladj); 
  23907.                         } 
  23908.  
  23909.                         if ($i > 0 && isset($cells[$i - 1][$j]) && (($this->packTableData && $cells[$i - 1][$j]['borderbin']) || $cells[$i - 1][$j]['border'])) { // Has Top adjoining cell 
  23910.                             if ($this->packTableData) { 
  23911.                                 $adjc = $cells[$i - 1][$j]; 
  23912.                                 $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($adjc['borderbin']); 
  23913.                             } else { 
  23914.                                 $celladj = & $cells[$i - 1][$j]; 
  23915.                             } 
  23916.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'], $celladj['border_details']['L']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BL']); 
  23917.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'], $celladj['border_details']['R']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BR']); 
  23918.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['LB']); 
  23919.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RB']); 
  23920.  
  23921.                             if ($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BL']) { 
  23922.                                 $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BL']); 
  23923.                             } 
  23924.                             if ($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BR']) { 
  23925.                                 $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = max($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BR'], $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR']); 
  23926.                             } 
  23927.                             if ($this->packTableData) { 
  23928.                                 $cells[$i - 1][$j]['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($celladj); 
  23929.                             } 
  23930.                             unset($celladj); 
  23931.                         } 
  23932.                         if ($j > 0 && isset($cells[$i][$j - 1]) && (($this->packTableData && $cells[$i][$j - 1]['borderbin']) || $cells[$i][$j - 1]['border'])) { // Has Left adjoining cell 
  23933.                             if ($this->packTableData) { 
  23934.                                 $adjc = $cells[$i][$j - 1]; 
  23935.                                 $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($adjc['borderbin']); 
  23936.                             } else { 
  23937.                                 $celladj = & $cells[$i][$j - 1]; 
  23938.                             } 
  23939.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'], $celladj['border_details']['T']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RT']); 
  23940.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'], $celladj['border_details']['B']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RB']); 
  23941.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BR']); 
  23942.                             $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['TR']); 
  23943.  
  23944.                             if ($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RT']) { 
  23945.                                 $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = max($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RT'], $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT']); 
  23946.                             } 
  23947.                             if ($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RB']) { 
  23948.                                 $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = max($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RB'], $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB']); 
  23949.                             } 
  23950.                             if ($this->packTableData) { 
  23951.                                 $cells[$i][$j - 1]['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($celladj); 
  23952.                             } 
  23953.                             unset($celladj); 
  23954.                         } 
  23955.  
  23956.  
  23957.                         // Update maximum cell border width at LRTB edges of table - used for overall table width 
  23958.                         if ($j == 0 && $cbord['border_details']['L']['w']) { 
  23959.                             $table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] = max($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'], $cbord['border_details']['L']['w']); 
  23960.                         } 
  23961.                         if (($j == ($numcols - 1) || ($j + $ccolsp) == $numcols ) && $cbord['border_details']['R']['w']) { 
  23962.                             $table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] = max($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'], $cbord['border_details']['R']['w']); 
  23963.                         } 
  23964.                         if ($i == 0 && $cbord['border_details']['T']['w']) { 
  23965.                             $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] = max($table['max_cell_border_width']['T'], $cbord['border_details']['T']['w']); 
  23966.                         } 
  23967.                         if (($i == ($numrows - 1) || ($i + $crowsp) == $numrows ) && $cbord['border_details']['B']['w']) { 
  23968.                             $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] = max($table['max_cell_border_width']['B'], $cbord['border_details']['B']['w']); 
  23969.                         } 
  23970.                     } 
  23971.                     /** -- END TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS -- */ 
  23972.  
  23973.                     if ($this->packTableData) { 
  23974.                         $cell['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($cbord); 
  23975.                     } 
  23976.  
  23977.                     unset($cbord); 
  23978.  
  23979.                     unset($cell); 
  23980.                 } 
  23981.             } 
  23982.         } 
  23983.         unset($cell); 
  23984.     } 
  23985.  
  23986.     // END FIX BORDERS ************************************************************************************ 
  23987.  
  23988.     function _reverseTableDir(&$table) 
  23989.     { 
  23990.         $cells = &$table['cells']; 
  23991.         $numcols = $table['nc']; 
  23992.         $numrows = $table['nr']; 
  23993.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numrows; $i++) { //Rows 
  23994.             $row = array(); 
  23995.             for ($j = ($numcols - 1); $j >= 0; $j--) { //Columns 
  23996.                 if (isset($cells[$i][$j]) && $cells[$i][$j]) { 
  23997.                     $cell = &$cells[$i][$j]; 
  23998.                     $col = $numcols - $j - 1; 
  23999.                     if (isset($cell['colspan']) && $cell['colspan'] > 1) { 
  24000.                         $col -= ($cell['colspan'] - 1); 
  24001.                     } 
  24002.                     // Nested content 
  24003.                     if (isset($cell['textbuffer'])) { 
  24004.                         for ($n = 0; $n < count($cell['textbuffer']); $n++) { 
  24005.                             $t = $cell['textbuffer'][$n][0]; 
  24006.                             if (substr($t, 0, 19) == "\xbb\xa4\xactype=nestedtable") { 
  24007.                                 $objattr = $this->_getObjAttr($t); 
  24008.                                 $objattr['col'] = $col; 
  24009.                                 $cell['textbuffer'][$n][0] = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=nestedtable, objattr=" . serialize($objattr) . "\xbb\xa4\xac"; 
  24010.                                 $this->table[($this->tableLevel + 1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]['nestedpos'][1] = $col; 
  24011.                             } 
  24012.                         } 
  24013.                     } 
  24014.                     $row[$col] = $cells[$i][$j]; 
  24015.                     unset($cell); 
  24016.                 } 
  24017.             } 
  24018.             for ($f = 0; $f < $numcols; $f++) { 
  24019.                 if (!isset($row[$f])) { 
  24020.                     $row[$f] = 0; 
  24021.                 } 
  24022.             } 
  24023.             $table['cells'][$i] = $row; 
  24024.         } 
  24025.     } 
  24026.  
  24027.     function _tableWrite(&$table, $split = false, $startrow = 0, $startcol = 0, $splitpg = 0, $rety = 0) 
  24028.     { 
  24029.         $level = $table['level']; 
  24030.         $levelid = $table['levelid']; 
  24031.  
  24032.         $cells = &$table['cells']; 
  24033.         $numcols = $table['nc']; 
  24034.         $numrows = $table['nr']; 
  24035.         $maxbwtop = 0; 
  24036.         if ($this->ColActive && $level == 1) { 
  24037.             $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; 
  24038.         } // *COLUMNS* 
  24039.  
  24040.         if (!$split || ($startrow == 0 && $splitpg == 0) || $startrow > 0) { 
  24041.             // TABLE TOP MARGIN 
  24042.             if ($table['margin']['T']) { 
  24043.                 if (!$this->table_rotate && $level == 1) { 
  24044.                     $this->DivLn($table['margin']['T'], $this->blklvl, true, 1);  // collapsible 
  24045.                 } else { 
  24046.                     $this->y += ($table['margin']['T']); 
  24047.                 } 
  24048.             } 
  24049.             // Advance down page by half width of top border 
  24050.             if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24051.                 if ($startrow > 0 && (!isset($table['is_thead']) || count($table['is_thead']) == 0)) 
  24052.                     $adv = $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  24053.                 else 
  24054.                     $adv = $table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  24055.             } 
  24056.             else { 
  24057.                 $adv = $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] / 2; 
  24058.             } 
  24059.             if (!$this->table_rotate && $level == 1) { 
  24060.                 $this->DivLn($adv); 
  24061.             } else { 
  24062.                 $this->y += $adv; 
  24063.             } 
  24064.         } 
  24065.  
  24066.         if ($level == 1) { 
  24067.             $this->x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w']; 
  24068.             $x0 = $this->x; 
  24069.             $y0 = $this->y; 
  24070.             $right = $x0 + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; 
  24071.             $outerfilled = $this->y; // Keep track of how far down the outer DIV bgcolor is painted (NB rowspans) 
  24072.             $this->outerfilled = $this->y; 
  24073.             $this->colsums = array(); 
  24074.         } else { 
  24075.             $x0 = $this->x; 
  24076.             $y0 = $this->y; 
  24077.             $right = $x0 + $table['w']; 
  24078.         } 
  24079.  
  24080.         if ($this->table_rotate) { 
  24081.             $temppgwidth = $this->tbrot_maxw; 
  24082.             $this->PageBreakTrigger = $pagetrigger = $y0 + ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']); 
  24083.             if ($level == 1) { 
  24084.                 $this->tbrot_y0 = $this->y - $adv - $table['margin']['T']; 
  24085.                 $this->tbrot_x0 = $this->x; 
  24086.                 $this->tbrot_w = $table['w']; 
  24087.                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24088.                     $this->tbrot_h = $table['margin']['T'] + $table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  24089.                 } else { 
  24090.                     $this->tbrot_h = $table['margin']['T'] + $table['padding']['T'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['T']; 
  24091.                 } 
  24092.             } 
  24093.         } else { 
  24094.             $this->PageBreakTrigger = $pagetrigger = ($this->h - $this->bMargin); 
  24095.             if ($level == 1) { 
  24096.                 $temppgwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; 
  24097.                 if (isset($table['a']) and ( $table['w'] < $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'])) { 
  24098.                     if ($table['a'] == 'C') { 
  24099.                         $x0 += ((($right - $x0) - $table['w']) / 2); 
  24100.                     } elseif ($table['a'] == 'R') { 
  24101.                         $x0 = $right - $table['w']; 
  24102.                     } 
  24103.                 } 
  24104.             } else { 
  24105.                 $temppgwidth = $table['w']; 
  24106.             } 
  24107.         } 
  24108.         if (!isset($table['overflow'])) { 
  24109.             $table['overflow'] = null; 
  24110.         } 
  24111.         if ($table['overflow'] == 'hidden' && $level == 1 && !$this->table_rotate && !$this->ColActive) { 
  24112.             //Bounding rectangle to clip 
  24113.             $this->tableClipPath = sprintf('q %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re W n', $x0 * _MPDFK, $this->h * _MPDFK, $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] * _MPDFK, -$this->h * _MPDFK); 
  24114.             $this->_out($this->tableClipPath); 
  24115.         } else { 
  24116.             $this->tableClipPath = ''; 
  24117.         } 
  24118.  
  24119.  
  24120.         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24121.             $indent = $table['margin']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_spacing_H'] / 2; 
  24122.         } else { 
  24123.             $indent = $table['margin']['L'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2; 
  24124.         } 
  24125.         $x0 += $indent; 
  24126.  
  24127.         $returny = 0; 
  24128.         $lastCol = 0; 
  24129.         $tableheader = array(); 
  24130.         $tablefooter = array(); 
  24131.         $tableheaderrowheight = 0; 
  24132.         $tablefooterrowheight = 0; 
  24133.         $footery = 0; 
  24134.  
  24135.         // mPD 3.0 Set the Page & Column where table starts 
  24136.         if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page) % 2 == 0)) { // EVEN 
  24137.             $tablestartpage = 'EVEN'; 
  24138.         } elseif (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page) % 2 == 1)) { // ODD 
  24139.             $tablestartpage = 'ODD'; 
  24140.         } else { 
  24141.             $tablestartpage = ''; 
  24142.         } 
  24143.         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  24144.             $tablestartcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  24145.         } else { 
  24146.             $tablestartcolumn = ''; 
  24147.         } 
  24148.  
  24149.         $y = $h = 0; 
  24150.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numrows; $i++) { //Rows 
  24151.             if (isset($table['is_tfoot'][$i]) && $table['is_tfoot'][$i] && $level == 1) { 
  24152.                 $tablefooterrowheight += $table['hr'][$i]; 
  24153.                 $tablefooter[$i][0]['trbackground-images'] = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]; 
  24154.                 $tablefooter[$i][0]['trgradients'] = $table['trgradients'][$i]; 
  24155.                 $tablefooter[$i][0]['trbgcolor'] = $table['bgcolor'][$i]; 
  24156.                 for ($j = $startcol; $j < $numcols; $j++) { //Columns 
  24157.                     if (isset($cells[$i][$j]) && $cells[$i][$j]) { 
  24158.                         $cell = &$cells[$i][$j]; 
  24159.                         if ($split) { 
  24160.                             if ($table['colPg'][$j] != $splitpg) { 
  24161.                                 continue; 
  24162.                             } 
  24163.                             list($x, $w) = $this->_splitTableGetWidth($table, $i, $j); 
  24164.                             $js = $j - $startcol; 
  24165.                         } else { 
  24166.                             list($x, $w) = $this->_tableGetWidth($table, $i, $j); 
  24167.                             $js = $j; 
  24168.                         } 
  24169.  
  24170.                         list($y, $h) = $this->_tableGetHeight($table, $i, $j); 
  24171.                         $x += $x0; 
  24172.                         $y += $y0; 
  24173.                         //Get info of tfoot ==>> table footer 
  24174.                         $tablefooter[$i][$js]['x'] = $x; 
  24175.                         $tablefooter[$i][$js]['y'] = $y; 
  24176.                         $tablefooter[$i][$js]['h'] = $h; 
  24177.                         $tablefooter[$i][$js]['w'] = $w; 
  24178.                         if (isset($cell['textbuffer'])) { 
  24179.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['textbuffer'] = $cell['textbuffer']; 
  24180.                         } else { 
  24181.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['textbuffer'] = ''; 
  24182.                         } 
  24183.                         $tablefooter[$i][$js]['a'] = $cell['a']; 
  24184.                         $tablefooter[$i][$js]['R'] = $cell['R']; 
  24185.                         $tablefooter[$i][$js]['va'] = $cell['va']; 
  24186.                         $tablefooter[$i][$js]['mih'] = $cell['mih']; 
  24187.                         if (isset($cell['gradient'])) 
  24188.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['gradient'] = $cell['gradient']; // *BACKGROUNDS* 
  24189.                         if (isset($cell['background-image'])) 
  24190.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['background-image'] = $cell['background-image']; // *BACKGROUNDS* 
  24191.  
  24192.                         //CELL FILL BGCOLOR 
  24193.                         if (!$this->simpleTables) { 
  24194.                             if ($this->packTableData) { 
  24195.                                 $c = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cell['borderbin']); 
  24196.                                 $tablefooter[$i][$js]['border'] = $c['border']; 
  24197.                                 $tablefooter[$i][$js]['border_details'] = $c['border_details']; 
  24198.                             } else { 
  24199.                                 $tablefooter[$i][$js]['border'] = $cell['border']; 
  24200.                                 $tablefooter[$i][$js]['border_details'] = $cell['border_details']; 
  24201.                             } 
  24202.                         } elseif ($this->simpleTables) { 
  24203.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['border'] = $table['simple']['border']; 
  24204.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['border_details'] = $table['simple']['border_details']; 
  24205.                         } 
  24206.                         $tablefooter[$i][$js]['bgcolor'] = $cell['bgcolor']; 
  24207.                         $tablefooter[$i][$js]['padding'] = $cell['padding']; 
  24208.                         if (isset($cell['rowspan'])) 
  24209.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['rowspan'] = $cell['rowspan']; 
  24210.                         if (isset($cell['colspan'])) 
  24211.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['colspan'] = $cell['colspan']; 
  24212.                         if (isset($cell['direction'])) 
  24213.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['direction'] = $cell['direction']; 
  24214.                         if (isset($cell['cellLineHeight'])) 
  24215.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['cellLineHeight'] = $cell['cellLineHeight']; 
  24216.                         if (isset($cell['cellLineStackingStrategy'])) 
  24217.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['cellLineStackingStrategy'] = $cell['cellLineStackingStrategy']; 
  24218.                         if (isset($cell['cellLineStackingShift'])) 
  24219.                             $tablefooter[$i][$js]['cellLineStackingShift'] = $cell['cellLineStackingShift']; 
  24220.                     } 
  24221.                 } 
  24222.             } 
  24223.         } 
  24224.  
  24225.         if ($level == 1) { 
  24226.             $this->_out('___TABLE___BACKGROUNDS' . $this->uniqstr); 
  24227.         } 
  24228.         $tableheaderadj = 0; 
  24229.         $tablefooteradj = 0; 
  24230.  
  24231.         $tablestartpageno = $this->page; 
  24232.  
  24233.         //Draw Table Contents and Borders 
  24234.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numrows; $i++) { //Rows 
  24235.             if ($split && $startrow > 0) { 
  24236.                 $thnr = (isset($table['is_thead']) ? count($table['is_thead']) : 0); 
  24237.                 if ($i >= $thnr && $i < $startrow) { 
  24238.                     continue; 
  24239.                 } 
  24240.                 if ($i == $startrow) { 
  24241.                     $returny = $rety - $tableheaderrowheight; 
  24242.                 } 
  24243.             } 
  24244.  
  24245.             // Get Maximum row/cell height in row - including rowspan>1 + 1 overlapping 
  24246.             $maxrowheight = $this->_tableGetMaxRowHeight($table, $i); 
  24247.  
  24248.             $skippage = false; 
  24249.             $newpagestarted = false; 
  24250.             for ($j = $startcol; $j < $numcols; $j++) { //Columns 
  24251.                 if ($split) { 
  24252.                     if ($table['colPg'][$j] > $splitpg) { 
  24253.                         break;
