  24254.                     } 
  24255.                     $lastCol = $j; 
  24256.                 } 
  24257.                 if (isset($cells[$i][$j]) && $cells[$i][$j]) { 
  24258.                     $cell = &$cells[$i][$j]; 
  24259.                     if ($split) { 
  24260.                         $lastCol = $j + (isset($cell['colspan']) ? ($cell['colspan'] - 1) : 0); 
  24261.                         list($x, $w) = $this->_splitTableGetWidth($table, $i, $j); 
  24262.                     } else { 
  24263.                         list($x, $w) = $this->_tableGetWidth($table, $i, $j); 
  24264.                     } 
  24265.  
  24266.                     list($y, $h) = $this->_tableGetHeight($table, $i, $j); 
  24267.                     $x += $x0; 
  24268.                     $y += $y0; 
  24269.                     $y -= $returny; 
  24270.  
  24271.                     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24272.                         if (!empty($tablefooter) || $i == ($numrows - 1) || (isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i + $cell['rowspan']) == $numrows) || (!isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i + 1) == $numrows)) { 
  24273.                             $extra = $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  24274.                             //$extra = $table['margin']['B'] + $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; 
  24275.                         } else { 
  24276.                             $extra = $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  24277.                         } 
  24278.                     } else { 
  24279.                         $extra = $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] / 2; 
  24280.                     } 
  24281.  
  24282.                     if ($j == $startcol && ((($y + $maxrowheight + $extra ) > ($pagetrigger + 0.001)) || (($this->keepColumns || !$this->ColActive) && !empty($tablefooter) && ($y + $maxrowheight + $tablefooterrowheight + $extra) > $pagetrigger) && ($this->tableLevel == 1 && $i < ($numrows - $table['headernrows']))) && ($y0 > 0 || $x0 > 0) && !$this->InFooter && $this->autoPageBreak) { 
  24283.  
  24284.                         if (!$skippage) { 
  24285.                             $finalSpread = true; 
  24286.                             $firstSpread = true; 
  24287.                             if ($split) { 
  24288.                                 for ($t = $startcol; $t < $numcols; $t++) { 
  24289.                                     // Are there more columns to print on a next page? 
  24290.                                     if ($table['colPg'][$t] > $splitpg) { 
  24291.                                         $finalSpread = false; 
  24292.                                         break; 
  24293.                                     } 
  24294.                                 } 
  24295.                                 if ($startcol > 0) { 
  24296.                                     $firstSpread = false; 
  24297.                                 } 
  24298.                             } 
  24299.  
  24300.                             if (($this->keepColumns || !$this->ColActive) && !empty($tablefooter) && $i > 0) { 
  24301.                                 $this->y = $y; 
  24302.                                 $ya = $this->y; 
  24303.                                 $this->TableHeaderFooter($tablefooter, $tablestartpage, $tablestartcolumn, 'F', $level, $firstSpread, $finalSpread); 
  24304.                                 if ($this->table_rotate) { 
  24305.                                     $this->tbrot_h += $this->y - $ya; 
  24306.                                 } 
  24307.                                 $tablefooteradj = $this->y - $ya; 
  24308.                             } 
  24309.                             $y -= $y0; 
  24310.                             $returny += $y; 
  24311.  
  24312.                             $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  24313.                             if ($this->AcceptPageBreak()) { 
  24314.                                 $newpagestarted = true; 
  24315.                                 $this->y = $y + $y0; 
  24316.  
  24317.                                 // Move down to account for border-spacing or 
  24318.                                 // extra half border width in case page breaks in middle 
  24319.                                 if ($i > 0 && !$this->table_rotate && $level == 1 && !$this->ColActive) { 
  24320.                                     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24321.                                         $adv = $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  24322.                                         // If table footer 
  24323.                                         if (($this->keepColumns || !$this->ColActive) && !empty($tablefooter) && $i > 0) { 
  24324.                                             $adv += ($table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w']); 
  24325.                                         } 
  24326.                                     } else { 
  24327.                                         $maxbwtop = 0; 
  24328.                                         $maxbwbottom = 0; 
  24329.                                         if (!$this->simpleTables) { 
  24330.                                             if (!empty($tablefooter)) { 
  24331.                                                 $maxbwbottom = $table['max_cell_border_width']['B']; 
  24332.                                             } else { 
  24333.                                                 $brow = $i - 1; 
  24334.                                                 for ($ctj = 0; $ctj < $numcols; $ctj++) { 
  24335.                                                     if (isset($cells[$brow][$ctj]) && $cells[$brow][$ctj]) { 
  24336.                                                         if ($this->packTableData) { 
  24337.                                                             list($bt, $br, $bb, $bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($cells[$brow][$ctj]['borderbin']); 
  24338.                                                         } else { 
  24339.                                                             $bb = $cells[$brow][$ctj]['border_details']['B']['w']; 
  24340.                                                         } 
  24341.                                                         $maxbwbottom = max($maxbwbottom, $bb); 
  24342.                                                     } 
  24343.                                                 } 
  24344.                                             } 
  24345.                                             if (!empty($tableheader)) { 
  24346.                                                 $maxbwtop = $table['max_cell_border_width']['T']; 
  24347.                                             } else { 
  24348.                                                 $trow = $i - 1; 
  24349.                                                 for ($ctj = 0; $ctj < $numcols; $ctj++) { 
  24350.                                                     if (isset($cells[$trow][$ctj]) && $cells[$trow][$ctj]) { 
  24351.                                                         if ($this->packTableData) { 
  24352.                                                             list($bt, $br, $bb, $bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($cells[$trow][$ctj]['borderbin']); 
  24353.                                                         } else { 
  24354.                                                             $bt = $cells[$trow][$ctj]['border_details']['T']['w']; 
  24355.                                                         } 
  24356.                                                         $maxbwtop = max($maxbwtop, $bt); 
  24357.                                                     } 
  24358.                                                 } 
  24359.                                             } 
  24360.                                         } elseif ($this->simpleTables) { 
  24361.                                             $maxbwtop = $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w']; 
  24362.                                             $maxbwbottom = $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w']; 
  24363.                                         } 
  24364.                                         $adv = $maxbwbottom / 2; 
  24365.                                     } 
  24366.                                     $this->y += $adv; 
  24367.                                 } 
  24368.  
  24369.                                 // Rotated table split over pages - needs this->y for borders/backgrounds 
  24370.                                 if ($i > 0 && $this->table_rotate && $level == 1) { 
  24371.                                     //            $this->y = $y0 + $this->tbrot_w; 
  24372.                                 } 
  24373.  
  24374.                                 if ($this->tableClipPath) { 
  24375.                                     $this->_out("Q"); 
  24376.                                 } 
  24377.  
  24378.                                 $bx = $x0; 
  24379.                                 $by = $y0; 
  24380.  
  24381.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24382.                                     $bx -= ($table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  24383.                                     if ($tablestartpageno != $this->page) { // IF already broken across a previous pagebreak 
  24384.                                         $by += $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] / 2; 
  24385.                                         if (empty($tableheader)) { 
  24386.                                             $by -= ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  24387.                                         } 
  24388.                                     } else { 
  24389.                                         $by -= ($table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  24390.                                     } 
  24391.                                 } elseif ($tablestartpageno != $this->page && !empty($tableheader)) { 
  24392.                                     $by += $maxbwtop / 2; 
  24393.                                 } 
  24394.  
  24395.                                 $by -= $tableheaderadj; 
  24396.                                 $bh = $this->y - $by + $tablefooteradj; 
  24397.                                 if (!$table['borders_separate']) { 
  24398.                                     $bh -= $adv; 
  24399.                                 } 
  24400.                                 if ($split) { 
  24401.                                     $bw = 0; 
  24402.                                     for ($t = $startcol; $t < $numcols; $t++) { 
  24403.                                         if ($table['colPg'][$t] == $splitpg) { 
  24404.                                             $bw += $table['wc'][$t]; 
  24405.                                         } 
  24406.                                         if ($table['colPg'][$t] > $splitpg) { 
  24407.                                             break; 
  24408.                                         } 
  24409.                                     } 
  24410.                                     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24411.                                         if ($firstSpread) { 
  24412.                                             $bw += $table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  24413.                                         } else { 
  24414.                                             $bx += ($table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w']); 
  24415.                                             $bw += $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  24416.                                         } 
  24417.                                         if ($finalSpread) { 
  24418.                                             $bw += $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] / 2 + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  24419.                                         } 
  24420.                                     } 
  24421.                                 } else { 
  24422.                                     $bw = $table['w'] - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2) - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] / 2) - $table['margin']['L'] - $table['margin']['R']; 
  24423.                                 } 
  24424.  
  24425.                                 if ($this->splitTableBorderWidth && ($this->keepColumns || !$this->ColActive) && empty($tablefooter) && $i > 0 && $table['border_details']['B']['w']) { 
  24426.                                     $prevDrawColor = $this->DrawColor; 
  24427.                                     $lw = $this->LineWidth; 
  24428.                                     $this->SetLineWidth($this->splitTableBorderWidth); 
  24429.                                     $this->SetDColor($table['border_details']['B']['c']); 
  24430.                                     $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  24431.                                     $this->SetLineCap(0); 
  24432.                                     $blx = $bx; 
  24433.                                     $blw = $bw; 
  24434.                                     if (!$table['borders_separate']) { 
  24435.                                         $blx -= ($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2); 
  24436.                                         $blw += ($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2 + $table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] / 2); 
  24437.                                     } 
  24438.                                     $this->Line($blx, $this->y + ($this->splitTableBorderWidth / 2), $blx + $blw, $this->y + ($this->splitTableBorderWidth / 2)); 
  24439.                                     $this->DrawColor = $prevDrawColor; 
  24440.                                     $this->_out($this->DrawColor); 
  24441.                                     $this->SetLineWidth($lw); 
  24442.                                     $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  24443.                                     $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  24444.                                 } 
  24445.  
  24446.                                 if (!$this->ColActive && ($i > 0 || $j > 0)) { 
  24447.                                     if (isset($table['bgcolor'][-1])) { 
  24448.                                         $color = $this->ConvertColor($table['bgcolor'][-1]); 
  24449.                                         if ($color) { 
  24450.                                             if (!$table['borders_separate']) { 
  24451.                                                 $bh -= $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] / 2; 
  24452.                                             } 
  24453.                                             $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9][] = array('gradient' => false, 'x' => $bx, 'y' => $by, 'w' => $bw, 'h' => $bh, 'col' => $color); 
  24454.                                         } 
  24455.                                     } 
  24456.  
  24457.                                     /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  24458.                                     if (isset($table['gradient'])) { 
  24459.                                         $g = $this->grad->parseBackgroundGradient($table['gradient']); 
  24460.                                         if ($g) { 
  24461.                                             $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 1][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $bx, 'y' => $by, 'w' => $bw, 'h' => $bh, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => ''); 
  24462.                                         } 
  24463.                                     } 
  24464.  
  24465.                                     if (isset($table['background-image'])) { 
  24466.                                         if ($table['background-image']['gradient'] && preg_match('/(-moz-)*(repeating-)*(linear|radial)-gradient/', $table['background-image']['gradient'])) { 
  24467.                                             $g = $this->grad->parseMozGradient($table['background-image']['gradient']); 
  24468.                                             if ($g) { 
  24469.                                                 $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 1][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $bx, 'y' => $by, 'w' => $bw, 'h' => $bh, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => ''); 
  24470.                                             } 
  24471.                                         } else { 
  24472.                                             $image_id = $table['background-image']['image_id']; 
  24473.                                             $orig_w = $table['background-image']['orig_w']; 
  24474.                                             $orig_h = $table['background-image']['orig_h']; 
  24475.                                             $x_pos = $table['background-image']['x_pos']; 
  24476.                                             $y_pos = $table['background-image']['y_pos']; 
  24477.                                             $x_repeat = $table['background-image']['x_repeat']; 
  24478.                                             $y_repeat = $table['background-image']['y_repeat']; 
  24479.                                             $resize = $table['background-image']['resize']; 
  24480.                                             $opacity = $table['background-image']['opacity']; 
  24481.                                             $itype = $table['background-image']['itype']; 
  24482.                                             $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 2][] = array('x' => $bx, 'y' => $by, 'w' => $bw, 'h' => $bh, 'image_id' => $image_id, 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $x_pos, 'y_pos' => $y_pos, 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'clippath' => '', 'resize' => $resize, 'opacity' => $opacity, 'itype' => $itype); 
  24483.                                         } 
  24484.                                     } 
  24485.                                     /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  24486.                                 } 
  24487.  
  24488.                                 // $this->AcceptPageBreak() has moved tablebuffer to $this->pages content 
  24489.                                 if ($this->tableBackgrounds) { 
  24490.                                     $s = $this->PrintTableBackgrounds(); 
  24491.                                     if ($this->bufferoutput) { 
  24492.                                         $this->headerbuffer = preg_replace('/(___TABLE___BACKGROUNDS' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', '\\1' . "\n" . $s . "\n", $this->headerbuffer); 
  24493.                                         $this->headerbuffer = preg_replace('/(___TABLE___BACKGROUNDS' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', " ", $this->headerbuffer); 
  24494.                                     } else { 
  24495.                                         $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___TABLE___BACKGROUNDS' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', '\\1' . "\n" . $s . "\n", $this->pages[$this->page]); 
  24496.                                         $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___TABLE___BACKGROUNDS' . $this->uniqstr . ')/', " ", $this->pages[$this->page]); 
  24497.                                     } 
  24498.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds = array(); 
  24499.                                 } 
  24500.  
  24501.                                 if ($split) { 
  24502.                                     if ($i == 0 && $j == 0) { 
  24503.                                         $y0 = -1; 
  24504.                                     } elseif ($finalSpread) { 
  24505.                                         $splitpg = 0; 
  24506.                                         $startcol = 0; 
  24507.                                         $startrow = $i; 
  24508.                                     } else { 
  24509.                                         $splitpg++; 
  24510.                                         $startcol = $t; 
  24511.                                         $returny -= $y; 
  24512.                                     } 
  24513.                                     return array(false, $startrow, $startcol, $splitpg, $returny, $y0); 
  24514.                                 } 
  24515.  
  24516.                                 $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  24517.  
  24518.                                 $this->_out('___TABLE___BACKGROUNDS' . $this->uniqstr); 
  24519.  
  24520.  
  24521.                                 if ($this->tableClipPath) { 
  24522.                                     $this->_out($this->tableClipPath); 
  24523.                                 } 
  24524.  
  24525.                                 // Added to correct for OddEven Margins 
  24526.                                 $x = $x + $this->MarginCorrection; 
  24527.                                 $x0 = $x0 + $this->MarginCorrection; 
  24528.  
  24529.                                 if ($this->splitTableBorderWidth && ($this->keepColumns || !$this->ColActive) && empty($tableheader) && $i > 0 && $table['border_details']['T']['w']) { 
  24530.                                     $prevDrawColor = $this->DrawColor; 
  24531.                                     $lw = $this->LineWidth; 
  24532.                                     $this->SetLineWidth($this->splitTableBorderWidth); 
  24533.                                     $this->SetDColor($table['border_details']['T']['c']); 
  24534.                                     $this->SetLineJoin(0); 
  24535.                                     $this->SetLineCap(0); 
  24536.                                     $blx += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  24537.                                     $this->Line($blx, $this->y - ($this->splitTableBorderWidth / 2), $blx + $blw, $this->y - ($this->splitTableBorderWidth / 2)); 
  24538.                                     $this->DrawColor = $prevDrawColor; 
  24539.                                     $this->_out($this->DrawColor); 
  24540.                                     $this->SetLineWidth($lw); 
  24541.                                     $this->SetLineJoin(2); 
  24542.                                     $this->SetLineCap(2); 
  24543.                                 } 
  24544.  
  24545.                                 // Move down to account for half of top border-spacing or 
  24546.                                 // extra half border width in case page was broken in middle 
  24547.                                 if ($i > 0 && !$this->table_rotate && $level == 1 && $table['headernrows'] == 0) { 
  24548.                                     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24549.                                         $adv = $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  24550.                                     } else { 
  24551.                                         $maxbwtop = 0; 
  24552.                                         for ($ctj = 0; $ctj < $numcols; $ctj++) { 
  24553.                                             if (isset($cells[$i][$ctj]) && $cells[$i][$ctj]) { 
  24554.                                                 if (!$this->simpleTables) { 
  24555.                                                     if ($this->packTableData) { 
  24556.                                                         list($bt, $br, $bb, $bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($cells[$i][$ctj]['borderbin']); 
  24557.                                                     } else { 
  24558.                                                         $bt = $cells[$i][$ctj]['border_details']['T']['w']; 
  24559.                                                     } 
  24560.                                                     $maxbwtop = max($maxbwtop, $bt); 
  24561.                                                 } elseif ($this->simpleTables) { 
  24562.                                                     $maxbwtop = max($maxbwtop, $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w']); 
  24563.                                                 } 
  24564.                                             } 
  24565.                                         } 
  24566.                                         $adv = $maxbwtop / 2; 
  24567.                                     } 
  24568.                                     $this->y += $adv; 
  24569.                                 } 
  24570.  
  24571.  
  24572.                                 if ($this->table_rotate) { 
  24573.                                     $this->tbrot_x0 = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w']; 
  24574.                                     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24575.                                         $this->tbrot_h = $table['margin']['T'] + $table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  24576.                                     } else { 
  24577.                                         $this->tbrot_h = $table['margin']['T'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['T']; 
  24578.                                     } 
  24579.                                     $this->tbrot_y0 = $this->y; 
  24580.                                     $pagetrigger = $y0 - $tableheaderadj + ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']); 
  24581.                                 } else { 
  24582.                                     $pagetrigger = $this->PageBreakTrigger; 
  24583.                                 } 
  24584.  
  24585.                                 if ($this->kwt_saved && $level == 1) { 
  24586.                                     $this->kwt_moved = true; 
  24587.                                 } 
  24588.  
  24589.  
  24590.                                 if (!empty($tableheader)) { 
  24591.                                     $ya = $this->y; 
  24592.                                     $this->TableHeaderFooter($tableheader, $tablestartpage, $tablestartcolumn, 'H', $level); 
  24593.                                     if ($this->table_rotate) { 
  24594.                                         $this->tbrot_h = $this->y - $ya; 
  24595.                                     } 
  24596.                                     $tableheaderadj = $this->y - $ya; 
  24597.                                 } elseif ($i == 0 && !$this->table_rotate && $level == 1 && !$this->ColActive) { 
  24598.                                     // Advance down page 
  24599.                                     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24600.                                         $adv = $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2 + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['padding']['T']; 
  24601.                                     } else { 
  24602.                                         $adv = $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] / 2; 
  24603.                                     } 
  24604.                                     if ($adv) { 
  24605.                                         if ($this->table_rotate) { 
  24606.                                             $this->y += ($adv); 
  24607.                                         } else { 
  24608.                                             $this->DivLn($adv, $this->blklvl, true); 
  24609.                                         } 
  24610.                                     } 
  24611.                                 } 
  24612.  
  24613.                                 $outerfilled = 0; 
  24614.                                 $y = $y0 = $this->y; 
  24615.                             } 
  24616.  
  24617.                             /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  24618.                             // COLS 
  24619.                             // COLUMN CHANGE 
  24620.                             if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) { 
  24621.                                 // Added to correct for Columns 
  24622.                                 $x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  24623.                                 $x0 += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  24624.                                 if ($this->CurrCol == 0) {  // just added a page - possibly with tableheader 
  24625.                                     $y0 = $this->y;  // this->y0 is global used by Columns - $y0 is internal to tablewrite 
  24626.                                 } else { 
  24627.                                     $y0 = $this->y0;  // this->y0 is global used by Columns - $y0 is internal to tablewrite 
  24628.                                 } 
  24629.                                 $y = $y0; 
  24630.                                 $outerfilled = 0; 
  24631.                                 if ($this->CurrCol != 0 && ($this->keepColumns && $this->ColActive) && !empty($tableheader) && $i > 0) { 
  24632.                                     $this->x = $x; 
  24633.                                     $this->y = $y; 
  24634.                                     $this->TableHeaderFooter($tableheader, $tablestartpage, $tablestartcolumn, 'H', $level); 
  24635.                                     $y0 = $y = $this->y; 
  24636.                                 } 
  24637.                             } 
  24638.                             /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  24639.                         } 
  24640.                         $skippage = true; 
  24641.                     } 
  24642.  
  24643.                     $this->x = $x; 
  24644.                     $this->y = $y; 
  24645.  
  24646.                     if ($this->kwt_saved && $level == 1) { 
  24647.                         $this->printkwtbuffer(); 
  24648.                         $x0 = $x = $this->x; 
  24649.                         $y0 = $y = $this->y; 
  24650.                         $this->kwt_moved = false; 
  24651.                         $this->kwt_saved = false; 
  24652.                     } 
  24653.  
  24654.  
  24655.                     // Set the Page & Column where table actually starts 
  24656.                     if ($i == 0 && $j == 0 && $level == 1) { 
  24657.                         if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page) % 2 == 0)) {    // EVEN 
  24658.                             $tablestartpage = 'EVEN'; 
  24659.                         } elseif (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page) % 2 == 1)) {    // ODD 
  24660.                             $tablestartpage = 'ODD'; 
  24661.                         } else { 
  24662.                             $tablestartpage = ''; 
  24663.                         } 
  24664.                         $tablestartpageno = $this->page; 
  24665.                         if ($this->ColActive) { 
  24666.                             $tablestartcolumn = $this->CurrCol; 
  24667.                         } // *COLUMNS* 
  24668.                     } 
  24669.  
  24670.  
  24671.                     //ALIGN 
  24672.                     $align = $cell['a']; 
  24673.  
  24674.  
  24675.                     /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  24676.                     // If outside columns, this is done in PaintDivBB 
  24677.                     if ($this->ColActive) { 
  24678.                         //OUTER FILL BGCOLOR of DIVS 
  24679.                         if ($this->blklvl > 0 && ($j == 0) && !$this->table_rotate && $level == 1) { 
  24680.                             $firstblockfill = $this->GetFirstBlockFill(); 
  24681.                             if ($firstblockfill && $this->blklvl >= $firstblockfill) { 
  24682.                                 $divh = $maxrowheight; 
  24683.                                 // Last row 
  24684.                                 if ((!isset($cell['rowspan']) && $i == $numrows - 1) || (isset($cell['rowspan']) && (($i == $numrows - 1 && $cell['rowspan'] < 2) || ($cell['rowspan'] > 1 && ($i + $cell['rowspan'] - 1) == $numrows - 1)))) { 
  24685.                                     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24686.                                         $adv = $table['margin']['B'] + $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V'] / 2; 
  24687.                                     } else { 
  24688.                                         $adv = $table['margin']['B'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] / 2; 
  24689.                                     } 
  24690.                                     $divh += $adv;  //last row: fill bottom half of bottom border (y advanced at end) 
  24691.                                 } 
  24692.  
  24693.                                 if (($this->y + $divh) > $outerfilled) { // if not already painted by previous rowspan 
  24694.                                     $bak_x = $this->x; 
  24695.                                     $bak_y = $this->y; 
  24696.                                     if ($outerfilled > $this->y) { 
  24697.                                         $divh = ($this->y + $divh) - $outerfilled; 
  24698.                                         $this->y = $outerfilled; 
  24699.                                     } 
  24700.  
  24701.                                     $this->DivLn($divh, -3, false); 
  24702.                                     $outerfilled = $this->y + $divh; 
  24703.                                     // Reset current block fill 
  24704.                                     $bcor = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray']; 
  24705.                                     if ($bcor) 
  24706.                                         $this->SetFColor($bcor); 
  24707.                                     $this->x = $bak_x; 
  24708.                                     $this->y = $bak_y; 
  24709.                                 } 
  24710.                             } 
  24711.                         } 
  24712.                     } 
  24713.  
  24714.  
  24715.                     //TABLE BACKGROUND FILL BGCOLOR - for cellSpacing 
  24716.                     if ($this->ColActive) { 
  24717.                         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24718.                             $fill = isset($table['bgcolor'][-1]) ? $table['bgcolor'][-1] : 0; 
  24719.                             if ($fill) { 
  24720.                                 $color = $this->ConvertColor($fill); 
  24721.                                 if ($color) { 
  24722.                                     $xadj = ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  24723.                                     $yadj = ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  24724.                                     $wadj = $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  24725.                                     $hadj = $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  24726.                                     if ($i == 0) {  // Top 
  24727.                                         $yadj += $table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w']; 
  24728.                                         $hadj += $table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w']; 
  24729.                                     } 
  24730.                                     if ($j == 0) {  // Left 
  24731.                                         $xadj += $table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w']; 
  24732.                                         $wadj += $table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w']; 
  24733.                                     } 
  24734.                                     if ($i == ($numrows - 1) || (isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i + $cell['rowspan']) == $numrows) || (!isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i + 1) == $numrows)) { // Bottom 
  24735.                                         $hadj += $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w']; 
  24736.                                     } 
  24737.                                     if ($j == ($numcols - 1) || (isset($cell['colspan']) && ($j + $cell['colspan']) == $numcols) || (!isset($cell['colspan']) && ($j + 1) == $numcols)) { // Right 
  24738.                                         $wadj += $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w']; 
  24739.                                     } 
  24740.                                     $this->SetFColor($color); 
  24741.                                     $this->Rect($x - $xadj, $y - $yadj, $w + $wadj, $h + $hadj, 'F'); 
  24742.                                 } 
  24743.                             } 
  24744.                         } 
  24745.                     } 
  24746.                     /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  24747.  
  24748.                     if ($table['empty_cells'] != 'hide' || !empty($cell['textbuffer']) || (isset($cell['nestedcontent']) && $cell['nestedcontent']) || !$table['borders_separate']) { 
  24749.                         $paintcell = true; 
  24750.                     } else { 
  24751.                         $paintcell = false; 
  24752.                     } 
  24753.  
  24754.                     //Set Borders 
  24755.                     $bord = 0; 
  24756.                     $bord_det = array(); 
  24757.  
  24758.                     if (!$this->simpleTables) { 
  24759.                         if ($this->packTableData) { 
  24760.                             $c = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cell['borderbin']); 
  24761.                             $bord = $c['border']; 
  24762.                             $bord_det = $c['border_details']; 
  24763.                         } else { 
  24764.                             $bord = $cell['border']; 
  24765.                             $bord_det = $cell['border_details']; 
  24766.                         } 
  24767.                     } elseif ($this->simpleTables) { 
  24768.                         $bord = $table['simple']['border']; 
  24769.                         $bord_det = $table['simple']['border_details']; 
  24770.                     } 
  24771.  
  24772.                     //TABLE ROW OR CELL FILL BGCOLOR 
  24773.                     $fill = 0; 
  24774.                     if (isset($cell['bgcolor']) && $cell['bgcolor'] && $cell['bgcolor'] != 'transparent') { 
  24775.                         $fill = $cell['bgcolor']; 
  24776.                         $leveladj = 6; 
  24777.                     } elseif (isset($table['bgcolor'][$i]) && $table['bgcolor'][$i] && $table['bgcolor'][$i] != 'transparent') { // Row color 
  24778.                         $fill = $table['bgcolor'][$i]; 
  24779.                         $leveladj = 3; 
  24780.                     } 
  24781.                     if ($fill && $paintcell) { 
  24782.                         $color = $this->ConvertColor($fill); 
  24783.                         if ($color) { 
  24784.                             if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24785.                                 if ($this->ColActive) { 
  24786.                                     $this->SetFColor($color); 
  24787.                                     $this->Rect($x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2), $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2), $w - $table['border_spacing_H'], $h - $table['border_spacing_V'], 'F'); 
  24788.                                 } else { 
  24789.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + $leveladj][] = array('gradient' => false, 'x' => ($x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2)), 'y' => ($y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2)), 'w' => ($w - $table['border_spacing_H']), 'h' => ($h - $table['border_spacing_V']), 'col' => $color); 
  24790.                                 } 
  24791.                             } else { 
  24792.                                 if ($this->ColActive) { 
  24793.                                     $this->SetFColor($color); 
  24794.                                     $this->Rect($x, $y, $w, $h, 'F'); 
  24795.                                 } else { 
  24796.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + $leveladj][] = array('gradient' => false, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'col' => $color); 
  24797.                                 } 
  24798.                             } 
  24799.                         } 
  24800.                     } 
  24801.  
  24802.                     /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  24803.                     if (isset($cell['gradient']) && $cell['gradient'] && $paintcell) { 
  24804.                         $g = $this->grad->parseBackgroundGradient($cell['gradient']); 
  24805.                         if ($g) { 
  24806.                             if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24807.                                 $px = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  24808.                                 $py = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  24809.                                 $pw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  24810.                                 $ph = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  24811.                             } else { 
  24812.                                 $px = $x; 
  24813.                                 $py = $y; 
  24814.                                 $pw = $w; 
  24815.                                 $ph = $h; 
  24816.                             } 
  24817.                             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  24818.                                 $this->grad->Gradient($px, $py, $pw, $ph, $g['type'], $g['stops'], $g['colorspace'], $g['coords'], $g['extend']); 
  24819.                             } else { 
  24820.                                 $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 7][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $px, 'y' => $py, 'w' => $pw, 'h' => $ph, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => ''); 
  24821.                             } 
  24822.                         } 
  24823.                     } 
  24824.  
  24825.                     if (isset($cell['background-image']) && $paintcell) { 
  24826.                         if (isset($cell['background-image']['gradient']) && $cell['background-image']['gradient'] && preg_match('/(-moz-)*(repeating-)*(linear|radial)-gradient/', $cell['background-image']['gradient'])) { 
  24827.                             $g = $this->grad->parseMozGradient($cell['background-image']['gradient']); 
  24828.                             if ($g) { 
  24829.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24830.                                     $px = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  24831.                                     $py = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  24832.                                     $pw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  24833.                                     $ph = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  24834.                                 } else { 
  24835.                                     $px = $x; 
  24836.                                     $py = $y; 
  24837.                                     $pw = $w; 
  24838.                                     $ph = $h; 
  24839.                                 } 
  24840.                                 if ($this->ColActive) { 
  24841.                                     $this->grad->Gradient($px, $py, $pw, $ph, $g['type'], $g['stops'], $g['colorspace'], $g['coords'], $g['extend']); 
  24842.                                 } else { 
  24843.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 7][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $px, 'y' => $py, 'w' => $pw, 'h' => $ph, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => ''); 
  24844.                                 } 
  24845.                             } 
  24846.                         } elseif (isset($cell['background-image']['image_id']) && $cell['background-image']['image_id']) { // Background pattern 
  24847.                             $n = count($this->patterns) + 1; 
  24848.                             if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  24849.                                 $px = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  24850.                                 $py = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  24851.                                 $pw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  24852.                                 $ph = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  24853.                             } else { 
  24854.                                 $px = $x; 
  24855.                                 $py = $y; 
  24856.                                 $pw = $w; 
  24857.                                 $ph = $h; 
  24858.                             } 
  24859.                             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  24860.                                 list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($cell['background-image']['orig_w'], $cell['background-image']['orig_h'], $pw, $ph, $cell['background-image']['resize'], $cell['background-image']['x_repeat'], $cell['background-image']['y_repeat']); 
  24861.                                 $this->patterns[$n] = array('x' => $px, 'y' => $py, 'w' => $pw, 'h' => $ph, 'pgh' => $this->h, 'image_id' => $cell['background-image']['image_id'], 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $cell['background-image']['x_pos'], 'y_pos' => $cell['background-image']['y_pos'], 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat); 
  24862.                                 if ($cell['background-image']['opacity'] > 0 && $cell['background-image']['opacity'] < 1) { 
  24863.                                     $opac = $this->SetAlpha($cell['background-image']['opacity'], 'Normal', true); 
  24864.                                 } else { 
  24865.                                     $opac = ''; 
  24866.                                 } 
  24867.                                 $this->_out(sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re f Q', $n, $opac, $px * _MPDFK, ($this->h - $py) * _MPDFK, $pw * _MPDFK, -$ph * _MPDFK)); 
  24868.                             } else { 
  24869.                                 $image_id = $cell['background-image']['image_id']; 
  24870.                                 $orig_w = $cell['background-image']['orig_w']; 
  24871.                                 $orig_h = $cell['background-image']['orig_h']; 
  24872.                                 $x_pos = $cell['background-image']['x_pos']; 
  24873.                                 $y_pos = $cell['background-image']['y_pos']; 
  24874.                                 $x_repeat = $cell['background-image']['x_repeat']; 
  24875.                                 $y_repeat = $cell['background-image']['y_repeat']; 
  24876.                                 $resize = $cell['background-image']['resize']; 
  24877.                                 $opacity = $cell['background-image']['opacity']; 
  24878.                                 $itype = $cell['background-image']['itype']; 
  24879.                                 $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 8][] = array('x' => $px, 'y' => $py, 'w' => $pw, 'h' => $ph, 'image_id' => $image_id, 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $x_pos, 'y_pos' => $y_pos, 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'clippath' => '', 'resize' => $resize, 'opacity' => $opacity, 'itype' => $itype); 
  24880.                             } 
  24881.                         } 
  24882.                     } 
  24883.                     /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  24884.  
  24885.                     if (isset($cell['colspan']) && $cell['colspan'] > 1) { 
  24886.                         $ccolsp = $cell['colspan']; 
  24887.                     } else { 
  24888.                         $ccolsp = 1; 
  24889.                     } 
  24890.                     if (isset($cell['rowspan']) && $cell['rowspan'] > 1) { 
  24891.                         $crowsp = $cell['rowspan']; 
  24892.                     } else { 
  24893.                         $crowsp = 1; 
  24894.                     } 
  24895.  
  24896.  
  24897.                     // but still need to do this for repeated headers... 
  24898.                     if (!$table['borders_separate'] && $this->tabletheadjustfinished && !$this->simpleTables) { 
  24899.                         if (isset($table['topntail']) && $table['topntail']) { 
  24900.                             $bord_det['T'] = $this->border_details($table['topntail']); 
  24901.                             $bord_det['T']['w'] /= $this->shrin_k; 
  24902.                             $this->setBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP); 
  24903.                         } 
  24904.                         if (isset($table['thead-underline']) && $table['thead-underline']) { 
  24905.                             $bord_det['T'] = $this->border_details($table['thead-underline']); 
  24906.                             $bord_det['T']['w'] /= $this->shrin_k; 
  24907.                             $this->setBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP); 
  24908.                         } 
  24909.                     } 
  24910.  
  24911.  
  24912.                     //Get info of first row ==>> table header 
  24913.                     //Use > 1 row if THEAD 
  24914.                     if (isset($table['is_thead'][$i]) && $table['is_thead'][$i] && $level == 1) { 
  24915.                         if ($j == 0) 
  24916.                             $tableheaderrowheight += $table['hr'][$i]; 
  24917.                         $tableheader[$i][0]['trbackground-images'] = (isset($table['trbackground-images'][$i]) ? $table['trbackground-images'][$i] : null); 
  24918.                         $tableheader[$i][0]['trgradients'] = (isset($table['trgradients'][$i]) ? $table['trgradients'][$i] : null); 
  24919.                         $tableheader[$i][0]['trbgcolor'] = (isset($table['bgcolor'][$i]) ? $table['bgcolor'][$i] : null); 
  24920.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['x'] = $x; 
  24921.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['y'] = $y; 
  24922.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['h'] = $h; 
  24923.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['w'] = $w; 
  24924.                         if (isset($cell['textbuffer'])) { 
  24925.                             $tableheader[$i][$j]['textbuffer'] = $cell['textbuffer']; 
  24926.                         } else { 
  24927.                             $tableheader[$i][$j]['textbuffer'] = ''; 
  24928.                         } 
  24929.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['a'] = $cell['a']; 
  24930.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['R'] = $cell['R']; 
  24931.  
  24932.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['va'] = $cell['va']; 
  24933.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['mih'] = $cell['mih']; 
  24934.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['gradient'] = (isset($cell['gradient']) ? $cell['gradient'] : null); // *BACKGROUNDS* 
  24935.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['background-image'] = (isset($cell['background-image']) ? $cell['background-image'] : null); // *BACKGROUNDS* 
  24936.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['rowspan'] = (isset($cell['rowspan']) ? $cell['rowspan'] : null); 
  24937.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['colspan'] = (isset($cell['colspan']) ? $cell['colspan'] : null); 
  24938.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['bgcolor'] = $cell['bgcolor']; 
  24939.  
  24940.                         if (!$this->simpleTables) { 
  24941.                             $tableheader[$i][$j]['border'] = $bord; 
  24942.                             $tableheader[$i][$j]['border_details'] = $bord_det; 
  24943.                         } elseif ($this->simpleTables) { 
  24944.                             $tableheader[$i][$j]['border'] = $table['simple']['border']; 
  24945.                             $tableheader[$i][$j]['border_details'] = $table['simple']['border_details']; 
  24946.                         } 
  24947.                         $tableheader[$i][$j]['padding'] = $cell['padding']; 
  24948.                         if (isset($cell['direction'])) 
  24949.                             $tableheader[$i][$j]['direction'] = $cell['direction']; 
  24950.                         if (isset($cell['cellLineHeight'])) 
  24951.                             $tableheader[$i][$j]['cellLineHeight'] = $cell['cellLineHeight']; 
  24952.                         if (isset($cell['cellLineStackingStrategy'])) 
  24953.                             $tableheader[$i][$j]['cellLineStackingStrategy'] = $cell['cellLineStackingStrategy']; 
  24954.                         if (isset($cell['cellLineStackingShift'])) 
  24955.                             $tableheader[$i][$j]['cellLineStackingShift'] = $cell['cellLineStackingShift']; 
  24956.                     } 
  24957.  
  24958.                     // CELL BORDER 
  24959.                     if ($bord) { 
  24960.                         if ($table['borders_separate'] && $paintcell) { 
  24961.                             $this->_tableRect($x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2) + ($bord_det['L']['w'] / 2), $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2) + ($bord_det['T']['w'] / 2), $w - $table['border_spacing_H'] - ($bord_det['L']['w'] / 2) - ($bord_det['R']['w'] / 2), $h - $table['border_spacing_V'] - ($bord_det['T']['w'] / 2) - ($bord_det['B']['w'] / 2), $bord, $bord_det, false, $table['borders_separate']); 
  24962.                         } elseif (!$table['borders_separate']) { 
  24963.                             $this->_tableRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $bord, $bord_det, true, $table['borders_separate']);  // true causes buffer 
  24964.                         } 
  24965.                     } 
  24966.  
  24967.                     //VERTICAL ALIGN 
  24968.                     if ($cell['R'] && INTVAL($cell['R']) > 0 && INTVAL($cell['R']) < 90 && isset($cell['va']) && $cell['va'] != 'B') { 
  24969.                         $cell['va'] = 'B'; 
  24970.                     } 
  24971.                     if (!isset($cell['va']) || $cell['va'] == 'M') 
  24972.                         $this->y += ($h - $cell['mih']) / 2; 
  24973.                     elseif (isset($cell['va']) && $cell['va'] == 'B') 
  24974.                         $this->y += $h - $cell['mih']; 
  24975.  
  24976.                     // NESTED CONTENT 
  24977.                     // TEXT (and nested tables) 
  24978.  
  24979.                     $this->divwidth = $w; 
  24980.                     if (!empty($cell['textbuffer'])) { 
  24981.                         $this->cellTextAlign = $align; 
  24982.                         $this->cellLineHeight = $cell['cellLineHeight']; 
  24983.                         $this->cellLineStackingStrategy = $cell['cellLineStackingStrategy']; 
  24984.                         $this->cellLineStackingShift = $cell['cellLineStackingShift']; 
  24985.                         if ($level == 1) { 
  24986.                             if (isset($table['is_tfoot'][$i]) && $table['is_tfoot'][$i]) { 
  24987.                                 if (preg_match('/{colsum([0-9]*)[_]*}/', $cell['textbuffer'][0][0], $m)) { 
  24988.                                     $rep = sprintf("%01." . intval($m[1]) . "f", $this->colsums[$j]); 
  24989.                                     $cell['textbuffer'][0][0] = preg_replace('/{colsum[0-9_]*}/', $rep, $cell['textbuffer'][0][0]); 
  24990.                                 } 
  24991.                             } elseif (!isset($table['is_thead'][$i])) { 
  24992.                                 if (isset($this->colsums[$j])) { 
  24993.                                     $this->colsums[$j] += floatval(preg_replace('/^[^0-9\.\, ]*/', '', $cell['textbuffer'][0][0])); 
  24994.                                 } else { 
  24995.                                     $this->colsums[$j] = floatval(preg_replace('/^[^0-9\.\, ]*/', '', $cell['textbuffer'][0][0])); 
  24996.                                 } 
  24997.                             } 
  24998.                         } 
  24999.                         $opy = $this->y; 
  25000.                         // mPDF ITERATION 
  25001.                         if ($this->iterationCounter) { 
  25002.                             foreach ($cell['textbuffer'] AS $k => $t) { 
  25003.                                 if (preg_match('/{iteration ([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)}/', $t[0], $m)) { 
  25004.                                     $vname = '__' . $m[1] . '_'; 
  25005.                                     if (!isset($this->$vname)) { 
  25006.                                         $this->$vname = 1; 
  25007.                                     } else { 
  25008.                                         $this->$vname++; 
  25009.                                     } 
  25010.                                     $cell['textbuffer'][$k][0] = preg_replace('/{iteration ' . $m[1] . '}/', $this->$vname, $cell['textbuffer'][$k][0]); 
  25011.                                 } 
  25012.                             } 
  25013.                         } 
  25014.  
  25015.  
  25016.                         if ($cell['R']) { 
  25017.                             $cellPtSize = $cell['textbuffer'][0][11] / $this->shrin_k; 
  25018.                             if (!$cellPtSize) { 
  25019.                                 $cellPtSize = $this->default_font_size; 
  25020.                             } 
  25021.                             $cellFontHeight = ($cellPtSize / _MPDFK); 
  25022.                             $opx = $this->x; 
  25023.                             $angle = INTVAL($cell['R']); 
  25024.                             // Only allow 45 to 89 degrees (when bottom-aligned) or exactly 90 or -90 
  25025.                             if ($angle > 90) { 
  25026.                                 $angle = 90; 
  25027.                             } elseif ($angle > 0 && $angle < 45) { 
  25028.                                 $angle = 45; 
  25029.                             } elseif ($angle < 0) { 
  25030.                                 $angle = -90; 
  25031.                             } 
  25032.                             $offset = ((sin(deg2rad($angle))) * 0.37 * $cellFontHeight); 
  25033.                             if (isset($cell['a']) && $cell['a'] == 'R') { 
  25034.                                 $this->x += ($w) + ($offset) - ($cellFontHeight / 3) - ($cell['padding']['R'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2)); 
  25035.                             } elseif (!isset($cell['a']) || $cell['a'] == 'C') { 
  25036.                                 $this->x += ($w / 2) + ($offset); 
  25037.                             } else { 
  25038.                                 $this->x += ($offset) + ($cellFontHeight / 3) + ($cell['padding']['L'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2)); 
  25039.                             } 
  25040.                             $str = ''; 
  25041.                             foreach ($cell['textbuffer'] AS $t) { 
  25042.                                 $str .= $t[0] . ' '; 
  25043.                             } 
  25044.                             $str = rtrim($str); 
  25045.                             if (!isset($cell['va']) || $cell['va'] == 'M') { 
  25046.                                 $this->y -= ($h - $cell['mih']) / 2; //Undo what was added earlier VERTICAL ALIGN 
  25047.                                 if ($angle > 0) { 
  25048.                                     $this->y += (($h - $cell['mih']) / 2) + $cell['padding']['T'] + ($cell['mih'] - ($cell['padding']['T'] + $cell['padding']['B'])); 
  25049.                                 } elseif ($angle < 0) { 
  25050.                                     $this->y += (($h - $cell['mih']) / 2) + ($cell['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2)); 
  25051.                                 } 
  25052.                             } elseif (isset($cell['va']) && $cell['va'] == 'B') { 
  25053.                                 $this->y -= $h - $cell['mih']; //Undo what was added earlier VERTICAL ALIGN 
  25054.                                 if ($angle > 0) { 
  25055.                                     $this->y += $h - ($cell['padding']['B'] + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2)); 
  25056.                                 } elseif ($angle < 0) { 
  25057.                                     $this->y += $h - $cell['mih'] + ($cell['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2)); 
  25058.                                 } 
  25059.                             } elseif (isset($cell['va']) && $cell['va'] == 'T') { 
  25060.                                 if ($angle > 0) { 
  25061.                                     $this->y += $cell['mih'] - ($cell['padding']['B'] + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2)); 
  25062.                                 } elseif ($angle < 0) { 
  25063.                                     $this->y += ($cell['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2)); 
  25064.                                 } 
  25065.                             } 
  25066.                             $this->Rotate($angle, $this->x, $this->y); 
  25067.                             $s_fs = $this->FontSizePt; 
  25068.                             $s_f = $this->FontFamily; 
  25069.                             $s_st = $this->FontStyle; 
  25070.                             if (!empty($cell['textbuffer'][0][3])) { //Font Color 
  25071.                                 $cor = $cell['textbuffer'][0][3]; 
  25072.                                 $this->SetTColor($cor); 
  25073.                             } 
  25074.                             $this->SetFont($cell['textbuffer'][0][4], $cell['textbuffer'][0][2], $cellPtSize, true, true); 
  25075.  
  25076.                             $this->magic_reverse_dir($str, $this->directionality, $cell['textbuffer'][0][18]); 
  25077.                             $this->Text($this->x, $this->y, $str, $cell['textbuffer'][0][18], $cell['textbuffer'][0][8]); // textvar 
  25078.                             $this->Rotate(0); 
  25079.                             $this->SetFont($s_f, $s_st, $s_fs, true, true); 
  25080.                             $this->SetTColor(0); 
  25081.                             $this->x = $opx; 
  25082.                         } else { 
  25083.  
  25084.                             if (!$this->simpleTables) { 
  25085.                                 if ($bord_det) { 
  25086.                                     $btlw = $bord_det['L']['w']; 
  25087.                                     $btrw = $bord_det['R']['w']; 
  25088.                                     $bttw = $bord_det['T']['w']; 
  25089.                                 } else { 
  25090.                                     $btlw = 0; 
  25091.                                     $btrw = 0; 
  25092.                                     $bttw = 0; 
  25093.                                 } 
  25094.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  25095.                                     $xadj = $btlw + $cell['padding']['L'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  25096.                                     $wadj = $btlw + $btrw + $cell['padding']['L'] + $cell['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  25097.                                     $yadj = $bttw + $cell['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  25098.                                 } else { 
  25099.                                     $xadj = $btlw / 2 + $cell['padding']['L']; 
  25100.                                     $wadj = ($btlw + $btrw) / 2 + $cell['padding']['L'] + $cell['padding']['R']; 
  25101.                                     $yadj = $bttw / 2 + $cell['padding']['T']; 
  25102.                                 } 
  25103.                             } elseif ($this->simpleTables) { 
  25104.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { // NB twice border width 
  25105.                                     $xadj = $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] + $cell['padding']['L'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  25106.                                     $wadj = $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] + $cell['padding']['L'] + $cell['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  25107.                                     $yadj = $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w'] + $cell['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  25108.                                 } else { 
  25109.                                     $xadj = $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] / 2 + $cell['padding']['L']; 
  25110.                                     $wadj = ($table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w']) / 2 + $cell['padding']['L'] + $cell['padding']['R']; 
  25111.                                     $yadj = $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w'] / 2 + $cell['padding']['T']; 
  25112.                                 } 
  25113.                             } 
  25114.                             $this->decimal_offset = 0; 
  25115.                             if (substr($cell['a'], 0, 1) == 'D') { 
  25116.                                 if (isset($cell['colspan']) && $cell['colspan'] > 1) { 
  25117.                                     $this->cellTextAlign = $c['a'] = substr($cell['a'], 2, 1); 
  25118.                                 } else { 
  25119.                                     $smax = $table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs0']; 
  25120.                                     $d_content = $table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs0'] + $table['decimal_align'][$j]['maxs1']; 
  25121.                                     $this->decimal_offset = $smax; 
  25122.                                     $extra = ($w - $d_content - $wadj); 
  25123.                                     if ($extra > 0) { 
  25124.                                         if (substr($cell['a'], 2, 1) == 'R') { 
  25125.                                             $this->decimal_offset += $extra; 
  25126.                                         } elseif (substr($cell['a'], 2, 1) == 'C') { 
  25127.                                             $this->decimal_offset += ($extra) / 2; 
  25128.                                         } 
  25129.                                     } 
  25130.                                 } 
  25131.                             } 
  25132.                             $this->divwidth = $w - $wadj; 
  25133.                             if ($this->divwidth == 0) { 
  25134.                                 $this->divwidth = 0.0001; 
  25135.                             } 
  25136.                             $this->x += $xadj; 
  25137.                             $this->y += $yadj; 
  25138.                             $this->printbuffer($cell['textbuffer'], '', true, false, $cell['direction']); 
  25139.                         } 
  25140.                         $this->y = $opy; 
  25141.                     } 
  25142.  
  25143.                     /** -- BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  25144.                     if (!$this->ColActive) { 
  25145.                         if (isset($table['trgradients'][$i]) && ($j == 0 || $table['borders_separate'])) { 
  25146.                             $g = $this->grad->parseBackgroundGradient($table['trgradients'][$i]); 
  25147.                             if ($g) { 
  25148.                                 $gx = $x0; 
  25149.                                 $gy = $y; 
  25150.                                 $gh = $h; 
  25151.                                 $gw = $table['w'] - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2) - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] / 2) - $table['margin']['L'] - $table['margin']['R']; 
  25152.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  25153.                                     $gw -= ($table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_H']); 
  25154.                                     $clx = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  25155.                                     $cly = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  25156.                                     $clw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  25157.                                     $clh = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  25158.                                     // Set clipping path 
  25159.                                     $s = $this->_setClippingPath($clx, $cly, $clw, $clh); // mPDF 6 
  25160.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 4][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $gx + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2), 'y' => $gy + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2), 'w' => $gw - $table['border_spacing_V'], 'h' => $gh - $table['border_spacing_H'], 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => $s); 
  25161.                                 } else { 
  25162.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 4][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $gx, 'y' => $gy, 'w' => $gw, 'h' => $gh, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => ''); 
  25163.                                 } 
  25164.                             } 
  25165.                         } 
  25166.                         if (isset($table['trbackground-images'][$i]) && ($j == 0 || $table['borders_separate'])) { 
  25167.                             if (isset($table['trbackground-images'][$i]['gradient']) && preg_match('/(-moz-)*(repeating-)*(linear|radial)-gradient/', $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['gradient'])) { 
  25168.                                 $g = $this->grad->parseMozGradient($table['trbackground-images'][$i]['gradient']); 
  25169.                                 if ($g) { 
  25170.                                     $gx = $x0; 
  25171.                                     $gy = $y; 
  25172.                                     $gh = $h; 
  25173.                                     $gw = $table['w'] - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2) - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] / 2) - $table['margin']['L'] - $table['margin']['R']; 
  25174.                                     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  25175.                                         $gw -= ($table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_H']); 
  25176.                                         $clx = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  25177.                                         $cly = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  25178.                                         $clw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  25179.                                         $clh = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  25180.                                         // Set clipping path 
  25181.                                         $s = $this->_setClippingPath($clx, $cly, $clw, $clh); // mPDF 6 
  25182.                                         $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 4][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $gx + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2), 'y' => $gy + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2), 'w' => $gw - $table['border_spacing_V'], 'h' => $gh - $table['border_spacing_H'], 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => $s); 
  25183.                                     } else { 
  25184.                                         $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 4][] = array('gradient' => true, 'x' => $gx, 'y' => $gy, 'w' => $gw, 'h' => $gh, 'gradtype' => $g['type'], 'stops' => $g['stops'], 'colorspace' => $g['colorspace'], 'coords' => $g['coords'], 'extend' => $g['extend'], 'clippath' => ''); 
  25185.                                     } 
  25186.                                 } 
  25187.                             } else { 
  25188.                                 $image_id = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['image_id']; 
  25189.                                 $orig_w = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['orig_w']; 
  25190.                                 $orig_h = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['orig_h']; 
  25191.                                 $x_pos = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['x_pos']; 
  25192.                                 $y_pos = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['y_pos']; 
  25193.                                 $x_repeat = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['x_repeat']; 
  25194.                                 $y_repeat = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['y_repeat']; 
  25195.                                 $resize = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['resize']; 
  25196.                                 $opacity = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['opacity']; 
  25197.                                 $itype = $table['trbackground-images'][$i]['itype']; 
  25198.                                 $clippath = ''; 
  25199.                                 $gx = $x0; 
  25200.                                 $gy = $y; 
  25201.                                 $gh = $h; 
  25202.                                 $gw = $table['w'] - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] / 2) - ($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] / 2) - $table['margin']['L'] - $table['margin']['R']; 
  25203.                                 if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
  25204.                                     $gw -= ($table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_H']); 
  25205.                                     $clx = $x + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  25206.                                     $cly = $y + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  25207.                                     $clw = $w - $table['border_spacing_H']; 
  25208.                                     $clh = $h - $table['border_spacing_V']; 
  25209.                                     // Set clipping path 
  25210.                                     $s = $this->_setClippingPath($clx, $cly, $clw, $clh); // mPDF 6 
  25211.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 5][] = array('x' => $gx + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2), 'y' => $gy + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2), 'w' => $gw - $table['border_spacing_V'], 'h' => $gh - $table['border_spacing_H'], 'image_id' => $image_id, 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $x_pos, 'y_pos' => $y_pos, 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'clippath' => $s, 'resize' => $resize, 'opacity' => $opacity, 'itype' => $itype); 
  25212.                                 } else { 
  25213.                                     $this->tableBackgrounds[$level * 9 + 5][] = array('x' => $gx, 'y' => $gy, 'w' => $gw, 'h' => $gh, 'image_id' => $image_id, 'orig_w' => $orig_w, 'orig_h' => $orig_h, 'x_pos' => $x_pos, 'y_pos' => $y_pos, 'x_repeat' => $x_repeat, 'y_repeat' => $y_repeat, 'clippath' => '', 'resize' => $resize, 'opacity' => $opacity, 'itype' => $itype); 
  25214.                                 } 
  25215.                             } 
  25216.                         } 
  25217.                     } 
  25218.  
  25219.                     /** -- END BACKGROUNDS -- */ 
  25220.  
  25221.                     // TABLE BORDER - if separate 
  25222.                     if (($table['borders_separate'] || ($this->simpleTables && !$table['simple']['border'])) && $table['border']) { 
  25223.                         $halfspaceL = $table['padding']['L'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  25224.                         $halfspaceR = $table['padding']['R'] + ($table['border_spacing_H'] / 2); 
  25225.                         $halfspaceT = $table['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  25226.                         $halfspaceB = $table['padding']['B'] + ($table['border_spacing_V'] / 2); 
  25227.                         $tbx = $x; 
  25228.                         $tby = $y; 
  25229.                         $tbw = $w; 
  25230.                         $tbh = $h; 
  25231.                         $tab_bord = 0; 
  25232.  
  25233.                         $corner = ''; 
  25234.                         if ($i == 0) {  // Top 
  25235.                             $tby -= $halfspaceT + ($table['border_details']['T']['w'] / 2); 
  25236.                             $tbh += $halfspaceT + ($table['border_details']['T']['w'] / 2); 
  25237.                             $this->setBorder($tab_bord, _BORDER_TOP); 
  25238.                             $corner .= 'T'; 
  25239.                         } 
  25240.                         if ($i == ($numrows - 1) || (isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i + $cell['rowspan']) == $numrows)) { // Bottom 
  25241.                             $tbh += $halfspaceB + ($table['border_details']['B']['w'] / 2); 
  25242.                             $this->setBorder($tab_bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
  25243.                             $corner .= 'B'; 
  25244.                         } 
  25245.                         if ($j == 0) {  // Left 
  25246.                             $tbx -= $halfspaceL + ($table['border_details']['L']['w'] / 2); 
  25247.                             $tbw += $halfspaceL + ($table['border_details']['L']['w'] / 2); 
  25248.                             $this->setBorder($tab_bord, _BORDER_LEFT); 
  25249.                             $corner .= 'L'; 
  25250.                         } 
  25251.                         if ($j == ($numcols - 1) || (isset($cell['colspan']) && ($j + $cell['colspan']) == $numcols)) { // Right 
  25252.                             $tbw += $halfspaceR + ($table['border_details']['R']['w'] / 2); 
  25253.                             $this->setBorder($tab_bord, _BORDER_RIGHT); 
  25254.                             $corner .= 'R'; 
  25255.                         } 
  25256.                         $this->_tableRect($tbx, $tby, $tbw, $tbh, $tab_bord, $table['border_details'], false, $table['borders_separate'], 'table', $corner, $table['border_spacing_V'], $table['border_spacing_H']); 
  25257.                     } 
  25258.  
  25259.                     unset($cell); 
  25260.                     //Reset values 
  25261.                     $this->Reset(); 
  25262.                 }//end of (if isset(cells)...) 
  25263.             }// end of columns 
  25264.  
  25265.             $newpagestarted = false; 
  25266.             $this->tabletheadjustfinished = false; 
  25267.  
  25268.             /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  25269.             if ($this->ColActive) {
