  26706.                 } 
  26707.                 if ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] == ($end_page + 1)) { 
  26708.                     $ep_present = true; 
  26709.                     if ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress'] != 'on' && $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress'] != 1) { 
  26710.                         $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress'] = 'off'; 
  26711.                     } 
  26712.                 } 
  26713.             } 
  26714.  
  26715.             if (!$tp_present) { 
  26716.                 list($tp_type, $tp_suppress, $tp_reset) = $this->docPageSettings($target_page); 
  26717.             } 
  26718.             if (!$sp_present) { 
  26719.                 list($sp_type, $sp_suppress, $sp_reset) = $this->docPageSettings($start_page); 
  26720.             } 
  26721.             if (!$ep_present) { 
  26722.                 list($ep_type, $ep_suppress, $ep_reset) = $this->docPageSettings($start_page - 1); 
  26723.             } 
  26724.         } 
  26725.  
  26726.         $last = array(); 
  26727.         //store pages 
  26728.         for ($i = $start_page; $i <= $end_page; $i++) 
  26729.             $last[] = $this->pages[$i]; 
  26730.         //move pages 
  26731.         for ($i = $start_page - 1; $i >= ($target_page); $i--) { 
  26732.             $this->pages[$i + $n_toc] = $this->pages[$i]; 
  26733.         } 
  26734.         //Put toc pages at insert point 
  26735.         for ($i = 0; $i < $n_toc; $i++) { 
  26736.             $this->pages[$target_page + $i] = $last[$i]; 
  26737.         } 
  26738.  
  26739.         /** -- BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  26740.         // Update Bookmarks 
  26741.         foreach ($this->BMoutlines as $i => $o) { 
  26742.             if ($o['p'] >= $target_page) { 
  26743.                 $this->BMoutlines[$i]['p'] += $n_toc; 
  26744.             } 
  26745.         } 
  26746.         /** -- END BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  26747.  
  26748.         // Update Page Links 
  26749.         if (count($this->PageLinks)) { 
  26750.             $newarr = array(); 
  26751.             foreach ($this->PageLinks as $i => $o) { 
  26752.                 foreach ($this->PageLinks[$i] as $key => $pl) { 
  26753.                     if (strpos($pl[4], '@') === 0) { 
  26754.                         $p = substr($pl[4], 1); 
  26755.                         if ($p >= $start_page && $p <= $end_page) { 
  26756.                             $this->PageLinks[$i][$key][4] = '@' . ($p + ($target_page - $start_page)); 
  26757.                         } elseif ($p >= $target_page && $p < $start_page) { 
  26758.                             $this->PageLinks[$i][$key][4] = '@' . ($p + $n_toc); 
  26759.                         } 
  26760.                     } 
  26761.                 } 
  26762.                 if ($i >= $start_page && $i <= $end_page) { 
  26763.                     $newarr[($i + ($target_page - $start_page))] = $this->PageLinks[$i]; 
  26764.                 } elseif ($i >= $target_page && $i < $start_page) { 
  26765.                     $newarr[($i + $n_toc)] = $this->PageLinks[$i]; 
  26766.                 } else { 
  26767.                     $newarr[$i] = $this->PageLinks[$i]; 
  26768.                 } 
  26769.             } 
  26770.             $this->PageLinks = $newarr; 
  26771.         } 
  26772.  
  26773.         // OrientationChanges 
  26774.         if (count($this->OrientationChanges)) { 
  26775.             $newarr = array(); 
  26776.             foreach ($this->OrientationChanges AS $p => $v) { 
  26777.                 if ($p >= $start_page && $p <= $end_page) { 
  26778.                     $newarr[($p + ($target_page - $start_page))] = $this->OrientationChanges[$p]; 
  26779.                 } elseif ($p >= $target_page && $p < $start_page) { 
  26780.                     $newarr[$p + $n_toc] = $this->OrientationChanges[$p]; 
  26781.                 } else { 
  26782.                     $newarr[$p] = $this->OrientationChanges[$p]; 
  26783.                 } 
  26784.             } 
  26785.             ksort($newarr); 
  26786.             $this->OrientationChanges = $newarr; 
  26787.         } 
  26788.  
  26789.         // Page Dimensions 
  26790.         if (count($this->pageDim)) { 
  26791.             $newarr = array(); 
  26792.             foreach ($this->pageDim AS $p => $v) { 
  26793.                 if ($p >= $start_page && $p <= $end_page) { 
  26794.                     $newarr[($p + ($target_page - $start_page))] = $this->pageDim[$p]; 
  26795.                 } elseif ($p >= $target_page && $p < $start_page) { 
  26796.                     $newarr[$p + $n_toc] = $this->pageDim[$p]; 
  26797.                 } else { 
  26798.                     $newarr[$p] = $this->pageDim[$p]; 
  26799.                 } 
  26800.             } 
  26801.             ksort($newarr); 
  26802.             $this->pageDim = $newarr; 
  26803.         } 
  26804.  
  26805.         // HTML Headers & Footers 
  26806.         if (count($this->saveHTMLHeader)) { 
  26807.             $newarr = array(); 
  26808.             foreach ($this->saveHTMLHeader AS $p => $v) { 
  26809.                 if ($p >= $start_page && $p <= $end_page) { 
  26810.                     $newarr[($p + ($target_page - $start_page))] = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$p]; 
  26811.                 } elseif ($p >= $target_page && $p < $start_page) { 
  26812.                     $newarr[$p + $n_toc] = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$p]; 
  26813.                 } else { 
  26814.                     $newarr[$p] = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$p]; 
  26815.                 } 
  26816.             } 
  26817.             ksort($newarr); 
  26818.             $this->saveHTMLHeader = $newarr; 
  26819.         } 
  26820.         if (count($this->saveHTMLFooter)) { 
  26821.             $newarr = array(); 
  26822.             foreach ($this->saveHTMLFooter AS $p => $v) { 
  26823.                 if ($p >= $start_page && $p <= $end_page) { 
  26824.                     $newarr[($p + ($target_page - $start_page))] = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$p]; 
  26825.                 } elseif ($p >= $target_page && $p < $start_page) { 
  26826.                     $newarr[$p + $n_toc] = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$p]; 
  26827.                 } else { 
  26828.                     $newarr[$p] = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$p]; 
  26829.                 } 
  26830.             } 
  26831.             ksort($newarr); 
  26832.             $this->saveHTMLFooter = $newarr; 
  26833.         } 
  26834.  
  26835.         // Update Internal Links 
  26836.         if (count($this->internallink)) { 
  26837.             foreach ($this->internallink as $key => $o) { 
  26838.                 if ($o['PAGE'] >= $start_page && $o['PAGE'] <= $end_page) { 
  26839.                     $this->internallink[$key]['PAGE'] += ($target_page - $start_page); 
  26840.                 } elseif ($o['PAGE'] >= $target_page && $o['PAGE'] < $start_page) { 
  26841.                     $this->internallink[$key]['PAGE'] += $n_toc; 
  26842.                 } 
  26843.             } 
  26844.         } 
  26845.  
  26846.         // Update Links 
  26847.         if (count($this->links)) { 
  26848.             foreach ($this->links as $key => $o) { 
  26849.                 if ($o[0] >= $start_page && $o[0] <= $end_page) { 
  26850.                     $this->links[$key][0] += ($target_page - $start_page); 
  26851.                 } 
  26852.                 if ($o[0] >= $target_page && $o[0] < $start_page) { 
  26853.                     $this->links[$key][0] += $n_toc; 
  26854.                 } 
  26855.             } 
  26856.         } 
  26857.  
  26858.         // Update Form fields 
  26859.         if (count($this->mpdfform->forms)) { 
  26860.             foreach ($this->mpdfform->forms as $key => $f) { 
  26861.                 if ($f['page'] >= $start_page && $f['page'] <= $end_page) { 
  26862.                     $this->mpdfform->forms[$key]['page'] += ($target_page - $start_page); 
  26863.                 } 
  26864.                 if ($f['page'] >= $target_page && $f['page'] < $start_page) { 
  26865.                     $this->mpdfform->forms[$key]['page'] += $n_toc; 
  26866.                 } 
  26867.             } 
  26868.         } 
  26869.  
  26870.         /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  26871.         // Update Annotations 
  26872.         if (count($this->PageAnnots)) { 
  26873.             $newarr = array(); 
  26874.             foreach ($this->PageAnnots as $p => $anno) { 
  26875.                 if ($p >= $start_page && $p <= $end_page) { 
  26876.                     $np = $p + ($target_page - $start_page); 
  26877.                     foreach ($anno as $o) { 
  26878.                         $newarr[$np][] = $o; 
  26879.                     } 
  26880.                 } elseif ($p >= $target_page && $p < $start_page) { 
  26881.                     $np = $p + $n_toc; 
  26882.                     foreach ($anno as $o) { 
  26883.                         $newarr[$np][] = $o; 
  26884.                     } 
  26885.                 } else { 
  26886.                     $newarr[$p] = $this->PageAnnots[$p]; 
  26887.                 } 
  26888.             } 
  26889.             $this->PageAnnots = $newarr; 
  26890.             unset($newarr); 
  26891.         } 
  26892.         /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  26893.  
  26894.         // Update PageNumSubstitutions 
  26895.         if (count($this->PageNumSubstitutions)) { 
  26896.             $newarr = array(); 
  26897.             foreach ($this->PageNumSubstitutions AS $k => $v) { 
  26898.                 if ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] >= $start_page && $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] <= $end_page) { 
  26899.                     $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] += ($target_page - $start_page); 
  26900.                     $newarr[$this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']] = $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]; 
  26901.                 } elseif ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] >= $target_page && $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] < $start_page) { 
  26902.                     $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] += $n_toc; 
  26903.                     $newarr[$this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']] = $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]; 
  26904.                 } else { 
  26905.                     $newarr[$this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']] = $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]; 
  26906.                 } 
  26907.             } 
  26908.  
  26909.             if (!$sp_present) { 
  26910.                 $newarr[$target_page] = array('from' => $target_page, 'suppress' => $sp_suppress, 'reset' => $sp_reset, 'type' => $sp_type); 
  26911.             } 
  26912.             if (!$tp_present) { 
  26913.                 $newarr[($target_page + $n_toc)] = array('from' => ($target_page + $n_toc), 'suppress' => $tp_suppress, 'reset' => $tp_reset, 'type' => $tp_type); 
  26914.             } 
  26915.             if (!$ep_present && $end_page > count($this->pages)) { 
  26916.                 $newarr[($end_page + 1)] = array('from' => ($end_page + 1), 'suppress' => $ep_suppress, 'reset' => $ep_reset, 'type' => $ep_type); 
  26917.             } 
  26918.             ksort($newarr); 
  26919.             $this->PageNumSubstitutions = array(); 
  26920.             foreach ($newarr as $v) { 
  26921.                 $this->PageNumSubstitutions[] = $v; 
  26922.             } 
  26923.         } 
  26924.     } 
  26925.  
  26926.     //====================================================== 
  26927.     function DeletePages($start_page, $end_page = -1) 
  26928.     { 
  26929.         // move a page/pages EARLIER in the document 
  26930.         if ($end_page < 1) { 
  26931.             $end_page = $start_page; 
  26932.         } 
  26933.         $n_tod = $end_page - $start_page + 1; 
  26934.         $last_page = count($this->pages); 
  26935.         $n_atend = $last_page - $end_page + 1; 
  26936.  
  26937.         //move pages 
  26938.         for ($i = 0; $i < $n_atend; $i++) { 
  26939.             $this->pages[$start_page + $i] = $this->pages[$end_page + 1 + $i]; 
  26940.         } 
  26941.         //delete pages 
  26942.         for ($i = 0; $i < $n_tod; $i++) 
  26943.             unset($this->pages[$last_page - $i]); 
  26944.  
  26945.  
  26946.         /** -- BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  26947.         // Update Bookmarks 
  26948.         foreach ($this->BMoutlines as $i => $o) { 
  26949.             if ($o['p'] >= $end_page) { 
  26950.                 $this->BMoutlines[$i]['p'] -= $n_tod; 
  26951.             } elseif ($p < $start_page) { 
  26952.                 unset($this->BMoutlines[$i]); 
  26953.             } 
  26954.         } 
  26955.         /** -- END BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  26956.  
  26957.         // Update Page Links 
  26958.         if (count($this->PageLinks)) { 
  26959.             $newarr = array(); 
  26960.             foreach ($this->PageLinks as $i => $o) { 
  26961.                 foreach ($this->PageLinks[$i] as $key => $pl) { 
  26962.                     if (strpos($pl[4], '@') === 0) { 
  26963.                         $p = substr($pl[4], 1); 
  26964.                         if ($p > $end_page) { 
  26965.                             $this->PageLinks[$i][$key][4] = '@' . ($p - $n_tod); 
  26966.                         } elseif ($p < $start_page) { 
  26967.                             unset($this->PageLinks[$i][$key]); 
  26968.                         } 
  26969.                     } 
  26970.                 } 
  26971.                 if ($i > $end_page) { 
  26972.                     $newarr[($i - $n_tod)] = $this->PageLinks[$i]; 
  26973.                 } elseif ($p < $start_page) { 
  26974.                     $newarr[$i] = $this->PageLinks[$i]; 
  26975.                 } 
  26976.             } 
  26977.             $this->PageLinks = $newarr; 
  26978.         } 
  26979.  
  26980.         // OrientationChanges 
  26981.         if (count($this->OrientationChanges)) { 
  26982.             $newarr = array(); 
  26983.             foreach ($this->OrientationChanges AS $p => $v) { 
  26984.                 if ($p > $end_page) { 
  26985.                     $newarr[($p - $t_tod)] = $this->OrientationChanges[$p]; 
  26986.                 } elseif ($p < $start_page) { 
  26987.                     $newarr[$p] = $this->OrientationChanges[$p]; 
  26988.                 } 
  26989.             } 
  26990.             ksort($newarr); 
  26991.             $this->OrientationChanges = $newarr; 
  26992.         } 
  26993.  
  26994.         // Page Dimensions 
  26995.         if (count($this->pageDim)) { 
  26996.             $newarr = array(); 
  26997.             foreach ($this->pageDim AS $p => $v) { 
  26998.                 if ($p > $end_page) { 
  26999.                     $newarr[($p - $n_tod)] = $this->pageDim[$p]; 
  27000.                 } elseif ($p < $start_page) { 
  27001.                     $newarr[$p] = $this->pageDim[$p]; 
  27002.                 } 
  27003.             } 
  27004.             ksort($newarr); 
  27005.             $this->pageDim = $newarr; 
  27006.         } 
  27007.  
  27008.         // HTML Headers & Footers 
  27009.         if (count($this->saveHTMLHeader)) { 
  27010.             foreach ($this->saveHTMLHeader AS $p => $v) { 
  27011.                 if ($p > $end_page) { 
  27012.                     $newarr[($p - $n_tod)] = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$p]; 
  27013.                 } // mPDF 5.7.3 
  27014.                 elseif ($p < $start_page) { 
  27015.                     $newarr[$p] = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$p]; 
  27016.                 } 
  27017.             } 
  27018.             ksort($newarr); 
  27019.             $this->saveHTMLHeader = $newarr; 
  27020.         } 
  27021.         if (count($this->saveHTMLFooter)) { 
  27022.             $newarr = array(); 
  27023.             foreach ($this->saveHTMLFooter AS $p => $v) { 
  27024.                 if ($p > $end_page) { 
  27025.                     $newarr[($p - $n_tod)] = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$p]; 
  27026.                 } elseif ($p < $start_page) { 
  27027.                     $newarr[$p] = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$p]; 
  27028.                 } 
  27029.             } 
  27030.             ksort($newarr); 
  27031.             $this->saveHTMLFooter = $newarr; 
  27032.         } 
  27033.  
  27034.         // Update Internal Links 
  27035.         foreach ($this->internallink as $key => $o) { 
  27036.             if ($o['PAGE'] > $end_page) { 
  27037.                 $this->internallink[$key]['PAGE'] -= $n_tod; 
  27038.             } elseif ($o['PAGE'] < $start_page) { 
  27039.                 unset($this->internallink[$key]); 
  27040.             } 
  27041.         } 
  27042.  
  27043.         // Update Links 
  27044.         foreach ($this->links as $key => $o) { 
  27045.             if ($o[0] > $end_page) { 
  27046.                 $this->links[$key][0] -= $n_tod; 
  27047.             } elseif ($o[0] < $start_page) { 
  27048.                 unset($this->links[$key]); 
  27049.             } 
  27050.         } 
  27051.  
  27052.         // Update Form fields 
  27053.         foreach ($this->mpdfform->forms as $key => $f) { 
  27054.             if ($f['page'] > $end_page) { 
  27055.                 $this->mpdfform->forms[$key]['page'] -= $n_tod; 
  27056.             } elseif ($f['page'] < $start_page) { 
  27057.                 unset($this->mpdfform->forms[$key]); 
  27058.             } 
  27059.         } 
  27060.  
  27061.         /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  27062.         // Update Annotations 
  27063.         if (count($this->PageAnnots)) { 
  27064.             $newarr = array(); 
  27065.             foreach ($this->PageAnnots as $p => $anno) { 
  27066.                 if ($p > $end_page) { 
  27067.                     foreach ($anno as $o) { 
  27068.                         $newarr[($p - $n_tod)][] = $o; 
  27069.                     } 
  27070.                 } elseif ($p < $start_page) { 
  27071.                     $newarr[$p] = $this->PageAnnots[$p]; 
  27072.                 } 
  27073.             } 
  27074.             ksort($newarr); 
  27075.             $this->PageAnnots = $newarr; 
  27076.         } 
  27077.         /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  27078.  
  27079.         // Update PageNumSubstitutions 
  27080.         foreach ($this->PageNumSubstitutions AS $k => $v) { 
  27081.             if ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] > $end_page) { 
  27082.                 $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] -= $n_tod; 
  27083.             } elseif ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] < $start_page) { 
  27084.                 unset($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]); 
  27085.             } 
  27086.         } 
  27087.  
  27088.         unset($newarr); 
  27089.         $this->page = count($this->pages); 
  27090.     } 
  27091.  
  27092.     //====================================================== 
  27093.         /** -- INDEX -- */ 
  27094.     // FROM class PDF_Ref == INDEX 
  27095.  
  27096.     function IndexEntry($txt, $xref = '') 
  27097.     { 
  27098.         if ($xref) { 
  27099.             $this->IndexEntrySee($txt, $xref); 
  27100.             return; 
  27101.         } 
  27102.  
  27103.         //Search the reference (AND Ref/PageNo) in the array 
  27104.         $Present = false; 
  27105.         if ($this->keep_block_together) { 
  27106.             // do nothing 
  27107.         } 
  27108.         /** -- TABLES -- */ elseif ($this->kwt) { 
  27109.             $size = count($this->kwt_Reference); 
  27110.             for ($i = 0; $i < $size; $i++) { 
  27111.                 if (isset($this->kwt_Reference[$i]['t']) && $this->kwt_Reference[$i]['t'] == $txt) { 
  27112.                     $Present = true; 
  27113.                     if ($this->page != $this->kwt_Reference[$i]['op']) { 
  27114.                         $this->kwt_Reference[$i]['op'] = $this->page; 
  27115.                     } 
  27116.                 } 
  27117.             } 
  27118.             if (!$Present) { //If not found, add it 
  27119.                 $this->kwt_Reference[] = array('t' => $txt, 'op' => $this->page); 
  27120.             } 
  27121.         } 
  27122.         /** -- END TABLES -- */ else { 
  27123.             $size = count($this->Reference); 
  27124.             for ($i = 0; $i < $size; $i++) { 
  27125.                 if (isset($this->Reference[$i]['t']) && $this->Reference[$i]['t'] == $txt) { 
  27126.                     $Present = true; 
  27127.                     if (!in_array($this->page, $this->Reference[$i]['p'])) { 
  27128.                         $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $this->page; 
  27129.                     } 
  27130.                 } 
  27131.             } 
  27132.             if (!$Present) { //If not found, add it 
  27133.                 $this->Reference[] = array('t' => $txt, 'p' => array($this->page)); 
  27134.             } 
  27135.         } 
  27136.     } 
  27137.  
  27138.     // Added function to add a reference "Elephants. See Chickens" 
  27139.     function IndexEntrySee($txta, $txtb) 
  27140.     { 
  27141.         if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *OTL* 
  27142.             // ONLY DO THIS IF NOT IN TAGS 
  27143.             if ($txta == strip_tags($txta)) 
  27144.                 $txta = str_replace(':', ' - ', $txta); // *OTL* 
  27145.             if ($txtb == strip_tags($txtb)) 
  27146.                 $txtb = str_replace(':', ' - ', $txtb); // *OTL* 
  27147.         } // *OTL* 
  27148.         else { // *OTL* 
  27149.             if ($txta == strip_tags($txta)) 
  27150.                 $txta = str_replace(':', ', ', $txta); 
  27151.             if ($txtb == strip_tags($txtb)) 
  27152.                 $txtb = str_replace(':', ', ', $txtb); 
  27153.         } // *OTL* 
  27154.         $this->Reference[] = array('t' => $txta . ' - see ' . $txtb, 'p' => array()); 
  27155.     } 
  27156.  
  27157.     function InsertIndex($usedivletters = 1, $useLinking = false, $indexCollationLocale = '', $indexCollationGroup = '') 
  27158.     { 
  27159.         $size = count($this->Reference); 
  27160.         if ($size == 0) { 
  27161.             return false; 
  27162.         } 
  27163.  
  27164.         // $spacer used after named entry 
  27165.         // $sep  separates number [groups], $joiner joins numbers in range 
  27166.         //  e.g. "elephant 73, 97-99" =  elephant[$spacer]73[$sep]97[$joiner]99 
  27167.         // $subEntrySeparator separates main and subentry (if $this->indexUseSubentries == false;) e.g. 
  27168.         // Mammal:elephant => Mammal[$subEntrySeparator]elephant 
  27169.         // $subEntryInset specifies what precedes a subentry (if $this->indexUseSubentries == true;) e.g. 
  27170.         // Mammal:elephant => [$subEntryInset]elephant 
  27171.         $spacer = "\xc2\xa0 "; 
  27172.         if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
  27173.             $sep = '، '; 
  27174.             $joiner = '-'; 
  27175.             $subEntrySeparator = '، '; 
  27176.             $subEntryInset = ' - '; 
  27177.         } else { 
  27178.             $sep = ', '; 
  27179.             $joiner = '-'; 
  27180.             $subEntrySeparator = ', '; 
  27181.             $subEntryInset = ' - '; 
  27182.         } 
  27183.  
  27184.         for ($i = 0; $i < $size; $i++) { 
  27185.             $txt = $this->Reference[$i]['t']; 
  27186.             $txt = strip_tags($txt); // mPDF 6 
  27187.             $txt = $this->purify_utf8($txt); 
  27188.             $this->Reference[$i]['uf'] = $txt; // Unformatted e.g. pure utf-8 encoded characters, no mark-up/tags 
  27189.             // Used for ordering and collation 
  27190.         } 
  27191.  
  27192.         if ($usedivletters) { 
  27193.             if ($indexCollationGroup) { 
  27194.                 require_once(_MPDF_PATH . 'collations/' . $indexCollationGroup . '.php'); 
  27195.             } else { 
  27196.                 $collation = array(); 
  27197.             } 
  27198.             for ($i = 0; $i < $size; $i++) { 
  27199.                 if ($this->Reference[$i]['uf']) { 
  27200.                     $l = mb_substr($this->Reference[$i]['uf'], 0, 1, 'UTF-8'); 
  27201.                     if (isset($this->indexCollationGroup) && $this->indexCollationGroup) { 
  27202.                         $uni = $this->UTF8StringToArray($l); 
  27203.                         $ucode = $uni[0]; 
  27204.                         if (isset($collation[$ucode])) { 
  27205.                             $this->Reference[$i]['d'] = code2utf($collation[$ucode]); 
  27206.                         } else { 
  27207.                             $this->Reference[$i]['d'] = mb_strtolower($l, 'UTF-8'); 
  27208.                         } 
  27209.                     } else { 
  27210.                         $this->Reference[$i]['d'] = mb_strtolower($l, 'UTF-8'); 
  27211.                     } 
  27212.                 } 
  27213.             } 
  27214.         } 
  27215.  
  27216.         if (!function_exists('cmp')) { 
  27217.  
  27218.             function cmp($a, $b) 
  27219.             { 
  27220.                 return strcoll(strtolower($a['uf']), strtolower($b['uf'])); 
  27221.             } 
  27222.  
  27223.         } 
  27224.         //Alphabetic sort of the references 
  27225.         $originalLocale = setlocale(LC_COLLATE, 0); 
  27226.         if ($indexCollationLocale) { 
  27227.             setlocale(LC_COLLATE, $indexCollationLocale); 
  27228.         } 
  27229.         usort($this->Reference, 'cmp'); 
  27230.         if ($indexCollationLocale) { 
  27231.             setlocale(LC_COLLATE, $originalLocale); 
  27232.         } 
  27233.  
  27234.         $html = '<div class="mpdf_index_main">'; 
  27235.  
  27236.         $lett = ''; 
  27237.         $last_lett = ''; 
  27238.         $mainentry = ''; 
  27239.         for ($i = 0; $i < $size; $i++) { 
  27240.             if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']) { 
  27241.                 if ($usedivletters) { 
  27242.                     $lett = $this->Reference[$i]['d']; 
  27243.                     if ($lett != $last_lett) { 
  27244.                         $html .= '<div class="mpdf_index_letter">' . $lett . '</div>'; 
  27245.                     } 
  27246.                 } 
  27247.                 $txt = $this->Reference[$i]['t']; 
  27248.  
  27249.                 // Sub-entries e.g. Mammals:elephant 
  27250.                 // But allow for tags e.g. <b>Mammal</b>:elephants 
  27251.                 $a = preg_split('/(<.*?>)/', $txt, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE); 
  27252.                 $txt = ''; 
  27253.                 $marker = false; 
  27254.                 foreach ($a as $k => $e) { 
  27255.                     if ($k % 2 == 0 && !$marker) { 
  27256.                         if (strpos($e, ':') !== false) { // == SubEntry 
  27257.                             if ($this->indexUseSubentries) { 
  27258.  
  27259.                                 // If the Main entry does not have any page numbers associated with it 
  27260.                                 // create and insert an entry 
  27261.                                 list($txtmain, $sub) = preg_split('/[:]/', $e, 2); 
  27262.                                 if (strip_tags($txt . $txtmain) != $mainentry) { 
  27263.                                     $html .= '<div class="mpdf_index_entry">' . $txt . $txtmain . '</div>'; 
  27264.                                     $mainentry = strip_tags($txt . $txtmain); 
  27265.                                 } 
  27266.  
  27267.                                 $txt = $subEntryInset; 
  27268.                                 $e = $sub; // Only replace first one 
  27269.                             } else { 
  27270.                                 $e = preg_replace('/[:]/', $subEntrySeparator, $e, 1); // Only replace first one 
  27271.                             } 
  27272.                             $marker = true; // Don't replace any more once the subentry marker has been found 
  27273.                         } 
  27274.                     } 
  27275.                     $txt .= $e; 
  27276.                 } 
  27277.  
  27278.                 if (!$marker) { 
  27279.                     $mainentry = strip_tags($txt); 
  27280.                 } 
  27281.  
  27282.                 $html .= '<div class="mpdf_index_entry">'; 
  27283.                 $html .= $txt; 
  27284.                 $ppp = $this->Reference[$i]['p']; // = array of page numbers to point to 
  27285.                 if (count($ppp)) { 
  27286.                     sort($ppp); 
  27287.                     $newarr = array(); 
  27288.                     $range_start = $ppp[0]; 
  27289.                     $range_end = 0; 
  27290.  
  27291.                     $html .= $spacer; 
  27292.  
  27293.                     for ($zi = 1; $zi < count($ppp); $zi++) { 
  27294.                         if ($ppp[$zi] == ($ppp[($zi - 1)] + 1)) { 
  27295.                             $range_end = $ppp[$zi]; 
  27296.                         } else { 
  27297.                             if ($range_end) { 
  27298.                                 if ($range_end == $range_start + 1) { 
  27299.                                     if ($useLinking) { 
  27300.                                         $html .= '<a class="mpdf_index_link" href="@' . $range_start . '">'; 
  27301.                                     } 
  27302.                                     $html .= $this->docPageNum($range_start); 
  27303.                                     if ($useLinking) { 
  27304.                                         $html .= '</a>'; 
  27305.                                     } 
  27306.                                     $html .= $sep; 
  27307.  
  27308.                                     if ($useLinking) { 
  27309.                                         $html .= '<a class="mpdf_index_link" href="@' . $ppp[$zi - 1] . '">'; 
  27310.                                     } 
  27311.                                     $html .= $this->docPageNum($ppp[$zi - 1]); 
  27312.                                     if ($useLinking) { 
  27313.                                         $html .= '</a>'; 
  27314.                                     } 
  27315.                                     $html .= $sep; 
  27316.                                 } 
  27317.                             } else { 
  27318.                                 if ($useLinking) { 
  27319.                                     $html .= '<a class="mpdf_index_link" href="@' . $ppp[$zi - 1] . '">'; 
  27320.                                 } 
  27321.                                 $html .= $this->docPageNum($ppp[$zi - 1]); 
  27322.                                 if ($useLinking) { 
  27323.                                     $html .= '</a>'; 
  27324.                                 } 
  27325.                                 $html .= $sep; 
  27326.                             } 
  27327.                             $range_start = $ppp[$zi]; 
  27328.                             $range_end = 0; 
  27329.                         } 
  27330.                     } 
  27331.  
  27332.                     if ($range_end) { 
  27333.                         if ($useLinking) { 
  27334.                             $html .= '<a class="mpdf_index_link" href="@' . $range_start . '">'; 
  27335.                         } 
  27336.                         $html .= $this->docPageNum($range_start); 
  27337.                         if ($range_end == $range_start + 1) { 
  27338.                             if ($useLinking) { 
  27339.                                 $html .= '</a>'; 
  27340.                             } 
  27341.                             $html .= $sep; 
  27342.                             if ($useLinking) { 
  27343.                                 $html .= '<a class="mpdf_index_link" href="@' . $range_end . '">'; 
  27344.                             } 
  27345.                             $html .= $this->docPageNum($range_end); 
  27346.                             if ($useLinking) { 
  27347.                                 $html .= '</a>'; 
  27348.                             } 
  27349.                         } else { 
  27350.                             $html .= $joiner; 
  27351.                             $html .= $this->docPageNum($range_end); 
  27352.                             if ($useLinking) { 
  27353.                                 $html .= '</a>'; 
  27354.                             } 
  27355.                         } 
  27356.                     } else { 
  27357.                         if ($useLinking) { 
  27358.                             $html .= '<a class="mpdf_index_link" href="@' . $ppp[(count($ppp) - 1)] . '">'; 
  27359.                         } 
  27360.                         $html .= $this->docPageNum($ppp[(count($ppp) - 1)]); 
  27361.                         if ($useLinking) { 
  27362.                             $html .= '</a>'; 
  27363.                         } 
  27364.                     } 
  27365.                 } 
  27366.             } 
  27367.             $html .= '</div>'; 
  27368.             $last_lett = $lett; 
  27369.         } 
  27370.         $html .= '</div>'; 
  27371.         $save_fpb = $this->fixedPosBlockSave; 
  27372.         $this->WriteHTML($html); 
  27373.         $this->fixedPosBlockSave = $save_fpb; 
  27374.  
  27375.         $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y;  // *COLUMNS* 
  27376.     } 
  27377.  
  27378.     /** -- END INDEX -- */ 
  27379.  
  27380.     function AcceptPageBreak() 
  27381.     { 
  27382.         if (count($this->cellBorderBuffer)) { 
  27383.             $this->printcellbuffer(); 
  27384.         } // *TABLES* 
  27385.         /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  27386.         if ($this->ColActive == 1) { 
  27387.             if ($this->CurrCol < $this->NbCol - 1) { 
  27388.                 //Go to the next column 
  27389.                 $this->CurrCol++; 
  27390.                 $this->SetCol($this->CurrCol); 
  27391.                 $this->y = $this->y0; 
  27392.                 $this->ChangeColumn = 1; // Number (and direction) of columns changed +1, +2, -2 etc. 
  27393.                 // DIRECTIONALITY RTL 
  27394.                 if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
  27395.                     $this->ChangeColumn = -($this->ChangeColumn); 
  27396.                 } // *OTL* 
  27397.                 //Stay on the page 
  27398.                 return false; 
  27399.             } else { 
  27400.                 //Go back to the first column - NEW PAGE 
  27401.                 if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { 
  27402.                     $this->printcolumnbuffer(); 
  27403.                 } 
  27404.                 $this->SetCol(0); 
  27405.                 $this->y0 = $this->tMargin; 
  27406.                 $this->ChangeColumn = -($this->NbCol - 1); 
  27407.                 // DIRECTIONALITY RTL 
  27408.                 if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
  27409.                     $this->ChangeColumn = -($this->ChangeColumn); 
  27410.                 } // *OTL* 
  27411.                 //Page break 
  27412.                 return true; 
  27413.             } 
  27414.         } 
  27415.         /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  27416.         /** -- TABLES -- */ elseif ($this->table_rotate) { 
  27417.             if ($this->tablebuffer) { 
  27418.                 $this->printtablebuffer(); 
  27419.             } 
  27420.             return true; 
  27421.         } 
  27422.         /** -- END TABLES -- */ else { // *COLUMNS* 
  27423.             $this->ChangeColumn = 0; 
  27424.             return $this->autoPageBreak; 
  27425.         } // *COLUMNS* 
  27426.         return $this->autoPageBreak; 
  27427.     } 
  27428.  
  27429.     //----------- COLUMNS --------------------- 
  27430.     /** -- COLUMNS -- */ 
  27431.  
  27432.     function SetColumns($NbCol, $vAlign = '', $gap = 5) 
  27433.     { 
  27434.         // NbCol = number of columns 
  27435.         // Anything less than 2 turns columns off 
  27436.         if ($NbCol < 2) { // SET COLUMNS OFF 
  27437.             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  27438.                 $this->ColActive = 0; 
  27439.                 if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { 
  27440.                     $this->printcolumnbuffer(); 
  27441.                 } 
  27442.                 $this->NbCol = 1; 
  27443.                 $this->ResetMargins(); 
  27444.                 $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  27445.                 $this->divwidth = 0; 
  27446.                 $this->Ln(); 
  27447.             } 
  27448.             $this->ColActive = 0; 
  27449.             $this->columnbuffer = array(); 
  27450.             $this->ColDetails = array(); 
  27451.             $this->columnLinks = array(); 
  27452.             $this->columnAnnots = array(); 
  27453.             $this->columnForms = array(); 
  27454.             $this->col_BMoutlines = array(); 
  27455.             $this->col_toc = array(); 
  27456.             $this->breakpoints = array(); 
  27457.         } else { // SET COLUMNS ON 
  27458.             if ($this->ColActive) { 
  27459.                 $this->ColActive = 0; 
  27460.                 if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { 
  27461.                     $this->printcolumnbuffer(); 
  27462.                 } 
  27463.                 $this->ResetMargins(); 
  27464.             } 
  27465.             if (isset($this->y) && $this->y > $this->tMargin) 
  27466.                 $this->Ln(); 
  27467.             $this->NbCol = $NbCol; 
  27468.             $this->ColGap = $gap; 
  27469.             $this->divwidth = 0; 
  27470.             $this->ColActive = 1; 
  27471.             $this->ColumnAdjust = true; // enables column height adjustment for the page 
  27472.             $this->columnbuffer = array(); 
  27473.             $this->ColDetails = array(); 
  27474.             $this->columnLinks = array(); 
  27475.             $this->columnAnnots = array(); 
  27476.             $this->columnForms = array(); 
  27477.             $this->col_BMoutlines = array(); 
  27478.             $this->col_toc = array(); 
  27479.             $this->breakpoints = array(); 
  27480.             if ((strtoupper($vAlign) == 'J') || (strtoupper($vAlign) == 'JUSTIFY')) { 
  27481.                 $vAlign = 'J'; 
  27482.             } else { 
  27483.                 $vAlign = ''; 
  27484.             } 
  27485.             $this->colvAlign = $vAlign; 
  27486.             //Save the ordinate 
  27487.             $absL = $this->DeflMargin - ($gap / 2); 
  27488.             $absR = $this->DefrMargin - ($gap / 2); 
  27489.             $PageWidth = $this->w - $absL - $absR; // virtual pagewidth for calculation only 
  27490.             $ColWidth = (($PageWidth - ($gap * ($NbCol))) / $NbCol); 
  27491.             $this->ColWidth = $ColWidth; 
  27492.             /** -- OTL -- */ 
  27493.  
  27494.             if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
  27495.                 for ($i = 0; $i < $this->NbCol; $i++) { 
  27496.                     $this->ColL[$i] = $absL + ($gap / 2) + (($NbCol - ($i + 1)) * ($PageWidth / $NbCol)); 
  27497.                     $this->ColR[$i] = $this->ColL[$i] + $ColWidth; // NB This is not R margin -> R pos 
  27498.                 } 
  27499.             } else { 
  27500.                 /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  27501.                 for ($i = 0; $i < $this->NbCol; $i++) { 
  27502.                     $this->ColL[$i] = $absL + ($gap / 2) + ($i * ($PageWidth / $NbCol) ); 
  27503.                     $this->ColR[$i] = $this->ColL[$i] + $ColWidth; // NB This is not R margin -> R pos 
  27504.                 } 
  27505.             } // *OTL* 
  27506.             $this->pgwidth = $ColWidth; 
  27507.             $this->SetCol(0); 
  27508.             $this->y0 = $this->y; 
  27509.         } 
  27510.         $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  27511.     } 
  27512.  
  27513.     function SetCol($CurrCol) 
  27514.     { 
  27515.         // Used internally to set column by number: 0 is 1st column 
  27516.         //Set position on a column 
  27517.         $this->CurrCol = $CurrCol; 
  27518.         $x = $this->ColL[$CurrCol]; 
  27519.         $xR = $this->ColR[$CurrCol]; // NB This is not R margin -> R pos 
  27520.         if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page) % 2 == 0)) { // EVEN 
  27521.             $x += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  27522.             $xR += $this->MarginCorrection; 
  27523.         } 
  27524.         $this->SetMargins($x, ($this->w - $xR), $this->tMargin); 
  27525.     } 
  27526.  
  27527.     function AddColumn() 
  27528.     { 
  27529.         $this->NewColumn(); 
  27530.         $this->ColumnAdjust = false; // disables all column height adjustment for the page. 
  27531.     } 
  27532.  
  27533.     function NewColumn() 
  27534.     { 
  27535.         if ($this->ColActive == 1) { 
  27536.             if ($this->CurrCol < $this->NbCol - 1) { 
  27537.                 //Go to the next column 
  27538.                 $this->CurrCol++; 
  27539.                 $this->SetCol($this->CurrCol); 
  27540.                 $this->y = $this->y0; 
  27541.                 $this->ChangeColumn = 1; 
  27542.                 // DIRECTIONALITY RTL 
  27543.                 if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
  27544.                     $this->ChangeColumn = -($this->ChangeColumn); 
  27545.                 } // *OTL* 
  27546.                 //Stay on the page 
  27547.             } else { 
  27548.                 //Go back to the first column 
  27549.                 //Page break 
  27550.                 if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { 
  27551.                     $this->printcolumnbuffer(); 
  27552.                 } 
  27553.                 $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  27554.                 $this->SetCol(0); 
  27555.                 $this->y0 = $this->tMargin; 
  27556.                 $this->ChangeColumn = -($this->NbCol - 1); 
  27557.                 // DIRECTIONALITY RTL 
  27558.                 if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
  27559.                     $this->ChangeColumn = -($this->ChangeColumn); 
  27560.                 } // *OTL* 
  27561.             } 
  27562.             $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  27563.         } else { 
  27564.             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  27565.         } 
  27566.     } 
  27567.  
  27568.     function printcolumnbuffer() 
  27569.     { 
  27570.         // Columns ended (but page not ended) -> try to match all columns - unless disabled by using a custom column-break 
  27571.         if (!$this->ColActive && $this->ColumnAdjust && !$this->keepColumns) { 
  27572.             // Calculate adjustment to add to each column to calculate rel_y value 
  27573.             $this->ColDetails[0]['add_y'] = 0; 
  27574.             $last_col = 0; 
  27575.             // Recursively add previous column's height 
  27576.             for ($i = 1; $i < $this->NbCol; $i++) { 
  27577.                 if (isset($this->ColDetails[$i]['bottom_margin']) && $this->ColDetails[$i]['bottom_margin']) { // If any entries in the column 
  27578.                     $this->ColDetails[$i]['add_y'] = ($this->ColDetails[$i - 1]['bottom_margin'] - $this->y0) + $this->ColDetails[$i - 1]['add_y']; 
  27579.                     $last_col = $i;  // Last column actually printed 
  27580.                 } 
  27581.             } 
  27582.  
  27583.             // Calculate value for each position sensitive entry as though for one column 
  27584.             foreach ($this->columnbuffer AS $key => $s) { 
  27585.                 $t = $s['s']; 
  27586.                 if ($t == 'ACROFORM') { 
  27587.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0; 
  27588.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['s'] = ''; 
  27589.                 } elseif (preg_match('/BT \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) Td/', $t)) { 
  27590.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0; 
  27591.                 } elseif (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ [\-]{0, 1}\d+\.\d\d+ re/', $t)) { 
  27592.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0; 
  27593.                 } elseif (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) m/', $t)) { 
  27594.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0; 
  27595.                 } elseif (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) l/', $t)) { 
  27596.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0; 
  27597.                 } elseif (preg_match('/q \d+\.\d\d+ 0 0 \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) cm \/(I|FO)\d+ Do Q/', $t)) { 
  27598.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0; 
  27599.                 } elseif (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ c/', $t)) { 
  27600.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0; 
  27601.                 } 
  27602.             } 
  27603.             foreach ($this->internallink AS $key => $f) { 
  27604.                 if (is_array($f) && isset($f['col'])) { 
  27605.                     $this->internallink[$key]['rel_y'] = $f['Y'] + $this->ColDetails[$f['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0; 
  27606.                 } 
  27607.             } 
  27608.  
  27609.             $breaks = array(); 
  27610.             foreach ($this->breakpoints AS $c => $bpa) { 
  27611.                 foreach ($bpa AS $rely) { 
  27612.                     $breaks[] = $rely + $this->ColDetails[$c]['add_y'] - $this->y0; 
  27613.                 } 
  27614.             } 
  27615.  
  27616.  
  27617.             if (isset($this->ColDetails[$last_col]['bottom_margin'])) { 
  27618.                 $lcbm = $this->ColDetails[$last_col]['bottom_margin']; 
  27619.             } else { 
  27620.                 $lcbm = 0; 
  27621.             } 
  27622.             $sum_h = $this->ColDetails[$last_col]['add_y'] + $lcbm - $this->y0; 
  27623.             //$sum_h = max($this->ColDetails[$last_col]['add_y'] + $this->ColDetails[$last_col]['bottom_margin'] - $this->y0, end($breaks)); 
  27624.             $target_h = ($sum_h / $this->NbCol); 
  27625.  
  27626.             $cbr = array(); 
  27627.             for ($i = 1; $i < $this->NbCol; $i++) { 
  27628.                 $th = ($sum_h * $i / $this->NbCol); 
  27629.                 foreach ($breaks AS $bk => $val) { 
  27630.                     if ($val > $th) { 
  27631.                         if (($val - $th) < ($th - $breaks[$bk - 1])) { 
  27632.                             $cbr[$i - 1] = $val; 
  27633.                         } else { 
  27634.                             $cbr[$i - 1] = $breaks[$bk - 1]; 
  27635.                         } 
  27636.                         break; 
  27637.                     } 
  27638.                 } 
  27639.             } 
  27640.             $cbr[($this->NbCol - 1)] = $sum_h; 
  27641.  
  27642.             // mPDF 6 
  27643.             // Avoid outputing with 1st column empty 
  27644.             if (isset($cbr[0]) && $cbr[0] == 0) { 
  27645.                 for ($i = 0; $i < $this->NbCol - 1; $i++) { 
  27646.                     $cbr[$i] = $cbr[$i + 1]; 
  27647.                 } 
  27648.             } 
  27649.  
  27650.             // Now update the columns - divide into columns of approximately equal value 
  27651.             $last_new_col = 0; 
  27652.             $yadj = 0; // mm 
  27653.             $xadj = 0; 
  27654.             $last_col_bottom = 0; 
  27655.             $lowest_bottom_y = 0; 
  27656.             $block_bottom = 0; 
  27657.             $newcolumn = 0; 
  27658.             foreach ($this->columnbuffer AS $key => $s) { 
  27659.                 if (isset($s['rel_y'])) { // only process position sensitive data 
  27660.                     if ($s['rel_y'] >= $cbr[$newcolumn]) { 
  27661.                         $newcolumn++; 
  27662.                     } else { 
  27663.                         $newcolumn = $last_new_col; 
  27664.                     } 
  27665.  
  27666.  
  27667.                     $block_bottom = max($block_bottom, ($s['rel_y'] + $s['h'])); 
  27668.  
  27669.                     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *OTL* 
  27670.                         $xadj = -(($newcolumn - $s['col']) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap)); // *OTL* 
  27671.                     } // *OTL* 
  27672.                     else { // *OTL* 
  27673.                         $xadj = ($newcolumn - $s['col']) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap); 
  27674.                     } // *OTL* 
  27675.  
  27676.                     if ($last_new_col != $newcolumn) { // Added new column 
  27677.                         $last_col_bottom = $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y']; 
  27678.                         $block_bottom = 0; 
  27679.                     } 
  27680.                     $yadj = ($s['rel_y'] - $s['y']) - ($last_col_bottom) + $this->y0; 
  27681.                     // callback function 
  27682.                     $t = $s['s']; 
  27683.  
  27684.                     // mPDF 5.7+ 
  27685.                     $t = $this->columnAdjustPregReplace('Td', $xadj, $yadj, '/BT (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) Td/', $t); 
  27686.                     $t = $this->columnAdjustPregReplace('re', $xadj, $yadj, '/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) ([\-]{0, 1}\d+\.\d\d+) re/', $t); 
  27687.                     $t = $this->columnAdjustPregReplace('l', $xadj, $yadj, '/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) l/', $t); 
  27688.                     $t = $this->columnAdjustPregReplace('img', $xadj, $yadj, '/q (\d+\.\d\d+) 0 0 (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) cm \/(I|FO)/', $t); 
  27689.                     $t = $this->columnAdjustPregReplace('draw', $xadj, $yadj, '/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) m/', $t); 
  27690.                     $t = $this->columnAdjustPregReplace('bezier', $xadj, $yadj, '/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) c/', $t); 
  27691.  
  27692.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['s'] = $t; 
  27693.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['newcol'] = $newcolumn; 
  27694.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['newy'] = $s['y'] + $yadj; 
  27695.                     $last_new_col = $newcolumn; 
  27696.                     $clb = $s['y'] + $yadj + $s['h']; // bottom_margin of current 
  27697.                     if ((isset($this->ColDetails[$newcolumn]['max_bottom']) && $clb > $this->ColDetails[$newcolumn]['max_bottom']) || (!isset($this->ColDetails[$newcolumn]['max_bottom']) && $clb)) { 
  27698.                         $this->ColDetails[$newcolumn]['max_bottom'] = $clb; 
  27699.                     } 
  27700.                     if ($clb > $lowest_bottom_y) { 
  27701.                         $lowest_bottom_y = $clb; 
  27702.                     } 
  27703.                     // Adjust LINKS 
  27704.                     if (isset($this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) { 
  27705.                         $ref = $this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]; 
  27706.                         $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][0] += ($xadj * _MPDFK); 
  27707.                         $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][1] -= ($yadj * _MPDFK); 
  27708.                         unset($this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]); 
  27709.                     } 
  27710.                     // Adjust FORM FIELDS 
  27711.                     if (isset($this->columnForms[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) { 
  27712.                         $ref = $this->columnForms[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]; 
  27713.                         $this->mpdfform->forms[$ref]['x'] += ($xadj); 
  27714.                         $this->mpdfform->forms[$ref]['y'] += ($yadj); 
  27715.                         unset($this->columnForms[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]); 
  27716.                     } 
  27717.                     /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  27718.                     if (isset($this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) { 
  27719.                         $ref = $this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]; 
  27720.                         if ($this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['x'] < 0) { 
  27721.                             $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['x'] -= ($xadj); 
  27722.                         } else { 
  27723.                             $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['x'] += ($xadj); 
  27724.                         } 
  27725.                         $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['y'] += ($yadj); // unlike PageLinks, Page annots has y values from top in mm 
  27726.                         unset($this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]); 
  27727.                     } 
  27728.                     /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  27729.                 } 
  27730.             } 
  27731.  
  27732.             /** -- BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  27733.             // Adjust Bookmarks 
  27734.             foreach ($this->col_BMoutlines AS $v) { 
  27735.                 $this->BMoutlines[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'y' => $this->y0, 'p' => $v['p']); 
  27736.             } 
  27737.             /** -- END BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  27738.  
  27739.             /** -- TOC -- */ 
  27740.  
  27741.             // Adjust ToC 
  27742.             foreach ($this->col_toc AS $v) { 
  27743.                 $this->tocontents->_toc[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'p' => $v['p'], 'link' => $v['link'], 'toc_id' => $v['toc_id']); 
  27744.                 $this->links[$v['link']][1] = $this->y0; 
  27745.             } 
  27746.             /** -- END TOC -- */ 
  27747.  
  27748.             // Adjust column length to be equal 
  27749.             if ($this->colvAlign == 'J') { 
  27750.                 foreach ($this->columnbuffer AS $key => $s) { 
  27751.                     if (isset($s['rel_y'])) { // only process position sensitive data 
  27752.                         // Set ratio to expand y values or heights 
  27753.                         if (isset($this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom']) && $this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom'] && $this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom'] != $this->y0) { 
  27754.                             $ratio = ($lowest_bottom_y - ($this->y0)) / ($this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom'] - ($this->y0)); 
  27755.                         } else { 
  27756.                             $ratio = 1; 
  27757.                         } 
  27758.                         if (($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) { 
  27759.                             $yadj = ($s['newy'] - $this->y0) * ($ratio - 1); 
  27760.  
  27761.                             // Adjust LINKS 
  27762.                             if (isset($this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) { 
  27763.                                 $ref = $this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]; 
  27764.                                 $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][1] -= ($yadj * _MPDFK); // y value 
  27765.                                 $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][3] *= $ratio; // height 
  27766.                                 unset($this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]); 
  27767.                             } 
  27768.                             // Adjust FORM FIELDS 
  27769.                             if (isset($this->columnForms[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) { 
  27770.                                 $ref = $this->columnForms[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]; 
  27771.                                 $this->mpdfform->forms[$ref]['x'] += ($xadj); 
  27772.                                 $this->mpdfform->forms[$ref]['y'] += ($yadj); 
  27773.                                 unset($this->columnForms[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]); 
  27774.                             } 
  27775.                             /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  27776.                             if (isset($this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) { 
  27777.                                 $ref = $this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]; 
  27778.                                 $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['y'] += ($yadj); 
  27779.                                 unset($this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]); 
  27780.                             } 
  27781.                             /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  27782.                         } 
  27783.                     } 
  27784.                 } 
  27785.                 foreach ($this->internallink AS $key => $f) { 
  27786.                     if (is_array($f) && isset($f['col'])) { 
  27787.                         $last_col_bottom = 0; 
  27788.                         for ($nbc = 0; $nbc < $this->NbCol; $nbc++) { 
  27789.                             if ($f['rel_y'] >= $cbr[$nbc]) { 
  27790.                                 $last_col_bottom = $cbr[$nbc]; 
  27791.                             } 
  27792.                         } 
  27793.                         $yadj = ($f['rel_y'] - $f['Y']) - $last_col_bottom + $this->y0; 
  27794.                         $f['Y'] += $yadj; 
  27795.                         unset($f['col']); 
  27796.                         unset($f['rel_y']); 
  27797.                         $this->internallink[$key] = $f; 
  27798.                     } 
  27799.                 } 
  27800.  
  27801.                 $last_col = -1; 
  27802.                 $trans_on = false; 
  27803.                 foreach ($this->columnbuffer AS $key => $s) { 
  27804.                     if (isset($s['rel_y'])) { // only process position sensitive data 
  27805.                         // Set ratio to expand y values or heights 
  27806.                         if (isset($this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom']) && $this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom'] && $this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom'] != $this->y0) { 
  27807.                             $ratio = ($lowest_bottom_y - ($this->y0)) / ($this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom'] - ($this->y0)); 
  27808.                         } else { 
  27809.                             $ratio = 1; 
  27810.                         } 
  27811.                         if (($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) { 
  27812.                             //Start Transformation 
  27813.                             $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StartTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  27814.                             $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->transformScale(100, $ratio * 100, $x = '', $this->y0, true) . "\n"; 
  27815.                             $trans_on = true; 
  27816.                         } 
  27817.                     } 
  27818.                     // Now output the adjusted values 
  27819.                     $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s'] . "\n"; 
  27820.                     if (isset($s['rel_y']) && ($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) { // only process position sensitive data 
  27821.                         //Stop Transformation 
  27822.                         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StopTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  27823.                         $trans_on = false; 
  27824.                     } 
  27825.                 } 
  27826.                 if ($trans_on) { 
  27827.                     $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StopTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  27828.                 } 
  27829.             } else { // if NOT $this->colvAlign == 'J' 
  27830.                 // Now output the adjusted values 
  27831.                 foreach ($this->columnbuffer AS $s) { 
  27832.                     $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s'] . "\n"; 
  27833.                 } 
  27834.             } 
  27835.             if ($lowest_bottom_y > 0) { 
  27836.                 $this->y = $lowest_bottom_y; 
  27837.             } 
  27838.         } 
  27839.  
  27840.         // Columns not ended but new page -> align columns (can leave the columns alone - just tidy up the height) 
  27841.         elseif ($this->colvAlign == 'J' && $this->ColumnAdjust && !$this->keepColumns) { 
  27842.             // calculate the lowest bottom margin 
  27843.             $lowest_bottom_y = 0; 
  27844.             foreach ($this->columnbuffer AS $key => $s) { 
  27845.                 // Only process output data 
  27846.                 $t = $s['s']; 
  27847.                 if ($t == 'ACROFORM' || (preg_match('/BT \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) Td/', $t)) || (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ [\-]{0, 1}\d+\.\d\d+ re/', $t)) || 
  27848.                     (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) l/', $t)) || 
  27849.                     (preg_match('/q \d+\.\d\d+ 0 0 \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) cm \/(I|FO)\d+ Do Q/', $t)) || 
  27850.                     (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) m/', $t)) || 
  27851.                     (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ c/', $t))) { 
  27852.  
  27853.                     $clb = $s['y'] + $s['h']; 
  27854.                     if ((isset($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) && $clb > $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) || !isset($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom'])) { 
  27855.                         $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom'] = $clb; 
  27856.                     } 
  27857.                     if ($clb > $lowest_bottom_y) { 
  27858.                         $lowest_bottom_y = $clb; 
  27859.                     } 
  27860.                     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y']; // Marks position sensitive data to process later 
  27861.                     if ($t == 'ACROFORM') { 
  27862.                         $this->columnbuffer[$key]['s'] = ''; 
  27863.                     } 
  27864.                 } 
  27865.             } 
  27866.             // Adjust column length equal 
  27867.             foreach ($this->columnbuffer AS $key => $s) { 
  27868.                 // Set ratio to expand y values or heights 
  27869.                 if (isset($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) && $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) { 
  27870.                     $ratio = ($lowest_bottom_y - ($this->y0)) / ($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom'] - ($this->y0)); 
  27871.                 } else { 
  27872.                     $ratio = 1; 
  27873.                 } 
  27874.                 if (($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) { 
  27875.                     $yadj = ($s['y'] - $this->y0) * ($ratio - 1); 
  27876.  
  27877.                     // Adjust LINKS 
  27878.                     if (isset($s['rel_y'])) { // only process position sensitive data 
  27879.                         // otherwise triggers for all entries in column buffer (.e.g. formatting) and makes below adjustments more than once 
  27880.                         if (isset($this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) { 
  27881.                             $ref = $this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]; 
  27882.                             $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][1] -= ($yadj * _MPDFK); // y value 
  27883.                             $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][3] *= $ratio; // height 
  27884.                             unset($this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]); 
  27885.                         } 
  27886.                         // Adjust FORM FIELDS 
  27887.                         if (isset($this->columnForms[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) { 
  27888.                             $ref = $this->columnForms[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]; 
  27889.                             $this->mpdfform->forms[$ref]['x'] += ($xadj); 
  27890.                             $this->mpdfform->forms[$ref]['y'] += ($yadj); 
  27891.                             unset($this->columnForms[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]); 
  27892.                         } 
  27893.                         /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  27894.                         if (isset($this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) { 
  27895.                             $ref = $this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]; 
  27896.                             $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['y'] += ($yadj); 
  27897.                             unset($this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])]); 
  27898.                         } 
  27899.                         /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  27900.                     } 
  27901.                 } 
  27902.             } 
  27903.  
  27904.             /** -- BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  27905.  
  27906.             // Adjust Bookmarks 
  27907.             foreach ($this->col_BMoutlines AS $v) { 
  27908.                 $this->BMoutlines[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'y' => $this->y0, 'p' => $v['p']); 
  27909.             } 
  27910.             /** -- END BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  27911.  
  27912.             /** -- TOC -- */ 
  27913.  
  27914.             // Adjust ToC 
  27915.             foreach ($this->col_toc AS $v) { 
  27916.                 $this->tocontents->_toc[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'p' => $v['p'], 'link' => $v['link'], 'toc_id' => $v['toc_id']); 
  27917.                 $this->links[$v['link']][1] = $this->y0; 
  27918.             } 
  27919.             /** -- END TOC -- */ 
  27920.             $trans_on = false; 
  27921.             foreach ($this->columnbuffer AS $key => $s) { 
  27922.                 if (isset($s['rel_y'])) { // only process position sensitive data 
  27923.                     // Set ratio to expand y values or heights 
  27924.                     if ($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) { 
  27925.                         $ratio = ($lowest_bottom_y - ($this->y0)) / ($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom'] - ($this->y0)); 
  27926.                     } else { 
  27927.                         $ratio = 1; 
  27928.                     } 
  27929.                     if (($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) { 
  27930.                         //Start Transformation 
  27931.                         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StartTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  27932.                         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->transformScale(100, $ratio * 100, $x = '', $this->y0, true) . "\n"; 
  27933.                         $trans_on = true; 
  27934.                     } 
  27935.                 } 
  27936.                 // Now output the adjusted values 
  27937.                 $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s'] . "\n"; 
  27938.                 if (isset($s['rel_y']) && ($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) { 
  27939.                     //Stop Transformation 
  27940.                     $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StopTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  27941.                     $trans_on = false; 
  27942.                 } 
  27943.             } 
  27944.             if ($trans_on) { 
  27945.                 $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StopTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  27946.             } 
  27947.  
  27948.             if ($lowest_bottom_y > 0) { 
  27949.                 $this->y = $lowest_bottom_y; 
  27950.             } 
  27951.         } 
  27952.  
  27953.  
  27954.         // Just reproduce the page as it was 
  27955.         else { 
  27956.             // If page has not ended but height adjustment was disabled by custom column-break - adjust y 
  27957.             $lowest_bottom_y = 0; 
  27958.             if (!$this->ColActive && (!$this->ColumnAdjust || $this->keepColumns)) { 
  27959.                 // calculate the lowest bottom margin 
  27960.                 foreach ($this->columnbuffer AS $key => $s) { 
  27961.                     // Only process output data 
  27962.                     $t = $s['s']; 
  27963.                     if ($t == 'ACROFORM' || (preg_match('/BT \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) Td/', $t)) || (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ [\-]{0, 1}\d+\.\d\d+ re/', $t)) || 
  27964.                         (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) l/', $t)) || 
  27965.                         (preg_match('/q \d+\.\d\d+ 0 0 \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) cm \/(I|FO)\d+ Do Q/', $t)) || 
  27966.                         (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) m/', $t)) || 
  27967.                         (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ c/', $t))) { 
  27968.  
  27969.                         $clb = $s['y'] + $s['h']; 
  27970.                         if ($clb > $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) { 
  27971.                             $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom'] = $clb; 
  27972.                         } 
  27973.                         if ($clb > $lowest_bottom_y) { 
  27974.                             $lowest_bottom_y = $clb; 
  27975.                         } 
  27976.                     } 
  27977.                 } 
  27978.             } 
  27979.             foreach ($this->columnbuffer AS $key => $s) { 
  27980.                 if ($s['s'] != 'ACROFORM') 
  27981.                     $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s'] . "\n"; 
  27982.             } 
  27983.             if ($lowest_bottom_y > 0) { 
  27984.                 $this->y = $lowest_bottom_y; 
  27985.             } 
  27986.             /** -- BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  27987.             // Output Bookmarks 
  27988.             foreach ($this->col_BMoutlines AS $v) { 
  27989.                 $this->BMoutlines[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'y' => $v['y'], 'p' => $v['p']); 
  27990.             } 
  27991.             /** -- END BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  27992.             /** -- TOC -- */ 
  27993.             // Output ToC 
  27994.             foreach ($this->col_toc AS $v) { 
  27995.                 $this->tocontents->_toc[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'p' => $v['p'], 'link' => $v['link'], 'toc_id' => $v['toc_id']); 
  27996.             } 
  27997.             /** -- END TOC -- */ 
  27998.         } 
  27999.         foreach ($this->internallink AS $key => $f) { 
  28000.             if (isset($this->internallink[$key]['col'])) 
  28001.                 unset($this->internallink[$key]['col']); 
  28002.             if (isset($this->internallink[$key]['rel_y'])) 
  28003.                 unset($this->internallink[$key]['rel_y']); 
  28004.         } 
  28005.  
  28006.         $this->columnbuffer = array(); 
  28007.         $this->ColDetails = array(); 
  28008.         $this->columnLinks = array(); 
  28009.         $this->columnAnnots = array(); 
  28010.         $this->columnForms = array(); 
  28011.  
  28012.         $this->col_BMoutlines = array(); 
  28013.         $this->col_toc = array(); 
  28014.         $this->breakpoints = array(); 
  28015.     } 
  28016.  
  28017.     // mPDF 5.7+ 
  28018.     function columnAdjustPregReplace($type, $xadj, $yadj, $pattern, $subject) 
  28019.     { 
  28020.         preg_match($pattern, $subject, $matches); 
  28021.         if (!count($matches)) { 
  28022.             return $subject; 
  28023.         } 
  28024.         if (!isset($matches[3])) { 
  28025.             $matches[3] = 0; 
  28026.         } 
  28027.         if (!isset($matches[4])) { 
  28028.             $matches[4] = 0; 
  28029.         } 
  28030.         if (!isset($matches[5])) { 
  28031.             $matches[5] = 0; 
  28032.         } 
  28033.         if (!isset($matches[6])) { 
  28034.             $matches[6] = 0; 
  28035.         } 
  28036.         return str_replace($matches[0], $this->columnAdjustAdd($type, _MPDFK, $xadj, $yadj, $matches[1], $matches[2], $matches[3], $matches[4], $matches[5], $matches[6]), $subject); 
  28037.     } 
  28038.  
  28039.     /** -- END COLUMNS -- */ 
  28040.  
  28041.     //================================================================== 
  28042.     /** -- TABLES -- */ 
  28043.     function printcellbuffer() 
  28044.     { 
  28045.         if (count($this->cellBorderBuffer)) { 
  28046.             sort($this->cellBorderBuffer); 
  28047.             foreach ($this->cellBorderBuffer AS $cbb) { 
  28048.                 $cba = unpack("A16dom/nbord/A1side/ns/dbw/a6ca/A10style/dx/dy/dw/dh/dmbl/dmbr/dmrt/dmrb/dmtl/dmtr/dmlt/dmlb/dcpd/dover/", $cbb); 
  28049.                 $side = $cba['side']; 
  28050.                 $color = str_pad($cba['ca'], 6, "\x00"); 
  28051.                 $details = array(); 
  28052.                 $details[$side]['dom'] = (float) $cba['dom']; 
  28053.                 $details[$side]['s'] = $cba['s']; 
  28054.                 $details[$side]['w'] = $cba['bw']; 
  28055.                 $details[$side]['c'] = $color; 
  28056.                 $details[$side]['style'] = trim($cba['style']); 
  28057.                 $details['mbw']['BL'] = $cba['mbl']; 
  28058.                 $details['mbw']['BR'] = $cba['mbr']; 
  28059.                 $details['mbw']['RT'] = $cba['mrt']; 
  28060.                 $details['mbw']['RB'] = $cba['mrb']; 
  28061.                 $details['mbw']['TL'] = $cba['mtl']; 
  28062.                 $details['mbw']['TR'] = $cba['mtr']; 
  28063.                 $details['mbw']['LT'] = $cba['mlt']; 
  28064.                 $details['mbw']['LB'] = $cba['mlb']; 
  28065.                 $details['cellposdom'] = $cba['cpd']; 
  28066.                 $details['p'] = $side; 
  28067.                 if ($cba['over'] == 1) { 
  28068.                     $details[$side]['overlay'] = true; 
  28069.                 } else { 
  28070.                     $details[$side]['overlay'] = false; 
  28071.                 } 
  28072.                 $this->_tableRect($cba['x'], $cba['y'], $cba['w'], $cba['h'], $cba['bord'], $details, false, false); 
  28073.             } 
  28074.             $this->cellBorderBuffer = array(); 
  28075.         } 
  28076.     } 
  28077.  
  28078.     //================================================================== 
  28079.     function printtablebuffer() 
  28080.     { 
  28081.  
  28082.         if (!$this->table_rotate) { 
  28083.             $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->tablebuffer; 
  28084.             foreach ($this->tbrot_Links AS $p => $l) { 
  28085.                 foreach ($l AS $v) { 
  28086.                     $this->PageLinks[$p][] = $v; 
  28087.                 } 
  28088.             } 
  28089.             $this->tbrot_Links = array(); 
  28090.             /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  28091.             foreach ($this->tbrot_Annots AS $p => $l) { 
  28092.                 foreach ($l AS $v) { 
  28093.                     $this->PageAnnots[$p][] = $v; 
  28094.                 } 
  28095.             } 
  28096.             $this->tbrot_Annots = array(); 
  28097.             /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  28098.  
  28099.             /** -- BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  28100.             // Output Bookmarks 
  28101.             foreach ($this->tbrot_BMoutlines AS $v) { 
  28102.                 $this->BMoutlines[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'y' => $v['y'], 'p' => $v['p']); 
  28103.             } 
  28104.             $this->tbrot_BMoutlines = array(); 
  28105.             /** -- END BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  28106.  
  28107.             /** -- TOC -- */ 
  28108.             // Output ToC 
  28109.             foreach ($this->tbrot_toc AS $v) { 
  28110.                 $this->tocontents->_toc[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'p' => $v['p'], 'link' => $v['link'], 'toc_id' => $v['toc_id']); 
  28111.             } 
  28112.             $this->tbrot_toc = array(); 
  28113.             /** -- END TOC -- */ 
  28114.  
  28115.             return; 
  28116.         } 
  28117.         // elseif rotated 
  28118.         $lm = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left']; 
  28119.         $pw = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; 
  28120.         //Start Transformation 
  28121.         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StartTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  28122.  
  28123.         if ($this->table_rotate > 1) { // clockwise 
  28124.             if ($this->tbrot_align == 'L') { 
  28125.                 $xadj = $this->tbrot_h; // align L (as is) 
  28126.             } elseif ($this->tbrot_align == 'R') { 
  28127.                 $xadj = $lm - $this->tbrot_x0 + ($pw); // align R 
  28128.             } else { 
  28129.                 $xadj = $lm - $this->tbrot_x0 + (($pw + $this->tbrot_h) / 2); // align C 
  28130.             } 
  28131.             $yadj = 0; 
  28132.         } else { // anti-clockwise 
  28133.             if ($this->tbrot_align == 'L') { 
  28134.                 $xadj = 0; // align L (as is) 
  28135.             } elseif ($this->tbrot_align == 'R') { 
  28136.                 $xadj = $lm - $this->tbrot_x0 + ($pw - $this->tbrot_h); // align R 
  28137.             } else { 
  28138.                 $xadj = $lm - $this->tbrot_x0 + (($pw - $this->tbrot_h) / 2); // align C 
  28139.             } 
  28140.             $yadj = $this->tbrot_w; 
  28141.         } 
  28142.  
  28143.  
  28144.         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->transformTranslate($xadj, $yadj, true) . "\n"; 
  28145.         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->transformRotate($this->table_rotate, $this->tbrot_x0, $this->tbrot_y0, true) . "\n"; 
  28146.  
  28147.         // Now output the adjusted values 
  28148.         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->tablebuffer; 
  28149.  
  28150.  
  28151.         foreach ($this->tbrot_Links AS $p => $l) { 
  28152.             foreach ($l AS $v) { 
  28153.                 $w = $v[2] / _MPDFK; 
  28154.                 $h = $v[3] / _MPDFK; 
  28155.                 $ax = ($v[0] / _MPDFK) - $this->tbrot_x0; 
  28156.                 $ay = (($this->hPt - $v[1]) / _MPDFK) - $this->tbrot_y0; 
  28157.                 if ($this->table_rotate > 1) { // clockwise 
  28158.                     $bx = $this->tbrot_x0 + $xadj - $ay - $h; 
  28159.                     $by = $this->tbrot_y0 + $yadj + $ax; 
  28160.                 } else { 
  28161.                     $bx = $this->tbrot_x0 + $xadj + $ay;
