  28162.                     $by = $this->tbrot_y0 + $yadj - $ax - $w; 
  28163.                 } 
  28164.                 $v[0] = $bx * _MPDFK; 
  28165.                 $v[1] = ($this->h - $by) * _MPDFK; 
  28166.                 $v[2] = $h * _MPDFK; // swap width and height 
  28167.                 $v[3] = $w * _MPDFK; 
  28168.                 $this->PageLinks[$p][] = $v; 
  28169.             } 
  28170.         } 
  28171.         $this->tbrot_Links = array(); 
  28172.         foreach ($this->internallink AS $key => $f) { 
  28173.             if (is_array($f) && isset($f['tbrot'])) { 
  28174.                 $f['Y'] = $this->tbrot_y0; 
  28175.                 $f['PAGE'] = $this->page; 
  28176.                 unset($f['tbrot']); 
  28177.                 $this->internallink[$key] = $f; 
  28178.             } 
  28179.         } 
  28180.         /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  28181.         foreach ($this->tbrot_Annots AS $p => $l) { 
  28182.             foreach ($l AS $v) { 
  28183.                 $ax = abs($v['x']) - $this->tbrot_x0; // abs because -ve values are internally set and held for reference if annotMargin set 
  28184.                 $ay = $v['y'] - $this->tbrot_y0; 
  28185.                 if ($this->table_rotate > 1) { // clockwise 
  28186.                     $bx = $this->tbrot_x0 + $xadj - $ay; 
  28187.                     $by = $this->tbrot_y0 + $yadj + $ax; 
  28188.                 } else { 
  28189.                     $bx = $this->tbrot_x0 + $xadj + $ay; 
  28190.                     $by = $this->tbrot_y0 + $yadj - $ax; 
  28191.                 } 
  28192.                 if ($v['x'] < 0) { 
  28193.                     $v['x'] = -$bx; 
  28194.                 } else { 
  28195.                     $v['x'] = $bx; 
  28196.                 } 
  28197.                 $v['y'] = ($by); 
  28198.                 $this->PageAnnots[$p][] = $v; 
  28199.             } 
  28200.         } 
  28201.         $this->tbrot_Annots = array(); 
  28202.         /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  28203.  
  28204.  
  28205.         /** -- BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  28206.  
  28207.         // Adjust Bookmarks 
  28208.         foreach ($this->tbrot_BMoutlines AS $v) { 
  28209.             $v['y'] = $this->tbrot_y0; 
  28210.             $this->BMoutlines[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'y' => $v['y'], 'p' => $this->page); 
  28211.         } 
  28212.         /** -- END BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  28213.  
  28214.         /** -- TOC -- */ 
  28215.  
  28216.         // Adjust ToC - uses document page number 
  28217.         foreach ($this->tbrot_toc AS $v) { 
  28218.             $this->tocontents->_toc[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'p' => $this->page, 'link' => $v['link'], 'toc_id' => $v['toc_id']); 
  28219.             $this->links[$v['link']][1] = $this->tbrot_y0; 
  28220.         } 
  28221.         /** -- END TOC -- */ 
  28222.  
  28223.  
  28224.  
  28225.         $this->tbrot_BMoutlines = array(); 
  28226.         $this->tbrot_toc = array(); 
  28227.  
  28228.         //Stop Transformation 
  28229.         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StopTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  28230.  
  28231.  
  28232.         $this->y = $this->tbrot_y0 + $this->tbrot_w; 
  28233.         $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  28234.  
  28235.         $this->tablebuffer = ''; 
  28236.     } 
  28237.  
  28238.     //================================================================== 
  28239.     // Keep-with-table This buffers contents of h1-6 to keep on page with table 
  28240.     function printkwtbuffer() 
  28241.     { 
  28242.         if (!$this->kwt_moved) { 
  28243.             foreach ($this->kwt_buffer AS $s) { 
  28244.                 $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s'] . "\n"; 
  28245.             } 
  28246.             foreach ($this->kwt_Links AS $p => $l) { 
  28247.                 foreach ($l AS $v) { 
  28248.                     $this->PageLinks[$p][] = $v; 
  28249.                 } 
  28250.             } 
  28251.             $this->kwt_Links = array(); 
  28252.             /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  28253.             foreach ($this->kwt_Annots AS $p => $l) { 
  28254.                 foreach ($l AS $v) { 
  28255.                     $this->PageAnnots[$p][] = $v; 
  28256.                 } 
  28257.             } 
  28258.             $this->kwt_Annots = array(); 
  28259.             /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  28260.  
  28261.             /** -- INDEX -- */ 
  28262.             // Output Reference (index) 
  28263.             foreach ($this->kwt_Reference AS $v) { 
  28264.                 $Present = 0; 
  28265.                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->Reference); $i++) { 
  28266.                     if ($this->Reference[$i]['t'] == $v['t']) { 
  28267.                         $Present = 1; 
  28268.                         if (!in_array($v['op'], $this->Reference[$i]['p'])) { 
  28269.                             $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $v['op']; 
  28270.                         } 
  28271.                     } 
  28272.                 } 
  28273.                 if ($Present == 0) { 
  28274.                     $this->Reference[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'p' => array($v['op'])); 
  28275.                 } 
  28276.             } 
  28277.             $this->kwt_Reference = array(); 
  28278.             /** -- END INDEX -- */ 
  28279.  
  28280.             /** -- BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  28281.             // Output Bookmarks 
  28282.             foreach ($this->kwt_BMoutlines AS $v) { 
  28283.                 $this->BMoutlines[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'y' => $v['y'], 'p' => $v['p']); 
  28284.             } 
  28285.             $this->kwt_BMoutlines = array(); 
  28286.             /** -- END BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  28287.  
  28288.             /** -- TOC -- */ 
  28289.             // Output ToC 
  28290.             foreach ($this->kwt_toc AS $v) { 
  28291.                 $this->tocontents->_toc[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'p' => $v['p'], 'link' => $v['link'], 'toc_id' => $v['toc_id']); 
  28292.             } 
  28293.             $this->kwt_toc = array(); 
  28294.             /** -- END TOC -- */ 
  28295.  
  28296.             $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); // mPDF 6 
  28297.             return; 
  28298.         } 
  28299.  
  28300.         //Start Transformation 
  28301.         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StartTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  28302.         $xadj = $this->lMargin - $this->kwt_x0; 
  28303.         //$yadj = $this->y - $this->kwt_y0 ; 
  28304.         $yadj = $this->tMargin - $this->kwt_y0; 
  28305.  
  28306.         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->transformTranslate($xadj, $yadj, true) . "\n"; 
  28307.  
  28308.         // Now output the adjusted values 
  28309.         foreach ($this->kwt_buffer AS $s) { 
  28310.             $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s'] . "\n"; 
  28311.         } 
  28312.  
  28313.         // Adjust hyperLinks 
  28314.         foreach ($this->kwt_Links AS $p => $l) { 
  28315.             foreach ($l AS $v) { 
  28316.                 $bx = $this->kwt_x0 + $xadj; 
  28317.                 $by = $this->kwt_y0 + $yadj; 
  28318.                 $v[0] = $bx * _MPDFK; 
  28319.                 $v[1] = ($this->h - $by) * _MPDFK; 
  28320.                 $this->PageLinks[$p][] = $v; 
  28321.             } 
  28322.         } 
  28323.         foreach ($this->internallink AS $key => $f) { 
  28324.             if (is_array($f) && isset($f['kwt'])) { 
  28325.                 $f['Y'] += $yadj; 
  28326.                 $f['PAGE'] = $this->page; 
  28327.                 unset($f['kwt']); 
  28328.                 $this->internallink[$key] = $f; 
  28329.             } 
  28330.         } 
  28331.         /** -- ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  28332.         foreach ($this->kwt_Annots AS $p => $l) { 
  28333.             foreach ($l AS $v) { 
  28334.                 $bx = $this->kwt_x0 + $xadj; 
  28335.                 $by = $this->kwt_y0 + $yadj; 
  28336.                 if ($v['x'] < 0) { 
  28337.                     $v['x'] = -$bx; 
  28338.                 } else { 
  28339.                     $v['x'] = $bx; 
  28340.                 } 
  28341.                 $v['y'] = $by; 
  28342.                 $this->PageAnnots[$p][] = $v; 
  28343.             } 
  28344.         } 
  28345.         /** -- END ANNOTATIONS -- */ 
  28346.  
  28347.         /** -- BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  28348.  
  28349.         // Adjust Bookmarks 
  28350.         foreach ($this->kwt_BMoutlines AS $v) { 
  28351.             if ($v['y'] != 0) { 
  28352.                 $v['y'] += $yadj; 
  28353.             } 
  28354.             $this->BMoutlines[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'y' => $v['y'], 'p' => $this->page); 
  28355.         } 
  28356.         /** -- END BOOKMARKS -- */ 
  28357.  
  28358.         /** -- INDEX -- */ 
  28359.  
  28360.         // Adjust Reference (index) 
  28361.         foreach ($this->kwt_Reference AS $v) { 
  28362.             $Present = 0; 
  28363.             //Search the reference (AND Ref/PageNo) in the array 
  28364.             for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->Reference); $i++) { 
  28365.                 if ($this->Reference[$i]['t'] == $v['t']) { 
  28366.                     $Present = 1; 
  28367.                     if (!in_array($this->page, $this->Reference[$i]['p'])) { 
  28368.                         $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $this->page; 
  28369.                     } 
  28370.                 } 
  28371.             } 
  28372.             if ($Present == 0) { 
  28373.                 $this->Reference[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'p' => array($this->page)); 
  28374.             } 
  28375.         } 
  28376.         /** -- END INDEX -- */ 
  28377.  
  28378.         /** -- TOC -- */ 
  28379.  
  28380.         // Adjust ToC 
  28381.         foreach ($this->kwt_toc AS $v) { 
  28382.             $this->tocontents->_toc[] = array('t' => $v['t'], 'l' => $v['l'], 'p' => $this->page, 'link' => $v['link'], 'toc_id' => $v['toc_id']); 
  28383.             $this->links[$v['link']][0] = $this->page; 
  28384.             $this->links[$v['link']][1] += $yadj; 
  28385.         } 
  28386.         /** -- END TOC -- */ 
  28387.  
  28388.  
  28389.         $this->kwt_Links = array(); 
  28390.         $this->kwt_Annots = array(); 
  28391.  
  28392.         $this->kwt_Reference = array(); 
  28393.         $this->kwt_BMoutlines = array(); 
  28394.         $this->kwt_toc = array(); 
  28395.         //Stop Transformation 
  28396.         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StopTransform(true) . "\n"; 
  28397.  
  28398.         $this->kwt_buffer = array(); 
  28399.  
  28400.         $this->y += $this->kwt_height; 
  28401.         $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array(); // mPDF 6 
  28402.     } 
  28403.  
  28404.     /** -- END TABLES -- */ 
  28405.  
  28406.     //================================================================== 
  28407.  
  28408.     function printfloatbuffer() 
  28409.     { 
  28410.         if (count($this->floatbuffer)) { 
  28411.             $this->objectbuffer = $this->floatbuffer; 
  28412.             $this->printobjectbuffer(false); 
  28413.             $this->objectbuffer = array(); 
  28414.             $this->floatbuffer = array(); 
  28415.             $this->floatmargins = array(); 
  28416.         } 
  28417.     } 
  28418.  
  28419.     //================================================================== 
  28420.     //================================================================== 
  28421.     // Added ELLIPSES and CIRCLES 
  28422.     function Circle($x, $y, $r, $style = 'S') 
  28423.     { 
  28424.         $this->Ellipse($x, $y, $r, $r, $style); 
  28425.     } 
  28426.  
  28427.     function Ellipse($x, $y, $rx, $ry, $style = 'S') 
  28428.     { 
  28429.         if ($style == 'F') { 
  28430.             $op = 'f'; 
  28431.         } elseif ($style == 'FD' or $style == 'DF') { 
  28432.             $op = 'B'; 
  28433.         } else { 
  28434.             $op = 'S'; 
  28435.         } 
  28436.         $lx = 4 / 3 * (M_SQRT2 - 1) * $rx; 
  28437.         $ly = 4 / 3 * (M_SQRT2 - 1) * $ry; 
  28438.         $h = $this->h; 
  28439.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F m %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c', ($x + $rx) * _MPDFK, ($h - $y) * _MPDFK, ($x + $rx) * _MPDFK, ($h - ($y - $ly)) * _MPDFK, ($x + $lx) * _MPDFK, ($h - ($y - $ry)) * _MPDFK, $x * _MPDFK, ($h - ($y - $ry)) * _MPDFK)); 
  28440.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c', ($x - $lx) * _MPDFK, ($h - ($y - $ry)) * _MPDFK, ($x - $rx) * _MPDFK, ($h - ($y - $ly)) * _MPDFK, ($x - $rx) * _MPDFK, ($h - $y) * _MPDFK)); 
  28441.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c', ($x - $rx) * _MPDFK, ($h - ($y + $ly)) * _MPDFK, ($x - $lx) * _MPDFK, ($h - ($y + $ry)) * _MPDFK, $x * _MPDFK, ($h - ($y + $ry)) * _MPDFK)); 
  28442.         $this->_out(sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c %s', ($x + $lx) * _MPDFK, ($h - ($y + $ry)) * _MPDFK, ($x + $rx) * _MPDFK, ($h - ($y + $ly)) * _MPDFK, ($x + $rx) * _MPDFK, ($h - $y) * _MPDFK, $op)); 
  28443.     } 
  28444.  
  28445.     /** -- DIRECTW -- */ 
  28446.  
  28447.     // Added adaptation of shaded_box = AUTOSIZE-TEXT 
  28448.     function AutosizeText($text, $w, $font, $style, $szfont = 72) 
  28449.     { 
  28450.  
  28451.         $text = ' ' . $text . ' '; 
  28452.  
  28453.         $this->SetFont($font, $style, $szfont, false); 
  28454.  
  28455.         $text = $this->purify_utf8_text($text); 
  28456.         if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) { 
  28457.             $text = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($text); 
  28458.         } 
  28459.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  28460.             $text = mb_convert_encoding($text, $this->mb_enc, 'UTF-8'); 
  28461.         } 
  28462.  
  28463.         // DIRECTIONALITY 
  28464.         if (preg_match("/([" . $this->pregRTLchars . "])/u", $text)) { 
  28465.             $this->biDirectional = true; 
  28466.         } // *OTL* 
  28467.  
  28468.         $textvar = 0; 
  28469.         $save_OTLtags = $this->OTLtags; 
  28470.         $this->OTLtags = array(); 
  28471.         if ($this->useKerning) { 
  28472.             if ($this->CurrentFont['haskernGPOS']) { 
  28473.                 $this->OTLtags['Plus'] .= ' kern'; 
  28474.             } else { 
  28475.                 $textvar = ($textvar | FC_KERNING); 
  28476.             } 
  28477.         } 
  28478.  
  28479.         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  28480.         // Use OTL OpenType Table Layout - GSUB & GPOS 
  28481.         if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) { 
  28482.             $text = $this->otl->applyOTL($text, $this->CurrentFont['useOTL']); 
  28483.             $OTLdata = $this->otl->OTLdata; 
  28484.         } 
  28485.         /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  28486.         $this->OTLtags = $save_OTLtags; 
  28487.  
  28488.         $this->magic_reverse_dir($text, $this->directionality, $OTLdata); 
  28489.  
  28490.  
  28491.         $width = $this->ConvertSize($w); 
  28492.         $loop = 0; 
  28493.         while ($loop == 0) { 
  28494.             $this->SetFont($font, $style, $szfont, false); 
  28495.             $sz = $this->GetStringWidth($text, true, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  28496.             if ($sz > $w) { 
  28497.                 $szfont --; 
  28498.             } else { 
  28499.                 $loop ++; 
  28500.             } 
  28501.         } 
  28502.         $this->SetFont($font, $style, $szfont, true, true); 
  28503.         $this->Cell($w, 0, $text, 0, 0, "C", 0, '', 0, 0, 0, 'M', 0, false, $OTLdata, $textvar); 
  28504.     } 
  28505.  
  28506.     /** -- END DIRECTW -- */ 
  28507.  
  28508.     // ==================================================== 
  28509.     // ==================================================== 
  28510.  
  28511.     function magic_reverse_dir(&$chunk, $dir, &$chunkOTLdata) 
  28512.     { 
  28513.         /** -- OTL -- */ 
  28514.         if ($this->usingCoreFont) { 
  28515.             return 0; 
  28516.         } 
  28517.         if ($chunk == '') { 
  28518.             return 0; 
  28519.         } 
  28520.  
  28521.         if ($this->biDirectional || $dir == 'rtl') { 
  28522.             // check if string contains RTL text 
  28523.             // including any added from OTL tables (in PUA) 
  28524.             $pregRTLchars = $this->pregRTLchars; 
  28525.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['rtlPUAstr']) && $this->CurrentFont['rtlPUAstr']) { 
  28526.                 $pregRTLchars .= $this->CurrentFont['rtlPUAstr']; 
  28527.             } 
  28528.             if (!preg_match("/[" . $pregRTLchars . "]/u", $chunk) && $dir != 'rtl') { 
  28529.                 return 0; 
  28530.             }   // Chunk doesn't contain RTL characters 
  28531.  
  28532.             $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($chunk, false); 
  28533.  
  28534.             $is_strong = false; 
  28535.             if (empty($chunkOTLdata)) { 
  28536.                 $this->getBasicOTLdata($chunkOTLdata, $unicode, $is_strong); 
  28537.             } 
  28538.  
  28539.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['useOTL']) && ($this->CurrentFont['useOTL'] & 0x80)) { 
  28540.                 $useGPOS = true; 
  28541.             } else { 
  28542.                 $useGPOS = false; 
  28543.             } 
  28544.  
  28545.             // NB Returned $chunk may be a shorter string (with adjusted $cOTLdata) by removal of LRE, RLE etc embedding codes. 
  28546.             list($chunk, $rtl_content) = $this->otl->_bidiSort($unicode, $chunk, $dir, $chunkOTLdata, $useGPOS); 
  28547.  
  28548.             return $rtl_content; 
  28549.         } 
  28550.         /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  28551.         return 0; 
  28552.     } 
  28553.  
  28554.     /** -- OTL -- */ 
  28555.  
  28556.     function getBasicOTLdata(&$chunkOTLdata, $unicode, &$is_strong) 
  28557.     { 
  28558.         if (!class_exists('otl', false)) { 
  28559.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/otl.php'); 
  28560.         } 
  28561.         if (empty($this->otl)) { 
  28562.             $this->otl = new otl($this); 
  28563.         } 
  28564.         $chunkOTLdata['group'] = ''; 
  28565.         $chunkOTLdata['GPOSinfo'] = array(); 
  28566.         $chunkOTLdata['char_data'] = array(); 
  28567.         foreach ($unicode as $char) { 
  28568.             $ucd_record = UCDN::get_ucd_record($char); 
  28569.             $chunkOTLdata['char_data'][] = array('bidi_class' => $ucd_record[2], 'uni' => $char); 
  28570.             if ($ucd_record[2] == 0 || $ucd_record[2] == 3 || $ucd_record[2] == 4) { 
  28571.                 $is_strong = true; 
  28572.             } // contains strong character 
  28573.             if ($ucd_record[0] == UCDN::UNICODE_GENERAL_CATEGORY_NON_SPACING_MARK) { 
  28574.                 $chunkOTLdata['group'] .= 'M'; 
  28575.             } elseif ($char == 32 || $char == 12288) { 
  28576.                 $chunkOTLdata['group'] .= 'S'; 
  28577.             } else { 
  28578.                 $chunkOTLdata['group'] .= 'C'; 
  28579.             } 
  28580.         } 
  28581.     } 
  28582.  
  28583.     function _setBidiCodes($mode = 'start', $bdf) 
  28584.     { 
  28585.         $s = ''; 
  28586.         if ($mode == 'end') { 
  28587.             // PDF comes before PDI to close isolate-override (e.g. "LRILROPDFPDI") 
  28588.             if (strpos($bdf, 'PDF') !== false) { 
  28589.                 $s .= code2utf(0x202C); 
  28590.             } // POP DIRECTIONAL FORMATTING 
  28591.             if (strpos($bdf, 'PDI') !== false) { 
  28592.                 $s .= code2utf(0x2069); 
  28593.             } // POP DIRECTIONAL ISOLATE 
  28594.         } elseif ($mode == 'start') { 
  28595.             // LRI comes before LRO to open isolate-override (e.g. "LRILROPDFPDI") 
  28596.             if (strpos($bdf, 'LRI') !== false) { 
  28597.                 $s .= code2utf(0x2066); 
  28598.             } // U+2066 LRI 
  28599.             elseif (strpos($bdf, 'RLI') !== false) { 
  28600.                 $s .= code2utf(0x2067); 
  28601.             } // U+2067 RLI 
  28602.             elseif (strpos($bdf, 'FSI') !== false) { 
  28603.                 $s .= code2utf(0x2068); 
  28604.             } // U+2068 FSI 
  28605.             if (strpos($bdf, 'LRO') !== false) { 
  28606.                 $s .= code2utf(0x202D); 
  28607.             } // U+202D LRO 
  28608.             elseif (strpos($bdf, 'RLO') !== false) { 
  28609.                 $s .= code2utf(0x202E); 
  28610.             } // U+202E RLO 
  28611.             elseif (strpos($bdf, 'LRE') !== false) { 
  28612.                 $s .= code2utf(0x202A); 
  28613.             } // U+202A LRE 
  28614.             elseif (strpos($bdf, 'RLE') !== false) { 
  28615.                 $s .= code2utf(0x202B); 
  28616.             } // U+202B RLE 
  28617.         } 
  28618.         return $s; 
  28619.     } 
  28620.  
  28621.     /** -- END OTL -- */ 
  28622.  
  28623.     // 
  28624.     // **************************** 
  28625.     // **************************** 
  28626.  
  28627.  
  28628.     function SetSubstitutions() 
  28629.     { 
  28630.         $subsarray = array(); 
  28631.         @include(_MPDF_PATH . 'includes/subs_win-1252.php'); 
  28632.         $this->substitute = array(); 
  28633.         foreach ($subsarray AS $key => $val) { 
  28634.             $this->substitute[code2utf($key)] = $val; 
  28635.         } 
  28636.     } 
  28637.  
  28638.     function SubstituteChars($html) 
  28639.     { 
  28640.         // only substitute characters between tags 
  28641.         if (count($this->substitute)) { 
  28642.             $a = preg_split('/(<.*?>)/ms', $html, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE); 
  28643.             $html = ''; 
  28644.             foreach ($a as $i => $e) { 
  28645.                 if ($i % 2 == 0) { 
  28646.                     $e = strtr($e, $this->substitute); 
  28647.                 } 
  28648.                 $html .= $e; 
  28649.             } 
  28650.         } 
  28651.         return $html; 
  28652.     } 
  28653.  
  28654.     function SubstituteCharsSIP(&$writehtml_a, &$writehtml_i, &$writehtml_e) 
  28655.     { 
  28656.         if (preg_match("/^(.*?)([\x{20000}-\x{2FFFF}]+)(.*)/u", $writehtml_e, $m)) { 
  28657.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['sipext']) && $this->CurrentFont['sipext']) { 
  28658.                 $font = $this->CurrentFont['sipext']; 
  28659.                 if (!in_array($font, $this->available_unifonts)) { 
  28660.                     return 0; 
  28661.                 } 
  28662.                 $writehtml_a[$writehtml_i] = $writehtml_e = $m[1]; 
  28663.                 array_splice($writehtml_a, $writehtml_i + 1, 0, array('span style="font-family: ' . $font . '"', $m[2], '/span', $m[3])); 
  28664.                 $this->subPos = $writehtml_i; 
  28665.                 return 4; 
  28666.             } 
  28667.         } 
  28668.         return 0; 
  28669.     } 
  28670.  
  28671.     // If core font is selected in document which is not onlyCoreFonts - substitute with non-core font 
  28672.     function SubstituteCharsNonCore(&$writehtml_a, &$writehtml_i, &$writehtml_e) 
  28673.     { 
  28674.         // Ignore if in Textarea 
  28675.         if ($writehtml_i > 0 && strtolower(substr($writehtml_a[$writehtml_i - 1], 0, 8)) == 'textarea') { 
  28676.             return 0; 
  28677.         } 
  28678.         if (mb_convert_encoding(mb_convert_encoding($writehtml_e, $this->mb_enc, "UTF-8"), "UTF-8", $this->mb_enc) == $writehtml_e) { 
  28679.             return 0; 
  28680.         } 
  28681.         $cw = &$this->CurrentFont['cw']; 
  28682.         $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($writehtml_e, false); 
  28683.         $start = -1; 
  28684.         $end = 0; 
  28685.         $flag = 0; 
  28686.         $ftype = ''; 
  28687.         $u = array(); 
  28688.         if (!$this->subArrMB) { 
  28689.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'includes/subs_core.php'); 
  28690.             $this->subArrMB['a'] = $aarr; 
  28691.             $this->subArrMB['s'] = $sarr; 
  28692.             $this->subArrMB['z'] = $zarr; 
  28693.         } 
  28694.         foreach ($unicode AS $c => $char) { 
  28695.             if (($char > 127 || ($flag == 1 && $char == 32)) && $char != 173 && (!isset($this->subArrMB['a'][$char]) || ($flag == 1 && $char == 32)) && ($char < 1536 || ($char > 1791 && $char < 2304) || $char > 3455)) { 
  28696.                 if ($flag == 0) { 
  28697.                     $start = $c; 
  28698.                 } 
  28699.                 $flag = 1; 
  28700.                 $u[] = $char; 
  28701.             } elseif ($flag > 0) { 
  28702.                 $end = $c - 1; 
  28703.                 break; 
  28704.             } 
  28705.         } 
  28706.         if ($flag > 0 && !$end) { 
  28707.             $end = count($unicode) - 1; 
  28708.         } 
  28709.         if ($start == -1) { 
  28710.             return 0; 
  28711.         } 
  28712.         // TRY IN BACKUP SUBS FONT 
  28713.         if (!is_array($this->backupSubsFont)) { 
  28714.             $this->backupSubsFont = array("$this->backupSubsFont"); 
  28715.         } 
  28716.         foreach ($this->backupSubsFont AS $bsfctr => $bsf) { 
  28717.             if ($this->fonttrans[$bsf] == 'chelvetica' || $this->fonttrans[$bsf] == 'ctimes' || $this->fonttrans[$bsf] == 'ccourier') { 
  28718.                 continue; 
  28719.             } 
  28720.             $font = $bsf; 
  28721.             unset($cw); 
  28722.             $cw = ''; 
  28723.             if (isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  28724.                 $cw = &$this->fonts[$font]['cw']; 
  28725.             } elseif (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat')) { 
  28726.                 $cw = @file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat'); 
  28727.             } else { 
  28728.  
  28729.                 $prevFontFamily = $this->FontFamily; 
  28730.                 $prevFontStyle = $this->currentfontstyle; 
  28731.                 $prevFontSizePt = $this->FontSizePt; 
  28732.                 $this->SetFont($bsf, '', '', false); 
  28733.                 $cw = @file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat'); 
  28734.                 $this->SetFont($prevFontFamily, $prevFontStyle, $prevFontSizePt, false); 
  28735.             } 
  28736.             if (!$cw) { 
  28737.                 continue; 
  28738.             } 
  28739.             $l = 0; 
  28740.             foreach ($u AS $char) { 
  28741.                 if ($char == 173 || $this->_charDefined($cw, $char) || ($char > 1536 && $char < 1791) || ($char > 2304 && $char < 3455 )) { 
  28742.                     $l++; 
  28743.                 } else { 
  28744.                     if ($l == 0 && $bsfctr == (count($this->backupSubsFont) - 1)) { // Not found even in last backup font 
  28745.                         $cont = mb_substr($writehtml_e, $start + 1); 
  28746.                         $writehtml_e = mb_substr($writehtml_e, 0, $start + 1, 'UTF-8'); 
  28747.                         array_splice($writehtml_a, $writehtml_i + 1, 0, array('', $cont)); 
  28748.                         $this->subPos = $writehtml_i + 1; 
  28749.                         return 2; 
  28750.                     } else { 
  28751.                         break; 
  28752.                     } 
  28753.                 } 
  28754.             } 
  28755.             if ($l > 0) { 
  28756.                 $patt = mb_substr($writehtml_e, $start, $l, 'UTF-8'); 
  28757.                 if (preg_match("/(.*?)(" . preg_quote($patt, '/') . ")(.*)/u", $writehtml_e, $m)) { 
  28758.                     $writehtml_e = $m[1]; 
  28759.                     array_splice($writehtml_a, $writehtml_i + 1, 0, array('span style="font-family: ' . $font . '"', $m[2], '/span', $m[3])); 
  28760.                     $this->subPos = $writehtml_i + 3; 
  28761.                     return 4; 
  28762.                 } 
  28763.             } 
  28764.         } 
  28765.  
  28766.         unset($cw); 
  28767.         return 0; 
  28768.     } 
  28769.  
  28770.     function SubstituteCharsMB(&$writehtml_a, &$writehtml_i, &$writehtml_e) 
  28771.     { 
  28772.         // Ignore if in Textarea 
  28773.         if ($writehtml_i > 0 && strtolower(substr($writehtml_a[$writehtml_i - 1], 0, 8)) == 'textarea') { 
  28774.             return 0; 
  28775.         } 
  28776.         $cw = &$this->CurrentFont['cw']; 
  28777.         $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($writehtml_e, false); 
  28778.         $start = -1; 
  28779.         $end = 0; 
  28780.         $flag = 0; 
  28781.         $ftype = ''; 
  28782.         $u = array(); 
  28783.         foreach ($unicode AS $c => $char) { 
  28784.             if (($flag == 0 || $flag == 2) && (!$this->_charDefined($cw, $char) || ($flag == 2 && $char == 32)) && $this->checkSIP && $char > 131071) {  // Unicode Plane 2 (SIP) 
  28785.                 if (in_array($this->FontFamily, $this->available_CJK_fonts)) { 
  28786.                     return 0; 
  28787.                 } 
  28788.                 if ($flag == 0) { 
  28789.                     $start = $c; 
  28790.                 } 
  28791.                 $flag = 2; 
  28792.                 $u[] = $char; 
  28793.             } 
  28794.             //elseif (($flag == 0 || $flag==1) && $char != 173 && !$this->_charDefined($cw, $char) && ($char<1423 ||  ($char>3583 && $char < 11263))) { 
  28795.             elseif (($flag == 0 || $flag == 1) && $char != 173 && (!$this->_charDefined($cw, $char) || ($flag == 1 && $char == 32)) && ($char < 1536 || ($char > 1791 && $char < 2304) || $char > 3455)) { 
  28796.                 if ($flag == 0) { 
  28797.                     $start = $c; 
  28798.                 } 
  28799.                 $flag = 1; 
  28800.                 $u[] = $char; 
  28801.             } elseif ($flag > 0) { 
  28802.                 $end = $c - 1; 
  28803.                 break; 
  28804.             } 
  28805.         } 
  28806.         if ($flag > 0 && !$end) { 
  28807.             $end = count($unicode) - 1; 
  28808.         } 
  28809.         if ($start == -1) { 
  28810.             return 0; 
  28811.         } 
  28812.         if ($flag == 2) {  // SIP 
  28813.             // Check if current CJK font has a ext-B related font 
  28814.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['sipext']) && $this->CurrentFont['sipext']) { 
  28815.                 $font = $this->CurrentFont['sipext']; 
  28816.                 unset($cw); 
  28817.                 $cw = ''; 
  28818.                 if (isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  28819.                     $cw = &$this->fonts[$font]['cw']; 
  28820.                 } elseif (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat')) { 
  28821.                     $cw = @file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat'); 
  28822.                 } else { 
  28823.                     $prevFontFamily = $this->FontFamily; 
  28824.                     $prevFontStyle = $this->currentfontstyle; 
  28825.                     $prevFontSizePt = $this->FontSizePt; 
  28826.                     $this->SetFont($font, '', '', false); 
  28827.                     $cw = @file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat'); 
  28828.                     $this->SetFont($prevFontFamily, $prevFontStyle, $prevFontSizePt, false); 
  28829.                 } 
  28830.                 if (!$cw) { 
  28831.                     return 0; 
  28832.                 } 
  28833.                 $l = 0; 
  28834.                 foreach ($u AS $char) { 
  28835.                     if ($this->_charDefined($cw, $char) || $char > 131071) { 
  28836.                         $l++; 
  28837.                     } else { 
  28838.                         break; 
  28839.                     } 
  28840.                 } 
  28841.                 if ($l > 0) { 
  28842.                     $patt = mb_substr($writehtml_e, $start, $l); 
  28843.                     if (preg_match("/(.*?)(" . preg_quote($patt, '/') . ")(.*)/u", $writehtml_e, $m)) { 
  28844.                         $writehtml_e = $m[1]; 
  28845.                         array_splice($writehtml_a, $writehtml_i + 1, 0, array('span style="font-family: ' . $font . '"', $m[2], '/span', $m[3])); 
  28846.                         $this->subPos = $writehtml_i + 3; 
  28847.                         return 4; 
  28848.                     } 
  28849.                 } 
  28850.             } 
  28851.             // Check Backup SIP font (defined in config_fonts.php) 
  28852.             if (isset($this->backupSIPFont) && $this->backupSIPFont) { 
  28853.                 if ($this->currentfontfamily != $this->backupSIPFont) { 
  28854.                     $font = $this->backupSIPFont; 
  28855.                 } else { 
  28856.                     unset($cw); 
  28857.                     return 0; 
  28858.                 } 
  28859.                 unset($cw); 
  28860.                 $cw = ''; 
  28861.                 if (isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  28862.                     $cw = &$this->fonts[$font]['cw']; 
  28863.                 } elseif (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat')) { 
  28864.                     $cw = @file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat'); 
  28865.                 } else { 
  28866.                     $prevFontFamily = $this->FontFamily; 
  28867.                     $prevFontStyle = $this->currentfontstyle; 
  28868.                     $prevFontSizePt = $this->FontSizePt; 
  28869.                     $this->SetFont($this->backupSIPFont, '', '', false); 
  28870.                     $cw = @file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat'); 
  28871.                     $this->SetFont($prevFontFamily, $prevFontStyle, $prevFontSizePt, false); 
  28872.                 } 
  28873.                 if (!$cw) { 
  28874.                     return 0; 
  28875.                 } 
  28876.                 $l = 0; 
  28877.                 foreach ($u AS $char) { 
  28878.                     if ($this->_charDefined($cw, $char) || $char > 131071) { 
  28879.                         $l++; 
  28880.                     } else { 
  28881.                         break; 
  28882.                     } 
  28883.                 } 
  28884.                 if ($l > 0) { 
  28885.                     $patt = mb_substr($writehtml_e, $start, $l); 
  28886.                     if (preg_match("/(.*?)(" . preg_quote($patt, '/') . ")(.*)/u", $writehtml_e, $m)) { 
  28887.                         $writehtml_e = $m[1]; 
  28888.                         array_splice($writehtml_a, $writehtml_i + 1, 0, array('span style="font-family: ' . $font . '"', $m[2], '/span', $m[3])); 
  28889.                         $this->subPos = $writehtml_i + 3; 
  28890.                         return 4; 
  28891.                     } 
  28892.                 } 
  28893.             } 
  28894.             return 0; 
  28895.         } 
  28896.  
  28897.  
  28898.         // FIRST TRY CORE FONTS (when appropriate) 
  28899.         if (!$this->PDFA && !$this->PDFX && !$this->biDirectional) {  // mPDF 6 
  28900.             $repl = array(); 
  28901.             if (!$this->subArrMB) { 
  28902.                 include(_MPDF_PATH . 'includes/subs_core.php'); 
  28903.                 $this->subArrMB['a'] = $aarr; 
  28904.                 $this->subArrMB['s'] = $sarr; 
  28905.                 $this->subArrMB['z'] = $zarr; 
  28906.             } 
  28907.             if (isset($this->subArrMB['a'][$u[0]])) { 
  28908.                 $font = 'tta'; 
  28909.                 $ftype = 'C'; 
  28910.                 foreach ($u AS $char) { 
  28911.                     if (isset($this->subArrMB['a'][$char])) { 
  28912.                         $repl[] = $this->subArrMB['a'][$char]; 
  28913.                     } else { 
  28914.                         break; 
  28915.                     } 
  28916.                 } 
  28917.             } elseif (isset($this->subArrMB['z'][$u[0]])) { 
  28918.                 $font = 'ttz'; 
  28919.                 $ftype = 'C'; 
  28920.                 foreach ($u AS $char) { 
  28921.                     if (isset($this->subArrMB['z'][$char])) { 
  28922.                         $repl[] = $this->subArrMB['z'][$char]; 
  28923.                     } else { 
  28924.                         break; 
  28925.                     } 
  28926.                 } 
  28927.             } elseif (isset($this->subArrMB['s'][$u[0]])) { 
  28928.                 $font = 'tts'; 
  28929.                 $ftype = 'C'; 
  28930.                 foreach ($u AS $char) { 
  28931.                     if (isset($this->subArrMB['s'][$char])) { 
  28932.                         $repl[] = $this->subArrMB['s'][$char]; 
  28933.                     } else { 
  28934.                         break; 
  28935.                     } 
  28936.                 } 
  28937.             } 
  28938.             if ($ftype == 'C') { 
  28939.                 $patt = mb_substr($writehtml_e, $start, count($repl)); 
  28940.                 if (preg_match("/(.*?)(" . preg_quote($patt, '/') . ")(.*)/u", $writehtml_e, $m)) { 
  28941.                     $writehtml_e = $m[1]; 
  28942.                     array_splice($writehtml_a, $writehtml_i + 1, 0, array($font, implode('|', $repl), '/' . $font, $m[3])); // e.g. <tts> 
  28943.                     $this->subPos = $writehtml_i + 3; 
  28944.                     return 4; 
  28945.                 } 
  28946.                 return 0; 
  28947.             } 
  28948.         } 
  28949.  
  28950.         // LASTLY TRY IN BACKUP SUBS FONT 
  28951.         if (!is_array($this->backupSubsFont)) { 
  28952.             $this->backupSubsFont = array("$this->backupSubsFont"); 
  28953.         } 
  28954.         foreach ($this->backupSubsFont AS $bsfctr => $bsf) { 
  28955.             if ($this->currentfontfamily != $bsf) { 
  28956.                 $font = $bsf; 
  28957.             } else { 
  28958.                 continue; 
  28959.             } 
  28960.             unset($cw); 
  28961.             $cw = ''; 
  28962.             if (isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  28963.                 $cw = &$this->fonts[$font]['cw']; 
  28964.             } elseif (file_exists(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat')) { 
  28965.                 $cw = @file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat'); 
  28966.             } else { 
  28967.                 $prevFontFamily = $this->FontFamily; 
  28968.                 $prevFontStyle = $this->currentfontstyle; 
  28969.                 $prevFontSizePt = $this->FontSizePt; 
  28970.                 $this->SetFont($bsf, '', '', false); 
  28971.                 $cw = @file_get_contents(_MPDF_TTFONTDATAPATH . $font . '.cw.dat'); 
  28972.                 $this->SetFont($prevFontFamily, $prevFontStyle, $prevFontSizePt, false); 
  28973.             } 
  28974.             if (!$cw) { 
  28975.                 continue; 
  28976.             } 
  28977.             $l = 0; 
  28978.             foreach ($u AS $char) { 
  28979.                 if ($char == 173 || $this->_charDefined($cw, $char) || ($char > 1536 && $char < 1791) || ($char > 2304 && $char < 3455 )) {  // Arabic and Indic 
  28980.                     $l++; 
  28981.                 } else { 
  28982.                     if ($l == 0 && $bsfctr == (count($this->backupSubsFont) - 1)) { // Not found even in last backup font 
  28983.                         $cont = mb_substr($writehtml_e, $start + 1); 
  28984.                         $writehtml_e = mb_substr($writehtml_e, 0, $start + 1); 
  28985.                         array_splice($writehtml_a, $writehtml_i + 1, 0, array('', $cont)); 
  28986.                         $this->subPos = $writehtml_i + 1; 
  28987.                         return 2; 
  28988.                     } else { 
  28989.                         break; 
  28990.                     } 
  28991.                 } 
  28992.             } 
  28993.             if ($l > 0) { 
  28994.                 $patt = mb_substr($writehtml_e, $start, $l); 
  28995.                 if (preg_match("/(.*?)(" . preg_quote($patt, '/') . ")(.*)/u", $writehtml_e, $m)) { 
  28996.                     $writehtml_e = $m[1]; 
  28997.                     array_splice($writehtml_a, $writehtml_i + 1, 0, array('span style="font-family: ' . $font . '"', $m[2], '/span', $m[3])); 
  28998.                     $this->subPos = $writehtml_i + 3; 
  28999.                     return 4; 
  29000.                 } 
  29001.             } 
  29002.         } 
  29003.  
  29004.         unset($cw); 
  29005.         return 0; 
  29006.     } 
  29007.  
  29008.     function setHiEntitySubstitutions() 
  29009.     { 
  29010.         $entarr = array( 
  29011.             'nbsp' => '160', 'iexcl' => '161', 'cent' => '162', 'pound' => '163', 'curren' => '164', 'yen' => '165', 'brvbar' => '166', 'sect' => '167',  
  29012.             'uml' => '168', 'copy' => '169', 'ordf' => '170', 'laquo' => '171', 'not' => '172', 'shy' => '173', 'reg' => '174', 'macr' => '175',  
  29013.             'deg' => '176', 'plusmn' => '177', 'sup2' => '178', 'sup3' => '179', 'acute' => '180', 'micro' => '181', 'para' => '182', 'middot' => '183',  
  29014.             'cedil' => '184', 'sup1' => '185', 'ordm' => '186', 'raquo' => '187', 'frac14' => '188', 'frac12' => '189', 'frac34' => '190',  
  29015.             'iquest' => '191', 'Agrave' => '192', 'Aacute' => '193', 'Acirc' => '194', 'Atilde' => '195', 'Auml' => '196', 'Aring' => '197',  
  29016.             'AElig' => '198', 'Ccedil' => '199', 'Egrave' => '200', 'Eacute' => '201', 'Ecirc' => '202', 'Euml' => '203', 'Igrave' => '204',  
  29017.             'Iacute' => '205', 'Icirc' => '206', 'Iuml' => '207', 'ETH' => '208', 'Ntilde' => '209', 'Ograve' => '210', 'Oacute' => '211',  
  29018.             'Ocirc' => '212', 'Otilde' => '213', 'Ouml' => '214', 'times' => '215', 'Oslash' => '216', 'Ugrave' => '217', 'Uacute' => '218',  
  29019.             'Ucirc' => '219', 'Uuml' => '220', 'Yacute' => '221', 'THORN' => '222', 'szlig' => '223', 'agrave' => '224', 'aacute' => '225',  
  29020.             'acirc' => '226', 'atilde' => '227', 'auml' => '228', 'aring' => '229', 'aelig' => '230', 'ccedil' => '231', 'egrave' => '232',  
  29021.             'eacute' => '233', 'ecirc' => '234', 'euml' => '235', 'igrave' => '236', 'iacute' => '237', 'icirc' => '238', 'iuml' => '239',  
  29022.             'eth' => '240', 'ntilde' => '241', 'ograve' => '242', 'oacute' => '243', 'ocirc' => '244', 'otilde' => '245', 'ouml' => '246',  
  29023.             'divide' => '247', 'oslash' => '248', 'ugrave' => '249', 'uacute' => '250', 'ucirc' => '251', 'uuml' => '252', 'yacute' => '253',  
  29024.             'thorn' => '254', 'yuml' => '255', 'OElig' => '338', 'oelig' => '339', 'Scaron' => '352', 'scaron' => '353', 'Yuml' => '376',  
  29025.             'fnof' => '402', 'circ' => '710', 'tilde' => '732', 'Alpha' => '913', 'Beta' => '914', 'Gamma' => '915', 'Delta' => '916',  
  29026.             'Epsilon' => '917', 'Zeta' => '918', 'Eta' => '919', 'Theta' => '920', 'Iota' => '921', 'Kappa' => '922', 'Lambda' => '923',  
  29027.             'Mu' => '924', 'Nu' => '925', 'Xi' => '926', 'Omicron' => '927', 'Pi' => '928', 'Rho' => '929', 'Sigma' => '931', 'Tau' => '932',  
  29028.             'Upsilon' => '933', 'Phi' => '934', 'Chi' => '935', 'Psi' => '936', 'Omega' => '937', 'alpha' => '945', 'beta' => '946', 'gamma' => '947',  
  29029.             'delta' => '948', 'epsilon' => '949', 'zeta' => '950', 'eta' => '951', 'theta' => '952', 'iota' => '953', 'kappa' => '954',  
  29030.             'lambda' => '955', 'mu' => '956', 'nu' => '957', 'xi' => '958', 'omicron' => '959', 'pi' => '960', 'rho' => '961', 'sigmaf' => '962',  
  29031.             'sigma' => '963', 'tau' => '964', 'upsilon' => '965', 'phi' => '966', 'chi' => '967', 'psi' => '968', 'omega' => '969',  
  29032.             'thetasym' => '977', 'upsih' => '978', 'piv' => '982', 'ensp' => '8194', 'emsp' => '8195', 'thinsp' => '8201', 'zwnj' => '8204',  
  29033.             'zwj' => '8205', 'lrm' => '8206', 'rlm' => '8207', 'ndash' => '8211', 'mdash' => '8212', 'lsquo' => '8216', 'rsquo' => '8217',  
  29034.             'sbquo' => '8218', 'ldquo' => '8220', 'rdquo' => '8221', 'bdquo' => '8222', 'dagger' => '8224', 'Dagger' => '8225', 'bull' => '8226',  
  29035.             'hellip' => '8230', 'permil' => '8240', 'prime' => '8242', 'Prime' => '8243', 'lsaquo' => '8249', 'rsaquo' => '8250', 'oline' => '8254',  
  29036.             'frasl' => '8260', 'euro' => '8364', 'image' => '8465', 'weierp' => '8472', 'real' => '8476', 'trade' => '8482', 'alefsym' => '8501',  
  29037.             'larr' => '8592', 'uarr' => '8593', 'rarr' => '8594', 'darr' => '8595', 'harr' => '8596', 'crarr' => '8629', 'lArr' => '8656',  
  29038.             'uArr' => '8657', 'rArr' => '8658', 'dArr' => '8659', 'hArr' => '8660', 'forall' => '8704', 'part' => '8706', 'exist' => '8707',  
  29039.             'empty' => '8709', 'nabla' => '8711', 'isin' => '8712', 'notin' => '8713', 'ni' => '8715', 'prod' => '8719', 'sum' => '8721',  
  29040.             'minus' => '8722', 'lowast' => '8727', 'radic' => '8730', 'prop' => '8733', 'infin' => '8734', 'ang' => '8736', 'and' => '8743',  
  29041.             'or' => '8744', 'cap' => '8745', 'cup' => '8746', 'int' => '8747', 'there4' => '8756', 'sim' => '8764', 'cong' => '8773',  
  29042.             'asymp' => '8776', 'ne' => '8800', 'equiv' => '8801', 'le' => '8804', 'ge' => '8805', 'sub' => '8834', 'sup' => '8835', 'nsub' => '8836',  
  29043.             'sube' => '8838', 'supe' => '8839', 'oplus' => '8853', 'otimes' => '8855', 'perp' => '8869', 'sdot' => '8901', 'lceil' => '8968',  
  29044.             'rceil' => '8969', 'lfloor' => '8970', 'rfloor' => '8971', 'lang' => '9001', 'rang' => '9002', 'loz' => '9674', 'spades' => '9824',  
  29045.             'clubs' => '9827', 'hearts' => '9829', 'diams' => '9830',  
  29046.  ); 
  29047.         foreach ($entarr AS $key => $val) { 
  29048.             $this->entsearch[] = '&' . $key . ';'; 
  29049.             $this->entsubstitute[] = code2utf($val); 
  29050.         } 
  29051.     } 
  29052.  
  29053.     function SubstituteHiEntities($html) 
  29054.     { 
  29055.         // converts html_entities > ASCII 127 to unicode 
  29056.         // Leaves in particular < to distinguish from tag marker 
  29057.         if (count($this->entsearch)) { 
  29058.             $html = str_replace($this->entsearch, $this->entsubstitute, $html); 
  29059.         } 
  29060.         return $html; 
  29061.     } 
  29062.  
  29063.     // Edited v1.2 Pass by reference; option to continue if invalid UTF-8 chars 
  29064.     function is_utf8(&$string) 
  29065.     { 
  29066.         if ($string === mb_convert_encoding(mb_convert_encoding($string, "UTF-32", "UTF-8"), "UTF-8", "UTF-32")) { 
  29067.             return true; 
  29068.         } else { 
  29069.             if ($this->ignore_invalid_utf8) { 
  29070.                 $string = mb_convert_encoding(mb_convert_encoding($string, "UTF-32", "UTF-8"), "UTF-8", "UTF-32"); 
  29071.                 return true; 
  29072.             } else { 
  29073.                 return false; 
  29074.             } 
  29075.         } 
  29076.     } 
  29077.  
  29078.     function purify_utf8($html, $lo = true) 
  29079.     { 
  29080.         // For HTML 
  29081.         // Checks string is valid UTF-8 encoded 
  29082.         // converts html_entities > ASCII 127 to UTF-8 
  29083.         // Only exception - leaves low ASCII entities e.g. < & etc. 
  29084.         // Leaves in particular < to distinguish from tag marker 
  29085.         if (!$this->is_utf8($html)) { 
  29086.             echo "<p><b>HTML contains invalid UTF-8 character(s)</b></p>"; 
  29087.             while (mb_convert_encoding(mb_convert_encoding($html, "UTF-32", "UTF-8"), "UTF-8", "UTF-32") != $html) { 
  29088.                 $a = iconv('UTF-8', 'UTF-8', $html); 
  29089.                 echo ($a); 
  29090.                 $pos = $start = strlen($a); 
  29091.                 $err = ''; 
  29092.                 while (ord(substr($html, $pos, 1)) > 128) { 
  29093.                     $err .= '[[#' . ord(substr($html, $pos, 1)) . ']]'; 
  29094.                     $pos++; 
  29095.                 } 
  29096.                 echo '<span style="color:red; font-weight:bold">' . $err . '</span>'; 
  29097.                 $html = substr($html, $pos); 
  29098.             } 
  29099.             echo $html; 
  29100.             throw new MpdfException(""); 
  29101.         } 
  29102.         $html = preg_replace("/\r/", "", $html); 
  29103.  
  29104.         // converts html_entities > ASCII 127 to UTF-8 
  29105.         // Leaves in particular < to distinguish from tag marker 
  29106.         $html = $this->SubstituteHiEntities($html); 
  29107.  
  29108.         // converts all &#nnn; or &#xHHH; to UTF-8 multibyte 
  29109.         // If $lo==true then includes ASCII < 128 
  29110.         $html = strcode2utf($html, $lo); 
  29111.         return ($html); 
  29112.     } 
  29113.  
  29114.     function purify_utf8_text($txt) 
  29115.     { 
  29116.         // For TEXT 
  29117.         // Make sure UTF-8 string of characters 
  29118.         if (!$this->is_utf8($txt)) { 
  29119.             throw new MpdfException("Text contains invalid UTF-8 character(s)"); 
  29120.         } 
  29121.  
  29122.         $txt = preg_replace("/\r/", "", $txt); 
  29123.  
  29124.         return ($txt); 
  29125.     } 
  29126.  
  29127.     function all_entities_to_utf8($txt) 
  29128.     { 
  29129.         // converts txt_entities > ASCII 127 to UTF-8 
  29130.         // Leaves in particular < to distinguish from tag marker 
  29131.         $txt = $this->SubstituteHiEntities($txt); 
  29132.  
  29133.         // converts all &#nnn; or &#xHHH; to UTF-8 multibyte 
  29134.         $txt = strcode2utf($txt); 
  29135.  
  29136.         $txt = $this->lesser_entity_decode($txt); 
  29137.         return ($txt); 
  29138.     } 
  29139.  
  29140.     // ==================================================== 
  29141.         /** -- BARCODES -- */ 
  29142.     // UPC/EAN barcode 
  29143.     // EAN13, EAN8, UPCA, UPCE, ISBN, ISSN 
  29144.     // Accepts 12 or 13 digits with or without - hyphens 
  29145.     function WriteBarcode($code, $showtext = 1, $x = '', $y = '', $size = 1, $border = 0, $paddingL = 1, $paddingR = 1, $paddingT = 2, $paddingB = 2, $height = 1, $bgcol = false, $col = false, $btype = 'ISBN', $supplement = '0', $supplement_code = '', $k = 1) 
  29146.     { 
  29147.         if (empty($code)) { 
  29148.             return; 
  29149.         } 
  29150.         $codestr = $code; 
  29151.         $code = preg_replace('/\-/', '', $code); 
  29152.  
  29153.         if (!class_exists('PDFBarcode', false)) { 
  29154.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/barcode.php'); 
  29155.         } 
  29156.         $this->barcode = new PDFBarcode(); 
  29157.         if ($btype == 'ISSN' || $btype == 'ISBN') { 
  29158.             $arrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($code, 'EAN13'); 
  29159.         } else { 
  29160.             $arrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($code, $btype); 
  29161.         } 
  29162.  
  29163.         if ($arrcode === false) { 
  29164.             throw new MpdfException('Error in barcode string: ' . $codestr); 
  29165.         } 
  29166.         if ((($btype == 'EAN13' || $btype == 'ISBN' || $btype == 'ISSN') && strlen($code) == 12) || ($btype == 'UPCA' && strlen($code) == 11) || ($btype == 'UPCE' && strlen($code) == 11) || ($btype == 'EAN8' && strlen($code) == 7)) { 
  29167.             $code .= $arrcode['checkdigit']; 
  29168.             if (stristr($codestr, '-')) { 
  29169.                 $codestr .= '-' . $arrcode['checkdigit']; 
  29170.             } else { 
  29171.                 $codestr .= $arrcode['checkdigit']; 
  29172.             } 
  29173.         } 
  29174.         if ($btype == 'ISBN') { 
  29175.             $codestr = 'ISBN ' . $codestr; 
  29176.         } 
  29177.         if ($btype == 'ISSN') { 
  29178.             $codestr = 'ISSN ' . $codestr; 
  29179.         } 
  29180.  
  29181.         if (empty($x)) { 
  29182.             $x = $this->x; 
  29183.         } 
  29184.         if (empty($y)) { 
  29185.             $y = $this->y; 
  29186.         } 
  29187.         // set foreground color 
  29188.         $prevDrawColor = $this->DrawColor; 
  29189.         $prevTextColor = $this->TextColor; 
  29190.         $prevFillColor = $this->FillColor; 
  29191.         $lw = $this->LineWidth; 
  29192.         $this->SetLineWidth(0.01); 
  29193.  
  29194.         $size /= $k; // in case resized in a table 
  29195.  
  29196.         $xres = $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size; 
  29197.         $llm = $arrcode['lightmL'] * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size; // Left Light margin 
  29198.         $rlm = $arrcode['lightmR'] * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size; // Right Light margin 
  29199.  
  29200.         $bcw = ($arrcode["maxw"] * $xres); // Barcode width = Should always be 31.35mm * $size 
  29201.  
  29202.         $fbw = $bcw + $llm + $rlm; // Full barcode width incl. light margins 
  29203.         $ow = $fbw + $paddingL + $paddingR; // Full overall width incl. user-defined padding 
  29204.  
  29205.         $fbwi = $fbw - 2; // Full barcode width incl. light margins - 2mm - for isbn string 
  29206.         // cf. http://www.gs1uk.org/downloads/bar_code/Bar coding getting it right.pdf 
  29207.         $num_height = 3 * $size;     // Height of numerals 
  29208.         $fbh = $arrcode['nom-H'] * $size * $height;  // Full barcode height incl. numerals 
  29209.         $bch = $fbh - (1.5 * $size);     // Barcode height of bars     (3mm for numerals) 
  29210.  
  29211.         if (($btype == 'EAN13' && $showtext) || $btype == 'ISSN' || $btype == 'ISBN') { // Add height for ISBN string + margin from top of bars 
  29212.             $tisbnm = 1.5 * $size; // Top margin between isbn (if shown) & bars 
  29213.             $codestr_fontsize = 2.1 * $size; 
  29214.             $paddingT += $codestr_fontsize + $tisbnm; 
  29215.         } 
  29216.         $oh = $fbh + $paddingT + $paddingB;  // Full overall height incl. user-defined padding 
  29217.         // PRINT border background color 
  29218.         $xpos = $x; 
  29219.         $ypos = $y; 
  29220.         if ($col) { 
  29221.             $this->SetDColor($col); 
  29222.             $this->SetTColor($col); 
  29223.         } else { 
  29224.             $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  29225.             $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  29226.         } 
  29227.         if ($bgcol) { 
  29228.             $this->SetFColor($bgcol); 
  29229.         } else { 
  29230.             $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  29231.         } 
  29232.         if (!$bgcol && !$col) { // fn. called directly - not via HTML 
  29233.             if ($border) { 
  29234.                 $fillb = 'DF'; 
  29235.             } else { 
  29236.                 $fillb = 'F'; 
  29237.             } 
  29238.             $this->Rect($xpos, $ypos, $ow, $oh, $fillb); 
  29239.         } 
  29240.  
  29241.  
  29242.         // PRINT BARS 
  29243.         $xpos = $x + $paddingL + $llm; 
  29244.         $ypos = $y + $paddingT; 
  29245.         if ($col) { 
  29246.             $this->SetFColor($col); 
  29247.         } else { 
  29248.             $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  29249.         } 
  29250.         if ($arrcode !== false) { 
  29251.             foreach ($arrcode["bcode"] AS $v) { 
  29252.                 $bw = ($v["w"] * $xres); 
  29253.                 if ($v["t"]) { 
  29254.                     // draw a vertical bar 
  29255.                     $this->Rect($xpos, $ypos, $bw, $bch, 'F'); 
  29256.                 } 
  29257.                 $xpos += $bw; 
  29258.             } 
  29259.         } 
  29260.  
  29261.  
  29262.         // print text 
  29263.         $prevFontFamily = $this->FontFamily; 
  29264.         $prevFontStyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  29265.         $prevFontSizePt = $this->FontSizePt; 
  29266.  
  29267.         // ISBN string 
  29268.         if (($btype == 'EAN13' && $showtext) || $btype == 'ISBN' || $btype == 'ISSN') { 
  29269.             if ($this->onlyCoreFonts) { 
  29270.                 $this->SetFont('chelvetica'); 
  29271.             } else { 
  29272.                 $this->SetFont('sans'); 
  29273.             } 
  29274.  
  29275.             if ($bgcol) { 
  29276.                 $this->SetFColor($bgcol); 
  29277.             } else { 
  29278.                 $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  29279.             } 
  29280.             $this->x = $x + $paddingL + 1; // 1mm left margin (cf. $fbwi above) 
  29281.             // max width is $fbwi 
  29282.             $loop = 0; 
  29283.             while ($loop == 0) { 
  29284.                 $this->SetFontSize($codestr_fontsize * 1.4 * _MPDFK, false); // don't write 
  29285.                 $sz = $this->GetStringWidth($codestr); 
  29286.                 if ($sz > $fbwi) 
  29287.                     $codestr_fontsize -= 0.1; 
  29288.                 else 
  29289.                     $loop ++; 
  29290.             } 
  29291.             $this->SetFont('', '', $codestr_fontsize * 1.4 * _MPDFK, true, true); // * 1.4 because font height is only 7/10 of given mm 
  29292.             // WORD SPACING 
  29293.             if ($fbwi > $sz) { 
  29294.                 $xtra = $fbwi - $sz; 
  29295.                 $charspacing = $xtra / (strlen($codestr) - 1); 
  29296.                 if ($charspacing) { 
  29297.                     $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3F Tc ET', $charspacing * _MPDFK)); 
  29298.                 } 
  29299.             } 
  29300.             $this->y = $y + $paddingT - ($codestr_fontsize ) - $tisbnm; 
  29301.             $this->Cell($fbw, $codestr_fontsize, $codestr); 
  29302.             if ($charspacing) { 
  29303.                 $this->_out('BT 0 Tc ET'); 
  29304.             } 
  29305.         } 
  29306.  
  29307.  
  29308.         // Bottom NUMERALS 
  29309.         // mPDF 5.7.4 
  29310.         if ($this->onlyCoreFonts) { 
  29311.             $this->SetFont('ccourier'); 
  29312.             $fh = 1.3; 
  29313.         } else { 
  29314.             $this->SetFont('ocrb'); 
  29315.             $fh = 1.06; 
  29316.         } 
  29317.         $charRO = ''; 
  29318.         if ($btype == 'EAN13' || $btype == 'ISBN' || $btype == 'ISSN') { 
  29319.             $outerfontsize = 3; // Inner fontsize = 3 
  29320.             $outerp = $xres * 4; 
  29321.             $innerp = $xres * 2.5; 
  29322.             $textw = ($bcw * 0.5) - $outerp - $innerp; 
  29323.             $chars = 6; // number of numerals in each half 
  29324.             $charLO = substr($code, 0, 1); // Left Outer 
  29325.             $charLI = substr($code, 1, 6); // Left Inner 
  29326.             $charRI = substr($code, 7, 6); // Right Inner 
  29327.             if (!$supplement) 
  29328.                 $charRO = '>'; // Right Outer 
  29329.         } 
  29330.         elseif ($btype == 'UPCA') { 
  29331.             $outerfontsize = 2.3; // Inner fontsize = 3 
  29332.             $outerp = $xres * 10; 
  29333.             $innerp = $xres * 2.5; 
  29334.             $textw = ($bcw * 0.5) - $outerp - $innerp; 
  29335.             $chars = 5; 
  29336.             $charLO = substr($code, 0, 1); // Left Outer 
  29337.             $charLI = substr($code, 1, 5); // Left Inner 
  29338.             $charRI = substr($code, 6, 5); // Right Inner 
  29339.             $charRO = substr($code, 11, 1); // Right Outer 
  29340.         } elseif ($btype == 'UPCE') { 
  29341.             $outerfontsize = 2.3; // Inner fontsize = 3 
  29342.             $outerp = $xres * 4; 
  29343.             $innerp = 0; 
  29344.             $textw = ($bcw * 0.5) - $outerp - $innerp; 
  29345.             $chars = 3; 
  29346.             $upce_code = $arrcode['code']; 
  29347.             $charLO = substr($code, 0, 1); // Left Outer 
  29348.             $charLI = substr($upce_code, 0, 3); // Left Inner 
  29349.             $charRI = substr($upce_code, 3, 3); // Right Inner 
  29350.             $charRO = substr($code, 11, 1); // Right Outer 
  29351.         } elseif ($btype == 'EAN8') { 
  29352.             $outerfontsize = 3; // Inner fontsize = 3 
  29353.             $outerp = $xres * 4; 
  29354.             $innerp = $xres * 2.5; 
  29355.             $textw = ($bcw * 0.5) - $outerp - $innerp; 
  29356.             $chars = 4; 
  29357.             $charLO = '<'; // Left Outer 
  29358.             $charLI = substr($code, 0, 4); // Left Inner 
  29359.             $charRI = substr($code, 4, 4); // Right Inner 
  29360.             if (!$supplement) 
  29361.                 $charRO = '>'; // Right Outer 
  29362.         } 
  29363.  
  29364.         $this->SetFontSize(($outerfontsize / 3) * 3 * $fh * $size * _MPDFK); // 3mm numerals (FontSize is larger to account for space above/below characters) 
  29365.  
  29366.         if (!$this->usingCoreFont) { 
  29367.             $cw = $this->_getCharWidth($this->CurrentFont['cw'], 32) * 3 * $fh * $size / 1000; 
  29368.         } // character width at 3mm 
  29369.         else { 
  29370.             $cw = 600 * 3 * $fh * $size / 1000; 
  29371.         } // mPDF 5.7.4 
  29372.         // Outer left character 
  29373.         $y_text = $y + $paddingT + $bch - ($num_height / 2); 
  29374.         $y_text_outer = $y + $paddingT + $bch - ($num_height * ($outerfontsize / 3) / 2); 
  29375.  
  29376.         $this->x = $x + $paddingL - ($cw * ($outerfontsize / 3) * 0.1); // 0.1 is correction as char does not fill full width; 
  29377.         $this->y = $y_text_outer; 
  29378.         $this->Cell($cw, $num_height, $charLO); 
  29379.  
  29380.         // WORD SPACING for inner chars 
  29381.         $xtra = $textw - ($cw * $chars); 
  29382.         $charspacing = $xtra / ($chars - 1); 
  29383.         if ($charspacing) { 
  29384.             $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3F Tc ET', $charspacing * _MPDFK)); 
  29385.         } 
  29386.  
  29387.         if ($bgcol) { 
  29388.             $this->SetFColor($bgcol); 
  29389.         } else { 
  29390.             $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  29391.         } 
  29392.  
  29393.         $this->SetFontSize(3 * $fh * $size * _MPDFK); // 3mm numerals (FontSize is larger to account for space above/below characters) 
  29394.         // Inner left half characters 
  29395.         $this->x = $x + $paddingL + $llm + $outerp; 
  29396.         $this->y = $y_text; 
  29397.         $this->Cell($textw, $num_height, $charLI, 0, 0, '', 1); 
  29398.  
  29399.         // Inner right half characters 
  29400.         $this->x = $x + $paddingL + $llm + ($bcw * 0.5) + $innerp; 
  29401.         $this->y = $y_text; 
  29402.         $this->Cell($textw, $num_height, $charRI, 0, 0, '', 1); 
  29403.  
  29404.         if ($charspacing) { 
  29405.             $this->_out('BT 0 Tc ET'); 
  29406.         } 
  29407.  
  29408.         // Outer Right character 
  29409.         $this->SetFontSize(($outerfontsize / 3) * 3 * $fh * $size * _MPDFK); // 3mm numerals (FontSize is larger to account for space above/below characters) 
  29410.  
  29411.         $this->x = $x + $paddingL + $llm + $bcw + $rlm - ($cw * ($outerfontsize / 3) * 0.9); // 0.9 is correction as char does not fill full width 
  29412.         $this->y = $y_text_outer; 
  29413.         $this->Cell($cw * ($outerfontsize / 3), $num_height, $charRO, 0, 0, 'R'); 
  29414.  
  29415.         if ($supplement) { // EAN-2 or -5 Supplement 
  29416.             // PRINT BARS 
  29417.             $supparrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($supplement_code, 'EAN' . $supplement); 
  29418.             if ($supparrcode === false) { 
  29419.                 throw new MpdfException('Error in barcode string (supplement): ' . $codestr . ' ' . $supplement_code); 
  29420.             } 
  29421.             if (strlen($supplement_code) != $supplement) { 
  29422.                 throw new MpdfException('Barcode supplement incorrect: ' . $supplement_code); 
  29423.             } 
  29424.             $llm = $fbw - (($arrcode['lightmR'] - $supparrcode['sepM']) * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size); // Left Light margin 
  29425.             $rlm = $arrcode['lightmR'] * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size; // Right Light margin 
  29426.  
  29427.             $bcw = ($supparrcode["maxw"] * $xres); // Barcode width = Should always be 31.35mm * $size 
  29428.  
  29429.             $fbw = $bcw + $llm + $rlm; // Full barcode width incl. light margins 
  29430.             $ow = $fbw + $paddingL + $paddingR; // Full overall width incl. user-defined padding 
  29431.             $bch = $fbh - (1.5 * $size) - ($num_height + 0.5);  // Barcode height of bars     (3mm for numerals) 
  29432.  
  29433.             $xpos = $x + $paddingL + $llm; 
  29434.             $ypos = $y + $paddingT + $num_height + 0.5; 
  29435.             if ($col) { 
  29436.                 $this->SetFColor($col); 
  29437.             } else { 
  29438.                 $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  29439.             } 
  29440.             if ($supparrcode !== false) { 
  29441.                 foreach ($supparrcode["bcode"] AS $v) { 
  29442.                     $bw = ($v["w"] * $xres); 
  29443.                     if ($v["t"]) { 
  29444.                         // draw a vertical bar 
  29445.                         $this->Rect($xpos, $ypos, $bw, $bch, 'F'); 
  29446.                     } 
  29447.                     $xpos += $bw; 
  29448.                 } 
  29449.             } 
  29450.  
  29451.             // Characters 
  29452.             if ($bgcol) { 
  29453.                 $this->SetFColor($bgcol); 
  29454.             } else { 
  29455.                 $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  29456.             } 
  29457.             $this->SetFontSize(3 * $fh * $size * _MPDFK); // 3mm numerals (FontSize is larger to account for space above/below characters) 
  29458.             $this->x = $x + $paddingL + $llm; 
  29459.             $this->y = $y + $paddingT; 
  29460.             $this->Cell($bcw, $num_height, $supplement_code, 0, 0, 'C'); 
  29461.  
  29462.             // Outer Right character (light margin) 
  29463.             $this->SetFontSize(($outerfontsize / 3) * 3 * $fh * $size * _MPDFK); // 3mm numerals (FontSize is larger to account for space above/below characters) 
  29464.             $this->x = $x + $paddingL + $llm + $bcw + $rlm - ($cw * 0.9); // 0.9 is correction as char does not fill full width 
  29465.             $this->y = $y + $paddingT; 
  29466.             $this->Cell($cw * ($outerfontsize / 3), $num_height, '>', 0, 0, 'R'); 
  29467.         } 
  29468.  
  29469.  
  29470.  
  29471.         // Restore ************** 
  29472.         $this->SetFont($prevFontFamily, $prevFontStyle, $prevFontSizePt); 
  29473.         $this->DrawColor = $prevDrawColor; 
  29474.         $this->TextColor = $prevTextColor; 
  29475.         $this->FillColor = $prevFillColor; 
  29476.         $this->SetLineWidth($lw); 
  29477.         $this->SetY($y); 
  29478.     } 
  29479.  
  29480.     // ==================================================== 
  29481.     // POSTAL and OTHER barcodes 
  29482.     function WriteBarcode2($code, $x = '', $y = '', $size = 1, $height = 1, $bgcol = false, $col = false, $btype = 'IMB', $print_ratio = '', $k = 1) 
  29483.     { 
  29484.         if (empty($code)) { 
  29485.             return; 
  29486.         } 
  29487.         if (!class_exists('PDFBarcode', false)) { 
  29488.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'classes/barcode.php'); 
  29489.         } 
  29490.         $this->barcode = new PDFBarcode(); 
  29491.         $arrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($code, $btype, $print_ratio); 
  29492.  
  29493.         if ($arrcode === false) { 
  29494.             throw new MpdfException('Error in barcode string: ' . $code); 
  29495.         } 
  29496.         if (empty($x)) { 
  29497.             $x = $this->x; 
  29498.         } 
  29499.         if (empty($y)) { 
  29500.             $y = $this->y; 
  29501.         } 
  29502.         $prevDrawColor = $this->DrawColor; 
  29503.         $prevTextColor = $this->TextColor; 
  29504.         $prevFillColor = $this->FillColor; 
  29505.         $lw = $this->LineWidth; 
  29506.         $this->SetLineWidth(0.01); 
  29507.         $size /= $k; // in case resized in a table 
  29508.         $xres = $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size; 
  29509.  
  29510.         if ($btype == 'IMB' || $btype == 'RM4SCC' || $btype == 'KIX' || $btype == 'POSTNET' || $btype == 'PLANET') { 
  29511.             $llm = $arrcode['quietL'] / $k; // Left Quiet margin 
  29512.             $rlm = $arrcode['quietR'] / $k; // Right Quiet margin 
  29513.             $tlm = $blm = $arrcode['quietTB'] / $k; 
  29514.             $height = 1;  // Overrides 
  29515.         } elseif (in_array($btype, array('C128A', 'C128B', 'C128C', 'EAN128A', 'EAN128B', 'EAN128C', 'C39', 'C39+', 'C39E', 'C39E+', 'S25', 'S25+', 'I25', 'I25+', 'I25B', 'I25B+', 'C93', 'MSI', 'MSI+', 'CODABAR', 'CODE11'))) { 
  29516.             $llm = $arrcode['lightmL'] * $xres; // Left Quiet margin 
  29517.             $rlm = $arrcode['lightmR'] * $xres; // Right Quiet margin 
  29518.             $tlm = $blm = $arrcode['lightTB'] * $xres * $height; 
  29519.         } 
  29520.  
  29521.  
  29522.         $bcw = ($arrcode["maxw"] * $xres); 
  29523.         $fbw = $bcw + $llm + $rlm;  // Full barcode width incl. light margins 
  29524.  
  29525.         $bch = ($arrcode["nom-H"] * $size * $height); 
  29526.         $fbh = $bch + $tlm + $blm;  // Full barcode height 
  29527.         // PRINT border background color 
  29528.         $xpos = $x; 
  29529.         $ypos = $y; 
  29530.         if ($col) { 
  29531.             $this->SetDColor($col); 
  29532.             $this->SetTColor($col); 
  29533.         } else { 
  29534.             $this->SetDColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  29535.             $this->SetTColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  29536.         } 
  29537.         if ($bgcol) { 
  29538.             $this->SetFColor($bgcol); 
  29539.         } else { 
  29540.             $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(255)); 
  29541.         } 
  29542.  
  29543.         // PRINT BARS 
  29544.         if ($col) { 
  29545.             $this->SetFColor($col); 
  29546.         } else { 
  29547.             $this->SetFColor($this->ConvertColor(0)); 
  29548.         } 
  29549.         $xpos = $x + $llm; 
  29550.  
  29551.         if ($arrcode !== false) { 
  29552.             foreach ($arrcode["bcode"] AS $v) { 
  29553.                 $bw = ($v["w"] * $xres); 
  29554.                 if ($v["t"]) { 
  29555.                     $ypos = $y + $tlm + ($bch * $v['p'] / $arrcode['maxh']); 
  29556.                     $this->Rect($xpos, $ypos, $bw, ($v['h'] * $bch / $arrcode['maxh']), 'F'); 
  29557.                 } 
  29558.                 $xpos += $bw; 
  29559.             } 
  29560.         } 
  29561.  
  29562.         // PRINT BEARER BARS 
  29563.         if ($btype == 'I25B' || $btype == 'I25B+') { 
  29564.             $this->Rect($x, $y, $fbw, ($arrcode['lightTB'] * $xres * $height), 'F'); 
  29565.             $this->Rect($x, $y + $tlm + $bch, $fbw, ($arrcode['lightTB'] * $xres * $height), 'F'); 
  29566.         } 
  29567.  
  29568.         // Restore ************** 
  29569.         $this->DrawColor = $prevDrawColor; 
  29570.         $this->TextColor = $prevTextColor; 
  29571.         $this->FillColor = $prevFillColor; 
  29572.         $this->SetLineWidth($lw); 
  29573.         $this->SetY($y); 
  29574.     } 
  29575.  
  29576.     /** -- END BARCODES -- */ 
  29577.  
  29578.     // ==================================================== 
  29579.     // ==================================================== 
  29580.  
  29581.     function StartTransform($returnstring = false) 
  29582.     { 
  29583.         if ($returnstring) { 
  29584.             return('q'); 
  29585.         } else { 
  29586.             $this->_out('q'); 
  29587.         } 
  29588.     } 
  29589.  
  29590.     function StopTransform($returnstring = false) 
  29591.     { 
  29592.         if ($returnstring) { 
  29593.             return('Q'); 
  29594.         } else { 
  29595.             $this->_out('Q'); 
  29596.         } 
  29597.     } 
  29598.  
  29599.     function transformScale($s_x, $s_y, $x = '', $y = '', $returnstring = false) 
  29600.     { 
  29601.         if ($x === '') { 
  29602.             $x = $this->x; 
  29603.         } 
  29604.         if ($y === '') { 
  29605.             $y = $this->y; 
  29606.         } 
  29607.         if (($s_x == 0) OR ( $s_y == 0)) { 
  29608.             throw new MpdfException('Please do not use values equal to zero for scaling'); 
  29609.         } 
  29610.         $y = ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK; 
  29611.         $x *= _MPDFK; 
  29612.         //calculate elements of transformation matrix 
  29613.         $s_x /= 100; 
  29614.         $s_y /= 100; 
  29615.         $tm = array(); 
  29616.         $tm[0] = $s_x; 
  29617.         $tm[1] = 0; 
  29618.         $tm[2] = 0; 
  29619.         $tm[3] = $s_y; 
  29620.         $tm[4] = $x * (1 - $s_x); 
  29621.         $tm[5] = $y * (1 - $s_y); 
  29622.         //scale the coordinate system 
  29623.         if ($returnstring) { 
  29624.             return($this->_transform($tm, true)); 
  29625.         } else { 
  29626.             $this->_transform($tm); 
  29627.         } 
  29628.     } 
  29629.  
  29630.     function transformTranslate($t_x, $t_y, $returnstring = false) 
  29631.     { 
  29632.         //calculate elements of transformation matrix 
  29633.         $tm = array(); 
  29634.         $tm[0] = 1; 
  29635.         $tm[1] = 0; 
  29636.         $tm[2] = 0; 
  29637.         $tm[3] = 1; 
  29638.         $tm[4] = $t_x * _MPDFK; 
  29639.         $tm[5] = -$t_y * _MPDFK; 
  29640.         //translate the coordinate system 
  29641.         if ($returnstring) { 
  29642.             return($this->_transform($tm, true)); 
  29643.         } else { 
  29644.             $this->_transform($tm); 
  29645.         } 
  29646.     } 
  29647.  
  29648.     function transformRotate($angle, $x = '', $y = '', $returnstring = false) 
  29649.     { 
  29650.         if ($x === '') { 
  29651.             $x = $this->x; 
  29652.         } 
  29653.         if ($y === '') { 
  29654.             $y = $this->y; 
  29655.         } 
  29656.         $angle = -$angle; 
  29657.         $y = ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK; 
  29658.         $x *= _MPDFK; 
  29659.         //calculate elements of transformation matrix 
  29660.         $tm = array(); 
  29661.         $tm[0] = cos(deg2rad($angle)); 
  29662.         $tm[1] = sin(deg2rad($angle)); 
  29663.         $tm[2] = -$tm[1]; 
  29664.         $tm[3] = $tm[0]; 
  29665.         $tm[4] = $x + $tm[1] * $y - $tm[0] * $x; 
  29666.         $tm[5] = $y - $tm[0] * $y - $tm[1] * $x; 
  29667.         //rotate the coordinate system around ($x, $y) 
  29668.         if ($returnstring) { 
  29669.             return($this->_transform($tm, true)); 
  29670.         } else { 
  29671.             $this->_transform($tm); 
  29672.         } 
  29673.     } 
  29674.  
  29675.     // mPDF 5.7.3 TRANSFORMS 
  29676.     function transformSkew($angle_x, $angle_y, $x = '', $y = '', $returnstring = false) 
  29677.     { 
  29678.         if ($x === '') { 
  29679.             $x = $this->x; 
  29680.         } 
  29681.         if ($y === '') { 
  29682.             $y = $this->y; 
  29683.         } 
  29684.         $angle_x = -$angle_x; 
  29685.         $angle_y = -$angle_y; 
  29686.         $x *= _MPDFK; 
  29687.         $y = ($this->h - $y) * _MPDFK; 
  29688.         //calculate elements of transformation matrix 
  29689.         $tm = array(); 
  29690.         $tm[0] = 1; 
  29691.         $tm[1] = tan(deg2rad($angle_y)); 
  29692.         $tm[2] = tan(deg2rad($angle_x)); 
  29693.         $tm[3] = 1; 
  29694.         $tm[4] = -$tm[2] * $y; 
  29695.         $tm[5] = -$tm[1] * $x; 
  29696.         //skew the coordinate system 
  29697.         if ($returnstring) { 
  29698.             return($this->_transform($tm, true)); 
  29699.         } else { 
  29700.             $this->_transform($tm); 
  29701.         } 
  29702.     } 
  29703.  
  29704.     function _transform($tm, $returnstring = false) 
  29705.     { 
  29706.         if ($returnstring) { 
  29707.             return(sprintf('%.4F %.4F %.4F %.4F %.4F %.4F cm', $tm[0], $tm[1], $tm[2], $tm[3], $tm[4], $tm[5])); 
  29708.         } else { 
  29709.             $this->_out(sprintf('%.4F %.4F %.4F %.4F %.4F %.4F cm', $tm[0], $tm[1], $tm[2], $tm[3], $tm[4], $tm[5])); 
  29710.         } 
  29711.     } 
  29712.  
  29713.     // AUTOFONT ========================= 
  29714.     function markScriptToLang($html) 
  29715.     { 
  29716.         if ($this->onlyCoreFonts) { 
  29717.             return $html; 
  29718.         } 
  29719.  
  29720.         // sets $this->script2lang 
  29721.         if (empty($this->script2lang)) { 
  29722.             include(_MPDF_PATH . 'config_script2lang.php'); 
  29723.         } 
  29724.  
  29725.         $n = ''; 
  29726.         $a = preg_split('/<(.*?)>/ms', $html, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE); 
  29727.         foreach ($a as $i => $e) { 
  29728.             if ($i % 2 == 0) { 
  29729.                 //ignore if in Textarea 
  29730.                 if ($i > 0 && strtolower(substr($a[$i - 1], 1, 8)) == 'textarea') { 
  29731.                     $a[$i] = $e; 
  29732.                     continue; 
  29733.                 } 
  29734.                 $e = strcode2utf($e); 
  29735.                 $e = $this->lesser_entity_decode($e); 
  29736.  
  29737.                 $earr = $this->UTF8StringToArray($e, false); 
  29738.  
  29739.                 $scriptblock = 0; 
  29740.                 $scriptblocks = array(); 
  29741.                 $scriptblocks[0] = 0; 
  29742.                 $chardata = array(); 
  29743.                 $subchunk = 0; 
  29744.                 $charctr = 0; 
  29745.                 foreach ($earr as $char) { 
  29746.                     $ucd_record = UCDN::get_ucd_record($char); 
  29747.                     $sbl = $ucd_record[6]; 
  29748.  
  29749.                     if ($sbl && $sbl != 40 && $sbl != 102) { 
  29750.                         if ($scriptblock == 0) { 
  29751.                             $scriptblock = $sbl; 
  29752.                             $scriptblocks[$subchunk] = $scriptblock;
